name: band shrug
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and place the band under your feet, holding the ends with your hands.
Step:2 Keep your arms straight and relaxed, and let the band hang in front of your thighs.
Step:3 Engage your traps by shrugging your shoulders upward, lifting the band as high as possible.
Step:4 Hold the contraction for a moment, then slowly lower your shoulders back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: band shrug
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and place the band under your feet, holding the ends with your hands.
Step:2 Keep your arms straight and relaxed, and let the band hang in front of your thighs.
Step:3 Engage your traps by shrugging your shoulders upward, lifting the band as high as possible.
Step:4 Hold the contraction for a moment, then slowly lower your shoulders back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Encogimiento de hombros con banda
instructions: Paso 1: Párese con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y coloque la banda debajo de sus pies, sosteniendo los extremos con las manos.
Paso 2: Mantenga los brazos rectos y relajados, y deje que la banda cuelgue frente a sus muslos.
Paso 3: Active sus trapecios encogiendo los hombros hacia arriba, levantando la banda lo más alto posible.
Paso 4: Mantenga la contracción por un momento, luego baje lentamente los hombros a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: barbell decline close grip to skull press
instructions: Step:1 Lie on a decline bench with your head lower than your feet and hold a barbell with a close grip.
Step:2 Lower the barbell towards your forehead by bending your elbows, keeping your upper arms stationary.
Step:3 Pause for a moment, then extend your arms to press the barbell back up to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: barbell decline close grip to skull press
instructions: Step:1 Lie on a decline bench with your head lower than your feet and hold a barbell with a close grip.
Step:2 Lower the barbell towards your forehead by bending your elbows, keeping your upper arms stationary.
Step:3 Pause for a moment, then extend your arms to press the barbell back up to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Press francés declinado con barra y agarre cerrado
instructions: Paso 1: Acuéstese en un banco declinado con la cabeza más baja que los pies y sostenga una barra con un agarre cerrado.
Paso 2: Baje la barra hacia su frente flexionando los codos, manteniendo la parte superior de los brazos inmóvil.
Paso 3: Haga una pausa por un momento, luego extienda los brazos para levantar la barra de nuevo a la posición inicial.
Paso 4: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: push-up inside leg kick
instructions: Step:1 Start in a push-up position with your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart and your feet together.
Step:2 Lower your body towards the ground by bending your elbows, keeping your back straight and your core engaged.
Step:3 As you push back up, lift one leg off the ground and kick it out to the side, keeping it straight.
Step:4 Lower your leg back down and repeat the push-up, then switch to the other leg.
Step:5 Continue alternating leg kicks with each push-up repetition.

translations.name: push-up inside leg kick
instructions: Step:1 Start in a push-up position with your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart and your feet together.
Step:2 Lower your body towards the ground by bending your elbows, keeping your back straight and your core engaged.
Step:3 As you push back up, lift one leg off the ground and kick it out to the side, keeping it straight.
Step:4 Lower your leg back down and repeat the push-up, then switch to the other leg.
Step:5 Continue alternating leg kicks with each push-up repetition.

translations.name: Flexión con patada lateral interna
instructions: Paso 1: Comience en una posición de flexión con las manos un poco más separadas que el ancho de los hombros y los pies juntos.
Paso 2: Baje su cuerpo hacia el suelo flexionando los codos, manteniendo la espalda recta y el core activado.
Paso 3: Al empujar para subir, levante una pierna del suelo y dé una patada hacia el lado, manteniéndola recta.
Paso 4: Baje la pierna y repita la flexión, luego cambie a la otra pierna.
Paso 5: Continúe alternando patadas con cada repetición de flexión.

name: cable incline fly (on stability ball)
instructions: Step:1 Set up a stability ball at an incline angle.
Step:2 Attach the cable handles to the high pulleys of a cable machine.
Step:3 Sit on the stability ball facing away from the machine, with your feet firmly planted on the ground.
Step:4 Grasp the cable handles with an overhand grip, palms facing forward.
Step:5 Lean forward slightly, keeping your back straight and core engaged.
Step:6 With a controlled motion, bring your arms out to the sides, keeping a slight bend in your elbows.
Step:7 Continue the motion until your arms are parallel to the ground.
Step:8 Pause for a moment, then slowly return to the starting position.
Step:9 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: cable incline fly (on stability ball)
instructions: Step:1 Set up a stability ball at an incline angle.
Step:2 Attach the cable handles to the high pulleys of a cable machine.
Step:3 Sit on the stability ball facing away from the machine, with your feet firmly planted on the ground.
Step:4 Grasp the cable handles with an overhand grip, palms facing forward.
Step:5 Lean forward slightly, keeping your back straight and core engaged.
Step:6 With a controlled motion, bring your arms out to the sides, keeping a slight bend in your elbows.
Step:7 Continue the motion until your arms are parallel to the ground.
Step:8 Pause for a moment, then slowly return to the starting position.
Step:9 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Aperturas inclinadas con cable (en balón de estabilidad)
instructions: Paso 1: Coloque un balón de estabilidad en un ángulo inclinado.
Paso 2: Enganche las manijas de cable a las poleas altas de una máquina de cables.
Paso 3: Siéntese en el balón de estabilidad de espaldas a la máquina, con los pies firmemente plantados en el suelo.
Paso 4: Agarre las manijas de cable con un agarre prono (palmas hacia adelante).
Paso 5: Inclínese ligeramente hacia adelante, manteniendo la espalda recta y el core activado.
Paso 6: Con un movimiento controlado, abra los brazos hacia los lados, manteniendo una ligera flexión en los codos.
Paso 7: Continúe el movimiento hasta que sus brazos estén paralelos al suelo.
Paso 8: Haga una pausa por un momento, luego regrese lentamente a la posición inicial.
Paso 9: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: kettlebell double alternating hang clean
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a kettlebell in each hand with an overhand grip.
Step:2 Bend your knees slightly and hinge forward at the hips, keeping your back straight and chest up.
Step:3 Allow the kettlebells to hang straight down in front of your body.
Step:4 In one fluid motion, explosively extend your hips and knees while shrugging your shoulders.
Step:5 As the kettlebells rise, pull them up towards your shoulders, keeping your elbows high and out to the sides.
Step:6 Catch the kettlebells at shoulder height, with your palms facing inward and your elbows pointing forward.
Step:7 Lower the kettlebells back down to the starting position and repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: kettlebell double alternating hang clean
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a kettlebell in each hand with an overhand grip.
Step:2 Bend your knees slightly and hinge forward at the hips, keeping your back straight and chest up.
Step:3 Allow the kettlebells to hang straight down in front of your body.
Step:4 In one fluid motion, explosively extend your hips and knees while shrugging your shoulders.
Step:5 As the kettlebells rise, pull them up towards your shoulders, keeping your elbows high and out to the sides.
Step:6 Catch the kettlebells at shoulder height, with your palms facing inward and your elbows pointing forward.
Step:7 Lower the kettlebells back down to the starting position and repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Cargada colgante alternada con dos kettlebells
instructions: Paso 1: Párese con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros, sosteniendo una kettlebell en cada mano con agarre prono.
Paso 2: Flexione ligeramente las rodillas e inclínese hacia adelante desde las caderas, manteniendo la espalda recta y el pecho erguido.
Paso 3: Permita que las kettlebells cuelguen rectas frente a su cuerpo.
Paso 4: En un movimiento fluido, extienda explosivamente sus caderas y rodillas mientras encoge los hombros.
Paso 5: A medida que las kettlebells suben, jálelas hacia sus hombros, manteniendo los codos altos y hacia los lados.
Paso 6: Reciba las kettlebells a la altura de los hombros, con las palmas mirando hacia adentro y los codos apuntando hacia adelante.
Paso 7: Baje las kettlebells a la posición inicial y repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell contralateral forward lunge
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a dumbbell in each hand.
Step:2 Take a step forward with your right foot, keeping your back straight and core engaged.
Step:3 Lower your body by bending both knees until your right thigh is parallel to the ground.
Step:4 Push through your right heel to return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat with your left leg.
Step:6 Alternate legs for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell contralateral forward lunge
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a dumbbell in each hand.
Step:2 Take a step forward with your right foot, keeping your back straight and core engaged.
Step:3 Lower your body by bending both knees until your right thigh is parallel to the ground.
Step:4 Push through your right heel to return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat with your left leg.
Step:6 Alternate legs for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Zancada contralateral hacia adelante con mancuerna
instructions: Paso 1: Párese con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros, sosteniendo una mancuerna en cada mano.
Paso 2: Dé un paso hacia adelante con el pie derecho, manteniendo la espalda recta y el core activado.
Paso 3: Baje su cuerpo flexionando ambas rodillas hasta que su muslo derecho esté paralelo al suelo.
Paso 4: Empuje con el talón derecho para volver a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita con la pierna izquierda.
Paso 6: Alterne las piernas para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: barbell press sit-up
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back on a mat with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Hold the barbell with an overhand grip, resting it on your chest.
Step:3 Engaging your abs, slowly lift your upper body off the ground, curling forward until your torso is at a 45-degree angle.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your upper body back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: barbell press sit-up
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back on a mat with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Hold the barbell with an overhand grip, resting it on your chest.
Step:3 Engaging your abs, slowly lift your upper body off the ground, curling forward until your torso is at a 45-degree angle.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your upper body back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Sit-up (abdominales) con press de barra
instructions: Paso 1: Acuéstese boca arriba en una colchoneta con las rodillas flexionadas y los pies apoyados en el suelo.
Paso 2: Sostenga la barra con un agarre prono, apoyándola sobre su pecho.
Paso 3: Activando sus abdominales, levante lentamente la parte superior del cuerpo del suelo, flexionándose hacia adelante hasta que su torso esté en un ángulo de 45 grados.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, luego baje lentamente la parte superior del cuerpo a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: cable reverse one arm curl
instructions: Step:1 Stand facing a cable machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Grasp the cable handle with an underhand grip, palm facing down.
Step:3 Keep your elbow close to your side and slowly curl your forearm up towards your shoulder.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your forearm back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: cable reverse one arm curl
instructions: Step:1 Stand facing a cable machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Grasp the cable handle with an overhand grip, palm facing down.
Step:3 Keep your elbow close to your side and slowly curl your forearm up towards your shoulder.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your forearm back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Curl inverso a un brazo con cable
instructions: Paso 1: Párese frente a una máquina de cable con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros.
Paso 2: Agarre la manija del cable con un agarre prono (palma hacia abajo).
Paso 3: Mantenga el codo pegado al costado y flexione lentamente el antebrazo hacia el hombro.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, luego baje lentamente el antebrazo a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell finger curls
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench or chair with your feet flat on the ground and your back straight.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell in one hand with an underhand grip, resting your forearm on your thigh, palm facing up.
Step:3 Allow the dumbbell to roll down to your fingertips, then curl it back up by flexing your fingers.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch to the other hand.

translations.name: dumbbell finger curls
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench or chair with your feet flat on the ground and your back straight.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell in one hand with an underhand grip, resting your forearm on your thigh, palm facing up.
Step:3 Allow the dumbbell to roll down to your fingertips, then curl it back up by flexing your fingers.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch to the other hand.

translations.name: Curl de dedos con mancuerna
instructions: Paso 1: Siéntese en un banco o silla con los pies apoyados en el suelo и la espalda recta.
Paso 2: Sostenga una mancuerna en una mano con agarre supino (palma hacia arriba), apoyando el antebrazo en el muslo.
Paso 3: Deje que la mancuerna ruede hasta la punta de sus dedos, luego súbala de nuevo flexionando los dedos.
Paso 4: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambie a la otra mano.

name: band stiff leg deadlift
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and place the band around your ankles.
Step:2 Hold the band with both hands in front of your thighs, palms facing your body.
Step:3 Keeping your back straight and your core engaged, hinge at the hips and slowly lower your upper body towards the ground.
Step:4 As you lower, push your hips back and allow your knees to bend slightly.
Step:5 Lower the band towards the ground, feeling a stretch in your hamstrings.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then engage your glutes and hamstrings to lift your upper body back up to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: band stiff leg deadlift
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and place the band under your feet.
Step:2 Hold the band with both hands in front of your thighs, palms facing your body.
Step:3 Keeping your back straight and your core engaged, hinge at the hips and slowly lower your upper body towards the ground.
Step:4 As you lower, push your hips back and allow your knees to bend slightly.
Step:5 Lower the band towards the ground, feeling a stretch in your hamstrings.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then engage your glutes and hamstrings to lift your upper body back up to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Peso muerto con piernas rígidas y banda
instructions: Paso 1: Párese con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y pise la banda.
Paso 2: Sostenga la banda con ambas manos frente a sus muslos, con las palmas mirando hacia su cuerpo.
Paso 3: Manteniendo la espalda recta y el core activado, inclínese desde las caderas y baje lentamente la parte superior del cuerpo hacia el suelo.
Paso 4: Mientras baja, empuje las caderas hacia atrás y permita que las rodillas se flexionen ligeramente.
Paso 5: Baje la banda hacia el suelo, sintiendo un estiramiento en los isquiotibiales.
Paso 6: Haga una pausa en la parte inferior, luego active sus glúteos e isquiotibiales para levantar la parte superior del cuerpo a la posición inicial.
Paso 7: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: kettlebell goblet squat
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a kettlebell close to your chest with both hands.
Step:2 Keeping your chest up and core engaged, lower your body down into a squat position by bending at the knees and hips.
Step:3 Continue lowering until your thighs are parallel to the ground, or as low as you can comfortably go.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push through your heels to return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: kettlebell goblet squat
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a kettlebell close to your chest with both hands.
Step:2 Keeping your chest up and core engaged, lower your body down into a squat position by bending at the knees and hips.
Step:3 Continue lowering until your thighs are parallel to the ground, or as low as you can comfortably go.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push through your heels to return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Sentadilla de copa con kettlebell
instructions: Paso 1: Párese con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros, sosteniendo una kettlebell cerca de su pecho con ambas manos.
Paso 2: Manteniendo el pecho erguido y el core activado, baje su cuerpo a una posición de sentadilla flexionando rodillas y caderas.
Paso 3: Continúe bajando hasta que sus muslos estén paralelos al suelo, o tan bajo como pueda cómodamente.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa por un momento en la parte inferior, luego empuje con los talones para volver a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: lever chest press
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and position yourself on the machine with your back flat against the pad.
Step:2 Grasp the handles with an overhand grip and position your elbows at a 90-degree angle.
Step:3 Push the handles forward until your arms are fully extended, exhaling during the movement.
Step:4 Pause briefly at the end of the movement, then slowly return to the starting position, inhaling as you do so.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: lever chest press
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and position yourself on the machine with your back flat against the pad.
Step:2 Grasp the handles with an overhand grip and position your elbows at a 90-degree angle.
Step:3 Push the handles forward until your arms are fully extended, exhaling during the movement.
Step:4 Pause briefly at the end of the movement, then slowly return to the starting position, inhaling as you do so.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Press de pecho en máquina de palanca
instructions: Paso 1: Ajuste la altura del asiento y colóquese en la máquina con la espalda plana contra el respaldo.
Paso 2: Agarre las manijas con un agarre prono y coloque los codos en un ángulo de 90 grados.
Paso 3: Empuje las manijas hacia adelante hasta que sus brazos estén completamente extendidos, exhalando durante el movimiento.
Paso 4: Haga una breve pausa al final del movimiento, luego regrese lentamente a la posición inicial, inhalando al hacerlo.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell incline biceps curl
instructions: Step:1 Sit on an incline bench with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing forward, and arms fully extended.
Step:2 Keeping your upper arms stationary, exhale and curl the weights while contracting your biceps.
Step:3 Continue to raise the dumbbells until your biceps are fully contracted and the dumbbells are at shoulder level.
Step:4 Hold the contracted position for a brief pause as you squeeze your biceps.
Step:5 Inhale and slowly begin to lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell incline biceps curl
instructions: Step:1 Sit on an incline bench with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing forward, and arms fully extended.
Step:2 Keeping your upper arms stationary, exhale and curl the weights while contracting your biceps.
Step:3 Continue to raise the dumbbells until your biceps are fully contracted and the dumbbells are at shoulder level.
Step:4 Hold the contracted position for a brief pause as you squeeze your biceps.
Step:5 Inhale and slowly begin to lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Curl de bíceps inclinado con mancuernas
instructions: Paso 1: Siéntese en un banco inclinado con una mancuerna en cada mano, las palmas hacia adelante y los brazos completamente extendidos.
Paso 2: Manteniendo la parte superior de los brazos inmóvil, exhale y flexione las pesas mientras contrae los bíceps.
Paso 3: Continúe levantando las mancuernas hasta que sus bíceps estén completamente contraídos y las mancuernas estén a la altura de los hombros.
Paso 4: Mantenga la posición contraída por una breve pausa mientras aprieta los bíceps.
Paso 5: Inhale y comience a bajar lentamente las mancuernas a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: one arm against wall
instructions: Step:1 Stand facing a wall with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Extend one arm straight out in front of you and place your palm against the wall.
Step:3 Engage your core and lean your body forward, keeping your arm straight and your back flat.
Step:4 Slowly push against the wall with your palm, activating your lat muscles.
Step:5 Hold the position for a few seconds, then release and repeat with the other arm.

translations.name: one arm against wall
instructions: Step:1 Stand facing a wall with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Extend one arm straight out in front of you and place your palm against the wall.
Step:3 Engage your core and lean your body forward, keeping your arm straight and your back flat.
Step:4 Slowly push against the wall with your palm, activating your lat muscles.
Step:5 Hold the position for a few seconds, then release and repeat with the other arm.

translations.name: Empuje a una mano contra la pared
instructions: Paso 1: Párese frente a una pared con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros.
Paso 2: Extienda un brazo recto frente a usted y coloque la palma contra la pared.
Paso 3: Active su core e incline su cuerpo hacia adelante, manteniendo el brazo recto y la espalda plana.
Paso 4: Empuje lentamente contra la pared con la palma, activando los músculos dorsales.
Paso 5: Mantenga la posición por unos segundos, luego suelte y repita con el otro brazo.

name: squat on bosu ball
instructions: Step:1 Place the bosu ball on the ground with the flat side up.
Step:2 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and position yourself on top of the bosu ball.
Step:3 Lower your body down by bending your knees and hips, as if sitting back into a chair.
Step:4 Keep your chest up and your weight on your heels.
Step:5 Lower yourself until your thighs are parallel to the ground.
Step:6 Pause for a moment, then push through your heels to return to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: squat on bosu ball
instructions: Step:1 Place the bosu ball on the ground with the flat side up.
Step:2 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and position yourself on top of the bosu ball.
Step:3 Lower your body down by bending your knees and hips, as if sitting back into a chair.
Step:4 Keep your chest up and your weight on your heels.
Step:5 Lower yourself until your thighs are parallel to the ground.
Step:6 Pause for a moment, then push through your heels to return to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Sentadilla sobre balón Bosu
instructions: Paso 1: Coloque el balón Bosu en el suelo con el lado plano hacia arriba.
Paso 2: Párese con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y colóquese encima del balón Bosu.
Paso 3: Baje su cuerpo flexionando las rodillas y las caderas, como si se sentara en una silla.
Paso 4: Mantenga el pecho erguido y el peso en los talones.
Paso 5: Baje hasta que sus muslos estén paralelos al suelo.
Paso 6: Haga una pausa por un momento, luego empuje con los talones para volver a la posición inicial.
Paso 7: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: close-grip push-up
instructions: Step:1 Start in a high plank position with your hands placed close together, directly under your shoulders.
Step:2 Engage your core and lower your body towards the ground, keeping your elbows close to your sides.
Step:3 Push through your palms to extend your arms and return to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: close-grip push-up
instructions: Step:1 Start in a high plank position with your hands placed close together, directly under your shoulders.
Step:2 Engage your core and lower your body towards the ground, keeping your elbows close to your sides.
Step:3 Push through your palms to extend your arms and return to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Flexión con agarre cerrado
instructions: Paso 1: Comience en una posición de plancha alta con las manos juntas, directamente debajo de los hombros.
Paso 2: Active su core y baje el cuerpo hacia el suelo, manteniendo los codos pegados a los costados.
Paso 3: Empuje con las palmas para extender los brazos y volver a la posición inicial.
Paso 4: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell one arm shoulder press
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a dumbbell in one hand at shoulder level, palm facing forward.
Step:2 Press the dumbbell upward until your arm is fully extended overhead.
Step:3 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch to the other arm.

translations.name: dumbbell one arm shoulder press
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a dumbbell in one hand at shoulder level, palm facing forward.
Step:2 Press the dumbbell upward until your arm is fully extended overhead.
Step:3 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch to the other arm.

translations.name: Press de hombro a un brazo con mancuerna
instructions: Paso 1: Párese con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y sostenga una mancuerna en una mano a la altura del hombro, con la palma hacia adelante.
Paso 2: Empuje la mancuerna hacia arriba hasta que su brazo esté completamente extendido sobre la cabeza.
Paso 3: Haga una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, luego baje lentamente la mancuerna a la posición inicial.
Paso 4: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambie al otro brazo.

name: cable standing up straight crossovers
instructions: Step:1 Stand in the middle of a cable machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Hold the handles of the cables with your palms facing down and your arms extended straight out to the sides.
Step:3 Keeping your arms straight, bring your hands together in front of your body, crossing them over each other.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then slowly return to the starting position, keeping your arms extended.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: cable standing up straight crossovers
instructions: Step:1 Stand in the middle of a cable machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Hold the handles of the cables with your palms facing down and your arms extended straight out to the sides.
Step:3 Keeping your arms straight, bring your hands together in front of your body, crossing them over each other.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then slowly return to the starting position, keeping your arms extended.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Cruce de cables de pie
instructions: Paso 1: Párese en medio de una máquina de cables con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros.
Paso 2: Sostenga las manijas de los cables con las palmas hacia abajo y los brazos extendidos rectos hacia los lados.
Paso 3: Manteniendo los brazos rectos, junte las manos frente a su cuerpo, cruzándolas una sobre la otra.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa por un momento, luego regrese lentamente a la posición inicial, manteniendo los brazos extendidos.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: band side triceps extension
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold the band with both hands, palms facing down.
Step:2 Extend your arms straight out to the sides, keeping them parallel to the ground.
Step:3 Slowly bend your elbows and bring your hands towards your shoulders, keeping your upper arms still.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then slowly extend your arms back out to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: band side triceps extension
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold the band with both hands, palms facing down.
Step:2 Extend your arms straight out to the sides, keeping them parallel to the ground.
Step:3 Slowly bend your elbows and bring your hands towards your shoulders, keeping your upper arms still.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then slowly extend your arms back out to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Extensión lateral de tríceps con banda
instructions: Paso 1: Párese con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y sostenga la banda con ambas manos, palmas hacia abajo.
Paso 2: Extienda los brazos rectos hacia los lados, manteniéndolos paralelos al suelo.
Paso 3: Flexione lentamente los codos y lleve las manos hacia los hombros, manteniendo la parte superior de los brazos inmóvil.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa por un momento, luego extienda lentamente los brazos de nuevo a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell side bend
instructions: Step:1 Stand up straight with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a dumbbell in one hand, letting it hang down by your side.
Step:2 Keeping your back straight and your core engaged, slowly bend sideways at the waist towards the opposite side of the dumbbell, lowering the weight as far as you comfortably can.
Step:3 Pause for a moment, then slowly return to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides and repeat.

translations.name: dumbbell side bend
instructions: Step:1 Stand up straight with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a dumbbell in one hand, letting it hang down by your side.
Step:2 Keeping your back straight and your core engaged, slowly bend sideways at the waist towards the opposite side of the dumbbell, lowering the weight as far as you comfortably can.
Step:3 Pause for a moment, then slowly return to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides and repeat.

translations.name: Flexión lateral con mancuerna
instructions: Paso 1: Párese derecho con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y sostenga una mancuerna en una mano, dejándola colgar a su lado.
Paso 2: Manteniendo la espalda recta y el core activado, inclínese lentamente hacia el lado opuesto de la mancuerna, bajando el peso tanto como pueda cómodamente.
Paso 3: Haga una pausa por un momento, luego regrese lentamente a la posición inicial.
Paso 4: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambie de lado y repita.

name: dumbbell single leg squat
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a dumbbell in each hand.
Step:2 Extend one leg forward and keep it off the ground throughout the exercise.
Step:3 Bend your standing leg and lower your body down as if sitting back into a chair.
Step:4 Keep your chest up and your back straight.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push through your heel to return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch legs.

translations.name: dumbbell single leg squat
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a dumbbell in each hand.
Step:2 Extend one leg forward and keep it off the ground throughout the exercise.
Step:3 Bend your standing leg and lower your body down as if sitting back into a chair.
Step:4 Keep your chest up and your back straight.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push through your heel to return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch legs.

translations.name: Sentadilla a una pierna con mancuerna
instructions: Paso 1: Párese con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros, sosteniendo una mancuerna en cada mano.
Paso 2: Extienda una pierna hacia adelante y manténgala sin tocar el suelo durante todo el ejercicio.
Paso 3: Flexione la pierna de apoyo y baje su cuerpo como si se sentara en una silla.
Paso 4: Mantenga el pecho erguido y la espalda recta.
Paso 5: Haga una pausa en la parte inferior, luego empuje con el talón para volver a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambie de pierna.

name: sledge hammer
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold the sledge hammer with both hands.
Step:2 Engage your core and keep your back straight.
Step:3 Swing the sledge hammer down towards the ground, using your core and upper body strength.
Step:4 As you swing down, pivot your hips and transfer the force to the hammer.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: sledge hammer
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold the sledge hammer with both hands.
Step:2 Engage your core and keep your back straight.
Step:3 Swing the sledge hammer down towards the ground, using your core and upper body strength.
Step:4 As you swing down, pivot your hips and transfer the force to the hammer.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Golpe de martillo (Mazo)
instructions: Paso 1: Párese con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y sostenga el mazo con ambas manos.
Paso 2: Active su core y mantenga la espalda recta.
Paso 3: Balancee el mazo hacia el suelo, usando la fuerza de su core y de la parte superior del cuerpo.
Paso 4: Mientras baja, pivote las caderas y transfiera la fuerza al martillo.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: barbell full squat (back pov)
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, toes slightly turned out.
Step:2 Hold the barbell across your back, resting it on your traps or rear shoulders.
Step:3 Engage your core and keep your chest up as you begin to lower your body down.
Step:4 Bend at the knees and hips, pushing your hips back and down as if sitting into a chair.
Step:5 Lower your body until your thighs are parallel to the ground or slightly below.
Step:6 Keep your knees in line with your toes and your weight in your heels.
Step:7 Drive through your heels to stand back up, extending your hips and knees.
Step:8 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: barbell full squat (back pov)
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, toes slightly turned out.
Step:2 Hold the barbell across your back, resting it on your traps or rear shoulders.
Step:3 Engage your core and keep your chest up as you begin to lower your body down.
Step:4 Bend at the knees and hips, pushing your hips back and down as if sitting into a chair.
Step:5 Lower your body until your thighs are parallel to the ground or slightly below.
Step:6 Keep your knees in line with your toes and your weight in your heels.
Step:7 Drive through your heels to stand back up, extending your hips and knees.
Step:8 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Sentadilla completa con barra (vista trasera)
instructions: Paso 1: Párese con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros, con las puntas de los pies ligeramente hacia afuera.
Paso 2: Sostenga la barra sobre su espalda, apoyándola en sus trapecios o en la parte posterior de los hombros.
Paso 3: Active su core y mantenga el pecho erguido mientras comienza a bajar su cuerpo.
Paso 4: Flexione las rodillas y las caderas, empujando las caderas hacia atrás y hacia abajo como si se sentara en una silla.
Paso 5: Baje su cuerpo hasta que sus muslos estén paralelos al suelo o ligeramente por debajo.
Paso 6: Mantenga las rodillas alineadas con los dedos de los pies y el peso en los talones.
Paso 7: Empuje con los talones para volver a ponerse de pie, extendiendo las caderas y las rodillas.
Paso 8: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: archer pull up
instructions: Step:1 Start by hanging from a pull-up bar with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Engage your core and pull your shoulder blades down and back.
Step:3 As you pull yourself up, bend one arm and bring your elbow towards your side, while keeping the other arm straight.
Step:4 Continue pulling until your chin is above the bar and your bent arm is fully flexed.
Step:5 Lower yourself back down with control, straightening the bent arm and repeating the movement on the other side.
Step:6 Alternate sides with each repetition.

translations.name: archer pull up
instructions: Step:1 Start by hanging from a pull-up bar with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Engage your core and pull your shoulder blades down and back.
Step:3 As you pull yourself up, bend one arm and bring your elbow towards your side, while keeping the other arm straight.
Step:4 Continue pulling until your chin is above the bar and your bent arm is fully flexed.
Step:5 Lower yourself back down with control, straightening the bent arm and repeating the movement on the other side.
Step:6 Alternate sides with each repetition.

translations.name: Dominada de arquero
instructions: Paso 1: Comience colgando de una barra de dominadas con un agarre prono, un poco más ancho que el ancho de los hombros.
Paso 2: Active su core y jale los omóplatos hacia abajo y hacia atrás.
Paso 3: Mientras se levanta, flexione un brazo y lleve el codo hacia su costado, mientras mantiene el otro brazo recto.
Paso 4: Continúe subiendo hasta que su barbilla esté por encima de la barra y su brazo flexionado esté completamente contraído.
Paso 5: Baje con control, enderezando el brazo flexionado y repitiendo el movimiento en el otro lado.
Paso 6: Alterne los lados con cada repetición.

name: cable one arm tricep pushdown
instructions: Step:1 Stand facing a cable machine with a straight bar attachment at chest height.
Step:2 Grasp the bar with an overhand grip and step back to create tension in the cable.
Step:3 Position your feet shoulder-width apart and slightly bend your knees.
Step:4 Keep your back straight and core engaged throughout the exercise.
Step:5 Start with your arm fully extended and perpendicular to the floor.
Step:6 Keeping your upper arm stationary, exhale and push the bar down until your arm is fully extended.
Step:7 Pause for a moment, then inhale and slowly return to the starting position.
Step:8 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

translations.name: cable one arm tricep pushdown
instructions: Step:1 Stand facing a cable machine with a straight bar attachment at chest height.
Step:2 Grasp the bar with an overhand grip and step back to create tension in the cable.
Step:3 Position your feet shoulder-width apart and slightly bend your knees.
Step:4 Keep your back straight and core engaged throughout the exercise.
Step:5 Start with your arm fully extended and perpendicular to the floor.
Step:6 Keeping your upper arm stationary, exhale and push the bar down until your arm is fully extended.
Step:7 Pause for a moment, then inhale and slowly return to the starting position.
Step:8 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

translations.name: Jalón de tríceps a un brazo en polea
instructions: Paso 1: Párese frente a una máquina de cable con un accesorio de barra recta a la altura del pecho.
Paso 2: Agarre la barra con un agarre prono y dé un paso atrás para crear tensión en el cable.
Paso 3: Coloque los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y flexione ligeramente las rodillas.
Paso 4: Mantenga la espalda recta y el core activado durante todo el ejercicio.
Paso 5: Comience con el brazo completamente extendido y perpendicular al suelo.
Paso 6: Manteniendo la parte superior del brazo inmóvil, exhale y empuje la barra hacia abajo hasta que su brazo esté completamente extendido.
Paso 7: Haga una pausa por un momento, luego inhale y regrese lentamente a la posición inicial.
Paso 8: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambie de brazo.

name: assisted wide-grip chest dip (kneeling)
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the machine to your desired height and secure your knees on the pad.
Step:2 Grasp the handles with a wide grip and keep your elbows slightly bent.
Step:3 Lower your body by bending your elbows until your upper arms are parallel to the floor.
Step:4 Push yourself back up to the starting position by extending your arms.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: assisted wide-grip chest dip (kneeling)
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the machine to your desired height and secure your knees on the pad.
Step:2 Grasp the handles with a wide grip and keep your elbows slightly bent.
Step:3 Lower your body by bending your elbows until your upper arms are parallel to the floor.
Step:4 Push yourself back up to the starting position by extending your arms.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Fondos de pecho asistidos con agarre ancho (de rodillas)
instructions: Paso 1: Ajuste la máquina a la altura deseada y apoye las rodillas en la almohadilla.
Paso 2: Agarre las manijas con un agarre ancho y mantenga los codos ligeramente flexionados.
Paso 3: Baje su cuerpo flexionando los codos hasta que la parte superior de sus brazos esté paralela al suelo.
Paso 4: Empuje hacia arriba para volver a la posición inicial extendiendo los brazos.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: stationary bike run
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and position to ensure proper alignment.
Step:2 Place your feet on the pedals and secure them with the straps if available.
Step:3 Start pedaling at a comfortable pace.
Step:4 Maintain a steady rhythm and increase the resistance as desired.
Step:5 Engage your core muscles to maintain stability and proper posture.
Step:6 Continue pedaling for the desired duration of your workout.
Step:7 Gradually decrease the resistance and slow down before coming to a complete stop.
Step:8 Stretch your legs and cool down after the workout.

translations.name: stationary bike run
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and position to ensure proper alignment.
Step:2 Place your feet on the pedals and secure them with the straps if available.
Step:3 Start pedaling at a comfortable pace.
Step:4 Maintain a steady rhythm and increase the resistance as desired.
Step:5 Engage your core muscles to maintain stability and proper posture.
Step:6 Continue pedaling for the desired duration of your workout.
Step:7 Gradually decrease the resistance and slow down before coming to a complete stop.
Step:8 Stretch your legs and cool down after the workout.

translations.name: Pedaleo en bicicleta estática
instructions: Paso 1: Ajuste la altura y la posición del asiento para asegurar una alineación adecuada.
Paso 2: Coloque los pies en los pedales y ajústelos con las correas si están disponibles.
Paso 3: Comience a pedalear a un ritmo cómodo.
Paso 4: Mantenga un ritmo constante y aumente la resistencia según lo desee.
Paso 5: Active los músculos del core para mantener la estabilidad y una postura adecuada.
Paso 6: Continúe pedaleando durante el tiempo deseado de su entrenamiento.
Paso 7: Disminuya gradualmente la resistencia y reduzca la velocidad antes de detenerse por completo.
Paso 8: Estire las piernas y enfríe después del entrenamiento.

name: dumbbell seated inner biceps curl
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your feet flat on the ground and hold a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing up.
Step:2 Rest your upper arms on your thighs, allowing the dumbbells to hang down.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arms stationary, curl the dumbbells up towards your shoulders by contracting your biceps.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbells back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell seated inner biceps curl
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your feet flat on the ground and hold a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing up.
Step:2 Rest your upper arms on your thighs, allowing the dumbbells to hang down.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arms stationary, curl the dumbbells up towards your shoulders by contracting your biceps.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbells back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Curl de bíceps interno sentado con mancuernas
instructions: Paso 1: Siéntese en un banco con los pies apoyados en el suelo y sostenga una mancuerna en cada mano, con las palmas hacia arriba.
Paso 2: Apoye la parte superior de los brazos en los muslos, permitiendo que las mancuernas cuelguen.
Paso 3: Manteniendo la parte superior de los brazos inmóvil, flexione las mancuernas hacia los hombros contrayendo los bíceps.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa en la parte superior, luego baje lentamente las mancuernas a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: lever seated hip abduction
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height so that your knees are at a 90-degree angle.
Step:2 Sit on the machine with your back against the backrest and your feet on the footrests.
Step:3 Place your hands on the side handles for stability.
Step:4 Engage your abductors and slowly push your legs apart, away from the midline of your body.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the end of the movement, then slowly bring your legs back together to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: lever seated hip abduction
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height so that your knees are at a 90-degree angle.
Step:2 Sit on the machine with your back against the backrest and your feet on the footrests.
Step:3 Place your hands on the side handles for stability.
Step:4 Engage your abductors and slowly push your legs apart, away from the midline of your body.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the end of the movement, then slowly bring your legs back together to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Abducción de cadera sentado en máquina de palanca
instructions: Paso 1: Ajuste la altura del asiento para que sus rodillas estén en un ángulo de 90 grados.
Paso 2: Siéntese en la máquina con la espalda contra el respaldo y los pies en los reposapiés.
Paso 3: Coloque las manos en las manijas laterales para mayor estabilidad.
Paso 4: Active sus abductores y separe lentamente las piernas, alejándolas de la línea media de su cuerpo.
Paso 5: Haga una pausa al final del movimiento, luego junte lentamente las piernas para volver a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: chest dip on straight bar
instructions: Step:1 Grab the parallel bars with your palms facing down and your arms fully extended.
Step:2 Bend your knees and cross your ankles.
Step:3 Lower your body by bending your arms until your shoulders are below your elbows.
Step:4 Push yourself back up to the starting position by straightening your arms.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: chest dip on straight bar
instructions: Step:1 Grab the parallel bars with your palms facing down and your arms fully extended.
Step:2 Bend your knees and cross your ankles.
Step:3 Lower your body by bending your arms until your shoulders are below your elbows.
Step:4 Push yourself back up to the starting position by straightening your arms.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Fondos de pecho en barra recta
instructions: Paso 1: Agarre las barras paralelas con las palmas hacia abajo y los brazos completamente extendidos.
Paso 2: Flexione las rodillas y cruce los tobillos.
Paso 3: Baje su cuerpo flexionando los brazos hasta que sus hombros estén por debajo de los codos.
Paso 4: Empuje hacia arriba para volver a la posición inicial, enderezando los brazos.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: barbell front raise and pullover
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a barbell with an overhand grip, palms facing down.
Step:2 Keep your arms straight and raise the barbell in front of you until it reaches shoulder height.
Step:3 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the barbell back down to the starting position.
Step:4 Next, lower the barbell behind your head, keeping your arms straight.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then raise the barbell back up to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: barbell front raise and pullover
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a barbell with an overhand grip, palms facing down.
Step:2 Keep your arms straight and raise the barbell in front of you until it reaches shoulder height.
Step:3 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the barbell back down to the starting position.
Step:4 Next, lower the barbell behind your head, keeping your arms straight.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then raise the barbell back up to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Elevación frontal y pullover con barra
instructions: Paso 1: Párese con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y sostenga una barra con agarre prono (palmas hacia abajo).
Paso 2: Mantenga los brazos rectos y levante la barra frente a usted hasta que alcance la altura de los hombros.
Paso 3: Haga una pausa en la parte superior, luego baje lentamente la barra a la posición inicial.
Paso 4: A continuación, baje la barra detrás de su cabeza, manteniendo los brazos rectos.
Paso 5: Haga una pausa en la parte inferior, luego levante la barra de nuevo a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell seated biceps curl to shoulder press
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your back straight and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell in each hand with your palms facing forward and arms fully extended.
Step:3 Keeping your elbows close to your sides, curl the dumbbells up towards your shoulders.
Step:4 Once your forearms are vertical, rotate your wrists so that your palms are facing forward.
Step:5 Press the dumbbells overhead until your arms are fully extended.
Step:6 Lower the dumbbells back down to the starting position by reversing the movement.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell seated biceps curl to shoulder press
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your back straight and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell in each hand with your palms facing forward and arms fully extended.
Step:3 Keeping your elbows close to your sides, curl the dumbbells up towards your shoulders.
Step:4 Once your forearms are vertical, rotate your wrists so that your palms are facing forward.
Step:5 Press the dumbbells overhead until your arms are fully extended.
Step:6 Lower the dumbbells back down to the starting position by reversing the movement.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Curl de bíceps sentado a press de hombros con mancuernas
instructions: Paso 1: Siéntese en un banco con la espalda recta y los pies apoyados en el suelo.
Paso 2: Sostenga una mancuerna en cada mano con las palmas hacia adelante y los brazos completamente extendidos.
Paso 3: Manteniendo los codos cerca de los costados, flexione las mancuernas hacia los hombros.
Paso 4: Una vez que sus antebrazos estén verticales, gire las muñecas para que sus palmas miren hacia adelante.
Paso 5: Empuje las mancuernas sobre la cabeza hasta que sus brazos estén completamente extendidos.
Paso 6: Baje las mancuernas a la posición inicial invirtiendo el movimiento.
Paso 7: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: barbell clean and press
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and the barbell on the floor in front of you.
Step:2 Bend your knees and hinge at the hips to lower down and grip the barbell with an overhand grip, hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Drive through your heels and extend your hips and knees to lift the barbell off the floor, keeping it close to your body.
Step:4 As the barbell reaches your thighs, explosively extend your hips, shrug your shoulders, and pull the barbell up towards your chest.
Step:5 As the barbell reaches chest height, quickly drop under it and catch it at shoulder level, with your elbows pointing forward and your palms facing up.
Step:6 From the catch position, press the barbell overhead by extending your arms and pushing the barbell straight up.
Step:7 Lower the barbell back down to the starting position and repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: barbell clean and press
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and the barbell on the floor in front of you.
Step:2 Bend your knees and hinge at the hips to lower down and grip the barbell with an overhand grip, hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Drive through your heels and extend your hips and knees to lift the barbell off the floor, keeping it close to your body.
Step:4 As the barbell reaches your thighs, explosively extend your hips, shrug your shoulders, and pull the barbell up towards your chest.
Step:5 As the barbell reaches chest height, quickly drop under it and catch it at shoulder level, with your elbows pointing forward and your palms facing up.
Step:6 From the catch position, press the barbell overhead by extending your arms and pushing the barbell straight up.
Step:7 Lower the barbell back down to the starting position and repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Cargada y press con barra
instructions: Paso 1: Párese con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y la barra en el suelo frente a usted.
Paso 2: Flexione las rodillas e inclínese desde las caderas para bajar y agarrar la barra con agarre prono, manos un poco más separadas que el ancho de los hombros.
Paso 3: Empuje con los talones y extienda caderas y rodillas para levantar la barra del suelo, manteniéndola cerca del cuerpo.
Paso 4: Cuando la barra llegue a sus muslos, extienda explosivamente las caderas, encoja los hombros y jale la barra hacia su pecho.
Paso 5: Cuando la barra alcance la altura del pecho, métase rápidamente debajo de ella y recíbala a la altura de los hombros, con los codos apuntando hacia adelante y las palmas hacia arriba.
Paso 6: Desde la posición de recepción, empuje la barra sobre la cabeza extendiendo los brazos.
Paso 7: Baje la barra a la posición inicial y repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: lever rotary calf
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height so that your knees are slightly bent and your feet are flat on the footplate.
Step:2 Place your toes on the footplate, with your heels hanging off the edge.
Step:3 Grasp the handles or the sides of the machine for stability.
Step:4 Push through the balls of your feet, raising your heels as high as possible.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your heels back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: lever rotary calf
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height so that your knees are slightly bent and your feet are flat on the footplate.
Step:2 Place your toes on the footplate, with your heels hanging off the edge.
Step:3 Grasp the handles or the sides of the machine for stability.
Step:4 Push through the balls of your feet, raising your heels as high as possible.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your heels back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Elevación de talones rotatoria en máquina de palanca
instructions: Paso 1: Ajuste la altura del asiento para que sus rodillas estén ligeramente flexionadas y sus pies planos en la plataforma.
Paso 2: Coloque las puntas de los pies en la plataforma, con los talones colgando del borde.
Paso 3: Agarre las manijas o los lados de la máquina para mayor estabilidad.
Paso 4: Empuje con la parte delantera de los pies, levantando los talones lo más alto posible.
Paso 5: Haga una pausa en la parte superior, luego baje lentamente los talones a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: barbell wrist curl
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your feet flat on the ground and your forearms resting on your thighs, holding a barbell with an underhand grip.
Step:2 Allow the barbell to roll down to your fingertips, keeping your wrists straight.
Step:3 Slowly curl the barbell up towards your forearms by flexing your wrists.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the barbell back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: barbell wrist curl
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your feet flat on the ground and your forearms resting on your thighs, holding a barbell with an underhand grip.
Step:2 Allow the barbell to roll down to your fingertips, keeping your wrists straight.
Step:3 Slowly curl the barbell up towards your forearms by flexing your wrists.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the barbell back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Curl de muñeca con barra
instructions: Paso 1: Siéntese en un banco con los pies apoyados en el suelo y los antebrazos sobre los muslos, sosteniendo una barra con agarre supino.
Paso 2: Permita que la barra ruede hasta la punta de sus dedos, manteniendo las muñecas rectas.
Paso 3: Flexione lentamente la barra hacia sus antebrazos doblando las muñecas.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa en la parte superior, luego baje lentamente la barra a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: arms apart circular toe touch (male)
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and arms extended to the sides.
Step:2 Keeping your legs straight, bend forward at the waist and reach down towards your toes with your right hand.
Step:3 As you reach down, simultaneously lift your left leg straight up behind you, maintaining balance.
Step:4 Return to the starting position and repeat the movement with your left hand reaching towards your toes and your right leg lifting up behind you.
Step:5 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: arms apart circular toe touch (male)
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and arms extended to the sides.
Step:2 Keeping your legs straight, bend forward at the waist and reach down towards your toes with your right hand.
Step:3 As you reach down, simultaneously lift your left leg straight up behind you, maintaining balance.
Step:4 Return to the starting position and repeat the movement with your left hand reaching towards your toes and your right leg lifting up behind you.
Step:5 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Toque de punta de pie circular con brazos abiertos
instructions: Paso 1: Párese con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y los brazos extendidos a los lados.
Paso 2: Manteniendo las piernas rectas, inclínese hacia adelante desde la cintura y alcance los dedos de los pies con la mano derecha.
Paso 3: Mientras baja, levante simultáneamente la pierna izquierda recta detrás de usted, manteniendo el equilibrio.
Paso 4: Vuelva a la posición inicial y repita el movimiento con la mano izquierda hacia los dedos del pie derecho y la pierna derecha levantada.
Paso 5: Continúe alternando lados para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: inverted row bent knees
instructions: Step:1 Set up a bar at waist height and lie underneath it.
Step:2 Grab the bar with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Position your body so that your heels are on the ground and your body is straight.
Step:4 Pull your chest up towards the bar by squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your body back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: inverted row bent knees
instructions: Step:1 Set up a bar at waist height and lie underneath it.
Step:2 Grab the bar with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Position your body so that your heels are on the ground and your body is straight.
Step:4 Pull your chest up towards the bar by squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your body back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Remo invertido con rodillas flexionadas
instructions: Paso 1: Coloque una barra a la altura de la cintura y acuéstese debajo de ella.
Paso 2: Agarre la barra con un agarre prono, un poco más ancho que el ancho de los hombros.
Paso 3: Coloque su cuerpo de modo que los talones estén en el suelo y su cuerpo esté recto.
Paso 4: Jale su pecho hacia la barra apretando los omóplatos.
Paso 5: Haga una pausa en la parte superior, luego baje lentamente su cuerpo a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell hammer curls (with arm blaster)
instructions: Step:1 Stand up straight with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing your torso.
Step:2 Keep your elbows close to your torso and rotate the palms of your hands until they are facing forward.
Step:3 This will be your starting position.
Step:4 Now, while holding your upper arm stationary, exhale and curl the weights while contracting your biceps.
Step:5 Continue to raise the weights until your biceps are fully contracted and the dumbbells are at shoulder level.
Step:6 Hold the contracted position for a brief pause as you squeeze your biceps.
Step:7 Then, inhale and slowly begin to lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Step:8 Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell hammer curls (with arm blaster)
instructions: Step:1 Stand up straight with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing your torso.
Step:2 Keep your elbows close to your torso.
Step:3 This will be your starting position.
Step:4 Now, while holding your upper arm stationary, exhale and curl the weights forward while contracting your biceps.
Step:5 Continue to raise the weights until your biceps are fully contracted and the dumbbells are at shoulder level.
Step:6 Hold the contracted position for a brief pause as you squeeze your biceps.
Step:7 Then, inhale and slowly begin to lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Step:8 Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.

translations.name: Curl martillo con mancuernas (con arm blaster)
instructions: Paso 1: Párese derecho con una mancuerna en cada mano, las palmas mirando hacia su torso.
Paso 2: Mantenga los codos cerca de su torso.
Paso 3: Esta será su posición inicial.
Paso 4: Ahora, manteniendo la parte superior del brazo inmóvil, exhale y flexione las pesas hacia adelante mientras contrae los bíceps.
Paso 5: Continúe levantando las pesas hasta que sus bíceps estén completamente contraídos y las mancuernas estén a la altura de los hombros.
Paso 6: Mantenga la posición contraída por una breve pausa mientras aprieta los bíceps.
Paso 7: Luego, inhale y comience a bajar lentamente las mancuernas a la posición inicial.
Paso 8: Repita la cantidad recomendada de repeticiones.

name: barbell reverse grip incline bench row
instructions: Step:1 Set up an incline bench at a 45-degree angle.
Step:2 Sit on the bench facing the backrest with your chest against it.
Step:3 Grab the barbell with a reverse grip (palms facing up) and hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:4 Keep your back straight and core engaged.
Step:5 Pull the barbell towards your upper abdomen, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the top of the movement.
Step:7 Slowly lower the barbell back to the starting position.
Step:8 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: barbell reverse grip incline bench row
instructions: Step:1 Set up an incline bench at a 45-degree angle.
Step:2 Lie face down on the bench with your chest against the pad.
Step:3 Grab the barbell with a reverse grip (palms facing up) and hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:4 Keep your back straight and core engaged.
Step:5 Pull the barbell towards your upper abdomen, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the top of the movement.
Step:7 Slowly lower the barbell back to the starting position.
Step:8 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Remo en banco inclinado con barra y agarre inverso
instructions: Paso 1: Coloque un banco inclinado en un ángulo de 45 grados.
Paso 2: Acuéstese boca abajo en el banco con el pecho contra el respaldo.
Paso 3: Agarre la barra con un agarre inverso (palmas hacia arriba) y las manos un poco más separadas que el ancho de los hombros.
Paso 4: Mantenga la espalda recta y el core activado.
Paso 5: Jale la barra hacia la parte superior de su abdomen, apretando los omóplatos.
Paso 6: Haga una pausa en la parte superior del movimiento.
Paso 7: Baje lentamente la barra a la posición inicial.
Paso 8: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: smith narrow row
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and position yourself on the machine with your feet flat on the floor.
Step:2 Grasp the handles with an overhand grip, slightly narrower than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Keep your back straight and your chest up as you pull the handles towards your body, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the peak of the movement, then slowly release the handles back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: smith narrow row
instructions: Step:1 Set the bar on the Smith machine to about waist height. Stand facing the bar.
Step:2 Grasp the bar with an overhand grip, slightly narrower than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Hinge at your hips and bend your knees, keeping your back straight, until your torso is almost parallel to the floor.
Step:4 Pull the bar up towards your stomach, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the peak of the movement, then slowly lower the bar back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Remo cerrado en máquina Smith
instructions: Paso 1: Ajuste la barra de la máquina Smith a la altura de la cintura. Párese frente a la barra.
Paso 2: Agarre la barra con un agarre prono, un poco más estrecho que el ancho de los hombros.
Paso 3: Inclínese desde las caderas y flexione las rodillas, manteniendo la espalda recta, hasta que su torso esté casi paralelo al suelo.
Paso 4: Jale la barra hacia su estómago, apretando los omóplatos.
Paso 5: Haga una pausa en el punto más alto del movimiento, luego baje lentamente la barra a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: assisted prone lying quads stretch
instructions: Step:1 Lie face down on the ground with your legs extended.
Step:2 Bend your left knee and reach back with your left hand to grab your left foot or ankle.
Step:3 Gently pull your left foot towards your glutes, feeling a stretch in your left quad.
Step:4 Hold the stretch for 20-30 seconds, then release.
Step:5 Repeat with your right leg.

translations.name: assisted prone lying quads stretch
instructions: Step:1 Lie face down on the ground with your legs extended.
Step:2 Bend your left knee and reach back with your left hand to grab your left foot or ankle.
Step:3 Gently pull your left foot towards your glutes, feeling a stretch in your left quad.
Step:4 Hold the stretch for 20-30 seconds, then release.
Step:5 Repeat with your right leg.

translations.name: Estiramiento de cuádriceps asistido tumbado boca abajo
instructions: Paso 1: Acuéstese boca abajo en el suelo con las piernas extendidas.
Paso 2: Flexione la rodilla izquierda y lleve la mano izquierda hacia atrás para agarrar el pie o el tobillo izquierdo.
Paso 3: Jale suavemente el pie izquierdo hacia los glúteos, sintiendo un estiramiento en el cuádriceps izquierdo.
Paso 4: Mantenga el estiramiento durante 20-30 segundos, luego suelte.
Paso 5: Repita con la pierna derecha.

name: lever preacher curl v. 2
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and position yourself on the machine with your upper arms resting on the pad and your chest against the support.
Step:2 Grasp the handles with an underhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Keep your upper arms stationary and exhale as you curl the handles towards your shoulders, contracting your biceps.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top of the movement, squeezing your biceps.
Step:5 Inhale as you slowly lower the handles back to the starting position, fully extending your arms.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: lever preacher curl v. 2
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and position yourself on the machine with your upper arms resting on the pad and your chest against the support.
Step:2 Grasp the handles with an underhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Keep your upper arms stationary and exhale as you curl the handles towards your shoulders, contracting your biceps.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top of the movement, squeezing your biceps.
Step:5 Inhale as you slowly lower the handles back to the starting position, fully extending your arms.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Curl predicador en máquina de palanca v. 2
instructions: Paso 1: Ajuste la altura del asiento y colóquese en la máquina con la parte superior de los brazos apoyada en la almohadilla y el pecho contra el soporte.
Paso 2: Agarre las manijas con un agarre supino, un poco más ancho que el ancho de los hombros.
Paso 3: Mantenga la parte superior de los brazos inmóvil y exhale mientras flexiona las manijas hacia los hombros, contrayendo los bíceps.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa en la parte superior del movimiento, apretando los bíceps.
Paso 5: Inhale mientras baja lentamente las manijas a la posición inicial, extendiendo completamente los brazos.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell seated one leg calf raise - palm up
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench or chair with your back straight and your feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell in one hand and place it on top of your thigh, palm facing up.
Step:3 Lift one leg off the ground and extend it in front of you, keeping your knee slightly bent.
Step:4 Raise your heel as high as possible by pushing through the ball of your foot.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your heel back down.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch legs and repeat.

translations.name: dumbbell seated one leg calf raise - palm up
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench or chair with your back straight and your feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell in the hand on the same side as the working leg. Place it on top of your thigh.
Step:3 Place the ball of your working foot on a raised surface (like a weight plate), with your heel on the ground.
Step:4 Raise your heel as high as possible by pushing through the ball of your foot.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your heel back down.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch legs and repeat.

translations.name: Elevación de talón sentado a una pierna con mancuerna
instructions: Paso 1: Siéntese en un banco o silla con la espalda recta y los pies apoyados en el suelo.
Paso 2: Sostenga una mancuerna en la mano del mismo lado de la pierna que trabajará. Colóquela sobre su muslo.
Paso 3: Coloque la parte delantera del pie que trabajará sobre una superficie elevada (como un disco), con el talón en el suelo.
Paso 4: Levante el talón lo más alto posible empujando con la parte delantera del pie.
Paso 5: Haga una pausa en la parte superior, luego baje lentamente el talón.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambie de pierna y repita.

name: cable standing shoulder external rotation
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your knees slightly bent.
Step:2 Hold the cable handle with your arm extended in front of you, parallel to the ground.
Step:3 Keep your elbow slightly bent and your shoulder blades pulled back.
Step:4 Slowly rotate your arm outward, away from your body, while keeping your elbow in the same position.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the end of the movement, then slowly return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: cable standing shoulder external rotation
instructions: Step:1 Set the cable pulley to elbow height. Stand sideways to the machine.
Step:2 Hold the cable handle with the hand farthest from the machine. Keep your elbow bent at 90 degrees and tucked into your side.
Step:3 Your forearm should be parallel to the floor and across your stomach.
Step:4 Slowly rotate your arm outward, away from your body, while keeping your elbow pinned to your side.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the end of the movement, then slowly return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions and then switch sides.

translations.name: Rotación externa de hombro de pie con cable
instructions: Paso 1: Ajuste la polea del cable a la altura del codo. Párese de lado a la máquina.
Paso 2: Sostenga la manija del cable con la mano más alejada de la máquina. Mantenga el codo flexionado a 90 grados y pegado a su costado.
Paso 3: Su antebrazo debe estar paralelo al suelo y cruzado sobre su estómago.
Paso 4: Rote lentamente el brazo hacia afuera, alejándolo del cuerpo, mientras mantiene el codo pegado al costado.
Paso 5: Haga una pausa al final del movimiento, luego regrese lentamente a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones y luego cambie de lado.

name: handstand
instructions: Step:1 Find an open space with enough room to perform a handstand.
Step:2 Place your hands on the ground shoulder-width apart, fingers pointing forward.
Step:3 Kick your legs up towards the wall, using your core and shoulders to maintain balance.
Step:4 Once in a handstand position, engage your triceps to support your body weight.
Step:5 Hold the handstand for as long as you can maintain balance.
Step:6 To come down, slowly lower your legs back to the ground.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: handstand
instructions: Step:1 Find an open space with enough room to perform a handstand.
Step:2 Place your hands on the ground shoulder-width apart, fingers pointing forward.
Step:3 Kick your legs up towards the wall, using your core and shoulders to maintain balance.
Step:4 Once in a handstand position, engage your triceps to support your body weight.
Step:5 Hold the handstand for as long as you can maintain balance.
Step:6 To come down, slowly lower your legs back to the ground.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Parada de manos / Pino
instructions: Paso 1: Encuentre un espacio abierto con suficiente sitio para hacer una parada de manos.
Paso 2: Coloque las manos en el suelo separadas al ancho de los hombros, con los dedos apuntando hacia adelante.
Paso 3: Impulse las piernas hacia la pared, usando su core y hombros para mantener el equilibrio.
Paso 4: Una vez en posición, active los tríceps para soportar su peso corporal.
Paso 5: Mantenga la posición todo el tiempo que pueda mantener el equilibrio.
Paso 6: Para bajar, baje lentamente las piernas de vuelta al suelo.
Paso 7: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: full planche push-up
instructions: Step:1 Start in a push-up position with your hands placed slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Engage your core and lower your body down towards the ground, keeping your elbows close to your sides.
Step:3 As you lower yourself, lean your body forward and lift your feet off the ground, balancing on your hands.
Step:4 Continue to lower your body until your chest is just above the ground.
Step:5 Push through your hands and extend your arms to lift your body back up to the starting position.
Step:6 Maintain a straight line from your head to your heels throughout the movement.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: full planche push-up
instructions: Step:1 Start in a push-up position with your hands placed slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Engage your core and lower your body down towards the ground, keeping your elbows close to your sides.
Step:3 As you lower yourself, lean your body forward and lift your feet off the ground, balancing on your hands.
