Step:4 Continue to lower your body until your chest is just above the ground.
Step:5 Push through your hands and extend your arms to lift your body back up to the starting position.
Step:6 Maintain a straight line from your head to your heels throughout the movement.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Flexión en plancha completa
instructions: Paso 1: Comience en una posición de flexión con las manos un poco más separadas que el ancho de los hombros.
Paso 2: Active su core y baje el cuerpo hacia el suelo, manteniendo los codos pegados a los costados.
Paso 3: Mientras baja, incline el cuerpo hacia adelante y levante los pies del suelo, equilibrándose sobre las manos.
Paso 4: Continúe bajando el cuerpo hasta que el pecho esté justo por encima del suelo.
Paso 5: Empuje con las manos y extienda los brazos para levantar el cuerpo de nuevo a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Mantenga una línea recta desde la cabeza hasta los talones durante todo el movimiento.
Paso 7: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell lying external shoulder rotation
instructions: Step:1 Lie on your side on a flat bench with your upper arm against your side and your elbow bent 90 degrees.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell in your hand with your palm facing down.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arm against your side, slowly rotate your forearm upward as far as possible.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your forearm back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides.

translations.name: dumbbell lying external shoulder rotation
instructions: Step:1 Lie on your side on a flat bench with your upper arm against your side and your elbow bent 90 degrees.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell in your hand with your palm facing inward.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arm against your side, slowly rotate your forearm upward as far as possible.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your forearm back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides.

translations.name: Rotación externa de hombro tumbado con mancuerna
instructions: Paso 1: Acuéstese de lado en un banco plano con la parte superior del brazo contra su costado y el codo flexionado 90 grados.
Paso 2: Sostenga una mancuerna en su mano con la palma mirando hacia adentro.
Paso 3: Manteniendo la parte superior del brazo contra su costado, rote lentamente el antebrazo hacia arriba tanto como sea posible.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa en la parte superior, luego baje lentamente el antebrazo a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambie de lado.

name: ez barbell seated triceps extension
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your back straight and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Hold the ez barbell with an overhand grip, hands shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Raise the barbell overhead, fully extending your arms.
Step:4 Keeping your upper arms stationary, lower the barbell behind your head by bending your elbows.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then raise the barbell back to the starting position by extending your arms.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: ez barbell seated triceps extension
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your back straight and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Hold the ez barbell with an overhand grip, hands shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Raise the barbell overhead, fully extending your arms.
Step:4 Keeping your upper arms stationary, lower the barbell behind your head by bending your elbows.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then raise the barbell back to the starting position by extending your arms.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Extensión de tríceps sentado con barra EZ
instructions: Paso 1: Siéntese en un banco con la espalda recta y los pies apoyados en el suelo.
Paso 2: Sostenga la barra EZ con un agarre prono, con las manos separadas al ancho de los hombros.
Paso 3: Levante la barra sobre la cabeza, extendiendo completamente los brazos.
Paso 4: Manteniendo la parte superior de los brazos inmóvil, baje la barra detrás de su cabeza flexionando los codos.
Paso 5: Haga una pausa, luego levante la barra a la posición inicial extendiendo los brazos.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: band standing crunch
instructions: Step:1 Attach the band to a sturdy anchor point at waist height.
Step:2 Stand facing away from the anchor point with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Hold the band with both hands and bring it up to your chest, keeping your elbows bent and close to your body.
Step:4 Engage your abs and slowly crunch forward, bringing your chest towards your knees.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top of the crunch, then slowly return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: band standing crunch
instructions: Step:1 Attach the band to a sturdy anchor point above you.
Step:2 Kneel down, facing the anchor point.
Step:3 Hold the band with both hands and bring it down to the sides of your head.
Step:4 Engage your abs and slowly crunch forward, bringing your elbows towards your knees.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom of the crunch, then slowly return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Crunch de pie con banda
instructions: Paso 1: Sujete la banda a un punto de anclaje resistente por encima de usted.
Paso 2: Arrodíllese mirando hacia el punto de anclaje.
Paso 3: Sostenga la banda con ambas manos y llévela a los lados de su cabeza.
Paso 4: Active sus abdominales y flexiónese lentamente hacia adelante, llevando los codos hacia las rodillas.
Paso 5: Haga una pausa en la parte inferior del movimiento, luego regrese lentamente a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell straight leg deadlift
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a dumbbell in each hand with an overhand grip.
Step:2 Keeping your back straight and your core engaged, hinge at the hips and lower the dumbbells towards the ground, allowing your torso to lean forward.
Step:3 Continue lowering the dumbbells until you feel a stretch in your hamstrings, keeping your knees slightly bent.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then engage your glutes and hamstrings to lift your torso back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell straight leg deadlift
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a dumbbell in each hand with an overhand grip.
Step:2 Keeping your back straight and your core engaged, hinge at the hips and lower the dumbbells towards the ground, allowing your torso to lean forward.
Step:3 Continue lowering the dumbbells until you feel a stretch in your hamstrings, keeping your knees slightly bent.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then engage your glutes and hamstrings to lift your torso back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Peso muerto con piernas rectas y mancuernas
instructions: Paso 1: Párese con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros, sosteniendo una mancuerna en cada mano con agarre prono.
Paso 2: Manteniendo la espalda recta y el core activado, inclínese desde las caderas y baje las mancuernas hacia el suelo, permitiendo que su torso se incline hacia adelante.
Paso 3: Continúe bajando las mancuernas hasta que sienta un estiramiento en los isquiotibiales, manteniendo las rodillas ligeramente flexionadas.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa en la parte inferior, luego active sus glúteos e isquiotibiales para levantar su torso de nuevo a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: smith close-grip bench press
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and position yourself on the bench with your feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Grasp the barbell with a close grip, slightly narrower than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Lower the barbell towards your chest, keeping your elbows close to your body.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push the barbell back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: smith close-grip bench press
instructions: Step:1 Position yourself on the bench with your feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Grasp the barbell with a close grip, slightly narrower than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Lower the barbell towards your chest, keeping your elbows close to your body.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push the barbell back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Press de banca con agarre cerrado en máquina Smith
instructions: Paso 1: Colóquese en el banco con los pies apoyados en el suelo.
Paso 2: Agarre la barra con un agarre cerrado, un poco más estrecho que el ancho de los hombros.
Paso 3: Baje la barra hacia su pecho, manteniendo los codos cerca de su cuerpo.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa por un momento en la parte inferior, luego empuje la barra hacia arriba a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: cable seated crunch
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a cable machine with your feet flat on the ground and your knees bent.
Step:2 Hold the cable handle with both hands and position it behind your head.
Step:3 Engage your abs and slowly curl your upper body forward, bringing your chest towards your knees.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: cable seated crunch
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a cable machine with your feet flat on the ground and your knees bent.
Step:2 Hold the cable handle with both hands and position it behind your head.
Step:3 Engage your abs and slowly curl your upper body forward, bringing your chest towards your knees.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Crunch sentado en polea
instructions: Paso 1: Siéntese en una máquina de poleas con los pies apoyados en el suelo y las rodillas flexionadas.
Paso 2: Sostenga el agarre de la polea con ambas manos y colóquelo detrás de su cabeza.
Paso 3: Active sus abdominales y flexione lentamente la parte superior del cuerpo hacia adelante, llevando el pecho hacia las rodillas.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, luego regrese lentamente a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: suspended push-up
instructions: Step:1 Find a suspension trainer and adjust it to an appropriate height.
Step:2 Stand facing away from the anchor point and hold the handles with an overhand grip.
Step:3 Walk your feet forward, leaning your body forward until your weight is supported by the suspension trainer.
Step:4 Keep your body straight from head to heels, engage your core, and lower your chest towards the handles.
Step:5 Push through your chest and arms to return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: suspended push-up
instructions: Step:1 Find a suspension trainer and adjust it to an appropriate height.
Step:2 Stand facing away from the anchor point and hold the handles with an overhand grip.
Step:3 Walk your feet back, leaning your body forward until your weight is supported by the suspension trainer.
Step:4 Keep your body straight from head to heels, engage your core, and lower your chest towards the handles.
Step:5 Push through your chest and arms to return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Flexión en suspensión
instructions: Paso 1: Encuentre un entrenador de suspensión y ajústelo a una altura adecuada.
Paso 2: Párese de espaldas al punto de anclaje y sostenga las manijas con un agarre prono.
Paso 3: Camine con los pies hacia atrás, inclinando su cuerpo hacia adelante hasta que su peso sea soportado por el entrenador de suspensión.
Paso 4: Mantenga su cuerpo recto de la cabeza a los talones, active su core y baje el pecho hacia las manijas.
Paso 5: Empuje con el pecho y los brazos para volver a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell single leg deadlift with stepbox support
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet hip-width apart, holding a dumbbell in your right hand.
Step:2 Place your left foot on a stepbox or elevated surface behind you.
Step:3 Keeping your back straight and core engaged, hinge forward at the hips, lowering the dumbbell towards the ground.
Step:4 As you lower the dumbbell, simultaneously lift your left leg behind you, maintaining a straight line from head to heel.
Step:5 Lower the dumbbell until you feel a stretch in your right hamstring, then return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides.

translations.name: dumbbell single leg deadlift with stepbox support
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet hip-width apart, holding a dumbbell in your right hand.
Step:2 Place your left foot on a stepbox or elevated surface behind you.
Step:3 Keeping your back straight and core engaged, hinge forward at the hips, lowering the dumbbell towards the ground.
Step:4 As you lower the dumbbell, keep your left leg on the support, maintaining a straight line from head to your supporting knee.
Step:5 Lower the dumbbell until you feel a stretch in your right hamstring, then return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides.

translations.name: Peso muerto a una pierna con mancuerna y apoyo en cajón
instructions: Paso 1: Párese con los pies separados a la altura de las caderas, sosteniendo una mancuerna en su mano derecha.
Paso 2: Coloque su pie izquierdo en un cajón o superficie elevada detrás de usted.
Paso 3: Manteniendo la espalda recta y el core activado, inclínese hacia adelante desde las caderas, bajando la mancuerna hacia el suelo.
Paso 4: Mientras baja la mancuerna, mantenga la pierna izquierda sobre el apoyo, conservando una línea recta desde la cabeza hasta la rodilla de apoyo.
Paso 5: Baje la mancuerna hasta que sienta un estiramiento en el isquiotibial derecho, luego regrese a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambie de lado.

name: cable standing lift
instructions: Step:1 Stand facing the cable machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Hold the cable handle with both hands and position it at waist height.
Step:3 Engage your core and maintain a straight back throughout the exercise.
Step:4 Keeping your arms straight, exhale and lift the cable handle up towards your opposite shoulder, rotating your torso.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then inhale and slowly lower the cable handle back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides.

translations.name: cable standing lift
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your side to the cable machine, feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Hold the cable handle with both hands down by your side.
Step:3 Engage your core and maintain a straight back throughout the exercise.
Step:4 Keeping your arms straight, exhale and lift the cable handle up and across your body towards the opposite shoulder, rotating your torso.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then inhale and slowly lower the cable handle back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides.

translations.name: Elevación de pie con polea (Leñador Inverso)
instructions: Paso 1: Párese de lado a la máquina de poleas, con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros.
Paso 2: Sostenga el agarre de la polea con ambas manos, abajo a su costado.
Paso 3: Active su core y mantenga la espalda recta durante todo el ejercicio.
Paso 4: Manteniendo los brazos rectos, exhale y levante el agarre de la polea hacia arriba y a través de su cuerpo hacia el hombro opuesto, rotando su torso.
Paso 5: Haga una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, luego inhale y baje lentamente el agarre a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambie de lado.

name: dumbbell one arm reverse preacher curl
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a preacher bench with your chest against the pad and your arm extended over the edge of the bench, holding a dumbbell with an overhand grip.
Step:2 Lower the dumbbell slowly until your arm is fully extended.
Step:3 Curl the dumbbell back up towards your shoulder, keeping your upper arm stationary.
Step:4 Squeeze your biceps at the top of the movement, then slowly lower the dumbbell back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

translations.name: dumbbell one arm reverse preacher curl
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a preacher bench with your chest against the pad and your arm extended over the edge of the bench, holding a dumbbell with an overhand grip (palm facing down).
Step:2 Lower the dumbbell slowly until your arm is fully extended.
Step:3 Curl the dumbbell back up towards your shoulder, keeping your upper arm stationary.
Step:4 Squeeze your forearm at the top of the movement, then slowly lower the dumbbell back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

translations.name: Curl predicador inverso a un brazo con mancuerna
instructions: Paso 1: Siéntese en un banco predicador con el pecho contra la almohadilla y el brazo extendido sobre el borde, sosteniendo una mancuerna con agarre prono (palma hacia abajo).
Paso 2: Baje la mancuerna lentamente hasta que su brazo esté completamente extendido.
Paso 3: Suba la mancuerna hacia su hombro, manteniendo la parte superior del brazo inmóvil.
Paso 4: Apriete el antebrazo en la parte superior del movimiento, luego baje lentamente la mancuerna a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambie de brazo.

name: dumbbell peacher hammer curl
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a preacher bench with your chest against the pad, holding a dumbbell in each hand with a neutral grip (palms facing each other).
Step:2 Rest the back of your upper arms on the pad.
Step:3 This will be your starting position.
Step:4 Now, keeping the upper arms stationary, exhale and curl the weights while contracting your biceps.
Step:5 Continue to raise the weights until your biceps are fully contracted and the dumbbells are at shoulder level.
Step:6 Hold the contracted position for a brief pause as you squeeze your biceps.
Step:7 Then, inhale and slowly begin to lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Step:8 Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell preacher hammer curl
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a preacher bench with your chest against the pad, holding a dumbbell in each hand with a neutral grip (palms facing each other).
Step:2 Rest the back of your upper arms on the pad.
Step:3 This will be your starting position.
Step:4 Now, keeping the upper arms stationary, exhale and curl the weights while contracting your biceps.
Step:5 Continue to raise the weights until your biceps are fully contracted and the dumbbells are at shoulder level.
Step:6 Hold the contracted position for a brief pause as you squeeze your biceps.
Step:7 Then, inhale and slowly begin to lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Step:8 Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.

translations.name: Curl martillo en banco predicador con mancuernas
instructions: Paso 1: Siéntese en un banco predicador con el pecho contra la almohadilla, sosteniendo una mancuerna en cada mano con un agarre neutro (palmas enfrentadas).
Paso 2: Apoye la parte posterior de sus brazos en la almohadilla.
Paso 3: Esta será su posición inicial.
Paso 4: Ahora, manteniendo los brazos inmóviles, exhale y suba las pesas mientras contrae los bíceps.
Paso 5: Continúe levantando las pesas hasta que sus bíceps estén completamente contraídos y las mancuernas estén a la altura de los hombros.
Paso 6: Mantenga la posición contraída por un momento mientras aprieta los bíceps.
Paso 7: Luego, inhale y comience a bajar lentamente las mancuernas a la posición inicial.
Paso 8: Repita la cantidad recomendada de repeticiones.

name: cable front raise
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and grasp the cable handle with an overhand grip.
Step:2 Keep your back straight and your core engaged.
Step:3 Raise the cable handle in front of you, keeping your arms straight and your palms facing down.
Step:4 Continue lifting until your arms are parallel to the floor.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the cable handle back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: cable front raise
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and grasp the cable bar with an overhand grip.
Step:2 Keep your back straight and your core engaged.
Step:3 Raise the cable bar in front of you, keeping your arms straight and your palms facing down.
Step:4 Continue lifting until your arms are parallel to the floor.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the cable bar back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Elevación frontal con polea
instructions: Paso 1: Párese con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y agarre la barra de la polea con un agarre prono.
Paso 2: Mantenga la espalda recta y el core activado.
Paso 3: Levante la barra de la polea frente a usted, manteniendo los brazos rectos y las palmas hacia abajo.
Paso 4: Continúe levantando hasta que sus brazos estén paralelos al suelo.
Paso 5: Haga una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, luego baje lentamente la barra a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: cable lying triceps extension v. 2
instructions: Step:1 Attach a rope handle to a low pulley cable machine.
Step:2 Lie down on a flat bench facing up, with your head towards the cable machine.
Step:3 Grasp the rope handle with both hands, palms facing each other, and extend your arms straight up over your chest.
Step:4 Keeping your upper arms stationary, slowly lower the rope handle towards your forehead by bending your elbows.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then extend your arms back up to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: cable lying triceps extension v. 2
instructions: Step:1 Attach a rope handle to a low pulley cable machine.
Step:2 Lie down on a flat bench facing up, with your head towards the cable machine.
Step:3 Grasp the rope handle with both hands, palms facing each other, and extend your arms straight up over your chest.
Step:4 Keeping your upper arms stationary, slowly lower the rope handle towards your forehead by bending your elbows.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then extend your arms back up to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Extensión de tríceps acostado con polea v. 2
instructions: Paso 1: Enganche un agarre de cuerda a una máquina de polea baja.
Paso 2: Acuéstese en un banco plano boca arriba, con la cabeza hacia la máquina de poleas.
Paso 3: Agarre la cuerda con ambas manos, las palmas enfrentadas, y extienda los brazos rectos sobre su pecho.
Paso 4: Manteniendo la parte superior de los brazos inmóvil, baje lentamente la cuerda hacia su frente flexionando los codos.
Paso 5: Haga una pausa por un momento en la parte inferior, luego extienda los brazos de nuevo a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: kettlebell alternating press
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a kettlebell in each hand at shoulder height.
Step:2 Press one kettlebell overhead, fully extending your arm.
Step:3 Lower the kettlebell back to shoulder height.
Step:4 Repeat with the other arm.
Step:5 Continue alternating arms for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: kettlebell alternating press
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a kettlebell in each hand at shoulder height.
Step:2 Press one kettlebell overhead, fully extending your arm.
Step:3 Lower the kettlebell back to shoulder height.
Step:4 Repeat with the other arm.
Step:5 Continue alternating arms for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Press alterno con kettlebell
instructions: Paso 1: Párese con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros, sosteniendo una kettlebell en cada mano a la altura de los hombros.
Paso 2: Empuje una kettlebell sobre la cabeza, extendiendo completamente el brazo.
Paso 3: Baje la kettlebell de nuevo a la altura del hombro.
Paso 4: Repita con el otro brazo.
Paso 5: Continúe alternando los brazos para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: cable rope lying on floor tricep extension
instructions: Step:1 Attach a rope to a cable machine and set it to the lowest position.
Step:2 Lie on the floor facing up, with your head towards the cable machine.
Step:3 Hold the rope with both hands, palms facing each other, and extend your arms straight up towards the ceiling.
Step:4 Keep your upper arms stationary and slowly lower the rope towards your forehead, bending your elbows.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then extend your arms back up to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: cable rope lying on floor tricep extension
instructions: Step:1 Attach a rope to a cable machine and set it to the lowest position.
Step:2 Lie on the floor facing up, with your head towards the cable machine.
Step:3 Hold the rope with both hands, palms facing each other, and extend your arms straight up towards the ceiling.
Step:4 Keep your upper arms stationary and slowly lower the rope towards your forehead, bending your elbows.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then extend your arms back up to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Extensión de tríceps con cuerda en polea acostado en el suelo
instructions: Paso 1: Enganche una cuerda a una máquina de poleas y ajústela en la posición más baja.
Paso 2: Acuéstese en el suelo boca arriba, con la cabeza hacia la máquina de poleas.
Paso 3: Sostenga la cuerda con ambas manos, las palmas enfrentadas, y extienda los brazos rectos hacia el techo.
Paso 4: Mantenga la parte superior de los brazos inmóvil y baje lentamente la cuerda hacia su frente, flexionando los codos.
Paso 5: Haga una pausa por un momento, luego extienda los brazos de nuevo a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: bottoms-up
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your legs extended and your arms by your sides.
Step:2 Bend your knees and bring them towards your chest, keeping your feet off the ground.
Step:3 Engaging your abs, lift your hips off the ground, bringing your knees towards your head.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your hips back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: bottoms-up
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your legs extended and your arms by your sides.
Step:2 Bend your knees and bring them towards your chest, keeping your feet off the ground.
Step:3 Engaging your abs, lift your hips off the ground, bringing your knees towards your head.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your hips back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Elevación de cadera invertida
instructions: Paso 1: Acuéstese boca arriba con las piernas extendidas y los brazos a los lados.
Paso 2: Flexione las rodillas y llévelas hacia el pecho, manteniendo los pies sin tocar el suelo.
Paso 3: Activando sus abdominales, levante las caderas del suelo, llevando las rodillas hacia la cabeza.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, luego baje lentamente las caderas a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: band step-up
instructions: Step:1 Place a band around your thighs, just above your knees.
Step:2 Stand facing a step or platform with your feet hip-width apart.
Step:3 Step up onto the platform with your right foot, pushing through your heel.
Step:4 Extend your left leg behind you, keeping it straight.
Step:5 Lower your left foot back down to the ground.
Step:6 Repeat with your left foot stepping up onto the platform.
Step:7 Continue alternating legs for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: band step-up
instructions: Step:1 Place a band around your thighs, just above your knees.
Step:2 Stand facing a step or platform with your feet hip-width apart.
Step:3 Step up onto the platform with your right foot, pushing through your heel.
Step:4 Bring your left foot up to meet your right foot on the platform.
Step:5 Step down with your left foot first.
Step:6 Repeat, leading with the left foot.
Step:7 Continue alternating legs for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Subida al cajón con banda
instructions: Paso 1: Coloque una banda alrededor de sus muslos, justo por encima de las rodillas.
Paso 2: Párese frente a un escalón o plataforma con los pies separados a la altura de las caderas.
Paso 3: Suba a la plataforma con el pie derecho, empujando con el talón.
Paso 4: Lleve su pie izquierdo a encontrarse con su pie derecho en la plataforma.
Paso 5: Baje primero con el pie izquierdo.
Paso 6: Repita, comenzando con el pie izquierdo.
Paso 7: Continúe alternando las piernas para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: cable alternate triceps extension
instructions: Step:1 Stand facing the cable machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Hold the cable handle with your right hand and bring your arm up so that your upper arm is parallel to the ground and your elbow is bent at a 90-degree angle.
Step:3 Keep your upper arm stationary and extend your forearm backward, fully straightening your arm.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then slowly return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat with your left arm.
Step:6 Continue alternating arms for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: cable alternate triceps extension
instructions: Step:1 Stand facing the cable machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Hold the cable handle with your right hand and bring your arm up so that your upper arm is parallel to the ground and your elbow is bent at a 90-degree angle.
Step:3 Keep your upper arm stationary and extend your forearm backward, fully straightening your arm.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then slowly return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat with your left arm.
Step:6 Continue alternating arms for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Extensión de tríceps alterna con polea
instructions: Paso 1: Párese frente a la máquina de poleas con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros.
Paso 2: Sostenga el agarre de la polea con la mano derecha y levante el brazo de modo que la parte superior del brazo quede paralela al suelo y el codo flexionado en un ángulo de 90 grados.
Paso 3: Mantenga la parte superior del brazo inmóvil y extienda el antebrazo hacia atrás, enderezando completamente el brazo.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa por un momento, luego regrese lentamente a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita con el brazo izquierdo.
Paso 6: Continúe alternando los brazos para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell one arm decline chest press
instructions: Step:1 Lie on a decline bench with a dumbbell in one hand, resting on your chest.
Step:2 Place your feet flat on the ground and keep your back pressed against the bench.
Step:3 Extend your arm and push the dumbbell up towards the ceiling, fully extending your elbow.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbell back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch to the other arm.

translations.name: dumbbell one arm decline chest press
instructions: Step:1 Lie on a decline bench with a dumbbell in one hand, at your chest.
Step:2 Place your feet securely and keep your back pressed against the bench.
Step:3 Extend your arm and push the dumbbell up towards the ceiling, fully extending your elbow.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbell back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch to the other arm.

translations.name: Press de pecho declinado a un brazo con mancuerna
instructions: Paso 1: Acuéstese en un banco declinado con una mancuerna en una mano, a la altura de su pecho.
Paso 2: Asegure bien los pies y mantenga la espalda presionada contra el banco.
Paso 3: Extienda el brazo y empuje la mancuerna hacia el techo, extendiendo completamente el codo.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, luego baje lentamente la mancuerna a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambie al otro brazo.

name: cable rope high pulley overhead tricep extension
instructions: Step:1 Attach a rope to a high pulley and adjust the weight accordingly.
Step:2 Stand facing away from the pulley machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Grasp the rope with both hands, palms facing down, and bring your hands above your head.
Step:4 Keep your upper arms close to your head and perpendicular to the floor.
Step:5 Slowly lower the rope behind your head by bending your elbows.
Step:6 Pause for a moment, then extend your arms back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: cable rope high pulley overhead tricep extension
instructions: Step:1 Attach a rope to a high pulley and adjust the weight accordingly.
Step:2 Stand facing away from the pulley machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Grasp the rope with both hands, palms facing each other, and bring your hands above your head.
Step:4 Keep your upper arms close to your head and perpendicular to the floor.
Step:5 Slowly lower the rope behind your head by bending your elbows.
Step:6 Pause for a moment, then extend your arms back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Extensión de tríceps sobre la cabeza con cuerda en polea alta
instructions: Paso 1: Enganche una cuerda a una polea alta y ajuste el peso adecuadamente.
Paso 2: Párese de espaldas a la máquina de poleas con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros.
Paso 3: Agarre la cuerda con ambas manos, las palmas enfrentadas, y lleve las manos por encima de la cabeza.
Paso 4: Mantenga la parte superior de los brazos cerca de la cabeza y perpendicular al suelo.
Paso 5: Baje lentamente la cuerda detrás de su cabeza flexionando los codos.
Paso 6: Haga una pausa por un momento, luego extienda los brazos de nuevo a la posición inicial.
Paso 7: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: barbell incline row
instructions: Step:1 Set up an incline bench at a 45-degree angle.
Step:2 Lie face down on the bench with your chest against the pad and your feet flat on the ground.
Step:3 Grasp the barbell with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:4 Keep your back straight and your core engaged.
Step:5 Pull the barbell towards your chest, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the barbell back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: barbell incline row
instructions: Step:1 Set up an incline bench at a 45-degree angle.
Step:2 Lie face down on the bench with your chest against the pad and your feet flat on the ground.
Step:3 Grasp the barbell with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:4 Keep your back straight and your core engaged.
Step:5 Pull the barbell towards your chest, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the barbell back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Remo inclinado con barra
instructions: Paso 1: Coloque un banco inclinado en un ángulo de 45 grados.
Paso 2: Acuéstese boca abajo en el banco con el pecho contra la almohadilla y los pies apoyados en el suelo.
Paso 3: Agarre la barra con un agarre prono, un poco más ancho que el ancho de los hombros.
Paso 4: Mantenga la espalda recta y el core activado.
Paso 5: Jale la barra hacia su pecho, apretando los omóplatos.
Paso 6: Haga una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, luego baje lentamente la barra a la posición inicial.
Paso 7: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: standing lateral stretch
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your knees slightly bent.
Step:2 Extend your arms straight out to the sides, parallel to the ground.
Step:3 Slowly lean your upper body to one side, feeling a stretch in your side and back.
Step:4 Hold the stretch for 15-30 seconds.
Step:5 Return to the starting position and repeat on the other side.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: standing lateral stretch
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your knees slightly bent.
Step:2 Extend your right arm straight up overhead.
Step:3 Slowly lean your upper body to the left side, feeling a stretch in your right side and back.
Step:4 Hold the stretch for 15-30 seconds.
Step:5 Return to the starting position and repeat on the other side.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Estiramiento lateral de pie
instructions: Paso 1: Párese con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y las rodillas ligeramente flexionadas.
Paso 2: Extienda su brazo derecho recto por encima de la cabeza.
Paso 3: Incline lentamente la parte superior de su cuerpo hacia el lado izquierdo, sintiendo un estiramiento en su costado derecho y espalda.
Paso 4: Mantenga el estiramiento durante 15-30 segundos.
Paso 5: Vuelva a la posición inicial y repita en el otro lado.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: cable supine reverse fly
instructions: Step:1 Attach a D-handle to a low pulley cable machine and lie face up on a flat bench.
Step:2 Grasp the D-handle with each hand, palms facing each other, and extend your arms straight out in front of you.
Step:3 Keeping your arms straight, lower them out to the sides until they are parallel to the floor.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then slowly raise your arms back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: cable supine reverse fly
instructions: Step:1 Attach D-handles to two low pulley cable machines and lie face up on a flat bench between them.
Step:2 Grasp the D-handle in each hand, palms facing each other, and extend your arms straight up above your chest.
Step:3 Keeping your arms straight with a slight bend in the elbows, lower them out to the sides until they are parallel to the floor.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then slowly raise your arms back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Apertura inversa supina con polea
instructions: Paso 1: Enganche agarres tipo D a dos máquinas de polea baja y acuéstese boca arriba en un banco plano entre ellas.
Paso 2: Agarre el agarre D en cada mano, con las palmas enfrentadas, y extienda los brazos rectos por encima de su pecho.
Paso 3: Manteniendo los brazos rectos con una ligera flexión en los codos, bájelos hacia los lados hasta que estén paralelos al suelo.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa por un momento en la parte inferior, luego levante lentamente los brazos de nuevo a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell single leg deadlift
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet hip-width apart, holding a dumbbell in your right hand.
Step:2 Shift your weight onto your left leg and lift your right foot slightly off the ground.
Step:3 Keeping your back straight, hinge forward at the hips and lower the dumbbell towards the ground.
Step:4 At the same time, extend your right leg straight behind you, maintaining a slight bend in your left knee.
Step:5 Lower the dumbbell until your torso and right leg are parallel to the ground.
Step:6 Pause for a moment, then engage your glutes and hamstrings to return to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides.

translations.name: dumbbell single leg deadlift
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet hip-width apart, holding a dumbbell in your right hand.
Step:2 Shift your weight onto your left leg and lift your right foot slightly off the ground.
Step:3 Keeping your back straight, hinge forward at the hips and lower the dumbbell towards the ground.
Step:4 At the same time, extend your right leg straight behind you, maintaining a slight bend in your left knee.
Step:5 Lower the dumbbell until your torso and right leg are parallel to the ground.
Step:6 Pause for a moment, then engage your glutes and hamstrings to return to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides.

translations.name: Peso muerto a una pierna con mancuerna
instructions: Paso 1: Párese con los pies separados a la altura de las caderas, sosteniendo una mancuerna en su mano derecha.
Paso 2: Transfiera su peso a la pierna izquierda y levante ligeramente el pie derecho del suelo.
Paso 3: Manteniendo la espalda recta, inclínese hacia adelante desde las caderas y baje la mancuerna hacia el suelo.
Paso 4: Al mismo tiempo, extienda su pierna derecha recta detrás de usted, manteniendo una ligera flexión en la rodilla izquierda.
Paso 5: Baje la mancuerna hasta que su torso y su pierna derecha estén paralelos al suelo.
Paso 6: Haga una pausa por un momento, luego active sus glúteos e isquiotibiales para volver a la posición inicial.
Paso 7: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambie de lado.

name: dumbbell seated revers grip concentration curl
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your feet flat on the ground and hold a dumbbell in one hand, palm facing down.
Step:2 Rest your elbow on the inside of your thigh, just above the knee.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arm stationary, exhale and curl the dumbbell towards your shoulder.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, squeezing your biceps.
Step:5 Inhale and slowly lower the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

translations.name: dumbbell seated reverse grip concentration curl
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your feet flat on the ground and hold a dumbbell in one hand, palm facing down.
Step:2 Rest your elbow on the inside of your thigh, just above the knee.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arm stationary, exhale and curl the dumbbell towards your shoulder.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, squeezing your forearm.
Step:5 Inhale and slowly lower the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

translations.name: Curl de concentración sentado con agarre inverso y mancuerna
instructions: Paso 1: Siéntese en un banco con los pies apoyados en el suelo y sostenga una mancuerna en una mano, con la palma hacia abajo.
Paso 2: Apoye el codo en la parte interior de su muslo, justo por encima de la rodilla.
Paso 3: Manteniendo la parte superior del brazo inmóvil, exhale y suba la mancuerna hacia su hombro.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, apretando el antebrazo.
Paso 5: Inhale y baje lentamente la mancuerna a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambie de brazo.

name: barbell standing close grip curl
instructions: Step:1 Stand up straight with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a barbell with an underhand grip, hands close together.
Step:2 Keep your elbows close to your torso and your upper arms stationary throughout the movement.
Step:3 Exhale as you curl the weights while contracting your biceps. Continue to raise the bar until your biceps are fully contracted and the bar is at shoulder level.
Step:4 Hold the contracted position for a brief pause as you squeeze your biceps.
Step:5 Inhale as you slowly begin to bring the barbell back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: barbell standing close grip curl
instructions: Step:1 Stand up straight with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a barbell with an underhand grip, hands close together.
Step:2 Keep your elbows close to your torso and your upper arms stationary throughout the movement.
Step:3 Exhale as you curl the bar while contracting your biceps. Continue to raise the bar until your biceps are fully contracted and the bar is at shoulder level.
Step:4 Hold the contracted position for a brief pause as you squeeze your biceps.
Step:5 Inhale as you slowly begin to bring the barbell back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Curl de pie con barra y agarre cerrado
instructions: Paso 1: Párese derecho con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y sostenga una barra con agarre supino, con las manos juntas.
Paso 2: Mantenga los codos cerca de su torso y la parte superior de los brazos inmóvil durante todo el movimiento.
Paso 3: Exhale mientras sube la barra contrayendo los bíceps. Continúe levantando la barra hasta que sus bíceps estén completamente contraídos y la barra esté a la altura de los hombros.
Paso 4: Mantenga la posición contraída por un momento mientras aprieta los bíceps.
Paso 5: Inhale mientras comienza a bajar lentamente la barra a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell incline one arm hammer press on exercise ball
instructions: Step:1 Sit on an exercise ball with a dumbbell in one hand.
Step:2 Walk your feet forward and roll your body down until your head, neck, and back are supported on the ball.
Step:3 Hold the dumbbell with your palm facing inward and your elbow bent at a 90-degree angle.
Step:4 Press the dumbbell up towards the ceiling, straightening your arm.
Step:5 Lower the dumbbell back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

translations.name: dumbbell incline one arm hammer press on exercise ball
instructions: Step:1 Sit on an exercise ball with a dumbbell in one hand.
Step:2 Walk your feet forward and roll your body down until your head, neck, and back are supported on the ball.
Step:3 Hold the dumbbell with your palm facing inward and your elbow bent at a 90-degree angle.
Step:4 Press the dumbbell up towards the ceiling, straightening your arm.
Step:5 Lower the dumbbell back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

translations.name: Press martillo inclinado a un brazo con mancuerna sobre balón de ejercicio
instructions: Paso 1: Siéntese en un balón de ejercicio con una mancuerna en una mano.
Paso 2: Camine con los pies hacia adelante y ruede su cuerpo hacia abajo hasta que su cabeza, cuello y espalda estén apoyados en el balón.
Paso 3: Sostenga la mancuerna con la palma mirando hacia adentro y el codo flexionado en un ángulo de 90 grados.
Paso 4: Empuje la mancuerna hacia el techo, enderezando el brazo.
Paso 5: Baje la mancuerna de nuevo a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambie de brazo.

name: side push neck stretch
instructions: Step:1 Stand or sit up straight with your shoulders relaxed.
Step:2 Tilt your head to the right, bringing your right ear towards your right shoulder.
Step:3 Place your right hand on the left side of your head and gently apply pressure to increase the stretch.
Step:4 Hold the stretch for 15-30 seconds.
Step:5 Repeat on the other side, tilting your head to the left and applying pressure with your left hand.
Step:6 Repeat the stretch 2-3 times on each side.

translations.name: side push neck stretch
instructions: Step:1 Stand or sit up straight with your shoulders relaxed.
Step:2 Tilt your head to the right, bringing your right ear towards your right shoulder.
Step:3 Place your right hand on the left side of your head and gently apply pressure to increase the stretch.
Step:4 Hold the stretch for 15-30 seconds.
Step:5 Repeat on the other side, tilting your head to the left and applying pressure with your left hand.
Step:6 Repeat the stretch 2-3 times on each side.

translations.name: Estiramiento de cuello con empuje lateral
instructions: Paso 1: Párese o siéntese derecho con los hombros relajados.
Paso 2: Incline la cabeza hacia la derecha, acercando la oreja derecha al hombro derecho.
Paso 3: Coloque la mano derecha en el lado izquierdo de la cabeza y aplique una suave presión para aumentar el estiramiento.
Paso 4: Mantenga el estiramiento durante 15-30 segundos.
Paso 5: Repita del otro lado, inclinando la cabeza hacia la izquierda y aplicando presión con la mano izquierda.
Paso 6: Repita el estiramiento 2-3 veces por cada lado.

name: reverse hyper extension (on stability ball)
instructions: Step:1 Lie face down on a stability ball with your hips resting on the ball and your legs extended straight behind you.
Step:2 Place your hands on the ground in front of you for stability.
Step:3 Engaging your glutes and hamstrings, lift your legs up towards the ceiling as high as you can.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your legs back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: reverse hyper extension (on stability ball)
instructions: Step:1 Lie face down on a stability ball with your hips resting on the ball and your legs extended straight behind you.
Step:2 Place your hands on the ground in front of you for stability.
Step:3 Engaging your glutes and hamstrings, lift your legs up towards the ceiling as high as you can.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your legs back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Hiperextensión inversa (en balón de estabilidad)
instructions: Paso 1: Acuéstese boca abajo sobre un balón de estabilidad con las caderas apoyadas en el balón y las piernas extendidas rectas detrás de usted.
Paso 2: Coloque las manos en el suelo frente a usted para mayor estabilidad.
Paso 3: Activando sus glúteos e isquiotibiales, levante las piernas hacia el techo tan alto como pueda.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, luego baje lentamente las piernas a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: weighted front plank
instructions: Step:1 Start by lying face down on the floor.
Step:2 Place your forearms on the ground, with your elbows directly under your shoulders.
Step:3 Extend your legs straight out behind you, with your toes on the ground.
Step:4 Engage your core and lift your body off the ground, balancing on your forearms and toes.
Step:5 Keep your body in a straight line from your head to your heels.
Step:6 Hold this position for the desired amount of time.
Step:7 Lower your body back down to the starting position.
Step:8 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: weighted front plank
instructions: Step:1 Start by getting into a forearm plank position.
Step:2 Place your forearms on the ground, with your elbows directly under your shoulders.
Step:3 Extend your legs straight out behind you, with your toes on the ground.
Step:4 Engage your core and keep your body in a straight line from your head to your heels.
Step:5 Have a partner carefully place a weight plate on your upper back.
Step:6 Hold this position for the desired amount of time.
Step:7 Have your partner remove the weight before you lower your body back down.
Step:8 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Plancha frontal con peso
instructions: Paso 1: Comience en una posición de plancha sobre los antebrazos.
Paso 2: Coloque los antebrazos en el suelo, con los codos directamente debajo de los hombros.
Paso 3: Extienda las piernas rectas detrás de usted, con los dedos de los pies en el suelo.
Paso 4: Active su core y mantenga su cuerpo en línea recta desde la cabeza hasta los talones.
Paso 5: Pida a un compañero que coloque con cuidado un disco de peso en la parte superior de su espalda.
Paso 6: Mantenga esta posición durante el tiempo deseado.
Paso 7: Pida a su compañero que retire el peso antes de bajar su cuerpo.
Paso 8: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell lying pronation on floor
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on the floor with your face down and your arms extended straight out in front of you, holding a dumbbell in each hand.
Step:2 Rotate your palms so they are facing down towards the floor.
Step:3 Keeping your arms straight, lift the dumbbells off the floor by contracting your forearms.
Step:4 Continue lifting until your forearms are fully contracted and the dumbbells are at shoulder level.
Step:5 Hold for a moment, then slowly lower the dumbbells back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell lying pronation on floor
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on the floor with your face down and your arms extended straight out in front of you, holding a dumbbell in each hand.
Step:2 Rotate your palms so they are facing down towards the floor.
Step:3 Keeping your arms straight, lift the dumbbells off the floor by contracting your forearms.
Step:4 Continue lifting until your forearms are fully contracted and the dumbbells are at shoulder level.
Step:5 Hold for a moment, then slowly lower the dumbbells back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Pronación acostado en el suelo con mancuernas
instructions: Paso 1: Acuéstese boca abajo en el suelo con los brazos extendidos rectos frente a usted, sosteniendo una mancuerna en cada mano.
Paso 2: Gire las palmas de las manos para que queden mirando hacia el suelo.
Paso 3: Manteniendo los brazos rectos, levante las mancuernas del suelo contrayendo los antebrazos.
Paso 4: Continúe levantando hasta que sus antebrazos estén completamente contraídos y las mancuernas estén a la altura de los hombros.
Paso 5: Mantenga la posición por un momento, luego baje lentamente las mancuernas a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: lever front pulldown
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and position yourself on the machine with your knees under the pads and your feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Grasp the handles with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Sit upright with your chest lifted and your shoulders back, maintaining a slight arch in your lower back.
Step:4 Engage your back and pull the handles down towards your chest, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom of the movement, then slowly release the handles back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: lever front pulldown
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and position yourself on the machine with your knees under the pads and your feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Grasp the handles with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Sit upright with your chest lifted and your shoulders back, maintaining a slight arch in your lower back.
Step:4 Engage your back and pull the handles down towards your chest, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom of the movement, then slowly release the handles back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Jalón frontal en máquina de palanca
instructions: Paso 1: Ajuste la altura del asiento y colóquese en la máquina con las rodillas debajo de las almohadillas y los pies apoyados en el suelo.
Paso 2: Agarre las manijas con un agarre prono, un poco más ancho que el ancho de los hombros.
Paso 3: Siéntese derecho con el pecho erguido y los hombros hacia atrás, manteniendo un ligero arco en la parte baja de la espalda.
Paso 4: Active su espalda y jale las manijas hacia su pecho, apretando los omóplatos.
Paso 5: Haga una pausa por un momento en la parte inferior del movimiento, luego suelte lentamente las manijas para volver a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: assisted hanging knee raise
instructions: Step:1 Hang from a pull-up bar with your arms fully extended and your palms facing away from you.
Step:2 Engage your core muscles and lift your knees towards your chest, bending at the hips and knees.
Step:3 Pause for a moment at the top of the movement, squeezing your abs.
Step:4 Slowly lower your legs back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: assisted hanging knee raise
instructions: Step:1 Hang from a pull-up bar with your arms fully extended and your palms facing away from you.
Step:2 Engage your core muscles and lift your knees towards your chest, bending at the hips and knees.
Step:3 Pause for a moment at the top of the movement, squeezing your abs.
Step:4 Slowly lower your legs back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Elevación de rodillas colgado asistido
instructions: Paso 1: Cuélguese de una barra de dominadas con los brazos completamente extendidos y las palmas mirando hacia afuera.
Paso 2: Active los músculos del core y levante las rodillas hacia el pecho, flexionando las caderas y las rodillas.
Paso 3: Haga una pausa por un momento en la parte superior del movimiento, apretando los abdominales.
Paso 4: Baje lentamente las piernas de nuevo a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: smith incline shoulder raises
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the smith machine to an incline position.
Step:2 Stand facing the machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Grasp the bar with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:4 Keep your back straight and core engaged.
Step:5 Raise the barbell up towards the ceiling, leading with your elbows.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the barbell back down to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: smith incline shoulder raises
instructions: Step:1 Set an incline bench under the Smith machine.
Step:2 Lie on the bench with your feet flat on the ground.
Step:3 Grasp the bar with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:4 Keep your back straight and core engaged.
Step:5 Raise the barbell up in front of you until your arms are parallel to the floor.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the barbell back down to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Elevaciones de hombro inclinadas en máquina Smith
instructions: Paso 1: Coloque un banco inclinado debajo de la máquina Smith.
Paso 2: Acuéstese en el banco con los pies apoyados en el suelo.
Paso 3: Agarre la barra con un agarre prono, un poco más ancho que el ancho de los hombros.
Paso 4: Mantenga la espalda recta y el core activado.
Paso 5: Levante la barra frente a usted hasta que sus brazos estén paralelos al suelo.
Paso 6: Haga una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, luego baje lentamente la barra a la posición inicial.
Paso 7: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: sphinx
instructions: Step:1 Lie face down on the ground with your forearms flat on the floor, elbows directly under your shoulders.
Step:2 Engage your core and lift your chest off the ground, keeping your forearms and toes on the floor.
Step:3 Hold this position for a few seconds, making sure to keep your neck in a neutral position.
Step:4 Slowly lower your chest back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: sphinx
instructions: Step:1 Lie face down on the ground with your forearms flat on the floor, elbows directly under your shoulders.
Step:2 Engage your core and lift your chest off the ground, keeping your forearms and hips on the floor.
Step:3 Hold this position for a few seconds, making sure to keep your neck in a neutral position.
Step:4 Slowly lower your chest back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Esfinge
instructions: Paso 1: Acuéstese boca abajo en el suelo con los antebrazos apoyados en el suelo, los codos directamente debajo de los hombros.
Paso 2: Active su core y levante el pecho del suelo, manteniendo los antebrazos y las caderas en el suelo.
Paso 3: Mantenga esta posición durante unos segundos, asegurándose de mantener el cuello en una posición neutra.
Paso 4: Baje lentamente el pecho de nuevo a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: side-to-side chin
instructions: Step:1 Grasp a pull-up bar with an underhand grip, hands shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Hang from the bar with your arms fully extended and your body relaxed.
Step:3 Pull yourself up by bending your elbows and bringing your chin towards one hand.
Step:4 Lower yourself back down to the starting position.
Step:5 On the next repetition, bring your chin towards the other hand.
Step:6 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: side-to-side chin-up
instructions: Step:1 Grasp a pull-up bar with an underhand grip, hands shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Hang from the bar with your arms fully extended and your body relaxed.
Step:3 Pull yourself up by bending your elbows and bringing your chin towards one hand.
Step:4 Lower yourself back down to the starting position.
Step:5 On the next repetition, bring your chin towards the other hand.
Step:6 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Dominada de lado a lado
instructions: Paso 1: Agarre una barra de dominadas con un agarre supino, con las manos separadas al ancho de los hombros.
Paso 2: Cuélguese de la barra con los brazos completamente extendidos y el cuerpo relajado.
Paso 3: Súbase flexionando los codos y llevando la barbilla hacia una mano.
Paso 4: Baje de nuevo a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: En la siguiente repetición, lleve la barbilla hacia la otra mano.
Paso 6: Continúe alternando los lados para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: barbell bench squat
instructions: Step:1 Set up a barbell on a squat rack at chest height.
Step:2 Stand in front of a bench, facing away from it, with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Position the barbell across your upper back.
Step:4 Keeping your chest up and core engaged, lower your body down until you are sitting on the bench.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push through your heels to return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: barbell bench squat
instructions: Step:1 Set up a barbell on a squat rack at chest height.
Step:2 Stand in front of a bench, facing away from it, with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Position the barbell across your upper back.
Step:4 Keeping your chest up and core engaged, lower your body down until you are sitting on the bench.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push through your heels to return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Sentadilla al banco con barra
instructions: Paso 1: Coloque una barra en un soporte para sentadillas a la altura del pecho.
Paso 2: Párese frente a un banco, de espaldas a él, con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros.
Paso 3: Coloque la barra sobre la parte superior de su espalda.
Paso 4: Manteniendo el pecho erguido y el core activado, baje su cuerpo hasta sentarse en el banco.
Paso 5: Haga una pausa por un momento en la parte inferior, luego empuje con los talones para volver a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: bodyweight kneeling triceps extension
instructions: Step:1 Kneel down on the ground with your knees hip-width apart.
Step:2 Place your hands on the ground in front of you, shoulder-width apart, fingers pointing forward.
Step:3 Extend your legs straight behind you, balancing on your toes and hands, forming a straight line from head to heels.
Step:4 Bend your elbows and lower your upper body towards the ground, keeping your elbows close to your sides.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push through your hands to straighten your arms and return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: bodyweight kneeling triceps extension
instructions: Step:1 Kneel on the ground with your knees hip-width apart.
Step:2 Place your hands on the ground in front of you, shoulder-width apart, fingers pointing forward.
Step:3 Lean forward and shift your weight onto your hands.
Step:4 Bend your elbows and lower your upper body towards the ground, keeping your elbows close to your sides.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push through your hands to straighten your arms and return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Extensión de tríceps de rodillas con peso corporal
instructions: Paso 1: Arrodíllese en el suelo con las rodillas separadas a la altura de las caderas.
Paso 2: Coloque las manos en el suelo frente a usted, separadas al ancho de los hombros, con los dedos apuntando hacia adelante.
Paso 3: Inclínese hacia adelante y transfiera su peso a sus manos.
Paso 4: Flexione los codos y baje la parte superior del cuerpo hacia el suelo, manteniendo los codos cerca de los costados.
Paso 5: Haga una pausa por un momento en la parte inferior, luego empuje con las manos para enderezar los brazos y volver a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: cable triceps pushdown (v-bar)
instructions: Step:1 Attach a v-bar attachment to the cable machine at the highest setting.
Step:2 Stand facing the cable machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Grasp the v-bar with an overhand grip, palms facing down, and your hands shoulder-width apart.
Step:4 Keep your elbows close to your sides and your upper arms stationary throughout the exercise.
Step:5 Engage your triceps and exhale as you push the v-bar down until your arms are fully extended.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the bottom of the movement, squeezing your triceps.
Step:7 Inhale as you slowly return the v-bar to the starting position, maintaining control.
Step:8 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: cable triceps pushdown (v-bar)
instructions: Step:1 Attach a v-bar attachment to the cable machine at the highest setting.
Step:2 Stand facing the cable machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Grasp the v-bar with an overhand grip, palms facing down, and your hands shoulder-width apart.
Step:4 Keep your elbows close to your sides and your upper arms stationary throughout the exercise.
Step:5 Engage your triceps and exhale as you push the v-bar down until your arms are fully extended.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the bottom of the movement, squeezing your triceps.
Step:7 Inhale as you slowly return the v-bar to the starting position, maintaining control.
Step:8 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Jalón de tríceps en polea (con barra V)
instructions: Paso 1: Enganche un accesorio de barra en V a la máquina de poleas en la posición más alta.
Paso 2: Párese frente a la máquina de poleas con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros.
Paso 3: Agarre la barra en V con un agarre prono, las palmas hacia abajo y las manos separadas al ancho de los hombros.
Paso 4: Mantenga los codos cerca de los costados y la parte superior de los brazos inmóvil durante todo el ejercicio.
Paso 5: Active sus tríceps y exhale mientras empuja la barra en V hacia abajo hasta que sus brazos estén completamente extendidos.
Paso 6: Haga una pausa por un momento en la parte inferior del movimiento, apretando los tríceps.
Paso 7: Inhale mientras regresa lentamente la barra en V a la posición inicial, manteniendo el control.
Paso 8: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell upright shoulder external rotation
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a dumbbell in each hand with your palms facing your body.
Step:2 Raise your arms out to the sides until they are parallel to the ground, keeping your elbows slightly bent.
Step:3 Rotate your arms externally, bringing the dumbbells up towards your head while keeping your elbows in the same position.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell upright shoulder external rotation
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a dumbbell in each hand with your palms facing your body.
Step:2 Raise your arms out to the sides until they are parallel to the ground, keeping your elbows slightly bent.
Step:3 Rotate your arms externally, bringing the dumbbells up towards your head while keeping your elbows in the same position.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Rotación externa de hombro de pie con mancuernas
instructions: Paso 1: Párese con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y sostenga una mancuerna en cada mano con las palmas mirando hacia su cuerpo.
Paso 2: Levante los brazos hacia los lados hasta que estén paralelos al suelo, manteniendo los codos ligeramente flexionados.
Paso 3: Rote los brazos externamente, llevando las mancuernas hacia la cabeza mientras mantiene los codos en la misma posición.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, luego baje lentamente las mancuernas a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: cable middle fly
instructions: Step:1 Attach cables to both sides of a cable machine at chest height.
Step:2 Stand in the center of the machine with one foot slightly in front of the other.
Step:3 Grasp the handles with an overhand grip and extend your arms out to the sides.
Step:4 Keep a slight bend in your elbows and maintain a slight forward lean.
Step:5 Engage your chest muscles and bring your arms forward in a sweeping motion.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the center, then slowly return your arms back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: cable middle fly
instructions: Step:1 Attach cables to both sides of a cable machine at chest height.
Step:2 Stand in the center of the machine with one foot slightly in front of the other.
Step:3 Grasp the handles with an overhand grip and extend your arms out to the sides.
Step:4 Keep a slight bend in your elbows and maintain a slight forward lean.
Step:5 Engage your chest muscles and bring your arms forward in a sweeping motion.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the center, then slowly return your arms back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Apertura media con polea
instructions: Paso 1: Enganche las poleas a ambos lados de una máquina de poleas a la altura del pecho.
Paso 2: Párese en el centro de la máquina con un pie ligeramente adelantado.
Paso 3: Agarre las manijas con un agarre prono y extienda los brazos hacia los lados.
Paso 4: Mantenga una ligera flexión en los codos y una leve inclinación hacia adelante.
Paso 5: Active los músculos del pecho y lleve los brazos hacia adelante en un movimiento de barrido.
Paso 6: Haga una pausa por un momento en el centro, luego regrese lentamente los brazos a la posición inicial.
Paso 7: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: barbell standing rocking leg calf raise
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a barbell across your back.
Step:2 Raise your heels off the ground as high as possible, balancing on the balls of your feet.
Step:3 Slowly lower your heels back down to the starting position.
Step:4 Now rock back on your heels, lifting your toes off the ground.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: barbell standing rocking calf raise
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a barbell across your back.
Step:2 Raise your heels off the ground as high as possible, balancing on the balls of your feet.
Step:3 Slowly lower your heels back down to the starting position.
Step:4 Now rock back on your heels, lifting your toes off the ground.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Elevación de talones de pie con barra y balanceo
instructions: Paso 1: Párese con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y sostenga una barra sobre su espalda.
Paso 2: Levante los talones del suelo lo más alto posible, balanceándose sobre la punta de los pies.
Paso 3: Baje lentamente los talones de nuevo a la posición inicial.
Paso 4: Ahora balancéese hacia atrás sobre sus talones, levantando los dedos de los pies del suelo.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: lever lying leg curl
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the machine to fit your body and select the desired weight.
Step:2 Lie face down on the machine with your legs straight and your heels against the padded lever.
Step:3 Grasp the handles or the sides of the machine for stability.
Step:4 Keeping your upper body stationary, exhale and curl your legs up as far as possible without lifting your hips off the pad.
Step:5 Hold the contracted position for a brief pause as you squeeze your hamstrings.
Step:6 Inhale and slowly lower the lever back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: lever lying leg curl
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the machine to fit your body and select the desired weight.
Step:2 Lie face down on the machine with your legs straight and your heels against the padded lever.
Step:3 Grasp the handles or the sides of the machine for stability.
Step:4 Keeping your upper body stationary, exhale and curl your legs up as far as possible without lifting your hips off the pad.
Step:5 Hold the contracted position for a brief pause as you squeeze your hamstrings.
Step:6 Inhale and slowly lower the lever back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Curl de pierna acostado en máquina de palanca
instructions: Paso 1: Ajuste la máquina a su cuerpo y seleccione el peso deseado.
Paso 2: Acuéstese boca abajo en la máquina con las piernas rectas y los talones contra la palanca acolchada.
Paso 3: Agarre las manijas o los lados de la máquina para mayor estabilidad.
Paso 4: Manteniendo la parte superior del cuerpo inmóvil, exhale y flexione las piernas hacia arriba tanto como sea posible sin levantar las caderas de la almohadilla.
Paso 5: Mantenga la posición contraída por un momento mientras aprieta los isquiotibiales.
Paso 6: Inhale y baje lentamente la palanca a la posición inicial.
Paso 7: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: hyperextension (on bench)
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the hyperextension bench so that your hips are resting comfortably on the pad and your feet are secured.
Step:2 Cross your arms over your chest or place your hands behind your head.
Step:3 Slowly lower your upper body towards the ground while keeping your back straight.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then raise your upper body back up until it is in line with your legs.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: hyperextension (on bench)
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the hyperextension bench so that your hips are resting comfortably on the pad and your feet are secured.
Step:2 Cross your arms over your chest or place your hands behind your head.
Step:3 Slowly lower your upper body towards the ground while keeping your back straight.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then raise your upper body back up until it is in line with your legs.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Hiperextensión (en banco)
instructions: Paso 1: Ajuste el banco de hiperextensión para que sus caderas descansen cómodamente en la almohadilla y sus pies estén asegurados.
Paso 2: Cruce los brazos sobre el pecho o coloque las manos detrás de la cabeza.
Paso 3: Baje lentamente la parte superior del cuerpo hacia el suelo manteniendo la espalda recta.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa por un momento en la parte inferior, luego levante la parte superior del cuerpo hasta que esté en línea con sus piernas.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: barbell stiff leg good morning
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your knees slightly bent.
Step:2 Hold the barbell across your back, resting it on your traps.
Step:3 Keeping your back straight, hinge forward at the hips, pushing your glutes back.
Step:4 Lower your torso until it is parallel to the ground, feeling a stretch in your hamstrings.
Step:5 Engage your glutes and hamstrings to return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: barbell stiff leg good morning
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your knees slightly bent.
Step:2 Hold the barbell across your back, resting it on your traps.
Step:3 Keeping your back straight, hinge forward at the hips, pushing your glutes back.
Step:4 Lower your torso until it is parallel to the ground, feeling a stretch in your hamstrings.
Step:5 Engage your glutes and hamstrings to return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Buenos días con barra y piernas rígidas
instructions: Paso 1: Párese con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y las rodillas ligeramente flexionadas.
Paso 2: Sostenga la barra sobre su espalda, apoyándola en sus trapecios.
Paso 3: Manteniendo la espalda recta, inclínese hacia adelante desde las caderas, empujando los glúteos hacia atrás.
Paso 4: Baje su torso hasta que esté paralelo al suelo, sintiendo un estiramiento en los isquiotibiales.
Paso 5: Active sus glúteos e isquiotibiales para volver a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: weighted crunch
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Hold a weight plate or dumbbell on your chest.
Step:3 Engage your abs and lift your upper body off the ground, curling forward until your shoulder blades are off the ground.
