Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your upper body back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: weighted crunch
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Hold a weight plate or dumbbell on your chest.
Step:3 Engage your abs and lift your upper body off the ground, curling forward until your shoulder blades are off the ground.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your upper body back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Crunch con peso
instructions: Paso 1: Acuéstese boca arriba con las rodillas flexionadas y los pies apoyados en el suelo.
Paso 2: Sostenga un disco o mancuerna sobre su pecho.
Paso 3: Active sus abdominales y levante la parte superior del cuerpo del suelo, flexionándose hacia adelante hasta que sus omóplatos se despeguen del suelo.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, luego baje lentamente la parte superior del cuerpo a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: band assisted pull-up
instructions: Step:1 Attach the band to a pull-up bar or sturdy anchor point.
Step:2 Step onto the band and grip the bar with your palms facing away from you, hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Hang with your arms fully extended, keeping your core engaged and your shoulders down and back.
Step:4 Pull your body up towards the bar by squeezing your shoulder blades together and driving your elbows down towards your hips.
Step:5 Continue pulling until your chin is above the bar, then slowly lower yourself back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: band assisted pull-up
instructions: Step:1 Attach the band to a pull-up bar or sturdy anchor point.
Step:2 Step into the band with one foot or knee and grip the bar with your palms facing away from you, hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Hang with your arms fully extended, keeping your core engaged and your shoulders down and back.
Step:4 Pull your body up towards the bar by squeezing your shoulder blades together and driving your elbows down towards your hips.
Step:5 Continue pulling until your chin is above the bar, then slowly lower yourself back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Dominada asistida con banda
instructions: Paso 1: Sujete la banda a una barra de dominadas o un punto de anclaje resistente.
Paso 2: Pise la banda con un pie o rodilla y agarre la barra con las palmas mirando hacia afuera, con las manos un poco más separadas que el ancho de los hombros.
Paso 3: Cuélguese con los brazos completamente extendidos, manteniendo el core activado y los hombros hacia abajo y atrás.
Paso 4: Súbase hacia la barra apretando los omóplatos y llevando los codos hacia las caderas.
Paso 5: Continúe subiendo hasta que su barbilla esté por encima de la barra, luego baje lentamente a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: barbell romanian deadlift
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your toes pointing forward.
Step:2 Hold the barbell with an overhand grip, hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Bend at the hips, keeping your back straight and your knees slightly bent.
Step:4 Lower the barbell towards the ground, keeping it close to your body.
Step:5 Feel the stretch in your hamstrings as you lower the barbell.
Step:6 Once you feel a stretch in your hamstrings, push your hips forward and stand up straight.
Step:7 Squeeze your glutes at the top of the movement.
Step:8 Lower the barbell back down to the starting position and repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: barbell romanian deadlift
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your toes pointing forward.
Step:2 Hold the barbell with an overhand grip, hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Hinge at the hips, keeping your back straight and your knees slightly bent.
Step:4 Lower the barbell towards the ground, keeping it close to your body.
Step:5 Feel the stretch in your hamstrings as you lower the barbell.
Step:6 Once you feel a stretch in your hamstrings, push your hips forward and stand up straight.
Step:7 Squeeze your glutes at the top of the movement.
Step:8 Lower the barbell back down to the starting position and repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Peso muerto rumano con barra
instructions: Paso 1: Párese con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y los dedos de los pies apuntando hacia adelante.
Paso 2: Sostenga la barra con un agarre prono, con las manos un poco más separadas que el ancho de los hombros.
Paso 3: Inclínese desde las caderas, manteniendo la espalda recta y las rodillas ligeramente flexionadas.
Paso 4: Baje la barra hacia el suelo, manteniéndola cerca de su cuerpo.
Paso 5: Sienta el estiramiento en sus isquiotibiales mientras baja la barra.
Paso 6: Una vez que sienta el estiramiento, empuje las caderas hacia adelante y póngase de pie.
Paso 7: Apriete los glúteos en la parte superior del movimiento.
Paso 8: Baje la barra de nuevo a la posición inicial y repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: band reverse wrist curl
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench or chair with your feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Hold the band with an overhand grip, palms facing down, and wrap it around your fingers.
Step:3 Rest your forearms on your thighs, with your wrists hanging off the edge.
Step:4 Slowly curl your wrists upward, squeezing your forearms.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your wrists back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: band reverse wrist curl
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench or chair with your feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Hold the band with an overhand grip, palms facing down.
Step:3 Rest your forearms on your thighs, with your wrists hanging off the edge.
Step:4 Slowly extend your wrists upward, squeezing your forearms.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your wrists back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Curl de muñeca inverso con banda
instructions: Paso 1: Siéntese en un banco o silla con los pies apoyados en el suelo.
Paso 2: Sostenga la banda con un agarre prono, con las palmas hacia abajo.
Paso 3: Apoye los antebrazos en los muslos, con las muñecas colgando del borde.
Paso 4: Extienda lentamente las muñecas hacia arriba, apretando los antebrazos.
Paso 5: Haga una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, luego baje lentamente las muñecas a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: kettlebell turkish get up (squat style)
instructions: Step:1 Start by lying on your back with your legs extended and the kettlebell held in your right hand, arm fully extended above your shoulder.
Step:2 Bend your right knee and place your right foot flat on the ground, keeping your left leg extended.
Step:3 Pressing through your right foot, lift your hips off the ground, coming into a bridge position.
Step:4 Slide your left leg underneath your body, bending your left knee and placing your left foot flat on the ground.
Step:5 Rotate your torso to the left, bringing your left hand to the ground for support.
Step:6 Pressing through your right foot and left hand, lift your torso off the ground, coming into a kneeling position.
Step:7 From the kneeling position, stand up, keeping the kettlebell extended overhead.
Step:8 Reverse the movement to return to the starting position.
Step:9 Repeat the exercise on the other side, starting with the kettlebell in your left hand.

translations.name: kettlebell turkish get up (squat style)
instructions: Step:1 Start by lying on your back with your legs extended and the kettlebell held in your right hand, arm fully extended above your shoulder.
Step:2 Bend your right knee and place your right foot flat on the ground, keeping your left leg extended.
Step:3 Pressing through your right foot, lift your hips off the ground, coming into a bridge position.
Step:4 Slide your left leg underneath your body, bending your left knee and placing your left foot flat on the ground.
Step:5 Rotate your torso to the left, bringing your left hand to the ground for support.
Step:6 Pressing through your right foot and left hand, lift your torso off the ground, coming into a kneeling position.
Step:7 From the kneeling position, stand up, keeping the kettlebell extended overhead.
Step:8 Reverse the movement to return to the starting position.
Step:9 Repeat the exercise on the other side, starting with the kettlebell in your left hand.

translations.name: Levantamiento turco con kettlebell (estilo sentadilla)
instructions: Paso 1: Comience acostado boca arriba con las piernas extendidas y la kettlebell en la mano derecha, con el brazo completamente extendido por encima del hombro.
Paso 2: Flexione la rodilla derecha y coloque el pie derecho plano en el suelo, manteniendo la pierna izquierda extendida.
Paso 3: Empujando con el pie derecho, levante las caderas del suelo, llegando a una posición de puente.
Paso 4: Deslice la pierna izquierda por debajo de su cuerpo, flexionando la rodilla izquierda y colocando el pie izquierdo plano en el suelo.
Paso 5: Gire el torso hacia la izquierda, llevando la mano izquierda al suelo como apoyo.
Paso 6: Empujando con el pie derecho y la mano izquierda, levante el torso del suelo, llegando a una posición de rodillas.
Paso 7: Desde la posición de rodillas, póngase de pie, manteniendo la kettlebell extendida sobre la cabeza.
Paso 8: Invierta el movimiento para volver a la posición inicial.
Paso 9: Repita el ejercicio del otro lado, comenzando con la kettlebell en la mano izquierda.

name: dumbbell rotation reverse fly
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing inwards.
Step:2 Bend your knees slightly and hinge forward at the hips, keeping your back straight and chest up.
Step:3 Raise your arms out to the sides, keeping a slight bend in your elbows, until they are parallel to the floor.
Step:4 Rotate your arms so that your palms are facing downwards.
Step:5 Slowly lower your arms back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell rotation reverse fly
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing inwards.
Step:2 Bend your knees slightly and hinge forward at the hips, keeping your back straight and chest up.
Step:3 Raise your arms out to the sides, keeping a slight bend in your elbows, until they are parallel to the floor.
Step:4 Rotate your arms so that your palms are facing downwards.
Step:5 Slowly lower your arms back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Apertura inversa con rotación y mancuernas
instructions: Paso 1: Párese con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y sostenga una mancuerna en cada mano, con las palmas mirando hacia adentro.
Paso 2: Flexione ligeramente las rodillas e inclínese hacia adelante desde las caderas, manteniendo la espalda recta y el pecho erguido.
Paso 3: Levante los brazos hacia los lados, manteniendo una ligera flexión en los codos, hasta que estén paralelos al suelo.
Paso 4: Gire los brazos para que las palmas miren hacia abajo.
Paso 5: Baje lentamente los brazos de nuevo a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: tuck crunch
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Place your hands behind your head with your elbows pointing outwards.
Step:3 Engaging your abs, lift your shoulder blades off the ground and bring your knees towards your chest, simultaneously curling your upper body towards your knees.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your shoulder blades and extend your legs back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: tuck crunch
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Place your hands behind your head with your elbows pointing outwards.
Step:3 Engaging your abs, lift your shoulder blades off the ground and bring your knees towards your chest, simultaneously curling your upper body towards your knees.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your shoulder blades and extend your legs back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Crunch encogido
instructions: Paso 1: Acuéstese boca arriba con las rodillas flexionadas y los pies apoyados en el suelo.
Paso 2: Coloque las manos detrás de la cabeza con los codos apuntando hacia afuera.
Paso 3: Activando sus abdominales, levante los omóplatos del suelo y lleve las rodillas hacia el pecho, flexionando simultáneamente la parte superior del cuerpo hacia las rodillas.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, luego baje lentamente los omóplatos y extienda las piernas de nuevo a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: reverse grip machine lat pulldown
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and position yourself on the machine with your knees under the pads and your feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Grasp the handles with an underhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Sit upright with your chest out and shoulders back, maintaining a slight arch in your lower back.
Step:4 Pull the handles down towards your chest, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom of the movement, then slowly release the handles back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: reverse grip machine lat pulldown
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and position yourself on the machine with your knees under the pads and your feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Grasp the handles with an underhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Sit upright with your chest out and shoulders back, maintaining a slight arch in your lower back.
Step:4 Pull the handles down towards your chest, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom of the movement, then slowly release the handles back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Jalón al pecho en máquina con agarre inverso
instructions: Paso 1: Ajuste la altura del asiento y colóquese en la máquina con las rodillas debajo de las almohadillas y los pies apoyados en el suelo.
Paso 2: Agarre las manijas con un agarre supino, un poco más ancho que el ancho de los hombros.
Paso 3: Siéntese derecho con el pecho hacia afuera y los hombros hacia atrás, manteniendo un ligero arco en la parte baja de la espalda.
Paso 4: Jale las manijas hacia su pecho, apretando los omóplatos.
Paso 5: Haga una pausa por un momento en la parte inferior del movimiento, luego suelte lentamente las manijas para volver a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell incline t-raise
instructions: Step:1 Set an incline bench to a 45-degree angle and sit on it with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing inwards.
Step:2 Lean forward and let your arms hang straight down, perpendicular to the floor.
Step:3 Keeping your arms straight, raise them out to the sides until they are parallel to the floor, forming a 'T' shape with your body.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your arms back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell incline t-raise
instructions: Step:1 Set an incline bench to a 45-degree angle and lie face down on it with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing inwards.
Step:2 Let your arms hang straight down, perpendicular to the floor.
Step:3 Keeping your arms straight, raise them out to the sides until they are parallel to the floor, forming a 'T' shape with your body.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your arms back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Elevación en T inclinada con mancuernas
instructions: Paso 1: Coloque un banco inclinado a 45 grados y acuéstese boca abajo sobre él con una mancuerna en cada mano, las palmas mirando hacia adentro.
Paso 2: Deje que sus brazos cuelguen rectos, perpendiculares al suelo.
Paso 3: Manteniendo los brazos rectos, levántelos hacia los lados hasta que estén paralelos al suelo, formando una 'T' con su cuerpo.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, luego baje lentamente los brazos a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: cable kickback
instructions: Step:1 Stand facing a cable machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Hold the cable handle with your right hand and step back to create tension in the cable.
Step:3 Bend your knees slightly and hinge forward at the hips, keeping your back straight.
Step:4 Keep your upper arm close to your body and your elbow bent at a 90-degree angle.
Step:5 Extend your forearm backward, straightening your arm fully.
Step:6 Pause for a moment, then slowly return to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides.

translations.name: cable kickback
instructions: Step:1 Stand facing a cable machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Hold the cable handle with your right hand and step back to create tension in the cable.
Step:3 Bend your knees slightly and hinge forward at the hips, keeping your back straight.
Step:4 Keep your upper arm close to your body and your elbow bent at a 90-degree angle.
Step:5 Extend your forearm backward, straightening your arm fully.
Step:6 Pause for a moment, then slowly return to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides.

translations.name: Patada de tríceps en polea
instructions: Paso 1: Párese frente a una máquina de poleas con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros.
Paso 2: Sostenga el agarre de la polea con la mano derecha y dé un paso atrás para crear tensión en el cable.
Paso 3: Flexione ligeramente las rodillas e inclínese hacia adelante desde las caderas, manteniendo la espalda recta.
Paso 4: Mantenga la parte superior del brazo pegada al cuerpo y el codo flexionado en un ángulo de 90 grados.
Paso 5: Extienda el antebrazo hacia atrás, enderezando el brazo por completo.
Paso 6: Haga una pausa por un momento, luego regrese lentamente a la posición inicial.
Paso 7: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambie de lado.

name: barbell high bar squat
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, toes slightly turned out.
Step:2 Place the barbell on your back, resting it on your traps.
Step:3 Engage your core and keep your chest up as you begin to squat down, pushing your hips back and bending your knees.
Step:4 Lower yourself until your thighs are parallel to the ground, or as low as you can comfortably go.
Step:5 Drive through your heels to stand back up, extending your hips and knees.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: barbell high bar squat
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, toes slightly turned out.
Step:2 Place the barbell on your back, resting it on your traps.
Step:3 Engage your core and keep your chest up as you begin to squat down, pushing your hips back and bending your knees.
Step:4 Lower yourself until your thighs are parallel to the ground, or as low as you can comfortably go.
Step:5 Drive through your heels to stand back up, extending your hips and knees.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Sentadilla con barra alta
instructions: Paso 1: Párese con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros, con las puntas de los pies ligeramente hacia afuera.
Paso 2: Coloque la barra sobre su espalda, apoyándola en sus trapecios.
Paso 3: Active su core y mantenga el pecho erguido mientras comienza a bajar, empujando las caderas hacia atrás y flexionando las rodillas.
Paso 4: Baje hasta que sus muslos estén paralelos al suelo, o tan bajo como pueda cómodamente.
Paso 5: Empuje con los talones para volver a ponerse de pie, extendiendo las caderas y las rodillas.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: ez-barbell standing wide grip biceps curl
instructions: Step:1 Stand up straight with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold the ez barbell with an underhand grip, hands wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Keep your elbows close to your torso and your upper arms stationary throughout the movement.
Step:3 Curl the barbell up towards your shoulders by contracting your biceps.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the barbell back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: ez-barbell standing wide grip biceps curl
instructions: Step:1 Stand up straight with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold the ez barbell with an underhand grip, hands wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Keep your elbows close to your torso and your upper arms stationary throughout the movement.
Step:3 Curl the barbell up towards your shoulders by contracting your biceps.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the barbell back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Curl de bíceps de pie con barra EZ y agarre ancho
instructions: Paso 1: Párese derecho con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y sostenga la barra EZ con un agarre supino, con las manos más separadas que el ancho de los hombros.
Paso 2: Mantenga los codos cerca de su torso y la parte superior de los brazos inmóvil durante todo el movimiento.
Paso 3: Suba la barra hacia sus hombros contrayendo los bíceps.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, luego baje lentamente la barra a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: barbell seated calf raise
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your feet flat on the floor and a barbell resting on your thighs.
Step:2 Place the balls of your feet on a raised platform, such as a block or step.
Step:3 Lower your heels as far as possible, feeling a stretch in your calves.
Step:4 Raise your heels as high as possible, contracting your calves.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: barbell seated calf raise
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your feet flat on the floor and a barbell resting on your thighs.
Step:2 Place the balls of your feet on a raised platform, such as a block or step.
Step:3 Lower your heels as far as possible, feeling a stretch in your calves.
Step:4 Raise your heels as high as possible, contracting your calves.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Elevación de talones sentado con barra
instructions: Paso 1: Siéntese en un banco con los pies apoyados en el suelo y una barra descansando sobre sus muslos.
Paso 2: Coloque la parte delantera de sus pies en una plataforma elevada, como un bloque o escalón.
Paso 3: Baje los talones tanto como sea posible, sintiendo un estiramiento en los gemelos.
Paso 4: Levante los talones lo más alto posible, contrayendo los gemelos.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: bodyweight incline side plank
instructions: Step:1 Start by lying on your side with your legs extended and stacked on top of each other.
Step:2 Place your forearm on an elevated surface directly below your shoulder, with your elbow bent at a 90-degree angle.
Step:3 Engage your core and lift your hips off the ground, creating a straight line from your head to your feet.
Step:4 Hold this position for the desired amount of time.
Step:5 Lower your hips back down to the ground and repeat on the other side.

translations.name: bodyweight incline side plank
instructions: Step:1 Start by lying on your side with your legs extended and stacked on top of each other.
Step:2 Place your forearm on an elevated surface directly below your shoulder, with your elbow bent at a 90-degree angle.
Step:3 Engage your core and lift your hips off the ground, creating a straight line from your head to your feet.
Step:4 Hold this position for the desired amount of time.
Step:5 Lower your hips back down to the ground and repeat on the other side.

translations.name: Plancha lateral inclinada con peso corporal
instructions: Paso 1: Comience acostándose de lado con las piernas extendidas y una encima de la otra.
Paso 2: Coloque el antebrazo sobre una superficie elevada directamente debajo del hombro, con el codo flexionado en un ángulo de 90 grados.
Paso 3: Active su core y levante las caderas del suelo, creando una línea recta desde la cabeza hasta los pies.
Paso 4: Mantenga esta posición durante el tiempo deseado.
Paso 5: Baje las caderas de nuevo al suelo y repita del otro lado.

name: barbell wrist curl v. 2
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your feet flat on the ground and your knees bent.
Step:2 Hold a barbell with an underhand grip, palms facing up, and your hands shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Rest your forearms on your thighs, allowing your wrists to hang off the edge.
Step:4 Slowly curl your wrists upward, bringing the barbell towards your forearms.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the barbell back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: barbell wrist curl v. 2
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your feet flat on the ground and your knees bent.
Step:2 Hold a barbell with an underhand grip, palms facing up, and your hands shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Rest your forearms on your thighs, allowing your wrists to hang off the edge.
Step:4 Slowly curl your wrists upward, bringing the barbell towards your forearms.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the barbell back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Curl de muñeca con barra v. 2
instructions: Paso 1: Siéntese en un banco con los pies apoyados en el suelo y las rodillas flexionadas.
Paso 2: Sostenga una barra con un agarre supino, con las palmas hacia arriba, y las manos separadas al ancho de los hombros.
Paso 3: Apoye los antebrazos en los muslos, permitiendo que las muñecas cuelguen del borde.
Paso 4: Flexione lentamente las muñecas hacia arriba, llevando la barra hacia sus antebrazos.
Paso 5: Haga una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, luego baje lentamente la barra a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: assisted prone rectus femoris stretch
instructions: Step:1 Lie face down on the ground with your legs straight.
Step:2 Bend your right knee and reach back with your right hand to grab your right foot or ankle.
Step:3 Gently pull your right foot or ankle towards your glutes, feeling a stretch in the front of your right thigh.
Step:4 Hold the stretch for 20-30 seconds.
Step:5 Release and repeat on the other side.

translations.name: assisted prone rectus femoris stretch
instructions: Step:1 Lie face down on the ground with your legs straight.
Step:2 Bend your right knee and reach back with your right hand to grab your right foot or ankle.
Step:3 Gently pull your right foot or ankle towards your glutes, feeling a stretch in the front of your right thigh.
Step:4 Hold the stretch for 20-30 seconds.
Step:5 Release and repeat on the other side.

translations.name: Estiramiento del recto femoral prono asistido
instructions: Paso 1: Acuéstese boca abajo en el suelo con las piernas estiradas.
Paso 2: Flexione la rodilla derecha y lleve la mano derecha hacia atrás para agarrar el pie o el tobillo derecho.
Paso 3: Jale suavemente el pie o tobillo derecho hacia los glúteos, sintiendo un estiramiento en la parte frontal del muslo derecho.
Paso 4: Mantenga el estiramiento durante 20-30 segundos.
Paso 5: Suelte y repita del otro lado.

name: dumbbell incline twisted flyes
instructions: Step:1 Set an incline bench to a 45-degree angle and sit on it with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing each other.
Step:2 Lie back on the bench and press the dumbbells up to the starting position, directly above your chest, with your arms extended.
Step:3 Lower the dumbbells out to the sides in a wide arc until you feel a stretch in your chest.
Step:4 As you lower the dumbbells, rotate your wrists so that your palms face forward at the bottom of the movement.
Step:5 Reverse the motion and bring the dumbbells back up to the starting position, squeezing your chest muscles together at the top.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell incline twisted flyes
instructions: Step:1 Set an incline bench to a 45-degree angle and sit on it with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing each other.
Step:2 Lie back on the bench and press the dumbbells up to the starting position, directly above your chest, with your arms extended.
Step:3 Lower the dumbbells out to the sides in a wide arc until you feel a stretch in your chest.
Step:4 As you lower the dumbbells, rotate your wrists so that your palms face forward at the bottom of the movement.
Step:5 Reverse the motion and bring the dumbbells back up to the starting position, squeezing your chest muscles together at the top.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Aperturas inclinadas con giro y mancuernas
instructions: Paso 1: Coloque un banco inclinado a 45 grados y siéntese en él con una mancuerna en cada mano, las palmas enfrentadas.
Paso 2: Acuéstese en el banco y empuje las mancuernas hacia arriba a la posición inicial, directamente sobre su pecho, con los brazos extendidos.
Paso 3: Baje las mancuernas hacia los lados en un arco amplio hasta que sienta un estiramiento en el pecho.
Paso 4: Mientras baja las mancuernas, gire las muñecas para que las palmas miren hacia adelante en la parte inferior del movimiento.
Paso 5: Invierta el movimiento y vuelva a subir las mancuernas a la posición inicial, apretando los músculos del pecho en la parte superior.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: incline push up depth jump
instructions: Step:1 Find an elevated surface, such as a bench or step, and place your hands shoulder-width apart on the edge.
Step:2 Step your feet back, keeping your body in a straight line from head to heels.
Step:3 Lower your chest towards the edge of the surface, bending your elbows and keeping your body aligned.
Step:4 Push through your palms to extend your arms and return to the starting position.
Step:5 Jump off the edge of the surface, landing softly with your knees slightly bent.
Step:6 Repeat the push-up and depth jump for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: incline push up depth jump
instructions: Step:1 Find an elevated surface, such as a bench or step, and place your hands shoulder-width apart on the edge.
Step:2 Step your feet back, keeping your body in a straight line from head to heels.
Step:3 Lower your chest towards the edge of the surface, bending your elbows and keeping your body aligned.
Step:4 Explosively push up so your hands leave the surface.
Step:5 Land softly back on the surface with your elbows slightly bent.
Step:6 Immediately lower into the next push-up and repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Flexión inclinada con salto de profundidad
instructions: Paso 1: Encuentre una superficie elevada, como un banco o escalón, y coloque las manos separadas al ancho de los hombros en el borde.
Paso 2: Coloque los pies hacia atrás, manteniendo el cuerpo en línea recta de la cabeza a los talones.
Paso 3: Baje el pecho hacia el borde de la superficie, flexionando los codos y manteniendo el cuerpo alineado.
Paso 4: Empuje explosivamente hacia arriba para que sus manos se separen de la superficie.
Paso 5: Aterrice suavemente de nuevo en la superficie con los codos ligeramente flexionados.
Paso 6: Baje inmediatamente a la siguiente flexión y repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell single arm overhead carry
instructions: Step:1 Stand tall with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a dumbbell in one hand.
Step:2 Raise the dumbbell overhead, fully extending your arm.
Step:3 Engage your core and keep your back straight as you walk forward, maintaining the dumbbell overhead.
Step:4 Continue walking for the desired distance or time.
Step:5 Switch hands and repeat the exercise.

translations.name: dumbbell single arm overhead carry
instructions: Step:1 Stand tall with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a dumbbell in one hand.
Step:2 Raise the dumbbell overhead, fully extending your arm.
Step:3 Engage your core and keep your back straight as you walk forward, maintaining the dumbbell overhead.
Step:4 Continue walking for the desired distance or time.
Step:5 Switch hands and repeat the exercise.

translations.name: Paseo con mancuerna sobre la cabeza a un brazo
instructions: Paso 1: Párese erguido con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros, sosteniendo una mancuerna en una mano.
Paso 2: Levante la mancuerna por encima de la cabeza, extendiendo completamente el brazo.
Paso 3: Active su core y mantenga la espalda recta mientras camina hacia adelante, manteniendo la mancuerna sobre la cabeza.
Paso 4: Continúe caminando durante la distancia o el tiempo deseado.
Paso 5: Cambie de mano y repita el ejercicio.

name: assisted chest dip (kneeling)
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the machine to your desired height and secure your knees on the pad.
Step:2 Grasp the handles with your palms facing down and your arms fully extended.
Step:3 Lower your body by bending your elbows until your upper arms are parallel to the floor.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then push yourself back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: assisted chest dip (kneeling)
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the machine to your desired height and secure your knees on the pad.
Step:2 Grasp the handles with your palms facing down and your arms fully extended.
Step:3 Lower your body by bending your elbows until your upper arms are parallel to the floor.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then push yourself back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Fondos de pecho asistidos (de rodillas)
instructions: Paso 1: Ajuste la máquina a la altura deseada y apoye las rodillas en la almohadilla.
Paso 2: Agarre las manijas con las palmas hacia abajo y los brazos completamente extendidos.
Paso 3: Baje su cuerpo flexionando los codos hasta que la parte superior de sus brazos esté paralela al suelo.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa por un momento, luego empuje hacia arriba para volver a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell full can lateral raise
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a dumbbell in each hand with your palms facing your body.
Step:2 Keep your back straight and engage your core.
Step:3 Raise your arms out to the sides, keeping a slight bend in your elbows, until they are parallel to the ground.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your arms back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell full can lateral raise
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a dumbbell in each hand with your thumbs pointing up.
Step:2 Keep your back straight and engage your core.
Step:3 Raise your arms out to the sides and slightly in front of you, keeping a slight bend in your elbows, until they are parallel to the ground.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your arms back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Elevación lateral 'Full Can' con mancuernas
instructions: Paso 1: Párese con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros, sosteniendo una mancuerna en cada mano con los pulgares apuntando hacia arriba.
Paso 2: Mantenga la espalda recta y active su core.
Paso 3: Levante los brazos hacia los lados y ligeramente hacia adelante, manteniendo una ligera flexión en los codos, hasta que estén paralelos al suelo.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, luego baje lentamente los brazos a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: kettlebell double windmill
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a kettlebell in your right hand.
Step:2 Extend your right arm overhead, keeping your eyes on the kettlebell.
Step:3 Rotate your left foot 45 degrees to the left and your right foot 90 degrees to the right.
Step:4 Bend at the waist to the left, keeping your right arm extended overhead.
Step:5 Lower your body towards the ground, reaching towards your left foot with your left hand.
Step:6 Pause for a moment, then engage your core and push through your right foot to return to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides.

translations.name: kettlebell double windmill
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a kettlebell in each hand.
Step:2 Extend your right arm overhead, keeping your eyes on the kettlebell.
Step:3 Rotate your left foot 45 degrees to the left and your right foot 90 degrees to the right.
Step:4 Hinge at your hips to the left, keeping your right arm extended overhead and your left arm hanging down.
Step:5 Lower your torso until the left kettlebell touches the ground.
Step:6 Pause for a moment, then engage your core and obliques to return to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides.

translations.name: Molino doble con kettlebell
instructions: Paso 1: Párese con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros, sosteniendo una kettlebell en cada mano.
Paso 2: Extienda su brazo derecho por encima de la cabeza, manteniendo la vista en la kettlebell.
Paso 3: Gire su pie izquierdo 45 grados a la izquierda y su pie derecho 90 grados a la derecha.
Paso 4: Inclínese desde las caderas hacia la izquierda, manteniendo el brazo derecho extendido sobre la cabeza y el brazo izquierdo colgando.
Paso 5: Baje el torso hasta que la kettlebell izquierda toque el suelo.
Paso 6: Haga una pausa por un momento, luego active su core y oblicuos para volver a la posición inicial.
Paso 7: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambie de lado.

name: cable kneeling rear delt row (with rope) (male)
instructions: Step:1 Attach a rope handle to a low cable pulley and kneel down facing the machine.
Step:2 Grasp the rope with a neutral grip (palms facing each other) and extend your arms fully in front of you.
Step:3 Keeping your back straight and core engaged, pull the rope towards your body by retracting your shoulder blades.
Step:4 Squeeze your shoulder blades together at the end of the movement and hold for a brief pause.
Step:5 Slowly release the tension and return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: cable kneeling rear delt row (with rope)
instructions: Step:1 Attach a rope handle to a low cable pulley and kneel down facing the machine.
Step:2 Grasp the rope with an overhand grip and extend your arms fully in front of you.
Step:3 Keeping your back straight and core engaged, pull the rope towards your face, leading with your elbows and pulling the handles apart.
Step:4 Squeeze your shoulder blades together at the end of the movement and hold for a brief pause.
Step:5 Slowly release the tension and return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Remo para deltoides posterior de rodillas con cuerda en polea
instructions: Paso 1: Enganche un agarre de cuerda a una polea baja y arrodíllese frente a la máquina.
Paso 2: Agarre la cuerda con un agarre prono y extienda los brazos completamente frente a usted.
Paso 3: Manteniendo la espalda recta y el core activado, jale la cuerda hacia su cara, liderando con los codos y separando los agarres.
Paso 4: Apriete los omóplatos al final del movimiento y mantenga la posición por un momento.
Paso 5: Suelte lentamente la tensión y regrese a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: lever seated crunch
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the leverage machine with your back against the pad and your feet flat on the floor.
Step:2 Grasp the handles or place your hands on the side pads for support.
Step:3 Engage your abs and slowly lean back, allowing the pad to move with you.
Step:4 Once your upper body is at a 45-degree angle, contract your abs and crunch forward, bringing your chest towards your knees.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly release and return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: lever seated crunch
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the leverage machine with your back against the pad and your feet flat on the floor.
Step:2 Grasp the handles or place your hands on the side pads for support.
Step:3 Engage your abs and crunch forward, bringing your chest towards your knees.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly release and return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Crunch sentado en máquina de palanca
instructions: Paso 1: Siéntese en la máquina de palanca con la espalda contra la almohadilla y los pies apoyados en el suelo.
Paso 2: Agarre las manijas o coloque las manos en las almohadillas laterales como apoyo.
Paso 3: Active sus abdominales y flexiónese hacia adelante, llevando el pecho hacia las rodillas.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, luego suelte lentamente y regrese a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: band horizontal pallof press
instructions: Step:1 Attach the band to a sturdy anchor point at waist height.
Step:2 Stand perpendicular to the anchor point with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Grasp the band handle with both hands and step away from the anchor point to create tension in the band.
Step:4 Bring your hands to your chest, keeping your elbows bent and close to your body.
Step:5 Engage your core and maintain a stable stance.
Step:6 Extend your arms straight out in front of you, pushing the band away from your body.
Step:7 Hold the extended position for a few seconds, focusing on maintaining tension in your core.
Step:8 Slowly bring your hands back to your chest, resisting the pull of the band.
Step:9 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: band horizontal pallof press
instructions: Step:1 Attach the band to a sturdy anchor point at waist height.
Step:2 Stand perpendicular to the anchor point with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Grasp the band with both hands and step away from the anchor point to create tension.
Step:4 Bring your hands to your chest, keeping your elbows bent and close to your body.
Step:5 Engage your core and maintain a stable stance.
Step:6 Extend your arms straight out in front of you, resisting the rotational pull of the band.
Step:7 Hold the extended position for a few seconds, focusing on maintaining tension in your core.
Step:8 Slowly bring your hands back to your chest, resisting the pull of the band.
Step:9 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions and then switch sides.

translations.name: Press Pallof horizontal con banda
instructions: Paso 1: Sujete la banda a un punto de anclaje resistente a la altura de la cintura.
Paso 2: Párese perpendicular al punto de anclaje con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros.
Paso 3: Agarre la banda con ambas manos y aléjese del punto de anclaje para crear tensión.
Paso 4: Lleve las manos al pecho, manteniendo los codos flexionados y cerca del cuerpo.
Paso 5: Active su core y mantenga una postura estable.
Paso 6: Extienda los brazos rectos frente a usted, resistiendo la fuerza de rotación de la banda.
Paso 7: Mantenga la posición extendida durante unos segundos, concentrándose en mantener la tensión en su core.
Paso 8: Lleve lentamente las manos de vuelta al pecho, resistiendo la tracción de la banda.
Paso 9: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones y luego cambie de lado.

name: lever reverse grip vertical row
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and footplate position to ensure proper alignment.
Step:2 Sit on the machine with your chest against the pad and your feet flat on the footplate.
Step:3 Grasp the handles with an underhand grip, palms facing up.
Step:4 Keep your back straight and engage your core.
Step:5 Pull the handles towards your chest, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the top of the movement, then slowly release and extend your arms back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: lever reverse grip vertical row
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and footplate position to ensure proper alignment.
Step:2 Sit on the machine with your chest against the pad and your feet flat on the footplate.
Step:3 Grasp the handles with an underhand grip, palms facing up.
Step:4 Keep your back straight and engage your core.
Step:5 Pull the handles towards your chest, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the top of the movement, then slowly release and extend your arms back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Remo vertical con agarre inverso en máquina de palanca
instructions: Paso 1: Ajuste la altura del asiento y la posición del reposapiés para asegurar una alineación adecuada.
Paso 2: Siéntese en la máquina con el pecho contra la almohadilla и los pies apoyados en el reposapiés.
Paso 3: Agarre las manijas con un agarre supino, con las palmas hacia arriba.
Paso 4: Mantenga la espalda recta y active su core.
Paso 5: Jale las manijas hacia su pecho, apretando los omóplatos.
Paso 6: Haga una pausa por un momento en la parte superior del movimiento, luego suelte lentamente y extienda los brazos de nuevo a la posición inicial.
Paso 7: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: exercise ball alternating arm ups
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the stability ball with your feet flat on the ground and your back straight.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell in each hand with your palms facing inwards and your arms extended down by your sides.
Step:3 Engage your core and slowly lift one arm up towards your shoulder, keeping your elbow slightly bent.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your arm back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat the movement with the other arm.
Step:6 Continue alternating arms for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: exercise ball alternating arm ups
instructions: Step:1 Lie with your stomach on the stability ball, with your legs extended and your toes on the ground for balance.
Step:2 Extend your arms down towards the floor.
Step:3 Engage your core and slowly lift one arm straight up in front of you.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your arm back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat the movement with the other arm.
Step:6 Continue alternating arms for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Elevación alterna de brazos sobre balón de ejercicio
instructions: Paso 1: Acuéstese con el estómago sobre el balón de estabilidad, con las piernas extendidas y los dedos de los pies en el suelo para mantener el equilibrio.
Paso 2: Extienda los brazos hacia el suelo.
Paso 3: Active su core y levante lentamente un brazo recto frente a usted.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, luego baje lentamente el brazo a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita el movimiento con el otro brazo.
Paso 6: Continúe alternando los brazos para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: kettlebell front squat
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, toes slightly turned out.
Step:2 Hold the kettlebell with both hands in front of your chest, close to your body.
Step:3 Engage your core and keep your chest up as you lower your hips down and back, as if sitting into a chair.
Step:4 Lower until your thighs are parallel to the ground, or as low as you can comfortably go.
Step:5 Drive through your heels to stand back up, squeezing your glutes at the top.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: kettlebell front squat
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, toes slightly turned out.
Step:2 Hold the kettlebell with both hands in front of your chest, close to your body.
Step:3 Engage your core and keep your chest up as you lower your hips down and back, as if sitting into a chair.
Step:4 Lower until your thighs are parallel to the ground, or as low as you can comfortably go.
Step:5 Drive through your heels to stand back up, squeezing your glutes at the top.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Sentadilla frontal con kettlebell
instructions: Paso 1: Párese con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros, con las puntas de los pies ligeramente hacia afuera.
Paso 2: Sostenga la kettlebell con ambas manos frente a su pecho, cerca de su cuerpo.
Paso 3: Active su core y mantenga el pecho erguido mientras baja las caderas hacia abajo y hacia atrás, como si se sentara en una silla.
Paso 4: Baje hasta que sus muslos estén paralelos al suelo, o tan bajo como pueda cómodamente.
Paso 5: Empuje con los talones para volver a ponerse de pie, apretando los glúteos en la parte superior.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: lever alternating narrow grip seated row
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and footplate position to ensure proper alignment.
Step:2 Sit on the machine with your back straight and feet flat on the footplate.
Step:3 Grasp the handles with a narrow grip, palms facing each other.
Step:4 Keep your chest up and shoulders back throughout the exercise.
Step:5 Pull one handle towards your torso while keeping the other handle stationary.
Step:6 Squeeze your shoulder blades together at the end of the movement.
Step:7 Slowly return the handle to the starting position and repeat with the other side.
Step:8 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: lever alternating narrow grip seated row
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and footplate position to ensure proper alignment.
Step:2 Sit on the machine with your back straight and feet flat on the footplate.
Step:3 Grasp the handles with a narrow grip, palms facing each other.
Step:4 Keep your chest up and shoulders back throughout the exercise.
Step:5 Pull one handle towards your torso while keeping the other handle stationary.
Step:6 Squeeze your shoulder blades together at the end of the movement.
Step:7 Slowly return the handle to the starting position and repeat with the other side.
Step:8 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Remo sentado alterno con agarre estrecho en máquina de palanca
instructions: Paso 1: Ajuste la altura del asiento y la posición del reposapiés para asegurar una alineación adecuada.
Paso 2: Siéntese en la máquina con la espalda recta y los pies apoyados en el reposapiés.
Paso 3: Agarre las manijas con un agarre estrecho, con las palmas enfrentadas.
Paso 4: Mantenga el pecho erguido y los hombros hacia atrás durante todo el ejercicio.
Paso 5: Jale una manija hacia su torso mientras mantiene la otra inmóvil.
Paso 6: Apriete los omóplatos al final del movimiento.
Paso 7: Regrese lentamente la manija a la posición inicial y repita con el otro lado.
Paso 8: Continúe alternando lados para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: elevator
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your knees slightly bent.
Step:2 Place your hands on your hips or cross them in front of your chest.
Step:3 Keeping your back straight, slowly bend forward at the waist, lowering your upper body towards the ground.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then slowly raise your upper body back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: elevator
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your knees slightly bent.
Step:2 Place your hands on your hips or cross them in front of your chest.
Step:3 Keeping your back straight, slowly bend forward at the waist, lowering your upper body towards the ground.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then slowly raise your upper body back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Elevador
instructions: Paso 1: Párese con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y las rodillas ligeramente flexionadas.
Paso 2: Coloque las manos en las caderas o crúcelas frente a su pecho.
Paso 3: Manteniendo la espalda recta, inclínese lentamente hacia adelante desde la cintura, bajando la parte superior del cuerpo hacia el suelo.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa por un momento en la parte inferior, luego levante lentamente la parte superior del cuerpo de nuevo a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: pelvic tilt
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Place your hands by your sides.
Step:3 Engage your abs and tilt your pelvis upward, pressing your lower back into the ground.
Step:4 Hold this position for a few seconds, focusing on contracting your abs.
Step:5 Release the tilt and return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: pelvic tilt
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Place your hands by your sides.
Step:3 Engage your abs and tilt your pelvis upward, pressing your lower back into the ground.
Step:4 Hold this position for a few seconds, focusing on contracting your abs.
Step:5 Release the tilt and return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Inclinación pélvica
instructions: Paso 1: Acuéstese boca arriba con las rodillas flexionadas y los pies apoyados en el suelo.
Paso 2: Coloque las manos a los lados.
Paso 3: Active sus abdominales e incline la pelvis hacia arriba, presionando la parte baja de la espalda contra el suelo.
Paso 4: Mantenga esta posición durante unos segundos, concentrándose en contraer los abdominales.
Paso 5: Suelte la inclinación y regrese a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell kickbacks on exercise ball
instructions: Step:1 Sit on an exercise ball with your feet flat on the ground and your back straight.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell in each hand with your palms facing inwards and your arms bent at a 90-degree angle.
Step:3 Extend your arms straight back, squeezing your triceps at the top of the movement.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then slowly lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell kickbacks on exercise ball
instructions: Step:1 Kneel with your chest on an exercise ball, holding a dumbbell in each hand.
Step:2 Keep your back straight and your arms bent at a 90-degree angle, with your upper arms parallel to the floor.
Step:3 Extend your arms straight back, squeezing your triceps at the top of the movement.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then slowly lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Patada de tríceps con mancuernas sobre balón de ejercicio
instructions: Paso 1: Arrodíllese con el pecho sobre un balón de ejercicio, sosteniendo una mancuerna en cada mano.
Paso 2: Mantenga la espalda recta y los brazos flexionados en un ángulo de 90 grados, con la parte superior de los brazos paralela al suelo.
Paso 3: Extienda los brazos rectos hacia atrás, apretando los tríceps en la parte superior del movimiento.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa por un momento, luego baje lentamente las mancuernas a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell zottman curl
instructions: Step:1 Stand up straight with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing forward.
Step:2 Keep your elbows close to your torso and your upper arms stationary.
Step:3 Curl the dumbbells up to your shoulders while contracting your biceps.
Step:4 At the top of the movement, rotate your wrists so that your palms are facing down.
Step:5 Slowly lower the dumbbells back to the starting position, keeping the palms-down grip.
Step:6 Rotate your wrists back to the starting position at the bottom.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell zottman curl
instructions: Step:1 Stand up straight with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing forward.
Step:2 Keep your elbows close to your torso and your upper arms stationary.
Step:3 Curl the dumbbells up to your shoulders while contracting your biceps.
Step:4 At the top of the movement, rotate your wrists so that your palms are facing down.
Step:5 Slowly lower the dumbbells back to the starting position, keeping the palms-down grip.
Step:6 Rotate your wrists back to the starting position at the bottom.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Curl Zottman con mancuernas
instructions: Paso 1: Párese derecho con una mancuerna en cada mano, con las palmas hacia adelante.
Paso 2: Mantenga los codos cerca de su torso y la parte superior de los brazos inmóvil.
Paso 3: Suba las mancuernas hacia los hombros mientras contrae los bíceps.
Paso 4: En la parte superior del movimiento, gire las muñecas para que las palmas miren hacia abajo.
Paso 5: Baje lentamente las mancuernas a la posición inicial, manteniendo el agarre con las palmas hacia abajo.
Paso 6: Gire las muñecas de nuevo a la posición inicial en la parte inferior.
Paso 7: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: machine inner chest press
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and position yourself on the machine with your back flat against the pad.
Step:2 Grasp the handles with a neutral grip and position your elbows at a 90-degree angle.
Step:3 Push the handles together until your arms are fully extended, exhaling during the movement.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the end of the movement, then slowly return to the starting position, inhaling as you do so.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: machine inner chest press
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and position yourself on the machine with your back flat against the pad.
Step:2 Grasp the handles with a neutral grip and position your elbows at a 90-degree angle.
Step:3 Push the handles together until your arms are fully extended, exhaling during the movement.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the end of the movement, then slowly return to the starting position, inhaling as you do so.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Press de pecho interno en máquina
instructions: Paso 1: Ajuste la altura del asiento y colóquese en la máquina con la espalda plana contra la almohadilla.
Paso 2: Agarre las manijas con un agarre neutro y coloque los codos en un ángulo de 90 grados.
Paso 3: Empuje las manijas una hacia la otra hasta que sus brazos estén completamente extendidos, exhalando durante el movimiento.
Paso 4: Haga una breve pausa al final del movimiento, luego regrese lentamente a la posición inicial, inhalando al hacerlo.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell one arm bent-over row
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a dumbbell in one hand with your palm facing your body.
Step:2 Bend your knees slightly and hinge forward at the hips, keeping your back straight and your core engaged.
Step:3 Let the dumbbell hang straight down towards the floor, with your arm fully extended.
Step:4 Pull the dumbbell up towards your chest, keeping your elbow close to your body and squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbell back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides.

translations.name: dumbbell one arm bent-over row
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a dumbbell in one hand with your palm facing your body.
Step:2 Bend your knees slightly and hinge forward at the hips, keeping your back straight and your core engaged.
Step:3 Let the dumbbell hang straight down towards the floor, with your arm fully extended.
Step:4 Pull the dumbbell up towards your chest, keeping your elbow close to your body and squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbell back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides.

translations.name: Remo inclinado a un brazo con mancuerna
instructions: Paso 1: Párese con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros, sosteniendo una mancuerna en una mano con la palma mirando hacia su cuerpo.
Paso 2: Flexione ligeramente las rodillas e inclínese hacia adelante desde las caderas, manteniendo la espalda recta y el core activado.
Paso 3: Deje que la mancuerna cuelgue recta hacia el suelo, con el brazo completamente extendido.
Paso 4: Jale la mancuerna hacia su pecho, manteniendo el codo cerca de su cuerpo y apretando los omóplatos.
Paso 5: Haga una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, luego baje lentamente la mancuerna a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambie de lado.

name: reverse crunch
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your arms extended along your sides.
Step:2 Bend your knees and lift your feet off the ground, bringing your thighs perpendicular to the floor.
Step:3 Contract your abs and curl your hips off the floor, bringing your knees towards your chest.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your hips back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: reverse crunch
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your arms extended along your sides.
Step:2 Bend your knees and lift your feet off the ground, bringing your thighs perpendicular to the floor.
Step:3 Contract your abs and curl your hips off the floor, bringing your knees towards your chest.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your hips back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Crunch inverso
instructions: Paso 1: Acuéstese boca arriba con los brazos extendidos a los lados.
Paso 2: Flexione las rodillas y levante los pies del suelo, llevando los muslos perpendiculares al suelo.
Paso 3: Contraiga sus abdominales y levante las caderas del suelo, llevando las rodillas hacia el pecho.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, luego baje lentamente las caderas a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell lying one arm supinated triceps extension
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on a bench with your back and head supported, and your feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell in one hand with an underhand grip, and extend your arm straight up above your shoulder.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arm stationary, slowly lower the dumbbell behind your head by bending your elbow.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then extend your arm back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

translations.name: dumbbell lying one arm supinated triceps extension
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on a bench with your back and head supported, and your feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell in one hand with an underhand grip, and extend your arm straight up above your shoulder.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arm stationary, slowly lower the dumbbell towards the opposite shoulder by bending your elbow.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then extend your arm back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

translations.name: Extensión de tríceps supina acostado a un brazo con mancuerna
instructions: Paso 1: Acuéstese en un banco con la espalda y la cabeza apoyadas, y los pies apoyados en el suelo.
Paso 2: Sostenga una mancuerna en una mano con agarre supino, y extienda el brazo recto por encima de su hombro.
Paso 3: Manteniendo la parte superior del brazo inmóvil, baje lentamente la mancuerna hacia el hombro opuesto flexionando el codo.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa por un momento en la parte inferior, luego extienda el brazo de nuevo a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambie de brazo.

name: assisted lying glutes stretch
instructions: Step:1 Lie on your back with your legs extended.
Step:2 Bend your right knee and place your right ankle on your left thigh, just above the knee.
Step:3 Grasp your left thigh with both hands and gently pull it towards your chest.
Step:4 Hold the stretch for 20-30 seconds.
Step:5 Release and repeat on the other side.

translations.name: assisted lying glutes stretch
instructions: Step:1 Lie on your back with your legs extended.
Step:2 Bend your right knee and place your right ankle on your left thigh, just above the knee.
Step:3 Grasp your left thigh with both hands and gently pull it towards your chest.
Step:4 Hold the stretch for 20-30 seconds.
Step:5 Release and repeat on the other side.

translations.name: Estiramiento de glúteos acostado asistido
instructions: Paso 1: Acuéstese boca arriba con las piernas extendidas.
Paso 2: Flexione la rodilla derecha y coloque el tobillo derecho sobre el muslo izquierdo, justo por encima de la rodilla.
Paso 3: Agarre su muslo izquierdo con ambas manos y jálelo suavemente hacia su pecho.
Paso 4: Mantenga el estiramiento durante 20-30 segundos.
Paso 5: Suelte y repita del otro lado.

name: assisted triceps dip (kneeling)
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the machine to your desired weight and height.
Step:2 Kneel down on the pad facing the machine, with your hands gripping the handles.
Step:3 Lower your body by bending your elbows, keeping your back straight and close to the machine.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push yourself back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: assisted triceps dip (kneeling)
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the machine to your desired weight and height.
Step:2 Kneel down on the pad facing the machine, with your hands gripping the handles.
Step:3 Lower your body by bending your elbows, keeping your back straight and close to the machine.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push yourself back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Fondos de tríceps asistidos (de rodillas)
instructions: Paso 1: Ajuste la máquina al peso y la altura deseados.
Paso 2: Arrodíllese en la almohadilla frente a la máquina, con las manos agarrando las manijas.
Paso 3: Baje su cuerpo flexionando los codos, manteniendo la espalda recta y cerca de la máquina.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa por un momento en la parte inferior, luego empuje hacia arriba para volver a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: back extension on exercise ball
instructions: Step:1 Place the stability ball on the ground and lie face down on top of it, with your hips resting on the ball and your feet against a wall or other stable surface.
Step:2 Position your hands behind your head or crossed over your chest.
Step:3 Engage your core and slowly lift your upper body off the ball, extending your back until your body forms a straight line from your head to your heels.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your upper body back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: back extension on exercise ball
instructions: Step:1 Place the stability ball on the ground and lie face down on top of it, with your hips resting on the ball and your feet against a wall or other stable surface.
Step:2 Position your hands behind your head or crossed over your chest.
Step:3 Engage your core and slowly lift your upper body off the ball, extending your back until your body forms a straight line from your head to your heels.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your upper body back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Extensión de espalda en balón de ejercicio
instructions: Paso 1: Coloque el balón de estabilidad en el suelo y acuéstese boca abajo sobre él, con las caderas apoyadas en el balón y los pies contra una pared u otra superficie estable.
Paso 2: Coloque las manos detrás de la cabeza o cruzadas sobre el pecho.
Paso 3: Active su core y levante lentamente la parte superior del cuerpo del balón, extendiendo la espalda hasta que su cuerpo forme una línea recta desde la cabeza hasta los talones.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, luego baje lentamente la parte superior del cuerpo a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: assisted hanging knee raise with throw down
instructions: Step:1 Hang from a pull-up bar with your arms fully extended and your palms facing away from you.
Step:2 Engage your core and lift your knees towards your chest, keeping your legs together.
Step:3 Once your knees are at chest level, explosively throw your legs down towards the ground, extending them fully.
Step:4 Allow your legs to swing back up and repeat the movement for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: assisted hanging knee raise with throw down
instructions: Step:1 Hang from a pull-up bar with your arms fully extended and your palms facing away from you.
Step:2 Engage your core and lift your knees towards your chest, keeping your legs together.
Step:3 Once your knees are at chest level, explosively throw your legs down towards the ground, extending them fully.
Step:4 Allow your legs to swing back up and repeat the movement for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Elevación de rodillas colgado asistido con lanzamiento hacia abajo
instructions: Paso 1: Cuélguese de una barra de dominadas con los brazos completamente extendidos y las palmas mirando hacia afuera.
Paso 2: Active su core y levante las rodillas hacia el pecho, manteniendo las piernas juntas.
Paso 3: Una vez que sus rodillas estén a la altura del pecho, lance explosivamente las piernas hacia el suelo, extendiéndolas por completo.
Paso 4: Permita que sus piernas se balanceen hacia arriba y repita el movimiento para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell deadlift
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, toes pointing forward.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing your body, arms extended downwards.
Step:3 Bend at your hips and knees, lowering the dumbbells towards the ground while keeping your back straight.
Step:4 Push through your heels and extend your hips and knees, lifting the dumbbells back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell deadlift
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, toes pointing forward.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing your body, arms extended downwards.
Step:3 Bend at your hips and knees, lowering the dumbbells towards the ground while keeping your back straight.
Step:4 Push through your heels and extend your hips and knees, lifting the dumbbells back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Peso muerto con mancuernas
instructions: Paso 1: Párese con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros, con las puntas de los pies apuntando hacia adelante.
Paso 2: Sostenga una mancuerna en cada mano, con las palmas mirando hacia su cuerpo, los brazos extendidos hacia abajo.
Paso 3: Flexione las caderas y las rodillas, bajando las mancuernas hacia el suelo mientras mantiene la espalda recta.
Paso 4: Empuje con los talones y extienda las caderas y las rodillas, levantando las mancuernas de nuevo a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell kneeling bicep curl exercise ball
instructions: Step:1 Kneel on the floor with an exercise ball in front of you.
Step:2 Place your elbows on top of the exercise ball, holding a dumbbell in each hand with your palms facing up.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arms stationary, exhale and curl the dumbbells while contracting your biceps.
Step:4 Continue to raise the dumbbells until your biceps are fully contracted and the dumbbells are at shoulder level.
Step:5 Hold the contracted position for a brief pause as you squeeze your biceps.
Step:6 Inhale and slowly begin to lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell kneeling bicep curl on exercise ball
instructions: Step:1 Kneel on the floor with an exercise ball in front of you.
Step:2 Place your elbows on top of the exercise ball, holding a dumbbell in each hand with your palms facing up.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arms stationary, exhale and curl the dumbbells while contracting your biceps.
Step:4 Continue to raise the dumbbells until your biceps are fully contracted and the dumbbells are at shoulder level.
Step:5 Hold the contracted position for a brief pause as you squeeze your biceps.
Step:6 Inhale and slowly begin to lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Curl de bíceps de rodillas sobre balón de ejercicio con mancuernas
instructions: Paso 1: Arrodíllese en el suelo con un balón de ejercicio frente a usted.
Paso 2: Coloque los codos sobre el balón de ejercicio, sosteniendo una mancuerna en cada mano con las palmas hacia arriba.
Paso 3: Manteniendo la parte superior de los brazos inmóvil, exhale y suba las mancuernas mientras contrae los bíceps.
Paso 4: Continúe levantando las mancuernas hasta que sus bíceps estén completamente contraídos y las mancuernas estén a la altura de los hombros.
Paso 5: Mantenga la posición contraída por un momento mientras aprieta los bíceps.
Paso 6: Inhale y comience a bajar lentamente las mancuernas a la posición inicial.
Paso 7: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: cable rope crossover seated row
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the rowing machine with your feet flat on the footrests and your knees slightly bent.
Step:2 Grasp the cable ropes with an overhand grip, palms facing each other.
Step:3 Lean back slightly, keeping your back straight and your core engaged.
Step:4 Pull the cable ropes towards your chest, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the peak of the movement, then slowly release the tension and return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: cable rope crossover seated row
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a seated row machine with your feet flat on the footrests and your knees slightly bent.
Step:2 Cross the cables and grasp the handles with the opposite hands.
Step:3 Lean back slightly, keeping your back straight and your core engaged.
Step:4 Pull the handles towards your torso, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the peak of the movement, then slowly release the tension and return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Remo sentado con cruce de poleas
instructions: Paso 1: Siéntese en una máquina de remo sentado con los pies apoyados en los reposapiés y las rodillas ligeramente flexionadas.
Paso 2: Cruce las poleas y agarre las manijas con las manos opuestas.
Paso 3: Inclínese ligeramente hacia atrás, manteniendo la espalda recta y el core activado.
Paso 4: Jale las manijas hacia su torso, apretando los omóplatos.
Paso 5: Haga una pausa por un momento en el punto más alto del movimiento, luego suelte lentamente la tensión y regrese a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: cable rope elevated seated row
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the elevated seat facing the cable machine.
Step:2 Grab the cable rope handles with an overhand grip, palms facing each other.
Step:3 Keep your back straight and lean slightly back, maintaining a slight bend in your knees.
Step:4 Pull the cable towards your body by retracting your shoulder blades and squeezing your back muscles.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the fully contracted position.
Step:6 Slowly release the tension and extend your arms back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: cable rope elevated seated row
instructions: Step:1 Sit on an elevated seat facing the cable machine.
Step:2 Grab the cable rope handles with a neutral grip, palms facing each other.
Step:3 Keep your back straight and lean slightly back, maintaining a slight bend in your knees.
Step:4 Pull the cable towards your body by retracting your shoulder blades and squeezing your back muscles.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the fully contracted position.
Step:6 Slowly release the tension and extend your arms back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Remo sentado elevado con cuerda en polea
instructions: Paso 1: Siéntese en un asiento elevado frente a la máquina de poleas.
Paso 2: Agarre los agarres de la cuerda con un agarre neutro, con las palmas enfrentadas.
Paso 3: Mantenga la espalda recta e inclínese ligeramente hacia atrás, manteniendo una ligera flexión en las rodillas.
Paso 4: Jale la polea hacia su cuerpo retrayendo los omóplatos y apretando los músculos de la espalda.
Paso 5: Haga una pausa por un momento en la posición de contracción total.
Paso 6: Suelte lentamente la tensión y extienda los brazos de nuevo a la posición inicial.
Paso 7: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell bicep curl with stork stance
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing forward.
Step:2 Extend one leg behind you, balancing on the toes of that foot.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arms stationary, exhale and curl the weights while contracting your biceps.
Step:4 Continue to raise the weights until your biceps are fully contracted and the dumbbells are at shoulder level.
