Step:5 Hold the contracted position for a brief pause as you squeeze your biceps.
Step:6 Inhale and slowly begin to lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch legs and repeat.

translations.name: dumbbell bicep curl with stork stance
instructions: Step:1 Stand on one leg, holding a dumbbell in each hand with your palms facing forward.
Step:2 Keep your upper arms stationary, exhale and curl the weights while contracting your biceps.
Step:3 Continue to raise the weights until your biceps are fully contracted and the dumbbells are at shoulder level.
Step:4 Hold the contracted position for a brief pause as you squeeze your biceps.
Step:5 Inhale and slowly begin to lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch legs and repeat.

translations.name: Curl de bíceps con mancuernas en posición de cigüeña
instructions: Paso 1: Párese sobre una pierna, sosteniendo una mancuerna en cada mano con las palmas hacia adelante.
Paso 2: Manteniendo la parte superior de los brazos inmóvil, exhale y suba las pesas mientras contrae los bíceps.
Paso 3: Continúe levantando las pesas hasta que sus bíceps estén completamente contraídos y las mancuernas estén a la altura de los hombros.
Paso 4: Mantenga la posición contraída por un momento mientras aprieta los bíceps.
Paso 5: Inhale y comience a bajar lentamente las mancuernas a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambie de pierna y repita.

name: dumbbell seated alternate hammer curl on exercise ball
instructions: Step:1 Sit on an exercise ball with your feet flat on the ground and your back straight.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell in each hand with your palms facing your body and your arms fully extended.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arms stationary, exhale and curl one dumbbell up towards your shoulder while keeping your palm facing your body.
Step:4 Continue to raise the dumbbell until your biceps are fully contracted and the dumbbell is at shoulder level.
Step:5 Hold the contracted position for a brief pause as you squeeze your biceps.
Step:6 Inhale and slowly lower the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat the movement with the opposite arm.
Step:8 Continue alternating arms for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell seated alternate hammer curl on exercise ball
instructions: Step:1 Sit on an exercise ball with your feet flat on the ground and your back straight.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell in each hand with your palms facing your body and your arms fully extended.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arms stationary, exhale and curl one dumbbell up towards your shoulder while keeping your palm facing your body.
Step:4 Continue to raise the dumbbell until your biceps are fully contracted and the dumbbell is at shoulder level.
Step:5 Hold the contracted position for a brief pause as you squeeze your biceps.
Step:6 Inhale and slowly lower the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat the movement with the opposite arm.
Step:8 Continue alternating arms for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Curl martillo alterno sentado sobre balón de ejercicio con mancuernas
instructions: Paso 1: Siéntese en un balón de ejercicio con los pies apoyados en el suelo y la espalda recta.
Paso 2: Sostenga una mancuerna en cada mano con las palmas mirando hacia su cuerpo y los brazos completamente extendidos.
Paso 3: Manteniendo la parte superior de los brazos inmóvil, exhale y suba una mancuerna hacia su hombro manteniendo la palma mirando hacia su cuerpo.
Paso 4: Continúe levantando la mancuerna hasta que sus bíceps estén completamente contraídos y la mancuerna esté a la altura del hombro.
Paso 5: Mantenga la posición contraída por un momento mientras aprieta los bíceps.
Paso 6: Inhale y baje lentamente la mancuerna a la posición inicial.
Paso 7: Repita el movimiento con el brazo opuesto.
Paso 8: Continúe alternando los brazos para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: astride jumps (male)
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Bend your knees and lower your body into a squat position.
Step:3 Jump explosively upwards, extending your legs and arms.
Step:4 While in the air, spread your legs apart and bring your arms out to the sides.
Step:5 Land softly with your feet shoulder-width apart, bending your knees to absorb the impact.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: astride jumps
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet together.
Step:2 Jump explosively upwards, spreading your legs apart and bringing your arms out to the sides.
Step:3 Land softly with your feet wide apart, bending your knees to absorb the impact.
Step:4 Immediately jump again, bringing your feet back together and your arms to your sides.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Saltos con piernas separadas
instructions: Paso 1: Párese con los pies juntos.
Paso 2: Salte explosivamente hacia arriba, separando las piernas y llevando los brazos hacia los lados.
Paso 3: Aterrice suavemente con los pies bien separados, flexionando las rodillas para absorber el impacto.
Paso 4: Salte de nuevo inmediatamente, juntando los pies y llevando los brazos a los lados.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: push and pull bodyweight
instructions: Step:1 Start in a push-up position with your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart and your body in a straight line.
Step:2 Lower your chest towards the ground by bending your elbows, keeping your body straight.
Step:3 Push through your palms to extend your arms and return to the starting position.
Step:4 From the push-up position, pull your chest towards the ground by retracting your shoulder blades.
Step:5 Push through your palms to extend your arms and return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: push and pull bodyweight
instructions: Step:1 Start in a push-up position with your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart and your body in a straight line.
Step:2 Lower your chest towards the ground by bending your elbows, keeping your body straight.
Step:3 Push through your palms to extend your arms and return to the starting position.
Step:4 From the push-up position, pull your chest towards the ground by retracting your shoulder blades.
Step:5 Push through your palms to extend your arms and return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Empuje y tracción con peso corporal
instructions: Paso 1: Comience en una posición de flexión con las manos un poco más separadas que el ancho de los hombros y el cuerpo en línea recta.
Paso 2: Baje el pecho hacia el suelo flexionando los codos, manteniendo el cuerpo recto.
Paso 3: Empuje con las palmas para extender los brazos y volver a la posición inicial.
Paso 4: Desde la posición de flexión, jale el pecho hacia el suelo retrayendo los omóplatos.
Paso 5: Empuje con las palmas para extender los brazos y volver a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell twisting bench press
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on a bench with your feet flat on the ground and your back pressed against the bench.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell in each hand with an overhand grip, palms facing away from you.
Step:3 Extend your arms straight up over your chest, keeping a slight bend in your elbows.
Step:4 Lower the dumbbells down towards your chest, keeping your elbows close to your body.
Step:5 As you lower the dumbbells, twist your wrists so that your palms face towards you at the bottom of the movement.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then reverse the movement by pressing the dumbbells back up to the starting position.
Step:7 As you press the dumbbells up, twist your wrists back to the starting position with palms facing away from you.
Step:8 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell twisting bench press
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on a bench with your feet flat on the ground and your back pressed against the bench.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell in each hand with a neutral grip, palms facing each other.
Step:3 Extend your arms straight up over your chest, keeping a slight bend in your elbows.
Step:4 Lower the dumbbells down towards your chest.
Step:5 As you press the dumbbells up, twist your wrists so that your palms face away from you at the top of the movement.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the top, then reverse the movement by lowering the dumbbells and twisting your wrists back to the neutral starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Press de banca con giro y mancuernas
instructions: Paso 1: Acuéstese en un banco con los pies apoyados en el suelo y la espalda presionada contra el banco.
Paso 2: Sostenga una mancuerna en cada mano con un agarre neutro, con las palmas enfrentadas.
Paso 3: Extienda los brazos rectos sobre su pecho, manteniendo una ligera flexión en los codos.
Paso 4: Baje las mancuernas hacia su pecho.
Paso 5: Mientras empuja las mancuernas hacia arriba, gire las muñecas para que las palmas miren hacia afuera en la parte superior del movimiento.
Paso 6: Haga una pausa en la parte superior, luego invierta el movimiento bajando las mancuernas y girando las muñecas de nuevo a la posición inicial neutra.
Paso 7: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: full maltese
instructions: Step:1 Start by standing with your feet shoulder-width apart and your arms extended straight out to the sides.
Step:2 Slowly lean forward, keeping your arms straight, until your upper body is parallel to the ground.
Step:3 Engage your core and hold this position for a few seconds.
Step:4 Return to the starting position by pushing through your feet and standing back up.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: full maltese
instructions: Step:1 Start in a push-up position with your hands wider than shoulder-width apart and turned out.
Step:2 Lean your body forward, keeping your arms straight and locked.
Step:3 Engage your core and lift your feet off the ground, keeping your body parallel to the floor.
Step:4 Hold this position for as long as possible.
Step:5 Slowly lower your feet back to the ground.

translations.name: Maltese completo
instructions: Paso 1: Comience en una posición de flexión con las manos más separadas que el ancho de los hombros y giradas hacia afuera.
Paso 2: Incline su cuerpo hacia adelante, manteniendo los brazos rectos y bloqueados.
Paso 3: Active su core y levante los pies del suelo, manteniendo su cuerpo paralelo al suelo.
Paso 4: Mantenga esta posición durante el mayor tiempo posible.
Paso 5: Baje lentamente los pies de nuevo al suelo.

name: roller seated single leg shoulder flexor depresor retractor
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a flat surface with your legs extended in front of you.
Step:2 Hold the roller with both hands, palms facing down, and place it on your thighs.
Step:3 Lean back slightly and engage your core muscles.
Step:4 Raise the roller up to shoulder level, keeping your arms straight.
Step:5 Slowly lower the roller back down to your thighs.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: roller seated single leg shoulder flexor depressor retractor
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the floor with one leg bent and the other extended.
Step:2 Place the roller under your extended leg's thigh.
Step:3 Place your hands on the floor behind you for support.
Step:4 Gently roll back and forth along the length of your hamstring.
Step:5 To target the shoulder aspect, focus on keeping your shoulders depressed and retracted (down and back) throughout the movement.
Step:6 Repeat on the other leg.

translations.name: Estiramiento de hombro y pierna sentado con rodillo
instructions: Paso 1: Siéntese en el suelo con una pierna flexionada y la otra extendida.
Paso 2: Coloque el rodillo debajo del muslo de su pierna extendida.
Paso 3: Coloque las manos en el suelo detrás de usted como apoyo.
Paso 4: Ruede suavemente hacia adelante y hacia atrás a lo largo de su isquiotibial.
Paso 5: Para el aspecto del hombro, concéntrese en mantener los hombros deprimidos y retraídos (hacia abajo y hacia atrás) durante todo el movimiento.
Paso 6: Repita con la otra pierna.

name: dumbbell one arm seated hammer curl
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your back straight and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell in one hand with a neutral grip (palms facing each other).
Step:3 Rest your elbow on the inside of your thigh, just above the knee.
Step:4 Keeping your upper arm stationary, exhale and curl the dumbbell up towards your shoulder.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, squeezing your biceps.
Step:6 Inhale and slowly lower the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

translations.name: dumbbell one arm seated hammer curl
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your back straight and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell in one hand with a neutral grip (palms facing your torso).
Step:3 Rest your elbow on the inside of your thigh, just above the knee.
Step:4 Keeping your upper arm stationary, exhale and curl the dumbbell up towards your shoulder.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, squeezing your biceps.
Step:6 Inhale and slowly lower the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

translations.name: Curl martillo sentado a un brazo con mancuerna
instructions: Paso 1: Siéntese en un banco con la espalda recta y los pies apoyados en el suelo.
Paso 2: Sostenga una mancuerna en una mano con un agarre neutro (palma mirando hacia su torso).
Paso 3: Apoye el codo en la parte interior de su muslo, justo por encima de la rodilla.
Paso 4: Manteniendo la parte superior del brazo inmóvil, exhale y suba la mancuerna hacia su hombro.
Paso 5: Haga una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, apretando los bíceps.
Paso 6: Inhale y baje lentamente la mancuerna a la posición inicial.
Paso 7: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambie de brazo.

name: barbell decline pullover
instructions: Step:1 Lie down on a decline bench with your head lower than your hips and your feet secured.
Step:2 Hold the barbell with a pronated grip (palms facing away from you) and your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Extend your arms above your chest, keeping a slight bend in your elbows.
Step:4 Lower the barbell in an arc motion behind your head, feeling a stretch in your chest and shoulders.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then return the barbell to the starting position by reversing the motion.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: barbell decline pullover
instructions: Step:1 Lie down on a decline bench with your head lower than your hips and your feet secured.
Step:2 Hold the barbell with an overhand grip (palms facing away from you) and your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Extend your arms above your chest, keeping a slight bend in your elbows.
Step:4 Lower the barbell in an arc motion behind your head, feeling a stretch in your chest and lats.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then return the barbell to the starting position by reversing the motion.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Pullover declinado con barra
instructions: Paso 1: Acuéstese en un banco declinado con la cabeza más baja que las caderas y los pies asegurados.
Paso 2: Sostenga la barra сon un agarre prono (palmas hacia afuera) y las manos un poco más separadas que el ancho de los hombros.
Paso 3: Extienda los brazos sobre el pecho, manteniendo una ligera flexión en los codos.
Paso 4: Baje la barra en un arco detrás de su cabeza, sintiendo un estiramiento en el pecho y los dorsales.
Paso 5: Haga una pausa por un momento, luego regrese la barra a la posición inicial invirtiendo el movimiento.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell waiter biceps curl
instructions: Step:1 Stand up straight with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing forward.
Step:2 Keep your upper arms close to your body and your elbows tucked in.
Step:3 Slowly curl the dumbbells up towards your shoulders, keeping your wrists straight.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbells back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell waiter biceps curl
instructions: Step:1 Stand up straight holding one dumbbell vertically by its top head with both hands.
Step:2 Keep your upper arms close to your body and your elbows tucked in.
Step:3 Slowly curl the dumbbell up towards your chest, keeping your wrists straight.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbell back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Curl de bíceps del camarero con mancuerna
instructions: Paso 1: Párese derecho sosteniendo una mancuerna verticalmente por su cabeza superior con ambas manos.
Paso 2: Mantenga la parte superior de los brazos cerca de su cuerpo y los codos metidos.
Paso 3: Suba lentamente la mancuerna hacia su pecho, manteniendo las muñecas rectas.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, luego baje lentamente la mancuerna a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: assisted lying leg raise with lateral throw down
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your legs extended and your arms by your sides.
Step:2 Place your hands under your glutes for support.
Step:3 Engage your abs and lift your legs off the ground, keeping them straight.
Step:4 While keeping your legs together, lower them to one side until they are a few inches above the ground.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then lift your legs back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat the movement to the other side.
Step:7 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: assisted lying leg raise with lateral throw down
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your legs extended straight up, perpendicular to the floor.
Step:2 Have a partner stand by your side.
Step:3 Engage your abs as your partner pushes your legs laterally to one side.
Step:4 Resist the push and use your core strength to bring your legs back to the center.
Step:5 Have your partner push your legs to the opposite side.
Step:6 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Elevación de piernas acostado asistido con lanzamiento lateral
instructions: Paso 1: Acuéstese boca arriba con las piernas extendidas hacia arriba, perpendiculares al suelo.
Paso 2: Pida a un compañero que se pare a su lado.
Paso 3: Active sus abdominales mientras su compañero empuja sus piernas lateralmente hacia un lado.
Paso 4: Resista el empujón y use la fuerza de su core para llevar sus piernas de vuelta al centro.
Paso 5: Pida a su compañero que empuje sus piernas hacia el lado opuesto.
Paso 6: Continúe alternando lados para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: vertical leg raise (on parallel bars)
instructions: Step:1 Support your body on the parallel bars with your arms fully extended and your body straight.
Step:2 Engage your core and lift your legs up in front of you, keeping them straight.
Step:3 Continue lifting until your legs are parallel to the ground or slightly higher.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your legs back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: vertical leg raise (on parallel bars)
instructions: Step:1 Support your body on the parallel bars with your arms fully extended and your body straight.
Step:2 Engage your core and lift your legs up in front of you, keeping them straight.
Step:3 Continue lifting until your legs are parallel to the ground or slightly higher.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your legs back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Elevación de piernas vertical (en barras paralelas)
instructions: Paso 1: Sostenga su cuerpo en las barras paralelas con los brazos completamente extendidos y el cuerpo recto.
Paso 2: Active su core y levante las piernas frente a usted, manteniéndolas rectas.
Paso 3: Continúe levantando hasta que sus piernas estén paralelas al suelo o un poco más arriba.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, luego baje lentamente las piernas a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: cable lying extension pullover (with rope attachment)
instructions: Step:1 Attach a rope to a cable machine and set the pulley at the highest position.
Step:2 Lie down on a bench with your head towards the cable machine.
Step:3 Hold the rope with both hands and extend your arms straight up above your chest.
Step:4 Keeping your arms straight, slowly lower the rope behind your head while maintaining control.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then slowly raise the rope back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: cable lying extension pullover (with rope attachment)
instructions: Step:1 Attach a rope to a cable machine and set the pulley at the highest position.
Step:2 Lie down on a bench with your head towards the cable machine.
Step:3 Hold the rope with both hands and extend your arms straight up above your chest.
Step:4 Keeping your arms straight, slowly lower the rope behind your head while maintaining control.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then slowly raise the rope back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Pullover acostado con extensión en polea (con agarre de cuerda)
instructions: Paso 1: Enganche una cuerda a una máquina de poleas y ajuste la polea en la posición más alta.
Paso 2: Acuéstese en un banco con la cabeza hacia la máquina de poleas.
Paso 3: Sostenga la cuerda con ambas manos y extienda los brazos rectos por encima de su pecho.
Paso 4: Manteniendo los brazos rectos, baje lentamente la cuerda detrás de su cabeza manteniendo el control.
Paso 5: Haga una pausa por un momento en la parte inferior, luego levante lentamente la cuerda de nuevo a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: kettlebell alternating renegade row
instructions: Step:1 Start in a high plank position with your hands gripping the kettlebells and your feet hip-width apart.
Step:2 Engage your core and keep your body in a straight line from head to heels.
Step:3 Pull one kettlebell up towards your chest, keeping your elbow close to your body.
Step:4 Lower the kettlebell back down to the starting position and repeat with the other arm.
Step:5 Continue alternating arms for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: kettlebell alternating renegade row
instructions: Step:1 Start in a high plank position with your hands gripping the kettlebells and your feet hip-width apart.
Step:2 Engage your core and keep your body in a straight line from head to heels.
Step:3 Pull one kettlebell up towards your chest, keeping your elbow close to your body.
Step:4 Lower the kettlebell back down to the starting position and repeat with the other arm.
Step:5 Continue alternating arms for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Remo renegado alterno con kettlebell
instructions: Paso 1: Comience en una posición de plancha alta con las manos agarrando las kettlebells y los pies separados a la altura de las caderas.
Paso 2: Active su core y mantenga su cuerpo en línea recta desde la cabeza hasta los talones.
Paso 3: Jale una kettlebell hacia su pecho, manteniendo el codo cerca de su cuerpo.
Paso 4: Baje la kettlebell de nuevo a la posición inicial y repita con el otro brazo.
Paso 5: Continúe alternando los brazos para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell one arm snatch
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a dumbbell in one hand with an overhand grip.
Step:2 Bend your knees slightly and hinge forward at the hips, keeping your back straight and chest up.
Step:3 Lower the dumbbell towards the ground, keeping it close to your body.
Step:4 Explosively extend your hips, knees, and ankles, driving the dumbbell upwards in a straight line.
Step:5 As the dumbbell reaches shoulder height, quickly rotate your hand and punch it overhead, fully extending your arm.
Step:6 Catch the dumbbell overhead with a slight bend in your knees and hips.
Step:7 Lower the dumbbell back down to the starting position in a controlled manner.
Step:8 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch to the other arm.

translations.name: dumbbell one arm snatch
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a dumbbell in one hand with an overhand grip.
Step:2 Bend your knees slightly and hinge forward at the hips, keeping your back straight and chest up.
Step:3 Lower the dumbbell towards the ground, keeping it close to your body.
Step:4 Explosively extend your hips, knees, and ankles, driving the dumbbell upwards in a straight line.
Step:5 As the dumbbell reaches shoulder height, quickly rotate your hand and punch it overhead, fully extending your arm.
Step:6 Catch the dumbbell overhead with a slight bend in your knees and hips.
Step:7 Lower the dumbbell back down to the starting position in a controlled manner.
Step:8 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch to the other arm.

translations.name: Arranque a un brazo con mancuerna
instructions: Paso 1: Párese con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros, sosteniendo una mancuerna en una mano con agarre prono.
Paso 2: Flexione ligeramente las rodillas e inclínese hacia adelante desde las caderas, manteniendo la espalda recta y el pecho erguido.
Paso 3: Baje la mancuerna hacia el suelo, manteniéndola cerca de su cuerpo.
Paso 4: Extienda explosivamente sus caderas, rodillas y tobillos, impulsando la mancuerna hacia arriba en línea recta.
Paso 5: Cuando la mancuerna alcance la altura del hombro, gire rápidamente la mano y láncela por encima de la cabeza, extendiendo completamente el brazo.
Paso 6: Reciba la mancuerna por encima de la cabeza con una ligera flexión de rodillas y caderas.
Paso 7: Baje la mancuerna de nuevo a la posición inicial de manera controlada.
Paso 8: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambie al otro brazo.

name: roller seated shoulder flexor depresor retractor
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a flat surface with your legs extended in front of you.
Step:2 Hold the roller with both hands, palms facing down, and place it on your thighs.
Step:3 Lean forward slightly and roll the roller away from your body, extending your arms straight in front of you.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then slowly roll the roller back towards your body, bending your arms and bringing the roller back to your thighs.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: roller seated shoulder flexor depressor retractor
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a flat surface with your legs extended in front of you.
Step:2 Hold the roller with both hands, palms facing down, and place it on your thighs.
Step:3 Lean forward slightly and roll the roller away from your body, extending your arms straight in front of you.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then slowly roll the roller back towards your body, bending your arms and bringing the roller back to your thighs.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Flexor, depresor y retractor de hombro sentado con rodillo
instructions: Paso 1: Siéntese en una superficie plana con las piernas extendidas frente a usted.
Paso 2: Sostenga el rodillo con ambas manos, con las palmas hacia abajo, y colóquelo sobre sus muslos.
Paso 3: Inclínese ligeramente hacia adelante y ruede el rodillo lejos de su cuerpo, extendiendo los brazos rectos frente a usted.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa por un momento, luego ruede lentamente el rodillo de regreso hacia su cuerpo, flexionando los brazos y llevando el rodillo de nuevo a sus muslos.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell seated lateral raise
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your feet flat on the ground and a dumbbell in each hand, resting on your thighs.
Step:2 Keep your back straight and core engaged.
Step:3 Raise the dumbbells to your sides with a slight bend in your elbows, until your arms are parallel to the ground.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbells back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell seated lateral raise
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your feet flat on the ground and a dumbbell in each hand at your sides.
Step:2 Keep your back straight and core engaged.
Step:3 Raise the dumbbells to your sides with a slight bend in your elbows, until your arms are parallel to the ground.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbells back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Elevación lateral sentado con mancuernas
instructions: Paso 1: Siéntese en un banco con los pies apoyados en el suelo y una mancuerna en cada mano a los costados.
Paso 2: Mantenga la espalda recta y el core activado.
Paso 3: Levante las mancuernas hacia los lados con una ligera flexión en los codos, hasta que sus brazos estén paralelos al suelo.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, luego baje lentamente las mancuernas a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: exercise ball pike push up
instructions: Step:1 Start in a push-up position with your hands on the floor and your shins resting on the stability ball.
Step:2 Engage your core and lift your hips up towards the ceiling, rolling the ball towards your hands.
Step:3 Keep your legs straight and your body in a pike position, forming an inverted V shape.
Step:4 Bend your elbows and lower your upper body towards the floor, keeping your head in line with your hands.
Step:5 Push through your hands and extend your arms to return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: exercise ball pike push up
instructions: Step:1 Start in a push-up position with your hands on the floor and your shins resting on the stability ball.
Step:2 Engage your core and lift your hips up towards the ceiling, rolling the ball towards your hands.
Step:3 Keep your legs straight and your body in a pike position, forming an inverted V shape.
Step:4 Bend your elbows and lower your upper body towards the floor, keeping your head in line with your hands.
Step:5 Push through your hands and extend your arms to return to the pike position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Flexión en pica sobre balón de ejercicio
instructions: Paso 1: Comience en una posición de flexión con las manos en el suelo y las espinillas apoyadas en el balón de estabilidad.
Paso 2: Active su core y levante las caderas hacia el techo, rodando el balón hacia sus manos.
Paso 3: Mantenga las piernas rectas y el cuerpo en posición de pica, formando una V invertida.
Paso 4: Flexione los codos y baje la parte superior del cuerpo hacia el suelo, manteniendo la cabeza alineada con las manos.
Paso 5: Empuje con las manos y extienda los brazos para volver a la posición de pica.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: triceps dip (between benches)
instructions: Step:1 Place two benches parallel to each other, about shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Sit on one bench and place your hands on the edge, fingers pointing forward.
Step:3 Place your heels on the edge of the other bench and straighten your legs.
Step:4 Slide your hips forward off the bench, supporting your weight with your hands.
Step:5 Bend your elbows and lower your body towards the ground until your upper arms are parallel to the floor.
Step:6 Push through your hands to straighten your arms and lift your body back up to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: triceps dip (between benches)
instructions: Step:1 Place two benches parallel to each other, about shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Sit on one bench and place your hands on the edge, fingers pointing forward.
Step:3 Place your heels on the edge of the other bench and straighten your legs.
Step:4 Slide your hips forward off the bench, supporting your weight with your hands.
Step:5 Bend your elbows and lower your body towards the ground until your upper arms are parallel to the floor.
Step:6 Push through your hands to straighten your arms and lift your body back up to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Fondos de tríceps (entre bancos)
instructions: Paso 1: Coloque dos bancos paralelos entre sí, separados aproximadamente al ancho de los hombros.
Paso 2: Siéntese en un banco y coloque las manos en el borde, con los dedos apuntando hacia adelante.
Paso 3: Coloque los talones en el borde del otro banco y estire las piernas.
Paso 4: Deslice las caderas hacia adelante fuera del banco, soportando su peso con las manos.
Paso 5: Flexione los codos y baje el cuerpo hacia el suelo hasta que la parte superior de sus brazos esté paralela al suelo.
Paso 6: Empuje con las manos para enderezar los brazos y levantar el cuerpo de nuevo a la posición inicial.
Paso 7: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: lever bicep curl
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and position yourself on the machine with your back against the pad.
Step:2 Grasp the handles with an underhand grip, palms facing up, and keep your elbows close to your sides.
Step:3 Exhale and curl the handles upward, contracting your biceps.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top of the movement, squeezing your biceps.
Step:5 Inhale and slowly lower the handles back to the starting position, fully extending your arms.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: lever bicep curl
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and position yourself on the machine with your back against the pad.
Step:2 Grasp the handles with an underhand grip, palms facing up, and keep your elbows close to your sides.
Step:3 Exhale and curl the handles upward, contracting your biceps.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top of the movement, squeezing your biceps.
Step:5 Inhale and slowly lower the handles back to the starting position, fully extending your arms.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Curl de bíceps en máquina de palanca
instructions: Paso 1: Ajuste la altura del asiento y colóquese en la máquina con la espalda contra la almohadilla.
Paso 2: Agarre las manijas con un agarre supino, con las palmas hacia arriba, y mantenga los codos cerca de los costados.
Paso 3: Exhale y suba las manijas, contrayendo los bíceps.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa por un momento en la parte superior del movimiento, apretando los bíceps.
Paso 5: Inhale y baje lentamente las manijas a la posición inicial, extendiendo completamente los brazos.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell over bench one arm neutral wrist curl
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with a dumbbell in one hand and your arm extended over the bench, palm facing inward (neutral grip).
Step:2 Keep your upper arm stationary and curl the dumbbell towards your shoulder.
Step:3 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

translations.name: dumbbell over bench one arm hammer curl
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with a dumbbell in one hand and your arm extended over the bench, palm facing inward (neutral grip).
Step:2 Keep your upper arm stationary and curl the dumbbell towards your shoulder.
Step:3 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

translations.name: Curl martillo a un brazo sobre banco con mancuerna
instructions: Paso 1: Siéntese en un banco con una mancuerna en una mano y su brazo extendido sobre el banco, con la palma hacia adentro (agarre neutro).
Paso 2: Mantenga la parte superior del brazo inmóvil y suba la mancuerna hacia su hombro.
Paso 3: Haga una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, luego baje lentamente la mancuerna a la posición inicial.
Paso 4: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambie de brazo.

name: barbell standing close grip military press
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold the barbell with an overhand grip, hands slightly closer than shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Lift the barbell to shoulder height, keeping your elbows close to your body.
Step:3 Press the barbell overhead, extending your arms fully.
Step:4 Lower the barbell back to shoulder height.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: barbell standing close grip military press
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold the barbell at shoulder height with an overhand grip, hands slightly closer than shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Keep your elbows close to your body.
Step:3 Press the barbell overhead, extending your arms fully.
Step:4 Lower the barbell back to shoulder height in a controlled manner.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Press militar de pie con barra y agarre cerrado
instructions: Paso 1: Párese con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y sostenga la barra a la altura de los hombros con un agarre prono, con las manos un poco más juntas que el ancho de los hombros.
Paso 2: Mantenga los codos cerca de su cuerpo.
Paso 3: Empuje la barra por encima de la cabeza, extendiendo completamente los brazos.
Paso 4: Baje la barra de nuevo a la altura de los hombros de manera controlada.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: ez barbell close grip preacher curl
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a preacher curl bench and place your upper arms on the pad, gripping the ez barbell with an underhand grip.
Step:2 Rest your triceps on the pad and fully extend your arms, keeping your back straight.
Step:3 Slowly curl the barbell towards your shoulders, contracting your biceps.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, squeezing your biceps.
Step:5 Lower the barbell back to the starting position, fully extending your arms.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: ez barbell close grip preacher curl
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a preacher curl bench and place your upper arms on the pad, gripping the ez barbell with a close underhand grip.
Step:2 Rest your triceps on the pad and fully extend your arms, keeping your back straight.
Step:3 Slowly curl the barbell towards your shoulders, contracting your biceps.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, squeezing your biceps.
Step:5 Lower the barbell back to the starting position, fully extending your arms.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Curl predicador con barra EZ y agarre cerrado
instructions: Paso 1: Siéntese en un banco de curl predicador y coloque la parte superior de sus brazos en la almohadilla, agarrando la barra EZ con un agarre supino cerrado.
Paso 2: Apoye sus tríceps en la almohadilla y extienda completamente sus brazos, manteniendo la espalda recta.
Paso 3: Suba lentamente la barra hacia sus hombros, contrayendo sus bíceps.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, apretando sus bíceps.
Paso 5: Baje la barra de nuevo a la posición inicial, extendiendo completamente sus brazos.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: barbell incline bench press
instructions: Step:1 Set up an incline bench at a 45-degree angle.
Step:2 Lie down on the bench with your feet flat on the ground.
Step:3 Grasp the barbell with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:4 Unrack the barbell and lower it slowly towards your chest, keeping your elbows at a 45-degree angle.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push the barbell back up to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: barbell incline bench press
instructions: Step:1 Set an incline bench to a 45-degree angle.
Step:2 Lie down on the bench with your feet flat on the ground.
Step:3 Grasp the barbell with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:4 Unrack the barbell and lower it slowly towards your upper chest, keeping your elbows tucked in.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push the barbell back up to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Press de banca inclinado con barra
instructions: Paso 1: Coloque un banco inclinado en un ángulo de 45 grados.
Paso 2: Acuéstese en el banco con los pies apoyados en el suelo.
Paso 3: Agarre la barra con un agarre prono, un poco más ancho que el ancho de los hombros.
Paso 4: Saque la barra del soporte y bájela lentamente hacia la parte superior de su pecho, manteniendo los codos metidos.
Paso 5: Haga una pausa por un momento en la parte inferior, luego empuje la barra hacia arriba a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: wide-grip chest dip on high parallel bars
instructions: Step:1 Position yourself on the parallel bars with your arms fully extended and your body suspended in the air.
Step:2 Lean forward slightly and lower your body by bending your elbows until your chest is just above the bars.
Step:3 Pause for a moment, then push yourself back up to the starting position by straightening your arms.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: wide-grip chest dip on high parallel bars
instructions: Step:1 Position yourself on the parallel bars with your arms fully extended and your body suspended in the air.
Step:2 Lean forward slightly and lower your body by bending your elbows until you feel a stretch in your chest.
Step:3 Pause for a moment, then push yourself back up to the starting position by straightening your arms.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Fondos de pecho con agarre ancho en barras paralelas altas
instructions: Paso 1: Colóquese en las barras paralelas con los brazos completamente extendidos y el cuerpo suspendido en el aire.
Paso 2: Inclínese ligeramente hacia adelante y baje su cuerpo flexionando los codos hasta que sienta un estiramiento en el pecho.
Paso 3: Haga una pausa por un momento, luego empuje hacia arriba para volver a la posición inicial, enderezando los brazos.
Paso 4: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell close-grip press
instructions: Step:1 Lie on a flat bench with a dumbbell in each hand.
Step:2 Hold the dumbbells close together over your chest with a neutral grip (palms facing each other).
Step:3 As you breathe in, slowly lower the dumbbells until they are about level with your chest.
Step:4 As you exhale, use your triceps to push the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell close-grip press
instructions: Step:1 Lie on a flat bench with a dumbbell in each hand.
Step:2 Hold the dumbbells close together over your chest with a neutral grip (palms facing each other).
Step:3 As you breathe in, slowly lower the dumbbells until they are about level with your chest.
Step:4 As you exhale, use your triceps to push the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Press con agarre cerrado y mancuernas
instructions: Paso 1: Acuéstese en un banco plano con una mancuerna en cada mano.
Paso 2: Sostenga las mancuernas juntas sobre su pecho con un agarre neutro (las palmas enfrentadas).
Paso 3: Mientras inhala, baje lentamente las mancuernas hasta que estén aproximadamente a la altura de su pecho.
Paso 4: Mientras exhala, use sus tríceps para empujar las mancuernas de vuelta a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: elbow dips
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the edge of a bench or chair with your hands gripping the edge next to your hips.
Step:2 Slide your hips forward off the bench and straighten your legs, keeping your heels on the ground.
Step:3 Bend your elbows and lower your body towards the ground, keeping your back close to the bench.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push through your hands to straighten your arms and lift your body back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: tricep dips on bench
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the edge of a bench or chair with your hands gripping the edge next to your hips.
Step:2 Slide your hips forward off the bench and straighten your legs, keeping your heels on the ground.
Step:3 Bend your elbows and lower your body towards the ground, keeping your back close to the bench.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push through your hands to straighten your arms and lift your body back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Fondos de tríceps en banco
instructions: Paso 1: Siéntese en el borde de un banco o silla con las manos agarrando el borde junto a sus caderas.
Paso 2: Deslice las caderas hacia adelante fuera del banco y estire las piernas, manteniendo los talones en el suelo.
Paso 3: Flexione los codos y baje el cuerpo hacia el suelo, manteniendo la espalda cerca del banco.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa por un momento en la parte inferior, luego empuje con las manos para enderezar los brazos y levantar el cuerpo de nuevo a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell decline twist fly
instructions: Step:1 Lie down on a decline bench with your head lower than your hips.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell in each hand with your palms facing each other and your arms extended straight up over your chest.
Step:3 Lower the dumbbells out to the sides in a wide arc until you feel a stretch in your chest.
Step:4 As you lower the dumbbells, twist your wrists so that your palms face forward at the bottom of the movement.
Step:5 Reverse the motion and bring the dumbbells back up to the starting position, squeezing your chest muscles at the top.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell decline twist fly
instructions: Step:1 Lie down on a decline bench with your head lower than your hips.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell in each hand with your palms facing each other and your arms extended straight up over your chest.
Step:3 Lower the dumbbells out to the sides in a wide arc until you feel a stretch in your chest.
Step:4 As you lower the dumbbells, twist your wrists so that your palms face forward at the bottom of the movement.
Step:5 Reverse the motion and bring the dumbbells back up to the starting position, squeezing your chest muscles at the top.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Apertura declinada con giro y mancuernas
instructions: Paso 1: Acuéstese en un banco declinado con la cabeza más baja que las caderas.
Paso 2: Sostenga una mancuerna en cada mano con las palmas enfrentadas y los brazos extendidos rectos sobre su pecho.
Paso 3: Baje las mancuernas hacia los lados en un arco amplio hasta que sienta un estiramiento en el pecho.
Paso 4: Mientras baja las mancuernas, gire las muñecas para que las palmas miren hacia adelante en la parte inferior del movimiento.
Paso 5: Invierta el movimiento y vuelva a subir las mancuernas a la posición inicial, apretando los músculos del pecho en la parte superior.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: suspended split squat
instructions: Step:1 Stand facing away from a suspension trainer with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Extend one leg back and place the top of your foot in the foot cradle of the suspension trainer.
Step:3 Bend your standing leg and lower your body down into a lunge position, keeping your chest up and your knee in line with your toes.
Step:4 Push through your heel to return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch legs.

translations.name: suspended split squat
instructions: Step:1 Stand facing away from a suspension trainer with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Extend one leg back and place the top of your foot in the foot cradle of the suspension trainer.
Step:3 Bend your standing leg and lower your body down into a lunge position, keeping your chest up and your knee in line with your toes.
Step:4 Push through your heel to return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch legs.

translations.name: Sentadilla búlgara en suspensión
instructions: Paso 1: Párese de espaldas a un entrenador de suspensión con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros.
Paso 2: Extienda una pierna hacia atrás y coloque la parte superior de su pie en el soporte para pies del entrenador de suspensión.
Paso 3: Flexione la pierna de apoyo y baje su cuerpo a una posición de zancada, manteniendo el pecho erguido y la rodilla alineada con los dedos del pie.
Paso 4: Empuje con el talón para volver a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambie de pierna.

name: ez-bar close-grip bench press
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on a bench with your feet flat on the ground and your back pressed against the bench.
Step:2 Grasp the ez barbell with a close grip, hands shoulder-width apart, palms facing forward.
Step:3 Lift the barbell off the rack and hold it directly above your chest with your arms fully extended.
Step:4 Slowly lower the barbell towards your chest, keeping your elbows close to your body.
Step:5 Pause for a moment when the barbell touches your chest.
Step:6 Push the barbell back up to the starting position, fully extending your arms.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: ez-bar close-grip bench press
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on a bench with your feet flat on the ground and your back pressed against the bench.
Step:2 Grasp the ez barbell with a close grip, hands about shoulder-width apart, palms facing forward.
Step:3 Lift the barbell off the rack and hold it directly above your chest with your arms fully extended.
Step:4 Slowly lower the barbell towards your chest, keeping your elbows close to your body.
Step:5 Pause for a moment when the barbell is just above your chest.
Step:6 Push the barbell back up to the starting position, fully extending your arms.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Press de banca con agarre cerrado y barra EZ
instructions: Paso 1: Acuéstese en un banco con los pies apoyados en el suelo y la espalda presionada contra el banco.
Paso 2: Agarre la barra EZ con un agarre cerrado, con las manos separadas aproximadamente al ancho de los hombros, con las palmas hacia adelante.
Paso 3: Saque la barra del soporte y sosténgala directamente sobre su pecho con los brazos completamente extendidos.
Paso 4: Baje lentamente la barra hacia su pecho, manteniendo los codos cerca de su cuerpo.
Paso 5: Haga una pausa por un momento cuando la barra esté justo encima de su pecho.
Paso 6: Empuje la barra de nuevo a la posición inicial, extendiendo completamente los brazos.
Paso 7: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: sled 45° wide leg press
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the sled machine with your back against the pad and your feet on the foot platform.
Step:2 Position your feet wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Push against the foot platform to extend your legs and straighten your knees.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the end of the movement, then slowly bend your knees to return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: sled 45° wide leg press
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the leg press machine with your back against the pad and your feet on the platform.
Step:2 Position your feet wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Push the platform away to extend your legs, but do not lock your knees.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the end of the movement, then slowly bend your knees to return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Prensa de piernas ancha a 45° en máquina
instructions: Paso 1: Siéntese en la máquina de prensa de piernas con la espalda contra la almohadilla y los pies en la plataforma.
Paso 2: Coloque los pies más separados que el ancho de los hombros.
Paso 3: Empuje la plataforma para extender las piernas, pero no bloquee las rodillas.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa por un momento al final del movimiento, luego flexione lentamente las rodillas para volver a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: band standing rear delt row
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and place the band under your feet.
Step:2 Hold the band handles with your palms facing each other and your arms extended in front of you.
Step:3 Bend your knees slightly and hinge forward at the hips, keeping your back straight.
Step:4 Pull the band towards your chest, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly release the tension and return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: band standing rear delt row
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and place the band under your feet.
Step:2 Hold the band handles with your palms facing each other and your arms extended in front of you.
Step:3 Bend your knees slightly and hinge forward at the hips, keeping your back straight.
Step:4 Pull the band towards your upper chest, leading with your elbows and squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly release the tension and return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Remo para deltoides posterior de pie con banda
instructions: Paso 1: Párese con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y coloque la banda debajo de sus pies.
Paso 2: Sostenga las manijas de la banda con las palmas enfrentadas y los brazos extendidos frente a usted.
Paso 3: Flexione ligeramente las rodillas e inclínese hacia adelante desde las caderas, manteniendo la espalda recta.
Paso 4: Jale la banda hacia la parte superior de su pecho, liderando con los codos y apretando los omóplatos.
Paso 5: Haga una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, luego suelte lentamente la tensión y regrese a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: single leg bridge with outstretched leg
instructions: Step:1 Lie on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Extend one leg straight out in front of you.
Step:3 Engage your glutes and lift your hips off the ground, forming a straight line from your knees to your shoulders.
Step:4 Hold for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your hips back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch legs.

translations.name: single leg bridge with outstretched leg
instructions: Step:1 Lie on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Extend one leg straight out in front of you.
Step:3 Engage your glutes and lift your hips off the ground, forming a straight line from your shoulders to your knees.
Step:4 Hold for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your hips back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch legs.

translations.name: Puente a una pierna con pierna extendida
instructions: Paso 1: Acuéstese boca arriba con las rodillas flexionadas y los pies apoyados en el suelo.
Paso 2: Extienda una pierna recta frente a usted.
Paso 3: Active sus glúteos y levante las caderas del suelo, formando una línea recta desde los hombros hasta las rodillas.
Paso 4: Mantenga la posición por un momento en la parte superior, luego baje lentamente las caderas a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambie de pierna.

name: barbell sumo deadlift
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet wider than shoulder-width apart, toes pointing outwards.
Step:2 Place a barbell on the ground in front of you, centered between your feet.
Step:3 Bend your knees and lower your hips, keeping your back straight and chest up, to grip the barbell with an overhand grip.
Step:4 Engage your core and drive through your heels to lift the barbell off the ground, extending your hips and knees simultaneously.
Step:5 As you lift, keep your chest up and back straight, and push your hips forward to fully engage your glutes.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the barbell back down to the starting position, maintaining control throughout the movement.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: barbell sumo deadlift
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet wider than shoulder-width apart, toes pointing outwards.
Step:2 Place a barbell on the ground in front of you, centered between your feet.
Step:3 Bend your knees and lower your hips, keeping your back straight and chest up, to grip the barbell with an overhand or mixed grip.
Step:4 Engage your core and drive through your heels to lift the barbell off the ground, extending your hips and knees simultaneously.
Step:5 As you lift, keep your chest up and back straight, and push your hips forward to fully engage your glutes.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the barbell back down to the starting position, maintaining control throughout the movement.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Peso muerto sumo con barra
instructions: Paso 1: Párese con los pies más separados que el ancho de los hombros, con las puntas de los pies apuntando hacia afuera.
Paso 2: Coloque una barra en el suelo frente a usted, centrada entre sus pies.
Paso 3: Flexione las rodillas y baje las caderas, manteniendo la espalda recta y el pecho erguido, para agarrar la barra con un agarre prono o mixto.
Paso 4: Active su core y empuje con los talones para levantar la barra del suelo, extendiendo las caderas y las rodillas simultáneamente.
Paso 5: Mientras levanta, mantenga el pecho erguido y la espalda recta, y empuje las caderas hacia adelante para activar completamente los glúteos.
Paso 6: Haga una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, luego baje lentamente la barra a la posición inicial, manteniendo el control durante todo el movimiento.
Paso 7: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: seated calf stretch (male)
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the floor with your legs extended straight out in front of you.
Step:2 Loop a towel or band around the ball of one foot.
Step:3 Gently pull the towel or band towards you, feeling a stretch in your calf muscle.
Step:4 Hold the stretch for 20-30 seconds.
Step:5 Switch legs and repeat the stretch.

translations.name: seated calf stretch
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the floor with your legs extended straight out in front of you.
Step:2 Loop a towel or band around the ball of one foot.
Step:3 Gently pull the towel or band towards you, keeping your knee straight, until you feel a stretch in your calf muscle.
Step:4 Hold the stretch for 20-30 seconds.
Step:5 Switch legs and repeat the stretch.

translations.name: Estiramiento de gemelo sentado
instructions: Paso 1: Siéntese en el suelo con las piernas extendidas rectas frente a usted.
Paso 2: Coloque una toalla o banda alrededor de la parte delantera de un pie.
Paso 3: Jale suavemente la toalla o banda hacia usted, manteniendo la rodilla recta, hasta que sienta un estiramiento en el músculo del gemelo.
Paso 4: Mantenga el estiramiento durante 20-30 segundos.
Paso 5: Cambie de pierna y repita el estiramiento.

name: dumbbell seated bent arm lateral raise
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your back straight and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell in each hand with your palms facing your body and your arms bent at a 90-degree angle.
Step:3 Keeping your elbows bent, raise your arms out to the sides until they are parallel to the ground.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your arms back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell seated bent arm lateral raise
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your back straight and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell in each hand with your palms facing your body and your arms bent at a 90-degree angle.
Step:3 Keeping your elbows bent, raise your arms out to the sides until they are parallel to the ground.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your arms back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Elevación lateral sentado con brazos flexionados y mancuernas
instructions: Paso 1: Siéntese en un banco con la espalda recta y los pies apoyados en el suelo.
Paso 2: Sostenga una mancuerna en cada mano con las palmas mirando hacia su cuerpo y los brazos flexionados en un ángulo de 90 grados.
Paso 3: Manteniendo los codos flexionados, levante los brazos hacia los lados hasta que estén paralelos al suelo.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, luego baje lentamente los brazos a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: band one arm twisting chest press
instructions: Step:1 Attach the band to a sturdy anchor point at chest height.
Step:2 Stand with your side facing the anchor point and grab the band with one hand.
Step:3 Step away from the anchor point to create tension in the band.
Step:4 Position your feet shoulder-width apart and slightly bend your knees.
Step:5 Bring your hand holding the band across your body, towards the opposite shoulder.
Step:6 While maintaining tension in the band, push your hand forward and away from your body, extending your arm.
Step:7 Slowly return to the starting position and repeat for the desired number of repetitions.
Step:8 Switch sides and repeat the exercise with the other hand.

translations.name: band one arm twisting chest press
instructions: Step:1 Attach the band to a sturdy anchor point at chest height.
Step:2 Stand with your side to the anchor point and grab the band with your hand farther away from the anchor.
Step:3 Step away from the anchor to create tension in the band.
Step:4 Position your feet shoulder-width apart and slightly bend your knees.
Step:5 Start with your hand at your chest.
Step:6 While rotating your torso, push your hand forward and across your body, extending your arm.
Step:7 Slowly return to the starting position and repeat for the desired number of repetitions.
Step:8 Switch sides and repeat the exercise with the other hand.

translations.name: Press de pecho a un brazo con giro y banda
instructions: Paso 1: Sujete la banda a un punto de anclaje resistente a la altura del pecho.
Paso 2: Párese de lado al punto de anclaje y agarre la banda con la mano más alejada del anclaje.
Paso 3: Aléjese del anclaje para crear tensión en la banda.
Paso 4: Coloque los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y flexione ligeramente las rodillas.
Paso 5: Comience con la mano en el pecho.
Paso 6: Mientras gira el torso, empuje la mano hacia adelante y a través de su cuerpo, extendiendo el brazo.
Paso 7: Regrese lentamente a la posición inicial y repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.
Paso 8: Cambie de lado y repita el ejercicio con la otra mano.

name: weighted drop push up
instructions: Step:1 Start in a high plank position with your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart and a weight on your back.
Step:2 Lower your chest towards the ground, keeping your elbows close to your body.
Step:3 Once your chest is just above the ground, explosively push yourself up, lifting your hands off the ground.
Step:4 Land softly with your hands back in the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat the push-up motion for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: weighted plyometric push-up
instructions: Step:1 Start in a high plank position with your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart and a weight on your back.
Step:2 Lower your chest towards the ground, keeping your elbows close to your body.
Step:3 Once your chest is just above the ground, explosively push yourself up, lifting your hands off the ground.
Step:4 Land softly with your hands back in the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat the push-up motion for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Flexión pliométrica con peso
instructions: Paso 1: Comience en una posición de plancha alta con las manos un poco más separadas que el ancho de los hombros y un peso en la espalda.
Paso 2: Baje el pecho hacia el suelo, manteniendo los codos cerca del cuerpo.
Paso 3: Una vez que su pecho esté justo por encima del suelo, empújese explosivamente hacia arriba, levantando las manos del suelo.
Paso 4: Aterrice suavemente con las manos de nuevo en la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita el movimiento de flexión para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: side-to-side toe touch (male)
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your arms extended to the sides.
Step:2 Bend at the waist to the right, reaching your right hand towards your right foot.
Step:3 Return to the starting position and then bend at the waist to the left, reaching your left hand towards your left foot.
Step:4 Repeat the side-to-side bending motion for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: standing side bend
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Place one hand on your hip and extend the other arm overhead.
Step:3 Bend at the waist to the side of the hand on your hip, feeling a stretch along the opposite side.
Step:4 Return to the starting position and repeat on the other side.
Step:5 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Inclinación lateral de pie
instructions: Paso 1: Párese con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros.
Paso 2: Coloque una mano en su cadera y extienda el otro brazo por encima de la cabeza.
Paso 3: Inclínese desde la cintura hacia el lado de la mano en su cadera, sintiendo un estiramiento en el lado opuesto.
Paso 4: Vuelva a la posición inicial y repita del otro lado.
Paso 5: Continúe alternando lados para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: barbell pin presses
instructions: Step:1 Set the safety pins in a power rack to a height where the barbell is just a few inches off your chest.
Step:2 Lie on the bench inside the rack and grip the barbell with a close grip.
Step:3 Press the barbell up from the pins until your arms are fully extended.
Step:4 Slowly lower the barbell back down to the pins, coming to a complete stop.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then press the barbell back up explosively.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: barbell pin press
instructions: Step:1 Set the safety pins in a power rack to a height where the barbell is just a few inches off your chest.
Step:2 Lie on the bench inside the rack and grip the barbell with a close grip.
Step:3 Press the barbell up from the pins until your arms are fully extended.
Step:4 Slowly lower the barbell back down to the pins, coming to a complete stop.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then press the barbell back up explosively.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Press desde soportes con barra
instructions: Paso 1: Ajuste los pasadores de seguridad en una jaula de potencia a una altura en la que la barra esté a solo unos centímetros de su pecho.
Paso 2: Acuéstese en el banco dentro de la jaula y agarre la barra con un agarre cerrado.
Paso 3: Empuje la barra hacia arriba desde los pasadores hasta que sus brazos estén completamente extendidos.
Paso 4: Baje lentamente la barra de nuevo a los pasadores, deteniéndose por completo.
Paso 5: Haga una pausa por un momento, luego empuje la barra hacia arriba de forma explosiva.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell lateral to front raise
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a dumbbell in each hand with your palms facing your body.
Step:2 Keep your back straight and engage your core.
Step:3 Raise your arms out to the sides until they are parallel to the ground, keeping a slight bend in your elbows.
Step:4 At the top of the movement, bring the dumbbells together in front of your body.
Step:5 Slowly lower the dumbbells back down to the starting position in front of you.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell lateral to front raise
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a dumbbell in each hand with your palms facing your body.
Step:2 Keep your back straight and engage your core.
Step:3 Raise your arms out to the sides until they are parallel to the ground, keeping a slight bend in your elbows.
Step:4 At the top of the movement, bring the dumbbells together in front of your body.
Step:5 Slowly lower the dumbbells back down to the starting position in front of you.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Elevación lateral a frontal con mancuernas
instructions: Paso 1: Párese con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros, sosteniendo una mancuerna en cada mano con las palmas mirando hacia su cuerpo.
Paso 2: Mantenga la espalda recta y active su core.
Paso 3: Levante los brazos hacia los lados hasta que estén paralelos al suelo, manteniendo una ligera flexión en los codos.
Paso 4: En la parte superior del movimiento, junte las mancuernas frente a su cuerpo.
Paso 5: Baje lentamente las mancuernas a la posición inicial frente a usted.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell incline one arm lateral raise
instructions: Step:1 Lie on your side on an incline bench with a dumbbell in your top hand.
Step:2 Let the dumbbell hang straight down, with your palm facing your body.
Step:3 Raise the dumbbell to the side, keeping your arm slightly bent and your palm facing down.
Step:4 Continue lifting until your arm is parallel to the floor.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch to the other arm.

translations.name: dumbbell incline one arm lateral raise
instructions: Step:1 Lie on your side on an incline bench with a dumbbell in your top hand.
Step:2 Let the dumbbell hang straight down, with your palm facing your body.
Step:3 Raise the dumbbell to the side, keeping your arm slightly bent and your palm facing down.
Step:4 Continue lifting until your arm is parallel to the floor.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch to the other arm.

translations.name: Elevación lateral inclinada a un brazo con mancuerna
instructions: Paso 1: Acuéstese de lado en un banco inclinado con una mancuerna en la mano superior.
Paso 2: Deje que la mancuerna cuelgue recta hacia abajo, con la palma mirando hacia su cuerpo.
Paso 3: Levante la mancuerna hacia el lado, manteniendo el brazo ligeramente flexionado y la palma mirando hacia abajo.
Paso 4: Continúe levantando hasta que su brazo esté paralelo al suelo.
Paso 5: Haga una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, luego baje lentamente la mancuerna a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambie al otro brazo.

name: dumbbell one arm concentration curl (on stability ball)
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a stability ball with your feet flat on the ground and your knees bent at a 90-degree angle.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell in one hand with your palm facing up and your arm extended down towards the floor.
Step:3 Rest your elbow on the inside of your thigh, just above the knee.
Step:4 Keeping your upper arm stationary, exhale and curl the dumbbell up towards your shoulder while contracting your biceps.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top of the movement, then inhale and slowly lower the dumbbell back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms and repeat.

translations.name: dumbbell one arm concentration curl (on stability ball)
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a stability ball with your feet flat on the ground and your knees bent at a 90-degree angle.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell in one hand with your palm facing up and your arm extended down towards the floor.
Step:3 Rest your elbow on the inside of your thigh, just above the knee.
Step:4 Keeping your upper arm stationary, exhale and curl the dumbbell up towards your shoulder while contracting your biceps.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top of the movement, then inhale and slowly lower the dumbbell back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms and repeat.

translations.name: Curl de concentración a un brazo sobre balón de estabilidad con mancuerna
instructions: Paso 1: Siéntese en un balón de estabilidad con los pies apoyados en el suelo y las rodillas flexionadas en un ángulo de 90 grados.
Paso 2: Sostenga una mancuerna en una mano con la palma hacia arriba y el brazo extendido hacia el suelo.
Paso 3: Apoye el codo en la parte interior de su muslo, justo por encima de la rodilla.
Paso 4: Manteniendo la parte superior del brazo inmóvil, exhale y suba la mancuerna hacia su hombro mientras contrae los bíceps.
Paso 5: Haga una pausa por un momento en la parte superior del movimiento, luego inhale y baje lentamente la mancuerna a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambie de brazo y repita.

name: dumbbell seated front raise
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your feet flat on the ground and a dumbbell in each hand, resting on your thighs.
Step:2 Keep your back straight and core engaged.
Step:3 Raise the dumbbells in front of you, with your palms facing down, until they are at shoulder level.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbells back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell seated front raise
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your feet flat on the ground and a dumbbell in each hand, resting at your sides.
Step:2 Keep your back straight and core engaged.
Step:3 Raise the dumbbells in front of you, with your palms facing down, until they are at shoulder level.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbells back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Elevación frontal sentado con mancuernas
instructions: Paso 1: Siéntese en un banco con los pies apoyados en el suelo y una mancuerna en cada mano, descansando a los lados.
Paso 2: Mantenga la espalda recta y el core activado.
Paso 3: Levante las mancuernas frente a usted, con las palmas hacia abajo, hasta que estén a la altura de los hombros.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, luego baje lentamente las mancuernas a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: kettlebell one arm jerk
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a kettlebell in one hand at shoulder height.
Step:2 Bend your knees slightly and engage your core.
Step:3 Press the kettlebell overhead in a straight line, fully extending your arm.
Step:4 As you press the kettlebell overhead, simultaneously dip your knees and quickly straighten them to generate momentum.
Step:5 As the kettlebell reaches its highest point, quickly drop underneath it by bending your knees and hips.
Step:6 Catch the kettlebell with a slight bend in your knees and hips, and your arm fully extended overhead.
Step:7 Stand up straight, fully extending your knees and hips, and stabilize the kettlebell overhead.
Step:8 Lower the kettlebell back to the starting position by bending your knees and hips, and repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: kettlebell one arm jerk
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a kettlebell in one hand at shoulder height.
Step:2 Bend your knees slightly and engage your core.
Step:3 Explosively drive through your legs to press the kettlebell overhead, fully extending your arm.
Step:4 As the kettlebell moves upward, quickly dip under it by bending your knees.
Step:5 Catch the kettlebell overhead with your arm locked out.
Step:6 Stand up straight to complete the lift.
Step:7 Lower the kettlebell back to the shoulder position in a controlled manner.
Step:8 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

translations.name: Jerk a un brazo con kettlebell
instructions: Paso 1: Párese con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros, sosteniendo una kettlebell en una mano a la altura del hombro.
Paso 2: Flexione ligeramente las rodillas y active su core.
Paso 3: Empuje explosivamente con las piernas para levantar la kettlebell sobre la cabeza, extendiendo completamente el brazo.
Paso 4: A medida que la kettlebell sube, métase rápidamente debajo de ella flexionando las rodillas.
Paso 5: Reciba la kettlebell sobre la cabeza con el brazo bloqueado.
Paso 6: Póngase de pie para completar el levantamiento.
Paso 7: Baje la kettlebell de nuevo a la posición del hombro de manera controlada.
Paso 8: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambie de brazo.

name: side plank hip adduction
instructions: Step:1 Start by lying on your side with your legs extended and stacked on top of each other.
Step:2 Prop yourself up on your forearm, keeping your elbow directly below your shoulder.
Step:3 Engage your core and lift your hips off the ground, creating a straight line from your head to your feet.
Step:4 While maintaining the side plank position, lift your top leg towards the ceiling, keeping it straight.
Step:5 Slowly lower your leg back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides.

translations.name: side plank hip abduction
instructions: Step:1 Start by lying on your side with your legs extended and stacked on top of each other.
Step:2 Prop yourself up on your forearm, keeping your elbow directly below your shoulder.
Step:3 Engage your core and lift your hips off the ground, creating a straight line from your head to your feet.
Step:4 While maintaining the side plank position, lift your top leg towards the ceiling, keeping it straight.
Step:5 Slowly lower your leg back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides.
