translations.name: Abducción de cadera en plancha lateral
instructions: Paso 1: Comience acostándose de lado con las piernas extendidas y una encima de la otra.
Paso 2: Apóyese sobre su antebrazo, manteniendo el codo directamente debajo del hombro.
Paso 3: Active su core y levante las caderas del suelo, creando una línea recta desde la cabeza hasta los pies.
Paso 4: Mientras mantiene la posición de plancha lateral, levante la pierna de arriba hacia el techo, manteniéndola recta.
Paso 5: Baje lentamente la pierna a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambie de lado.

name: dumbbell alternating seated bicep curl on exercise ball
instructions: Step:1 Sit on an exercise ball with your feet flat on the ground and your back straight.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell in each hand with your palms facing forward and your arms fully extended.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arms stationary, exhale and curl one dumbbell while rotating your forearm until your palm is facing your shoulder.
Step:4 Inhale and slowly lower the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat the curl with the other arm.
Step:6 Continue alternating curls for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell alternating seated bicep curl on exercise ball
instructions: Step:1 Sit on an exercise ball with your feet flat on the ground and your back straight.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell in each hand with your palms facing forward and your arms fully extended.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arms stationary, exhale and curl one dumbbell while rotating your forearm until your palm is facing your shoulder.
Step:4 Inhale and slowly lower the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat the curl with the other arm.
Step:6 Continue alternating curls for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Curl de bíceps alterno sentado sobre balón de ejercicio con mancuernas
instructions: Paso 1: Siéntese en un balón de ejercicio con los pies apoyados en el suelo y la espalda recta.
Paso 2: Sostenga una mancuerna en cada mano con las palmas hacia adelante y los brazos completamente extendidos.
Paso 3: Manteniendo la parte superior de los brazos inmóvil, exhale y suba una mancuerna mientras gira el antebrazo hasta que la palma de la mano mire hacia su hombro.
Paso 4: Inhale y baje lentamente la mancuerna a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita el curl con el otro brazo.
Paso 6: Continúe alternando los curls para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: cable overhead triceps extension (rope attachment)
instructions: Step:1 Attach a rope to a cable machine at a high position.
Step:2 Stand facing away from the machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Grasp the rope with both hands, palms facing each other, and bring your hands above your head.
Step:4 Keep your upper arms close to your head and your elbows pointing forward.
Step:5 Slowly lower the rope behind your head by bending your elbows.
Step:6 Pause for a moment, then extend your arms back up to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: cable overhead triceps extension (rope attachment)
instructions: Step:1 Attach a rope to a cable machine at a high position.
Step:2 Stand facing away from the machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Grasp the rope with both hands, palms facing each other, and bring your hands above your head.
Step:4 Keep your upper arms close to your head and your elbows pointing forward.
Step:5 Slowly lower the rope behind your head by bending your elbows.
Step:6 Pause for a moment, then extend your arms back up to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Extensión de tríceps sobre la cabeza con cuerda en polea
instructions: Paso 1: Enganche una cuerda a una máquina de poleas en una posición alta.
Paso 2: Párese de espaldas a la máquina con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros.
Paso 3: Agarre la cuerda con ambas manos, con las palmas enfrentadas, y lleve las manos por encima de la cabeza.
Paso 4: Mantenga la parte superior de los brazos cerca de la cabeza y los codos apuntando hacia adelante.
Paso 5: Baje lentamente la cuerda detrás de su cabeza flexionando los codos.
Paso 6: Haga una pausa por un momento, luego extienda los brazos de nuevo a la posición inicial.
Paso 7: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: pull-up
instructions: Step:1 Hang from a pull-up bar with your palms facing away from you and your arms fully extended.
Step:2 Engage your core and squeeze your shoulder blades together.
Step:3 Pull your body up towards the bar by bending your elbows and bringing your chest towards the bar.
Step:4 Pause at the top of the movement, then slowly lower your body back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: pull-up
instructions: Step:1 Hang from a pull-up bar with your palms facing away from you and your arms fully extended.
Step:2 Engage your core and squeeze your shoulder blades together.
Step:3 Pull your body up towards the bar by bending your elbows and bringing your chest towards the bar.
Step:4 Pause at the top of the movement, then slowly lower your body back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Dominada
instructions: Paso 1: Cuélguese de una barra de dominadas con las palmas mirando hacia afuera y los brazos completamente extendidos.
Paso 2: Active su core y apriete los omóplatos.
Paso 3: Súbase hacia la barra flexionando los codos y llevando el pecho hacia la barra.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa en la parte superior del movimiento, luego baje lentamente su cuerpo a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: barbell lying preacher curl
instructions: Step:1 Lie on your back on an incline bench set to about 60 degrees, with the back of your upper arms resting on the bench.
Step:2 Hold a barbell with an underhand grip.
Step:3 Slowly curl the barbell towards your shoulders, contracting your biceps.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, squeezing your biceps.
Step:5 Lower the barbell back to the starting position, fully extending your arms.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: barbell lying preacher curl
instructions: Step:1 Lie on your back on an incline bench set to about 60 degrees, with the back of your upper arms resting on the bench.
Step:2 Hold a barbell with an underhand grip.
Step:3 Slowly curl the barbell towards your shoulders, contracting your biceps.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, squeezing your biceps.
Step:5 Lower the barbell back to the starting position, fully extending your arms.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Curl predicador acostado con barra
instructions: Paso 1: Acuéstese boca arriba en un banco inclinado a unos 60 grados, con la parte posterior de sus brazos descansando sobre el banco.
Paso 2: Sostenga una barra con un agarre supino.
Paso 3: Suba lentamente la barra hacia sus hombros, contrayendo sus bíceps.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, apretando sus bíceps.
Paso 5: Baje la barra de nuevo a la posición inicial, extendiendo completamente sus brazos.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: exercise ball back extension with knees off ground
instructions: Step:1 Place the stability ball on the ground and lie face down on top of it, with your hips resting on the ball and your feet against a wall for stability.
Step:2 Position your hands behind your head or crossed over your chest.
Step:3 Engage your core and slowly lift your upper body off the ball, extending your back until your body forms a straight line from your head to your heels.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your upper body back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: exercise ball back extension with knees off ground
instructions: Step:1 Place the stability ball on the ground and lie face down on top of it, with your hips resting on the ball and your feet against a wall for stability.
Step:2 Position your hands behind your head or crossed over your chest.
Step:3 Engage your core and slowly lift your upper body off the ball, extending your back until your body forms a straight line from your head to your heels.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your upper body back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Extensión de espalda en balón de ejercicio con rodillas despegadas del suelo
instructions: Paso 1: Coloque el balón de estabilidad en el suelo y acuéstese boca abajo sobre él, con las caderas apoyadas en el balón y los pies contra una pared para mayor estabilidad.
Paso 2: Coloque las manos detrás de la cabeza o cruzadas sobre el pecho.
Paso 3: Active su core y levante lentamente la parte superior del cuerpo del balón, extendiendo la espalda hasta que su cuerpo forme una línea recta desde la cabeza hasta los talones.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, luego baje lentamente la parte superior del cuerpo a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: assisted lying leg raise with throw down
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your legs extended straight up, perpendicular to the floor. Hold onto a stable object behind your head for support.
Step:2 Have a partner stand in front of you.
Step:3 Engage your abs as your partner forcefully pushes your legs down towards the floor.
Step:4 Resist the push and use your core strength to bring your legs back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: assisted lying leg raise with throw down
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your legs extended straight up, perpendicular to the floor. Hold onto a stable object behind your head for support.
Step:2 Have a partner stand in front of you.
Step:3 Engage your abs as your partner forcefully pushes your legs down towards the floor.
Step:4 Resist the push and use your core strength to bring your legs back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Elevación de piernas acostado asistido con lanzamiento hacia abajo
instructions: Paso 1: Acuéstese boca arriba con las piernas extendidas hacia arriba, perpendiculares al suelo. Agárrese a un objeto estable detrás de su cabeza para apoyarse.
Paso 2: Pida a un compañero que se pare frente a usted.
Paso 3: Active sus abdominales mientras su compañero empuja con fuerza sus piernas hacia el suelo.
Paso 4: Resista el empujón y use la fuerza de su core para volver a subir las piernas a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: seated lower back stretch
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the edge of a chair with your feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Place your hands on your thighs or on the sides of the chair for support.
Step:3 Slowly lean forward from your hips, rounding your back and reaching towards the floor.
Step:4 Feel the stretch in your lower back and hold for 20-30 seconds.
Step:5 Slowly return to the starting position and repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: seated lower back stretch
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the edge of a chair with your feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Place your hands on your thighs or on the sides of the chair for support.
Step:3 Slowly lean forward from your hips, rounding your back and reaching towards the floor.
Step:4 Feel the stretch in your lower back and hold for 20-30 seconds.
Step:5 Slowly return to the starting position and repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Estiramiento lumbar sentado
instructions: Paso 1: Siéntese en el borde de una silla con los pies apoyados en el suelo.
Paso 2: Coloque las manos en los muslos o a los lados de la silla para apoyarse.
Paso 3: Inclínese lentamente hacia adelante desde las caderas, redondeando la espalda y tratando de alcanzar el suelo.
Paso 4: Sienta el estiramiento en la parte baja de la espalda y manténgalo durante 20-30 segundos.
Paso 5: Vuelva lentamente a la posición inicial y repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell tricep kickback with stork stance
instructions: Step:1 Stand on one leg, holding a dumbbell in the opposite hand.
Step:2 Hinge forward at the hips, keeping your back straight, until your torso is almost parallel to the floor.
Step:3 Bring your elbow up to your side, keeping it bent at a 90-degree angle.
Step:4 Extend your arm straight back, squeezing your triceps.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then slowly lower the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides.

translations.name: dumbbell tricep kickback with stork stance
instructions: Step:1 Stand on one leg, holding a dumbbell in the opposite hand.
Step:2 Hinge forward at the hips, keeping your back straight, until your torso is almost parallel to the floor.
Step:3 Bring your elbow up to your side, keeping it bent at a 90-degree angle.
Step:4 Extend your arm straight back, squeezing your triceps.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then slowly lower the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides.

translations.name: Patada de tríceps con mancuerna en posición de cigüeña
instructions: Paso 1: Párese sobre una pierna, sosteniendo una mancuerna en la mano opuesta.
Paso 2: Inclínese hacia adelante desde las caderas, manteniendo la espalda recta, hasta que su torso esté casi paralelo al suelo.
Paso 3: Levante el codo a su costado, manteniéndolo flexionado en un ángulo de 90 grados.
Paso 4: Extienda el brazo recto hacia atrás, apretando el tríceps.
Paso 5: Haga una pausa por un momento, luego baje lentamente la mancuerna a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambie de lado.

name: run
instructions: Step:1 Start by standing upright with your feet hip-width apart.
Step:2 Engage your core and keep your upper body relaxed.
Step:3 Begin jogging in place, lifting your knees up towards your chest and landing softly on the balls of your feet.
Step:4 Maintain a steady pace and continue jogging for the desired duration or distance.
Step:5 Remember to breathe deeply and maintain good posture throughout the exercise.

translations.name: run
instructions: Step:1 Start by standing upright with your feet hip-width apart.
Step:2 Engage your core and keep your upper body relaxed.
Step:3 Begin running at a comfortable pace, landing on the midfoot and pushing off with your toes.
Step:4 Maintain a steady pace and continue for the desired duration or distance.
Step:5 Remember to breathe deeply and maintain good posture throughout the exercise.

translations.name: Correr
instructions: Paso 1: Comience de pie con los pies separados a la altura de las caderas.
Paso 2: Active su core y mantenga la parte superior del cuerpo relajada.
Paso 3: Comience a correr a un ritmo cómodo, aterrizando en la parte media del pie y empujando con los dedos.
Paso 4: Mantenga un ritmo constante y continúe durante el tiempo o la distancia deseada.
Paso 5: Recuerde respirar profundamente y mantener una buena postura durante todo el ejercicio.

name: curtsey squat
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Take a step diagonally behind and across your body with your right foot, crossing it behind your left leg.
Step:3 Bend both knees as if you were curtsying, lowering your body towards the ground.
Step:4 Keep your torso upright and your weight on your front foot.
Step:5 Push through your front foot to return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat on the other side, stepping diagonally behind and across your body with your left foot.

translations.name: curtsey squat
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Take a step diagonally behind and across your body with your right foot, crossing it behind your left leg.
Step:3 Bend both knees as if you were curtsying, lowering your body towards the ground.
Step:4 Keep your torso upright and your weight on your front foot.
Step:5 Push through your front foot to return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat on the other side, stepping diagonally behind and across your body with your left foot.

translations.name: Sentadilla de reverencia
instructions: Paso 1: Párese con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros.
Paso 2: Dé un paso en diagonal hacia atrás y a través de su cuerpo con su pie derecho, cruzándolo por detrás de su pierna izquierda.
Paso 3: Flexione ambas rodillas como si estuviera haciendo una reverencia, bajando su cuerpo hacia el suelo.
Paso 4: Mantenga el torso erguido y el peso en el pie delantero.
Paso 5: Empuje con el pie delantero para volver a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita del otro lado, dando un paso en diagonal hacia atrás y a través de su cuerpo con el pie izquierdo.

name: cable one arm straight back high row (kneeling)
instructions: Step:1 Attach a handle to a cable machine at waist height.
Step:2 Kneel down facing the cable machine and grab the handle with one hand.
Step:3 Keep your back straight and your core engaged.
Step:4 Pull the handle towards your chest, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top of the movement.
Step:6 Slowly release the handle back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.
Step:8 Switch sides and repeat the exercise with the other arm.

translations.name: cable one arm straight back high row (kneeling)
instructions: Step:1 Attach a handle to a high pulley cable machine.
Step:2 Kneel on one knee facing the cable machine and grab the handle with the opposite hand.
Step:3 Keep your back straight and your core engaged.
Step:4 Pull the handle towards your shoulder, leading with your elbow and squeezing your shoulder blade.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the peak of the movement.
Step:6 Slowly release the handle back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.
Step:8 Switch sides and repeat the exercise.

translations.name: Remo alto a un brazo de rodillas con espalda recta en polea
instructions: Paso 1: Enganche un agarre a una máquina de polea alta.
Paso 2: Arrodíllese sobre una rodilla frente a la máquina de poleas y agarre la manija con la mano opuesta.
Paso 3: Mantenga la espalda recta y el core activado.
Paso 4: Jale la manija hacia su hombro, liderando con el codo y apretando el omóplato.
Paso 5: Haga una pausa por un momento en el punto más alto del movimiento.
Paso 6: Suelte lentamente la manija para volver a la posición inicial.
Paso 7: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.
Paso 8: Cambie de lado y repita el ejercicio.

name: cable pulldown (pro lat bar)
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height so that your thighs are secure under the pads and your feet are flat on the floor.
Step:2 Grasp the lat bar with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Sit down and lean back slightly, keeping your chest up and your back straight.
Step:4 Pull the bar down towards your chest, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom of the movement, then slowly release the bar back up to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: cable pulldown (pro lat bar)
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height so that your thighs are secure under the pads and your feet are flat on the floor.
Step:2 Grasp the lat bar with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Sit down and lean back slightly, keeping your chest up and your back straight.
Step:4 Pull the bar down towards your upper chest, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom of the movement, then slowly release the bar back up to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Jalón al pecho con barra profesional en polea
instructions: Paso 1: Ajuste la altura del asiento para que sus muslos queden seguros debajo de las almohadillas y sus pies estén apoyados en el suelo.
Paso 2: Agarre la barra de dorsales con un agarre prono, un poco más ancho que el ancho de los hombros.
Paso 3: Siéntese e inclínese ligeramente hacia atrás, manteniendo el pecho erguido y la espalda recta.
Paso 4: Jale la barra hacia la parte superior de su pecho, apretando los omóplatos.
Paso 5: Haga una pausa por un momento en la parte inferior del movimiento, luego suelte lentamente la barra hasta la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: wind sprints
instructions: Step:1 Find an open space or a track to perform the exercise.
Step:2 Start by standing with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Begin running as fast as you can, pumping your arms and driving your knees up.
Step:4 Continue sprinting for a specific distance or time period.
Step:5 Rest and repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: wind sprints
instructions: Step:1 Find an open space or a track to perform the exercise.
Step:2 Start by standing with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Begin running as fast as you can, pumping your arms and driving your knees up.
Step:4 Continue sprinting for a specific distance or time period.
Step:5 Rest and repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Sprints
instructions: Paso 1: Encuentre un espacio abierto o una pista para realizar el ejercicio.
Paso 2: Comience de pie con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros.
Paso 3: Comience a correr lo más rápido que pueda, bombeando los brazos e impulsando las rodillas hacia arriba.
Paso 4: Continúe corriendo durante una distancia o período de tiempo específico.
Paso 5: Descanse y repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: raise single arm push-up
instructions: Step:1 Start in a push-up position with your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart and your feet together.
Step:2 Extend one arm straight out to the side, parallel to the ground.
Step:3 Lower your body towards the ground by bending your elbows, keeping your back straight and core engaged.
Step:4 Push back up to the starting position, using your chest muscles to lift your body.
Step:5 Repeat with the other arm extended.

translations.name: single arm raise push-up
instructions: Step:1 Start in a push-up position with your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart and your feet together.
Step:2 Extend one arm straight out to the side, parallel to the ground.
Step:3 Lower your body towards the ground by bending your supporting elbow, keeping your back straight and core engaged.
Step:4 Push back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Switch arms and repeat.

translations.name: Flexión con elevación de un solo brazo
instructions: Paso 1: Comience en una posición de flexión con las manos un poco más separadas que el ancho de los hombros y los pies juntos.
Paso 2: Extienda un brazo recto hacia el lado, paralelo al suelo.
Paso 3: Baje su cuerpo hacia el suelo flexionando el codo de apoyo, manteniendo la espalda recta y el core activado.
Paso 4: Empuje hacia arriba para volver a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Cambie de brazo y repita.

name: weighted muscle up (on bar)
instructions: Step:1 Start by hanging from a pull-up bar with your palms facing away from you and your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Engage your core and pull your shoulder blades down and back.
Step:3 Bend your elbows and pull your chest towards the bar, keeping your body straight.
Step:4 Once your chest reaches the bar, push down with your hands and drive your elbows back, lifting your body above the bar.
Step:5 Pause at the top of the movement, then slowly lower yourself back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: weighted muscle up (on bar)
instructions: Step:1 Start by hanging from a pull-up bar with your palms facing away from you and your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart. Secure a weight using a dip belt.
Step:2 Engage your core and pull your body up explosively, bringing your chest towards the bar.
Step:3 As your chest approaches the bar, transition your grip and push your body up and over the bar, ending in a dip position.
Step:4 Extend your arms to complete the dip.
Step:5 Slowly lower yourself back down to the starting hanging position with control.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Muscle up con peso (en barra)
instructions: Paso 1: Comience colgando de una barra de dominadas con las palmas mirando hacia afuera y las manos un poco más separadas que el ancho de los hombros. Asegure un peso con un cinturón de lastre.
Paso 2: Active su core y suba su cuerpo explosivamente, llevando el pecho hacia la barra.
Paso 3: A medida que su pecho se acerca a la barra, haga la transición de su agarre y empuje su cuerpo hacia arriba y por encima de la barra, terminando en una posición de fondo.
Paso 4: Extienda los brazos para completar el fondo.
Paso 5: Baje lentamente de nuevo a la posición inicial colgando con control.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: muscle up
instructions: Step:1 Start by hanging from a pull-up bar with your palms facing away from you and your arms fully extended.
Step:2 Engage your core and pull your body up explosively, bringing your chest towards the bar.
Step:3 As your chest approaches the bar, transition your grip and push your body up and over the bar, ending in a dip position.
Step:4 Extend your arms to complete the dip.
Step:5 Slowly lower yourself back down to the starting hanging position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: muscle up
instructions: Step:1 Start by hanging from a pull-up bar with your palms facing away from you and your arms fully extended.
Step:2 Engage your core and pull your body up explosively, bringing your chest towards the bar.
Step:3 As your chest approaches the bar, transition your grip and push your body up and over the bar, ending in a dip position.
Step:4 Extend your arms to complete the dip.
Step:5 Slowly lower yourself back down to the starting hanging position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Muscle up
instructions: Paso 1: Comience colgando de una barra de dominadas con las palmas mirando hacia afuera y los brazos completamente extendidos.
Paso 2: Active su core y suba su cuerpo explosivamente, llevando el pecho hacia la barra.
Paso 3: A medida que su pecho se acerca a la barra, haga la transición de su agarre y empuje su cuerpo hacia arriba y por encima de la barra, terminando en una posición de fondo.
Paso 4: Extienda los brazos para completar el fondo.
Paso 5: Baje lentamente de nuevo a la posición inicial colgando.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: cable twist (up-down)
instructions: Step:1 Set a cable pulley to a high position. Stand with your side to the machine.
Step:2 Grab the handle with both hands and pull it down and across your body towards your opposite knee, rotating your torso.
Step:3 Keep your arms straight and your core engaged throughout the movement.
Step:4 Slowly return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides.

translations.name: cable woodchop (high to low)
instructions: Step:1 Set a cable pulley to a high position. Stand with your side to the machine.
Step:2 Grab the handle with both hands and pull it down and across your body towards your opposite knee, rotating your torso.
Step:3 Keep your arms straight and your core engaged throughout the movement.
Step:4 Slowly return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides.

translations.name: Leñador con polea (de arriba a abajo)
instructions: Paso 1: Ajuste una polea de cable a una posición alta. Párese de lado a la máquina.
Paso 2: Agarre la manija con ambas manos y jálela hacia abajo y a través de su cuerpo hacia la rodilla opuesta, rotando su torso.
Paso 3: Mantenga los brazos rectos y el core activado durante todo el movimiento.
Paso 4: Regrese lentamente a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambie de lado.

name: lever seated leg curl
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the machine to fit your body and sit on it with your back against the backrest.
Step:2 Place your lower legs under the padded lever, just above your ankles.
Step:3 Grasp the handles on the sides of the machine for support.
Step:4 Keeping your upper legs stationary, exhale and curl your legs up as far as possible.
Step:5 Hold the contracted position for a brief pause as you squeeze your hamstrings.
Step:6 Inhale and slowly lower the lever back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: lever seated leg curl
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the machine to fit your body and sit on it with your back against the backrest.
Step:2 Place your lower legs under the padded lever, just above your ankles.
Step:3 Grasp the handles on the sides of the machine for support.
Step:4 Keeping your upper legs stationary, exhale and curl the lever down as far as possible.
Step:5 Hold the contracted position for a brief pause as you squeeze your hamstrings.
Step:6 Inhale and slowly raise the lever back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Curl de pierna sentado en máquina de palanca
instructions: Paso 1: Ajuste la máquina a su cuerpo y siéntese en ella con la espalda contra el respaldo.
Paso 2: Coloque la parte inferior de sus piernas debajo de la palanca acolchada, justo por encima de los tobillos.
Paso 3: Agarre las manijas a los lados de la máquina para apoyarse.
Paso 4: Manteniendo la parte superior de las piernas inmóvil, exhale y flexione la palanca hacia abajo tanto como sea posible.
Paso 5: Mantenga la posición contraída por un momento mientras aprieta los isquiotibiales.
Paso 6: Inhale y levante lentamente la palanca de nuevo a la posición inicial.
Paso 7: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: push-up (wall) v. 2
instructions: Step:1 Stand facing a wall, about arm's length away.
Step:2 Place your hands on the wall at shoulder height, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Step back with your feet, keeping them hip-width apart.
Step:4 Engage your core and keep your body in a straight line from head to heels.
Step:5 Bend your elbows and lower your chest towards the wall, keeping your body straight.
Step:6 Pause for a moment, then push yourself back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: wall push-up v. 2
instructions: Step:1 Stand facing a wall, about arm's length away.
Step:2 Place your hands on the wall at shoulder height, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Step back with your feet, keeping them hip-width apart.
Step:4 Engage your core and keep your body in a straight line from head to heels.
Step:5 Bend your elbows and lower your chest towards the wall, keeping your body straight.
Step:6 Pause for a moment, then push yourself back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Flexión en pared v. 2
instructions: Paso 1: Párese frente a una pared, a la distancia de un brazo.
Paso 2: Coloque las manos en la pared a la altura de los hombros, un poco más separadas que el ancho de los hombros.
Paso 3: Dé un paso atrás con los pies, manteniéndolos separados a la altura de las caderas.
Paso 4: Active su core y mantenga el cuerpo en línea recta desde la cabeza hasta los talones.
Paso 5: Flexione los codos y baje el pecho hacia la pared, manteniendo el cuerpo recto.
Paso 6: Haga una pausa por un momento, luego empuje para volver a la posición inicial.
Paso 7: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: band one arm standing low row
instructions: Step:1 Attach the band to a stable anchor point at waist height.
Step:2 Stand facing the anchor point with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Hold the band with one hand, palm facing inward, and step back to create tension in the band.
Step:4 Bend your knees slightly and hinge forward at the hips, keeping your back straight.
Step:5 Pull the band towards your waist, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the top of the movement, then slowly release the band back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides.

translations.name: band one arm standing low row
instructions: Step:1 Attach the band to a stable anchor point at waist height.
Step:2 Stand facing the anchor point with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Hold the band with one hand, palm facing inward, and step back to create tension in the band.
Step:4 Bend your knees slightly and hinge forward at the hips, keeping your back straight.
Step:5 Pull the band towards your waist, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the top of the movement, then slowly release the band back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides.

translations.name: Remo bajo a un brazo de pie con banda
instructions: Paso 1: Sujete la banda a un punto de anclaje estable a la altura de la cintura.
Paso 2: Párese frente al punto de anclaje con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros.
Paso 3: Sostenga la banda con una mano, con la palma hacia adentro, y dé un paso atrás para crear tensión.
Paso 4: Flexione ligeramente las rodillas e inclínese desde las caderas, manteniendo la espalda recta.
Paso 5: Jale la banda hacia su cintura, apretando los omóplatos.
Paso 6: Haga una pausa en la parte superior del movimiento, luego suelte lentamente la banda hasta la posición inicial.
Paso 7: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambie de lado.

name: band hip lift
instructions: Step:1 Lie on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Place a resistance band just above your knees.
Step:3 Engage your glutes and core muscles.
Step:4 Press your heels into the ground and lift your hips off the floor, squeezing your glutes at the top.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your hips back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: band glute bridge
instructions: Step:1 Lie on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Place a resistance band just above your knees.
Step:3 Engage your glutes and core muscles.
Step:4 Press your heels into the ground and lift your hips off the floor, squeezing your glutes at the top.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your hips back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Puente de glúteos con banda
instructions: Paso 1: Acuéstese boca arriba con las rodillas flexionadas y los pies apoyados en el suelo.
Paso 2: Coloque una banda de resistencia justo por encima de las rodillas.
Paso 3: Active sus glúteos y los músculos del core.
Paso 4: Presione los talones contra el suelo y levante las caderas, apretando los glúteos en la parte superior.
Paso 5: Haga una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, luego baje lentamente las caderas a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: cable kneeling crunch
instructions: Step:1 Attach a rope handle to a high pulley and kneel down facing the machine.
Step:2 Hold the rope handle with both hands and place it on either side of your head.
Step:3 Keeping your hips stationary, flex your waist and crunch your torso down towards your thighs.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then slowly return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: cable kneeling crunch
instructions: Step:1 Attach a rope handle to a high pulley and kneel down facing the machine.
Step:2 Hold the rope handle with both hands and place it on either side of your head.
Step:3 Keeping your hips stationary, flex your waist and crunch your torso down towards your thighs.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then slowly return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Crunch de rodillas en polea
instructions: Paso 1: Enganche un agarre de cuerda a una polea alta y arrodíllese frente a la máquina.
Paso 2: Sostenga el agarre de la cuerda con ambas manos y colóquelo a cada lado de su cabeza.
Paso 3: Manteniendo las caderas inmóviles, flexione la cintura y encoja el torso hacia los muslos.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa por un momento en la parte inferior, luego regrese lentamente a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: lever gripper hands
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and grip the handles of the leverage machine.
Step:2 Keep your back straight and your feet flat on the ground.
Step:3 Exhale and squeeze the handles, contracting your forearms.
Step:4 Hold the contraction for a second, then slowly release and return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: lever gripper
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and grip the handles of the leverage machine.
Step:2 Keep your back straight and your feet flat on the ground.
Step:3 Exhale and squeeze the handles, contracting your forearms.
Step:4 Hold the contraction for a second, then slowly release and return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Fortalecedor de agarre en máquina
instructions: Paso 1: Ajuste la altura del asiento y agarre las manijas de la máquina.
Paso 2: Mantenga la espalda recta y los pies apoyados en el suelo.
Paso 3: Exhale y apriete las manijas, contrayendo sus antebrazos.
Paso 4: Mantenga la contracción por un segundo, luego suelte lentamente y regrese a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: lever shoulder press v. 2
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and backrest of the leverage machine to a comfortable position.
Step:2 Sit on the machine with your back against the backrest and your feet flat on the floor.
Step:3 Grasp the handles of the machine with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:4 Push the handles upward and forward until your arms are fully extended, but not locked.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the handles back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: lever shoulder press v. 2
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and backrest of the leverage machine to a comfortable position.
Step:2 Sit on the machine with your back against the backrest and your feet flat on the floor.
Step:3 Grasp the handles of the machine with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:4 Push the handles upward until your arms are fully extended, but not locked.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the handles back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Press de hombro en máquina de palanca v. 2
instructions: Paso 1: Ajuste la altura del asiento y el respaldo de la máquina a una posición cómoda.
Paso 2: Siéntese en la máquina con la espalda contra el respaldo y los pies apoyados en el suelo.
Paso 3: Agarre las manijas de la máquina con un agarre prono, un poco más ancho que el ancho de los hombros.
Paso 4: Empuje las manijas hacia arriba hasta que sus brazos estén completamente extendidos, pero sin bloquearlos.
Paso 5: Haga una pausa en la parte superior, luego baje lentamente las manijas a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: kneeling push-up (male)
instructions: Step:1 Start by kneeling on the ground.
Step:2 Place your hands on the floor shoulder-width apart, fingers pointing forward.
Step:3 Lower your body towards the ground by bending your elbows, keeping your body in a straight line from your head to your knees.
Step:4 Push back up to the starting position by straightening your arms.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: kneeling push-up
instructions: Step:1 Start by kneeling on the ground.
Step:2 Place your hands on the floor shoulder-width apart, fingers pointing forward.
Step:3 Lower your body towards the ground by bending your elbows, keeping your body in a straight line from your head to your knees.
Step:4 Push back up to the starting position by straightening your arms.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Flexión de rodillas
instructions: Paso 1: Comience arrodillado en el suelo.
Paso 2: Coloque las manos en el suelo separadas al ancho de los hombros, con los dedos apuntando hacia adelante.
Paso 3: Baje su cuerpo hacia el suelo flexionando los codos, manteniendo el cuerpo en línea recta desde la cabeza hasta las rodillas.
Paso 4: Empuje hacia arriba para volver a la posición inicial, enderezando los brazos.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell incline hammer press on exercise ball
instructions: Step:1 Sit on an exercise ball with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing each other.
Step:2 Walk your feet forward and roll your body down the ball until your head, neck, and upper back are supported on the ball.
Step:3 Hold the dumbbells at shoulder level, elbows bent and close to your body.
Step:4 Press the dumbbells up, keeping your palms facing each other.
Step:5 Extend your arms fully, squeezing your chest at the top of the movement.
Step:6 Slowly lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell incline hammer press on exercise ball
instructions: Step:1 Sit on an exercise ball with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing each other.
Step:2 Walk your feet forward and roll your body down the ball until your head, neck, and upper back are supported on the ball.
Step:3 Hold the dumbbells at shoulder level, elbows bent and close to your body.
Step:4 Press the dumbbells up, keeping your palms facing each other.
Step:5 Extend your arms fully, squeezing your chest at the top of the movement.
Step:6 Slowly lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Press martillo inclinado sobre balón de ejercicio con mancuernas
instructions: Paso 1: Siéntese en un balón de ejercicio con una mancuerna en cada mano, con las palmas enfrentadas.
Paso 2: Camine con los pies hacia adelante y ruede su cuerpo hacia abajo por el balón hasta que su cabeza, cuello y parte superior de la espalda estén apoyados.
Paso 3: Sostenga las mancuernas a la altura de los hombros, con los codos flexionados y cerca de su cuerpo.
Paso 4: Empuje las mancuernas hacia arriba, manteniendo las palmas enfrentadas.
Paso 5: Extienda los brazos por completo, apretando el pecho en la parte superior del movimiento.
Paso 6: Baje lentamente las mancuernas a la posición inicial.
Paso 7: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: isometric chest squeeze
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your knees slightly bent.
Step:2 Bring your hands together in front of your chest in a prayer position.
Step:3 Squeeze your palms together as hard as you can, contracting your chest muscles.
Step:4 Hold this position for a few seconds, focusing on the contraction.
Step:5 Release the squeeze and relax your chest muscles.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: isometric chest squeeze
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your knees slightly bent.
Step:2 Bring your hands together in front of your chest in a prayer position.
Step:3 Squeeze your palms together as hard as you can, contracting your chest muscles.
Step:4 Hold this position for a few seconds, focusing on the contraction.
Step:5 Release the squeeze and relax your chest muscles.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Contracción isométrica de pecho
instructions: Paso 1: Párese con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y las rodillas ligeramente flexionadas.
Paso 2: Junte las manos frente a su pecho en posición de oración.
Paso 3: Apriete las palmas una contra la otra tan fuerte como pueda, contrayendo los músculos del pecho.
Paso 4: Mantenga esta posición durante unos segundos, concentrándose en la contracción.
Paso 5: Suelte la presión y relaje los músculos del pecho.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: resistance band hip thrusts on knees (female)
instructions: Step:1 Start by kneeling on the ground with your knees hip-width apart.
Step:2 Wrap the resistance band around your thighs, just above your knees.
Step:3 Place your hands on your hips or extend them out in front of you for balance.
Step:4 Engage your glutes and core muscles.
Step:5 Push your hips forward and squeeze your glutes, extending your hips until your body forms a straight line from your knees to your shoulders.
Step:6 Hold the position for a moment, then slowly lower your hips back down to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: kneeling resistance band hip thrust
instructions: Step:1 Start by kneeling on the ground with your knees hip-width apart.
Step:2 Wrap the resistance band around your thighs, just above your knees.
Step:3 Place your hands on your hips or extend them out in front of you for balance.
Step:4 Engage your glutes and core muscles.
Step:5 Push your hips forward and squeeze your glutes, extending your hips until your body forms a straight line from your knees to your shoulders.
Step:6 Hold the position for a moment, then slowly lower your hips back down to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Empuje de cadera de rodillas con banda de resistencia
instructions: Paso 1: Comience arrodillado en el suelo con las rodillas separadas a la altura de las caderas.
Paso 2: Coloque la banda de resistencia alrededor de sus muslos, justo por encima de las rodillas.
Paso 3: Coloque las manos en las caderas o extiéndalas frente a usted para mantener el equilibrio.
Paso 4: Active sus glúteos y los músculos del core.
Paso 5: Empuje las caderas hacia adelante y apriete los glúteos, extendiendo las caderas hasta que su cuerpo forme una línea recta desde las rodillas hasta los hombros.
Paso 6: Mantenga la posición por un momento, luego baje lentamente las caderas a la posición inicial.
Paso 7: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: barbell reverse grip incline bench press
instructions: Step:1 Set up an incline bench at a 45-degree angle.
Step:2 Lie down on the bench with your feet flat on the ground.
Step:3 Grasp the barbell with a reverse grip, hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:4 Unrack the barbell and lower it slowly towards your chest, keeping your elbows tucked in.
Step:5 Pause for a moment when the barbell touches your chest.
Step:6 Push the barbell back up to the starting position, fully extending your arms.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: barbell reverse grip incline bench press
instructions: Step:1 Set an incline bench to a 45-degree angle.
Step:2 Lie down on the bench with your feet flat on the ground.
Step:3 Grasp the barbell with a reverse (underhand) grip, hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:4 Unrack the barbell and lower it slowly towards your chest, keeping your elbows tucked in.
Step:5 Pause for a moment when the barbell is just above your chest.
Step:6 Push the barbell back up to the starting position, fully extending your arms.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Press de banca inclinado con barra y agarre inverso
instructions: Paso 1: Coloque un banco inclinado en un ángulo de 45 grados.
Paso 2: Acuéstese en el banco con los pies apoyados en el suelo.
Paso 3: Agarre la barra con un agarre inverso (supino), con las manos un poco más separadas que el ancho de los hombros.
Paso 4: Saque la barra del soporte y bájela lentamente hacia su pecho, manteniendo los codos metidos.
Paso 5: Haga una pausa por un momento cuando la barra esté justo por encima de su pecho.
Paso 6: Empuje la barra de nuevo a la posición inicial, extendiendo completamente los brazos.
Paso 7: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell reverse fly
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a dumbbell in each hand.
Step:2 Bend your knees slightly and hinge forward at the hips, keeping your back straight.
Step:3 Extend your arms straight down in front of you, palms facing each other.
Step:4 Keeping a slight bend in your elbows, raise your arms out to the sides until they are parallel to the ground.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your arms back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell reverse fly
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a dumbbell in each hand.
Step:2 Bend your knees slightly and hinge forward at the hips, keeping your back straight.
Step:3 Let your arms hang straight down, with your palms facing each other.
Step:4 Keeping a slight bend in your elbows, raise your arms out to the sides until they are at shoulder level.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your arms back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Apertura inversa con mancuernas (Pájaros)
instructions: Paso 1: Párese con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y sostenga una mancuerna en cada mano.
Paso 2: Flexione ligeramente las rodillas e inclínese hacia adelante desde las caderas, manteniendo la espalda recta.
Paso 3: Deje que sus brazos cuelguen rectos, con las palmas enfrentadas.
Paso 4: Manteniendo una ligera flexión en los codos, levante los brazos hacia los lados hasta que estén a la altura de los hombros.
Paso 5: Haga una pausa en la parte superior, luego baje lentamente los brazos a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: cable straight arm pulldown
instructions: Step:1 Attach a straight bar to the high pulley of a cable machine.
Step:2 Stand facing the machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Grasp the bar with an overhand grip, keeping your arms straight and your palms facing down.
Step:4 Engage your back and pull the bar down towards your thighs, keeping your arms straight throughout the movement.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then slowly return the bar to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: cable straight arm pulldown
instructions: Step:1 Attach a straight bar to the high pulley of a cable machine.
Step:2 Stand facing the machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Grasp the bar with an overhand grip, keeping your arms straight and your palms facing down.
Step:4 Engage your lats and pull the bar down towards your thighs, keeping your arms straight throughout the movement.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then slowly return the bar to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Jalón con brazos rectos en polea
instructions: Paso 1: Enganche una barra recta a la polea alta de una máquina de cables.
Paso 2: Párese frente a la máquina con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros.
Paso 3: Agarre la barra con un agarre prono, manteniendo los brazos rectos y las palmas hacia abajo.
Paso 4: Active sus dorsales y jale la barra hacia sus muslos, manteniendo los brazos rectos durante todo el movimiento.
Paso 5: Haga una pausa en la parte inferior, luego regrese lentamente la barra a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: standing pelvic tilt
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your knees slightly bent.
Step:2 Place your hands on your hips or let them hang by your sides.
Step:3 Engage your core muscles and tilt your pelvis forward, pushing your lower back towards the wall behind you.
Step:4 Hold the position for a few seconds, then release and return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: standing pelvic tilt
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your knees slightly bent.
Step:2 Place your hands on your hips or let them hang by your sides.
Step:3 Engage your core muscles and gently tilt your pelvis forward, slightly arching your lower back.
Step:4 Then, tilt your pelvis backward, tucking your tailbone under and flattening your lower back.
Step:5 Continue rocking back and forth for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Inclinación pélvica de pie
instructions: Paso 1: Párese con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y las rodillas ligeramente flexionadas.
Paso 2: Coloque las manos en las caderas o déjelas colgar a los lados.
Paso 3: Active los músculos del core e incline suavemente la pelvis hacia adelante, arqueando ligeramente la parte baja de la espalda.
Paso 4: Luego, incline la pelvis hacia atrás, metiendo el coxis y aplanando la parte baja de la espalda.
Paso 5: Continúe balanceándose hacia adelante y hacia atrás para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: barbell standing calf raise
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and place a barbell across your back.
Step:2 Raise your heels off the ground as high as possible, balancing on the balls of your feet.
Step:3 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your heels back down to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: barbell standing calf raise
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and place a barbell across your upper back.
Step:2 Raise your heels off the ground as high as possible, balancing on the balls of your feet.
Step:3 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your heels back down to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Elevación de talones de pie con barra
instructions: Paso 1: Párese con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y coloque una barra sobre la parte superior de su espalda.
Paso 2: Levante los talones del suelo lo más alto posible, balanceándose sobre la punta de los pies.
Paso 3: Haga una pausa en la parte superior, luego baje lentamente los talones a la posición inicial.
Paso 4: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: cable shrug
instructions: Step:1 Stand facing the cable machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Grasp the cable handles with an overhand grip and let your arms hang down in front of you.
Step:3 Keeping your arms straight, shrug your shoulders up towards your ears.
Step:4 Hold the contraction for a moment, then slowly lower your shoulders back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: cable shrug
instructions: Step:1 Stand facing a low pulley cable machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Grasp a straight bar with an overhand grip and let your arms hang down in front of you.
Step:3 Keeping your arms straight, shrug your shoulders up towards your ears.
Step:4 Hold the contraction for a moment, then slowly lower your shoulders back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Encogimiento de hombros en polea
instructions: Paso 1: Párese frente a una máquina de polea baja con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros.
Paso 2: Agarre una barra recta con un agarre prono y deje que sus brazos cuelguen frente a usted.
Paso 3: Manteniendo los brazos rectos, encoja los hombros hacia las orejas.
Paso 4: Mantenga la contracción por un momento, luego baje lentamente los hombros a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: barbell floor calf raise
instructions: Step:1 Place a barbell on the floor in front of you.
Step:2 Stand with the balls of your feet on the edge of the barbell, with your heels on the floor.
Step:3 Hold onto a stable object for balance if needed.
Step:4 Raise your heels as high as possible, using your calves to lift your body.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your heels back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: barbell floor calf raise
instructions: Step:1 Place a barbell on the floor in front of you.
Step:2 Stand with the balls of your feet on the barbell, with your heels on the floor.
Step:3 Hold onto a stable object for balance if needed.
Step:4 Raise your heels as high as possible, using your calves to lift your body.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your heels back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Elevación de talones en el suelo con barra
instructions: Paso 1: Coloque una barra en el suelo frente a usted.
Paso 2: Párese con la parte delantera de sus pies sobre la barra y los talones en el suelo.
Paso 3: Agárrese a un objeto estable para mantener el equilibrio si es necesario.
Paso 4: Levante los talones lo más alto posible, usando sus gemelos para levantar su cuerpo.
Paso 5: Haga una pausa en la parte superior, luego baje lentamente los talones a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: weighted donkey calf raise
instructions: Step:1 Stand on a raised platform with your toes on the edge and your heels hanging off.
Step:2 Hinge at your hips so your torso is parallel to the floor. Have a partner sit on your lower back.
Step:3 Hold onto a stable object for support.
Step:4 Raise your heels as high as possible by extending your ankles.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your heels back down past the edge of the platform.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: weighted donkey calf raise
instructions: Step:1 Stand on a raised platform with your toes on the edge and your heels hanging off.
Step:2 Hinge at your hips so your torso is parallel to the floor. Have a partner sit on your lower back.
Step:3 Hold onto a stable object for support.
Step:4 Raise your heels as high as possible by extending your ankles.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your heels back down past the edge of the platform.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Elevación de talones tipo burro con peso
instructions: Paso 1: Párese en una plataforma elevada con los dedos de los pies en el borde y los talones colgando.
Paso 2: Inclínese desde las caderas para que su torso quede paralelo al suelo. Pida a un compañero que se siente en la parte baja de su espalda.
Paso 3: Agárrese a un objeto estable para apoyarse.
Paso 4: Levante los talones lo más alto posible extendiendo los tobillos.
Paso 5: Haga una pausa en la parte superior, luego baje lentamente los talones por debajo del borde de la plataforma.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: lying (side) quads stretch
instructions: Step:1 Lie on your side with your legs straight.
Step:2 Bend your top leg and grab your ankle or foot with your hand.
Step:3 Gently pull your ankle or foot towards your glutes until you feel a stretch in your quads.
Step:4 Hold the stretch for 20-30 seconds.
Step:5 Release the stretch and repeat on the other side.

translations.name: side-lying quad stretch
instructions: Step:1 Lie on your side with your legs straight.
Step:2 Bend your top leg and grab your ankle or foot with your top hand.
Step:3 Gently pull your heel towards your glutes until you feel a stretch in your quads.
Step:4 Hold the stretch for 20-30 seconds.
Step:5 Release the stretch and repeat on the other side.

translations.name: Estiramiento de cuádriceps acostado de lado
instructions: Paso 1: Acuéstese de lado con las piernas estiradas.
Paso 2: Flexione la pierna de arriba y agarre su tobillo o pie con la mano de arriba.
Paso 3: Jale suavemente el talón hacia los glúteos hasta que sienta un estiramiento en el cuádriceps.
Paso 4: Mantenga el estiramiento durante 20-30 segundos.
Paso 5: Suelte el estiramiento y repita del otro lado.

name: assisted side lying adductor stretch
instructions: Step:1 Lie on your side with your bottom leg straight and your top leg bent over it.
Step:2 Have a partner gently press down on your top knee to increase the stretch in your inner thigh.
Step:3 Hold the stretch for 20-30 seconds.
Step:4 Return to the starting position and repeat on the other side.

translations.name: assisted side lying adductor stretch
instructions: Step:1 Lie on your side with your bottom leg straight and your top leg bent over it.
Step:2 Have a partner gently press down on your top knee to increase the stretch in your inner thigh.
Step:3 Hold the stretch for 20-30 seconds.
Step:4 Return to the starting position and repeat on the other side.

translations.name: Estiramiento de aductor acostado de lado asistido
instructions: Paso 1: Acuéstese de lado con la pierna de abajo estirada y la de arriba flexionada sobre ella.
Paso 2: Pida a un compañero que presione suavemente su rodilla superior hacia abajo para aumentar el estiramiento en la parte interna del muslo.
Paso 3: Mantenga el estiramiento durante 20-30 segundos.
Paso 4: Vuelva a la posición inicial y repita del otro lado.

name: band two legs calf raise - (band under both legs) v. 2
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and place a resistance band under both feet.
Step:2 Hold the ends of the band with your hands for stability.
Step:3 Raise your heels off the ground as high as possible, using your calves.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your heels back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: band standing two legs calf raise v. 2
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and place a resistance band under the balls of both feet.
Step:2 Hold the ends of the band in each hand at your shoulders.
Step:3 Raise your heels off the ground as high as possible, contracting your calves.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your heels back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Elevación de talones a dos piernas con banda v. 2
instructions: Paso 1: Párese con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y coloque una banda de resistencia debajo de la parte delantera de ambos pies.
Paso 2: Sostenga los extremos de la banda en cada mano a la altura de sus hombros.
Paso 3: Levante los talones del suelo lo más alto posible, contrayendo sus gemelos.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa en la parte superior, luego baje lentamente los talones a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: short stride run
instructions: Step:1 Find an open space or a treadmill to perform the exercise.
Step:2 Stand tall with your feet hip-width apart.
Step:3 Start jogging in place, lifting your knees high and pumping your arms.
Step:4 After a few seconds, start taking short strides forward, maintaining a quick pace.
Step:5 Continue running with short strides for the desired duration or distance.

translations.name: short stride run
instructions: Step:1 Find an open space or a treadmill to perform the exercise.
Step:2 Stand tall with your feet hip-width apart.
Step:3 Start jogging, focusing on taking shorter, quicker steps than a normal run.
Step:4 Land on the midfoot and maintain a high cadence (steps per minute).
Step:5 Continue running with short strides for the desired duration or distance.

translations.name: Carrera de zancada corta
instructions: Paso 1: Encuentre un espacio abierto o una cinta de correr para realizar el ejercicio.
Paso 2: Párese erguido con los pies separados a la altura de las caderas.
Paso 3: Comience a trotar, concentrándose en dar pasos más cortos y rápidos que en una carrera normal.
Paso 4: Aterrice en la parte media del pie y mantenga una cadencia alta (pasos por minuto).
Paso 5: Continúe corriendo con zancadas cortas durante el tiempo o la distancia deseada.

name: kettlebell alternating row
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, knees slightly bent, and hold a kettlebell in each hand with your palms facing your body.
Step:2 Bend forward at the hips, keeping your back straight and your core engaged.
Step:3 Pull one kettlebell up towards your chest, keeping your elbow close to your body and squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:4 Lower the kettlebell back down to the starting position and repeat with the other arm.
Step:5 Continue alternating arms for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: kettlebell alternating row
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, knees slightly bent, and hold a kettlebell in each hand with your palms facing your body.
Step:2 Bend forward at the hips, keeping your back straight and your core engaged.
Step:3 Pull one kettlebell up towards your chest, keeping your elbow close to your body and squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:4 Lower the kettlebell back down to the starting position and repeat with the other arm.
Step:5 Continue alternating arms for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Remo alterno con kettlebell
instructions: Paso 1: Párese con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros, las rodillas ligeramente flexionadas y sostenga una kettlebell en cada mano con las palmas mirando hacia su cuerpo.
Paso 2: Inclínese hacia adelante desde las caderas, manteniendo la espalda recta y el core activado.
Paso 3: Jale una kettlebell hacia su pecho, manteniendo el codo cerca de su cuerpo y apretando los omóplatos.
Paso 4: Baje la kettlebell a la posición inicial y repita con el otro brazo.
Paso 5: Continúe alternando los brazos para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: triceps stretch
instructions: Step:1 Stand or sit upright with your back straight.
Step:2 Extend one arm overhead, bending it at the elbow.
Step:3 Place your opposite hand on the bent elbow and gently pull it towards your head.
Step:4 Hold the stretch for 15-30 seconds, feeling a gentle stretch in your triceps.
Step:5 Release the stretch and repeat on the other arm.

translations.name: triceps stretch
instructions: Step:1 Stand or sit upright with your back straight.
Step:2 Extend one arm overhead, then bend at the elbow so your hand reaches down your back.
Step:3 Use your opposite hand to gently pull the bent elbow towards your head.
Step:4 Hold the stretch for 15-30 seconds, feeling a gentle stretch in your triceps.
Step:5 Release the stretch and repeat on the other arm.

translations.name: Estiramiento de tríceps
instructions: Paso 1: Párese o siéntese erguido con la espalda recta.
Paso 2: Extienda un brazo por encima de la cabeza, luego flexione el codo de modo que su mano baje por su espalda.
Paso 3: Use la mano opuesta para jalar suavemente el codo flexionado hacia su cabeza.
Paso 4: Mantenga el estiramiento durante 15-30 segundos, sintiendo un estiramiento suave en su tríceps.
Paso 5: Suelte el estiramiento y repita con el otro brazo.

name: band close-grip pulldown
instructions: Step:1 Attach the band to a high anchor point, such as a pull-up bar or sturdy beam.
Step:2 Kneel or sit facing the anchor point and grab the band with an underhand grip, hands close together.
Step:3 Lean back slightly, keeping your back straight.
Step:4 Engage your core and pull the band down towards your chest, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom of the movement, then slowly release the band back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: band close-grip pulldown
instructions: Step:1 Attach the band to a high anchor point, such as a pull-up bar or sturdy beam.
Step:2 Kneel or sit facing the anchor point and grab the band with an underhand grip, hands close together.
Step:3 Lean back slightly, keeping your back straight.
Step:4 Engage your lats and pull the band down towards your upper chest, squeezing your shoulder blades.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom of the movement, then slowly release the band back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Jalón con agarre cerrado y banda
instructions: Paso 1: Sujete la banda a un punto de anclaje alto, como una barra de dominadas o una viga resistente.
Paso 2: Arrodíllese o siéntese frente al punto de anclaje y agarre la banda con un agarre supino, con las manos juntas.
Paso 3: Inclínese ligeramente hacia atrás, manteniendo la espalda recta.
Paso 4: Active sus dorsales y jale la banda hacia la parte superior de su pecho, apretando los omóplatos.
Paso 5: Haga una pausa en la parte inferior del movimiento, luego suelte lentamente la banda hasta la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: squat to overhead reach with twist
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and toes slightly turned out.
Step:2 Lower your body into a squat position by bending your knees and pushing your hips back.
Step:3 As you come up from the squat, raise your arms overhead and twist your torso to one side.
Step:4 Return to the starting position and repeat the squat, this time twisting your torso to the opposite side.
Step:5 Continue alternating sides with each squat repetition.

translations.name: squat to overhead reach with twist
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and toes slightly turned out.
Step:2 Lower your body into a squat position by bending your knees and pushing your hips back.
Step:3 As you come up from the squat, raise your arms overhead and twist your torso to one side.
Step:4 Return to the squat position and then rise up, twisting to the opposite side.
Step:5 Continue alternating sides with each repetition.

translations.name: Sentadilla con alcance superior y giro
instructions: Paso 1: Párese con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y las puntas de los pies ligeramente hacia afuera.
Paso 2: Baje su cuerpo a una posición de sentadilla flexionando las rodillas y empujando las caderas hacia atrás.
Paso 3: Al subir de la sentadilla, levante los brazos por encima de la cabeza y gire el torso hacia un lado.
Paso 4: Vuelva a la posición de sentadilla y luego levántese, girando hacia el lado opuesto.
Paso 5: Continúe alternando lados con cada repetición.

name: lever gripless shrug v. 2
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and position yourself on the machine with your back against the pad.
Step:2 Rest your shoulders under the pads.
Step:3 Keeping your back straight, lift your shoulders up towards your ears as high as possible.
Step:4 Hold the contraction for a moment, then slowly lower your shoulders back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: lever gripless shrug v. 2
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and position yourself on the machine with your back against the pad.
Step:2 Rest your shoulders under the pads.
Step:3 Keeping your back straight, lift your shoulders up towards your ears as high as possible.
Step:4 Hold the contraction for a moment, then slowly lower your shoulders back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Encogimiento de hombros sin agarre en máquina v. 2
instructions: Paso 1: Ajuste la altura del asiento y colóquese en la máquina con la espalda contra la almohadilla.
Paso 2: Apoye los hombros debajo de las almohadillas.
Paso 3: Manteniendo la espalda recta, levante los hombros hacia las orejas lo más alto posible.
Paso 4: Mantenga la contracción por un momento, luego baje lentamente los hombros a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: smith bent over row
instructions: Step:1 Set the bar on the Smith machine to about knee height.
Step:2 Stand facing the bar with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Bend your knees slightly and hinge forward at the hips, keeping your back straight.
Step:4 Grasp the bar with an overhand grip, hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:5 Pull the bar towards your lower chest, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the bar back down to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: smith bent over row
instructions: Step:1 Set the bar on the Smith machine to about knee height.
Step:2 Stand facing the bar with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Bend your knees slightly and hinge forward at the hips, keeping your back straight.
Step:4 Grasp the bar with an overhand grip, hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:5 Pull the bar towards your lower chest, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the bar back down to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Remo inclinado en máquina Smith
instructions: Paso 1: Ajuste la barra en la máquina Smith aproximadamente a la altura de las rodillas.
Paso 2: Párese frente a la barra con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros.
Paso 3: Flexione ligeramente las rodillas e inclínese desde las caderas, manteniendo la espalda recta.
Paso 4: Agarre la barra con un agarre prono, con las manos un poco más separadas que el ancho de los hombros.
Paso 5: Jale la barra hacia la parte inferior de su pecho, apretando los omóplatos.
Paso 6: Haga una pausa en la parte superior, luego baje lentamente la barra a la posición inicial.
Paso 7: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: kettlebell plyo push-up
instructions: Step:1 Start in a high plank position with your hands on the kettlebells, shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Lower your chest towards the ground, keeping your elbows close to your body.
Step:3 Push through your hands explosively, lifting your hands off the kettlebells and extending your arms fully.
Step:4 Land softly back on the kettlebells and immediately lower your chest back down for the next repetition.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: kettlebell plyometric push-up
instructions: Step:1 Start in a high plank position with your hands on the kettlebells, shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Lower your chest towards the kettlebells, keeping your elbows close to your body.
Step:3 Push up explosively, so your hands leave the kettlebells.
Step:4 Land softly back on the kettlebells and immediately lower into the next repetition.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Flexión pliométrica con kettlebell
instructions: Paso 1: Comience en una posición de plancha alta con las manos sobre las kettlebells, separadas al ancho de los hombros.
Paso 2: Baje el pecho hacia las kettlebells, manteniendo los codos cerca del cuerpo.
Paso 3: Empuje hacia arriba explosivamente, de modo que sus manos se separen de las kettlebells.
Paso 4: Aterrice suavemente de nuevo sobre las kettlebells y baje inmediatamente a la siguiente repetición.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell seated alternate press
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing forward.
Step:2 Raise the dumbbells to shoulder height, with your elbows bent and palms facing forward.
Step:3 Press one dumbbell up overhead, fully extending your arm.
Step:4 Lower the dumbbell back down to shoulder height.
Step:5 Repeat with the other arm.
Step:6 Continue alternating arms for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell seated alternating press
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing forward.
Step:2 Raise the dumbbells to shoulder height, with your elbows bent and palms facing forward.
Step:3 Press one dumbbell up overhead, fully extending your arm.
Step:4 Lower the dumbbell back down to shoulder height.
Step:5 Repeat with the other arm.
Step:6 Continue alternating arms for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Press sentado alterno con mancuernas
instructions: Paso 1: Siéntese en un banco con una mancuerna en cada mano, con las palmas hacia adelante.
Paso 2: Levante las mancuernas a la altura de los hombros, con los codos flexionados y las palmas hacia adelante.
Paso 3: Empuje una mancuerna por encima de la cabeza, extendiendo completamente el brazo.
Paso 4: Baje la mancuerna de nuevo a la altura del hombro.
Paso 5: Repita con el otro brazo.
Paso 6: Continúe alternando los brazos para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell lying extension (across face)
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on a bench with your feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell in each hand and extend your arms straight up above your chest, palms facing each other.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arms stationary, slowly lower the dumbbells by bending your elbows until they are near your ears.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then contract your triceps to bring the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell lying triceps extension (skull crusher)
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on a bench with your feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell in each hand and extend your arms straight up above your chest, palms facing each other.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arms stationary, slowly lower the dumbbells by bending your elbows until they are near your ears.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then contract your triceps to bring the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Extensión de tríceps acostado con mancuernas (rompecráneos)
instructions: Paso 1: Acuéstese en un banco con los pies apoyados en el suelo.
Paso 2: Sostenga una mancuerna en cada mano y extienda los brazos rectos sobre su pecho, con las palmas enfrentadas.
Paso 3: Manteniendo la parte superior de los brazos inmóvil, baje lentamente las mancuernas flexionando los codos hasta que estén cerca de sus orejas.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa, luego contraiga sus tríceps para llevar las mancuernas de vuelta a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: smith single leg split squat
instructions: Step:1 Stand in front of the smith machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Place one foot behind you on a bench or step, with your toes pointing forward.
Step:3 Position the smith machine bar on your upper back for stability.
Step:4 Bend your front knee and lower your body down into a lunge position, keeping your back straight.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push through your front heel to return to the starting position.
