Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch legs.

translations.name: smith single leg split squat
instructions: Step:1 Stand in front of the smith machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Place one foot behind you on a bench or step, with the top of your foot resting on it.
Step:3 Position the smith machine bar on your upper back.
Step:4 Bend your front knee and lower your body down into a lunge position, keeping your back straight.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push through your front heel to return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch legs.

translations.name: Sentadilla búlgara a una pierna en máquina Smith
instructions: Paso 1: Párese frente a la máquina Smith con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros.
Paso 2: Coloque un pie detrás de usted en un banco o escalón, con la parte superior del pie apoyada.
Paso 3: Coloque la barra de la máquina Smith en la parte superior de su espalda.
Paso 4: Flexione la rodilla delantera y baje su cuerpo a una posición de zancada, manteniendo la espalda recta.
Paso 5: Haga una pausa en la parte inferior, luego empuje con el talón delantero para volver a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambie de pierna.

name: kneeling jump squat
instructions: Step:1 Start by kneeling on the ground with your feet hip-width apart and your toes tucked under.
Step:2 Hold a barbell across your back, resting it on your shoulders.
Step:3 Engage your core and glutes, then explosively jump up into a low squat position.
Step:4 As you jump, push through your toes and fully extend your hips and knees.
Step:5 Land softly in the squat position.
Step:6 Carefully return to the kneeling position and repeat.

translations.name: kneeling jump squat
instructions: Step:1 Start by kneeling on the ground with your feet hip-width apart and your toes tucked under.
Step:2 Hold a barbell across your back, resting it on your shoulders.
Step:3 Engage your core and glutes, then explosively jump up into a low squat position.
Step:4 As you jump, push through your toes and fully extend your hips and knees.
Step:5 Land softly in the squat position.
Step:6 Carefully return to the kneeling position and repeat.

translations.name: Sentadilla con salto desde rodillas
instructions: Paso 1: Comience arrodillado en el suelo con los pies separados a la altura de las caderas y los dedos de los pies metidos debajo.
Paso 2: Sostenga una barra sobre su espalda, apoyándola en sus hombros.
Paso 3: Active su core y glúteos, luego salte explosivamente a una posición de sentadilla baja.
Paso 4: Al saltar, empuje con los dedos de los pies y extienda completamente las caderas y las rodillas.
Paso 5: Aterrice suavemente en la posición de sentadilla.
Paso 6: Vuelva con cuidado a la posición de rodillas y repita.

name: scapula dips
instructions: Step:1 Support yourself on parallel bars or a dip station with your arms straight.
Step:2 Keeping your arms straight, depress your shoulders to lower your body slightly.
Step:3 Then, elevate your shoulders to raise your body back up.
Step:4 The movement should only come from your shoulder blades.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: scapular dips
instructions: Step:1 Support yourself on parallel bars or a dip station with your arms straight.
Step:2 Keeping your arms straight, depress your shoulders to lower your body slightly.
Step:3 Then, elevate your shoulders to raise your body back up.
Step:4 The movement should only come from your shoulder blades.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Fondos escapulares
instructions: Paso 1: Apóyese en barras paralelas o una estación de fondos con los brazos rectos.
Paso 2: Manteniendo los brazos rectos, deprima los hombros para bajar ligeramente el cuerpo.
Paso 3: Luego, eleve los hombros para volver a subir el cuerpo.
Paso 4: El movimiento debe provenir únicamente de sus omóplatos.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: cable front shoulder raise
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and grasp the cable handle with an overhand grip.
Step:2 Keep your back straight and your core engaged.
Step:3 Raise the cable handle in front of you, keeping your arms straight and your palms facing down.
Step:4 Continue lifting until your arms are parallel to the floor.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the cable handle back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: cable front raise
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and grasp a straight bar attached to a low pulley with an overhand grip.
Step:2 Keep your back straight and your core engaged.
Step:3 Raise the bar in front of you, keeping your arms straight, until your arms are parallel to the floor.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the bar back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Elevación frontal con polea
instructions: Paso 1: Párese con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y agarre una barra recta unida a una polea baja con un agarre prono.
Paso 2: Mantenga la espalda recta y el core activado.
Paso 3: Levante la barra frente a usted, manteniendo los brazos rectos, hasta que sus brazos estén paralelos al suelo.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa en la parte superior, luego baje lentamente la barra a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: hack one leg calf raise
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the hack squat machine to an appropriate weight.
Step:2 Stand on the platform with one foot, placing the ball of your foot on the edge. Keep the other foot off the platform.
Step:3 Rest your shoulders under the pads.
Step:4 Raise your heel as high as possible, lifting the weight.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your heel back down below the platform's edge.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.
Step:7 Switch legs and repeat the exercise.

translations.name: hack machine one leg calf raise
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the hack squat machine to an appropriate weight.
Step:2 Stand on the platform with one foot, placing the ball of your foot on the edge. Keep the other foot off the platform.
Step:3 Rest your shoulders under the pads.
Step:4 Raise your heel as high as possible, lifting the weight.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your heel back down below the platform's edge.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.
Step:7 Switch legs and repeat the exercise.

translations.name: Elevación de talón a una pierna en máquina hack
instructions: Paso 1: Ajuste la máquina de sentadilla hack a un peso apropiado.
Paso 2: Párese en la plataforma con un pie, colocando la parte delantera del pie en el borde. Mantenga el otro pie fuera de la plataforma.
Paso 3: Apoye los hombros debajo de las almohadillas.
Paso 4: Levante el talón lo más alto posible, levantando el peso.
Paso 5: Haga una pausa en la parte superior, luego baje lentamente el talón por debajo del borde de la plataforma.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.
Paso 7: Cambie de pierna y repita el ejercicio.

name: dumbbell incline inner biceps curl
instructions: Step:1 Sit on an incline bench with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing each other.
Step:2 Rest your upper arms on the bench, allowing your elbows to hang down.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arms stationary, exhale and curl the weights while contracting your biceps.
Step:4 Continue to raise the dumbbells until your biceps are fully contracted and the dumbbells are at shoulder level.
Step:5 Hold the contracted position for a brief pause as you squeeze your biceps.
Step:6 Inhale and slowly begin to lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell incline inner biceps curl
instructions: Step:1 Sit on an incline bench with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing forward.
Step:2 Let your arms hang straight down, perpendicular to the floor.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arms stationary, exhale and curl the weights, focusing on the inner head of the biceps.
Step:4 Continue to raise the dumbbells until your biceps are fully contracted and the dumbbells are at shoulder level.
Step:5 Hold the contracted position for a brief pause as you squeeze your biceps.
Step:6 Inhale and slowly begin to lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Curl de bíceps interno inclinado con mancuernas
instructions: Paso 1: Siéntese en un banco inclinado con una mancuerna en cada mano, con las palmas hacia adelante.
Paso 2: Deje que sus brazos cuelguen rectos, perpendiculares al suelo.
Paso 3: Manteniendo la parte superior de los brazos inmóvil, exhale y suba las pesas, concentrándose en la cabeza interna del bíceps.
Paso 4: Continúe levantando las mancuernas hasta que sus bíceps estén completamente contraídos y las mancuernas estén a la altura de los hombros.
Paso 5: Mantenga la posición contraída por un momento mientras aprieta los bíceps.
Paso 6: Inhale y comience a bajar lentamente las mancuernas a la posición inicial.
Paso 7: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell one arm reverse spider curl
instructions: Step:1 Lie face down on an incline bench, holding a dumbbell in one hand with an overhand (pronated) grip.
Step:2 Let the arm hang straight down, perpendicular to the floor.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arm stationary, curl the dumbbell up towards your shoulder.
Step:4 Pause, then slowly lower the dumbbell.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired reps, then switch arms.

translations.name: dumbbell one arm reverse spider curl
instructions: Step:1 Lie face down on an incline bench, holding a dumbbell in one hand with an overhand (pronated) grip.
Step:2 Let the arm hang straight down, perpendicular to the floor.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arm stationary, curl the dumbbell up towards your shoulder.
Step:4 Pause, then slowly lower the dumbbell.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired reps, then switch arms.

translations.name: Curl araña inverso a un brazo con mancuerna
instructions: Paso 1: Acuéstese boca abajo en un banco inclinado, sosteniendo una mancuerna en una mano con un agarre prono.
Paso 2: Deje que el brazo cuelgue recto, perpendicular al suelo.
Paso 3: Manteniendo la parte superior del brazo inmóvil, suba la mancuerna hacia su hombro.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa, luego baje lentamente la mancuerna.
Paso 5: Repita para las repeticiones deseadas, luego cambie de brazo.

name: barbell palms down wrist curl over a bench
instructions: Step:1 Kneel in front of a flat bench.
Step:2 Hold a barbell with an overhand grip (palms down), hands shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Rest your forearms on the bench, with your wrists hanging off the edge.
Step:4 Slowly lower the barbell by flexing your wrists.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then slowly raise the barbell back up by extending your wrists.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: barbell reverse wrist curl over a bench
instructions: Step:1 Kneel in front of a flat bench.
Step:2 Hold a barbell with an overhand grip (palms down), hands shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Rest your forearms on the bench, with your wrists hanging off the edge.
Step:4 Slowly lower the barbell by flexing your wrists.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then slowly raise the barbell back up by extending your wrists.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Curl de muñeca inverso con barra sobre banco
instructions: Paso 1: Arrodíllese frente a un banco plano.
Paso 2: Sostenga una barra con un agarre prono (palmas hacia abajo), con las manos separadas al ancho de los hombros.
Paso 3: Apoye los antebrazos en el banco, con las muñecas colgando del borde.
Paso 4: Baje lentamente la barra flexionando las muñecas.
Paso 5: Haga una pausa en la parte inferior, luego levante lentamente la barra extendiendo las muñecas.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: bodyweight standing one arm row
instructions: Step:1 Stand facing a sturdy vertical pole or door frame.
Step:2 Grab it with one hand at chest height.
Step:3 Lean back until your arm is straight, with your feet close to the anchor point.
Step:4 Engage your core and pull your chest towards your hand, squeezing your shoulder blade.
Step:5 Slowly return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat, then switch sides.

translations.name: bodyweight standing one arm row
instructions: Step:1 Stand facing a sturdy vertical pole or door frame.
Step:2 Grab it with one hand at chest height.
Step:3 Lean back until your arm is straight, with your feet close to the anchor point.
Step:4 Engage your core and pull your chest towards your hand, squeezing your shoulder blade.
Step:5 Slowly return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat, then switch sides.

translations.name: Remo de pie a un brazo con peso corporal
instructions: Paso 1: Párese frente a un poste vertical resistente o el marco de una puerta.
Paso 2: Agárrelo con una mano a la altura del pecho.
Paso 3: Inclínese hacia atrás hasta que su brazo esté recto, con los pies cerca del punto de anclaje.
Paso 4: Active su core y jale su pecho hacia su mano, apretando el omóplato.
Paso 5: Regrese lentamente a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita, luego cambie de lado.

name: one arm towel row
instructions: Step:1 Loop a towel around a sturdy anchor point.
Step:2 Stand facing the anchor. Grab both ends of the towel with one hand.
Step:3 Hinge at the hips with your back straight and lean back.
Step:4 Pull the towel towards your chest, squeezing your shoulder blade.
Step:5 Slowly return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

translations.name: one arm towel row
instructions: Step:1 Loop a towel around a sturdy anchor point.
Step:2 Stand facing the anchor. Grab both ends of the towel with one hand.
Step:3 Hinge at the hips with your back straight and lean back.
Step:4 Pull the towel towards your chest, squeezing your shoulder blade.
Step:5 Slowly return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

translations.name: Remo a un brazo con toalla
instructions: Paso 1: Pase una toalla alrededor de un punto de anclaje resistente.
Paso 2: Párese frente al anclaje. Agarre ambos extremos de la toalla con una mano.
Paso 3: Inclínese desde las caderas con la espalda recta y échese hacia atrás.
Paso 4: Jale la toalla hacia su pecho, apretando el omóplato.
Paso 5: Regrese lentamente a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambie de brazo.

name: ski step
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Bend your knees slightly and keep your back straight.
Step:3 Jump to the right, landing on your right foot while swinging your left leg behind your right leg.
Step:4 Immediately jump to the left, landing on your left foot while swinging your right leg behind your left leg.
Step:5 Continue alternating jumps from side to side, mimicking a skiing motion.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: skater jumps
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Bend your knees slightly and keep your back straight.
Step:3 Jump to the right, landing on your right foot while swinging your left leg behind your right leg.
Step:4 Immediately jump to the left, landing on your left foot while swinging your right leg behind your left leg.
Step:5 Continue alternating jumps from side to side.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Saltos de patinador
instructions: Paso 1: Párese con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros.
Paso 2: Flexione ligeramente las rodillas y mantenga la espalda recta.
Paso 3: Salte hacia la derecha, aterrizando sobre su pie derecho mientras balancea su pierna izquierda detrás de su pierna derecha.
Paso 4: Salte inmediatamente hacia la izquierda, aterrizando sobre su pie izquierdo mientras balancea su pierna derecha detrás de su pierna izquierda.
Paso 5: Continúe alternando saltos de lado a lado.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: chair leg extended stretch
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the edge of a chair with your back straight.
Step:2 Extend one leg straight out in front of you, keeping your heel on the ground.
Step:3 Lean forward from your hips, feeling a stretch in your hamstring.
Step:4 Hold this position for 20-30 seconds.
Step:5 Switch legs and repeat the stretch.

translations.name: seated hamstring stretch
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the edge of a chair with your back straight.
Step:2 Extend one leg straight out in front of you, keeping your heel on the ground.
Step:3 Lean forward from your hips, feeling a stretch in your hamstring.
Step:4 Hold this position for 20-30 seconds.
Step:5 Switch legs and repeat the stretch.

translations.name: Estiramiento de isquiotibiales sentado
instructions: Paso 1: Siéntese en el borde de una silla con la espalda recta.
Paso 2: Extienda una pierna recta frente a usted, manteniendo el talón en el suelo.
Paso 3: Inclínese hacia adelante desde las caderas, sintiendo un estiramiento en el isquiotibial.
Paso 4: Mantenga esta posición durante 20-30 segundos.
Paso 5: Cambie de pierna y repita el estiramiento.

name: single arm push-up
instructions: Step:1 Start in a push-up position but with your feet wide for balance.
Step:2 Place one hand on the floor under your shoulder and the other hand on your lower back.
Step:3 Lower your body until your chest is close to the floor, keeping your core tight.
Step:4 Push back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

translations.name: single arm push-up
instructions: Step:1 Start in a push-up position but with your feet wide for balance.
Step:2 Place one hand on the floor under your shoulder and the other hand on your lower back.
Step:3 Lower your body until your chest is close to the floor, keeping your core tight.
Step:4 Push back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

translations.name: Flexión a un brazo
instructions: Paso 1: Comience en una posición de flexión pero con los pies bien separados para mantener el equilibrio.
Paso 2: Coloque una mano en el suelo debajo de su hombro y la otra mano en la parte baja de su espalda.
Paso 3: Baje su cuerpo hasta que su pecho esté cerca del suelo, manteniendo el core apretado.
Paso 4: Empuje para volver a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambie de brazo.

name: barbell decline wide-grip press
instructions: Step:1 Lie on a decline bench with your feet secured and your head lower than your hips.
Step:2 Grasp the barbell with a wide grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Lower the barbell to your chest, keeping your elbows out to the sides.
Step:4 Push the barbell back up to the starting position, fully extending your arms.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: barbell decline wide-grip press
instructions: Step:1 Lie on a decline bench with your feet secured and your head lower than your hips.
Step:2 Grasp the barbell with a wide grip, wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Lower the barbell to your lower chest, keeping your elbows out to the sides.
Step:4 Push the barbell back up to the starting position, fully extending your arms.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Press declinado con barra y agarre ancho
instructions: Paso 1: Acuéstese en un banco declinado con los pies asegurados y la cabeza más baja que las caderas.
Paso 2: Agarre la barra con un agarre ancho, más separado que el ancho de los hombros.
Paso 3: Baje la barra hacia la parte inferior de su pecho, manteniendo los codos hacia los lados.
Paso 4: Empuje la barra de nuevo a la posición inicial, extendiendo completamente los brazos.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: band one arm overhead biceps curl
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and place one end of the band under your foot.
Step:2 Hold the other end of the band with your arm fully extended overhead, palm facing forward.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arm stationary, curl your forearm towards your shoulder, squeezing your biceps.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your forearm back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

translations.name: band one arm overhead biceps curl
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and place one end of the band under your foot.
Step:2 Hold the other end of the band with your arm fully extended overhead, palm facing forward.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arm stationary, curl your forearm towards your shoulder, squeezing your biceps.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your forearm back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

translations.name: Curl de bíceps sobre la cabeza a un brazo con banda
instructions: Paso 1: Párese con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y coloque un extremo de la banda debajo de su pie.
Paso 2: Sostenga el otro extremo de la banda con el brazo completamente extendido por encima de la cabeza, con la palma hacia adelante.
Paso 3: Manteniendo la parte superior del brazo inmóvil, flexione el antebrazo hacia el hombro, apretando los bíceps.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa en la parte superior, luego baje lentamente el antebrazo a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambie de brazo.

name: cable overhead curl
instructions: Step:1 Attach a straight bar to a high pulley.
Step:2 Stand facing the machine and grab the bar with an underhand grip, hands shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Step back slightly and raise your elbows so your upper arms are parallel to the floor.
Step:4 Keeping your upper arms stationary, curl the bar towards your forehead.
Step:5 Squeeze your biceps at the peak of the contraction, then slowly return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: cable high pulley curl
instructions: Step:1 Attach a straight bar to a high pulley.
Step:2 Stand facing the machine and grab the bar with an underhand grip, hands shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Step back slightly and raise your elbows so your upper arms are parallel to the floor.
Step:4 Keeping your upper arms stationary, curl the bar towards your forehead.
Step:5 Squeeze your biceps at the peak of the contraction, then slowly return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Curl en polea alta
instructions: Paso 1: Enganche una barra recta a una polea alta.
Paso 2: Párese frente a la máquina y agarre la barra con un agarre supino, con las manos separadas al ancho de los hombros.
Paso 3: Dé un paso atrás ligeramente y levante los codos para que la parte superior de sus brazos quede paralela al suelo.
Paso 4: Manteniendo la parte superior de los brazos inmóvil, suba la barra hacia su frente.
Paso 5: Apriete los bíceps en el punto máximo de contracción, luego regrese lentamente a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell lying one arm deltoid rear
instructions: Step:1 Lie face down on a flat bench with a dumbbell in one hand, palm facing inwards.
Step:2 Extend your arm straight down towards the floor, keeping it close to your body.
Step:3 Raise your arm up and out to the side in an arc, squeezing your rear deltoid.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your arm back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

translations.name: dumbbell lying one arm rear deltoid raise
instructions: Step:1 Lie face down on a flat bench with a dumbbell in one hand, palm facing inwards.
Step:2 Let your arm hang straight down towards the floor.
Step:3 Raise your arm up and out to the side in an arc, squeezing your rear deltoid.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your arm back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

translations.name: Elevación para deltoides posterior acostado a un brazo con mancuerna
instructions: Paso 1: Acuéstese boca abajo en un banco plano con una mancuerna en una mano, con la palma hacia adentro.
Paso 2: Deje que su brazo cuelgue recto hacia el suelo.
Paso 3: Levante su brazo hacia arriba y hacia el lado en un arco, apretando su deltoides posterior.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa en la parte superior, luego baje lentamente el brazo a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambie de brazo.

name: cable pulldown bicep curl
instructions: Step:1 Attach a straight bar to the high pulley of a cable machine.
Step:2 Stand facing the machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Grasp the bar with an underhand grip, hands shoulder-width apart.
Step:4 Keep your elbows high and your upper arms parallel to the floor.
Step:5 Exhale and slowly curl the bar down towards your face.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the bottom of the movement, squeezing your biceps.
Step:7 Inhale and slowly return the bar to the starting position.
Step:8 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: cable high pulley bicep curl
instructions: Step:1 Attach a straight bar to the high pulley of a cable machine.
Step:2 Stand facing the machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Grasp the bar with an underhand grip, hands shoulder-width apart.
Step:4 Keep your elbows high and your upper arms parallel to the floor.
Step:5 Exhale and slowly curl the bar towards your face.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the peak of the contraction, squeezing your biceps.
Step:7 Inhale and slowly return the bar to the starting position.
Step:8 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Curl de bíceps en polea alta
instructions: Paso 1: Enganche una barra recta a la polea alta de una máquina de cables.
Paso 2: Párese frente a la máquina con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros.
Paso 3: Agarre la barra con un agarre supino, con las manos separadas al ancho de los hombros.
Paso 4: Mantenga los codos altos y la parte superior de sus brazos paralela al suelo.
Paso 5: Exhale y suba lentamente la barra hacia su cara.
Paso 6: Haga una pausa en el punto máximo de contracción, apretando los bíceps.
Paso 7: Inhale y regrese lentamente la barra a la posición inicial.
Paso 8: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: cable side bend
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and grasp the low cable handle with one hand.
Step:2 Keep your back straight and your core engaged.
Step:3 Slowly bend sideways at the waist, away from the machine.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat on the other side.
Step:6 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: cable side bend
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your side to a low pulley cable machine and grasp the handle with your hand.
Step:2 Keep your back straight and your core engaged.
Step:3 Slowly bend sideways at the waist, away from the machine.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then return to the starting position.
Step:5 Complete all reps on one side, then switch to the other side.

translations.name: Inclinación lateral en polea
instructions: Paso 1: Párese de lado a una máquina de polea baja y agarre la manija con la mano.
Paso 2: Mantenga la espalda recta y el core activado.
Paso 3: Inclínese lentamente hacia el lado, alejándose de la máquina.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa por un momento, luego regrese a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Complete todas las repeticiones de un lado, luego cambie al otro lado.

name: lever reverse grip preacher curl
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and position yourself on the leverage machine.
Step:2 Grasp the handles with a reverse (overhand) grip, palms facing down.
Step:3 Rest your upper arms on the preacher pad, ensuring your elbows are fully extended.
Step:4 Keeping your upper arms stationary, exhale and curl the handles towards your shoulders.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top of the movement, squeezing your biceps and forearms.
Step:6 Inhale and slowly lower the handles back to the starting position, fully extending your elbows.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: lever reverse grip preacher curl
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and position yourself on the leverage machine.
Step:2 Grasp the handles with a reverse (overhand) grip, palms facing down.
Step:3 Rest your upper arms on the preacher pad, ensuring your elbows are fully extended.
Step:4 Keeping your upper arms stationary, exhale and curl the handles towards your shoulders.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top of the movement, squeezing your biceps and forearms.
Step:6 Inhale and slowly lower the handles back to the starting position, fully extending your elbows.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Curl predicador con agarre inverso en máquina de palanca
instructions: Paso 1: Ajuste la altura del asiento y colóquese en la máquina de palanca.
Paso 2: Agarre las manijas con un agarre inverso (prono), con las palmas hacia abajo.
Paso 3: Apoye la parte superior de los brazos en la almohadilla del predicador, asegurándose de que los codos estén completamente extendidos.
Paso 4: Manteniendo la parte superior de los brazos inmóvil, exhale y suba las manijas hacia sus hombros.
Paso 5: Haga una pausa en la parte superior del movimiento, apretando los bíceps y los antebrazos.
Paso 6: Inhale y baje lentamente las manijas a la posición inicial, extendiendo completamente los codos.
Paso 7: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: kettlebell seesaw press
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a kettlebell in each hand at shoulder height.
Step:2 Press one kettlebell overhead while keeping the other kettlebell at shoulder height.
Step:3 Lower the pressed kettlebell back to shoulder height while simultaneously pressing the other kettlebell overhead.
Step:4 Continue alternating the pressing motion, creating a seesaw-like movement.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: kettlebell seesaw press
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a kettlebell in each hand at shoulder height.
Step:2 Press one kettlebell overhead while keeping the other kettlebell at shoulder height.
Step:3 Lower the pressed kettlebell back to shoulder height while simultaneously pressing the other kettlebell overhead.
Step:4 Continue alternating the pressing motion, creating a seesaw-like movement.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Press de balancín con kettlebell
instructions: Paso 1: Párese con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros, sosteniendo una kettlebell en cada mano a la altura de los hombros.
Paso 2: Empuje una kettlebell por encima de la cabeza mientras mantiene la otra a la altura del hombro.
Paso 3: Baje la kettlebell que empujó de nuevo a la altura del hombro mientras simultáneamente empuja la otra por encima de la cabeza.
Paso 4: Continúe alternando el movimiento de presión, creando un movimiento similar a un balancín.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: barbell one arm floor press
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back on the floor with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Hold the barbell with one hand, palm facing forward, and extend your arm straight up over your chest.
Step:3 Slowly lower the barbell towards your chest, stopping when your upper arm touches the floor.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push the barbell back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

translations.name: barbell one arm floor press
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back on the floor with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Hold the barbell with one hand, palm facing forward, and extend your arm straight up over your chest.
Step:3 Slowly lower the barbell towards your chest, stopping when your upper arm touches the floor.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push the barbell back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

translations.name: Press de suelo a un brazo con barra
instructions: Paso 1: Acuéstese boca arriba en el suelo con las rodillas flexionadas y los pies apoyados en el suelo.
Paso 2: Sostenga la barra con una mano, con la palma hacia adelante, y extienda el brazo recto sobre su pecho.
Paso 3: Baje lentamente la barra hacia su pecho, deteniéndose cuando la parte superior de su brazo toque el suelo.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa por un momento en la parte inferior, luego empuje la barra hacia arriba a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambie de brazo.

name: dumbbell one arm standing curl
instructions: Step:1 Stand up straight with a dumbbell in one hand, palm facing forward and arm fully extended.
Step:2 Keeping your upper arm stationary, exhale and curl the weight upward while contracting your biceps.
Step:3 Continue to raise the dumbbell until your biceps are fully contracted and the dumbbell is at shoulder level.
Step:4 Hold the contracted position for a brief pause as you squeeze your biceps.
Step:5 Inhale and slowly lower the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

translations.name: dumbbell one arm standing curl
instructions: Step:1 Stand up straight with a dumbbell in one hand, palm facing forward and arm fully extended.
Step:2 Keeping your upper arm stationary, exhale and curl the weight upward while contracting your biceps.
Step:3 Continue to raise the dumbbell until your biceps are fully contracted and the dumbbell is at shoulder level.
Step:4 Hold the contracted position for a brief pause as you squeeze your biceps.
Step:5 Inhale and slowly lower the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

translations.name: Curl de pie a un brazo con mancuerna
instructions: Paso 1: Párese derecho con una mancuerna en una mano, con la palma hacia adelante y el brazo completamente extendido.
Paso 2: Manteniendo la parte superior del brazo inmóvil, exhale y suba la pesa mientras contrae los bíceps.
Paso 3: Continúe levantando la mancuerna hasta que sus bíceps estén completamente contraídos y la mancuerna esté a la altura del hombro.
Paso 4: Mantenga la posición contraída por un momento mientras aprieta los bíceps.
Paso 5: Inhale y baje lentamente la mancuerna a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambie de brazo.

name: roller body saw
instructions: Step:1 Start in a plank position with your forearms on the roller and your body in a straight line.
Step:2 Engage your core and slowly roll the roller forward, extending your body as far as you can while maintaining control.
Step:3 Pause for a moment at the furthest point, then slowly roll the roller back towards your starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: roller body saw
instructions: Step:1 Start in a plank position with your forearms on the roller and your body in a straight line.
Step:2 Engage your core and slowly move your body forward and backward, rolling the roller along your forearms.
Step:3 Keep your body straight and avoid letting your hips sag.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Sierra corporal con rodillo
instructions: Paso 1: Comience en una posición de plancha con los antebrazos sobre el rodillo y el cuerpo en línea recta.
Paso 2: Active su core y mueva lentamente su cuerpo hacia adelante y hacia atrás, rodando el rodillo a lo largo de sus antebrazos.
Paso 3: Mantenga el cuerpo recto y evite que sus caderas se caigan.
Paso 4: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: cable one arm reverse preacher curl
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the cable machine so the pulley is at the lowest position and attach a handle.
Step:2 Sit on a preacher bench, placing your upper arm against the pad.
Step:3 Grasp the handle with an overhand (reverse) grip.
Step:4 Slowly curl the handle towards your shoulder, keeping your upper arm stationary.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, squeezing your bicep and forearm.
Step:6 Slowly lower the handle back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

translations.name: cable one arm reverse preacher curl
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the cable machine so the pulley is at the lowest position and attach a handle.
Step:2 Sit on a preacher bench, placing your upper arm against the pad.
Step:3 Grasp the handle with an overhand (reverse) grip.
Step:4 Slowly curl the handle towards your shoulder, keeping your upper arm stationary.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, squeezing your bicep and forearm.
Step:6 Slowly lower the handle back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

translations.name: Curl predicador inverso a un brazo en polea
instructions: Paso 1: Ajuste la máquina de poleas para que la polea esté en la posición más baja y enganche un agarre.
Paso 2: Siéntese en un banco predicador, colocando la parte superior de su brazo contra la almohadilla.
Paso 3: Agarre la manija con un agarre prono (inverso).
Paso 4: Suba lentamente la manija hacia su hombro, manteniendo la parte superior del brazo inmóvil.
Paso 5: Haga una pausa por un momento, apretando el bíceps y el antebrazo.
Paso 6: Baje lentamente la manija a la posición inicial.
Paso 7: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambie de brazo.

name: jackknife sit-up
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your legs extended and your arms overhead.
Step:2 Engage your core and lift your legs and upper body simultaneously, reaching your hands towards your toes.
Step:3 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your legs and upper body back down to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: jackknife sit-up
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your legs extended and your arms overhead.
Step:2 Engage your core and lift your legs and upper body simultaneously, reaching your hands towards your toes, forming a 'V' shape with your body.
Step:3 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your legs and upper body back down to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Abdominales en V (Jackknife)
instructions: Paso 1: Acuéstese boca arriba con las piernas extendidas y los brazos por encima de la cabeza.
Paso 2: Active su core y levante las piernas y la parte superior del cuerpo simultáneamente, llevando las manos hacia los dedos de los pies, formando una 'V' con su cuerpo.
Paso 3: Haga una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, luego baje lentamente las piernas y la parte superior del cuerpo a la posición inicial.
Paso 4: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: sled 45° leg press (back pov)
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the leg press machine with your back against the backrest and your feet shoulder-width apart on the footplate.
Step:2 Grip the handles on the sides of the seat for stability.
Step:3 Push the footplate away from your body by extending your legs, keeping your heels on the footplate.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the fully extended position.
Step:5 Slowly bend your knees and lower the footplate back towards your body, controlling the movement.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: sled 45° leg press (back pov)
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the leg press machine with your back against the backrest and your feet shoulder-width apart on the footplate.
Step:2 Grip the handles on the sides of the seat for stability.
Step:3 Push the footplate away from your body by extending your legs, keeping your heels on the footplate.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the fully extended position.
Step:5 Slowly bend your knees and lower the footplate back towards your body, controlling the movement.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Prensa de piernas a 45° (vista trasera)
instructions: Paso 1: Siéntese en la máquina de prensa de piernas con la espalda contra el respaldo y los pies separados al ancho de los hombros sobre la plataforma.
Paso 2: Agarre las manijas a los lados del asiento para mayor estabilidad.
Paso 3: Empuje la plataforma lejos de su cuerpo extendiendo las piernas, manteniendo los talones en la plataforma.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa por un momento en la posición de extensión total.
Paso 5: Flexione lentamente las rodillas y baje la plataforma de nuevo hacia su cuerpo, controlando el movimiento.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: barbell jump squat
instructions: Step:1 Start by standing with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a barbell across your back.
Step:2 Lower your body into a squat position by bending your knees and pushing your hips back.
Step:3 Once you reach the bottom of the squat, explode upwards by jumping off the ground.
Step:4 As you jump, extend your hips, knees, and ankles, pushing through your toes.
Step:5 Land softly back into the squat position and immediately repeat the movement for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: barbell jump squat
instructions: Step:1 Start by standing with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a barbell across your upper back.
Step:2 Lower your body into a squat position by bending your knees and pushing your hips back.
Step:3 Once you reach the bottom of the squat, explode upwards by jumping off the ground.
Step:4 As you jump, extend your hips, knees, and ankles.
Step:5 Land softly back into the squat position and immediately repeat the movement.

translations.name: Sentadilla con salto y barra
instructions: Paso 1: Comience de pie con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros, sosteniendo una barra sobre la parte superior de su espalda.
Paso 2: Baje su cuerpo a una posición de sentadilla flexionando las rodillas y empujando las caderas hacia atrás.
Paso 3: Una vez que llegue al final de la sentadilla, explote hacia arriba saltando del suelo.
Paso 4: Al saltar, extienda sus caderas, rodillas y tobillos.
Paso 5: Aterrice suavemente de nuevo en la posición de sentadilla y repita inmediatamente el movimiento.

name: weighted tricep dips
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the edge of a bench or chair with your hands gripping the edge next to your hips. Place a weight on your lap.
Step:2 Slide your butt off the front of the bench with your legs extended in front of you.
Step:3 Keep your back close to the bench and your elbows slightly bent.
Step:4 Lower your body by bending your elbows until your upper arms are parallel to the floor.
Step:5 Push yourself back up to the starting position by straightening your arms.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: weighted tricep dips
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the edge of a bench or chair with your hands gripping the edge next to your hips. Place a weight on your lap.
Step:2 Slide your butt off the front of the bench with your legs extended in front of you.
Step:3 Keep your back close to the bench.
Step:4 Lower your body by bending your elbows until your upper arms are parallel to the floor.
Step:5 Push yourself back up to the starting position by straightening your arms.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Fondos de tríceps con peso
instructions: Paso 1: Siéntese en el borde de un banco o silla con las manos agarrando el borde junto a sus caderas. Coloque un peso en su regazo.
Paso 2: Deslice sus glúteos fuera del frente del banco con las piernas extendidas frente a usted.
Paso 3: Mantenga la espalda cerca del banco.
Paso 4: Baje su cuerpo flexionando los codos hasta que la parte superior de sus brazos esté paralela al suelo.
Paso 5: Empuje hacia arriba para volver a la posición inicial, enderezando los brazos.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: cable reverse-grip pushdown
instructions: Step:1 Attach a straight bar to a high pulley cable machine.
Step:2 Stand facing the machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Grasp the bar with an underhand grip, palms facing up, and your hands shoulder-width apart.
Step:4 Keep your elbows close to your sides and your upper arms stationary throughout the exercise.
Step:5 Using your triceps, push the bar down until your arms are fully extended and your triceps are contracted.
Step:6 Pause for a moment, then slowly return the bar to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: cable reverse-grip triceps pushdown
instructions: Step:1 Attach a straight bar to a high pulley cable machine.
Step:2 Stand facing the machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Grasp the bar with an underhand grip, palms facing up, and your hands shoulder-width apart.
Step:4 Keep your elbows close to your sides and your upper arms stationary throughout the exercise.
Step:5 Using your triceps, push the bar down until your arms are fully extended.
Step:6 Pause for a moment, then slowly return the bar to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Jalón de tríceps con agarre inverso en polea
instructions: Paso 1: Enganche una barra recta a una máquina de polea alta.
Paso 2: Párese frente a la máquina con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros.
Paso 3: Agarre la barra con un agarre supino, con las palmas hacia arriba y las manos separadas al ancho de los hombros.
Paso 4: Mantenga los codos cerca de los costados y la parte superior de los brazos inmóvil durante todo el ejercicio.
Paso 5: Usando sus tríceps, empuje la barra hacia abajo hasta que sus brazos estén completamente extendidos.
Paso 6: Haga una pausa por un momento, luego regrese lentamente la barra a la posición inicial.
Paso 7: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: resistance band seated biceps curl
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a chair or bench with your back straight and feet flat on the ground, stepping on the middle of the band.
Step:2 Hold the resistance band with an underhand grip, palms facing up, and arms extended down by your sides.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arms stationary, exhale and curl the resistance band up towards your shoulders.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, squeezing your biceps.
Step:5 Inhale and slowly lower the resistance band back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: resistance band seated biceps curl
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a chair or bench with your back straight and feet flat on the ground, stepping on the middle of the band.
Step:2 Hold the resistance band with an underhand grip, palms facing up, and arms extended down by your sides.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arms stationary, exhale and curl the resistance band up towards your shoulders.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, squeezing your biceps.
Step:5 Inhale and slowly lower the resistance band back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Curl de bíceps sentado con banda de resistencia
instructions: Paso 1: Siéntese en una silla o banco con la espalda recta y los pies apoyados en el suelo, pisando el centro de la banda.
Paso 2: Sostenga la banda de resistencia con un agarre supino, con las palmas hacia arriba, y los brazos extendidos a los lados.
Paso 3: Manteniendo la parte superior de los brazos inmóvil, exhale y suba la banda de resistencia hacia sus hombros.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa en la parte superior, apretando los bíceps.
Paso 5: Inhale y baje lentamente la banda de resistencia a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: barbell standing ab rollout
instructions: Step:1 Start by kneeling on the floor and hold the barbell with both hands in front of you.
Step:2 Engage your core and slowly roll the barbell forward, keeping your back straight and your arms extended.
Step:3 Continue rolling the barbell forward until your body is nearly parallel to the floor.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then slowly roll the barbell back towards your body, returning to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: barbell ab rollout
instructions: Step:1 Start by kneeling on the floor and hold the barbell with both hands in front of you.
Step:2 Engage your core and slowly roll the barbell forward, keeping your back straight and your arms extended.
Step:3 Continue rolling the barbell forward until your body is nearly parallel to the floor.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then slowly roll the barbell back towards your body, returning to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Ab rollout con barra
instructions: Paso 1: Comience arrodillado en el suelo y sostenga la barra con ambas manos frente a usted.
Paso 2: Active su core y ruede lentamente la barra hacia adelante, manteniendo la espalda recta y los brazos extendidos.
Paso 3: Continúe rodando la barra hacia adelante hasta que su cuerpo esté casi paralelo al suelo.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa, luego ruede lentamente la barra de regreso hacia su cuerpo, volviendo a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell bench press
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on a bench with your feet flat on the ground and your back pressed against the bench.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell in each hand, with your palms facing forward and your arms extended above your chest.
Step:3 Lower the dumbbells slowly to the sides of your chest, keeping your elbows at a 90-degree angle.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then push the dumbbells back up to the starting position, fully extending your arms.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell bench press
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on a bench with your feet flat on the ground and your back pressed against the bench.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell in each hand at chest level, with your palms facing forward.
Step:3 Push the dumbbells up until your arms are fully extended.
Step:4 Lower the dumbbells slowly to the sides of your chest.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Press de banca con mancuernas
instructions: Paso 1: Acuéstese en un banco con los pies apoyados en el suelo y la espalda presionada contra el banco.
Paso 2: Sostenga una mancuerna en cada mano a la altura del pecho, con las palmas hacia adelante.
Paso 3: Empuje las mancuernas hacia arriba hasta que sus brazos estén completamente extendidos.
Paso 4: Baje lentamente las mancuernas a los lados de su pecho.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell lying one arm press v. 2
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on a bench with your back supported and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell in one hand with your palm facing towards your feet.
Step:3 Extend your arm straight up towards the ceiling, keeping your elbow slightly bent.
Step:4 Slowly lower the dumbbell down towards your chest, keeping your elbow close to your body.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push the dumbbell back up to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch to the other arm.

translations.name: dumbbell lying one arm press v. 2
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on a bench with your back supported and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell in one hand with your palm facing forward.
Step:3 Press the dumbbell up until your arm is fully extended.
Step:4 Slowly lower the dumbbell down to your chest.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push the dumbbell back up to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch to the other arm.

translations.name: Press acostado a un brazo con mancuerna v. 2
instructions: Paso 1: Acuéstese en un banco con la espalda apoyada y los pies en el suelo.
Paso 2: Sostenga una mancuerna en una mano con la palma hacia adelante.
Paso 3: Empuje la mancuerna hacia arriba hasta que su brazo esté completamente extendido.
Paso 4: Baje lentamente la mancuerna hacia su pecho.
Paso 5: Haga una pausa en la parte inferior, luego empuje la mancuerna de nuevo a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambie al otro brazo.

name: dumbbell lying rear delt row
instructions: Step:1 Lie face down on an incline bench with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing inwards.
Step:2 Extend your arms straight down towards the floor, keeping a slight bend in your elbows.
Step:3 Engaging your back muscles, lift the dumbbells up and out to the sides, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbells back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell incline rear delt raise
instructions: Step:1 Lie face down on an incline bench with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing inwards.
Step:2 Let your arms hang straight down towards the floor.
Step:3 Raise the dumbbells up and out to the sides, keeping a slight bend in your elbows and squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbells back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Elevación para deltoides posterior inclinado con mancuernas
instructions: Paso 1: Acuéstese boca abajo en un banco inclinado con una mancuerna en cada mano, con las palmas hacia adentro.
Paso 2: Deje que sus brazos cuelguen rectos hacia el suelo.
Paso 3: Levante las mancuernas hacia arriba y hacia los lados, manteniendo una ligera flexión en los codos y apretando los omóplatos.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa en la parte superior, luego baje lentamente las mancuernas a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: cable decline one arm press
instructions: Step:1 Set up a decline bench and attach a handle to a low pulley.
Step:2 Lie on the bench and grab the handle with one hand.
Step:3 Position the handle at your chest with your arm bent.
Step:4 Press the handle up and away from your body until your arm is fully extended.
Step:5 Slowly lower the handle back to your chest.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

translations.name: cable decline one arm press
instructions: Step:1 Set up a decline bench and attach a handle to a low pulley.
Step:2 Lie on the bench and grab the handle with one hand.
Step:3 Position the handle at your chest with your arm bent.
Step:4 Press the handle up and away from your body until your arm is fully extended.
Step:5 Slowly lower the handle back to your chest.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

translations.name: Press declinado a un brazo en polea
instructions: Paso 1: Coloque un banco declinado y enganche un agarre a una polea baja.
Paso 2: Acuéstese en el banco y agarre la manija con una mano.
Paso 3: Coloque la manija a la altura de su pecho con el brazo flexionado.
Paso 4: Empuje la manija hacia arriba y lejos de su cuerpo hasta que su brazo esté completamente extendido.
Paso 5: Baje lentamente la manija de nuevo a su pecho.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambie de brazo.

name: lever one arm bent over row
instructions: Step:1 Stand facing the machine and grab one handle.
Step:2 Bend your knees slightly and hinge forward at the hips, keeping your back straight.
Step:3 Pull the handle towards your waist, squeezing your shoulder blade.
Step:4 Lower the handle back down to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides.

translations.name: lever one arm bent over row
instructions: Step:1 Stand facing the machine and grab one handle.
Step:2 Bend your knees slightly and hinge forward at the hips, keeping your back straight.
Step:3 Pull the handle towards your waist, squeezing your shoulder blade.
Step:4 Lower the handle back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides.

translations.name: Remo inclinado a un brazo en máquina de palanca
instructions: Paso 1: Párese frente a la máquina y agarre una manija.
Paso 2: Flexione ligeramente las rodillas e inclínese desde las caderas, manteniendo la espalda recta.
Paso 3: Jale la manija hacia su cintura, apretando el omóplato.
Paso 4: Baje la manija de nuevo a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambie de lado.

name: dumbbell seated bicep curl
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your feet flat on the ground and hold a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing up.
Step:2 Keep your back straight and your elbows close to your torso.
Step:3 Exhale and curl the dumbbells up towards your shoulders, contracting your biceps.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then inhale and slowly lower the dumbbells back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell seated bicep curl
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your feet flat on the ground and hold a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing up.
Step:2 Keep your back straight and your elbows close to your torso.
Step:3 Exhale and curl the dumbbells up towards your shoulders, contracting your biceps.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then inhale and slowly lower the dumbbells back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Curl de bíceps sentado con mancuernas
instructions: Paso 1: Siéntese en un banco con los pies apoyados en el suelo y sostenga una mancuerna en cada mano, con las palmas hacia arriba.
Paso 2: Mantenga la espalda recta y los codos cerca de su torso.
Paso 3: Exhale y suba las mancuernas hacia sus hombros, contrayendo los bíceps.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa en la parte superior, luego inhale y baje lentamente las mancuernas a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: cable reverse-grip straight back seated high row
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the seat facing the cable machine with your feet flat on the floor.
Step:2 Grasp the cable attachment with an underhand grip, palms facing up, and your hands shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Keep your back straight and lean slightly forward from your hips.
Step:4 Pull the cable towards your torso by retracting your shoulder blades and squeezing your back muscles.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the peak of the contraction, then slowly release the cable back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: cable reverse-grip straight back seated high row
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the seat facing the cable machine with your feet flat on the floor.
Step:2 Grasp the cable attachment with an underhand grip, palms facing up, and your hands shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Keep your back straight and your chest up.
Step:4 Pull the cable towards your upper abdomen by retracting your shoulder blades and squeezing your back muscles.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the peak of the contraction, then slowly release the cable back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Remo alto sentado con espalda recta y agarre inverso en polea
instructions: Paso 1: Siéntese en el asiento frente a la máquina de poleas con los pies apoyados en el suelo.
Paso 2: Agarre el accesorio de la polea con un agarre supino, con las palmas hacia arriba, y las manos separadas al ancho de los hombros.
Paso 3: Mantenga la espalda recta y el pecho erguido.
Paso 4: Jale la polea hacia la parte superior de su abdomen retrayendo los omóplatos y apretando los músculos de la espalda.
Paso 5: Haga una pausa en el punto máximo de contracción, luego suelte lentamente la polea a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: lever incline chest press v. 2
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and backrest angle on the leverage machine to a comfortable position.
Step:2 Sit on the machine with your back against the backrest and your feet flat on the floor.
Step:3 Grasp the handles with an overhand grip and position your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:4 Push the handles forward and away from your body until your arms are fully extended, but without locking your elbows.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the fully extended position, then slowly bend your elbows and lower the handles back towards your chest.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: lever incline chest press v. 2
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and backrest angle on the leverage machine.
Step:2 Sit on the machine with your back against the backrest and your feet flat on the floor.
Step:3 Grasp the handles with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:4 Push the handles forward and upward until your arms are fully extended.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then slowly lower the handles back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Press de pecho inclinado en máquina de palanca v. 2
instructions: Paso 1: Ajuste la altura del asiento y el ángulo del respaldo en la máquina de palanca.
Paso 2: Siéntese en la máquina con la espalda contra el respaldo y los pies apoyados en el suelo.
Paso 3: Agarre las manijas con un agarre prono, un poco más ancho que el ancho de los hombros.
Paso 4: Empuje las manijas hacia adelante y hacia arriba hasta que sus brazos estén completamente extendidos.
Paso 5: Haga una pausa, luego baje lentamente las manijas a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: incline close-grip push-up
instructions: Step:1 Place your hands on an elevated surface, such as a bench or step, closer than shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Extend your legs behind you, resting on the balls of your feet, with your body forming a straight line from head to heels.
Step:3 Lower your chest towards the elevated surface by bending your elbows, keeping them close to your sides.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push yourself back up to the starting position by straightening your arms.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: incline close-grip push-up
instructions: Step:1 Place your hands on an elevated surface, such as a bench or step, closer than shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Extend your legs behind you, with your body forming a straight line from head to heels.
Step:3 Lower your chest towards the surface by bending your elbows, keeping them close to your sides.
Step:4 Pause, then push yourself back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Flexión inclinada con agarre cerrado
instructions: Paso 1: Coloque las manos sobre una superficie elevada, como un banco o escalón, más juntas que el ancho de los hombros.
Paso 2: Extienda las piernas detrás de usted, con su cuerpo formando una línea recta desde la cabeza hasta los talones.
Paso 3: Baje el pecho hacia la superficie flexionando los codos, manteniéndolos cerca de los costados.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa, luego empuje hacia arriba para volver a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell decline shrug
instructions: Step:1 Set up a decline bench at a 45-degree angle.
Step:2 Lie face down on the bench with your chest and stomach resting against it.
Step:3 Hold a dumbbell in each hand with your arms fully extended towards the floor.
Step:4 Keeping your arms straight, raise your shoulders towards your ears as high as possible.
Step:5 Hold the contraction for a moment, then slowly lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell decline shrug
instructions: Step:1 Set up a decline bench at a 45-degree angle.
Step:2 Lie face down on the bench with your chest resting against it.
Step:3 Hold a dumbbell in each hand with your arms fully extended towards the floor.
Step:4 Keeping your arms straight, raise your shoulders towards your ears as high as possible.
Step:5 Hold the contraction for a moment, then slowly lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Encogimiento de hombros declinado con mancuernas
instructions: Paso 1: Coloque un banco declinado en un ángulo de 45 grados.
Paso 2: Acuéstese boca abajo en el banco con el pecho apoyado en él.
Paso 3: Sostenga una mancuerna en cada mano con los brazos completamente extendidos hacia el suelo.
Paso 4: Manteniendo los brazos rectos, levante los hombros hacia las orejas lo más alto posible.
Paso 5: Mantenga la contracción por un momento, luego baje lentamente las mancuernas a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: barbell lunge
instructions: Step:1 Start by standing with your feet shoulder-width apart and a barbell resting on your upper back.
Step:2 Take a step forward with your right foot, keeping your torso upright.
Step:3 Lower your body by bending your right knee until your thigh is parallel to the ground.
Step:4 Push through your right heel to return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat with your left leg, alternating legs for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: barbell lunge
instructions: Step:1 Start by standing with your feet shoulder-width apart and a barbell resting on your upper back.
Step:2 Take a step forward with your right foot, keeping your torso upright.
Step:3 Lower your body by bending your right knee until your thigh is parallel to the ground.
Step:4 Push through your right heel to return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat with your left leg, alternating legs for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Zancada con barra
instructions: Paso 1: Comience de pie con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y una barra descansando sobre la parte superior de su espalda.
Paso 2: Dé un paso hacia adelante con el pie derecho, manteniendo el torso erguido.
Paso 3: Baje su cuerpo flexionando la rodilla derecha hasta que su muslo esté paralelo al suelo.
Paso 4: Empuje con el talón derecho para volver a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita con la pierna izquierda, alternando las piernas para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: cable cross-over reverse fly
instructions: Step:1 Attach a D-handle to each low pulley and stand in the middle of the cable crossover machine.
Step:2 Grasp the handles with the opposite hands (left hand grabs right handle, right hand grabs left handle).
Step:3 Bend your knees slightly and hinge forward at the waist, keeping your back straight.
Step:4 With your arms extended and slightly bent, exhale and pull the cables out and back in a reverse fly motion, squeezing your shoulder blades.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then inhale and slowly return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: cable crossover reverse fly
instructions: Step:1 Attach a D-handle to each low pulley and stand in the middle of the cable crossover machine.
Step:2 Grasp the handles with the opposite hands (left hand grabs right handle, right hand grabs left handle).
Step:3 Bend your knees slightly and hinge forward at the waist, keeping your back straight.
Step:4 With your arms extended and slightly bent, exhale and pull the cables out and back in a reverse fly motion, squeezing your shoulder blades.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then inhale and slowly return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Apertura inversa en polea cruzada
instructions: Paso 1: Enganche un agarre en D a cada polea baja y párese en medio de la máquina de cruce de poleas.
Paso 2: Agarre las manijas con las manos opuestas (la mano izquierda agarra la manija derecha, la mano derecha agarra la manija izquierda).
Paso 3: Flexione ligeramente las rodillas e inclínese hacia adelante desde la cintura, manteniendo la espalda recta.
Paso 4: Con los brazos extendidos y ligeramente flexionados, exhale y jale las poleas hacia afuera y hacia atrás en un movimiento de apertura inversa, apretando los omóplatos.
Paso 5: Haga una pausa, luego inhale y regrese lentamente a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: barbell standing bradford press
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold the barbell in front of your shoulders with an overhand grip.
Step:2 Press the barbell overhead, but only high enough to clear your head.
Step:3 Lower the barbell behind your head.
Step:4 Press the barbell back over your head to the front starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: barbell standing bradford press
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold the barbell in front of your shoulders with an overhand grip.
Step:2 Press the barbell overhead, but only high enough to clear your head.
Step:3 Lower the barbell behind your head.
Step:4 Press the barbell back over your head to the front starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Press Bradford de pie con barra
instructions: Paso 1: Párese con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y sostenga la barra frente a sus hombros con un agarre prono.
Paso 2: Empuje la barra por encima de la cabeza, pero solo lo suficientemente alto como para pasar su cabeza.
Paso 3: Baje la barra por detrás de su cabeza.
Paso 4: Empuje la barra de nuevo por encima de su cabeza hasta la posición inicial en el frente.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: barbell thruster
instructions: Step:1 Start by standing with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a barbell at shoulder height with an overhand grip.
Step:2 Lower into a squat position by bending your knees and pushing your hips back.
Step:3 As you reach the bottom of the squat, explosively drive through your heels to stand up, simultaneously pressing the barbell overhead.
Step:4 Lower the barbell back to shoulder height as you lower back into the squat position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: barbell thruster
instructions: Step:1 Start by standing with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a barbell at shoulder height with an overhand grip.
Step:2 Lower into a full squat position.
Step:3 Explosively drive through your heels to stand up, simultaneously pressing the barbell overhead.
Step:4 Lower the barbell back to shoulder height as you descend into the next squat.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Thruster con barra
instructions: Paso 1: Comience de pie con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros, sosteniendo una barra a la altura de los hombros con un agarre prono.
Paso 2: Baje a una posición de sentadilla completa.
Paso 3: Empuje explosivamente con los talones para ponerse de pie, presionando simultáneamente la barra por encima de la cabeza.
Paso 4: Baje la barra de nuevo a la altura de los hombros mientras desciende a la siguiente sentadilla.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell supported squat
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a dumbbell in each hand at your sides.
Step:2 Keeping your chest up and core engaged, slowly lower your body down by bending your knees and pushing your hips back.
Step:3 Continue lowering until your thighs are parallel to the ground, or as low as you can comfortably go.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push through your heels to return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell squat
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a dumbbell in each hand at your sides.
Step:2 Keeping your chest up and core engaged, slowly lower your body down by bending your knees and pushing your hips back.
Step:3 Continue lowering until your thighs are parallel to the ground, or as low as you can comfortably go.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push through your heels to return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Sentadilla con mancuernas
instructions: Paso 1: Párese con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros, sosteniendo una mancuerna en cada mano a los costados.
Paso 2: Manteniendo el pecho erguido y el core activado, baje lentamente su cuerpo flexionando las rodillas y empujando las caderas hacia atrás.
Paso 3: Continúe bajando hasta que sus muslos estén paralelos al suelo, o tan bajo como pueda cómodamente.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa en la parte inferior, luego empuje con los talones para volver a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell seated bench extension
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your back straight and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell with both hands and extend your arms straight up above your head.
Step:3 Slowly lower the dumbbell behind your head, keeping your elbows close to your ears.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then raise the dumbbell back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: seated dumbbell overhead triceps extension
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your back straight and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell with both hands and extend your arms straight up above your head.
Step:3 Slowly lower the dumbbell behind your head, keeping your elbows close to your ears.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then raise the dumbbell back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Extensión de tríceps sobre la cabeza sentado con mancuerna
instructions: Paso 1: Siéntese en un banco con la espalda recta y los pies apoyados en el suelo.
Paso 2: Sostenga una mancuerna con ambas manos y extienda los brazos rectos por encima de su cabeza.
Paso 3: Baje lentamente la mancuerna detrás de su cabeza, manteniendo los codos cerca de sus orejas.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa, luego levante la mancuerna de nuevo a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: cable decline fly
instructions: Step:1 Attach D-handles to two low pulleys.
Step:2 Stand in the middle with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Hold the handles with your palms facing forward and your arms extended slightly bent.
Step:4 Lean forward slightly and bring your arms up and together in front of your lower chest in a wide arc.
Step:5 Squeeze your chest muscles at the peak of the movement, then slowly return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: cable low fly
instructions: Step:1 Attach D-handles to two low pulleys.
Step:2 Stand in the middle with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Hold the handles with your palms facing forward and your arms extended with a slight bend.
Step:4 Lean forward slightly and bring your arms up and together in front of your lower chest in a wide arc.
Step:5 Squeeze your chest muscles at the peak of the movement, then slowly return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Apertura baja en polea
instructions: Paso 1: Enganche agarres en D a dos poleas bajas.
Paso 2: Párese en el medio con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros.
Paso 3: Sostenga las manijas con las palmas hacia adelante y los brazos extendidos con una ligera flexión.
Paso 4: Inclínese ligeramente hacia adelante y junte los brazos hacia arriba frente a la parte inferior de su pecho en un arco amplio.
Paso 5: Apriete los músculos del pecho en el punto álgido del movimiento, luego regrese lentamente a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: barbell overhead squat
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and toes slightly turned out.
Step:2 Hold the barbell with a wide grip, positioning it overhead with your arms fully extended.
Step:3 Engage your core and lower your body down into a squat position, keeping your chest up and knees tracking over your toes.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push through your heels to return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: barbell overhead squat
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and toes slightly turned out.
Step:2 Hold the barbell with a wide grip, positioning it overhead with your arms fully extended.
Step:3 Engage your core and lower your body down into a squat, keeping your chest up and the bar directly over your midfoot.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push through your heels to return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Sentadilla sobre la cabeza con barra
instructions: Paso 1: Párese con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y las puntas de los pies ligeramente hacia afuera.
Paso 2: Sostenga la barra con un agarre ancho, colocándola sobre la cabeza con los brazos completamente extendidos.
Paso 3: Active su core y baje su cuerpo a una posición de sentadilla, manteniendo el pecho erguido y la barra directamente sobre la mitad de su pie.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa en la parte inferior, luego empuje con los talones para volver a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: barbell reverse grip decline bench press
instructions: Step:1 Lie on a decline bench with your feet secured and your head lower than your hips.
Step:2 Grasp the barbell with a reverse grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Unrack the barbell and lower it slowly towards your chest, keeping your elbows tucked in.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push the barbell back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: barbell reverse grip decline bench press
instructions: Step:1 Lie on a decline bench with your feet secured.
Step:2 Grasp the barbell with a reverse (underhand) grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Unrack the barbell and lower it slowly towards your lower chest, keeping your elbows tucked in.
Step:4 Pause, then push the barbell back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Press de banca declinado con barra y agarre inverso
instructions: Paso 1: Acuéstese en un banco declinado con los pies asegurados.
