Paso 2: Agarre la barra con un agarre inverso (supino), un poco más ancho que el ancho de los hombros.
Paso 3: Saque la barra del soporte y bájela lentamente hacia la parte inferior de su pecho, manteniendo los codos metidos.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa, luego empuje la barra de nuevo a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: weighted overhead crunch (on stability ball)
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a stability ball with your feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Lie back on the ball so your back is supported.
Step:3 Hold a weight plate or dumbbell with both hands and extend your arms overhead.
Step:4 Engage your abs and crunch your torso forward, bringing the weight towards your knees.
Step:5 Pause, then slowly lower your torso back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: weighted overhead crunch (on stability ball)
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a stability ball with your feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Lie back on the ball so your back is supported.
Step:3 Hold a weight plate or dumbbell with both hands and extend your arms overhead.
Step:4 Engage your abs and crunch your torso forward, bringing the weight towards your knees.
Step:5 Pause, then slowly lower your torso back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Crunch con peso sobre la cabeza (en balón de estabilidad)
instructions: Paso 1: Siéntese en un balón de estabilidad con los pies apoyados en el suelo.
Paso 2: Acuéstese sobre el balón para que su espalda quede apoyada.
Paso 3: Sostenga un disco o mancuerna con ambas manos y extienda los brazos por encima de la cabeza.
Paso 4: Active sus abdominales y flexione el torso hacia adelante, llevando el peso hacia las rodillas.
Paso 5: Haga una pausa, luego baje lentamente el torso a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: cable standing reverse grip one arm overhead tricep extension
instructions: Step:1 Stand facing away from a high pulley cable machine.
Step:2 Hold the cable handle with an underhand grip and extend your arm overhead, keeping your elbow close to your head.
Step:3 Keep your upper arm stationary and slowly lower the handle behind your head by bending your elbow.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then extend your arm back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

translations.name: cable standing reverse grip one arm overhead triceps extension
instructions: Step:1 Stand facing away from a high pulley cable machine.
Step:2 Hold the cable handle with an underhand grip and extend your arm overhead, keeping your elbow close to your head.
Step:3 Keep your upper arm stationary and slowly lower the handle behind your head by bending your elbow.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then extend your arm back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

translations.name: Extensión de tríceps sobre la cabeza a un brazo con agarre inverso en polea
instructions: Paso 1: Párese de espaldas a una máquina de polea alta.
Paso 2: Sostenga el agarre de la polea con un agarre supino y extienda el brazo por encima de la cabeza, manteniendo el codo cerca de la cabeza.
Paso 3: Mantenga la parte superior del brazo inmóvil y baje lentamente el agarre detrás de su cabeza flexionando el codo.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa en la parte inferior, luego extienda el brazo de nuevo a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambie de brazo.

name: barbell front chest squat
instructions: Step:1 Start by standing with your feet shoulder-width apart, toes slightly turned out.
Step:2 Hold the barbell in front of your chest with your hands crossed, resting the bar on your front shoulders.
Step:3 Engage your core and keep your chest up as you lower your body down into a squat position.
Step:4 Lower until your thighs are parallel to the ground, or as low as you can comfortably go.
Step:5 Push through your heels to return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: barbell front squat
instructions: Step:1 Start by standing with your feet shoulder-width apart, toes slightly turned out.
Step:2 Hold the barbell in front of your shoulders with a clean grip (fingertips under the bar, elbows high).
Step:3 Engage your core and keep your chest up as you lower your body into a squat.
Step:4 Lower until your thighs are parallel to the ground, or as low as you can comfortably go.
Step:5 Push through your heels to return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Sentadilla frontal con barra
instructions: Paso 1: Comience de pie con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y las puntas ligeramente hacia afuera.
Paso 2: Sostenga la barra frente a sus hombros con un agarre de cargada (puntas de los dedos debajo de la barra, codos altos).
Paso 3: Active su core y mantenga el pecho erguido mientras baja a una sentadilla.
Paso 4: Baje hasta que sus muslos estén paralelos al suelo, o tan bajo como pueda cómodamente.
Paso 5: Empuje con los talones para volver a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: exercise ball one leg prone lower body rotation
instructions: Step:1 Lie face down on the stability ball with your hips resting on the ball and your legs extended straight behind you.
Step:2 Place your hands on the ground in front of you for support.
Step:3 Engage your glutes and core muscles to stabilize your body.
Step:4 Slowly lift one leg off the ground, keeping it straight.
Step:5 Rotate your leg outward, away from your body, while keeping your hips and upper body stable.
Step:6 Pause, then slowly return your leg to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat the rotation with the other leg.
Step:8 Continue alternating legs for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: exercise ball one leg prone lower body rotation
instructions: Step:1 Lie face down on the stability ball with your hips resting on the ball and your legs extended straight behind you.
Step:2 Place your hands on the ground in front of you for support.
Step:3 Engage your glutes and core muscles to stabilize your body.
Step:4 Slowly lift one leg off the ground, keeping it straight.
Step:5 Rotate your leg outward from the hip, keeping your torso stable.
Step:6 Pause, then slowly return your leg to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat with the other leg.
Step:8 Continue alternating legs for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Rotación de la parte inferior del cuerpo prono a una pierna sobre balón de ejercicio
instructions: Paso 1: Acuéstese boca abajo sobre el balón de estabilidad con las caderas apoyadas en el balón y las piernas extendidas rectas detrás de usted.
Paso 2: Coloque las manos en el suelo frente a usted como apoyo.
Paso 3: Active sus glúteos y los músculos del core para estabilizar su cuerpo.
Paso 4: Levante lentamente una pierna del suelo, manteniéndola recta.
Paso 5: Rote la pierna hacia afuera desde la cadera, manteniendo el torso estable.
Paso 6: Haga una pausa, luego regrese lentamente la pierna a la posición inicial.
Paso 7: Repita con la otra pierna.
Paso 8: Continúe alternando las piernas para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: lever deadlift
instructions: Step:1 Stand on the foot platform with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Hinge at your hips and grab the handles.
Step:3 Keeping your back straight, drive through your heels to lift the weight.
Step:4 Extend your hips fully at the top, squeezing your glutes.
Step:5 Lower the weight back down in a controlled manner.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: lever deadlift
instructions: Step:1 Stand on the foot platform with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Hinge at your hips and grab the handles.
Step:3 Keeping your back straight, drive through your heels to lift the weight.
Step:4 Extend your hips fully at the top, squeezing your glutes.
Step:5 Lower the weight back down in a controlled manner.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Peso muerto en máquina de palanca
instructions: Paso 1: Párese en la plataforma para los pies con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros.
Paso 2: Inclínese desde las caderas y agarre las manijas.
Paso 3: Manteniendo la espalda recta, empuje con los talones para levantar el peso.
Paso 4: Extienda completamente las caderas en la parte superior, apretando los glúteos.
Paso 5: Baje el peso de manera controlada.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: exercise ball lower back stretch (pyramid)
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the stability ball with your feet flat on the ground and your knees bent at a 90-degree angle.
Step:2 Slowly walk your feet forward, rolling the ball down your back until your lower back is resting on the ball.
Step:3 Place your hands behind your head or cross them over your chest.
Step:4 Engage your core and slowly lower your upper body towards the ground, allowing your back to arch over the ball.
Step:5 Hold the stretch for a few seconds, then slowly return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: exercise ball lower back stretch
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the stability ball with your feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Slowly walk your feet forward, rolling the ball up your back until your lower back is supported.
Step:3 Place your hands behind your head or cross them over your chest.
Step:4 Gently arch your back over the ball to feel a stretch.
Step:5 Hold the stretch for 20-30 seconds.
Step:6 Repeat as needed.

translations.name: Estiramiento lumbar en balón de ejercicio
instructions: Paso 1: Siéntese en el balón de estabilidad con los pies apoyados en el suelo.
Paso 2: Camine lentamente con los pies hacia adelante, rodando el balón por su espalda hasta que su zona lumbar quede apoyada.
Paso 3: Coloque las manos detrás de la cabeza o crúcelas sobre el pecho.
Paso 4: Arquee suavemente la espalda sobre el balón para sentir un estiramiento.
Paso 5: Mantenga el estiramiento durante 20-30 segundos.
Paso 6: Repita según sea necesario.

name: assisted inverse leg curl
instructions: Step:1 Kneel on the floor and have a partner hold your ankles securely.
Step:2 Keep your body straight from your knees to your head.
Step:3 Slowly lower your torso towards the floor, controlling the movement with your hamstrings.
Step:4 Go as low as you can, then use your hands to push yourself back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: assisted nordic hamstring curl
instructions: Step:1 Kneel on the floor and have a partner hold your ankles securely.
Step:2 Keep your body straight from your knees to your head.
Step:3 Slowly lower your torso towards the floor, controlling the movement with your hamstrings.
Step:4 Go as low as you can, then use your hands to push yourself back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Curl nórdico de isquiotibiales asistido
instructions: Paso 1: Arrodíllese en el suelo y pida a un compañero que le sujete los tobillos firmemente.
Paso 2: Mantenga el cuerpo recto desde las rodillas hasta la cabeza.
Paso 3: Baje lentamente el torso hacia el suelo, controlando el movimiento con los isquiotibiales.
Paso 4: Baje todo lo que pueda, luego use las manos para empujarse de vuelta a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: chest stretch with exercise ball
instructions: Step:1 Kneel in front of an exercise ball.
Step:2 Place your forearms on the ball and lean forward.
Step:3 Gently press your chest towards the ball, feeling a stretch in your chest muscles.
Step:4 Hold the stretch for a few seconds, then slowly return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: chest stretch with exercise ball
instructions: Step:1 Kneel in front of an exercise ball.
Step:2 Place your forearms on the ball and lean forward.
Step:3 Gently press your chest towards the ball, feeling a stretch in your chest and shoulders.
Step:4 Hold the stretch for 20-30 seconds.
Step:5 Repeat as needed.

translations.name: Estiramiento de pecho con balón de ejercicio
instructions: Paso 1: Arrodíllese frente a un balón de ejercicio.
Paso 2: Coloque los antebrazos sobre el balón e inclínese hacia adelante.
Paso 3: Presione suavemente el pecho hacia el balón, sintiendo un estiramiento en el pecho y los hombros.
Paso 4: Mantenga el estiramiento durante 20-30 segundos.
Paso 5: Repita según sea necesario.

name: narrow push-up on exercise ball
instructions: Step:1 Place the stability ball on the ground and position yourself in a push-up position with your hands on the ball, slightly narrower than shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Engage your core and keep your body in a straight line from head to toe.
Step:3 Lower your chest towards the ball by bending your elbows, keeping them close to your body.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push yourself back up to the starting position by straightening your arms.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: narrow push-up on exercise ball
instructions: Step:1 Place the stability ball on the ground and position yourself in a push-up position with your hands on the ball, slightly narrower than shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Engage your core and keep your body in a straight line from head to toe.
Step:3 Lower your chest towards the ball by bending your elbows, keeping them close to your body.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push yourself back up to the starting position by straightening your arms.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Flexión cerrada sobre balón de ejercicio
instructions: Paso 1: Coloque el balón de estabilidad en el suelo y póngase en posición de flexión con las manos sobre el balón, un poco más juntas que el ancho de los hombros.
Paso 2: Active su core y mantenga su cuerpo en línea recta de la cabeza a los pies.
Paso 3: Baje el pecho hacia el balón flexionando los codos, manteniéndolos cerca del cuerpo.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa en la parte inferior, luego empuje hacia arriba para volver a la posición inicial, enderezando los brazos.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: barbell split squat v. 2
instructions: Step:1 Start by standing with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a barbell across your back.
Step:2 Take a large step forward with your right foot, keeping your torso upright.
Step:3 Lower your body by bending your knees and hips until your right thigh is parallel to the ground.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then push through your right heel to return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat with your left leg forward for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: barbell split squat v. 2
instructions: Step:1 Start by standing with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a barbell across your upper back.
Step:2 Take a large step forward with your right foot.
Step:3 Lower your body by bending both knees until your front thigh is parallel to the ground and your back knee is just above the floor.
Step:4 Push through your front heel to return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat all reps on one side before switching to the other.

translations.name: Sentadilla dividida con barra v. 2
instructions: Paso 1: Comience de pie con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros, sosteniendo una barra sobre la parte superior de su espalda.
Paso 2: Dé un gran paso hacia adelante con su pie derecho.
Paso 3: Baje su cuerpo flexionando ambas rodillas hasta que su muslo delantero esté paralelo al suelo y su rodilla trasera esté justo por encima del suelo.
Paso 4: Empuje con el talón delantero para volver a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita todas las repeticiones de un lado antes de cambiar al otro.

name: standing wheel rollout
instructions: Step:1 Start by standing tall with your feet shoulder-width apart and the wheel roller in front of you.
Step:2 Bend at your waist and slowly roll the wheel forward, keeping your back straight and your core engaged.
Step:3 Continue rolling forward until you feel a stretch in your abs and your body is extended as far as possible.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then slowly roll the wheel back towards your body, returning to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: standing wheel rollout
instructions: Step:1 Start by standing tall with your feet shoulder-width apart and the wheel roller in front of you.
Step:2 Bend at your hips and slowly roll the wheel forward, keeping your back straight and your core engaged.
Step:3 Roll out as far as you can while maintaining a straight line from your head to your heels.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then use your core to slowly roll the wheel back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Ab rollout de pie con rueda
instructions: Paso 1: Comience de pie con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y la rueda abdominal frente a usted.
Paso 2: Inclínese desde las caderas y ruede lentamente la rueda hacia adelante, manteniendo la espalda recta y el core activado.
Paso 3: Ruede hacia adelante tanto como pueda mientras mantiene una línea recta desde la cabeza hasta los talones.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa, luego use su core para rodar lentamente la rueda de regreso a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: plyo push up
instructions: Step:1 Start in a high plank position with your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Lower your chest towards the ground by bending your elbows, keeping your body in a straight line.
Step:3 Push explosively off the ground, using your chest muscles to propel your upper body off the ground.
Step:4 Land softly with your hands back in the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: plyometric push-up
instructions: Step:1 Start in a high plank position with your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Lower your chest towards the ground.
Step:3 Push explosively off the ground, so your hands leave the floor.
Step:4 Land softly with your elbows slightly bent and immediately lower into the next repetition.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Flexión pliométrica
instructions: Paso 1: Comience en una posición de plancha alta con las manos un poco más separadas que el ancho de los hombros.
Paso 2: Baje el pecho hacia el suelo.
Paso 3: Empuje explosivamente desde el suelo, de modo que sus manos se despeguen del piso.
Paso 4: Aterrice suavemente con los codos ligeramente flexionados y baje inmediatamente a la siguiente repetición.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: run (equipment)
instructions: Step:1 Start by standing upright with your feet hip-width apart.
Step:2 Engage your core and keep your upper body relaxed.
Step:3 Begin jogging in place, lifting your knees up towards your chest and landing softly on the balls of your feet.
Step:4 Maintain a steady pace and continue jogging for the desired duration or distance.
Step:5 Remember to breathe deeply and maintain good posture throughout the exercise.

translations.name: running
instructions: Step:1 Start by standing upright with your feet hip-width apart.
Step:2 Engage your core and keep your upper body relaxed.
Step:3 Begin running at a comfortable pace, landing on your midfoot and pushing off with your toes.
Step:4 Maintain a steady pace and continue for the desired duration or distance.
Step:5 Remember to breathe deeply and maintain good posture throughout the exercise.

translations.name: Correr
instructions: Paso 1: Comience de pie con los pies separados a la altura de las caderas.
Paso 2: Active su core y mantenga la parte superior del cuerpo relajada.
Paso 3: Comience a correr a un ritmo cómodo, aterrizando en la parte media del pie y empujando con los dedos.
Paso 4: Mantenga un ritmo constante y continúe durante la duración o distancia deseada.
Paso 5: Recuerde respirar profundamente y mantener una buena postura durante todo el ejercicio.

name: stalder press
instructions: Step:1 Start in a seated straddle position with your hands on the floor between your legs.
Step:2 Press through your hands, lifting your hips off the floor while keeping your legs straight and in a straddle.
Step:3 Continue pressing until you are in a handstand.
Step:4 Slowly lower your body back down to the starting position with control.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: stalder press
instructions: Step:1 Start in a seated straddle position with your hands on the floor between your legs.
Step:2 Press through your hands, lifting your hips off the floor while keeping your legs straight and in a straddle.
Step:3 Continue pressing until you are in a handstand.
Step:4 Slowly lower your body back down to the starting position with control.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Press Stalder
instructions: Paso 1: Comience en una posición de 'straddle' (piernas abiertas) sentado con las manos en el suelo entre las piernas.
Paso 2: Empuje con las manos, levantando las caderas del suelo mientras mantiene las piernas rectas y abiertas.
Paso 3: Continúe empujando hasta que esté en una parada de manos (pino).
Paso 4: Baje lentamente su cuerpo de vuelta a la posición inicial con control.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell standing biceps curl
instructions: Step:1 Stand up straight with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing forward and arms fully extended.
Step:2 Keeping your upper arms stationary, exhale and curl the weights while contracting your biceps.
Step:3 Continue to raise the dumbbells until your biceps are fully contracted and the dumbbells are at shoulder level.
Step:4 Hold the contracted position for a brief pause as you squeeze your biceps.
Step:5 Inhale and slowly begin to lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell standing biceps curl
instructions: Step:1 Stand up straight with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing forward and arms fully extended.
Step:2 Keeping your upper arms stationary, exhale and curl the weights while contracting your biceps.
Step:3 Continue to raise the dumbbells until your biceps are fully contracted and the dumbbells are at shoulder level.
Step:4 Hold the contracted position for a brief pause as you squeeze your biceps.
Step:5 Inhale and slowly begin to lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Curl de bíceps de pie con mancuernas
instructions: Paso 1: Párese derecho con una mancuerna en cada mano, con las palmas hacia adelante y los brazos completamente extendidos.
Paso 2: Manteniendo la parte superior de los brazos inmóvil, exhale y suba las pesas mientras contrae los bíceps.
Paso 3: Continúe levantando las mancuernas hasta que sus bíceps estén completamente contraídos y las mancuernas estén a la altura del hombro.
Paso 4: Mantenga la posición contraída por un momento mientras aprieta los bíceps.
Paso 5: Inhale y comience a bajar lentamente las mancuernas a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: band bicycle crunch
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your hands behind your head and your knees bent. Loop a resistance band around your feet.
Step:2 Lift your feet off the ground and bring your right knee towards your chest while twisting your torso to bring your left elbow towards your right knee.
Step:3 Straighten your right leg while bringing your left knee towards your chest and twisting your torso to bring your right elbow towards your left knee.
Step:4 Continue alternating this motion, feeling the resistance from the band.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: band bicycle crunch
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your hands behind your head and your knees bent. Loop a resistance band around your feet.
Step:2 Lift your feet off the ground and bring your right knee towards your chest while simultaneously twisting your torso to bring your left elbow towards your right knee.
Step:3 Straighten your right leg while bringing your left knee towards your chest and twisting your torso to bring your right elbow towards your left knee.
Step:4 Continue alternating this motion, feeling the resistance from the band.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Crunch bicicleta con banda
instructions: Paso 1: Acuéstese boca arriba con las manos detrás de la cabeza y las rodillas flexionadas. Coloque una banda de resistencia alrededor de sus pies.
Paso 2: Levante los pies del suelo y lleve la rodilla derecha hacia el pecho mientras gira el torso para llevar el codo izquierdo hacia la rodilla derecha.
Paso 3: Estire la pierna derecha mientras lleva la rodilla izquierda hacia el pecho y gira el torso para llevar el codo derecho hacia la rodilla izquierda.
Paso 4: Continúe alternando este movimiento, sintiendo la resistencia de la banda.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: barbell low bar squat
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and place the barbell on your back, resting it on your rear deltoids.
Step:2 Keeping your chest up and core engaged, slowly lower your body by bending your knees and pushing your hips back.
Step:3 Continue lowering until your thighs are parallel to the ground or slightly below.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then push through your heels to return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: barbell low bar squat
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and place the barbell on your back, resting it on your rear deltoids.
Step:2 Keeping your chest up and core engaged, slowly lower your body by bending your knees and pushing your hips back.
Step:3 Continue lowering until your thighs are parallel to the ground or slightly below.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then push through your heels to return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Sentadilla con barra baja
instructions: Paso 1: Párese con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y coloque la barra en su espalda, descansando sobre sus deltoides posteriores.
Paso 2: Manteniendo el pecho erguido y el core activado, baje lentamente su cuerpo flexionando las rodillas y empujando las caderas hacia atrás.
Paso 3: Continúe bajando hasta que sus muslos estén paralelos al suelo o ligeramente por debajo.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa por un momento, luego empuje con los talones para volver a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: cable palm rotational row
instructions: Step:1 Attach a handle to a cable machine at waist height.
Step:2 Stand facing the machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Grasp the handle with an overhand grip, palms facing down.
Step:4 Step back to create tension on the cable, keeping your back straight and knees slightly bent.
Step:5 Pull the handle towards your body, rotating your palm to face upwards as you pull.
Step:6 Squeeze your shoulder blades together at the end of the movement.
Step:7 Slowly release the handle back to the starting position.
Step:8 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: cable rotational row
instructions: Step:1 Attach a handle to a cable machine at waist height.
Step:2 Stand facing the machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Grasp the handle with an overhand grip, palms facing down.
Step:4 Step back to create tension on the cable, keeping your back straight and knees slightly bent.
Step:5 Pull the handle towards your body, rotating your palm to face upwards as you pull.
Step:6 Squeeze your shoulder blades together at the end of the movement.
Step:7 Slowly return to the starting position, rotating your palm back down.
Step:8 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Remo con rotación en polea
instructions: Paso 1: Enganche un agarre a una máquina de poleas a la altura de la cintura.
Paso 2: Párese frente a la máquina con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros.
Paso 3: Agarre la manija con un agarre prono, con las palmas hacia abajo.
Paso 4: Dé un paso atrás para crear tensión en la polea, manteniendo la espalda recta y las rodillas ligeramente flexionadas.
Paso 5: Jale la manija hacia su cuerpo, girando la palma de la mano hacia arriba mientras jala.
Paso 6: Apriete los omóplatos al final del movimiento.
Paso 7: Regrese lentamente a la posición inicial, girando la palma de la mano de nuevo hacia abajo.
Paso 8: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: cable standing pulldown (with rope)
instructions: Step:1 Attach a rope to the cable machine at the highest setting.
Step:2 Stand facing the machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Grasp the rope with an overhand grip, palms facing down.
Step:4 Keep your back straight and core engaged throughout the exercise.
Step:5 Pull the rope down towards your thighs, keeping your arms straight and squeezing your lats.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then slowly release the rope back up.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: cable standing straight arm pulldown (with rope)
instructions: Step:1 Attach a rope to the cable machine at the highest setting.
Step:2 Stand facing the machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Grasp the rope with an overhand grip, palms facing down.
Step:4 Keep your back straight and core engaged throughout the exercise.
Step:5 Pull the rope down towards your thighs, keeping your arms straight and squeezing your lats.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then slowly release the rope back up.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Jalón de brazo recto de pie con cuerda en polea
instructions: Paso 1: Enganche una cuerda a la máquina de poleas en la posición más alta.
Paso 2: Párese frente a la máquina con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros.
Paso 3: Agarre la cuerda con un agarre prono, con las palmas hacia abajo.
Paso 4: Mantenga la espalda recta y el core activado durante todo el ejercicio.
Paso 5: Jale la cuerda hacia sus muslos, manteniendo los brazos rectos y apretando los dorsales.
Paso 6: Haga una pausa por un momento en la parte inferior, luego suelte lentamente la cuerda hacia arriba.
Paso 7: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: band squat
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, with the band placed just above your knees.
Step:2 Keeping your chest up and core engaged, push your hips back and bend your knees to lower into a squat position.
Step:3 Make sure your knees are tracking over your toes and your weight is in your heels.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push through your heels to return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: band squat
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, with the band placed just above your knees.
Step:2 Keeping your chest up and core engaged, push your hips back and bend your knees to lower into a squat position.
Step:3 Make sure your knees are tracking over your toes and your weight is in your heels.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push through your heels to return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Sentadilla con banda
instructions: Paso 1: Párese con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros, con la banda colocada justo por encima de las rodillas.
Paso 2: Manteniendo el pecho erguido y el core activado, empuje las caderas hacia atrás y flexione las rodillas para bajar a una posición de sentadilla.
Paso 3: Asegúrese de que sus rodillas sigan la línea de los dedos de sus pies y que su peso esté en los talones.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa en la parte inferior, luego empuje con los talones para volver a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell reverse spider curl
instructions: Step:1 Lie face down on an incline bench, holding a dumbbell in each hand with an overhand (pronated) grip.
Step:2 Let your arms hang straight down, perpendicular to the floor.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arms stationary, curl the dumbbells up towards your shoulders.
Step:4 Pause, then slowly lower the dumbbells.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell reverse spider curl
instructions: Step:1 Lie face down on an incline bench, holding a dumbbell in each hand with an overhand (pronated) grip.
Step:2 Let your arms hang straight down, perpendicular to the floor.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arms stationary, curl the dumbbells up towards your shoulders.
Step:4 Pause, then slowly lower the dumbbells.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Curl araña inverso con mancuernas
instructions: Paso 1: Acuéstese boca abajo en un banco inclinado, sosteniendo una mancuerna en cada mano con un agarre prono.
Paso 2: Deje que sus brazos cuelguen rectos, perpendiculares al suelo.
Paso 3: Manteniendo la parte superior de los brazos inmóvil, suba las mancuernas hacia sus hombros.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa, luego baje lentamente las mancuernas.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: potty squat
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, toes pointing slightly outward.
Step:2 Lower your body by bending your knees and pushing your hips back as if you were sitting on a chair.
Step:3 Keep your chest up and your back straight throughout the movement.
Step:4 Lower yourself until your thighs are parallel to the ground or as low as you can comfortably go.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push through your heels to return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: bodyweight squat
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, toes pointing slightly outward.
Step:2 Lower your body by bending your knees and pushing your hips back as if you were sitting on a chair.
Step:3 Keep your chest up and your back straight throughout the movement.
Step:4 Lower yourself until your thighs are parallel to the ground or as low as you can comfortably go.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push through your heels to return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Sentadilla con peso corporal
instructions: Paso 1: Párese con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros, con las puntas de los pies ligeramente hacia afuera.
Paso 2: Baje su cuerpo flexionando las rodillas y empujando las caderas hacia atrás como si se sentara en una silla.
Paso 3: Mantenga el pecho erguido y la espalda recta durante todo el movimiento.
Paso 4: Baje hasta que sus muslos estén paralelos al suelo, o tan bajo como pueda cómodamente.
Paso 5: Haga una pausa en la parte inferior, luego empuje con los talones para volver a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: barbell wide reverse grip bench press
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on a bench with your feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Grasp the barbell with a wide reverse (underhand) grip, wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Lift the barbell off the rack and hold it directly above your chest with your arms fully extended.
Step:4 Lower the barbell slowly towards your chest, keeping your elbows tucked in.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then push it back up to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: barbell wide reverse grip bench press
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on a bench with your feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Grasp the barbell with a wide reverse (underhand) grip, wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Lift the barbell off the rack and hold it directly above your chest with your arms fully extended.
Step:4 Lower the barbell slowly towards your chest, keeping your elbows tucked in.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then push it back up to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Press de banca con agarre ancho e inverso
instructions: Paso 1: Acuéstese en un banco con los pies apoyados en el suelo.
Paso 2: Agarre la barra con un agarre ancho e inverso (supino), más separado que el ancho de los hombros.
Paso 3: Saque la barra del soporte y sosténgala directamente sobre su pecho con los brazos completamente extendidos.
Paso 4: Baje lentamente la barra hacia su pecho, manteniendo los codos metidos.
Paso 5: Haga una pausa por un momento, luego empújela de nuevo a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell one arm fly on exercise ball
instructions: Step:1 Sit on an exercise ball with a dumbbell in one hand and your feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Walk your feet forward and roll your body down until your upper back is resting on the ball.
Step:3 Extend your arm with the dumbbell straight up above your chest, palm facing inwards.
Step:4 Slowly lower the dumbbell out to the side in an arc, keeping a slight bend in your elbow.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then squeeze your chest muscles to bring the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

translations.name: dumbbell one arm fly on exercise ball
instructions: Step:1 Sit on an exercise ball with a dumbbell in one hand and your feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Walk your feet forward and roll your body down until your upper back is resting on the ball.
Step:3 Extend your arm with the dumbbell straight up above your chest, palm facing inwards.
Step:4 Slowly lower the dumbbell out to the side in an arc, keeping a slight bend in your elbow.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then squeeze your chest muscles to bring the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

translations.name: Apertura a un brazo sobre balón de ejercicio con mancuerna
instructions: Paso 1: Siéntese en un balón de ejercicio con una mancuerna en una mano y los pies apoyados en el suelo.
Paso 2: Camine con los pies hacia adelante y ruede su cuerpo hacia abajo hasta que la parte superior de su espalda descanse sobre el balón.
Paso 3: Extienda el brazo con la mancuerna recto sobre su pecho, con la palma hacia adentro.
Paso 4: Baje lentamente la mancuerna hacia el lado en un arco, manteniendo una ligera flexión en el codo.
Paso 5: Haga una pausa, luego apriete los músculos del pecho para llevar la mancuerna de vuelta a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambie de brazo.

name: dumbbell incline row
instructions: Step:1 Set up an incline bench at a 45-degree angle.
Step:2 Grab a dumbbell in each hand and lie face down on the bench.
Step:3 Extend your arms fully, allowing the dumbbells to hang straight down.
Step:4 Pull the dumbbells up towards your chest, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell incline row
instructions: Step:1 Set up an incline bench at a 45-degree angle.
Step:2 Grab a dumbbell in each hand and lie face down on the bench.
Step:3 Let your arms hang straight down, palms facing each other.
Step:4 Pull the dumbbells up towards your chest, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Remo inclinado con mancuernas
instructions: Paso 1: Coloque un banco inclinado en un ángulo de 45 grados.
Paso 2: Agarre una mancuerna en cada mano y acuéstese boca abajo en el banco.
Paso 3: Deje que sus brazos cuelguen rectos, con las palmas enfrentadas.
Paso 4: Jale las mancuernas hacia su pecho, apretando los omóplatos.
Paso 5: Haga una pausa en la parte superior, luego baje lentamente las mancuernas a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell standing one arm curl (over incline bench)
instructions: Step:1 Stand facing an incline bench, holding a dumbbell in one hand.
Step:2 Place your working arm over the bench so the back of your upper arm rests firmly against the pad.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arm stationary, curl the dumbbell towards your shoulder.
Step:4 Pause, then slowly lower the dumbbell.
Step:5 Repeat, then switch arms.

translations.name: dumbbell one arm preacher curl (over incline bench)
instructions: Step:1 Stand facing an incline bench, holding a dumbbell in one hand.
Step:2 Place your working arm over the bench so the back of your upper arm rests firmly against the pad.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arm stationary, curl the dumbbell towards your shoulder.
Step:4 Pause, then slowly lower the dumbbell.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired reps, then switch arms.

translations.name: Curl predicador a un brazo con mancuerna (sobre banco inclinado)
instructions: Paso 1: Párese frente a un banco inclinado, sosteniendo una mancuerna en una mano.
Paso 2: Coloque su brazo de trabajo sobre el banco de modo que la parte posterior de su brazo descanse firmemente sobre la almohadilla.
Paso 3: Manteniendo la parte superior del brazo inmóvil, suba la mancuerna hacia su hombro.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa, luego baje lentamente la mancuerna.
Paso 5: Repita para las repeticiones deseadas, luego cambie de brazo.

name: lying elbow to knee
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your hands behind your head.
Step:2 Lift your legs so your knees are bent at a 90-degree angle.
Step:3 Engage your abs and lift your upper body, bringing your right elbow towards your left knee while extending your right leg.
Step:4 Return to the center and repeat, bringing your left elbow towards your right knee and extending your left leg.
Step:5 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: bicycle crunch
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your hands behind your head.
Step:2 Lift your legs so your knees are bent at a 90-degree angle.
Step:3 Engage your abs and lift your upper body, bringing your right elbow towards your left knee while extending your right leg.
Step:4 Return to the center and repeat, bringing your left elbow towards your right knee and extending your left leg.
Step:5 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Crunch bicicleta
instructions: Paso 1: Acuéstese boca arriba con las manos detrás de la cabeza.
Paso 2: Levante las piernas de modo que las rodillas queden flexionadas en un ángulo de 90 grados.
Paso 3: Active sus abdominales y levante la parte superior del cuerpo, llevando el codo derecho hacia la rodilla izquierda mientras extiende la pierna derecha.
Paso 4: Vuelva al centro y repita, llevando el codo izquierdo hacia la rodilla derecha y extendiendo la pierna izquierda.
Paso 5: Continúe alternando lados para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: cable upright row
instructions: Step:1 Attach a straight bar to a low pulley.
Step:2 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, and hold the bar with an overhand grip, hands close together.
Step:3 Pull the bar straight up towards your chin, leading with your elbows.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, squeezing your shoulder blades.
Step:5 Slowly lower the bar back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: cable upright row
instructions: Step:1 Attach a straight bar to a low pulley.
Step:2 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, and hold the bar with an overhand grip, hands close together.
Step:3 Pull the bar straight up towards your chin, leading with your elbows.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, squeezing your shoulder blades.
Step:5 Slowly lower the bar back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Remo al mentón en polea
instructions: Paso 1: Enganche una barra recta a una polea baja.
Paso 2: Párese con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y sostenga la barra con un agarre prono, con las manos juntas.
Paso 3: Jale la barra directamente hacia su barbilla, liderando con los codos.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa en la parte superior, apretando los omóplatos.
Paso 5: Baje lentamente la barra a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: intermediate hip flexor and quad stretch
instructions: Step:1 Kneel on one knee, with your other foot flat on the floor in front of you.
Step:2 Lean forward, shifting your weight onto your front foot.
Step:3 You should feel a stretch in the front of your hip and thigh on the kneeling side.
Step:4 Hold the stretch for 20-30 seconds.
Step:5 Switch legs and repeat.

translations.name: kneeling hip flexor and quad stretch
instructions: Step:1 Kneel on one knee, with your other foot flat on the floor in front of you.
Step:2 Lean forward, shifting your weight onto your front foot.
Step:3 You should feel a stretch in the front of your hip and thigh on the kneeling side.
Step:4 Hold the stretch for 20-30 seconds.
Step:5 Switch legs and repeat.

translations.name: Estiramiento de flexor de cadera y cuádriceps de rodillas
instructions: Paso 1: Arrodíllese sobre una rodilla, con el otro pie apoyado en el suelo frente a usted.
Paso 2: Inclínese hacia adelante, trasladando su peso al pie delantero.
Paso 3: Debería sentir un estiramiento en la parte frontal de la cadera y el muslo del lado arrodillado.
Paso 4: Mantenga el estiramiento durante 20-30 segundos.
Paso 5: Cambie de pierna y repita.

name: lever chest press
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and position yourself on the machine with your back flat against the pad.
Step:2 Grasp the handles with an overhand grip and position your elbows at a 90-degree angle.
Step:3 Push the handles forward until your arms are fully extended, exhaling during the movement.
Step:4 Pause briefly at the end of the movement, then slowly return to the starting position, inhaling as you do so.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: lever chest press
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and position yourself on the machine with your back flat against the pad.
Step:2 Grasp the handles with an overhand grip and position your elbows at a 90-degree angle.
Step:3 Push the handles forward until your arms are fully extended, exhaling during the movement.
Step:4 Pause briefly at the end of the movement, then slowly return to the starting position, inhaling as you do so.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Press de pecho en máquina de palanca
instructions: Paso 1: Ajuste la altura del asiento y colóquese en la máquina con la espalda plana contra la almohadilla.
Paso 2: Agarre las manijas con un agarre prono y coloque los codos en un ángulo de 90 grados.
Paso 3: Empuje las manijas hacia adelante hasta que sus brazos estén completamente extendidos, exhalando durante el movimiento.
Paso 4: Haga una breve pausa al final del movimiento, luego regrese lentamente a la posición inicial, inhalando al hacerlo.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: chest dip
instructions: Step:1 Position yourself on parallel bars with your arms fully extended and your body straight.
Step:2 Lower your body by bending your elbows until your shoulders are below your elbows.
Step:3 Push yourself back up to the starting position by straightening your arms.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: chest dip
instructions: Step:1 Position yourself on parallel bars with your arms fully extended and your body straight.
Step:2 Lower your body by bending your elbows until your shoulders are below your elbows.
Step:3 Push yourself back up to the starting position by straightening your arms.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Fondos de pecho
instructions: Paso 1: Colóquese en barras paralelas con los brazos completamente extendidos y el cuerpo recto.
Paso 2: Baje su cuerpo flexionando los codos hasta que sus hombros estén por debajo de los codos.
Paso 3: Empuje hacia arriba para volver a la posición inicial, enderezando los brazos.
Paso 4: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: smith chair squat
instructions: Step:1 Place a chair or bench under the Smith machine bar.
Step:2 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, and place the bar across your upper back.
Step:3 Engage your core and lower your body as if sitting on the chair.
Step:4 Lightly touch the chair, then push through your heels to return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: smith chair squat
instructions: Step:1 Place a chair or bench under the Smith machine bar.
Step:2 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, and place the bar across your upper back.
Step:3 Engage your core and lower your body as if sitting on the chair.
Step:4 Lightly touch the chair, then push through your heels to return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Sentadilla a la silla en máquina Smith
instructions: Paso 1: Coloque una silla o banco debajo de la barra de la máquina Smith.
Paso 2: Párese con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y coloque la barra sobre la parte superior de su espalda.
Paso 3: Active su core y baje su cuerpo como si se sentara en la silla.
Paso 4: Toque ligeramente la silla, luego empuje con los talones para volver a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: one arm chin-up
instructions: Step:1 Grab a pull-up bar with an underhand grip, with one hand gripping the bar and the other hand holding your wrist for support.
Step:2 Hang from the bar with your arm fully extended, keeping your body straight and your core engaged.
Step:3 Pull yourself up towards the bar by bending your elbow and squeezing your back muscles.
Step:4 Continue pulling until your chin is above the bar, then slowly lower yourself back down.
Step:5 Repeat, then switch arms.

translations.name: one arm chin-up
instructions: Step:1 Grab a pull-up bar with an underhand grip, with one hand gripping the bar and the other hand holding your wrist for support.
Step:2 Hang from the bar with your arm fully extended, keeping your body straight and your core engaged.
Step:3 Pull yourself up towards the bar by bending your elbow and squeezing your back muscles.
Step:4 Continue pulling until your chin is above the bar, then slowly lower yourself back down.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

translations.name: Dominada a un brazo
instructions: Paso 1: Agarre una barra de dominadas con un agarre supino, con una mano agarrando la barra y la otra sujetando su muñeca para apoyarse.
Paso 2: Cuélguese de la barra con el brazo completamente extendido, manteniendo el cuerpo recto y el core activado.
Paso 3: Súbase hacia la barra flexionando el codo y apretando los músculos de la espalda.
Paso 4: Continúe subiendo hasta que su barbilla esté por encima de la barra, luego baje lentamente.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambie de brazo.

name: lever hammer grip preacher curl
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and position yourself on the machine.
Step:2 Place your upper arms on the preacher pad, ensuring your chest is pressed against it.
Step:3 Grasp the handles with a hammer grip (palms facing each other).
Step:4 Keeping your upper arms stationary, curl the handles towards your shoulders.
Step:5 Pause, squeezing your biceps.
Step:6 Slowly lower the handles back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: lever hammer grip preacher curl
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and position yourself on the machine.
Step:2 Place your upper arms on the preacher pad, ensuring your chest is pressed against it.
Step:3 Grasp the handles with a hammer grip (palms facing each other).
Step:4 Keeping your upper arms stationary, curl the handles towards your shoulders.
Step:5 Pause, squeezing your biceps.
Step:6 Slowly lower the handles back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Curl predicador con agarre martillo en máquina de palanca
instructions: Paso 1: Ajuste la altura del asiento y colóquese en la máquina.
Paso 2: Coloque la parte superior de sus brazos en la almohadilla del predicador, asegurándose de que su pecho esté presionado contra ella.
Paso 3: Agarre las manijas con un agarre martillo (palmas enfrentadas).
Paso 4: Manteniendo la parte superior de los brazos inmóvil, suba las manijas hacia sus hombros.
Paso 5: Haga una pausa, apretando los bíceps.
Paso 6: Baje lentamente las manijas a la posición inicial.
Paso 7: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell standing alternate overhead press
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a dumbbell in each hand at shoulder level with your palms facing forward.
Step:2 Press one dumbbell overhead, fully extending your arm.
Step:3 Lower the dumbbell back to shoulder level.
Step:4 Repeat with the other arm.
Step:5 Continue alternating arms for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell standing alternating press
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a dumbbell in each hand at shoulder level with your palms facing forward.
Step:2 Press one dumbbell overhead, fully extending your arm.
Step:3 Lower the dumbbell back to shoulder level.
Step:4 Repeat with the other arm.
Step:5 Continue alternating arms for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Press de hombro alterno de pie con mancuernas
instructions: Paso 1: Párese con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros, sosteniendo una mancuerna en cada mano a la altura de los hombros con las palmas hacia adelante.
Paso 2: Empuje una mancuerna por encima de la cabeza, extendiendo completamente el brazo.
Paso 3: Baje la mancuerna de nuevo a la altura del hombro.
Paso 4: Repita con el otro brazo.
Paso 5: Continúe alternando los brazos para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: overhead triceps stretch
instructions: Step:1 Stand or sit upright.
Step:2 Extend one arm overhead, then bend at the elbow so your hand reaches down your back.
Step:3 With your other hand, gently pull the elbow of the extended arm towards your head.
Step:4 Hold the stretch for 15-30 seconds.
Step:5 Repeat on the other side.

translations.name: overhead triceps stretch
instructions: Step:1 Stand or sit upright.
Step:2 Extend one arm overhead, then bend at the elbow so your hand reaches down your back.
Step:3 With your other hand, gently pull the elbow of the extended arm towards your head.
Step:4 Hold the stretch for 15-30 seconds.
Step:5 Repeat on the other side.

translations.name: Estiramiento de tríceps sobre la cabeza
instructions: Paso 1: Párese o siéntese erguido.
Paso 2: Extienda un brazo por encima de la cabeza, luego flexione el codo de modo que su mano baje por su espalda.
Paso 3: Con la otra mano, jale suavemente el codo del brazo extendido hacia su cabeza.
Paso 4: Mantenga el estiramiento durante 15-30 segundos.
Paso 5: Repita del otro lado.

name: weighted muscle up
instructions: Step:1 Hang from a pull-up bar with a weight attached to a dip belt.
Step:2 Engage your core and pull your body up explosively.
Step:3 As your chest approaches the bar, transition your grip and push your body up and over the bar, ending in a dip position.
Step:4 Extend your arms to complete the dip.
Step:5 Slowly lower yourself back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: weighted muscle up
instructions: Step:1 Hang from a pull-up bar with a weight attached to a dip belt.
Step:2 Engage your core and pull your body up explosively.
Step:3 As your chest approaches the bar, transition your grip and push your body up and over the bar, ending in a dip position.
Step:4 Extend your arms to complete the dip.
Step:5 Slowly lower yourself back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Muscle up con peso
instructions: Paso 1: Cuélguese de una barra de dominadas con un peso sujeto a un cinturón de lastre.
Paso 2: Active su core y suba su cuerpo explosivamente.
Paso 3: A medida que su pecho se acerca a la barra, haga la transición de su agarre y empuje su cuerpo hacia arriba y por encima de la barra, terminando en una posición de fondo.
Paso 4: Extienda los brazos para completar el fondo.
Paso 5: Baje lentamente de nuevo a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: lever calf press
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the machine and place the balls of your feet on the platform.
Step:2 Adjust the shoulder pads to rest comfortably on your shoulders.
Step:3 Push the platform down by extending your ankles, contracting your calf muscles.
Step:4 Pause at the bottom of the movement.
Step:5 Slowly return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: lever seated calf press
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the machine and place the balls of your feet on the platform.
Step:2 Adjust the shoulder pads to rest comfortably on your shoulders.
Step:3 Push the platform up by extending your ankles, contracting your calf muscles.
Step:4 Pause at the top of the movement.
Step:5 Slowly lower the weight back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Press de gemelos sentado en máquina de palanca
instructions: Paso 1: Siéntese en la máquina y coloque la parte delantera de sus pies en la plataforma.
Paso 2: Ajuste las almohadillas para que descansen cómodamente sobre sus hombros.
Paso 3: Empuje la plataforma hacia arriba extendiendo sus tobillos, contrayendo los músculos de los gemelos.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa en la parte superior del movimiento.
Paso 5: Baje lentamente el peso de nuevo a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell alternate biceps curl (with arm blaster)
instructions: Step:1 Stand up straight, holding a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing forward. Place the arm blaster on your upper arms.
Step:2 Keeping your upper arms stationary, curl one dumbbell towards your shoulder.
Step:3 Pause, then slowly lower the dumbbell.
Step:4 Repeat with the other arm.
Step:5 Continue alternating for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell alternate biceps curl (with arm blaster)
instructions: Step:1 Stand up straight, holding a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing forward. Place the arm blaster on your upper arms.
Step:2 Keeping your upper arms stationary, curl one dumbbell towards your shoulder.
Step:3 Pause, then slowly lower the dumbbell.
Step:4 Repeat with the other arm.
Step:5 Continue alternating for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Curl de bíceps alterno con mancuernas (con arm blaster)
instructions: Paso 1: Párese derecho, sosteniendo una mancuerna en cada mano, con las palmas hacia adelante. Coloque el 'arm blaster' en sus brazos.
Paso 2: Manteniendo la parte superior de los brazos inmóvil, suba una mancuerna hacia su hombro.
Paso 3: Haga una pausa, luego baje lentamente la mancuerna.
Paso 4: Repita con el otro brazo.
Paso 5: Continúe alternando para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: weighted svend press
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a weight plate in front of your chest with both hands.
Step:2 Keep your elbows slightly bent and your palms pressing against the plate.
Step:3 Squeeze the plate hard and press it straight out in front of you, fully extending your arms.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then slowly bring the plate back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: weighted Svend press
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a weight plate in front of your chest with both hands, pressing your palms together.
Step:2 Squeeze the plate hard between your hands and press it straight out in front of you until your arms are fully extended.
Step:3 Pause for a moment, focusing on the chest contraction, then slowly bring the plate back to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Press Svend con peso
instructions: Paso 1: Párese con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y sostenga un disco frente a su pecho con ambas manos, presionando las palmas juntas.
Paso 2: Apriete el disco con fuerza entre sus manos y empújelo recto frente a usted hasta que sus brazos estén completamente extendidos.
Paso 3: Haga una pausa por un momento, concentrándose en la contracción del pecho, luego regrese lentamente el disco a la posición inicial.
Paso 4: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: barbell squat jump step rear lunge
instructions: Step:1 Stand with a barbell across your upper back.
Step:2 Perform a squat, then jump explosively upwards.
Step:3 Land softly and immediately step one leg back into a reverse lunge.
Step:4 Push off your back foot to return to the starting squat position.
Step:5 Repeat the jump and lunge on the other leg.
Step:6 Continue alternating legs.

translations.name: barbell squat jump to reverse lunge
instructions: Step:1 Stand with a barbell across your upper back.
Step:2 Perform a squat, then jump explosively upwards.
Step:3 Land softly and immediately step one leg back into a reverse lunge.
Step:4 Push off your front foot to return to the starting position.
Step:5 Perform another squat jump and lunge on the other leg.
Step:6 Continue alternating legs.

translations.name: Sentadilla con salto a zancada inversa con barra
instructions: Paso 1: Párese con una barra sobre la parte superior de su espalda.
Paso 2: Realice una sentadilla y luego salte explosivamente hacia arriba.
Paso 3: Aterrice suavemente e inmediatamente dé un paso hacia atrás con una pierna para hacer una zancada inversa.
Paso 4: Empuje con el pie delantero para volver a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Realice otra sentadilla con salto y una zancada con la otra pierna.
Paso 6: Continúe alternando las piernas.

name: close-grip push-up (on knees)
instructions: Step:1 Start on your hands and knees, with your hands closer than shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Lower your upper body towards the ground by bending your elbows, keeping them close to your sides.
Step:3 Pause when your chest is just above the ground.
Step:4 Push through your palms to straighten your arms and return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: close-grip push-up (on knees)
instructions: Step:1 Start on your hands and knees, with your hands closer than shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Lower your upper body towards the ground by bending your elbows, keeping them close to your sides.
Step:3 Pause when your chest is just above the ground.
Step:4 Push through your palms to straighten your arms and return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Flexión con agarre cerrado (de rodillas)
instructions: Paso 1: Comience sobre sus manos y rodillas, con las manos más juntas que el ancho de los hombros.
Paso 2: Baje la parte superior del cuerpo hacia el suelo flexionando los codos, manteniéndolos cerca de los costados.
Paso 3: Haga una pausa cuando su pecho esté justo por encima del suelo.
Paso 4: Empuje con las palmas para enderezar los brazos y volver a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: cable reverse crunch
instructions: Step:1 Attach an ankle strap to a low pulley and lie on your back facing the machine.
Step:2 Attach the strap to your ankles.
Step:3 Bend your knees and lift your legs up, bringing your thighs towards your chest.
Step:4 Curl your pelvis up towards your chest, lifting your hips off the mat.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then slowly lower your hips back down.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: cable reverse crunch
instructions: Step:1 Attach an ankle strap to a low pulley and lie on your back facing the machine.
Step:2 Attach the strap to your ankles.
Step:3 Bend your knees and lift your legs up, bringing your thighs towards your chest.
Step:4 Curl your pelvis up towards your chest, lifting your hips off the mat, pulling against the cable's resistance.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then slowly lower your hips back down.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Crunch inverso en polea
instructions: Paso 1: Enganche una tobillera a una polea baja y acuéstese boca arriba frente a la máquina.
Paso 2: Colóquese la tobillera.
Paso 3: Flexione las rodillas y levante las piernas, llevando los muslos hacia el pecho.
Paso 4: Encoja la pelvis hacia el pecho, levantando las caderas de la colchoneta, tirando contra la resistencia de la polea.
Paso 5: Haga una pausa, luego baje lentamente las caderas.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: barbell one leg squat
instructions: Step:1 Stand with a barbell across your upper back.
Step:2 Lift one foot off the ground and extend it forward.
Step:3 Bend your standing leg and lower your body as if sitting back into a chair.
Step:4 Lower yourself until your thigh is parallel to the ground, then push through your heel to return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat, then switch legs.

translations.name: barbell one leg squat (pistol squat)
instructions: Step:1 Stand with a barbell across your upper back.
Step:2 Lift one foot off the ground and extend it forward.
Step:3 Bend your standing leg and lower your body as if sitting back into a chair.
Step:4 Lower yourself until your thigh is parallel to the ground, then push through your heel to return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch legs.

translations.name: Sentadilla pistola con barra
instructions: Paso 1: Párese con una barra sobre la parte superior de su espalda.
Paso 2: Levante un pie del suelo y extiéndalo hacia adelante.
Paso 3: Flexione la pierna de apoyo y baje su cuerpo como si se sentara en una silla.
Paso 4: Baje hasta que su muslo esté paralelo al suelo, luego empuje con el talón para volver a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambie de pierna.

name: dumbbell seated one arm neutral wrist curl
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your feet flat on the ground and hold a dumbbell in one hand with a neutral grip (thumb up).
Step:2 Rest your forearm on your thigh, with your wrist hanging off the edge.
Step:3 Keeping your forearm stationary, curl your wrist upward as far as possible.
Step:4 Pause, then slowly lower your wrist.
Step:5 Repeat, then switch hands.

translations.name: dumbbell seated one arm neutral wrist curl
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your feet flat on the ground and hold a dumbbell in one hand with a neutral grip (thumb up).
Step:2 Rest your forearm on your thigh, with your wrist hanging off the edge.
Step:3 Keeping your forearm stationary, curl your wrist upward as far as possible.
Step:4 Pause, then slowly lower your wrist.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch hands.

translations.name: Curl de muñeca neutro sentado a un brazo con mancuerna
instructions: Paso 1: Siéntese en un banco con los pies apoyados en el suelo y sostenga una mancuerna en una mano con un agarre neutro (pulgar hacia arriba).
Paso 2: Apoye el antebrazo en el muslo, con la muñeca colgando del borde.
Paso 3: Manteniendo el antebrazo inmóvil, flexione la muñeca hacia arriba tanto como sea posible.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa, luego baje lentamente la muñeca.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambie de mano.

name: cable pushdown
instructions: Step:1 Attach a straight bar to a high pulley cable machine.
Step:2 Stand facing the machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Grasp the bar with an overhand grip, hands shoulder-width apart.
Step:4 Keep your elbows close to your sides and your upper arms stationary.
Step:5 Exhale and push the bar down until your elbows are fully extended.
Step:6 Pause, then slowly return the bar to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: cable triceps pushdown
instructions: Step:1 Attach a straight bar to a high pulley cable machine.
Step:2 Stand facing the machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Grasp the bar with an overhand grip, hands shoulder-width apart.
Step:4 Keep your elbows close to your sides and your upper arms stationary.
Step:5 Exhale and push the bar down until your arms are fully extended.
Step:6 Pause, then slowly return the bar to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Jalón de tríceps en polea
instructions: Paso 1: Enganche una barra recta a una máquina de polea alta.
Paso 2: Párese frente a la máquina con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros.
Paso 3: Agarre la barra con un agarre prono, con las manos separadas al ancho de los hombros.
Paso 4: Mantenga los codos cerca de los costados y la parte superior de los brazos inmóvil.
Paso 5: Exhale y empuje la barra hacia abajo hasta que sus brazos estén completamente extendidos.
Paso 6: Haga una pausa, luego regrese lentamente la barra a la posición inicial.
Paso 7: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: lean planche
instructions: Step:1 Start in a push-up position with your hands shoulder-width apart and your body straight.
Step:2 Engage your core and slowly shift your weight forward, bringing your shoulders past your hands.
Step:3 Keep your elbows slightly bent and your body straight as you lean forward.
Step:4 Hold this position for as long as you can maintain good form.
Step:5 Slowly return to the starting position.

translations.name: planche lean
instructions: Step:1 Start in a push-up position with your hands shoulder-width apart and your body straight.
Step:2 Engage your core and slowly shift your weight forward, bringing your shoulders past your hands.
Step:3 Keep your arms straight and your body in one line.
Step:4 Lean as far forward as you can while maintaining control.
Step:5 Hold this position for time, then slowly return to the start.

translations.name: Inclinación para plancha (Planche lean)
instructions: Paso 1: Comience en una posición de flexión con las manos separadas al ancho de los hombros y el cuerpo recto.
Paso 2: Active su core y desplace lentamente su peso hacia adelante, llevando los hombros más allá de sus manos.
Paso 3: Mantenga los brazos rectos y su cuerpo en una sola línea.
Paso 4: Inclínese hacia adelante tanto como pueda mientras mantiene el control.
Paso 5: Mantenga esta posición por tiempo, luego regrese lentamente al inicio.

name: kettlebell windmill
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a kettlebell in your right hand overhead.
Step:2 Rotate your left foot outwards about 45 degrees and keep your right foot pointing forward.
Step:3 Hinge at your hips and lower your torso to the left side, keeping your right arm extended overhead.
Step:4 Lower your torso as far as you can while keeping your right arm straight and your left arm reaching for the floor.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides.

translations.name: kettlebell windmill
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a kettlebell in your right hand overhead.
Step:2 Rotate your left foot outwards about 45 degrees and keep your right foot pointing forward.
Step:3 Hinge at your hips and lower your torso to the left side, keeping your right arm extended overhead.
Step:4 Lower your torso as far as you can while keeping your right arm straight and your left hand reaching for your left foot or the floor.
Step:5 Pause, then return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides.

translations.name: Molino con kettlebell
instructions: Paso 1: Párese con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros, sosteniendo una kettlebell en su mano derecha por encima de la cabeza.
Paso 2: Gire su pie izquierdo hacia afuera unos 45 grados y mantenga su pie derecho apuntando hacia adelante.
Paso 3: Inclínese desde las caderas y baje el torso hacia el lado izquierdo, manteniendo el brazo derecho extendido por encima de la cabeza.
Paso 4: Baje el torso tanto como pueda mientras mantiene el brazo derecho recto y la mano izquierda alcanza su pie izquierdo o el suelo.
Paso 5: Haga una pausa, luego regrese a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambie de lado.

name: dumbbell iron cross
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a dumbbell in each hand at your sides.
Step:2 Raise your arms out to the sides until they are parallel to the ground, forming a T shape with your body.
Step:3 Hold this position for as long as possible.
Step:4 Slowly lower your arms back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell iron cross
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a dumbbell in each hand at your sides.
Step:2 Raise your arms out to the sides until they are parallel to the ground, forming a 'T' shape with your body.
Step:3 Hold this position for as long as possible.
Step:4 Slowly lower your arms back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Cruz de hierro con mancuernas
instructions: Paso 1: Párese con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros, sosteniendo una mancuerna en cada mano a los costados.
Paso 2: Levante los brazos hacia los lados hasta que estén paralelos al suelo, formando una 'T' con su cuerpo.
Paso 3: Mantenga esta posición durante el mayor tiempo posible.
Paso 4: Baje lentamente los brazos de nuevo a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: lever preacher curl
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and position yourself on the machine.
Step:2 Place your upper arms on the pad and grip the handles with an underhand grip.
Step:3 Exhale and curl the handles upward, contracting your biceps.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, squeezing your biceps.
Step:5 Inhale and slowly lower the handles back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: lever preacher curl
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and position yourself on the machine.
Step:2 Place your upper arms on the pad and grip the handles with an underhand grip.
Step:3 Exhale and curl the handles upward, contracting your biceps.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, squeezing your biceps.
Step:5 Inhale and slowly lower the handles back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Curl predicador en máquina de palanca
instructions: Paso 1: Ajuste la altura del asiento y colóquese en la máquina.
Paso 2: Coloque la parte superior de sus brazos en la almohadilla y agarre las manijas con un agarre supino.
Paso 3: Exhale y suba las manijas, contrayendo sus bíceps.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa en la parte superior, apretando sus bíceps.
Paso 5: Inhale y baje lentamente las manijas a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: push-up on lower arms
instructions: Step:1 Start in a plank position with your forearms on the ground and elbows directly below your shoulders.
Step:2 Engage your core and keep your body in a straight line.
Step:3 Press up onto one hand, then the other, to get into a high plank (push-up) position.
Step:4 Lower back down to your forearms, one arm at a time.
Step:5 Repeat, alternating the leading arm.

translations.name: plank to push-up
instructions: Step:1 Start in a plank position with your forearms on the ground and elbows directly below your shoulders.
Step:2 Engage your core and keep your body in a straight line.
Step:3 Press up onto one hand, then the other, to get into a high plank (push-up) position.
Step:4 Lower back down to your forearms, one arm at a time.
Step:5 Repeat, alternating the leading arm.

translations.name: De plancha a flexión
instructions: Paso 1: Comience en una posición de plancha con los antebrazos en el suelo y los codos directamente debajo de los hombros.
Paso 2: Active su core y mantenga su cuerpo en línea recta.
Paso 3: Empuje hacia arriba sobre una mano, luego la otra, para llegar a una posición de plancha alta (flexión).
Paso 4: Baje de nuevo a sus antebrazos, un brazo a la vez.
Paso 5: Repita, alternando el brazo que lidera.

name: straddle maltese
instructions: Step:1 Start in a push-up position with your hands wider than shoulder-width apart and turned out.
Step:2 Lean your body forward, keeping your arms straight and locked.
Step:3 Engage your core and lift your feet off the ground, spreading your legs into a straddle position.
Step:4 Hold this position for as long as possible with your body parallel to the floor.
Step:5 Slowly lower your feet back to the ground.

translations.name: straddle maltese
instructions: Step:1 Start in a push-up position with your hands wider than shoulder-width apart and turned out.
Step:2 Lean your body forward, keeping your arms straight and locked.
Step:3 Engage your core and lift your feet off the ground, spreading your legs into a straddle position.
Step:4 Hold this position for as long as possible with your body parallel to the floor.
Step:5 Slowly lower your feet back to the ground.

translations.name: Maltese en straddle
instructions: Paso 1: Comience en una posición de flexión con las manos más separadas que el ancho de los hombros y giradas hacia afuera.
Paso 2: Incline su cuerpo hacia adelante, manteniendo los brazos rectos y bloqueados.
Paso 3: Active su core y levante los pies del suelo, abriendo las piernas en una posición de 'straddle'.
Paso 4: Mantenga esta posición el mayor tiempo posible con su cuerpo paralelo al suelo.
Paso 5: Baje lentamente los pies de nuevo al suelo.

name: dumbbell biceps curl reverse
instructions: Step:1 Stand up straight with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing down and arms fully extended.
Step:2 Keeping your upper arms stationary, exhale and curl the weights.
Step:3 Continue to raise the dumbbells until they are at shoulder level.
Step:4 Hold the contracted position for a brief pause.
Step:5 Inhale and slowly lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell reverse curl
