instructions: Step:1 Stand up straight with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing down and arms fully extended.
Step:2 Keeping your upper arms stationary, exhale and curl the weights.
Step:3 Continue to raise the dumbbells until they are at shoulder level.
Step:4 Hold the contracted position for a brief pause.
Step:5 Inhale and slowly lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Curl inverso con mancuernas
instructions: Paso 1: Párese derecho con una mancuerna en cada mano, con las palmas hacia abajo y los brazos completamente extendidos.
Paso 2: Manteniendo la parte superior de los brazos inmóvil, exhale y suba las pesas.
Paso 3: Continúe levantando las mancuernas hasta que estén a la altura de los hombros.
Paso 4: Mantenga la posición contraída por un breve momento.
Paso 5: Inhale y baje lentamente las mancuernas a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell stiff leg deadlift
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a dumbbell in each hand with an overhand grip.
Step:2 Keeping your back straight and your core engaged, hinge at the hips and lower the dumbbells towards the ground, allowing a slight bend in your knees.
Step:3 Lower the dumbbells until you feel a stretch in your hamstrings, then squeeze your glutes and push through your heels to return to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell stiff-legged deadlift
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a dumbbell in each hand with an overhand grip.
Step:2 Keeping your back straight and core engaged, hinge at the hips and lower the dumbbells towards the ground, keeping your legs nearly straight.
Step:3 Lower the dumbbells until you feel a stretch in your hamstrings, then squeeze your glutes to return to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Peso muerto con piernas rígidas y mancuernas
instructions: Paso 1: Párese con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros, sosteniendo una mancuerna en cada mano con un agarre prono.
Paso 2: Manteniendo la espalda recta y el core activado, inclínese desde las caderas y baje las mancuernas hacia el suelo, manteniendo las piernas casi rectas.
Paso 3: Baje las mancuernas hasta que sienta un estiramiento en los isquiotibiales, luego apriete los glúteos para volver a la posición inicial.
Paso 4: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: assisted standing chin-up
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the machine to your desired assistance level.
Step:2 Stand on the foot platform and grip the handles with an underhand grip, shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Keep your chest up and shoulders back.
Step:4 Pull your body up by flexing your elbows and driving them down towards your sides.
Step:5 Continue pulling until your chin is above the handles.
Step:6 Slowly lower your body back down to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: assisted standing chin-up
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the machine to your desired assistance level.
Step:2 Stand on the foot platform and grip the handles with an underhand grip, shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Keep your chest up and shoulders back.
Step:4 Pull your body up by flexing your elbows and driving them down towards your sides.
Step:5 Continue pulling until your chin is above the handles.
Step:6 Slowly lower your body back down to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Dominada asistida de pie
instructions: Paso 1: Ajuste la máquina a su nivel de asistencia deseado.
Paso 2: Párese en la plataforma para los pies y agarre las manijas con un agarre supino, al ancho de los hombros.
Paso 3: Mantenga el pecho erguido y los hombros hacia atrás.
Paso 4: Súbase flexionando los codos y llevándolos hacia abajo, a sus costados.
Paso 5: Continúe subiendo hasta que su barbilla esté por encima de las manijas.
Paso 6: Baje lentamente su cuerpo a la posición inicial.
Paso 7: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: barbell wide-grip upright row
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a barbell with an overhand grip, hands wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Let the barbell hang in front of your thighs, arms fully extended.
Step:3 Keeping your back straight, exhale and lift the barbell straight up towards your chin, leading with your elbows.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then inhale and slowly lower the barbell back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: barbell wide-grip upright row
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a barbell with an overhand grip, hands wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Let the barbell hang in front of your thighs, arms fully extended.
Step:3 Exhale and lift the barbell straight up towards your collarbone, leading with your elbows.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then inhale and slowly lower the barbell back down.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Remo al mentón con agarre ancho y barra
instructions: Paso 1: Párese con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y sostenga una barra con un agarre prono, con las manos más separadas que el ancho de los hombros.
Paso 2: Deje que la barra cuelgue frente a sus muslos, con los brazos completamente extendidos.
Paso 3: Exhale y levante la barra directamente hacia su clavícula, liderando con los codos.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa en la parte superior, luego inhale y baje lentamente la barra.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: cable low seated row
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the machine with your feet flat on the footrests and your knees slightly bent.
Step:2 Grasp the handles with an overhand grip, palms facing down.
Step:3 Keep your back straight and lean slightly forward.
Step:4 Pull the handles towards your body, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the peak of the movement, then slowly release the handles back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: cable low seated row
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the machine with your feet flat on the footrests and your knees slightly bent.
Step:2 Grasp the handles with an overhand grip, palms facing down.
Step:3 Keep your back straight and lean slightly forward.
Step:4 Pull the handles towards your lower abdomen, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the peak of the movement, then slowly release the handles back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Remo bajo sentado en polea
instructions: Paso 1: Siéntese en la máquina con los pies apoyados en los reposapiés y las rodillas ligeramente flexionadas.
Paso 2: Agarre las manijas con un agarre prono, con las palmas hacia abajo.
Paso 3: Mantenga la espalda recta e inclínese ligeramente hacia adelante.
Paso 4: Jale las manijas hacia la parte inferior de su abdomen, apretando los omóplatos.
Paso 5: Haga una pausa en el punto más alto del movimiento, luego suelte lentamente las manijas a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell incline two arm extension
instructions: Step:1 Lie on an incline bench with a dumbbell in each hand.
Step:2 Extend your arms straight up towards the ceiling, keeping your elbows slightly bent.
Step:3 Slowly lower the dumbbells behind your head, keeping your upper arms stationary.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then extend your arms back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell incline two arm extension
instructions: Step:1 Lie on an incline bench with a dumbbell in each hand.
Step:2 Extend your arms straight up towards the ceiling, keeping your elbows slightly bent.
Step:3 Slowly lower the dumbbells behind your head by bending your elbows, keeping your upper arms stationary.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then extend your arms back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Extensión inclinada a dos brazos con mancuernas
instructions: Paso 1: Acuéstese en un banco inclinado con una mancuerna en cada mano.
Paso 2: Extienda los brazos rectos hacia el techo, manteniendo los codos ligeramente flexionados.
Paso 3: Baje lentamente las mancuernas detrás de su cabeza flexionando los codos, manteniendo la parte superior de los brazos inmóvil.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa, luego extienda los brazos de nuevo a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: butt-ups
instructions: Step:1 Start in a plank position with your forearms on the ground.
Step:2 Engage your abs and lift your hips up towards the ceiling, forming an inverted 'V' shape.
Step:3 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your hips back down to the starting plank position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: plank pike
instructions: Step:1 Start in a plank position with your forearms on the ground.
Step:2 Engage your abs and lift your hips up towards the ceiling, forming an inverted 'V' shape.
Step:3 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your hips back down to the starting plank position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Pica en plancha
instructions: Paso 1: Comience en una posición de plancha con los antebrazos en el suelo.
Paso 2: Active sus abdominales y levante las caderas hacia el techo, formando una 'V' invertida.
Paso 3: Haga una pausa en la parte superior, luego baje lentamente las caderas a la posición inicial de plancha.
Paso 4: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell lying triceps extension
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on a bench with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing each other.
Step:2 Extend your arms straight up over your chest.
Step:3 Lower the dumbbells down towards your forehead, bending your elbows.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then extend your arms back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell lying triceps extension (skull crusher)
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on a bench with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing each other.
Step:2 Extend your arms straight up over your chest.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arms stationary, lower the dumbbells by bending your elbows until they are near your ears.
Step:4 Pause, then extend your arms back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Extensión de tríceps acostado con mancuernas (rompecráneos)
instructions: Paso 1: Acuéstese en un banco con una mancuerna en cada mano, con las palmas enfrentadas.
Paso 2: Extienda los brazos rectos sobre su pecho.
Paso 3: Manteniendo la parte superior de los brazos inmóvil, baje las mancuernas flexionando los codos hasta que estén cerca de sus orejas.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa, luego extienda los brazos de nuevo a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: resistance band seated hip abduction
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a chair or bench with your back straight and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Wrap the resistance band around your thighs, just above your knees.
Step:3 Place your hands on the sides of the chair or bench for support.
Step:4 Engage your abductors and slowly push your knees apart against the resistance of the band.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then slowly bring your knees back together.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: resistance band seated hip abduction
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a chair or bench with your back straight and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Wrap the resistance band around your thighs, just above your knees.
Step:3 Place your hands on the sides of the chair or bench for support.
Step:4 Engage your outer thigh muscles and slowly push your knees apart.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then slowly bring your knees back together.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Abducción de cadera sentado con banda de resistencia
instructions: Paso 1: Siéntese en una silla o banco con la espalda recta y los pies apoyados en el suelo.
Paso 2: Coloque la banda de resistencia alrededor de sus muslos, justo por encima de las rodillas.
Paso 3: Coloque las manos a los lados de la silla o banco para apoyarse.
Paso 4: Active los músculos externos del muslo y separe lentamente las rodillas.
Paso 5: Haga una pausa, luego junte lentamente las rodillas de nuevo.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: cable seated rear lateral raise
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench facing a cable crossover machine.
Step:2 Grasp the left cable handle with your right hand and the right handle with your left hand.
Step:3 Lean forward slightly, keeping your arms extended with a slight bend in the elbows.
Step:4 Pull the cables out to your sides in a reverse fly motion, squeezing your shoulder blades.
Step:5 Pause, then slowly return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: cable seated rear lateral raise
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench facing a cable crossover machine.
Step:2 Grasp the left cable handle with your right hand and the right handle with your left hand.
Step:3 Lean forward slightly, keeping your arms extended with a slight bend in the elbows.
Step:4 Pull the cables out to your sides in a reverse fly motion, squeezing your shoulder blades.
Step:5 Pause, then slowly return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Elevación lateral posterior sentado en polea
instructions: Paso 1: Siéntese en un banco frente a una máquina de cruce de poleas.
Paso 2: Agarre el agarre de la polea izquierda con la mano derecha y el de la derecha con la mano izquierda.
Paso 3: Inclínese ligeramente hacia adelante, manteniendo los brazos extendidos con una ligera flexión en los codos.
Paso 4: Jale las poleas hacia los lados en un movimiento de apertura inversa, apretando los omóplatos.
Paso 5: Haga una pausa, luego regrese lentamente a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: kettlebell two arm row
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, knees slightly bent, and hold a kettlebell in each hand.
Step:2 Bend forward at the hips, keeping your back straight.
Step:3 Pull the kettlebells up towards your chest, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:4 Pause, then slowly lower the kettlebells.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: kettlebell two arm row
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, knees slightly bent, and hold a kettlebell in each hand.
Step:2 Hinge at the hips, keeping your back straight, until your torso is nearly parallel to the floor.
Step:3 Pull the kettlebells up towards your chest, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:4 Pause, then slowly lower the kettlebells.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Remo a dos brazos con kettlebell
instructions: Paso 1: Párese con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros, las rodillas ligeramente flexionadas y sostenga una kettlebell en cada mano.
Paso 2: Inclínese desde las caderas, manteniendo la espalda recta, hasta que su torso esté casi paralelo al suelo.
Paso 3: Jale las kettlebells hacia su pecho, apretando los omóplatos.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa, luego baje lentamente las kettlebells.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: barbell rear delt raise
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a barbell with an overhand grip.
Step:2 Bend your knees slightly and hinge forward at the hips, keeping your back straight.
Step:3 Raise the barbell out to the sides, keeping your arms straight, until they are parallel to the ground.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then slowly lower the barbell back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: barbell rear delt row
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a barbell with an overhand grip.
Step:2 Bend your knees slightly and hinge forward at the hips, keeping your back straight.
Step:3 Pull the barbell up towards your upper chest, leading with your elbows and keeping them high.
Step:4 Squeeze your shoulder blades at the top of the movement.
Step:5 Slowly lower the barbell back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Remo para deltoides posterior con barra
instructions: Paso 1: Párese con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y sostenga una barra con un agarre prono.
Paso 2: Flexione ligeramente las rodillas e inclínese desde las caderas, manteniendo la espalda recta.
Paso 3: Jale la barra hacia la parte superior de su pecho, liderando con los codos y manteniéndolos altos.
Paso 4: Apriete los omóplatos en la parte superior del movimiento.
Paso 5: Baje lentamente la barra a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell standing bent over one arm triceps extension
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a dumbbell in one hand.
Step:2 Hinge forward at the hips, keeping your back straight and parallel to the ground.
Step:3 Bring your elbow up to your side, keeping it bent at a 90-degree angle.
Step:4 Extend your arm straight back, squeezing your triceps.
Step:5 Slowly lower the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat, then switch arms.

translations.name: dumbbell bent over one arm triceps extension
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a dumbbell in one hand.
Step:2 Hinge forward at the hips, keeping your back straight and parallel to the ground.
Step:3 Bring your elbow up to your side, keeping it bent at a 90-degree angle.
Step:4 Extend your arm straight back, squeezing your triceps.
Step:5 Slowly lower the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

translations.name: Extensión de tríceps inclinado a un brazo con mancuerna
instructions: Paso 1: Párese con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y sostenga una mancuerna en una mano.
Paso 2: Inclínese hacia adelante desde las caderas, manteniendo la espalda recta y paralela al suelo.
Paso 3: Levante el codo a su costado, manteniéndolo flexionado en un ángulo de 90 grados.
Paso 4: Extienda el brazo recto hacia atrás, apretando el tríceps.
Paso 5: Baje lentamente la mancuerna a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambie de brazo.

name: dumbbell incline one arm press
instructions: Step:1 Sit on an incline bench with a dumbbell in one hand, resting on your thigh.
Step:2 Lie back on the bench and position the dumbbell at shoulder level, palm facing forward.
Step:3 Press the dumbbell upward until your arm is fully extended.
Step:4 Slowly lower the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch to the other arm.

translations.name: dumbbell incline one arm press
instructions: Step:1 Sit on an incline bench with a dumbbell in one hand, resting on your thigh.
Step:2 Lie back on the bench and position the dumbbell at shoulder level, palm facing forward.
Step:3 Press the dumbbell upward until your arm is fully extended.
Step:4 Slowly lower the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch to the other arm.

translations.name: Press inclinado a un brazo con mancuerna
instructions: Paso 1: Siéntese en un banco inclinado con una mancuerna en una mano, descansando sobre su muslo.
Paso 2: Acuéstese en el banco y coloque la mancuerna a la altura del hombro, con la palma hacia adelante.
Paso 3: Empuje la mancuerna hacia arriba hasta que su brazo esté completamente extendido.
Paso 4: Baje lentamente la mancuerna a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambie al otro brazo.

name: sled forward angled calf raise
instructions: Step:1 Position yourself on a leg press machine with your toes on the platform and your heels hanging off.
Step:2 Place your hands on the handles or the sides of the machine for support.
Step:3 Engage your calves and slowly raise your heels as high as possible.
Step:4 Pause, then slowly lower your heels back down.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: sled forward angled calf raise
instructions: Step:1 Position yourself on a leg press machine with your toes on the lower part of the platform and your heels hanging off.
Step:2 Place your hands on the handles for support.
Step:3 Engage your calves and slowly press the platform up by extending your ankles.
Step:4 Pause at the top, then slowly lower the platform back down.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Elevación de talones en prensa inclinada hacia adelante
instructions: Paso 1: Colóquese en una máquina de prensa de piernas con los dedos de los pies en la parte inferior de la plataforma y los talones colgando.
Paso 2: Coloque las manos en las manijas para apoyarse.
Paso 3: Active sus gemelos y empuje lentamente la plataforma hacia arriba extendiendo los tobillos.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa en la parte superior, luego baje lentamente la plataforma.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell biceps curl squat
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a dumbbell in each hand with your palms facing forward.
Step:2 Simultaneously lower into a squat and curl the dumbbells up towards your shoulders.
Step:3 Pause for a moment at the bottom.
Step:4 As you stand up, lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell squat to bicep curl
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a dumbbell in each hand with your palms facing forward.
Step:2 Simultaneously lower into a squat and curl the dumbbells up towards your shoulders.
Step:3 Pause for a moment at the bottom of the squat.
Step:4 As you stand back up, lower the dumbbells to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Sentadilla a curl de bíceps con mancuernas
instructions: Paso 1: Párese con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros, sosteniendo una mancuerna en cada mano con las palmas hacia adelante.
Paso 2: Baje simultáneamente a una sentadilla y suba las mancuernas hacia sus hombros.
Paso 3: Haga una pausa por un momento en la parte inferior de la sentadilla.
Paso 4: Mientras se levanta, baje las mancuernas a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: barbell biceps curl (with arm blaster)
instructions: Step:1 Stand up straight with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a barbell with an underhand grip, palms facing up.
Step:2 Place your upper arms against the arm blaster, keeping your elbows close to your torso.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arms stationary, exhale and curl the weights while contracting your biceps.
Step:4 Continue to raise the barbell until your biceps are fully contracted and the bar is at shoulder level.
Step:5 Hold the contracted position for a brief pause as you squeeze your biceps.
Step:6 Inhale and slowly begin to lower the barbell back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: barbell biceps curl (with arm blaster)
instructions: Step:1 Stand up straight with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a barbell with an underhand grip, palms facing up.
Step:2 Place your upper arms against the arm blaster, keeping your elbows close to your torso.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arms stationary, exhale and curl the barbell while contracting your biceps.
Step:4 Continue to raise the barbell until your biceps are fully contracted and the bar is at shoulder level.
Step:5 Hold the contracted position for a brief pause as you squeeze your biceps.
Step:6 Inhale and slowly begin to lower the barbell back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Curl de bíceps con barra (con arm blaster)
instructions: Paso 1: Párese derecho con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y sostenga una barra con agarre supino (palmas hacia arriba).
Paso 2: Coloque la parte superior de sus brazos contra el 'arm blaster', manteniendo los codos cerca de su torso.
Paso 3: Manteniendo la parte superior de los brazos inmóvil, exhale y suba la barra mientras contrae los bíceps.
Paso 4: Continúe levantando la barra hasta que sus bíceps estén completamente contraídos y la barra esté a la altura de los hombros.
Paso 5: Mantenga la posición contraída por un momento mientras aprieta los bíceps.
Paso 6: Inhale y comience a bajar lentamente la barra a la posición inicial.
Paso 7: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: barbell lying triceps extension
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on a bench with your feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Hold the barbell with an overhand grip, hands shoulder-width apart, and extend your arms straight up over your chest.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arms stationary, slowly lower the barbell towards your forehead by bending your elbows.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then extend your arms back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: barbell lying triceps extension (skull crusher)
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on a bench with your feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Hold the barbell with an overhand grip, hands shoulder-width apart, and extend your arms straight up over your chest.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arms stationary, slowly lower the barbell towards your forehead by bending your elbows.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then extend your arms back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Extensión de tríceps acostado con barra (rompecráneos)
instructions: Paso 1: Acuéstese en un banco con los pies apoyados en el suelo.
Paso 2: Sostenga la barra con un agarre prono, con las manos separadas al ancho de los hombros, y extienda los brazos rectos sobre su pecho.
Paso 3: Manteniendo la parte superior de los brazos inmóvil, baje lentamente la barra hacia su frente flexionando los codos.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa en la parte inferior, luego extienda los brazos de nuevo a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: barbell reverse preacher curl
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a preacher bench with your chest against the pad, holding a barbell with an overhand grip.
Step:2 Keeping your upper arms stationary, curl the barbell upward.
Step:3 Continue until your biceps are fully contracted and the barbell is at shoulder level.
Step:4 Hold for a brief pause.
Step:5 Slowly lower the barbell back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: barbell reverse preacher curl
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a preacher bench with your chest against the pad, holding a barbell with an overhand grip.
Step:2 Keeping your upper arms stationary, curl the barbell upward.
Step:3 Continue until your biceps and forearms are fully contracted and the barbell is at shoulder level.
Step:4 Hold for a brief pause.
Step:5 Slowly lower the barbell back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Curl predicador inverso con barra
instructions: Paso 1: Siéntese en un banco predicador con el pecho contra la almohadilla, sosteniendo una barra con agarre prono.
Paso 2: Manteniendo la parte superior de los brazos inmóvil, suba la barra.
Paso 3: Continúe hasta que sus bíceps y antebrazos estén completamente contraídos y la barra esté a la altura de los hombros.
Paso 4: Mantenga la posición por un breve momento.
Paso 5: Baje lentamente la barra a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: push-up (on stability ball)
instructions: Step:1 Place the stability ball on the ground and position yourself with your hands on the ball, shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Extend your legs straight out behind you, balancing on your toes.
Step:3 Engage your core and lower your chest towards the ball by bending your elbows.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then push yourself back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: push-up (on stability ball)
instructions: Step:1 Place the stability ball on the ground and position yourself with your hands on the ball, shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Extend your legs straight out behind you, balancing on your toes.
Step:3 Engage your core and lower your chest towards the ball by bending your elbows.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then push yourself back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Flexión (sobre balón de estabilidad)
instructions: Paso 1: Coloque el balón de estabilidad en el suelo y colóquese con las manos sobre el balón, separadas al ancho de los hombros.
Paso 2: Extienda las piernas rectas detrás de usted, balanceándose sobre los dedos de los pies.
Paso 3: Active su core y baje el pecho hacia el balón flexionando los codos.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa por un momento, luego empuje hacia arriba para volver a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: smith seated shoulder press
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench inside the smith machine with your back against the pad.
Step:2 Grasp the bar with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Unrack the bar and lower it to shoulder level.
Step:4 Press the bar overhead until your arms are fully extended.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then slowly lower the bar back down to shoulder level.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: smith seated shoulder press
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench inside the Smith machine with your back against the pad.
Step:2 Grasp the bar with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Unrack the bar and lower it to shoulder level.
Step:4 Press the bar overhead until your arms are fully extended.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then slowly lower the bar back down to shoulder level.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Press de hombro sentado en máquina Smith
instructions: Paso 1: Siéntese en un banco dentro de la máquina Smith con la espalda contra la almohadilla.
Paso 2: Agarre la barra con un agarre prono, un poco más ancho que el ancho de los hombros.
Paso 3: Saque la barra del soporte y bájela a la altura de los hombros.
Paso 4: Empuje la barra por encima de la cabeza hasta que sus brazos estén completamente extendidos.
Paso 5: Haga una pausa, luego baje lentamente la barra de nuevo a la altura de los hombros.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: kipping muscle up
instructions: Step:1 Start by hanging from a pull-up bar with an overhand grip.
Step:2 Engage your core and use a swinging motion ('kipping') to generate momentum.
Step:3 As you swing forward, pull your chest explosively towards the bar.
Step:4 As your chest clears the bar, transition into a dip position by pushing down on the bar and extending your arms.
Step:5 Lower yourself back down with control.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: kipping muscle up
instructions: Step:1 Start by hanging from a pull-up bar with an overhand grip.
Step:2 Engage your core and use a swinging motion ('kipping') to generate momentum.
Step:3 As you swing forward, pull your chest explosively towards the bar.
Step:4 As your chest clears the bar, transition into a dip position by pushing down on the bar and extending your arms.
Step:5 Lower yourself back down with control.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Muscle up con kipping
instructions: Paso 1: Comience colgando de una barra de dominadas con un agarre prono.
Paso 2: Active su core y use un movimiento de balanceo ('kipping') para generar impulso.
Paso 3: Mientras se balancea hacia adelante, jale su pecho explosivamente hacia la barra.
Paso 4: A medida que su pecho pasa la barra, haga la transición a una posición de fondo empujando la barra hacia abajo y extendiendo los brazos.
Paso 5: Baje de nuevo con control.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: korean dips
instructions: Step:1 Position yourself behind a dip bar.
Step:2 Place your hands on the bar with your knuckles facing forward.
Step:3 Lower your body by bending your elbows until your upper arms are parallel to the ground.
Step:4 Push yourself back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Korean dips
instructions: Step:1 Position yourself behind a dip bar.
Step:2 Place your hands on the bar with your knuckles facing forward.
Step:3 Lower your body by bending your elbows until your upper arms are parallel to the ground.
Step:4 Push yourself back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Fondos coreanos
instructions: Paso 1: Colóquese detrás de una barra para fondos.
Paso 2: Coloque las manos sobre la barra con los nudillos hacia adelante.
Paso 3: Baje su cuerpo flexionando los codos hasta que la parte superior de sus brazos esté paralela al suelo.
Paso 4: Empújese de nuevo a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: lever seated hip adduction
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and position yourself on the machine with your back against the backrest.
Step:2 Place your feet on the footrests and grasp the handles for stability.
Step:3 Engage your adductor muscles and slowly bring your legs together.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the peak contraction, then slowly return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: lever seated hip adduction
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and position yourself on the machine with your back against the backrest.
Step:2 Place your inner thighs against the pads.
Step:3 Engage your adductor muscles and slowly bring your legs together.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the peak contraction, then slowly return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Aducción de cadera sentado en máquina de palanca
instructions: Paso 1: Ajuste la altura del asiento y colóquese en la máquina con la espalda contra el respaldo.
Paso 2: Coloque la parte interna de sus muslos contra las almohadillas.
Paso 3: Active sus músculos aductores y junte lentamente las piernas.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa en el punto de máxima contracción, luego regrese lentamente a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: barbell pullover
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on a bench with your feet on the floor.
Step:2 Hold a barbell with a shoulder-width grip and extend your arms straight above your chest.
Step:3 Keeping your arms straight, lower the barbell behind your head until you feel a stretch in your lats.
Step:4 Pause, then raise the barbell back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: barbell pullover
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on a bench with your feet on the floor.
Step:2 Hold a barbell with a shoulder-width overhand grip and extend your arms straight above your chest.
Step:3 Keeping your arms straight, lower the barbell in an arc behind your head until you feel a stretch in your lats.
Step:4 Pause, then pull the barbell back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Pullover con barra
instructions: Paso 1: Acuéstese en un banco con los pies en el suelo.
Paso 2: Sostenga una barra con un agarre prono al ancho de los hombros y extienda los brazos rectos sobre su pecho.
Paso 3: Manteniendo los brazos rectos, baje la barra en un arco detrás de su cabeza hasta que sienta un estiramiento en sus dorsales.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa, luego jale la barra de nuevo a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell biceps curl v sit on bosu ball
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bosu ball with your feet flat on the ground and knees bent at a 90-degree angle.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell in each hand with your palms facing forward.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arms stationary, curl the weights while contracting your biceps.
Step:4 Continue until the dumbbells are at shoulder level.
Step:5 Hold the position for a brief pause.
Step:6 Slowly lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell biceps curl v-sit on bosu ball
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bosu ball, lean back slightly, and lift your feet off the ground, finding your balance in a V-sit position.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell in each hand with your palms facing forward.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arms stationary, curl the weights while contracting your biceps and maintaining your balance.
Step:4 Continue until the dumbbells are at shoulder level.
Step:5 Slowly lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Curl de bíceps en V sentado sobre balón bosu con mancuernas
instructions: Paso 1: Siéntese en un balón bosu, inclínese ligeramente hacia atrás y levante los pies del suelo, encontrando el equilibrio en una posición de V.
Paso 2: Sostenga una mancuerna en cada mano con las palmas hacia adelante.
Paso 3: Manteniendo la parte superior de los brazos inmóvil, suba las pesas mientras contrae los bíceps y mantiene el equilibrio.
Paso 4: Continúe hasta que las mancuernas estén a la altura de los hombros.
Paso 5: Baje lentamente las mancuernas a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell pullover
instructions: Step:1 Lie on a flat bench with your feet on the floor.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell with both hands over your chest.
Step:3 Keeping a slight bend in your elbows, slowly lower the dumbbell behind your head.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then raise the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell pullover
instructions: Step:1 Lie across a flat bench with only your upper back supported, and your feet flat on the floor.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell with both hands over your chest, arms slightly bent.
Step:3 Slowly lower the dumbbell in an arc behind your head.
Step:4 Pause, then pull the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Pullover con mancuerna
instructions: Paso 1: Acuéstese de forma transversal sobre un banco plano con solo la parte superior de la espalda apoyada y los pies en el suelo.
Paso 2: Sostenga una mancuerna con ambas manos sobre su pecho, con los brazos ligeramente flexionados.
Paso 3: Baje lentamente la mancuerna en un arco detrás de su cabeza.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa, luego jale la mancuerna de nuevo a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: lever overhand triceps dip
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the machine to the appropriate height.
Step:2 Grasp the handles with an overhand grip.
Step:3 Lower your body by bending your elbows, keeping your upper arms close to your sides.
Step:4 Lower until your upper arms are parallel to the floor.
Step:5 Push yourself back up by extending your elbows.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: lever overhand triceps dip
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the machine to the appropriate height.
Step:2 Grasp the handles with an overhand grip.
Step:3 Lower your body by bending your elbows, keeping them close to your sides.
Step:4 Lower until your upper arms are parallel to the floor.
Step:5 Push yourself back up by extending your elbows.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Fondos de tríceps con agarre prono en máquina
instructions: Paso 1: Ajuste la máquina a la altura apropiada.
Paso 2: Agarre las manijas con un agarre prono.
Paso 3: Baje su cuerpo flexionando los codos, manteniéndolos cerca de sus costados.
Paso 4: Baje hasta que la parte superior de sus brazos esté paralela al suelo.
Paso 5: Empújese hacia arriba extendiendo los codos.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: full planche
instructions: Step:1 Start in a push-up position with your hands shoulder-width apart and your fingers pointing forward.
Step:2 Lean your weight forward, lifting your feet off the ground.
Step:3 Continue shifting your weight forward until your body is parallel to the ground, balancing on your hands.
Step:4 Hold this position for as long as you can, maintaining a straight body.
Step:5 Slowly lower your feet back to the ground.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: full planche
instructions: Step:1 Start in a push-up position with your hands shoulder-width apart and your fingers pointing forward.
Step:2 Lean your weight forward, lifting your feet off the ground.
Step:3 Continue leaning forward until your body is parallel to the ground, balancing on your hands.
Step:4 Hold this position for as long as you can, maintaining a straight body.
Step:5 Slowly lower your feet back to the ground.

translations.name: Plancha completa
instructions: Paso 1: Comience en una posición de flexión con las manos separadas al ancho de los hombros y los dedos apuntando hacia adelante.
Paso 2: Incline su peso hacia adelante, levantando los pies del suelo.
Paso 3: Continúe inclinándose hacia adelante hasta que su cuerpo esté paralelo al suelo, balanceándose sobre sus manos.
Paso 4: Mantenga esta posición todo el tiempo que pueda, manteniendo el cuerpo recto.
Paso 5: Baje lentamente los pies de nuevo al suelo.

name: cocoons
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your legs extended and your arms overhead.
Step:2 Simultaneously lift your upper body and knees, bringing them together in a 'tuck' position.
Step:3 Pause for a moment at the top.
Step:4 Slowly lower your upper body and legs back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: cocoons
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your legs extended and your arms overhead.
Step:2 Simultaneously lift your upper body and knees, bringing them together in a 'tuck' position.
Step:3 Pause for a moment at the top.
Step:4 Slowly lower your upper body and legs back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Encogimientos (Cocoons)
instructions: Paso 1: Acuéstese boca arriba con las piernas extendidas y los brazos por encima de la cabeza.
Paso 2: Levante simultáneamente la parte superior del cuerpo y las rodillas, juntándolas en una posición 'encogida'.
Paso 3: Haga una pausa por un momento en la parte superior.
Paso 4: Baje lentamente la parte superior del cuerpo y las piernas a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: side hip (on parallel bars)
instructions: Step:1 Support yourself on parallel bars with your arms straight.
Step:2 Engage your abs and slowly lift your legs to one side, keeping them straight.
Step:3 Pause for a moment, then slowly lower your legs back down.
Step:4 Repeat on the other side.
Step:5 Continue alternating sides.

translations.name: side leg raises (on parallel bars)
instructions: Step:1 Support yourself on parallel bars with your arms straight.
Step:2 Engage your abs and slowly lift your legs to one side, keeping them straight.
Step:3 Pause, then slowly lower your legs back down.
Step:4 Repeat on the other side.
Step:5 Continue alternating sides.

translations.name: Elevaciones laterales de pierna (en barras paralelas)
instructions: Paso 1: Apóyese en barras paralelas con los brazos rectos.
Paso 2: Active sus abdominales y levante lentamente las piernas hacia un lado, manteniéndolas rectas.
Paso 3: Haga una pausa, luego baje lentamente las piernas.
Paso 4: Repita del otro lado.
Paso 5: Continúe alternando lados.

name: peroneals stretch
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the ground with your legs extended.
Step:2 Loop a rope or band around the ball of one foot.
Step:3 Gently pull the rope towards you while turning your foot inward to feel a stretch on the outside of your calf.
Step:4 Hold for 15-30 seconds.
Step:5 Repeat on the other leg.

translations.name: peroneals stretch
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the ground with your legs extended.
Step:2 Loop a rope or band around the ball of one foot.
Step:3 Gently pull the rope towards you while turning your foot inward to feel a stretch on the outside of your calf.
Step:4 Hold for 15-30 seconds.
Step:5 Repeat on the other leg.

translations.name: Estiramiento de peroneos
instructions: Paso 1: Siéntese en el suelo con las piernas extendidas.
Paso 2: Coloque una cuerda o banda alrededor de la parte delantera de un pie.
Paso 3: Jale suavemente la cuerda hacia usted mientras gira el pie hacia adentro para sentir un estiramiento en la parte exterior de la pantorrilla.
Paso 4: Mantenga la posición durante 15-30 segundos.
Paso 5: Repita con la otra pierna.

name: bodyweight squatting row (with towel)
instructions: Step:1 Loop a towel around a sturdy anchor point.
Step:2 Stand facing the anchor, holding both ends of the towel.
Step:3 Lower your body into a squat position, and lean back.
Step:4 Pull the towel towards your chest, squeezing your shoulder blades.
Step:5 Slowly return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: bodyweight squatting row (with towel)
instructions: Step:1 Loop a towel around a sturdy anchor point.
Step:2 Stand facing the anchor, holding both ends of the towel.
Step:3 Lower your body into a squat position, and lean back.
Step:4 Pull the towel towards your chest, squeezing your shoulder blades.
Step:5 Slowly return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Remo en sentadilla con peso corporal (con toalla)
instructions: Paso 1: Pase una toalla alrededor de un punto de anclaje resistente.
Paso 2: Párese frente al anclaje, sosteniendo ambos extremos de la toalla.
Paso 3: Baje su cuerpo a una posición de sentadilla e inclínese hacia atrás.
Paso 4: Jale la toalla hacia su pecho, apretando los omóplatos.
Paso 5: Regrese lentamente a la posición inicial.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell lying supine biceps curl
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on a bench, holding a dumbbell in each hand with your palms facing up.
Step:2 Let your arms hang straight down on either side of the bench.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arms stationary, curl the dumbbells towards your shoulders.
Step:4 Pause, then slowly lower the dumbbells.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell lying supine biceps curl
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on a bench, holding a dumbbell in each hand with your palms facing up.
Step:2 Let your arms hang straight down on either side of the bench.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arms stationary, curl the dumbbells towards your shoulders.
Step:4 Pause, then slowly lower the dumbbells.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Curl de bíceps supino acostado con mancuernas
instructions: Paso 1: Acuéstese en un banco, sosteniendo una mancuerna en cada mano con las palmas hacia arriba.
Paso 2: Deje que sus brazos cuelguen rectos a cada lado del banco.
Paso 3: Manteniendo la parte superior de los brazos inmóvil, suba las mancuernas hacia sus hombros.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa, luego baje lentamente las mancuernas.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: alternate heel touchers
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Lift your shoulders off the ground.
Step:3 Reach your right hand towards your right heel, then your left hand towards your left heel.
Step:4 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: alternate heel touchers
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Lift your shoulders off the ground.
Step:3 Reach your right hand towards your right heel, then your left hand towards your left heel.
Step:4 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Toques de talón alternos
instructions: Paso 1: Acuéstese boca arriba con las rodillas flexionadas y los pies apoyados en el suelo.
Paso 2: Levante los hombros del suelo.
Paso 3: Alcance con su mano derecha su talón derecho, luego su mano izquierda hacia su talón izquierdo.
Paso 4: Continúe alternando lados para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: chest dip (on dip-pull-up cage)
instructions: Step:1 Position yourself on the dip bars.
Step:2 Lean your torso forward slightly.
Step:3 Lower your body by bending your elbows until you feel a stretch in your chest.
Step:4 Push yourself back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: chest dip (on dip-pull-up cage)
instructions: Step:1 Position yourself on the dip bars.
Step:2 Lean your torso forward slightly.
Step:3 Lower your body by bending your elbows until you feel a stretch in your chest.
Step:4 Push yourself back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Fondos de pecho (en jaula de dominadas y fondos)
instructions: Paso 1: Colóquese en las barras para fondos.
Paso 2: Incline ligeramente el torso hacia adelante.
Paso 3: Baje su cuerpo flexionando los codos hasta que sienta un estiramiento en el pecho.
Paso 4: Empújese de nuevo a la posición inicial.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: lever unilateral row
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and position yourself facing the machine.
Step:2 Grasp one handle with an overhand grip.
Step:3 Pull the handle towards your body, squeezing your shoulder blade.
Step:4 Pause, then slowly release.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired reps, then switch sides.

translations.name: lever unilateral row
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and position yourself facing the machine.
Step:2 Grasp one handle with an overhand grip.
Step:3 Pull the handle towards your body, squeezing your shoulder blade.
Step:4 Pause, then slowly release.
Step:5 Complete all reps on one side, then switch to the other.

translations.name: Remo unilateral en máquina de palanca
instructions: Paso 1: Ajuste la altura del asiento y colóquese frente a la máquina.
Paso 2: Agarre una manija con un agarre prono.
Paso 3: Jale la manija hacia su cuerpo, apretando el omóplato.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa, luego suelte lentamente.
Paso 5: Complete todas las repeticiones de un lado, luego cambie al otro.

name: dumbbell seated one arm bicep curl on exercise ball with leg raised
instructions: Step:1 Sit on an exercise ball, holding a dumbbell in one hand.
Step:2 Raise the opposite leg off the ground to engage your core.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arm stationary, curl the dumbbell towards your shoulder.
Step:4 Pause, then slowly lower the dumbbell.
Step:5 Repeat, then switch arms and legs.

translations.name: dumbbell seated one arm bicep curl on exercise ball with leg raised
instructions: Step:1 Sit on an exercise ball, holding a dumbbell in one hand.
Step:2 Raise the opposite leg off the ground to engage your core.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arm stationary, curl the dumbbell towards your shoulder.
Step:4 Pause, then slowly lower the dumbbell.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of reps, then switch arms and legs.

translations.name: Curl de bíceps sentado a un brazo sobre balón de ejercicio con pierna levantada
instructions: Paso 1: Siéntese en un balón de ejercicio, sosteniendo una mancuerna en una mano.
Paso 2: Levante la pierna opuesta del suelo para activar su core.
Paso 3: Manteniendo la parte superior del brazo inmóvil, suba la mancuerna hacia su hombro.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa, luego baje lentamente la mancuerna.
Paso 5: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambie de brazo y pierna.

name: dumbbell standing one arm curl over incline bench
instructions: Step:1 Stand facing an incline bench, holding a dumbbell in one hand.
Step:2 Place your working arm over the bench so the back of your upper arm rests against the pad.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arm stationary, curl the dumbbell towards your shoulder.
Step:4 Pause, then slowly lower the dumbbell.
Step:5 Repeat, then switch arms.

translations.name: dumbbell one arm preacher curl (over incline bench)
instructions: Step:1 Stand facing an incline bench, holding a dumbbell in one hand.
Step:2 Place your working arm over the bench so the back of your upper arm rests against the pad.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arm stationary, curl the dumbbell towards your shoulder.
Step:4 Pause, then slowly lower the dumbbell.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of reps, then switch arms.

translations.name: Curl predicador a un brazo con mancuerna (sobre banco inclinado)
instructions: Paso 1: Párese frente a un banco inclinado, sosteniendo una mancuerna en una mano.
Paso 2: Coloque su brazo de trabajo sobre el banco de modo que la parte posterior de su brazo descanse sobre la almohadilla.
Paso 3: Manteniendo la parte superior del brazo inmóvil, suba la mancuerna hacia su hombro.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa, luego baje lentamente la mancuerna.
Paso 5: Repita para las repeticiones deseadas, luego cambie de brazo.

name: roller back stretch
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the ground with the roller positioned under your lower back.
Step:2 Place your hands behind you for support.
Step:3 Slowly roll back and forth along your spine, from your lower to your upper back.
Step:4 Pause on any tight spots for a few seconds.
Step:5 Continue for the desired duration.

translations.name: foam roller back stretch
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the ground with the foam roller positioned under your lower back.
Step:2 Place your hands behind you for support.
Step:3 Slowly roll up and down your spine, from your lower to your upper back.
Step:4 Pause and hold on any tight spots for a few seconds.
Step:5 Continue for the desired duration.

translations.name: Estiramiento de espalda con rodillo de espuma
instructions: Paso 1: Siéntese en el suelo con el rodillo de espuma colocado debajo de la parte baja de su espalda.
Paso 2: Coloque las manos detrás de usted para apoyarse.
Paso 3: Ruede lentamente hacia arriba y hacia abajo por su columna vertebral, desde la parte baja hasta la parte alta de la espalda.
Paso 4: Haga una pausa y mantenga la posición en cualquier punto tenso durante unos segundos.
Paso 5: Continúe durante el tiempo deseado.

name: barbell drag curl
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a barbell with an underhand grip.
Step:2 Let the barbell hang at arm's length in front of your thighs.
Step:3 Keeping the bar close to your body, pull it upwards towards your chest by flexing your elbows and moving them back.
Step:4 Squeeze your biceps at the top.
Step:5 Slowly lower the barbell back down.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: barbell drag curl
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a barbell with an underhand grip.
Step:2 Let the barbell hang at arm's length in front of your thighs.
Step:3 Keeping the bar close to your body, pull it upwards towards your chest by flexing your elbows and pulling them back.
Step:4 Squeeze your biceps at the top.
Step:5 Slowly lower the barbell back down.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Curl de arrastre con barra
instructions: Paso 1: Párese con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y sostenga una barra con un agarre supino.
Paso 2: Deje que la barra cuelgue con los brazos extendidos frente a sus muslos.
Paso 3: Manteniendo la barra cerca de su cuerpo, jálela hacia arriba, hacia su pecho, flexionando los codos y llevándolos hacia atrás.
Paso 4: Apriete los bíceps en la parte superior.
Paso 5: Baje lentamente la barra.
Paso 6: Repita para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell one arm incline chest press
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the incline bench to a 45-degree angle.
Step:2 Sit on the bench with your back against the pad and feet flat on the ground.
Step:3 Hold a dumbbell in one hand with an overhand grip, resting it on your shoulder.
Step:4 Push the dumbbell up and away from your body, extending your arm fully.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbell back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch to the other arm.

translations.name: dumbbell one arm incline chest press
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the incline bench to a 45-degree angle.
Step:2 Sit on the bench with your back against the pad and feet flat on the ground.
Step:3 Hold a dumbbell in one hand with an overhand grip, resting it on your shoulder.
Step:4 Push the dumbbell up and away from your body, extending your arm fully.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbell back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch to the other arm.

translations.name: press inclinado con mancuerna a un brazo en pecho
instructions: Paso:1 Ajusta el banco inclinado a un ángulo de 45 grados.
Paso:2 Siéntate en el banco con la espalda contra el respaldo y los pies planos en el suelo.
Paso:3 Sostén una mancuerna en una mano con agarre prono, descansándola sobre tu hombro.
Paso:4 Empuja la mancuerna hacia arriba y lejos de tu cuerpo, extendiendo tu brazo completamente.
Paso:5 Pausa un momento en la parte superior, luego baja lentamente la mancuerna de vuelta a la posición inicial.
Paso:6 Repite para el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambia al otro brazo.

name: dumbbell lying supination on floor
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back on the floor with your legs extended and your arms by your sides, holding a dumbbell in each hand.
Step:2 Rotate your palms to face up, keeping your elbows close to your sides.
Step:3 Slowly curl the dumbbells towards your shoulders, squeezing your forearms.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbells back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell lying supination on floor
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back on the floor with your legs extended and your arms by your sides, holding a dumbbell in each hand.
Step:2 Rotate your palms to face up, keeping your elbows close to your sides.
Step:3 Slowly curl the dumbbells towards your shoulders, squeezing your forearms.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbells back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: supinación tumbado con mancuernas en el suelo
instructions: Paso:1 Acuéstate boca arriba en el suelo con las piernas extendidas y los brazos a los lados, sosteniendo una mancuerna en cada mano.
Paso:2 Rota las palmas hacia arriba, manteniendo los codos cerca de los lados.
Paso:3 Curl lentamente las mancuernas hacia los hombros, apretando los antebrazos.
Paso:4 Pausa un momento en la parte superior, luego baja lentamente las mancuernas de vuelta a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: cable pull through (with rope)
instructions: Step:1 Stand facing away from the cable machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Grab the rope attachment with both hands and step forward, creating tension in the cable.
Step:3 Bend at the hips and lower your upper body until it is parallel to the ground, keeping your back straight.
Step:4 Engage your glutes and hamstrings to pull your body back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: cable pull through (with rope)
instructions: Step:1 Stand facing away from the cable machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Grab the rope attachment with both hands and step forward, creating tension in the cable.
Step:3 Bend at the hips and lower your upper body until it is parallel to the ground, keeping your back straight.
Step:4 Engage your glutes and hamstrings to pull your body back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: jalón con cable (con cuerda)
instructions: Paso:1 Párate de espaldas a la máquina de cable con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros.
Paso:2 Agarra el accesorio de cuerda con ambas manos y da un paso adelante, creando tensión en el cable.
Paso:3 Dobla las caderas y baja la parte superior del cuerpo hasta que esté paralela al suelo, manteniendo la espalda recta.
Paso:4 Activa los glúteos e isquiotibiales para tirar de tu cuerpo de vuelta a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell incline alternate press
instructions: Step:1 Sit on an incline bench with a dumbbell in each hand, resting on your thighs.
Step:2 Lean back on the bench and use your thighs to help raise the dumbbells to shoulder height, palms facing forward.
Step:3 Once at shoulder height, rotate your wrists so that the palms of your hands are facing forward.
Step:4 Push the dumbbells up with your chest and shoulders, extending your arms fully.
Step:5 Lower the dumbbells back down to the starting position, keeping your elbows slightly bent.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, alternating arms.

translations.name: dumbbell incline alternate press
instructions: Step:1 Sit on an incline bench with a dumbbell in each hand, resting on your thighs.
Step:2 Lean back on the bench and use your thighs to help raise the dumbbells to shoulder height, palms facing forward.
Step:3 Once at shoulder height, rotate your wrists so that the palms of your hands are facing forward.
Step:4 Push the dumbbells up with your chest and shoulders, extending your arms fully.
Step:5 Lower the dumbbells back down to the starting position, keeping your elbows slightly bent.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, alternating arms.

translations.name: press inclinado alterno con mancuernas
instructions: Paso:1 Siéntate en un banco inclinado con una mancuerna en cada mano, descansando sobre tus muslos.
Paso:2 Reclínate en el banco y usa tus muslos para ayudar a elevar las mancuernas a la altura de los hombros, con las palmas hacia adelante.
Paso:3 Una vez a la altura de los hombros, rota las muñecas para que las palmas de las manos queden hacia adelante.
Paso:4 Empuja las mancuernas hacia arriba con el pecho y los hombros, extendiendo los brazos completamente.
Paso:5 Baja las mancuernas de vuelta a la posición inicial, manteniendo los codos ligeramente doblados.
Paso:6 Repite para el número deseado de repeticiones, alternando los brazos.

name: cable tuck reverse crunch
instructions: Step:1 Attach a cable to a low pulley and lie down on a mat facing up.
Step:2 Hold the cable with both hands and extend your arms straight up above your chest.
Step:3 Bend your knees and lift your legs up, bringing your knees towards your chest.
Step:4 At the same time, curl your pelvis up towards your chest, lifting your hips off the ground.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your legs and hips back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: cable tuck reverse crunch
instructions: Step:1 Attach a cable to a low pulley and lie down on a mat facing up.
Step:2 Hold the cable with both hands and extend your arms straight up above your chest.
Step:3 Bend your knees and lift your legs up, bringing your knees towards your chest.
Step:4 At the same time, curl your pelvis up towards your chest, lifting your hips off the ground.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your legs and hips back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: encogimiento inverso con cable en posición recogida
instructions: Paso:1 Conecta un cable a una polea baja y acuéstate en una colchoneta boca arriba.
Paso:2 Sostén el cable con ambas manos y extiende los brazos hacia arriba sobre el pecho.
Paso:3 Dobla las rodillas y levanta las piernas, llevando las rodillas hacia el pecho.
Paso:4 Al mismo tiempo, enrolla la pelvis hacia el pecho, levantando las caderas del suelo.
Paso:5 Pausa un momento en la parte superior, luego baja lentamente las piernas y las caderas de vuelta a la posición inicial.
Paso:6 Repite para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: barbell speed squat
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, toes slightly turned out.
Step:2 Hold the barbell across your back, resting it on your traps or rear shoulders.
Step:3 Engage your core and keep your chest up as you lower your hips back and down, as if sitting into a chair.
Step:4 Lower until your thighs are parallel to the ground, or as low as you can comfortably go.
Step:5 Drive through your heels to stand back up, squeezing your glutes at the top.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: barbell speed squat
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, toes slightly turned out.
Step:2 Hold the barbell across your back, resting it on your traps or rear shoulders.
Step:3 Engage your core and keep your chest up as you lower your hips back and down, as if sitting into a chair.
Step:4 Lower until your thighs are parallel to the ground, or as low as you can comfortably go.
Step:5 Drive through your heels to stand back up, squeezing your glutes at the top.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: sentadilla rápida con barra
instructions: Paso:1 Párate con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros, con los dedos ligeramente hacia afuera.
Paso:2 Sostén la barra sobre tu espalda, descansándola sobre los trapecios o la parte posterior de los hombros.
Paso:3 Activa el core y mantén el pecho arriba mientras bajas las caderas hacia atrás y abajo, como si te sentaras en una silla.
Paso:4 Baja hasta que los muslos estén paralelos al suelo, o tan bajo como puedas cómodamente.
Paso:5 Empuja a través de los talones para levantarte, apretando los glúteos en la parte superior.
Paso:6 Repite para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: sled calf press on leg press
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat of the leg press machine so that your knees are slightly bent when your feet are on the sled.
Step:2 Place your feet shoulder-width apart on the sled, with your toes pointing forward.
Step:3 Release the safety handles and push the sled away from you by extending your knees and ankles.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top of the movement, then slowly lower the sled back down by bending your knees and ankles.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: sled calf press on leg press
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat of the leg press machine so that your knees are slightly bent when your feet are on the sled.
Step:2 Place your feet shoulder-width apart on the sled, with your toes pointing forward.
Step:3 Release the safety handles and push the sled away from you by extending your knees and ankles.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top of the movement, then slowly lower the sled back down by bending your knees and ankles.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: press de pantorrillas en máquina de prensa de piernas
instructions: Paso:1 Ajusta el asiento de la máquina de prensa de piernas para que las rodillas estén ligeramente dobladas cuando los pies estén en el trineo.
Paso:2 Coloca los pies separados al ancho de los hombros en el trineo, con los dedos apuntando hacia adelante.
Paso:3 Suelta las manijas de seguridad y empuja el trineo lejos de ti extendiendo las rodillas y los tobillos.
Paso:4 Pausa un momento en la parte superior del movimiento, luego baja lentamente el trineo doblando las rodillas y los tobillos.
Paso:5 Repite para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: smith seated one leg calf raise
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the machine with your back against the pad and your feet on the footrest.
Step:2 Place one leg on the footrest and keep the other leg off the footrest.
Step:3 Using your calf muscles, raise your heel as high as possible.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your heel back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch legs and repeat.

translations.name: smith seated one leg calf raise
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the machine with your back against the pad and your feet on the footrest.
Step:2 Place one leg on the footrest and keep the other leg off the footrest.
Step:3 Using your calf muscles, raise your heel as high as possible.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your heel back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch legs and repeat.

translations.name: elevación de gemelo a una pierna sentado en smith
instructions: Paso:1 Siéntate en la máquina con la espalda contra el respaldo y los pies en el reposapiés.
Paso:2 Coloca una pierna en el reposapiés y mantén la otra pierna fuera del reposapiés.
Paso:3 Usando los músculos de la pantorrilla, levanta el talón lo más alto posible.
Paso:4 Pausa un momento en la parte superior, luego baja lentamente el talón de vuelta a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite para el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambia de pierna y repite.

name: ez barbell reverse grip curl
instructions: Step:1 Stand up straight with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold the ez barbell with an underhand grip.
Step:2 Keep your elbows close to your torso and your upper arms stationary throughout the exercise.
Step:3 Curl the barbell upwards by contracting your biceps, while exhaling.
Step:4 Continue to raise the barbell until your biceps are fully contracted and the barbell is at shoulder level.
Step:5 Hold the contracted position for a brief pause as you squeeze your biceps.
Step:6 Slowly begin to bring the barbell back to the starting position as you inhale.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: ez barbell reverse grip curl
instructions: Step:1 Stand up straight with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold the ez barbell with an underhand grip.
Step:2 Keep your elbows close to your torso and your upper arms stationary throughout the exercise.
Step:3 Curl the barbell upwards by contracting your biceps, while exhaling.
Step:4 Continue to raise the barbell until your biceps are fully contracted and the barbell is at shoulder level.
Step:5 Hold the contracted position for a brief pause as you squeeze your biceps.
Step:6 Slowly begin to bring the barbell back to the starting position as you inhale.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: curl con barra ez agarre inverso
instructions: Paso:1 Párate erguido con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y sostén la barra ez con agarre supino.
Paso:2 Mantén los codos cerca del torso y los brazos superiores estacionarios durante todo el ejercicio.
Paso:3 Curl la barra hacia arriba contrayendo los bíceps, mientras exhalas.
Paso:4 Continúa levantando la barra hasta que los bíceps estén completamente contraídos y la barra esté a la altura de los hombros.
Paso:5 Mantén la posición contraída por una breve pausa mientras aprietas los bíceps.
Paso:6 Comienza lentamente a bajar la barra de vuelta a la posición inicial mientras inhalas.
Paso:7 Repite para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: barbell lying close-grip press
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on a bench with your feet flat on the ground and your back pressed against the bench.
Step:2 Grasp the barbell with a close grip, hands shoulder-width apart, palms facing towards your feet.
Step:3 Lift the barbell off the rack and hold it directly above your chest with your arms fully extended.
Step:4 Slowly lower the barbell towards your chest, keeping your elbows close to your body.
Step:5 Pause for a moment when the barbell touches your chest, then push it back up to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: barbell lying close-grip press
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on a bench with your feet flat on the ground and your back pressed against the bench.
Step:2 Grasp the barbell with a close grip, hands shoulder-width apart, palms facing towards your feet.
Step:3 Lift the barbell off the rack and hold it directly above your chest with your arms fully extended.
Step:4 Slowly lower the barbell towards your chest, keeping your elbows close to your body.
Step:5 Pause for a moment when the barbell touches your chest, then push it back up to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: press tumbado con barra agarre cerrado
instructions: Paso:1 Acuéstate en un banco con los pies planos en el suelo y la espalda presionada contra el banco.
Paso:2 Agarra la barra con un agarre cerrado, manos separadas al ancho de los hombros, palmas mirando hacia los pies.
Paso:3 Levanta la barra del rack y sostenla directamente sobre el pecho con los brazos completamente extendidos.
Paso:4 Baja lentamente la barra hacia el pecho, manteniendo los codos cerca del cuerpo.
Paso:5 Pausa un momento cuando la barra toque el pecho, luego empújala de vuelta a la posición inicial.
Paso:6 Repite para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: weighted decline sit-up
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on a decline bench with your feet secured under the foot pads.
Step:2 Place your hands behind your head or across your chest.
Step:3 Engage your abs and slowly lift your upper body off the bench, curling forward until your torso is perpendicular to the ground.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your upper body back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: weighted decline sit-up
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on a decline bench with your feet secured under the foot pads.
Step:2 Place your hands behind your head or across your chest.
Step:3 Engage your abs and slowly lift your upper body off the bench, curling forward until your torso is perpendicular to the ground.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your upper body back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: abdominal declinado con peso
instructions: Paso:1 Acuéstate en un banco declinado con los pies asegurados bajo las almohadillas.
Paso:2 Coloca las manos detrás de la cabeza o cruzadas sobre el pecho.
Paso:3 Activa los abdominales y levanta lentamente la parte superior del cuerpo del banco, enrollándote hacia adelante hasta que el torso esté perpendicular al suelo.
Paso:4 Pausa un momento en la parte superior, luego baja lentamente la parte superior del cuerpo de vuelta a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell rear lunge
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a dumbbell in each hand.
Step:2 Take a step backward with your right foot, lowering your body into a lunge position.
Step:3 Bend your left knee and lower your body until your left thigh is parallel to the ground.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then push through your left heel to return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat on the other side, stepping back with your left foot.

translations.name: dumbbell rear lunge
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a dumbbell in each hand.
Step:2 Take a step backward with your right foot, lowering your body into a lunge position.
Step:3 Bend your left knee and lower your body until your left thigh is parallel to the ground.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then push through your left heel to return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat on the other side, stepping back with your left foot.

translations.name: zancada trasera con mancuernas
instructions: Paso:1 Párate con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros, sosteniendo una mancuerna en cada mano.
Paso:2 Da un paso hacia atrás con el pie derecho, bajando el cuerpo a una posición de zancada.
Paso:3 Dobla la rodilla izquierda y baja el cuerpo hasta que el muslo izquierdo esté paralelo al suelo.
Paso:4 Pausa un momento, luego empuja a través del talón izquierdo para volver a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite del otro lado, dando un paso atrás con el pie izquierdo.

name: barbell standing back wrist curl
instructions: Step:1 Stand up straight with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a barbell with an overhand grip.
Step:2 Rest the barbell on the back of your hands with your palms facing down and your fingers pointing towards your body.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arms stationary, exhale and curl your wrists upwards as far as possible.
Step:4 Hold the contracted position for a brief pause, then inhale and slowly lower the barbell back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: barbell standing back wrist curl
instructions: Step:1 Stand up straight with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a barbell with an overhand grip.
Step:2 Rest the barbell on the back of your hands with your palms facing down and your fingers pointing towards your body.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arms stationary, exhale and curl your wrists upwards as far as possible.
Step:4 Hold the contracted position for a brief pause, then inhale and slowly lower the barbell back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: curl de muñeca trasero de pie con barra
instructions: Paso:1 Párate erguido con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y sostén una barra con agarre prono.
Paso:2 Descansa la barra en la parte posterior de las manos con las palmas hacia abajo y los dedos apuntando hacia el cuerpo.
Paso:3 Manteniendo los brazos superiores estacionarios, exhala y curl las muñecas hacia arriba lo más posible.
Paso:4 Mantén la posición contraída por una breve pausa, luego inhala y baja lentamente la barra de vuelta a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell seated one leg calf raise - hammer grip
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench or chair with your feet flat on the ground and a dumbbell resting on your thighs.
Step:2 Place one foot on a raised surface, such as a step or block, with your heel hanging off the edge.
Step:3 Hold the dumbbell with a hammer grip, meaning your palms are facing each other and your fingers are wrapped around the handle.
