Step:4 Keeping your core engaged and your back straight, slowly raise your heel as high as possible by pushing through the ball of your foot.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your heel back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch to the other leg.

translations.name: dumbbell seated one leg calf raise - hammer grip
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench or chair with your feet flat on the ground and a dumbbell resting on your thighs.
Step:2 Place one foot on a raised surface, such as a step or block, with your heel hanging off the edge.
Step:3 Hold the dumbbell with a hammer grip, meaning your palms are facing each other and your fingers are wrapped around the handle.
Step:4 Keeping your core engaged and your back straight, slowly raise your heel as high as possible by pushing through the ball of your foot.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your heel back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch to the other leg.

translations.name: elevación de gemelo sentado a una pierna con mancuerna - agarre martillo
instructions: Paso:1 Siéntate en un banco o silla con los pies planos en el suelo y una mancuerna descansando sobre los muslos.
Paso:2 Coloca un pie en una superficie elevada, como un escalón o bloque, con el talón colgando del borde.
Paso:3 Sostén la mancuerna con agarre martillo, lo que significa que las palmas están enfrentadas y los dedos envuelven el mango.
Paso:4 Manteniendo el core activado y la espalda recta, levanta lentamente el talón lo más alto posible empujando a través de la planta del pie.
Paso:5 Pausa un momento en la parte superior, luego baja lentamente el talón de vuelta a la posición inicial.
Paso:6 Repite para el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambia a la otra pierna.

name: sled one leg calf press on leg press
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat of the leg press machine so that your knees are slightly bent when your feet are on the sled.
Step:2 Sit on the machine with your back against the backrest and your feet on the sled, shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Place your toes and the balls of your feet on the sled, keeping your heels off.
Step:4 Push the sled forward by extending your ankles, keeping your knees slightly bent.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the sled back down by flexing your ankles.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: sled one leg calf press on leg press
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat of the leg press machine so that your knees are slightly bent when your feet are on the sled.
Step:2 Sit on the machine with your back against the backrest and your feet on the sled, shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Place your toes and the balls of your feet on the sled, keeping your heels off.
Step:4 Push the sled forward by extending your ankles, keeping your knees slightly bent.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the sled back down by flexing your ankles.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: prensa de gemelo a una pierna en trineo con máquina de prensa
instructions: Paso:1 Ajusta el asiento de la máquina de prensa de piernas para que las rodillas estén ligeramente dobladas cuando los pies estén en el trineo.
Paso:2 Siéntate en la máquina con la espalda contra el respaldo y los pies en el trineo, separados al ancho de los hombros.
Paso:3 Coloca los dedos y la planta de los pies en el trineo, manteniendo los talones fuera.
Paso:4 Empuja el trineo hacia adelante extendiendo los tobillos, manteniendo las rodillas ligeramente dobladas.
Paso:5 Pausa un momento en la parte superior, luego baja lentamente el trineo flexionando los tobillos.
Paso:6 Repite para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: assisted seated pectoralis major stretch with stability ball
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a stability ball with your feet flat on the ground and your back straight.
Step:2 Hold a stability ball with both hands and extend your arms straight out in front of you.
Step:3 Slowly lower the stability ball towards your chest, feeling a stretch in your pectoral muscles.
Step:4 Hold the stretch for a few seconds, then slowly return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: assisted seated pectoralis major stretch with stability ball
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a stability ball with your feet flat on the ground and your back straight.
Step:2 Hold a stability ball with both hands and extend your arms straight out in front of you.
Step:3 Slowly lower the stability ball towards your chest, feeling a stretch in your pectoral muscles.
Step:4 Hold the stretch for a few seconds, then slowly return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: estiramiento asistido de pectoral mayor sentado con pelota de estabilidad
instructions: Paso:1 Siéntate en una pelota de estabilidad con los pies planos en el suelo y la espalda recta.
Paso:2 Sostén una pelota de estabilidad con ambas manos y extiende los brazos rectos hacia adelante.
Paso:3 Baja lentamente la pelota de estabilidad hacia el pecho, sintiendo un estiramiento en los músculos pectorales.
Paso:4 Mantén el estiramiento por unos segundos, luego regresa lentamente a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: calf stretch with rope
instructions: Step:1 Stand facing a wall or sturdy object with your feet hip-width apart.
Step:2 Hold the ends of the rope in each hand and place the middle of the rope around the ball of your right foot.
Step:3 Step back with your left foot, keeping your heel on the ground and your leg straight.
Step:4 Lean forward, keeping your back straight, and gently pull on the rope to stretch your calf.
Step:5 Hold the stretch for 20-30 seconds, then release.
Step:6 Repeat on the other leg.

translations.name: calf stretch with rope
instructions: Step:1 Stand facing a wall or sturdy object with your feet hip-width apart.
Step:2 Hold the ends of the rope in each hand and place the middle of the rope around the ball of your right foot.
Step:3 Step back with your left foot, keeping your heel on the ground and your leg straight.
Step:4 Lean forward, keeping your back straight, and gently pull on the rope to stretch your calf.
Step:5 Hold the stretch for 20-30 seconds, then release.
Step:6 Repeat on the other leg.

translations.name: estiramiento de gemelo con cuerda
instructions: Paso:1 Párate frente a una pared u objeto sólido con los pies separados al ancho de las caderas.
Paso:2 Sostén los extremos de la cuerda en cada mano y coloca la mitad de la cuerda alrededor de la planta del pie derecho.
Paso:3 Da un paso atrás con el pie izquierdo, manteniendo el talón en el suelo y la pierna recta.
Paso:4 Inclínate hacia adelante, manteniendo la espalda recta, y tira suavemente de la cuerda para estirar el gemelo.
Paso:5 Mantén el estiramiento por 20-30 segundos, luego suelta.
Paso:6 Repite con la otra pierna.

name: band concentration curl
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench or chair with your legs spread apart and your feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Hold one end of the band in your hand and step on the other end with your foot on the same side.
Step:3 Lean forward slightly and rest your elbow on the inside of your thigh, just above the knee.
Step:4 With your palm facing up, slowly curl your hand towards your shoulder, keeping your upper arm stationary.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your hand back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides.

translations.name: band concentration curl
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench or chair with your legs spread apart and your feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Hold one end of the band in your hand and step on the other end with your foot on the same side.
Step:3 Lean forward slightly and rest your elbow on the inside of your thigh, just above the knee.
Step:4 With your palm facing up, slowly curl your hand towards your shoulder, keeping your upper arm stationary.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your hand back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides.

translations.name: curl de concentración con banda
instructions: Paso:1 Siéntate en un banco o silla con las piernas separadas y los pies planos en el suelo.
Paso:2 Sostén un extremo de la banda en la mano y pisa el otro extremo con el pie del mismo lado.
Paso:3 Inclínate ligeramente hacia adelante y apoya el codo en el interior del muslo, justo encima de la rodilla.
Paso:4 Con la palma hacia arriba, curl lentamente la mano hacia el hombro, manteniendo el brazo superior estacionario.
Paso:5 Pausa un momento en la parte superior, luego baja lentamente la mano de vuelta a la posición inicial.
Paso:6 Repite para el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambia de lado.

name: push-up (bosu ball)
instructions: Step:1 Place the bosu ball on the ground with the flat side facing up.
Step:2 Position yourself in a push-up position with your hands on the outer edges of the bosu ball.
Step:3 Engage your core and lower your body down towards the bosu ball by bending your elbows.
Step:4 Push yourself back up to the starting position by extending your arms.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: push-up (bosu ball)
instructions: Step:1 Place the bosu ball on the ground with the flat side facing up.
Step:2 Position yourself in a push-up position with your hands on the outer edges of the bosu ball.
Step:3 Engage your core and lower your body down towards the bosu ball by bending your elbows.
Step:4 Push yourself back up to the starting position by extending your arms.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: flexión (pelota bosu)
instructions: Paso:1 Coloca la pelota bosu en el suelo con el lado plano hacia arriba.
Paso:2 Posiciónate en posición de flexión con las manos en los bordes exteriores de la pelota bosu.
Paso:3 Activa el core y baja el cuerpo hacia la pelota bosu doblando los codos.
Paso:4 Empújate de vuelta a la posición inicial extendiendo los brazos.
Paso:5 Repite para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: tire flip
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, facing the tire.
Step:2 Bend your knees and hinge at the hips, lowering into a squat position.
Step:3 Reach down and grab the bottom edge of the tire with both hands, fingers facing towards you.
Step:4 Engage your glutes and leg muscles, and explosively drive through your legs to lift the tire off the ground.
Step:5 As the tire flips over, use your upper body strength to guide it and maintain control.
Step:6 Once the tire is fully flipped, quickly step back and reset your stance.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: tire flip
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, facing the tire.
Step:2 Bend your knees and hinge at the hips, lowering into a squat position.
Step:3 Reach down and grab the bottom edge of the tire with both hands, fingers facing towards you.
Step:4 Engage your glutes and leg muscles, and explosively drive through your legs to lift the tire off the ground.
Step:5 As the tire flips over, use your upper body strength to guide it and maintain control.
Step:6 Once the tire is fully flipped, quickly step back and reset your stance.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: volteo de neumático
instructions: Paso:1 Párate con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros, frente al neumático.
Paso:2 Dobla las rodillas y flexiona las caderas, bajando a una posición de sentadilla.
Paso:3 Agáchate y agarra el borde inferior del neumático con ambas manos, con los dedos apuntando hacia ti.
Paso:4 Activa los glúteos y los músculos de las piernas, y empuja explosivamente a través de las piernas para levantar el neumático del suelo.
Paso:5 A medida que el neumático se voltea, usa la fuerza de la parte superior del cuerpo para guiarlo y mantener el control.
Paso:6 Una vez que el neumático esté completamente volteado, da un paso atrás rápidamente y reajusta tu postura.
Paso:7 Repite para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell alternate biceps curl
instructions: Step:1 Stand up straight with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing forward and arms fully extended.
Step:2 Keeping your upper arms stationary, exhale and curl the weights while contracting your biceps.
Step:3 Continue to raise the dumbbells until your biceps are fully contracted and the dumbbells are at shoulder level.
Step:4 Hold the contracted position for a brief pause as you squeeze your biceps.
Step:5 Inhale and slowly begin to lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, alternating arms.

translations.name: dumbbell alternate biceps curl
instructions: Step:1 Stand up straight with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing forward and arms fully extended.
Step:2 Keeping your upper arms stationary, exhale and curl the weights while contracting your biceps.
Step:3 Continue to raise the dumbbells until your biceps are fully contracted and the dumbbells are at shoulder level.
Step:4 Hold the contracted position for a brief pause as you squeeze your biceps.
Step:5 Inhale and slowly begin to lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, alternating arms.

translations.name: curl de biceps alternado con mancuernas
instructions: Paso:1 Párate derecho con una mancuerna en cada mano, palmas hacia adelante y brazos completamente extendidos.
Paso:2 Manteniendo los brazos superiores estacionarios, exhala y curl las pesas mientras contraes los bíceps.
Paso:3 Continúa levantando las mancuernas hasta que los bíceps estén completamente contraídos y las mancuernas estén a nivel del hombro.
Paso:4 Mantén la posición contraída por una breve pausa mientras aprietas los bíceps.
Paso:5 Inhala y comienza a bajar lentamente las mancuernas de vuelta a la posición inicial.
Paso:6 Repite para el número deseado de repeticiones, alternando los brazos.

name: barbell standing reverse grip curl
instructions: Step:1 Stand up straight with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a barbell with an underhand grip, palms facing up.
Step:2 Keep your elbows close to your torso and your upper arms stationary.
Step:3 Exhale and curl the weights while contracting your biceps, bringing the barbell as close to your shoulders as possible.
Step:4 Hold the contracted position for a brief pause as you squeeze your biceps.
Step:5 Inhale and slowly lower the barbell back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: barbell standing reverse grip curl
instructions: Step:1 Stand up straight with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a barbell with an underhand grip, palms facing up.
Step:2 Keep your elbows close to your torso and your upper arms stationary.
Step:3 Exhale and curl the weights while contracting your biceps, bringing the barbell as close to your shoulders as possible.
Step:4 Hold the contracted position for a brief pause as you squeeze your biceps.
Step:5 Inhale and slowly lower the barbell back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: curl con barra de pie con agarre inverso
instructions: Paso:1 Párate derecho con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y sostén una barra con un agarre prono, palmas hacia arriba.
Paso:2 Mantén los codos cerca del torso y los brazos superiores estacionarios.
Paso:3 Exhala y curl las pesas mientras contraes los bíceps, llevando la barra lo más cerca posible de los hombros.
Paso:4 Mantén la posición contraída por una breve pausa mientras aprietas los bíceps.
Paso:5 Inhala y baja lentamente la barra de vuelta a la posición inicial.
Paso:6 Repite para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell seated curl
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your feet flat on the ground and a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing forward.
Step:2 Keep your back straight and your elbows close to your torso.
Step:3 Exhale and curl the dumbbells up towards your shoulders, contracting your biceps.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then inhale and slowly lower the dumbbells back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell seated curl
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your feet flat on the ground and a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing forward.
Step:2 Keep your back straight and your elbows close to your torso.
Step:3 Exhale and curl the dumbbells up towards your shoulders, contracting your biceps.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then inhale and slowly lower the dumbbells back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: curl con mancuernas sentado
instructions: Paso:1 Siéntate en un banco con los pies planos en el suelo y una mancuerna en cada mano, palmas hacia adelante.
Paso:2 Mantén la espalda recta y los codos cerca del torso.
Paso:3 Exhala y curl las mancuernas hacia los hombros, contrayendo los bíceps.
Paso:4 Pausa un momento en la parte superior, luego inhala y baja lentamente las mancuernas de vuelta a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell raise
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing your body.
Step:2 Keep your back straight and engage your core.
Step:3 Raise your arms out to the sides until they are parallel to the floor, keeping a slight bend in your elbows.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your arms back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Dumbbell Raise
instructions: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing your body.
Keep your back straight and engage your core.
Raise your arms out to the sides until they are parallel to the floor, keeping a slight bend in your elbows.
Pause briefly at the top, then slowly lower your arms back to the starting position.
Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Elevación con mancuernas
instructions: Ponte de pie con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y sostén una mancuerna en cada mano, con las palmas hacia el cuerpo.
Mantén la espalda recta y el abdomen contraído.
Levanta los brazos hacia los lados hasta que estén paralelos al suelo, manteniendo una ligera flexión en los codos.
Haz una breve pausa arriba y luego baja lentamente los brazos a la posición inicial.
Repite el movimiento las veces deseadas.

name: medicine ball catch and overhead throw
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a medicine ball in both hands at chest level.
Step:2 Bend your knees slightly and engage your core.
Step:3 Lower your body into a squat position, keeping your back straight and chest up.
Step:4 Explosively extend your hips and legs, while simultaneously throwing the medicine ball overhead.
Step:5 Release the ball at the top of the movement and catch it on the way down.
Step:6 Lower your body back into the squat position and repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Medicine Ball Catch and Overhead Throw
instructions: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a medicine ball in both hands at chest level.
Bend your knees slightly and engage your core.
Lower into a squat position while keeping your back straight and chest up.
Explosively extend your hips and legs while throwing the medicine ball overhead.
Release the ball at the top of the movement and catch it on the way down.
Return to the squat position and repeat.

translations.name: Lanzamiento por encima de la cabeza con balón medicinal
instructions: Ponte de pie con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y sostiene un balón medicinal a la altura del pecho.
Flexiona ligeramente las rodillas y contrae el abdomen.
Desciende a una posición de sentadilla manteniendo la espalda recta y el pecho erguido.
Extiende explosivamente las caderas y piernas mientras lanzas el balón por encima de la cabeza.
Suelta el balón en la parte más alta del movimiento y atrápalo al descender.
Regresa a la posición de sentadilla y repite el movimiento.

name: spider crawl push up
instructions: Step:1 Start in a push-up position with your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart and your feet together.
Step:2 Bring your right knee towards your right elbow, keeping it off the ground.
Step:3 As you bring your right knee back, simultaneously lower your body towards the ground by bending your elbows.
Step:4 Push back up to the starting position and repeat with your left knee towards your left elbow.
Step:5 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Spider Crawl Push-Up
instructions: Start in a push-up position with hands slightly wider than shoulder-width and feet together.
Bring your right knee toward your right elbow without touching the ground.
As you return the leg, lower your body by bending your elbows.
Push back to the starting position and repeat with the other leg.
Alternate sides for the desired reps.

translations.name: Flexión con arrastre tipo araña
instructions: Comienza en posición de flexión con las manos un poco más abiertas que los hombros y los pies juntos.
Lleva la rodilla derecha hacia el codo derecho sin tocar el suelo.
Mientras regresas la pierna, baja el cuerpo doblando los codos.
Empuja de nuevo a la posición inicial y repite con la pierna izquierda.
Alterna los lados durante las repeticiones deseadas.

name: dumbbell kickback
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a dumbbell in each hand.
Step:2 Bend your knees slightly and hinge forward at the hips, keeping your back straight.
Step:3 Bring your upper arms close to your sides, with your elbows bent at a 90-degree angle.
Step:4 Extend your arms straight back, squeezing your triceps at the top of the movement.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then slowly lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Dumbbell Kickback
instructions: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart holding a dumbbell in each hand.
Slightly bend your knees and hinge forward at the hips, keeping your back straight.
Keep your upper arms close to your sides and elbows at 90 degrees.
Extend your arms backward, squeezing your triceps at the top.
Pause briefly, then lower the weights slowly.
Repeat.

translations.name: Extensión de tríceps con mancuernas
instructions: Ponte de pie con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y una mancuerna en cada mano.
Flexiona ligeramente las rodillas y lleva el torso hacia adelante con la espalda recta.
Mantén los brazos superiores pegados al cuerpo y los codos a 90 grados.
Extiende los brazos hacia atrás contrayendo los tríceps en la parte alta.
Haz una breve pausa y baja lentamente las mancuernas.
Repite el movimiento.

name: band straight back stiff leg deadlift
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and place the band around your upper legs.
Step:2 Hold the band with both hands in front of your thighs, palms facing your body.
Step:3 Keeping your back straight and your knees slightly bent, hinge at the hips and lower the band towards the ground.
Step:4 Feel the stretch in your hamstrings as you lower the band.
Step:5 Engage your glutes and hamstrings to lift your body back up to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Band Straight Back Stiff Leg Deadlift
instructions: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and place the band around your upper legs.
Hold the band in front of your thighs, palms facing your body.
Keep your back straight and knees slightly bent as you hinge at the hips.
Lower until you feel a stretch in your hamstrings.
Engage glutes and hamstrings to return to start.
Repeat.

translations.name: Peso muerto con piernas rígidas usando banda
instructions: Ponte de pie con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y coloca la banda alrededor de tus piernas superiores.
Sujeta la banda frente a los muslos con las palmas hacia el cuerpo.
Mantén la espalda recta y las rodillas ligeramente flexionadas mientras inclinas la cadera hacia adelante.
Desciende hasta sentir el estiramiento en los isquiotibiales.
Activa glúteos y femorales para volver a la posición inicial.
Repite.

name: barbell rear delt row
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and knees slightly bent.
Step:2 Hold a barbell with an overhand grip, hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Bend forward at the hips, keeping your back straight and chest up.
Step:4 Pull the barbell towards your chest, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the barbell back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Barbell Rear Delt Row
instructions: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and knees slightly bent.
Hold a barbell with an overhand grip slightly wider than shoulder width.
Bend forward at the hips keeping your back straight.
Pull the barbell toward your chest while squeezing your shoulder blades.
Pause at the top, then lower the barbell slowly.
Repeat.

translations.name: Remo posterior con barra
instructions: Colócate de pie con los pies al ancho de los hombros y las rodillas ligeramente flexionadas.
Sujeta una barra con agarre prono (palmas hacia abajo) un poco más ancho que los hombros.
Inclina el torso hacia adelante manteniendo la espalda recta.
Lleva la barra hacia el pecho contrayendo los omóplatos.
Haz una breve pausa y baja lentamente la barra.
Repite el movimiento.

name: swing 360
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and knees slightly bent.
Step:2 Hold your arms straight out in front of you, parallel to the ground.
Step:3 Engage your core and swing your arms in a circular motion, rotating your torso as you do so.
Step:4 Continue the circular motion, swinging your arms and rotating your torso for the desired number of repetitions.
Step:5 Remember to breathe throughout the exercise.

translations.name: Swing 360
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart and knees slightly bent.
Extend your arms straight in front of you, parallel to the floor.
Engage your core and swing your arms in a circular motion, rotating your torso.
Continue the motion for the desired number of reps.
Remember to breathe steadily throughout.

translations.name: Giro 360
instructions: Ponte de pie con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y las rodillas ligeramente flexionadas.
Extiende los brazos al frente, paralelos al suelo.
Activa el core y mueve los brazos en círculos mientras giras el torso.
Mantén el movimiento circular durante las repeticiones deseadas.
Recuerda respirar de forma constante durante el ejercicio.

name: chin-up
instructions: Step:1 Hang from a pull-up bar with your palms facing towards you and your hands shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Engage your core and pull your body up towards the bar, leading with your chest.
Step:3 Continue pulling until your chin is above the bar.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your body back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Chin-Up
instructions: Hang from a pull-up bar with palms facing you and hands shoulder-width apart.
Engage your core and pull your body up until your chin clears the bar.
Lead with your chest and avoid swinging.
Pause at the top, then lower yourself slowly.
Repeat for the desired reps.

translations.name: Dominada supina
instructions: Cuelga de una barra con las palmas mirando hacia ti y las manos al ancho de los hombros.
Activa el abdomen y tira del cuerpo hacia arriba hasta que el mentón supere la barra.
Lidera el movimiento con el pecho y evita balancearte.
Haz una breve pausa arriba y desciende lentamente.
Repite las veces necesarias.

name: dumbbell seated alternate front raise
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your back straight and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell in each hand with your palms facing your body and arms extended down by your sides.
Step:3 Keeping your arms straight, raise one dumbbell in front of you until it is parallel to the ground.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbell back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat with the other arm.
Step:6 Alternate between arms for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Seated Alternating Dumbbell Front Raise
instructions: Sit on a bench with your back straight and feet flat on the floor.
Hold a dumbbell in each hand with palms facing your body.
Raise one arm in front of you until it’s parallel to the ground.
Pause briefly, then lower slowly.
Repeat with the other arm, alternating between sides.

translations.name: Elevación frontal alternada sentado con mancuernas
instructions: Siéntate en un banco con la espalda recta y los pies apoyados en el suelo.
Sujeta una mancuerna en cada mano con las palmas hacia el cuerpo.
Levanta un brazo al frente hasta que quede paralelo al suelo.
Haz una breve pausa y bájalo lentamente.
Repite con el otro brazo, alternando entre ambos.

name: flexion leg sit up (bent knee)
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Place your hands behind your head with your elbows pointing outwards.
Step:3 Engaging your abs, slowly lift your upper body off the ground, curling forward until your torso is at a 45-degree angle.
Step:4 At the same time, lift your legs off the ground, bending your knees and bringing them towards your chest.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your upper body and legs back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Bent-Knee Sit-Up
instructions: Lie on your back with knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Place your hands behind your head with elbows wide.
Engage your abs and curl your torso up to about 45 degrees.
Lift your legs toward your chest as you rise.
Pause briefly, then return slowly to the starting position.
Repeat.

translations.name: Abdominal con piernas flexionadas
instructions: Acuéstate boca arriba con las rodillas dobladas y los pies apoyados en el suelo.
Coloca las manos detrás de la cabeza con los codos hacia afuera.
Activa los abdominales y eleva el torso unos 45 grados.
Al mismo tiempo, levanta las piernas hacia el pecho.
Haz una breve pausa arriba y regresa lentamente a la posición inicial.
Repite.

name: lever seated crunch v. 2
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the leverage machine with your back against the pad and your feet secured under the footpads.
Step:2 Place your hands on the handles or the sides of the seat for support.
Step:3 Engage your abs and slowly crunch forward, bringing your chest towards your knees.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top of the movement, squeezing your abs.
Step:5 Slowly return to the starting position, allowing your back to round slightly.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Lever Seated Crunch (Version 2)
instructions: Sit on the leverage machine with your back against the pad and feet secured.
Hold the handles or seat sides for support.
Engage your abs and crunch forward, bringing your chest toward your knees.
Pause briefly at the top, squeezing your abs.
Return slowly to the starting position and repeat.

translations.name: Crunch en máquina sentado (versión 2)
instructions: Siéntate en la máquina de palanca con la espalda apoyada y los pies asegurados.
Sujeta las asas o los costados del asiento para estabilizarte.
Activa los abdominales y flexiona el torso hacia adelante llevando el pecho hacia las rodillas.
Haz una breve pausa arriba contrayendo los abdominales.
Regresa lentamente a la posición inicial y repite.

name: dumbbell one arm seated bicep curl on exercise ball
instructions: Step:1 Sit on an exercise ball with your feet flat on the ground and your back straight.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell in one hand with your palm facing up and your arm fully extended.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arm stationary, curl the dumbbell towards your shoulder by contracting your biceps.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

translations.name: One-Arm Seated Dumbbell Curl on Exercise Ball
instructions: Sit on an exercise ball with feet flat on the ground and back straight.
Hold a dumbbell with one hand, palm facing upward.
Keep the upper arm still and curl the dumbbell toward your shoulder.
Pause at the top, then lower slowly.
Repeat and switch arms.

translations.name: Curl de bíceps con mancuerna en balón de estabilidad (un brazo)
instructions: Siéntate sobre una pelota de ejercicio con los pies apoyados en el suelo y la espalda recta.
Sujeta una mancuerna con una mano, con la palma mirando hacia arriba.
Mantén el brazo superior inmóvil y flexiona el codo llevando la mancuerna hacia el hombro.
Haz una breve pausa arriba y baja lentamente.
Repite y cambia de brazo.

name: side push-up
instructions: Step:1 Start by lying on your side with your legs extended and stacked on top of each other.
Step:2 Place your bottom hand on the ground directly under your shoulder, fingers pointing forward.
Step:3 Press through your bottom hand to lift your body off the ground, keeping your legs straight and your core engaged.
Step:4 Extend your top arm straight up towards the ceiling, creating a straight line from your head to your heels.
Step:5 Lower your body back down to the starting position with control.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides.

translations.name: Side Push-Up
instructions: Lie on your side with legs extended and stacked.
Place your lower hand under your shoulder, fingers forward.
Push through the hand to lift your body, keeping legs straight and core tight.
Raise your top arm toward the ceiling, forming a straight line from head to heels.
Lower yourself slowly back down with control.
Repeat and switch sides.

translations.name: Flexión lateral
instructions: Acuéstate de lado con las piernas extendidas una sobre otra.
Coloca la mano inferior debajo del hombro con los dedos apuntando hacia adelante.
Empuja con la mano inferior para levantar el cuerpo, manteniendo las piernas rectas y el abdomen firme.
Extiende el brazo superior hacia el techo formando una línea recta desde la cabeza hasta los talones.
Baja lentamente el cuerpo con control.
Repite y cambia de lado.

name: ez barbell close-grip curl
instructions: Step:1 Stand up straight with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold the ez barbell with an underhand grip, hands shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Keep your elbows close to your torso and your upper arms stationary throughout the movement.
Step:3 Curl the barbell up towards your shoulders, contracting your biceps.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the barbell back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: EZ Barbell Close-Grip Curl
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart and hold the EZ bar with an underhand grip.
Keep elbows close to the torso and upper arms still.
Curl the bar toward your shoulders while contracting your biceps.
Pause at the top, then lower slowly.
Repeat.

translations.name: Curl con barra EZ agarre cerrado
instructions: Ponte de pie con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y sujeta la barra EZ con agarre supino.
Mantén los codos cerca del torso y los brazos superiores inmóviles.
Flexiona los codos llevando la barra hacia los hombros contrayendo los bíceps.
Haz una breve pausa arriba y baja lentamente.
Repite el movimiento.

name: exercise ball prone leg raise
instructions: Step:1 Lie face down on a mat with your legs extended and your toes resting on top of the stability ball.
Step:2 Place your hands on the ground, shoulder-width apart, and engage your core muscles.
Step:3 Keeping your legs straight, slowly lift them off the ground, using your lower back and glutes to raise them as high as possible.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your legs back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Exercise Ball Prone Leg Raise
instructions: Lie face down with your toes resting on a stability ball.
Place your hands on the ground shoulder-width apart and engage your core.
Lift your straight legs upward using your glutes and lower back.
Pause briefly at the top, then lower slowly.
Repeat.

translations.name: Elevación de piernas en balón de estabilidad
instructions: Acuéstate boca abajo con los dedos de los pies apoyados sobre una pelota de estabilidad.
Coloca las manos en el suelo al ancho de los hombros y activa el abdomen.
Levanta las piernas rectas usando los glúteos y la zona lumbar.
Haz una breve pausa arriba y baja lentamente.
Repite el movimiento.

name: kettlebell alternating press on floor
instructions: Step:1 Start by lying on your back on the floor with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Hold a kettlebell in each hand, with your palms facing towards your feet and your arms extended straight up towards the ceiling.
Step:3 Lower one kettlebell down towards your shoulder while keeping the other kettlebell extended straight up.
Step:4 Press the lowered kettlebell back up to the starting position while simultaneously lowering the other kettlebell down towards your shoulder.
Step:5 Continue alternating the press motion with each kettlebell for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Alternating Kettlebell Floor Press
instructions: Lie on your back with knees bent and feet flat.
Hold a kettlebell in each hand, arms extended upward.
Lower one kettlebell toward your shoulder while keeping the other arm extended.
Press it back up while lowering the opposite kettlebell.
Alternate sides for the desired reps.

translations.name: Press alternado con kettlebell en el suelo
instructions: Acuéstate boca arriba con las rodillas dobladas y los pies apoyados.
Sostén una kettlebell en cada mano con los brazos extendidos hacia arriba.
Baja una kettlebell hacia el hombro mientras mantienes la otra extendida.
Empuja hacia arriba la kettlebell bajada mientras desciendes la otra.
Alterna los lados durante las repeticiones deseadas.

name: lever kneeling leg curl
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the machine to fit your body and select the desired weight.
Step:2 Kneel on the machine facing downwards, with your knees resting on the pad and your feet secured under the footpads.
Step:3 Grasp the handles or the sides of the machine for stability.
Step:4 Keeping your upper body stationary, exhale and curl your legs up towards your glutes by flexing your knees.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top of the movement, squeezing your hamstrings.
Step:6 Inhale and slowly lower your legs back to the starting position, fully extending your knees.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Lever Kneeling Leg Curl
instructions: Adjust the machine and select weight.
Kneel on the pad facing down with feet secured.
Hold the handles for stability.
Curl your legs toward your glutes, exhaling as you lift.
Pause and squeeze your hamstrings.
Lower slowly to the start and repeat.

translations.name: Curl de piernas en máquina arrodillado
instructions: Ajusta la máquina según tu cuerpo y elige el peso adecuado.
Arrodíllate sobre la máquina mirando hacia abajo con los pies asegurados.
Sujeta las asas para mantener la estabilidad.
Flexiona las rodillas llevando los talones hacia los glúteos mientras exhalas.
Haz una breve pausa contrayendo los isquiotibiales.
Baja lentamente hasta extender las piernas y repite.

name: twisted leg raise (female)
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your legs extended and your arms by your sides.
Step:2 Bend your knees and lift your legs off the ground, bringing them towards your chest.
Step:3 As you lift your legs, twist your hips to one side, bringing your knees towards your opposite shoulder.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your legs back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat the movement, this time twisting your hips to the other side.
Step:6 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Twisted Leg Raise
instructions: Lie on your back with legs extended and arms at your sides.
Lift your legs and bend your knees toward your chest.
Twist your hips, bringing your knees toward the opposite shoulder.
Pause briefly, then return to the starting position.
Alternate sides for the desired reps.

translations.name: Elevación de piernas con giro
instructions: Acuéstate boca arriba con las piernas extendidas y los brazos a los costados.
Levanta las piernas doblando las rodillas hacia el pecho.
Gira las caderas llevando las rodillas hacia el hombro contrario.
Haz una breve pausa y baja lentamente a la posición inicial.
Alterna los lados durante las repeticiones deseadas.

name: cable decline press
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the cable machine to a decline position.
Step:2 Sit on the decline bench facing the cable machine.
Step:3 Grasp the handles with an overhand grip and position them at chest level.
Step:4 Keep your feet flat on the ground and your back firmly against the bench.
Step:5 Exhale and push the handles away from your body, extending your arms fully.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the end of the movement, squeezing your chest muscles.
Step:7 Inhale and slowly return the handles back to the starting position.
Step:8 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: barbell upright row
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a barbell with an overhand grip, hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Let the barbell hang in front of your thighs, arms fully extended.
Step:3 Keeping your back straight and core engaged, exhale and lift the barbell straight up towards your chin, leading with your elbows.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then inhale and slowly lower the barbell back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: dumbbell one arm lateral raise
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a dumbbell in one hand with your palm facing your body.
Step:2 Keep your back straight and your core engaged throughout the exercise.
Step:3 Raise the dumbbell to the side, keeping your arm straight and your palm facing down.
Step:4 Continue lifting until your arm is parallel to the ground.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch to the other arm.

name: dumbbell cuban press
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a dumbbell in each hand at shoulder height with your palms facing down.
Step:2 Keeping your core engaged and your elbows slightly bent, press the dumbbells up and overhead until your arms are fully extended.
Step:3 Rotate your wrists so that your palms are facing forward.
Step:4 Slowly lower the dumbbells back to the starting position, rotating your wrists back to the starting position as you do so.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: isometric wipers
instructions: Step:1 Start by lying flat on your back on a mat or bench.
Step:2 Extend your arms straight out to the sides, perpendicular to your body.
Step:3 Engage your core and lift both legs off the ground, keeping them together and straight.
Step:4 Slowly lower your legs to one side, aiming to touch the ground with your feet while maintaining control.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then use your core to lift your legs back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat the movement, this time lowering your legs to the opposite side.
Step:7 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

name: dumbbell incline breeding
instructions: Step:1 Set up an incline bench at a 45-degree angle.
Step:2 Sit on the bench with your back against the pad and feet flat on the ground.
Step:3 Hold a dumbbell in each hand with an overhand grip, palms facing forward.
Step:4 Start with your arms fully extended, perpendicular to the ground.
Step:5 Lower the dumbbells slowly to the sides of your chest, keeping your elbows at a 90-degree angle.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push the dumbbells back up to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: barbell standing wide grip biceps curl
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a barbell with an underhand grip, hands wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Keep your back straight and your elbows close to your torso.
Step:3 Exhale and curl the barbell up towards your shoulders, keeping your upper arms stationary.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, squeezing your biceps.
Step:5 Inhale and slowly lower the barbell back to the starting position, fully extending your arms.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: barbell squat (on knees)
instructions: Step:1 Start by kneeling on the ground with your knees hip-width apart and your toes pointing forward.
Step:2 Place a barbell across your shoulders, gripping it with an overhand grip and your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Engage your core and keep your chest lifted as you slowly lower your body down by bending your knees, keeping your back straight.
Step:4 Continue lowering until your thighs are parallel to the ground, or as low as you can comfortably go.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push through your heels to return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: barbell palms up wrist curl over a bench
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your feet flat on the ground and hold a barbell with an underhand grip, palms facing up.
Step:2 Rest your forearms on the bench, allowing your wrists to hang off the edge.
Step:3 Keeping your forearms stationary, exhale and curl your wrists upwards as far as possible.
Step:4 Hold the contracted position for a brief pause, then inhale and slowly lower the barbell back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: smith rear delt row
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and position yourself on the machine with your chest against the pad and your feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Grasp the handles with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Keep your back straight and your core engaged as you pull the handles towards your chest, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top of the movement, then slowly release the handles back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: weighted seated twist (on stability ball)
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a stability ball with your feet flat on the ground and your knees bent at a 90-degree angle.
Step:2 Hold a weight plate or dumbbell with both hands close to your chest.
Step:3 Engage your core and slowly rotate your torso to one side, keeping your hips stable.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the end of the rotation, then slowly return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat the rotation to the other side.
Step:6 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

name: inverted row
instructions: Step:1 Set up a bar at waist height or use a suspension trainer.
Step:2 Stand facing the bar or suspension trainer, with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Grab the bar or handles with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:4 Lean back, keeping your body straight and your heels on the ground.
Step:5 Pull your chest towards the bar or handles, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower yourself back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: cable press on exercise ball
instructions: Step:1 Sit on an exercise ball with your feet flat on the ground and your knees at a 90-degree angle.
Step:2 Hold the cable handles at chest height with your palms facing down and your elbows bent.
Step:3 Engage your core and press the cable handles forward until your arms are fully extended.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then slowly release the tension and bring the cable handles back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: dumbbell decline triceps extension
instructions: Step:1 Lie on a decline bench with your head lower than your feet and hold a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing each other.
Step:2 Extend your arms fully, keeping your elbows close to your head.
Step:3 Lower the dumbbells slowly behind your head, bending your elbows.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then raise the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: cable lying bicep curl
instructions: Step:1 Attach a straight bar to a low pulley cable machine.
Step:2 Lie face up on a flat bench with your feet flat on the ground.
Step:3 Grasp the bar with an underhand grip, hands shoulder-width apart.
Step:4 Extend your arms fully, keeping your elbows close to your sides.
Step:5 Keeping your upper arms stationary, exhale and curl the bar up towards your shoulders.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the top, squeezing your biceps.
Step:7 Inhale and slowly lower the bar back to the starting position, fully extending your arms.
Step:8 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: barbell seated good morning
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your feet flat on the ground and a barbell resting on your back.
Step:2 Keep your back straight and your chest up.
Step:3 Slowly hinge forward at the hips, lowering your torso towards the ground.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push through your heels to return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: weighted cossack squats (male)
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet wider than shoulder-width apart and toes pointing slightly outward.
Step:2 Hold a weight in front of your chest with both hands.
Step:3 Shift your weight to one side and lower your body by bending the knee of the side you shifted towards, while keeping the other leg straight.
Step:4 Go as low as you can while maintaining balance and keeping your chest up.
Step:5 Push through the heel of the bent leg to return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat on the other side, alternating between legs.

name: cable reverse curl
instructions: Step:1 Attach a straight bar to a low pulley cable machine.
Step:2 Stand facing the machine with your feet shoulder-width apart and your knees slightly bent.
Step:3 Grasp the bar with an underhand grip, hands shoulder-width apart.
Step:4 Keep your elbows close to your sides and your upper arms stationary throughout the exercise.
Step:5 Exhale and curl the bar up towards your shoulders, contracting your biceps.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the top, squeezing your biceps.
Step:7 Inhale and slowly lower the bar back to the starting position, fully extending your arms.
Step:8 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: smith sumo squat
instructions: Step:1 Set up the smith machine with the barbell at hip height.
Step:2 Stand with your feet wider than shoulder-width apart, toes pointing outwards.
Step:3 Position yourself under the barbell, resting it on your back and shoulders.
Step:4 Engage your core and keep your chest up as you lower your body down into a squat position, pushing your hips back and bending your knees.
Step:5 Lower yourself until your thighs are parallel to the ground, or as low as you can comfortably go.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push through your heels to return to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: cable one arm pulldown
instructions: Step:1 Attach a single handle to a high pulley cable machine.
Step:2 Stand facing the machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Grasp the handle with an overhand grip and extend your arm fully.
Step:4 Keep your back straight and your core engaged.
Step:5 Pull the handle down towards your side while keeping your elbow close to your body.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the bottom of the movement, squeezing your lat muscle.
Step:7 Slowly release the handle back to the starting position.
Step:8 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.
Step:9 Switch sides and repeat the exercise with the other arm.

name: dumbbell incline curl
instructions: Step:1 Set an incline bench to a 45-degree angle and sit on it with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing forward.
Step:2 Rest your upper arms on the incline bench and let your elbows hang down, fully extending your arms.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arms stationary, exhale and curl the weights while contracting your biceps.
Step:4 Continue to raise the dumbbells until your biceps are fully contracted and the dumbbells are at shoulder level.
Step:5 Hold the contracted position for a brief pause as you squeeze your biceps.
Step:6 Inhale and slowly begin to lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: dumbbell zottman preacher curl
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a preacher bench with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing up and elbows resting on the pad.
Step:2 Curl the dumbbells up towards your shoulders, keeping your upper arms stationary and your palms facing up.
Step:3 At the top of the curl, rotate your wrists so that your palms are facing down.
Step:4 Slowly lower the dumbbells back down to the starting position, rotating your wrists back to the starting position as you do so.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: assisted prone hamstring
instructions: Step:1 Lie face down on a mat or bench with your legs fully extended.
Step:2 Have a partner or use a resistance band to secure your ankles.
Step:3 Engage your hamstrings and lift your legs towards your glutes, keeping your knees straight.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your legs back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: flag
instructions: Step:1 Start by gripping a vertical pole with both hands, palms facing each other, and arms fully extended.
Step:2 Engage your core and lift your legs off the ground, keeping them straight.
Step:3 Using your core and upper body strength, raise your legs until they are parallel to the ground.
Step:4 Hold this position for as long as you can, maintaining a straight body line.
Step:5 Slowly lower your legs back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: twist hip lift
instructions: Step:1 Lie on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Place your hands by your sides for support.
Step:3 Engage your glutes and lift your hips off the ground, forming a straight line from your knees to your shoulders.
Step:4 While keeping your hips lifted, twist your lower body to the right side, bringing your knees towards the ground.
Step:5 Return to the starting position and repeat the twist to the left side.
Step:6 Continue alternating twists for the desired number of repetitions.

name: cable high pulley overhead tricep extension
instructions: Step:1 Attach a rope to a high pulley and stand facing away from the machine.
Step:2 Grasp the rope with both hands and extend your arms overhead.
Step:3 Keep your elbows close to your head and your upper arms stationary.
Step:4 Slowly lower the rope behind your head by bending your elbows.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then extend your arms back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: dumbbell incline triceps extension
instructions: Step:1 Sit on an incline bench with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing inwards.
Step:2 Extend your arms fully overhead, keeping your elbows close to your head.
Step:3 Lower the dumbbells behind your head by bending your elbows, keeping your upper arms stationary.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then raise the dumbbells back to the starting position by extending your arms.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: cable standing inner curl
instructions: Step:1 Stand facing a cable machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Grasp the cable handle with an underhand grip, palms facing up.
Step:3 Keep your elbows close to your sides and your upper arms stationary.
Step:4 Exhale and curl the cable handle towards your shoulders, contracting your biceps.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top of the movement, squeezing your biceps.
Step:6 Inhale and slowly lower the cable handle back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: kettlebell extended range one arm press on floor
instructions: Step:1 Start by lying on your back on the floor with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Hold a kettlebell in one hand, with your palm facing towards your feet.
Step:3 Extend your arm straight up towards the ceiling, keeping your elbow locked and your wrist straight.
Step:4 Slowly lower the kettlebell back down to the starting position, maintaining control throughout the movement.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch to the other arm.

name: barbell side split squat
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet wider than shoulder-width apart, toes pointing slightly outward.
Step:2 Hold a barbell across your back, resting it on your traps.
Step:3 Engage your core and keep your chest up as you lower your body down into a squat position, bending at the knees and hips.
Step:4 As you lower, push your knees out to the sides and keep your weight on your heels.
Step:5 Lower until your thighs are parallel to the ground, then push through your heels to return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: smith squat
instructions: Step:1 Set up the smith machine with the barbell at an appropriate height for your squat.
Step:2 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, toes slightly turned out.
Step:3 Position yourself under the barbell, resting it on your upper traps and shoulders.
Step:4 Grip the barbell with a wide grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:5 Engage your core and unrack the barbell, stepping back to clear the rack.
Step:6 Keeping your chest up and back straight, initiate the squat by bending at the hips and knees.
Step:7 Lower your body until your thighs are parallel to the ground or slightly below.
Step:8 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then drive through your heels to return to the starting position.
Step:9 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: push to run
instructions: Step:1 Start in a push-up position with your hands shoulder-width apart and your body in a straight line.
Step:2 Lower your chest towards the ground by bending your elbows, keeping your body straight.
Step:3 Push through your hands to extend your arms and return to the starting position.
Step:4 Quickly bring one knee towards your chest, then quickly switch and bring the other knee towards your chest.
Step:5 Continue alternating knees as fast as you can while maintaining good form.
Step:6 Continue for the desired duration or number of repetitions.

name: dumbbell incline one arm fly on exercise ball
instructions: Step:1 Sit on an exercise ball with a dumbbell in one hand.
Step:2 Walk your feet forward and roll your body down until your head, neck, and back are supported on the ball.
Step:3 Hold the dumbbell with your arm extended straight up over your chest, palm facing inwards.
Step:4 Slowly lower the dumbbell out to the side, keeping a slight bend in your elbow.
Step:5 Pause for a moment when your arm is parallel to the ground.
Step:6 Engage your chest muscles to bring the dumbbell back up to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

name: kettlebell one arm military press to the side
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a kettlebell in one hand at shoulder height.
Step:2 Engage your core and keep your back straight.
Step:3 Press the kettlebell overhead, extending your arm fully.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the kettlebell back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides.

name: bodyweight standing row (with towel)
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a towel in front of you with both hands.
Step:2 Bend your knees slightly and hinge forward at the hips, keeping your back straight.
Step:3 Pull the towel towards your chest, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly release the tension and return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: dumbbell side plank with rear fly
instructions: Step:1 Start by lying on your side with your legs extended and stacked on top of each other.
Step:2 Place your forearm on the ground directly below your shoulder, keeping your elbow bent at a 90-degree angle.
Step:3 Hold a dumbbell in your top hand, with your arm extended straight down towards the ground.
Step:4 Engage your core and lift your hips off the ground, creating a straight line from your head to your heels.
Step:5 While maintaining the side plank position, lift the dumbbell up towards the ceiling, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:6 Lower the dumbbell back down to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides.

name: cable one arm decline chest fly
instructions: Step:1 Attach a D-handle to a low pulley cable machine and set the bench to a decline angle.
Step:2 Lie down on the bench with your head towards the machine and grab the handle with your right hand.
Step:3 Extend your arm straight up above your chest, keeping a slight bend in your elbow.
Step:4 With a controlled motion, lower your arm out to the side until your hand is in line with your shoulder.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then reverse the motion and bring your arm back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch to your left arm and repeat the exercise.

name: cable incline triceps extension
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the cable machine to a low pulley position.
Step:2 Attach a straight bar to the cable.
Step:3 Stand facing away from the machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:4 Grasp the bar with an overhand grip and extend your arms straight overhead.
Step:5 Lean forward slightly, keeping your back straight and core engaged.
Step:6 Bend your elbows and lower the bar behind your head, keeping your upper arms close to your ears.
Step:7 Pause for a moment, then extend your arms back to the starting position.
Step:8 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: cable close grip curl
instructions: Step:1 Attach a straight bar to a low pulley cable machine.
Step:2 Stand facing the machine with your feet shoulder-width apart and your knees slightly bent.
Step:3 Grasp the bar with an underhand grip, hands shoulder-width apart.
Step:4 Keep your elbows close to your sides and your upper arms stationary throughout the exercise.
Step:5 Exhale and curl the bar up towards your shoulders, contracting your biceps.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the top of the movement, squeezing your biceps.
Step:7 Inhale and slowly lower the bar back to the starting position, fully extending your arms.
Step:8 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: cable one arm incline press
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the cable machine to a low pulley position.
Step:2 Sit on an incline bench facing away from the cable machine.
Step:3 Grasp the handle with one hand and bring it up to shoulder height.
Step:4 Position your feet firmly on the ground and maintain a stable position.
Step:5 Press the handle forward and upward, extending your arm fully.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the handle back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides.

name: snatch pull
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and the barbell on the ground in front of you.
Step:2 Bend your knees and hinge at the hips to lower into a squat position, gripping the barbell with an overhand grip.
Step:3 Keep your back straight and chest up as you drive through your heels to lift the barbell off the ground, extending your hips and knees.
Step:4 As the barbell reaches hip level, explosively pull it upwards, shrugging your shoulders and pulling your elbows high and to the sides.
Step:5 As the barbell reaches its highest point, quickly drop underneath it, pulling yourself into a deep squat position.
Step:6 Catch the barbell overhead with your arms fully extended and your knees bent.
Step:7 Stand up by extending your hips and knees, keeping the barbell overhead.
Step:8 Lower the barbell back down to the starting position by reversing the movement.
Step:9 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: dumbbell seated bent over triceps extension
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your feet flat on the ground and hold a dumbbell in each hand.
Step:2 Bend forward at the waist, keeping your back straight and your head up.
Step:3 Extend your arms straight back, keeping your elbows close to your head.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then slowly lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: kettlebell one arm snatch
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a kettlebell in one hand between your legs.
Step:2 Bend your knees slightly and hinge at the hips, lowering the kettlebell towards the ground.
Step:3 Explosively extend your hips and knees, using the momentum to swing the kettlebell up towards your shoulder.
Step:4 As the kettlebell reaches shoulder height, rotate your hand and punch it straight up overhead, fully extending your arm.
Step:5 Lower the kettlebell back down between your legs and repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: dumbbell incline one arm press on exercise ball
instructions: Step:1 Sit on an exercise ball with a dumbbell in one hand, feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Slowly walk your feet forward, rolling the ball until your head, neck, and back are supported on the ball.
Step:3 Hold the dumbbell at shoulder height with your palm facing forward.
Step:4 Press the dumbbell upward until your arm is fully extended.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch to the other arm.

name: bench pull-ups
instructions: Step:1 Position yourself under a bar or a sturdy horizontal surface that is at chest height.
Step:2 Grab the bar or surface with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Hang with your arms fully extended and your body straight.
Step:4 Pull your chest towards the bar or surface by squeezing your shoulder blades together and bending your elbows.
Step:5 Continue pulling until your chin is above the bar or surface.
Step:6 Lower yourself back down to the starting position with control.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: barbell single leg deadlift
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet hip-width apart, holding a barbell in front of your thighs with an overhand grip.
Step:2 Shift your weight onto your left foot and lift your right foot slightly off the ground.
Step:3 Hinge forward at the hips, keeping your back straight and your right leg extended behind you for balance.
Step:4 Lower the barbell towards the ground, keeping it close to your body and your left leg slightly bent.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then engage your glutes and hamstrings to lift your torso back up to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides.

name: glute bridge two legs on bench (male)
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the edge of a bench with your back against it and your feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Place your hands on the bench beside your hips for support.
Step:3 Engage your glutes and hamstrings, then lift your hips off the bench until your body forms a straight line from your knees to your shoulders.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your hips back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: kettlebell two arm clean
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a kettlebell in front of your thighs with both hands, palms facing towards you.
Step:2 Bend your knees slightly and hinge at the hips, lowering the kettlebell towards the ground.
Step:3 Explosively extend your hips and knees, using the momentum to pull the kettlebell up towards your shoulders.
Step:4 As the kettlebell reaches shoulder height, rotate your wrists and catch the kettlebell in the rack position, with your elbows tucked in and the kettlebell resting on the back of your forearm.
Step:5 Lower the kettlebell back down to the starting position and repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: barbell wide bench press
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on a bench with your feet flat on the ground and your back pressed against the bench.
Step:2 Grasp the barbell with a wide grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Lift the barbell off the rack and hold it directly above your chest with your arms fully extended.
Step:4 Lower the barbell slowly towards your chest, keeping your elbows slightly flared out.
Step:5 Pause for a moment when the barbell touches your chest, then push it back up to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: dumbbell lying rear lateral raise
instructions: Step:1 Lie face down on a flat bench with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing each other.
Step:2 Extend your arms straight down towards the floor, keeping a slight bend in your elbows.
Step:3 Engaging your shoulder muscles, lift your arms out to the sides until they are parallel to the floor.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your arms back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: dumbbell decline fly
instructions: Step:1 Lie on a decline bench with your feet secured and your head lower than your hips.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell in each hand with your palms facing each other and your arms extended above your chest.
Step:3 Lower the dumbbells out to the sides in a wide arc until you feel a stretch in your chest.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then squeeze your chest muscles to bring the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: bodyweight side lying biceps curl
instructions: Step:1 Lie on your side with your legs extended and your head supported by your arm.
Step:2 Hold your upper arm against your side and bend your elbow to curl your forearm towards your shoulder.
Step:3 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your forearm back down to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: weighted lunge with swing
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a weight in each hand.
Step:2 Take a step forward with your right foot, lowering your body into a lunge position.
Step:3 As you lunge forward, swing the weights forward and upward, keeping your arms straight.
Step:4 Push off with your right foot and return to the starting position, swinging the weights back down.
Step:5 Repeat with your left foot and continue alternating legs for the desired number of repetitions.

name: incline push-up (on box)
instructions: Step:1 Place your hands on the edge of a box or elevated surface, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Extend your legs behind you, resting on the balls of your feet, creating a straight line from your head to your heels.
Step:3 Lower your chest towards the box by bending your elbows, keeping your body in a straight line.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push yourself back up to the starting position by straightening your arms.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: lever seated fly
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and position yourself on the machine with your back against the pad.
Step:2 Grasp the handles with a pronated grip and keep your elbows slightly bent.
Step:3 Exhale and push the handles forward, bringing them together in front of your chest.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, squeezing your chest muscles.
Step:5 Inhale and slowly return to the starting position, allowing your chest muscles to stretch.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: barbell lying back of the head tricep extension
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on a bench with your feet flat on the ground and your head at the end of the bench.
Step:2 Hold a barbell with an overhand grip, hands shoulder-width apart, and extend your arms straight up over your chest.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arms stationary, slowly lower the barbell behind your head by bending your elbows.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then extend your arms back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: barbell rollerout from bench
instructions: Step:1 Start by kneeling on the floor with a barbell placed on a bench in front of you.
Step:2 Grasp the barbell with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Keeping your core engaged and your back straight, slowly roll the barbell forward, extending your arms in front of you.
Step:4 Continue rolling the barbell forward until your body is fully extended and your arms are overhead.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the fully extended position, then slowly roll the barbell back towards your body, returning to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: dumbbell lying elbow press
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on a bench with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing each other and arms extended straight up over your chest.
Step:2 Lower the dumbbells towards your shoulders by bending your elbows, keeping your upper arms stationary.
Step:3 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then press the dumbbells back up to the starting position by extending your elbows.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: dumbbell incline hammer press
instructions: Step:1 Set an incline bench to a 45-degree angle and sit on it with a dumbbell in each hand, resting on your thighs.
Step:2 Lie back on the bench and position the dumbbells at shoulder level with your palms facing each other.
Step:3 Press the dumbbells up and away from your body until your arms are fully extended.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbells back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: wide grip rear pull-up
instructions: Step:1 Grab the pull-up bar with a wide overhand grip, hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Hang from the bar with your arms fully extended and your body straight.
Step:3 Engage your back muscles and pull your body up towards the bar, leading with your chest.
Step:4 Continue pulling until your chin is above the bar.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your body back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: dumbbell incline shoulder raise
instructions: Step:1 Set an incline bench to a 45-degree angle and sit on it with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing down.
Step:2 Rest the dumbbells on your thighs and lean back onto the bench.
Step:3 Use your thighs to help raise the dumbbells to shoulder height, then rotate your wrists so that your palms are facing forward.
Step:4 Exhale and slowly raise the dumbbells above your head, keeping a slight bend in your elbows.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then inhale and slowly lower the dumbbells back to shoulder height.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: weighted three bench dips
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the edge of a bench with your hands gripping the edge, fingers pointing forward.
Step:2 Walk your feet forward, sliding your butt off the bench and supporting your weight with your arms.
Step:3 Lower your body by bending your elbows, keeping your back close to the bench.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push yourself back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: dumbbell fly on exercise ball
instructions: Step:1 Sit on an exercise ball and hold a dumbbell in each hand.
Step:2 Walk your feet forward and roll your body down until your head, neck, and back are supported by the ball.
Step:3 Extend your arms straight up above your chest, palms facing each other.
Step:4 Bend your elbows slightly and lower your arms out to the sides in a wide arc until you feel a stretch in your chest.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then reverse the movement and squeeze your chest muscles as you bring the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: dumbbell standing one arm concentration curl
instructions: Step:1 Stand up straight with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a dumbbell in one hand, palm facing up.
Step:2 Place your free hand on your thigh for support.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arm stationary, exhale and curl the dumbbell towards your shoulder by contracting your biceps.
Step:4 Continue to raise the dumbbell until your biceps are fully contracted and the dumbbell is at shoulder level.
Step:5 Hold the contracted position for a brief pause as you squeeze your biceps.
Step:6 Inhale and slowly lower the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

name: crunch (hands overhead)
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Extend your arms straight above your head.
Step:3 Engaging your abs, lift your upper body off the ground, curling forward towards your knees.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your upper body back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: band single leg split squat
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet hip-width apart and place a resistance band around your ankles.
Step:2 Take a big step forward with your right foot and a smaller step back with your left foot.
Step:3 Bend your knees and lower your body until your right thigh is parallel to the ground, keeping your left knee slightly above the ground.
Step:4 Push through your right heel to return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat on the other side.

name: exercise ball on the wall calf raise (tennis ball between knees)
