Step:4 Press the barbell upward until your arms are fully extended.
Step:5 Lower the barbell back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: dumbbell incline shrug
instructions: Step:1 Set an incline bench to a 45-degree angle and sit on it with a dumbbell in each hand.
Step:2 Place your feet flat on the ground and let your arms hang straight down with your palms facing your body.
Step:3 Keeping your arms straight, shrug your shoulders up towards your ears as high as possible.
Step:4 Hold the contraction for a moment, then slowly lower your shoulders back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: dumbbell over bench neutral wrist curl
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your feet flat on the ground and hold a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing up.
Step:2 Rest your forearms on the bench, allowing your wrists to hang off the edge.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arms stationary, exhale and curl the dumbbells up towards your shoulders.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then inhale and slowly lower the dumbbells back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: lever military press
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and position yourself on the machine with your back against the backrest.
Step:2 Grasp the handles with an overhand grip and position your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Push the handles upward until your arms are fully extended, but do not lock your elbows.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the handles back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: decline crunch
instructions: Step:1 Lie on a decline bench with your feet secured and your knees bent at a 90-degree angle.
Step:2 Place your hands behind your head or across your chest.
Step:3 Engage your abs and lift your upper body towards your knees, curling your torso.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your upper body back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: kettlebell two arm military press
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a kettlebell in each hand at shoulder level with your palms facing forward.
Step:2 Engage your core and press the kettlebells overhead, fully extending your arms.
Step:3 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the kettlebells back to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: dumbbell seated biceps curl (on stability ball)
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a stability ball with your feet flat on the ground and your back straight.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell in each hand with your palms facing forward and your arms fully extended.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arms stationary, exhale and curl the dumbbells while contracting your biceps.
Step:4 Continue to raise the dumbbells until your biceps are fully contracted and the dumbbells are at shoulder level.
Step:5 Hold the contracted position for a brief pause as you squeeze your biceps.
Step:6 Inhale and slowly begin to lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: inverted row on bench
instructions: Step:1 Set up a bench at a height that allows your body to hang freely underneath it.
Step:2 Lie face up on the ground with your head towards the bench.
Step:3 Reach up and grab the bench with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:4 Position your body so that your heels are on the ground and your arms are fully extended.
Step:5 Engage your core and squeeze your shoulder blades together as you pull your chest up towards the bench.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the top of the movement, then slowly lower your body back down to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: oblique crunches floor
instructions: Step:1 Lie on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the floor.
Step:2 Place your hands behind your head or cross them over your chest.
Step:3 Engage your abs and lift your shoulder blades off the floor, rotating your torso to one side.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then lower your shoulder blades back down to the floor.
Step:5 Repeat on the other side, alternating sides with each repetition.

name: barbell side bent v. 2
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a barbell with both hands, palms facing down.
Step:2 Keep your back straight and core engaged throughout the exercise.
Step:3 Slowly bend your torso to the right side, lowering the barbell towards your right knee.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat the movement on the left side.
Step:6 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

name: shoulder tap push-up
instructions: Step:1 Start in a high plank position with your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart and your body in a straight line from head to heels.
Step:2 Lower your body towards the ground by bending your elbows, keeping them close to your sides.
Step:3 As you push back up, lift your right hand off the ground and tap your left shoulder.
Step:4 Return your right hand to the ground and repeat the push-up, this time lifting your left hand and tapping your right shoulder.
Step:5 Continue alternating shoulder taps with each push-up repetition.
Step:6 Maintain a stable core and avoid excessive hip rotation throughout the exercise.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: cable seated shoulder internal rotation
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench or chair facing the cable machine with your feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Hold the cable handle with your arm extended straight out in front of you, parallel to the ground.
Step:3 Keep your elbow slightly bent and your shoulder blades pulled back and down.
Step:4 Slowly rotate your arm inward, bringing the cable handle towards the center of your body.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the end of the movement, then slowly return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

name: cable decline seated wide-grip row
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the decline bench facing the cable machine with your feet securely placed on the footrests.
Step:2 Grasp the cable attachment with a wide overhand grip, palms facing down.
Step:3 Lean back slightly, keeping your back straight and your core engaged.
Step:4 Pull the cable towards your lower chest, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the peak of the contraction, then slowly release the cable back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: inverse leg curl (bench support)
instructions: Step:1 Lie face down on a bench with your hips at the edge and your legs extended straight behind you.
Step:2 Hold onto the bench for support.
Step:3 Keeping your upper body still, bend your knees and curl your legs towards your glutes.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly extend your legs back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: ez bar standing french press
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold the ez barbell with an overhand grip.
Step:2 Raise the barbell above your head, fully extending your arms.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arms close to your head, slowly lower the barbell behind your head by bending your elbows.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then extend your arms back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: ski ergometer
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and footrests to a comfortable position.
Step:2 Grasp the handles with an overhand grip, palms facing down.
Step:3 Sit up straight with your feet flat on the footrests.
Step:4 Extend your arms straight out in front of you, keeping your elbows slightly bent.
Step:5 Engage your triceps and push the handles down towards your thighs.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then slowly return to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: hanging straight leg hip raise
instructions: Step:1 Hang from a pull-up bar with your arms fully extended and your palms facing away from you.
Step:2 Engage your core and lift your legs up in front of you until they are parallel to the ground.
Step:3 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your legs back down to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: lying leg raise flat bench
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on a flat bench with your back pressed against it.
Step:2 Place your hands under your glutes for support.
Step:3 Keep your legs straight and together, and lift them up towards the ceiling.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your legs back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: dumbbell biceps curl (with arm blaster)
instructions: Step:1 Stand up straight with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing forward.
Step:2 Keep your elbows close to your torso and your upper arms stationary.
Step:3 Exhale and curl the weights while contracting your biceps.
Step:4 Continue to raise the weights until your biceps are fully contracted and the dumbbells are at shoulder level.
Step:5 Hold the contracted position for a brief pause as you squeeze your biceps.
Step:6 Inhale and slowly begin to lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: cable one arm press on exercise ball
instructions: Step:1 Sit on an exercise ball with your feet flat on the ground and your back straight.
Step:2 Hold a cable handle in one hand and position your arm at chest height, elbow bent.
Step:3 Place your other hand on your hip for stability.
Step:4 Press the cable handle forward, extending your arm fully.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then slowly return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

name: one arm dip
instructions: Step:1 Stand facing away from a bench or chair, with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Place one hand on the bench or chair behind you, fingers pointing towards your body.
Step:3 Extend your legs out in front of you, keeping your heels on the ground.
Step:4 Bend your elbows and lower your body towards the ground, keeping your back close to the bench or chair.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push through your palms to straighten your arms and return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides and repeat with the other arm.

name: cable concentration curl
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench or chair with your feet flat on the floor and your knees slightly bent.
Step:2 Hold the cable handle with an underhand grip and rest your elbow against the inside of your thigh.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arm stationary, exhale and curl the cable handle towards your shoulder while contracting your biceps.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top of the movement, then inhale and slowly lower the cable handle back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

name: dumbbell decline shrug v. 2
instructions: Step:1 Set up a decline bench at a 45-degree angle.
Step:2 Lie face down on the bench with your chest and stomach resting on it.
Step:3 Hold a dumbbell in each hand with your palms facing each other and your arms fully extended.
Step:4 Keeping your arms straight, raise your shoulders as high as possible while squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:5 Hold the contraction for a brief pause, then lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: dumbbell close grip press
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a flat bench with a dumbbell in each hand, resting on your thighs.
Step:2 Using your thighs to help raise the dumbbells, lift the dumbbells one at a time so that you can hold them in front of you at shoulder width.
Step:3 Once at shoulder width, rotate your wrists forward so that the palms of your hands are facing away from you. This will be your starting position.
Step:4 As you breathe in, slowly lower the dumbbells to your side until they are about level with your chest.
Step:5 As you exhale, use your triceps to lift the dumbbells back to the starting position. Make sure to use only your triceps and do not use your forearms or biceps to help lift the dumbbells.
Step:6 After a second pause at the contracted position, repeat the movement for the prescribed amount of repetitions.

name: sissy squat
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your toes pointing slightly outward.
Step:2 Hold onto a stable object for balance if needed.
Step:3 Slowly lower your body by bending your knees and leaning back, keeping your torso upright.
Step:4 Continue lowering until your thighs are parallel to the ground or as far as you can comfortably go.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then push through your heels to return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: cable hip adduction
instructions: Step:1 Attach the ankle cuff to your ankle and stand facing the cable machine.
Step:2 Position yourself far enough away from the machine so that there is tension on the cable.
Step:3 Place your hands on the machine for support.
Step:4 Keeping your leg straight, slowly move your leg across your body towards the midline.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the end of the movement, then slowly return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: barbell sitted alternate leg raise
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your back straight and hold a barbell across your thighs.
Step:2 Keeping your legs straight, lift one leg up as high as possible while keeping the other leg on the ground.
Step:3 Lower the raised leg back down and repeat with the other leg.
Step:4 Continue alternating legs for the desired number of repetitions.

name: band alternating biceps curl
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold the band with an underhand grip, palms facing up.
Step:2 Keep your elbows close to your sides and slowly curl one arm up towards your shoulder, squeezing your biceps at the top.
Step:3 Lower the arm back down to the starting position and repeat with the other arm.
Step:4 Continue alternating arms for the desired number of repetitions.

name: march sit (wall)
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your back against a wall and your feet hip-width apart.
Step:2 Slowly slide your back down the wall until your knees are bent at a 90-degree angle.
Step:3 Lift your right foot off the ground and bring your knee towards your chest.
Step:4 Lower your right foot back down and lift your left foot off the ground, bringing your knee towards your chest.
Step:5 Continue alternating between lifting your right and left foot for the desired number of repetitions.

name: dynamic chest stretch (male)
instructions: Step:1 Stand tall with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Extend your arms straight out to the sides, parallel to the ground.
Step:3 Slowly bring your arms forward, crossing them in front of your body.
Step:4 Feel the stretch in your chest muscles.
Step:5 Hold the stretch for 10-30 seconds.
Step:6 Return to the starting position and repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: medicine ball overhead slam
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a medicine ball with both hands above your head.
Step:2 Engage your core and keep your back straight.
Step:3 Bend your knees slightly and forcefully slam the medicine ball down to the ground in front of you.
Step:4 As you slam the ball down, use your entire body to generate power, including your shoulders and core.
Step:5 Catch the ball on the bounce and repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: dumbbell one arm lateral raise with support
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a dumbbell in one hand, with your palm facing your body.
Step:2 Place your other hand on a stable surface, such as a bench or wall, for support.
Step:3 Keep your back straight and engage your core.
Step:4 Raise the dumbbell out to the side, keeping your arm straight and your palm facing down.
Step:5 Continue lifting until your arm is parallel to the ground.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbell back down to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides.

name: ez-bar biceps curl (with arm blaster)
instructions: Step:1 Stand up straight with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold the ez barbell with an underhand grip, palms facing up.
Step:2 Place your upper arms against the arm blaster, keeping them stationary throughout the exercise.
Step:3 Keeping your elbows close to your body, exhale and curl the barbell up towards your shoulders.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, squeezing your biceps.
Step:5 Inhale and slowly lower the barbell back to the starting position, fully extending your arms.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: bench hip extension
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your back against the bench and your feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Place your hands on the bench for support.
Step:3 Engage your glutes and hamstrings, then lift your hips off the bench until your body forms a straight line from your knees to your shoulders.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your hips back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: behind head chest stretch
instructions: Step:1 Stand tall with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Interlace your fingers behind your head with your elbows pointing outwards.
Step:3 Slowly squeeze your shoulder blades together and push your chest forward.
Step:4 Hold the stretch for 15-30 seconds.
Step:5 Release the stretch and repeat as desired.

name: medicine ball chest push multiple response
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a medicine ball at chest level.
Step:2 Extend your arms forward, pushing the medicine ball away from your chest.
Step:3 Pause for a moment, then slowly bring the medicine ball back to your chest.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: smith sprint lunge
instructions: Step:1 Set up the smith machine with the barbell at hip height.
Step:2 Stand facing away from the machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Step back with your right foot and place it on the barbell, resting the top of your foot on the bar.
Step:4 Bend your left knee and lower your body into a lunge position, keeping your back straight.
Step:5 Push through your left heel to return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat on the other side, stepping back with your left foot.
Step:7 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

name: assisted lying calves stretch
instructions: Step:1 Lie on your back with your legs extended.
Step:2 Bend one knee and place your foot flat on the ground.
Step:3 Using your hands or a towel, gently pull your toes towards your body, feeling a stretch in your calf.
Step:4 Hold the stretch for 20-30 seconds.
Step:5 Release the stretch and repeat on the other leg.

name: walk elliptical cross trainer
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the resistance level and incline of the elliptical machine to your desired settings.
Step:2 Step onto the pedals of the machine and grip the handles lightly.
Step:3 Begin by pushing down with your feet and pulling the handles towards your body.
Step:4 Continue this motion, alternating between pushing and pulling, to simulate a walking or running motion.
Step:5 Maintain a steady pace and keep your core engaged throughout the exercise.
Step:6 Continue for the desired duration of your cardio workout.
Step:7 Gradually decrease the intensity and speed of the machine before stepping off.

name: dumbbell standing alternate hammer curl and press
instructions: Step:1 Stand up straight with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing your body.
Step:2 Keep your elbows close to your torso and your back straight.
Step:3 Exhale and curl the dumbbell in your right hand towards your shoulder, keeping your upper arm stationary.
Step:4 Continue to raise the dumbbell until your biceps are fully contracted and the dumbbell is at shoulder level.
Step:5 Inhale and slowly lower the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat the curl with your left hand.
Step:7 After completing the curl with your left hand, exhale and press the dumbbell in your right hand overhead.
Step:8 Extend your arm fully and hold for a moment at the top.
Step:9 Inhale and slowly lower the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:10 Repeat the press with your left hand.
Step:11 Continue alternating between curls and presses for the desired number of repetitions.

name: scapular pull-up
instructions: Step:1 Start by hanging from a pull-up bar with your palms facing away from you and your arms fully extended.
Step:2 Retract your shoulder blades by pulling them down and back.
Step:3 Engage your back muscles and pull your body up towards the bar, focusing on squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top of the movement, then slowly lower your body back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: barbell incline close grip bench press
instructions: Step:1 Set up an incline bench at a 45-degree angle.
Step:2 Lie down on the bench with your feet flat on the ground.
Step:3 Grasp the barbell with a close grip, slightly narrower than shoulder-width apart.
Step:4 Unrack the barbell and lower it slowly towards your chest, keeping your elbows close to your body.
Step:5 Pause for a moment when the barbell touches your chest.
Step:6 Push the barbell back up to the starting position, fully extending your arms.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: kettlebell one arm row
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a kettlebell in one hand with an overhand grip.
Step:2 Bend your knees slightly and hinge forward at the hips, keeping your back straight and your core engaged.
Step:3 Pull the kettlebell up towards your chest, keeping your elbow close to your body and squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the kettlebell back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides and repeat with the other arm.

name: half sit-up (male)
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Place your hands behind your head with your elbows pointing outwards.
Step:3 Engaging your abs, slowly lift your upper body off the ground, curling forward until your torso is at a 45-degree angle.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your upper body back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: cable high row (kneeling)
instructions: Step:1 Attach a straight bar to a cable machine at chest height.
Step:2 Kneel down in front of the cable machine and grab the bar with an overhand grip, hands shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Sit back on your heels, keeping your back straight and your core engaged.
Step:4 Pull the bar towards your upper abdomen, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top of the movement, then slowly release the bar back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: cable bar lateral pulldown
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the cable pulley to a high position and attach a straight bar.
Step:2 Sit facing the cable machine with your feet flat on the ground and your knees slightly bent.
Step:3 Grasp the bar with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:4 Lean back slightly and keep your chest up, maintaining a slight arch in your lower back.
Step:5 Pull the bar down towards your chest, leading with your elbows and squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the bottom of the movement, then slowly return the bar to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: bodyweight drop jump squat
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Lower your body into a squat position by bending your knees and pushing your hips back.
Step:3 Jump up explosively, extending your hips, knees, and ankles.
Step:4 While in mid-air, quickly bring your feet together.
Step:5 Land softly on the balls of your feet and immediately drop back into a squat position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: hanging leg hip raise
instructions: Step:1 Hang from a pull-up bar with your arms fully extended and your palms facing away from you.
Step:2 Engage your core and lift your legs up by flexing your hips and knees until your thighs are parallel to the ground.
Step:3 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your legs back down to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: dumbbell incline y-raise
instructions: Step:1 Set an incline bench to a 45-degree angle and sit on it with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing inwards.
Step:2 Lean forward slightly and let your arms hang straight down, keeping a slight bend in your elbows.
Step:3 Raise your arms out to the sides and up in a Y shape until they are parallel to the ground.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your arms back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: dumbbell lunge
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a dumbbell in each hand.
Step:2 Take a step forward with your right foot, lowering your body into a lunge position.
Step:3 Keep your back straight and your chest up as you lower your body.
Step:4 Push through your right heel to return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat with your left leg.
Step:6 Alternate legs for the desired number of repetitions.

name: one leg donkey calf raise
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, toes pointing forward.
Step:2 Place your hands on a stable surface for support, such as a wall or a bar.
Step:3 Lift one leg off the ground, keeping your knee slightly bent.
Step:4 Raise your heel as high as possible, using your calf muscles.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your heel back down.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch legs.

name: barbell narrow stance squat
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and toes pointing slightly outward.
Step:2 Hold the barbell across your back, resting it on your traps or rear shoulders.
Step:3 Engage your core and keep your chest up as you slowly lower your body by bending your knees and pushing your hips back.
Step:4 Continue lowering until your thighs are parallel to the ground or slightly below.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then push through your heels to return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: dumbbell one arm hammer preacher curl
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a preacher bench with a dumbbell in one hand and your upper arm resting on the pad.
Step:2 Hold the dumbbell with a neutral grip (palms facing your body).
Step:3 Keeping your upper arm stationary, exhale and curl the dumbbell up towards your shoulder.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, squeezing your biceps.
Step:5 Inhale and slowly lower the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

name: barbell decline wide-grip pullover
instructions: Step:1 Lie on a decline bench with your head lower than your hips and your feet secured.
Step:2 Hold a barbell with a wide grip and extend your arms straight above your chest.
Step:3 Lower the barbell behind your head in a controlled manner, keeping your arms straight.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then raise the barbell back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: shoulder tap
instructions: Step:1 Start in a high plank position with your hands directly under your shoulders and your body in a straight line.
Step:2 Engage your core and lift your right hand off the ground, reaching across to tap your left shoulder.
Step:3 Place your right hand back on the ground and repeat with your left hand tapping your right shoulder.
Step:4 Continue alternating shoulder taps while keeping your hips and torso stable.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: smith full squat
instructions: Step:1 Set up the smith machine with the barbell at shoulder height.
Step:2 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, toes slightly turned out.
Step:3 Step under the bar and position it across your back, resting on your traps.
Step:4 Grip the bar with your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:5 Unrack the bar and take a step back, maintaining a stable stance.
Step:6 Keeping your chest up and core engaged, initiate the squat by pushing your hips back and bending your knees.
Step:7 Lower your body until your thighs are parallel to the ground, or as low as your flexibility allows.
Step:8 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then drive through your heels to return to the starting position.
Step:9 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: self assisted inverse leg curl
instructions: Step:1 Lie face down on a leg curl machine with your legs extended and your ankles hooked under the padded lever.
Step:2 Place your hands on the side handles of the machine for support.
Step:3 Keeping your upper body stationary, exhale and curl your legs upward as far as possible.
Step:4 Hold the contracted position for a brief pause as you squeeze your hamstrings.
Step:5 Slowly lower your legs back to the starting position while inhaling.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: exercise ball hug
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the stability ball with your feet flat on the ground and your back straight.
Step:2 Hold the stability ball with both hands, hugging it close to your chest.
Step:3 Engage your core muscles and slowly lean back, keeping your back straight and your feet planted on the ground.
Step:4 Continue leaning back until you feel a stretch in your back muscles.
Step:5 Hold the position for a few seconds, then slowly return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: monster walk
instructions: Step:1 Place a resistance band around your ankles.
Step:2 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and slightly bend your knees.
Step:3 Take a step to the side with your right foot, maintaining tension on the resistance band.
Step:4 Follow with your left foot, stepping to the side to return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides.

name: bodyweight standing calf raise
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, toes pointing forward.
Step:2 Place your hands on a wall or stable surface for balance.
Step:3 Slowly raise your heels off the ground, lifting your body weight onto the balls of your feet.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your heels back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: lever bent-over row with v-bar
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and position yourself facing the machine.
Step:2 Grasp the v-bar with an overhand grip, keeping your back straight and your knees slightly bent.
Step:3 Pull the v-bar towards your abdomen, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top of the movement, then slowly release the weight back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: smith decline reverse-grip press
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the smith machine to a decline position.
Step:2 Lie down on the bench with your feet secured under the foot pads.
Step:3 Grasp the barbell with a reverse grip, hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:4 Unrack the barbell and lower it towards your chest, keeping your elbows tucked in.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push the barbell back up to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: negative crunch
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Place your hands behind your head with your elbows pointing outwards.
Step:3 Engaging your abs, slowly lift your upper body off the ground, curling forward until your torso is at a 45-degree angle.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your upper body back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: pull up (neutral grip)
instructions: Step:1 Hang from a pull-up bar with a neutral grip (palms facing each other) and your arms fully extended.
Step:2 Engage your core and squeeze your shoulder blades together.
Step:3 Pull your body up towards the bar by bending your elbows and driving your elbows down towards your hips.
Step:4 Continue pulling until your chin is above the bar.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your body back down to the starting position with control.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: dumbbell incline fly
instructions: Step:1 Set an incline bench to a 45-degree angle.
Step:2 Sit on the bench with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing each other.
Step:3 Lie back on the bench and press the dumbbells up to the starting position, directly above your chest.
Step:4 Lower the dumbbells out to the sides in a wide arc until you feel a stretch in your chest.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then squeeze your chest muscles to bring the dumbbells back up to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell incline fly
instructions: Step:1 Set an incline bench to a 45-degree angle.
Step:2 Sit on the bench with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing each other.
Step:3 Lie back on the bench and press the dumbbells up to the starting position, directly above your chest.
Step:4 Lower the dumbbells out to the sides in a wide arc until you feel a stretch in your chest.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then squeeze your chest muscles to bring the dumbbells back up to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: aperturas inclinadas con mancuerna
instructions: Paso:1 Ajusta un banco inclinado a un ángulo de 45 grados.
Paso:2 Siéntate en el banco con una mancuerna en cada mano, palmas mirándose entre sí.
Paso:3 Recuéstate en el banco y lleva las mancuernas a la posición inicial, directamente sobre el pecho.
Paso:4 Baja las mancuernas hacia los lados en un arco amplio hasta sentir un estiramiento en el pecho.
Paso:5 Pausa un momento y contrae el pecho para llevar las mancuernas de vuelta a la posición inicial.
Paso:6 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: barbell seated calf raise
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your feet flat on the floor and a barbell resting on your thighs.
Step:2 Place the balls of your feet on a raised platform, such as a block or step.
Step:3 Position the barbell across your thighs and hold it securely with your hands.
Step:4 Keeping your back straight and your core engaged, lift your heels off the ground by extending your ankles.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your heels back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: barbell seated calf raise
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your feet flat on the floor and a barbell resting on your thighs.
Step:2 Place the balls of your feet on a raised platform, such as a block or step.
Step:3 Position the barbell across your thighs and hold it securely with your hands.
Step:4 Keeping your back straight and your core engaged, lift your heels off the ground by extending your ankles.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your heels back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: elevación de pantorrillas sentado con barra
instructions: Paso:1 Siéntate en un banco con los pies planos en el suelo y una barra apoyada sobre los muslos.
Paso:2 Coloca las puntas de los pies en una plataforma elevada, como un bloque o escalón.
Paso:3 Ubica la barra a lo largo de los muslos y sujétala con firmeza con las manos.
Paso:4 Manteniendo la espalda recta y el core activo, eleva los talones extendiendo los tobillos.
Paso:5 Pausa un momento arriba y baja lentamente los talones a la posición inicial.
Paso:6 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: band straight leg deadlift
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and place the band around your feet.
Step:2 Hold the band with both hands, palms facing your body, and keep your arms straight.
Step:3 Engage your core and maintain a slight bend in your knees.
Step:4 Slowly hinge forward at your hips, keeping your back straight and chest lifted.
Step:5 Lower the band towards the ground while keeping your legs straight.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then squeeze your glutes and hamstrings to return to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: band straight leg deadlift
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and place the band around your feet.
Step:2 Hold the band with both hands, palms facing your body, and keep your arms straight.
Step:3 Engage your core and maintain a slight bend in your knees.
Step:4 Slowly hinge forward at your hips, keeping your back straight and chest lifted.
Step:5 Lower the band towards the ground while keeping your legs straight.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then squeeze your glutes and hamstrings to return to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: peso muerto con piernas rectas con banda
instructions: Paso:1 Colócate de pie con los pies al ancho de hombros y pasa la banda alrededor de los pies.
Paso:2 Sujeta la banda con ambas manos, palmas hacia el cuerpo, y mantén los brazos rectos.
Paso:3 Activa el core y conserva una ligera flexión en las rodillas.
Paso:4 Flexiona lentamente desde las caderas, manteniendo la espalda recta y el pecho elevado.
Paso:5 Desciende la banda hacia el suelo manteniendo las piernas rectas.
Paso:6 Pausa un momento abajo y contrae glúteos e isquiotibiales para volver a la posición inicial.
Paso:7 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell seated bent over alternate kickback
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing inwards.
Step:2 Bend forward at the waist, keeping your back straight and parallel to the ground.
Step:3 Extend one arm straight back, keeping it close to your body, until your arm is fully extended.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then slowly lower the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat with the other arm.
Step:6 Continue alternating arms for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell seated bent over alternate kickback
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing inwards.
Step:2 Bend forward at the waist, keeping your back straight and parallel to the ground.
Step:3 Extend one arm straight back, keeping it close to your body, until your arm is fully extended.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then slowly lower the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat with the other arm.
Step:6 Continue alternating arms for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: patada de tríceps alterna sentado con mancuernas (inclinado)
instructions: Paso:1 Siéntate en un banco con una mancuerna en cada mano, palmas hacia adentro.
Paso:2 Inclínate hacia adelante desde la cintura, manteniendo la espalda recta y paralela al suelo.
Paso:3 Extiende un brazo hacia atrás, pegado al cuerpo, hasta que quede completamente extendido.
Paso:4 Pausa un momento y baja la mancuerna de forma controlada a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite con el otro brazo.
Paso:6 Alterna los brazos por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: smith back shrug
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your knees slightly bent.
Step:2 Grasp the barbell with an overhand grip, hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Keep your arms straight and allow the barbell to hang in front of your thighs.
Step:4 Lift your shoulders straight up towards your ears, squeezing your traps at the top.
Step:5 Hold for a moment, then lower your shoulders back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: smith back shrug
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your knees slightly bent.
Step:2 Grasp the barbell with an overhand grip, hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Keep your arms straight and allow the barbell to hang in front of your thighs.
Step:4 Lift your shoulders straight up towards your ears, squeezing your traps at the top.
Step:5 Hold for a moment, then lower your shoulders back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: encogimiento de espalda en máquina smith
instructions: Paso:1 Ponte de pie con los pies al ancho de hombros y las rodillas ligeramente flexionadas.
Paso:2 Sujeta la barra con agarre prono, manos un poco más anchas que los hombros.
Paso:3 Mantén los brazos rectos y deja que la barra cuelgue frente a los muslos.
Paso:4 Eleva los hombros directamente hacia las orejas, contrayendo los trapecios arriba.
Paso:5 Sostén un instante y baja los hombros a la posición inicial.
Paso:6 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell one arm chest fly on exercise ball
instructions: Step:1 Sit on an exercise ball with a dumbbell in one hand and your feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Walk your feet forward, rolling the ball until your back is supported on the ball and your head, neck, and shoulders are off the ball.
Step:3 Extend your arm with the dumbbell straight up above your chest, palm facing inward.
Step:4 Slowly lower the dumbbell out to the side, keeping a slight bend in your elbow.
Step:5 Pause for a moment when your arm is parallel to the ground.
Step:6 Engage your chest muscles to bring the dumbbell back up to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

translations.name: dumbbell one arm chest fly on exercise ball
instructions: Step:1 Sit on an exercise ball with a dumbbell in one hand and your feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Walk your feet forward, rolling the ball until your back is supported on the ball and your head, neck, and shoulders are off the ball.
Step:3 Extend your arm with the dumbbell straight up above your chest, palm facing inward.
Step:4 Slowly lower the dumbbell out to the side, keeping a slight bend in your elbow.
Step:5 Pause for a moment when your arm is parallel to the ground.
Step:6 Engage your chest muscles to bring the dumbbell back up to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

translations.name: aperturas de pecho a una mano con mancuerna sobre balón de ejercicio
instructions: Paso:1 Siéntate sobre un balón de ejercicio con una mancuerna en una mano y los pies planos en el suelo.
Paso:2 Camina hacia adelante rodando el balón hasta apoyar la espalda en el balón, con cabeza, cuello y hombros fuera.
Paso:3 Extiende el brazo con la mancuerna arriba del pecho, palma hacia adentro.
Paso:4 Baja la mancuerna hacia el lado lentamente, manteniendo una ligera flexión en el codo.
Paso:5 Pausa un momento cuando el brazo esté paralelo al suelo.
Paso:6 Activa el pecho para regresar la mancuerna a la posición inicial.
Paso:7 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones y cambia de brazo.

name: cable one arm bent over row
instructions: Step:1 Stand facing a cable machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Bend your knees slightly and hinge forward at the hips, keeping your back straight.
Step:3 Grasp the cable handle with one hand, palm facing inward, and extend your arm fully.
Step:4 Pull the cable handle towards your body, keeping your elbow close to your side, until your hand reaches your lower chest.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then slowly extend your arm back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides.

translations.name: cable one arm bent over row
instructions: Step:1 Stand facing a cable machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Bend your knees slightly and hinge forward at the hips, keeping your back straight.
Step:3 Grasp the cable handle with one hand, palm facing inward, and extend your arm fully.
Step:4 Pull the cable handle towards your body, keeping your elbow close to your side, until your hand reaches your lower chest.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then slowly extend your arm back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides.

translations.name: remo inclinado a una mano con cable
instructions: Paso:1 Colócate de frente a una máquina de cable con los pies al ancho de hombros.
Paso:2 Flexiona ligeramente las rodillas y bisagra desde las caderas, manteniendo la espalda recta.
Paso:3 Sujeta la manija del cable con una mano, palma hacia adentro, y extiende el brazo por completo.
Paso:4 Tira de la manija hacia el cuerpo manteniendo el codo pegado al costado hasta que la mano llegue a la parte baja del pecho.
Paso:5 Pausa un momento y extiende el brazo lentamente a la posición inicial.
Paso:6 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones y cambia de lado.

name: hyght dumbbell fly
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on a bench with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing each other.
Step:2 Extend your arms straight up over your chest, with a slight bend in your elbows.
Step:3 Keeping a slight bend in your elbows, lower the dumbbells out to the sides in a wide arc until you feel a stretch in your chest.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then reverse the movement and bring the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: hyght dumbbell fly
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on a bench with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing each other.
Step:2 Extend your arms straight up over your chest, with a slight bend in your elbows.
Step:3 Keeping a slight bend in your elbows, lower the dumbbells out to the sides in a wide arc until you feel a stretch in your chest.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then reverse the movement and bring the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: aperturas Hyght con mancuernas
instructions: Paso:1 Acuéstate en un banco con una mancuerna en cada mano, palmas mirándose.
Paso:2 Extiende los brazos sobre el pecho con una ligera flexión en los codos.
Paso:3 Manteniendo esa ligera flexión, baja las mancuernas hacia los lados en un arco amplio hasta sentir estiramiento en el pecho.
Paso:4 Pausa un momento y revierte el movimiento llevando las mancuernas a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: band kneeling one arm pulldown
instructions: Step:1 Attach the band to a sturdy anchor point above your head.
Step:2 Kneel down and hold the band with one hand, palm facing down.
Step:3 Extend your arm fully overhead, keeping your elbow slightly bent.
Step:4 Engage your lat muscles and pull the band down towards your side, bringing your elbow towards your ribcage.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then slowly release the tension and return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides.

translations.name: band kneeling one arm pulldown
instructions: Step:1 Attach the band to a sturdy anchor point above your head.
Step:2 Kneel down and hold the band with one hand, palm facing down.
Step:3 Extend your arm fully overhead, keeping your elbow slightly bent.
Step:4 Engage your lat muscles and pull the band down towards your side, bringing your elbow towards your ribcage.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then slowly release the tension and return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides.

translations.name: jalón de banda arrodillado a una mano
instructions: Paso:1 Fija la banda a un punto de anclaje resistente por encima de la cabeza.
Paso:2 Arrodíllate y toma la banda con una mano, palma hacia abajo.
Paso:3 Extiende el brazo completamente arriba, con el codo levemente flexionado.
Paso:4 Activa los dorsales y tira de la banda hacia el costado llevando el codo hacia la caja torácica.
Paso:5 Pausa un momento abajo y libera la tensión lentamente volviendo a la posición inicial.
Paso:6 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones y cambia de lado.

name: dumbbell standing one arm palm in press
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a dumbbell in one hand at shoulder height with your palm facing inwards.
Step:2 Engage your core and keep your back straight.
Step:3 Press the dumbbell upwards until your arm is fully extended.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch to the other arm.

translations.name: dumbbell standing one arm palm in press
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a dumbbell in one hand at shoulder height with your palm facing inwards.
Step:2 Engage your core and keep your back straight.
Step:3 Press the dumbbell upwards until your arm is fully extended.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch to the other arm.

translations.name: press de pie a una mano con mancuerna (palma hacia adentro)
instructions: Paso:1 Ponte de pie con los pies al ancho de hombros, sosteniendo una mancuerna a la altura del hombro con la palma hacia adentro.
Paso:2 Activa el core y mantén la espalda recta.
Paso:3 Realiza un press elevando la mancuerna hasta extender completamente el brazo.
Paso:4 Pausa un momento arriba y baja la mancuerna lentamente a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones y cambia al otro brazo.

name: 3/4 sit-up
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Place your hands behind your head with your elbows pointing outwards.
Step:3 Engaging your abs, slowly lift your upper body off the ground, curling forward until your torso is at a 45-degree angle.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your upper body back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: 3/4 sit-up
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Place your hands behind your head with your elbows pointing outwards.
Step:3 Engaging your abs, slowly lift your upper body off the ground, curling forward until your torso is at a 45-degree angle.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your upper body back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: abdominal 3/4
instructions: Paso:1 Acuéstate boca arriba con las rodillas flexionadas y los pies planos en el suelo.
Paso:2 Coloca las manos detrás de la cabeza con los codos apuntando hacia afuera.
Paso:3 Activando los abdominales, eleva lentamente el torso curvándolo hacia adelante hasta quedar en un ángulo de 45 grados.
Paso:4 Pausa un momento arriba y desciende el torso lentamente a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: barbell one arm snatch
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, toes pointing slightly outwards.
Step:2 Hold the barbell with an overhand grip, hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Bend your knees and lower your hips into a squat position, keeping your back straight and chest up.
Step:4 Explosively extend your hips, knees, and ankles, driving the barbell upwards.
Step:5 As the barbell reaches chest level, pull it upwards with your arm, keeping it close to your body.
Step:6 Rotate your elbow under the barbell and extend your arm fully overhead, locking out your elbow.
Step:7 Lower the barbell back down to the starting position in a controlled manner.
Step:8 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

translations.name: barbell one arm snatch
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, toes pointing slightly outwards.
Step:2 Hold the barbell with an overhand grip, hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Bend your knees and lower your hips into a squat position, keeping your back straight and chest up.
Step:4 Explosively extend your hips, knees, and ankles, driving the barbell upwards.
Step:5 As the barbell reaches chest level, pull it upwards with your arm, keeping it close to your body.
Step:6 Rotate your elbow under the barbell and extend your arm fully overhead, locking out your elbow.
Step:7 Lower the barbell back down to the starting position in a controlled manner.
Step:8 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

translations.name: arranque con una mano con barra
instructions: Paso:1 Colócate de pie con los pies al ancho de hombros y las puntas ligeramente hacia afuera.
Paso:2 Sujeta la barra con agarre prono, manos un poco más anchas que los hombros.
Paso:3 Flexiona las rodillas y baja las caderas a posición de sentadilla, manteniendo la espalda recta y el pecho arriba.
Paso:4 Extiende explosivamente caderas, rodillas y tobillos impulsando la barra hacia arriba.
Paso:5 Cuando la barra llegue a la altura del pecho, tira con el brazo manteniéndola cerca del cuerpo.
Paso:6 Rota el codo por debajo de la barra y extiende el brazo por completo sobre la cabeza, bloqueando el codo.
Paso:7 Baja la barra de forma controlada a la posición inicial.
Paso:8 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones y cambia de brazo.

name: inverted row with straps
instructions: Step:1 Set up a suspension trainer or straps at chest height.
Step:2 Stand facing the anchor point and grab the handles with an overhand grip.
Step:3 Walk your feet forward, leaning back until your body is at an angle.
Step:4 Keep your body straight and engage your core.
Step:5 Pull your chest towards the handles, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower yourself back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: inverted row with straps
instructions: Step:1 Set up a suspension trainer or straps at chest height.
Step:2 Stand facing the anchor point and grab the handles with an overhand grip.
Step:3 Walk your feet forward, leaning back until your body is at an angle.
Step:4 Keep your body straight and engage your core.
Step:5 Pull your chest towards the handles, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower yourself back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: remo invertido con correas
instructions: Paso:1 Coloca un entrenador de suspensión o correas a la altura del pecho.
Paso:2 Ponte de frente al anclaje y toma las manijas con agarre prono.
Paso:3 Camina con los pies hacia adelante inclinando el cuerpo hacia atrás hasta quedar en ángulo.
Paso:4 Mantén el cuerpo alineado y activa el core.
Paso:5 Tira del pecho hacia las manijas, juntando las escápulas.
Paso:6 Pausa un momento arriba y desciende lentamente a la posición inicial.
Paso:7 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell standing calf raise
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a dumbbell in each hand.
Step:2 Raise your heels off the ground as high as possible, using your calves.
Step:3 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your heels back down to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell standing calf raise
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a dumbbell in each hand.
Step:2 Raise your heels off the ground as high as possible, using your calves.
Step:3 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your heels back down to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: elevación de pantorrillas de pie con mancuernas
instructions: Paso:1 Ponte de pie con los pies al ancho de hombros, sosteniendo una mancuerna en cada mano.
Paso:2 Eleva los talones lo más alto posible usando las pantorrillas.
Paso:3 Pausa un momento arriba y baja lentamente los talones a la posición inicial.
Paso:4 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: smith standing leg calf raise
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the smith machine bar to a height that allows you to stand with your feet flat on the ground and your shoulders under the bar.
Step:2 Position yourself under the bar with your feet shoulder-width apart and your toes pointing forward.
Step:3 Place your hands on the bar for stability.
Step:4 Engage your calves and slowly raise your heels off the ground, lifting your body up onto your toes.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your heels back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: smith standing leg calf raise
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the smith machine bar to a height that allows you to stand with your feet flat on the ground and your shoulders under the bar.
Step:2 Position yourself under the bar with your feet shoulder-width apart and your toes pointing forward.
Step:3 Place your hands on the bar for stability.
Step:4 Engage your calves and slowly raise your heels off the ground, lifting your body up onto your toes.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your heels back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: elevación de pantorrillas de pie en máquina smith
instructions: Paso:1 Ajusta la barra de la máquina smith a una altura que te permita estar de pie con los pies planos y los hombros bajo la barra.
Paso:2 Colócate bajo la barra con los pies al ancho de hombros y las puntas hacia adelante.
Paso:3 Apoya las manos en la barra para estabilidad.
Paso:4 Activa las pantorrillas y eleva lentamente los talones, subiendo al apoyo de las puntas.
Paso:5 Pausa un momento arriba y baja los talones a la posición inicial.
Paso:6 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: flexion leg sit up (straight arm)
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your legs extended and arms straight above your head.
Step:2 Engaging your abs, lift your upper body off the ground while simultaneously lifting your legs towards your chest.
Step:3 Reach your hands towards your toes as you lift your upper body and legs.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your upper body and legs back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: flexion leg sit up (straight arm)
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your legs extended and arms straight above your head.
Step:2 Engaging your abs, lift your upper body off the ground while simultaneously lifting your legs towards your chest.
Step:3 Reach your hands towards your toes as you lift your upper body and legs.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your upper body and legs back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: abdominal con flexión de piernas (brazos extendidos)
instructions: Paso:1 Acuéstate boca arriba con las piernas extendidas y los brazos rectos por encima de la cabeza.
Paso:2 Activando los abdominales, eleva el torso mientras al mismo tiempo elevas las piernas hacia el pecho.
Paso:3 Lleva las manos hacia los dedos de los pies mientras elevas el torso y las piernas.
Paso:4 Pausa un momento arriba y desciende lentamente torso y piernas a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: circles knee stretch
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your hands on your hips.
Step:2 Bend your knees slightly and lift your heels off the ground, balancing on the balls of your feet.
Step:3 Keeping your knees bent, rotate your knees in a circular motion, first clockwise and then counterclockwise.
Step:4 Perform the movement for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: circles knee stretch
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your hands on your hips.
Step:2 Bend your knees slightly and lift your heels off the ground, balancing on the balls of your feet.
Step:3 Keeping your knees bent, rotate your knees in a circular motion, first clockwise and then counterclockwise.
Step:4 Perform the movement for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: estiramiento de rodillas en círculos
instructions: Paso:1 Ponte de pie con los pies al ancho de hombros y las manos en la cintura.
Paso:2 Flexiona ligeramente las rodillas y eleva los talones, apoyándote en las puntas de los pies.
Paso:3 Manteniendo las rodillas flexionadas, rota las rodillas en movimiento circular, primero en sentido horario y luego antihorario.
Paso:4 Realiza el movimiento por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: weighted russian twist
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the ground with your knees bent and your feet flat on the floor.
Step:2 Hold a weight or medicine ball with both hands in front of your chest.
Step:3 Lean back slightly, keeping your back straight and your core engaged.
Step:4 Slowly twist your torso to the right, bringing the weight or medicine ball towards the floor on your right side.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then twist your torso to the left, bringing the weight or medicine ball towards the floor on your left side.
Step:6 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: weighted russian twist
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the ground with your knees bent and your feet flat on the floor.
Step:2 Hold a weight or medicine ball with both hands in front of your chest.
Step:3 Lean back slightly, keeping your back straight and your core engaged.
Step:4 Slowly twist your torso to the right, bringing the weight or medicine ball towards the floor on your right side.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then twist your torso to the left, bringing the weight or medicine ball towards the floor on your left side.
Step:6 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: giros rusos con peso
instructions: Paso:1 Siéntate en el suelo con las rodillas flexionadas y los pies apoyados.
Paso:2 Sostén un peso o balón medicinal con ambas manos frente al pecho.
Paso:3 Inclínate ligeramente hacia atrás, manteniendo la espalda recta y el core activo.
Paso:4 Gira el torso lentamente hacia la derecha, llevando el peso hacia el suelo del lado derecho.
Paso:5 Pausa un momento y gira el torso hacia la izquierda, llevando el peso hacia el suelo del lado izquierdo.
Paso:6 Alterna lados por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: arm slingers hanging straight legs
instructions: Step:1 Hang from a pull-up bar with your arms fully extended and your legs straight down.
Step:2 Engage your core and lift your legs up in front of you until they are parallel to the ground.
Step:3 Hold for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your legs back down to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: arm slingers hanging straight legs
instructions: Step:1 Hang from a pull-up bar with your arms fully extended and your legs straight down.
Step:2 Engage your core and lift your legs up in front of you until they are parallel to the ground.
Step:3 Hold for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your legs back down to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: elevaciones de piernas rectas colgado con eslingas
instructions: Paso:1 Cuelga de una barra de dominadas con los brazos completamente extendidos y las piernas rectas hacia abajo.
Paso:2 Activa el core y eleva las piernas al frente hasta que queden paralelas al suelo.
Paso:3 Sostén un momento arriba y baja las piernas lentamente a la posición inicial.
Paso:4 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: roller hip stretch
instructions: Step:1 Start by sitting on the ground with your legs extended in front of you.
Step:2 Place the roller under your glutes, just above your knees.
Step:3 Lean back and place your hands on the ground behind you for support.
Step:4 Engage your glutes and slowly roll the roller forward, bending your knees and bringing them towards your chest.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the end of the movement, feeling a stretch in your glutes.
Step:6 Slowly roll the roller back to the starting position, extending your legs.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: roller hip stretch
instructions: Step:1 Start by sitting on the ground with your legs extended in front of you.
Step:2 Place the roller under your glutes, just above your knees.
Step:3 Lean back and place your hands on the ground behind you for support.
Step:4 Engage your glutes and slowly roll the roller forward, bending your knees and bringing them towards your chest.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the end of the movement, feeling a stretch in your glutes.
Step:6 Slowly roll the roller back to the starting position, extending your legs.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: estiramiento de cadera con rodillo
instructions: Paso:1 Siéntate en el suelo con las piernas extendidas al frente.
Paso:2 Coloca el rodillo bajo los glúteos, justo por encima de las rodillas.
Paso:3 Inclínate hacia atrás y apoya las manos en el suelo detrás de ti para estabilizarte.
Paso:4 Activa los glúteos y rueda el rodillo hacia adelante lentamente, flexionando las rodillas y llevándolas hacia el pecho.
Paso:5 Pausa un momento al final del movimiento, sintiendo el estiramiento en los glúteos.
Paso:6 Rueda el rodillo de regreso a la posición inicial extendiendo las piernas.
Paso:7 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: smith machine reverse decline close grip bench press
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the smith machine to a decline position.
Step:2 Lie down on the bench with your feet secured under the foot pads.
Step:3 Grasp the barbell with a close grip, slightly narrower than shoulder-width apart.
Step:4 Unrack the barbell and lower it slowly towards your chest, keeping your elbows tucked in.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push the barbell back up to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: smith machine reverse decline close grip bench press
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the smith machine to a decline position.
Step:2 Lie down on the bench with your feet secured under the foot pads.
Step:3 Grasp the barbell with a close grip, slightly narrower than shoulder-width apart.
Step:4 Unrack the barbell and lower it slowly towards your chest, keeping your elbows tucked in.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push the barbell back up to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: press en banco declinado inverso con agarre cerrado en máquina smith
instructions: Paso:1 Ajusta la máquina smith a una posición declinada.
Paso:2 Acuéstate en el banco con los pies asegurados bajo los soportes.
Paso:3 Sujeta la barra con agarre cerrado, un poco más estrecho que el ancho de hombros.
Paso:4 Desengancha la barra y bájala lentamente hacia el pecho, manteniendo los codos pegados.
Paso:5 Pausa un momento abajo y empuja la barra de regreso a la posición inicial.
Paso:6 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: star jump (male)
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your arms by your sides.
Step:2 Bend your knees slightly and jump up explosively.
Step:3 As you jump, spread your legs and extend your arms out to the sides, forming a star shape with your body.
Step:4 Land softly on the balls of your feet with your knees slightly bent.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: star jump (male)
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your arms by your sides.
Step:2 Bend your knees slightly and jump up explosively.
Step:3 As you jump, spread your legs and extend your arms out to the sides, forming a star shape with your body.
Step:4 Land softly on the balls of your feet with your knees slightly bent.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: salto estrella
instructions: Paso:1 Ponte de pie con los pies al ancho de hombros y los brazos a los costados.
Paso:2 Flexiona ligeramente las rodillas y salta de forma explosiva.
Paso:3 Mientras saltas, abre las piernas y extiende los brazos hacia los lados formando una figura de estrella con el cuerpo.
Paso:4 Aterriza suave sobre las puntas con las rodillas ligeramente flexionadas.
Paso:5 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: one leg floor calf raise
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet hip-width apart and place your hands on a wall or sturdy object for balance.
Step:2 Lift one foot off the ground and balance on the other foot.
Step:3 Slowly raise your heel off the ground, lifting your body up onto the ball of your foot.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your heel back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch legs and repeat.

translations.name: one leg floor calf raise
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet hip-width apart and place your hands on a wall or sturdy object for balance.
Step:2 Lift one foot off the ground and balance on the other foot.
Step:3 Slowly raise your heel off the ground, lifting your body up onto the ball of your foot.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your heel back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch legs and repeat.

translations.name: elevación de pantorrillas en el suelo a una pierna
instructions: Paso:1 Ponte de pie con los pies al ancho de caderas y apoya las manos en una pared u objeto firme para equilibrarte.
Paso:2 Eleva un pie del suelo y equilíbrate sobre la otra pierna.
Paso:3 Eleva lentamente el talón del pie de apoyo, subiendo sobre la punta.
Paso:4 Pausa un momento arriba y baja el talón lentamente a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones y cambia de pierna.

name: walking high knees lunge
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet hip-width apart.
Step:2 Lift your right knee up towards your chest as high as you can while balancing on your left leg.
Step:3 Step forward with your right foot and lower your body into a lunge position, bending both knees to a 90-degree angle.
Step:4 Push off with your right foot and bring your left knee up towards your chest.
Step:5 Step forward with your left foot and lower your body into a lunge position.
Step:6 Continue alternating legs and lunging forward, keeping your core engaged and maintaining a steady pace.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: walking high knees lunge
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet hip-width apart.
Step:2 Lift your right knee up towards your chest as high as you can while balancing on your left leg.
Step:3 Step forward with your right foot and lower your body into a lunge position, bending both knees to a 90-degree angle.
Step:4 Push off with your right foot and bring your left knee up towards your chest.
Step:5 Step forward with your left foot and lower your body into a lunge position.
Step:6 Continue alternating legs and lunging forward, keeping your core engaged and maintaining a steady pace.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: zancada caminando con rodillas altas
instructions: Paso:1 Ponte de pie con los pies al ancho de caderas.
Paso:2 Eleva la rodilla derecha hacia el pecho lo más alto posible mientras te equilibras en la pierna izquierda.
Paso:3 Da un paso al frente con el pie derecho y baja el cuerpo a una posición de zancada, flexionando ambas rodillas a 90 grados.
Paso:4 Impúlsate con el pie derecho y eleva la rodilla izquierda hacia el pecho.
Paso:5 Da un paso al frente con el pie izquierdo y baja a la posición de zancada.
Paso:6 Continúa alternando piernas y avanzando en zancadas, manteniendo el core activo y un ritmo constante.
Paso:7 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: elbow lift - reverse push-up
instructions: Step:1 Start by lying face down on the ground with your legs extended and your hands placed directly under your shoulders.
Step:2 Engage your core and press through your palms to lift your upper body off the ground, keeping your elbows close to your sides.
Step:3 Pause at the top for a moment, squeezing your back muscles.
Step:4 Slowly lower your body back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: elbow lift - reverse push-up
instructions: Step:1 Start by lying face down on the ground with your legs extended and your hands placed directly under your shoulders.
Step:2 Engage your core and press through your palms to lift your upper body off the ground, keeping your elbows close to your sides.
Step:3 Pause at the top for a moment, squeezing your back muscles.
Step:4 Slowly lower your body back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: elevación de codos - flexión invertida
instructions: Paso:1 Comienza boca abajo en el suelo con las piernas extendidas y las manos justo bajo los hombros.
Paso:2 Activa el core y empuja con las palmas para elevar el torso, manteniendo los codos cerca del cuerpo.
Paso:3 Pausa un momento arriba, contrayendo los músculos de la espalda.
Paso:4 Desciende lentamente a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: weighted one hand pull up
instructions: Step:1 Grab the pull-up bar with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Hang from the bar with your arm fully extended and your body straight.
Step:3 Engage your core and pull your body up towards the bar by bending your elbow and squeezing your back muscles.
Step:4 Continue pulling until your chin is above the bar.
Step:5 Lower your body back down to the starting position with control.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: weighted one hand pull up
instructions: Step:1 Grab the pull-up bar with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Hang from the bar with your arm fully extended and your body straight.
Step:3 Engage your core and pull your body up towards the bar by bending your elbow and squeezing your back muscles.
Step:4 Continue pulling until your chin is above the bar.
Step:5 Lower your body back down to the starting position with control.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dominada a una mano lastrada
instructions: Paso:1 Agarra la barra de dominadas con agarre prono, un poco más ancho que los hombros.
Paso:2 Cuelga de la barra con el brazo completamente extendido y el cuerpo alineado.
Paso:3 Activa el core y tira del cuerpo hacia la barra flexionando el codo y contrayendo la espalda.
Paso:4 Continúa tirando hasta que la barbilla quede por encima de la barra.
Paso:5 Desciende el cuerpo de forma controlada a la posición inicial.
Paso:6 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: barbell curl
instructions: Step:1 Stand up straight with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a barbell with an underhand grip, palms facing forward.
Step:2 Keep your elbows close to your torso and exhale as you curl the weights while contracting your biceps.
Step:3 Continue to raise the bar until your biceps are fully contracted and the bar is at shoulder level.
Step:4 Hold the contracted position for a brief pause as you squeeze your biceps.
Step:5 Inhale as you slowly begin to lower the bar back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: barbell curl
instructions: Step:1 Stand up straight with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a barbell with an underhand grip, palms facing forward.
Step:2 Keep your elbows close to your torso and exhale as you curl the weights while contracting your biceps.
Step:3 Continue to raise the bar until your biceps are fully contracted and the bar is at shoulder level.
Step:4 Hold the contracted position for a brief pause as you squeeze your biceps.
Step:5 Inhale as you slowly begin to lower the bar back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: curl con barra
instructions: Paso:1 Ponte de pie con los pies al ancho de hombros y sujeta una barra con agarre supino, palmas hacia adelante.
Paso:2 Mantén los codos pegados al torso y exhala mientras realizas el curl contrayendo los bíceps.
Paso:3 Continúa elevando la barra hasta contraer por completo los bíceps y que la barra llegue a la altura de los hombros.
Paso:4 Mantén la contracción con una breve pausa, apretando los bíceps.
Paso:5 Inhala mientras bajas lentamente la barra a la posición inicial.
Paso:6 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell one arm reverse fly (with support)
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your feet flat on the ground and your back straight.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell in one hand with your palm facing inwards.
Step:3 Lean forward and place your free hand on the bench for support.
Step:4 Keep your arm slightly bent and raise it out to the side until it is parallel to the ground.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your arm back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

translations.name: dumbbell one arm reverse fly (with support)
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your feet flat on the ground and your back straight.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell in one hand with your palm facing inwards.
Step:3 Lean forward and place your free hand on the bench for support.
Step:4 Keep your arm slightly bent and raise it out to the side until it is parallel to the ground.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your arm back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

translations.name: apertura inversa a una mano con mancuerna (con apoyo)
instructions: Paso:1 Siéntate en un banco con los pies planos en el suelo y la espalda recta.
