Paso:2 Sostén una mancuerna con una mano, palma hacia adentro.
Paso:3 Inclínate hacia adelante y apoya la mano libre en el banco para soporte.
Paso:4 Mantén el brazo levemente flexionado y elévalo hacia el lado hasta que quede paralelo al suelo.
Paso:5 Pausa un momento arriba y baja el brazo lentamente a la posición inicial.
Paso:6 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones y cambia de brazo.

name: dumbbell bicep curl on exercise ball with leg raised
instructions: Step:1 Sit on an exercise ball with your feet flat on the ground and your back straight.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell in each hand with your palms facing forward and your arms fully extended.
Step:3 Slowly curl the dumbbells towards your shoulders, keeping your elbows close to your sides.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top of the movement, then slowly lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Step:5 While performing the bicep curl, raise one leg off the ground and hold it in the air for the duration of the exercise.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch legs and repeat.

translations.name: dumbbell bicep curl on exercise ball with leg raised
instructions: Step:1 Sit on an exercise ball with your feet flat on the ground and your back straight.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell in each hand with your palms facing forward and your arms fully extended.
Step:3 Slowly curl the dumbbells towards your shoulders, keeping your elbows close to your sides.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top of the movement, then slowly lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Step:5 While performing the bicep curl, raise one leg off the ground and hold it in the air for the duration of the exercise.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch legs and repeat.

translations.name: curl de bíceps con mancuernas sobre balón de ejercicio con pierna elevada
instructions: Paso:1 Siéntate en un balón de ejercicio con los pies planos y la espalda recta.
Paso:2 Sostén una mancuerna en cada mano con palmas hacia adelante y brazos completamente extendidos.
Paso:3 Realiza un curl llevando las mancuernas hacia los hombros, manteniendo los codos pegados a los costados.
Paso:4 Pausa un momento arriba y desciende las mancuernas lentamente a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Mientras haces el curl, eleva una pierna del suelo y mantenla en el aire durante el ejercicio.
Paso:6 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones y cambia de pierna.

name: exercise ball hip flexor stretch
instructions: Step:1 Place the stability ball on the ground and kneel in front of it.
Step:2 Place your right foot on top of the stability ball, with your knee bent at a 90-degree angle.
Step:3 Extend your left leg behind you, keeping it straight.
Step:4 Lean forward, pushing your hips towards the stability ball, until you feel a stretch in your right hip flexor.
Step:5 Hold the stretch for 20-30 seconds, then switch sides and repeat.

translations.name: exercise ball hip flexor stretch
instructions: Step:1 Place the stability ball on the ground and kneel in front of it.
Step:2 Place your right foot on top of the stability ball, with your knee bent at a 90-degree angle.
Step:3 Extend your left leg behind you, keeping it straight.
Step:4 Lean forward, pushing your hips towards the stability ball, until you feel a stretch in your right hip flexor.
Step:5 Hold the stretch for 20-30 seconds, then switch sides and repeat.

translations.name: estiramiento de flexores de cadera con balón de estabilidad
instructions: Paso:1 Coloca el balón de estabilidad en el suelo y arrodíllate frente a él.
Paso:2 Apoya el pie derecho sobre el balón con la rodilla flexionada a 90 grados.
Paso:3 Extiende la pierna izquierda detrás, manteniéndola recta.
Paso:4 Inclínate hacia adelante llevando las caderas hacia el balón hasta sentir estiramiento en el flexor de cadera derecho.
Paso:5 Mantén el estiramiento por 20-30 segundos, cambia de lado y repite.

name: lever lying two-one leg curl
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the machine to fit your body and sit on it with your back against the backrest.
Step:2 Place your legs on the lever pad, just above your ankles.
Step:3 Grasp the handles on the sides of the machine for support.
Step:4 Keeping your upper body still, exhale and curl your legs up towards your glutes.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then inhale and slowly lower your legs back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: lever lying two-one leg curl
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the machine to fit your body and sit on it with your back against the backrest.
Step:2 Place your legs on the lever pad, just above your ankles.
Step:3 Grasp the handles on the sides of the machine for support.
Step:4 Keeping your upper body still, exhale and curl your legs up towards your glutes.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then inhale and slowly lower your legs back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: curl femoral acostado dos-una pierna en máquina de palanca
instructions: Paso:1 Ajusta la máquina a tu cuerpo y siéntate con la espalda apoyada en el respaldo.
Paso:2 Coloca las piernas sobre la almohadilla de la palanca, justo por encima de los tobillos.
Paso:3 Sujeta las manijas a los lados de la máquina para estabilizarte.
Paso:4 Manteniendo el torso inmóvil, exhala y realiza un curl llevando las piernas hacia los glúteos.
Paso:5 Pausa un momento arriba, luego inhala y desciende las piernas lentamente a la posición inicial.
Paso:6 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: cable standing back wrist curl
instructions: Step:1 Stand facing a cable machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Hold the cable handle with an overhand grip, palms facing down.
Step:3 Keep your arms straight and your elbows close to your sides.
Step:4 Slowly curl your wrists upward, bringing the cable handle towards your body.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the cable handle back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: cable standing back wrist curl
instructions: Step:1 Stand facing a cable machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Hold the cable handle with an overhand grip, palms facing down.
Step:3 Keep your arms straight and your elbows close to your sides.
Step:4 Slowly curl your wrists upward, bringing the cable handle towards your body.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the cable handle back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: curl de muñecas en extensión de pie con cable
instructions: Paso:1 Ponte de pie frente a una máquina de cable con los pies al ancho de hombros.
Paso:2 Sujeta la empuñadura con agarre prono, palmas hacia abajo.
Paso:3 Mantén los brazos rectos y los codos pegados al cuerpo.
Paso:4 Flexiona (curl) lentamente las muñecas hacia arriba llevando la empuñadura hacia el cuerpo.
Paso:5 Pausa un momento arriba y desciende la empuñadura lentamente a la posición inicial.
Paso:6 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: lever seated dip
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height so that your feet are flat on the ground and your knees are at a 90-degree angle.
Step:2 Grasp the handles of the leverage machine with your palms facing down and your arms fully extended.
Step:3 Slowly lower your body by bending your elbows until your upper arms are parallel to the ground.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then push yourself back up to the starting position by straightening your arms.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: lever seated dip
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height so that your feet are flat on the ground and your knees are at a 90-degree angle.
Step:2 Grasp the handles of the leverage machine with your palms facing down and your arms fully extended.
Step:3 Slowly lower your body by bending your elbows until your upper arms are parallel to the ground.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then push yourself back up to the starting position by straightening your arms.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: fondo sentado en máquina de palanca
instructions: Paso:1 Ajusta la altura del asiento para que los pies queden planos y las rodillas a 90 grados.
Paso:2 Sujeta las manijas de la máquina con palmas hacia abajo y los brazos extendidos.
Paso:3 Desciende controladamente flexionando los codos hasta que los brazos queden paralelos al suelo.
Paso:4 Pausa un instante y empuja de regreso a la posición inicial extendiendo los brazos.
Paso:5 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: standing calves
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, toes pointing forward.
Step:2 Raise your heels off the ground as high as possible, standing on your toes.
Step:3 Hold the position for a moment, then slowly lower your heels back down to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: standing calves
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, toes pointing forward.
Step:2 Raise your heels off the ground as high as possible, standing on your toes.
Step:3 Hold the position for a moment, then slowly lower your heels back down to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: pantorrillas de pie
instructions: Paso:1 Ponte de pie con los pies al ancho de hombros y las puntas hacia adelante.
Paso:2 Eleva los talones lo más alto posible quedando sobre las puntas.
Paso:3 Mantén la posición un instante y baja los talones lentamente a la posición inicial.
Paso:4 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell palms in incline bench press
instructions: Step:1 Set up an incline bench at a 45-degree angle.
Step:2 Sit on the bench with your back against the backrest and feet flat on the ground.
Step:3 Hold a dumbbell in each hand with an overhand grip, palms facing inwards.
Step:4 Extend your arms straight up above your chest, keeping a slight bend in your elbows.
Step:5 Lower the dumbbells slowly towards your shoulders, keeping your elbows close to your body.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then press the dumbbells back up to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell palms in incline bench press
instructions: Step:1 Set up an incline bench at a 45-degree angle.
Step:2 Sit on the bench with your back against the backrest and feet flat on the ground.
Step:3 Hold a dumbbell in each hand with an overhand grip, palms facing inwards.
Step:4 Extend your arms straight up above your chest, keeping a slight bend in your elbows.
Step:5 Lower the dumbbells slowly towards your shoulders, keeping your elbows close to your body.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then press the dumbbells back up to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: press inclinado con mancuernas (palmas hacia adentro)
instructions: Paso:1 Ajusta un banco inclinado a 45 grados.
Paso:2 Siéntate en el banco con la espalda contra el respaldo y los pies planos.
Paso:3 Sostén una mancuerna en cada mano con agarre prono, palmas hacia adentro.
Paso:4 Extiende los brazos sobre el pecho con ligera flexión en los codos.
Paso:5 Desciende las mancuernas lentamente hacia los hombros manteniendo los codos pegados al cuerpo.
Paso:6 Pausa un momento abajo y realiza un press para volver a la posición inicial.
Paso:7 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: barbell standing twist
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a barbell in front of your chest with both hands, palms facing down.
Step:2 Engage your core and keep your back straight throughout the exercise.
Step:3 Slowly twist your torso to the right, pivoting on your feet and hips, while keeping your lower body stable.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the end of the twist, then slowly return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat the twist to the left side.
Step:6 Continue alternating twists for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: barbell standing twist
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a barbell in front of your chest with both hands, palms facing down.
Step:2 Engage your core and keep your back straight throughout the exercise.
Step:3 Slowly twist your torso to the right, pivoting on your feet and hips, while keeping your lower body stable.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the end of the twist, then slowly return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat the twist to the left side.
Step:6 Continue alternating twists for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: giro de pie con barra
instructions: Paso:1 Ponte de pie con los pies al ancho de hombros y sujeta una barra frente al pecho con ambas manos, palmas hacia abajo.
Paso:2 Activa el core y mantén la espalda recta durante todo el ejercicio.
Paso:3 Gira lentamente el torso hacia la derecha pivotando en pies y caderas, manteniendo estable la parte inferior del cuerpo.
Paso:4 Pausa un instante al final del giro y regresa lentamente a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite el giro hacia la izquierda.
Paso:6 Alterna los giros por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: lever kneeling twist
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and position yourself on the machine with your knees resting on the pads and your upper body facing forward.
Step:2 Grasp the handles or the sides of the machine for stability.
Step:3 Keeping your core engaged, twist your torso to one side as far as comfortably possible.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then slowly return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat the twist to the opposite side.
Step:6 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: lever kneeling twist
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and position yourself on the machine with your knees resting on the pads and your upper body facing forward.
Step:2 Grasp the handles or the sides of the machine for stability.
Step:3 Keeping your core engaged, twist your torso to one side as far as comfortably possible.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then slowly return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat the twist to the opposite side.
Step:6 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: giro arrodillado en máquina de palanca
instructions: Paso:1 Ajusta la altura y colócate en la máquina con las rodillas sobre las almohadillas y el torso mirando al frente.
Paso:2 Sujeta las manijas o los laterales de la máquina para estabilidad.
Paso:3 Manteniendo el core activo, gira el torso hacia un lado hasta donde sea cómodo.
Paso:4 Pausa un momento y vuelve lentamente a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite el giro hacia el lado opuesto.
Paso:6 Alterna lados por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: incline leg hip raise (leg straight)
instructions: Step:1 Lie on an incline bench with your back flat against the bench and your legs extended straight out in front of you.
Step:2 Place your hands on the sides of the bench for support.
Step:3 Engaging your abs, lift your legs off the bench, raising them as high as you can while keeping them straight.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your legs back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: incline leg hip raise (leg straight)
instructions: Step:1 Lie on an incline bench with your back flat against the bench and your legs extended straight out in front of you.
Step:2 Place your hands on the sides of the bench for support.
Step:3 Engaging your abs, lift your legs off the bench, raising them as high as you can while keeping them straight.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your legs back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: elevación de cadera en banco inclinado (piernas rectas)
instructions: Paso:1 Acuéstate en un banco inclinado con la espalda apoyada y las piernas extendidas al frente.
Paso:2 Coloca las manos a los lados del banco para apoyo.
Paso:3 Activando los abdominales, eleva las piernas del banco lo más alto posible manteniéndolas rectas.
Paso:4 Pausa un momento arriba y desciende las piernas lentamente a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell straight arm pullover
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on a bench with your head at one end and your feet planted firmly on the ground.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell with both hands and extend your arms straight above your chest.
Step:3 Keeping your arms straight, slowly lower the dumbbell behind your head in an arc-like motion.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then raise the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell straight arm pullover
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on a bench with your head at one end and your feet planted firmly on the ground.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell with both hands and extend your arms straight above your chest.
Step:3 Keeping your arms straight, slowly lower the dumbbell behind your head in an arc-like motion.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then raise the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: pullover con brazos rectos con mancuerna
instructions: Paso:1 Acuéstate en un banco con la cabeza en un extremo y los pies firmes en el suelo.
Paso:2 Sujeta una mancuerna con ambas manos y extiende los brazos rectos sobre el pecho.
Paso:3 Manteniendo los brazos rectos, baja la mancuerna detrás de la cabeza en un movimiento en arco.
Paso:4 Pausa un momento y eleva la mancuerna de regreso a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell goblet squat
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a dumbbell vertically against your chest with both hands.
Step:2 Keeping your chest up and core engaged, lower your body down into a squat position by pushing your hips back and bending your knees.
Step:3 Continue lowering until your thighs are parallel to the ground, or as low as you can comfortably go.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push through your heels to return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell goblet squat
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a dumbbell vertically against your chest with both hands.
Step:2 Keeping your chest up and core engaged, lower your body down into a squat position by pushing your hips back and bending your knees.
Step:3 Continue lowering until your thighs are parallel to the ground, or as low as you can comfortably go.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push through your heels to return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: sentadilla goblet con mancuerna
instructions: Paso:1 Ponte de pie con los pies al ancho de hombros, sosteniendo una mancuerna vertical contra el pecho con ambas manos.
Paso:2 Manteniendo el pecho arriba y el core activo, desciende a una sentadilla llevando las caderas hacia atrás y flexionando las rodillas.
Paso:3 Continúa bajando hasta que los muslos queden paralelos al suelo o hasta donde sea cómodo.
Paso:4 Pausa un instante abajo y empuja con los talones para volver a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: barbell decline bench press
instructions: Step:1 Lie on a decline bench with your feet secured and your head lower than your hips.
Step:2 Grasp the barbell with an overhand grip slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Unrack the barbell and lower it slowly towards your chest, keeping your elbows tucked in.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push the barbell back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: barbell decline bench press
instructions: Step:1 Lie on a decline bench with your feet secured and your head lower than your hips.
Step:2 Grasp the barbell with an overhand grip slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Unrack the barbell and lower it slowly towards your chest, keeping your elbows tucked in.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push the barbell back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: press en banco declinado con barra
instructions: Paso:1 Acuéstate en un banco declinado con los pies asegurados y la cabeza más baja que las caderas.
Paso:2 Sujeta la barra con agarre prono ligeramente más ancho que los hombros.
Paso:3 Desengancha la barra y bájala lentamente hacia el pecho manteniendo los codos pegados.
Paso:4 Pausa un momento abajo y empuja la barra de regreso a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: lever assisted chin-up
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the leverage machine to your desired resistance level.
Step:2 Stand on the foot platform and grip the handles with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Hang with your arms fully extended, keeping your body straight.
Step:4 Engage your back muscles and pull your body up towards the handles, leading with your chest.
Step:5 Continue pulling until your chin is above the handles.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your body back down to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: lever assisted chin-up
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the leverage machine to your desired resistance level.
Step:2 Stand on the foot platform and grip the handles with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Hang with your arms fully extended, keeping your body straight.
Step:4 Engage your back muscles and pull your body up towards the handles, leading with your chest.
Step:5 Continue pulling until your chin is above the handles.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your body back down to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dominada asistida en máquina de palanca
instructions: Paso:1 Ajusta la máquina de palanca al nivel de asistencia deseado.
Paso:2 Colócate sobre la plataforma y toma las manijas con agarre prono, un poco más ancho que hombros.
Paso:3 Quédate colgado con los brazos extendidos, manteniendo el cuerpo alineado.
Paso:4 Activa la espalda y tira del cuerpo hacia las manijas liderando con el pecho.
Paso:5 Continúa hasta que la barbilla quede por encima de las manijas.
Paso:6 Pausa un momento arriba y desciende lentamente a la posición inicial.
Paso:7 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: lever alternate leg press
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat and foot platform of the leverage machine to your desired position.
Step:2 Sit on the machine with your back against the backrest and your feet on the foot platform.
Step:3 Place your hands on the handles or sides of the machine for stability.
Step:4 Push one foot against the foot platform, extending your leg until it is almost fully straight.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then slowly bend your leg and return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat with the other leg.
Step:7 Continue alternating legs for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: lever alternate leg press
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat and foot platform of the leverage machine to your desired position.
Step:2 Sit on the machine with your back against the backrest and your feet on the foot platform.
Step:3 Place your hands on the handles or sides of the machine for stability.
Step:4 Push one foot against the foot platform, extending your leg until it is almost fully straight.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then slowly bend your leg and return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat with the other leg.
Step:7 Continue alternating legs for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: prensa de piernas alterna en máquina de palanca
instructions: Paso:1 Ajusta el asiento y la plataforma de pies de la máquina a la posición deseada.
Paso:2 Siéntate con la espalda en el respaldo y los pies sobre la plataforma.
Paso:3 Coloca las manos en las manijas o en los laterales para estabilidad.
Paso:4 Empuja con un pie extendiendo la pierna hasta casi quedar recta.
Paso:5 Pausa un instante y flexiona la pierna lentamente para regresar a la posición inicial.
Paso:6 Repite con la otra pierna.
Paso:7 Alterna las piernas por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: chest tap push-up (male)
instructions: Step:1 Start in a high plank position with your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart and your body in a straight line.
Step:2 Lower your body towards the ground by bending your elbows, keeping them close to your sides.
Step:3 As you lower yourself, tap your chest with your right hand.
Step:4 Push yourself back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat the movement, this time tapping your chest with your left hand.
Step:6 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: chest tap push-up (male)
instructions: Step:1 Start in a high plank position with your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart and your body in a straight line.
Step:2 Lower your body towards the ground by bending your elbows, keeping them close to your sides.
Step:3 As you lower yourself, tap your chest with your right hand.
Step:4 Push yourself back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat the movement, this time tapping your chest with your left hand.
Step:6 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: flexión con toque al pecho
instructions: Paso:1 Inicia en plancha alta con las manos un poco más anchas que hombros y el cuerpo en línea recta.
Paso:2 Desciende flexionando los codos manteniéndolos cerca del cuerpo.
Paso:3 Al bajar, toca el pecho con la mano derecha.
Paso:4 Empuja de regreso a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite el movimiento tocando el pecho con la mano izquierda.
Paso:6 Alterna lados por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell seated preacher curl
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a preacher curl bench with your feet flat on the floor.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell in one hand with an underhand grip, resting your upper arm against the preacher pad.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arm stationary, exhale and curl the dumbbell up towards your shoulder.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then inhale and slowly lower the dumbbell back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

translations.name: dumbbell seated preacher curl
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a preacher curl bench with your feet flat on the floor.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell in one hand with an underhand grip, resting your upper arm against the preacher pad.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arm stationary, exhale and curl the dumbbell up towards your shoulder.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then inhale and slowly lower the dumbbell back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

translations.name: curl predicador sentado con mancuerna
instructions: Paso:1 Siéntate en un banco de curl predicador con los pies planos en el suelo.
Paso:2 Sostén una mancuerna con agarre supino y apoya la parte superior del brazo en el cojín.
Paso:3 Manteniendo el brazo fijo, exhala y realiza un curl llevando la mancuerna hacia el hombro.
Paso:4 Pausa un momento arriba y luego inhala mientras bajas la mancuerna lentamente a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones y cambia de brazo.

name: weighted front raise
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a dumbbell in each hand with your palms facing your thighs.
Step:2 Keeping your arms straight, exhale and lift the dumbbells in front of you until they are at shoulder level.
Step:3 Pause for a moment at the top, then inhale and slowly lower the dumbbells back down to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: weighted front raise
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a dumbbell in each hand with your palms facing your thighs.
Step:2 Keeping your arms straight, exhale and lift the dumbbells in front of you until they are at shoulder level.
Step:3 Pause for a moment at the top, then inhale and slowly lower the dumbbells back down to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: elevación frontal con peso
instructions: Paso:1 Ponte de pie con los pies al ancho de hombros, sosteniendo una mancuerna en cada mano con palmas hacia los muslos.
Paso:2 Manteniendo los brazos rectos, exhala y eleva las mancuernas al frente hasta la altura de los hombros.
Paso:3 Pausa un momento arriba y luego inhala mientras bajas las mancuernas lentamente.
Paso:4 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: reverse dip
instructions: Step:1 Position yourself between two parallel bars with your arms fully extended and your body straight.
Step:2 Lower your body by bending your elbows until your upper arms are parallel to the ground.
Step:3 Pause for a moment, then push yourself back up to the starting position by straightening your arms.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: reverse dip
instructions: Step:1 Position yourself between two parallel bars with your arms fully extended and your body straight.
Step:2 Lower your body by bending your elbows until your upper arms are parallel to the ground.
Step:3 Pause for a moment, then push yourself back up to the starting position by straightening your arms.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: fondo inverso
instructions: Paso:1 Colócate entre dos barras paralelas con los brazos extendidos y el cuerpo alineado.
Paso:2 Desciende flexionando los codos hasta que los brazos queden paralelos al suelo.
Paso:3 Pausa un momento y empuja de regreso a la posición inicial extendiendo los brazos.
Paso:4 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell seated reverse grip one arm overhead tricep extension
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your back straight and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell with an underhand grip and extend your arm straight up overhead.
Step:3 Lower the dumbbell behind your head by bending your elbow, keeping your upper arm stationary.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then extend your arm back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

translations.name: dumbbell seated reverse grip one arm overhead tricep extension
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your back straight and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell with an underhand grip and extend your arm straight up overhead.
Step:3 Lower the dumbbell behind your head by bending your elbow, keeping your upper arm stationary.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then extend your arm back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

translations.name: extensión de tríceps por encima de la cabeza a una mano sentado con mancuerna (agarre supino)
instructions: Paso:1 Siéntate en un banco con la espalda recta y los pies planos.
Paso:2 Sujeta una mancuerna con agarre supino y extiende el brazo recto sobre la cabeza.
Paso:3 Desciende la mancuerna detrás de la cabeza flexionando el codo, manteniendo el brazo superior fijo.
Paso:4 Pausa un momento y extiende el brazo de nuevo a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones y cambia de brazo.

name: kettlebell one arm push press
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a kettlebell in one hand at shoulder level.
Step:2 Bend your knees slightly and engage your core.
Step:3 Press the kettlebell overhead by extending your arm and fully extending your legs.
Step:4 Lower the kettlebell back to the starting position by bending your knees and bringing the kettlebell back to your shoulder.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides.

translations.name: kettlebell one arm push press
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a kettlebell in one hand at shoulder level.
Step:2 Bend your knees slightly and engage your core.
Step:3 Press the kettlebell overhead by extending your arm and fully extending your legs.
Step:4 Lower the kettlebell back to the starting position by bending your knees and bringing the kettlebell back to your shoulder.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides.

translations.name: push press con kettlebell a una mano
instructions: Paso:1 Ponte de pie con los pies al ancho de hombros, sosteniendo una kettlebell a la altura del hombro.
Paso:2 Flexiona levemente las rodillas y activa el core.
Paso:3 Realiza un press por encima de la cabeza extendiendo el brazo y las piernas.
Paso:4 Baja la kettlebell a la posición inicial flexionando las rodillas y llevándola al hombro.
Paso:5 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones y cambia de lado.

name: dumbbell alternate seated hammer curl
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing your torso and arms extended down.
Step:2 Keep your back straight and your elbows close to your torso.
Step:3 Exhale and curl the dumbbell in your right hand towards your shoulder, keeping your upper arm stationary.
Step:4 Continue to raise the dumbbell until your biceps are fully contracted and the dumbbell is at shoulder level.
Step:5 Pause for a brief moment, then inhale and slowly lower the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat the movement with your left arm.
Step:7 Continue alternating arms for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell alternate seated hammer curl
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing your torso and arms extended down.
Step:2 Keep your back straight and your elbows close to your torso.
Step:3 Exhale and curl the dumbbell in your right hand towards your shoulder, keeping your upper arm stationary.
Step:4 Continue to raise the dumbbell until your biceps are fully contracted and the dumbbell is at shoulder level.
Step:5 Pause for a brief moment, then inhale and slowly lower the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat the movement with your left arm.
Step:7 Continue alternating arms for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: curl martillo alterno sentado con mancuernas
instructions: Paso:1 Siéntate en un banco con una mancuerna en cada mano, palmas hacia el torso y brazos extendidos.
Paso:2 Mantén la espalda recta y los codos pegados al torso.
Paso:3 Exhala y realiza un curl con la mancuerna derecha hacia el hombro manteniendo el brazo superior fijo.
Paso:4 Continúa elevando hasta contraer por completo el bíceps y que la mancuerna llegue a la altura del hombro.
Paso:5 Pausa brevemente y luego inhala mientras bajas la mancuerna lentamente.
Paso:6 Repite el movimiento con el brazo izquierdo.
Paso:7 Continúa alternando por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: reverse grip pull-up
instructions: Step:1 Grab the pull-up bar with an underhand grip, hands shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Hang from the bar with your arms fully extended and your body straight.
Step:3 Engage your back muscles and pull your body up towards the bar, leading with your chest.
Step:4 Continue pulling until your chin is above the bar.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your body back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: reverse grip pull-up
instructions: Step:1 Grab the pull-up bar with an underhand grip, hands shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Hang from the bar with your arms fully extended and your body straight.
Step:3 Engage your back muscles and pull your body up towards the bar, leading with your chest.
Step:4 Continue pulling until your chin is above the bar.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your body back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dominada con agarre supino
instructions: Paso:1 Agarra la barra de dominadas con agarre supino, manos al ancho de hombros.
Paso:2 Cuelga de la barra con los brazos totalmente extendidos y el cuerpo alineado.
Paso:3 Activa la espalda y tira del cuerpo hacia la barra liderando con el pecho.
Paso:4 Continúa hasta que la barbilla quede por encima de la barra.
Paso:5 Pausa un momento arriba y desciende lentamente a la posición inicial.
Paso:6 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: captains chair straight leg raise
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the captain's chair with your back against the backrest and your forearms resting on the arm pads.
Step:2 Keep your upper body stable and your back straight.
Step:3 Engage your abs and lift your legs up in front of you, keeping them straight.
Step:4 Continue lifting until your legs are parallel to the ground or as high as you can comfortably go.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your legs back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: captains chair straight leg raise
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the captain's chair with your back against the backrest and your forearms resting on the arm pads.
Step:2 Keep your upper body stable and your back straight.
Step:3 Engage your abs and lift your legs up in front of you, keeping them straight.
Step:4 Continue lifting until your legs are parallel to the ground or as high as you can comfortably go.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your legs back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: elevación de piernas rectas en silla del capitán
instructions: Paso:1 Siéntate en la silla del capitán con la espalda contra el respaldo y los antebrazos sobre las almohadillas.
Paso:2 Mantén el torso estable y la espalda recta.
Paso:3 Activa los abdominales y eleva las piernas al frente manteniéndolas rectas.
Paso:4 Continúa elevando hasta que queden paralelas al suelo o hasta donde sea cómodo.
Paso:5 Pausa un momento arriba y desciende las piernas lentamente a la posición inicial.
Paso:6 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: power clean
instructions: Step:1 Start with the barbell on the ground in front of you, with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Bend down and grip the barbell with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Keep your back straight and chest up as you lift the barbell off the ground, extending your hips and knees.
Step:4 As the barbell reaches your mid-thigh, explosively pull it upwards, shrugging your shoulders and pulling your elbows high and to the sides.
Step:5 As the barbell reaches its highest point, quickly drop underneath it, rotating your elbows around and catching the barbell on your shoulders in a front squat position.
Step:6 Stand up with the barbell, fully extending your hips and knees.
Step:7 Lower the barbell back down to the starting position, keeping control of the weight throughout the movement.
Step:8 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: power clean
instructions: Step:1 Start with the barbell on the ground in front of you, with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Bend down and grip the barbell with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Keep your back straight and chest up as you lift the barbell off the ground, extending your hips and knees.
Step:4 As the barbell reaches your mid-thigh, explosively pull it upwards, shrugging your shoulders and pulling your elbows high and to the sides.
Step:5 As the barbell reaches its highest point, quickly drop underneath it, rotating your elbows around and catching the barbell on your shoulders in a front squat position.
Step:6 Stand up with the barbell, fully extending your hips and knees.
Step:7 Lower the barbell back down to the starting position, keeping control of the weight throughout the movement.
Step:8 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: power clean con barra
instructions: Paso:1 Coloca la barra en el suelo al frente con los pies al ancho de hombros.
Paso:2 Agáchate y toma la barra con agarre prono, un poco más ancho que hombros.
Paso:3 Mantén la espalda recta y el pecho arriba mientras elevas la barra extendiendo caderas y rodillas.
Paso:4 Al llegar la barra al muslo medio, tira explosivamente hacia arriba encogiendo hombros y elevando los codos altos y hacia afuera.
Paso:5 En el punto más alto, entra rápido bajo la barra, rota los codos y recíbela sobre los hombros en posición de sentadilla frontal.
Paso:6 Ponte de pie con la barra extendiendo por completo caderas y rodillas.
Paso:7 Baja la barra controladamente de regreso a la posición inicial.
Paso:8 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: ez bar seated close grip concentration curl
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your feet flat on the ground and hold an EZ barbell with an underhand grip.
Step:2 Rest your elbow on the inside of your thigh, just above the knee.
Step:3 Curl the barbell up towards your shoulder while keeping your upper arm stationary.
Step:4 Squeeze your biceps at the top of the movement, then slowly lower the barbell back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: ez bar seated close grip concentration curl
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your feet flat on the ground and hold an EZ barbell with an underhand grip.
Step:2 Rest your elbow on the inside of your thigh, just above the knee.
Step:3 Curl the barbell up towards your shoulder while keeping your upper arm stationary.
Step:4 Squeeze your biceps at the top of the movement, then slowly lower the barbell back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: curl de concentración con agarre cerrado sentado con barra EZ
instructions: Paso:1 Siéntate en un banco con los pies planos y sujeta una barra EZ con agarre supino.
Paso:2 Apoya el codo en la parte interna del muslo, justo encima de la rodilla.
Paso:3 Realiza un curl llevando la barra hacia el hombro manteniendo el brazo superior fijo.
Paso:4 Aprieta los bíceps arriba y baja la barra lentamente a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: forward lunge (male)
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet hip-width apart and hands on your hips.
Step:2 Take a big step forward with your right foot, lowering your body into a lunge position.
Step:3 Bend your right knee to about 90 degrees, keeping your knee aligned with your ankle.
Step:4 Push off with your right foot and return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat with your left leg, alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: forward lunge (male)
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet hip-width apart and hands on your hips.
Step:2 Take a big step forward with your right foot, lowering your body into a lunge position.
Step:3 Bend your right knee to about 90 degrees, keeping your knee aligned with your ankle.
Step:4 Push off with your right foot and return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat with your left leg, alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: zancada al frente
instructions: Paso:1 Ponte de pie con los pies al ancho de caderas y las manos en la cintura.
Paso:2 Da un gran paso hacia adelante con el pie derecho, bajando el cuerpo a una posición de zancada.
Paso:3 Flexiona la rodilla derecha a unos 90 grados manteniéndola alineada con el tobillo.
Paso:4 Impúlsate con el pie derecho y regresa a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite con la pierna izquierda, alternando por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell alternating bicep curl with leg raised on exercise ball
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing forward.
Step:2 Place an exercise ball behind you and position one foot on top of it, keeping your balance.
Step:3 With your arms fully extended and elbows close to your sides, curl one dumbbell towards your shoulder while keeping your upper arm stationary.
Step:4 Lower the dumbbell back down to the starting position and repeat with the other arm.
Step:5 Continue alternating arms for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell alternating bicep curl with leg raised on exercise ball
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing forward.
Step:2 Place an exercise ball behind you and position one foot on top of it, keeping your balance.
Step:3 With your arms fully extended and elbows close to your sides, curl one dumbbell towards your shoulder while keeping your upper arm stationary.
Step:4 Lower the dumbbell back down to the starting position and repeat with the other arm.
Step:5 Continue alternating arms for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: curl de bíceps alterno con mancuernas con pierna elevada sobre balón de ejercicio
instructions: Paso:1 Ponte de pie con los pies al ancho de hombros y sostiene una mancuerna en cada mano, palmas hacia adelante.
Paso:2 Coloca un balón de ejercicio detrás y apoya un pie encima manteniendo el equilibrio.
Paso:3 Con los brazos extendidos y codos pegados, realiza un curl con una mancuerna hacia el hombro manteniendo el brazo superior fijo.
Paso:4 Baja la mancuerna a la posición inicial y repite con el otro brazo.
Paso:5 Alterna los brazos por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: triceps dip
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the edge of a bench or chair with your hands gripping the edge, fingers pointing forward.
Step:2 Slide your butt off the bench, supporting your weight with your hands.
Step:3 Bend your elbows and lower your body towards the ground, keeping your back close to the bench.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push yourself back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: triceps dip
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the edge of a bench or chair with your hands gripping the edge, fingers pointing forward.
Step:2 Slide your butt off the bench, supporting your weight with your hands.
Step:3 Bend your elbows and lower your body towards the ground, keeping your back close to the bench.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push yourself back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: fondo de tríceps en banco
instructions: Paso:1 Siéntate en el borde de un banco o silla y sujeta el borde con las manos, dedos hacia adelante.
Paso:2 Desliza los glúteos fuera del banco apoyando el peso en las manos.
Paso:3 Flexiona los codos y desciende el cuerpo manteniendo la espalda cerca del banco.
Paso:4 Pausa un momento abajo y empuja de vuelta a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: lever seated row
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and footrests to a comfortable position.
Step:2 Sit on the machine with your chest against the pad and your feet on the footrests.
Step:3 Grasp the handles with an overhand grip, shoulder-width apart.
Step:4 Keep your back straight and your core engaged.
Step:5 Pull the handles towards your body, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the peak of the movement.
Step:7 Slowly release the handles and return to the starting position.
Step:8 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: lever seated row
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and footrests to a comfortable position.
Step:2 Sit on the machine with your chest against the pad and your feet on the footrests.
Step:3 Grasp the handles with an overhand grip, shoulder-width apart.
Step:4 Keep your back straight and your core engaged.
Step:5 Pull the handles towards your body, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the peak of the movement.
Step:7 Slowly release the handles and return to the starting position.
Step:8 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: remo sentado en máquina de palanca
instructions: Paso:1 Ajusta la altura del asiento y los apoyapiés a una posición cómoda.
Paso:2 Siéntate con el pecho contra el apoyo y los pies en los reposapiés.
Paso:3 Sujeta las manijas con agarre prono al ancho de hombros.
Paso:4 Mantén la espalda recta y el core activo.
Paso:5 Tira de las manijas hacia el cuerpo juntando las escápulas.
Paso:6 Pausa un instante en el pico del movimiento.
Paso:7 Libera las manijas lentamente y vuelve a la posición inicial.
Paso:8 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: ez barbell decline close grip face press
instructions: Step:1 Lie on a decline bench with your head lower than your feet.
Step:2 Grasp the ez barbell with a close grip, palms facing each other.
Step:3 Extend your arms straight up above your chest, keeping your elbows close to your body.
Step:4 Lower the barbell towards your forehead by bending your elbows.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then press the barbell back up to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: ez barbell decline close grip face press
instructions: Step:1 Lie on a decline bench with your head lower than your feet.
Step:2 Grasp the ez barbell with a close grip, palms facing each other.
Step:3 Extend your arms straight up above your chest, keeping your elbows close to your body.
Step:4 Lower the barbell towards your forehead by bending your elbows.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then press the barbell back up to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: press al rostro en declinado con agarre cerrado con barra EZ
instructions: Paso:1 Acuéstate en un banco declinado con la cabeza más baja que los pies.
Paso:2 Sujeta la barra EZ con agarre cerrado, palmas enfrentadas.
Paso:3 Extiende los brazos sobre el pecho manteniendo los codos pegados al cuerpo.
Paso:4 Desciende la barra hacia la frente flexionando los codos.
Paso:5 Pausa un momento y realiza un press para volver a la posición inicial.
Paso:6 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: smith one leg floor calf raise
instructions: Step:1 Position yourself on the floor under the smith machine bar, facing away from the machine.
Step:2 Place the balls of your feet on a raised surface, such as a weight plate or block.
Step:3 Position the smith machine bar across your lower legs, just above your ankles.
Step:4 Hold onto the bar with your hands for stability.
Step:5 Raise your heels off the ground by extending your ankles, lifting your body up.
Step:6 Pause at the top of the movement, then slowly lower your heels back down to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: smith one leg floor calf raise
instructions: Step:1 Position yourself on the floor under the smith machine bar, facing away from the machine.
Step:2 Place the balls of your feet on a raised surface, such as a weight plate or block.
Step:3 Position the smith machine bar across your lower legs, just above your ankles.
Step:4 Hold onto the bar with your hands for stability.
Step:5 Raise your heels off the ground by extending your ankles, lifting your body up.
Step:6 Pause at the top of the movement, then slowly lower your heels back down to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: elevación de pantorrilla en el suelo a una pierna en máquina smith
instructions: Paso:1 Colócate en el suelo bajo la barra de la máquina smith, de espaldas a la máquina.
Paso:2 Apoya las puntas de los pies en una superficie elevada, como un disco o bloque.
Paso:3 Ubica la barra de la smith sobre la parte baja de las piernas, justo por encima de los tobillos.
Paso:4 Sujeta la barra con las manos para estabilidad.
Paso:5 Eleva los talones extendiendo los tobillos para levantar el cuerpo.
Paso:6 Pausa arriba y baja los talones lentamente a la posición inicial.
Paso:7 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: hanging straight twisting leg hip raise
instructions: Step:1 Hang from a pull-up bar with your arms fully extended and your legs straight.
Step:2 Engage your core and lift your legs up towards your chest, keeping them straight.
Step:3 Once your legs are parallel to the ground, twist your hips to one side, bringing your legs towards that side.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat the movement, but this time twist your hips to the opposite side.
Step:6 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: hanging straight twisting leg hip raise
instructions: Step:1 Hang from a pull-up bar with your arms fully extended and your legs straight.
Step:2 Engage your core and lift your legs up towards your chest, keeping them straight.
Step:3 Once your legs are parallel to the ground, twist your hips to one side, bringing your legs towards that side.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat the movement, but this time twist your hips to the opposite side.
Step:6 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: elevación de cadera con piernas rectas y giro suspendido
instructions: Paso:1 Cuélgate de una barra de dominadas con los brazos completamente extendidos y las piernas rectas.
Paso:2 Activa tu core y levanta las piernas hacia el pecho, manteniéndolas rectas.
Paso:3 Una vez que tus piernas estén paralelas al suelo, gira la cadera hacia un lado, llevando las piernas hacia ese lado.
Paso:4 Haz una pausa por un momento, luego regresa a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite el movimiento, pero esta vez gira la cadera hacia el lado opuesto.
Paso:6 Continúa alternando lados para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: lever seated crunch (chest pad)
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and chest pad position according to your comfort.
Step:2 Sit on the machine with your back against the chest pad and your feet flat on the floor.
Step:3 Grasp the handles or side bars for stability.
Step:4 Engage your abs and slowly lean back, allowing the chest pad to move with you.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the maximum contraction, feeling the tension in your abs.
Step:6 Slowly return to the starting position by contracting your abs and pulling yourself back up.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: lever seated crunch (chest pad)
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and chest pad position according to your comfort.
Step:2 Sit on the machine with your back against the chest pad and your feet flat on the floor.
Step:3 Grasp the handles or side bars for stability.
Step:4 Engage your abs and slowly lean back, allowing the chest pad to move with you.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the maximum contraction, feeling the tension in your abs.
Step:6 Slowly return to the starting position by contracting your abs and pulling yourself back up.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: crunch sentado en máquina de palanca (con almohadilla en el pecho)
instructions: Paso:1 Ajusta la altura del asiento y la posición de la almohadilla del pecho según tu comodidad.
Paso:2 Siéntate en la máquina con la espalda contra la almohadilla del pecho y los pies planos en el suelo.
Paso:3 Sujeta las manijas o las barras laterales para mayor estabilidad.
Paso:4 Activa tus abdominales e inclínate lentamente hacia atrás, permitiendo que la almohadilla del pecho se mueva contigo.
Paso:5 Haz una pausa por un momento en la máxima contracción, sintiendo la tensión en tus abdominales.
Paso:6 Regresa lentamente a la posición inicial contrayendo tus abdominales y tirando de ti mismo hacia arriba.
Paso:7 Repite para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: cable one arm fly on exercise ball
instructions: Step:1 Sit on an exercise ball with your feet flat on the ground and your back straight.
Step:2 Hold a cable handle in one hand and extend your arm out to the side, parallel to the ground.
Step:3 Keep your elbow slightly bent and your palm facing forward.
Step:4 Slowly bring your arm across your body, squeezing your chest muscles.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the end of the movement, then slowly return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides.

translations.name: cable one arm fly on exercise ball
instructions: Step:1 Sit on an exercise ball with your feet flat on the ground and your back straight.
Step:2 Hold a cable handle in one hand and extend your arm out to the side, parallel to the ground.
Step:3 Keep your elbow slightly bent and your palm facing forward.
Step:4 Slowly bring your arm across your body, squeezing your chest muscles.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the end of the movement, then slowly return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides.

translations.name: aperturas a un brazo con cable sobre pelota de ejercicio
instructions: Paso:1 Siéntate en una pelota de ejercicio con los pies planos en el suelo y la espalda recta.
Paso:2 Sostén una manija de cable con una mano y extiende el brazo hacia un lado, paralelo al suelo.
Paso:3 Mantén el codo ligeramente flexionado y la palma de la mano hacia adelante.
Paso:4 Lentamente, cruza el brazo por delante de tu cuerpo, apretando los músculos del pecho.
Paso:5 Haz una pausa por un momento al final del movimiento, luego regresa lentamente a la posición inicial.
Paso:6 Repite para el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambia de lado.

name: oblique crunch v. 2
instructions: Step:1 Lie on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Place your hands behind your head or cross them over your chest.
Step:3 Engage your abs and lift your shoulder blades off the ground, rotating your torso to one side.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then lower your shoulder blades back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat on the other side.
Step:6 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: oblique crunch v. 2
instructions: Step:1 Lie on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Place your hands behind your head or cross them over your chest.
Step:3 Engage your abs and lift your shoulder blades off the ground, rotating your torso to one side.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then lower your shoulder blades back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat on the other side.
Step:6 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: crunch oblicuo v. 2
instructions: Paso:1 Acuéstate boca arriba con las rodillas flexionadas y los pies planos en el suelo.
Paso:2 Coloca las manos detrás de la cabeza o crúzalas sobre el pecho.
Paso:3 Activa tus abdominales y levanta los omóplatos del suelo, girando el torso hacia un lado.
Paso:4 Haz una pausa por un momento, luego baja los omóplatos a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite del otro lado.
Paso:6 Continúa alternando lados para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: cable cross-over variation
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the cable pulleys to chest height.
Step:2 Stand in the center of the cable machine with one foot in front of the other.
Step:3 Grasp the handles with your palms facing down and your arms extended out to the sides.
Step:4 Take a step forward, keeping your arms slightly bent.
Step:5 With a slight bend in your elbows, bring your hands together in front of your chest.
Step:6 Pause for a moment, then slowly return your arms back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: cable cross-over variation
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the cable pulleys to chest height.
Step:2 Stand in the center of the cable machine with one foot in front of the other.
Step:3 Grasp the handles with your palms facing down and your arms extended out to the sides.
Step:4 Take a step forward, keeping your arms slightly bent.
Step:5 With a slight bend in your elbows, bring your hands together in front of your chest.
Step:6 Pause for a moment, then slowly return your arms back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: variación de cruce de cables
instructions: Paso:1 Ajusta las poleas del cable a la altura del pecho.
Paso:2 Párate en el centro de la máquina de cables con un pie delante del otro.
Paso:3 Agarra las manijas con las palmas hacia abajo y los brazos extendidos hacia los lados.
Paso:4 Da un paso hacia adelante, manteniendo los brazos ligeramente flexionados.
Paso:5 Con una ligera flexión en los codos, junta las manos frente a tu pecho.
Paso:6 Haz una pausa por un momento, luego regresa lentamente los brazos a la posición inicial.
Paso:7 Repite para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell over bench wrist curl
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your forearms resting on the bench and your palms facing up, holding a dumbbell in each hand.
Step:2 Allow your wrists to hang over the edge of the bench.
Step:3 Slowly curl your wrists upward, squeezing your forearms at the top of the movement.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then slowly lower your wrists back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell over bench wrist curl
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your forearms resting on the bench and your palms facing up, holding a dumbbell in each hand.
Step:2 Allow your wrists to hang over the edge of the bench.
Step:3 Slowly curl your wrists upward, squeezing your forearms at the top of the movement.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then slowly lower your wrists back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: curl de muñeca con mancuerna sobre banco
instructions: Paso:1 Siéntate en un banco con los antebrazos apoyados en el banco y las palmas de las manos hacia arriba, sosteniendo una mancuerna en cada mano.
Paso:2 Deja que tus muñecas cuelguen sobre el borde del banco.
Paso:3 Lentamente, flexiona las muñecas hacia arriba, apretando los antebrazos en la parte superior del movimiento.
Paso:4 Haz una pausa por un momento, luego baja lentamente las muñecas a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: barbell single leg split squat
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a barbell across your back.
Step:2 Take a large step forward with one leg, keeping your torso upright.
Step:3 Lower your body by bending your front knee and hip, while keeping your back leg straight.
Step:4 Continue lowering until your front thigh is parallel to the ground.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then push through your front heel to return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch legs.

translations.name: barbell single leg split squat
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a barbell across your back.
Step:2 Take a large step forward with one leg, keeping your torso upright.
Step:3 Lower your body by bending your front knee and hip, while keeping your back leg straight.
Step:4 Continue lowering until your front thigh is parallel to the ground.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then push through your front heel to return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch legs.

translations.name: sentadilla dividida a una pierna con barra
instructions: Paso:1 Párate con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros, sosteniendo una barra sobre tu espalda.
Paso:2 Da un gran paso hacia adelante con una pierna, manteniendo el torso erguido.
Paso:3 Baja el cuerpo flexionando la rodilla y la cadera delanteras, mientras mantienes la pierna de atrás recta.
Paso:4 Continúa bajando hasta que tu muslo delantero esté paralelo al suelo.
Paso:5 Haz una pausa por un momento, luego empuja con el talón delantero para volver a la posición inicial.
Paso:6 Repite para el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambia de pierna.

name: dumbbell lying single extension
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on a bench with a dumbbell in one hand and your arm fully extended above your chest.
Step:2 Lower the dumbbell in a controlled manner towards your forehead, keeping your upper arm stationary.
Step:3 Pause briefly at the bottom of the movement, then extend your arm back to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

translations.name: dumbbell lying single extension
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on a bench with a dumbbell in one hand and your arm fully extended above your chest.
Step:2 Lower the dumbbell in a controlled manner towards your forehead, keeping your upper arm stationary.
Step:3 Pause briefly at the bottom of the movement, then extend your arm back to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

translations.name: extensión acostado a un brazo con mancuerna
instructions: Paso:1 Acuéstate en un banco con una mancuerna en una mano y el brazo completamente extendido sobre el pecho.
Paso:2 Baja la mancuerna de manera controlada hacia tu frente, manteniendo la parte superior del brazo inmóvil.
Paso:3 Haz una pausa breve en la parte inferior del movimiento, luego extiende el brazo de regreso a la posición inicial.
Paso:4 Repite para el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambia de brazo.

name: dumbbell incline one arm hammer press
instructions: Step:1 Sit on an incline bench with a dumbbell in one hand, resting on your thigh.
Step:2 Lean back on the bench and use your thigh to help raise the dumbbell to shoulder height.
Step:3 Rotate your wrist so that your palm is facing inward, towards your body.
Step:4 Press the dumbbell up and away from your body, extending your arm fully.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbell back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

translations.name: dumbbell incline one arm hammer press
instructions: Step:1 Sit on an incline bench with a dumbbell in one hand, resting on your thigh.
Step:2 Lean back on the bench and use your thigh to help raise the dumbbell to shoulder height.
Step:3 Rotate your wrist so that your palm is facing inward, towards your body.
Step:4 Press the dumbbell up and away from your body, extending your arm fully.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbell back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

translations.name: press martillo inclinado a un brazo con mancuerna
instructions: Paso:1 Siéntate en un banco inclinado con una mancuerna en una mano, apoyada sobre tu muslo.
Paso:2 Recuéstate en el banco y usa tu muslo para ayudar a levantar la mancuerna a la altura del hombro.
Paso:3 Gira la muñeca para que la palma de la mano quede hacia adentro, hacia tu cuerpo.
Paso:4 Empuja la mancuerna hacia arriba y lejos de tu cuerpo, extendiendo el brazo por completo.
Paso:5 Haz una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, luego baja lentamente la mancuerna a la posición inicial.
Paso:6 Repite para el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambia de brazo.

name: sled 45в° calf press
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the sled machine to a 45-degree angle.
Step:2 Place your feet on the sled platform with your toes pointing forward.
Step:3 Push the sled platform away from you by extending your ankles and calves.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the sled platform back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: sled 45в° calf press
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the sled machine to a 45-degree angle.
Step:2 Place your feet on the sled platform with your toes pointing forward.
Step:3 Push the sled platform away from you by extending your ankles and calves.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the sled platform back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: press de pantorrilla a 45° en sled
instructions: Paso:1 Ajusta la máquina de sled a un ángulo de 45 grados.
Paso:2 Coloca los pies en la plataforma del sled con los dedos apuntando hacia adelante.
Paso:3 Empuja la plataforma del sled lejos de ti extendiendo los tobillos y las pantorrillas.
Paso:4 Haz una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, luego baja lentamente la plataforma del sled a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: pike-to-cobra push-up
instructions: Step:1 Start in a push-up position with your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart and your feet together.
Step:2 Engage your core and lift your hips up towards the ceiling, forming an inverted V shape with your body.
Step:3 Lower your upper body towards the ground by bending your elbows, keeping them close to your body.
Step:4 As you lower down, shift your weight forward and transition into a cobra pose by straightening your arms and lifting your chest up.
Step:5 Reverse the movement by bending your elbows and lowering your chest back down towards the ground.
Step:6 Push through your hands to return to the inverted V position.
Step:7 Continue the movement by lowering your hips back down towards the ground, returning to the starting push-up position.
Step:8 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: pike-to-cobra push-up
instructions: Step:1 Start in a push-up position with your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart and your feet together.
Step:2 Engage your core and lift your hips up towards the ceiling, forming an inverted V shape with your body.
Step:3 Lower your upper body towards the ground by bending your elbows, keeping them close to your body.
Step:4 As you lower down, shift your weight forward and transition into a cobra pose by straightening your arms and lifting your chest up.
Step:5 Reverse the movement by bending your elbows and lowering your chest back down towards the ground.
Step:6 Push through your hands to return to the inverted V position.
Step:7 Continue the movement by lowering your hips back down towards the ground, returning to the starting push-up position.
Step:8 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: flexión de pica a cobra
instructions: Paso:1 Comienza en una posición de flexión con las manos un poco más separadas que el ancho de los hombros y los pies juntos.
Paso:2 Activa tu core y levanta las caderas hacia el techo, formando una V invertida con tu cuerpo.
Paso:3 Baja la parte superior del cuerpo hacia el suelo flexionando los codos, manteniéndolos cerca de tu cuerpo.
Paso:4 A medida que bajas, desplaza tu peso hacia adelante y transiciona a una postura de cobra estirando los brazos y levantando el pecho.
Paso:5 Invierte el movimiento flexionando los codos y bajando el pecho de nuevo hacia el suelo.
Paso:6 Empuja con las manos para volver a la posición de V invertida.
Paso:7 Continúa el movimiento bajando las caderas de nuevo hacia el suelo, volviendo a la posición inicial de flexión.
Paso:8 Repite para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: barbell seated overhead press
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your back straight and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Hold the barbell with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Lift the barbell off the rack and bring it to shoulder level, with your elbows bent and palms facing forward.
Step:4 Press the barbell overhead by extending your arms fully.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the barbell back to shoulder level.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: barbell seated overhead press
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your back straight and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Hold the barbell with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Lift the barbell off the rack and bring it to shoulder level, with your elbows bent and palms facing forward.
Step:4 Press the barbell overhead by extending your arms fully.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the barbell back to shoulder level.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: press militar sentado con barra
instructions: Paso:1 Siéntate en un banco con la espalda recta y los pies planos en el suelo.
Paso:2 Sostén la barra con un agarre prono, un poco más ancho que la distancia entre los hombros.
Paso:3 Levanta la barra del soporte y llévala a la altura de los hombros, con los codos flexionados y las palmas hacia adelante.
Paso:4 Empuja la barra por encima de la cabeza extendiendo completamente los brazos.
Paso:5 Haz una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, luego baja lentamente la barra a la altura de los hombros.
Paso:6 Repite para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: smith shoulder press
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and position yourself on the smith machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Grasp the bar with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Lift the bar off the rack and position it at shoulder level, with your elbows bent and palms facing forward.
Step:4 Press the bar upward until your arms are fully extended overhead.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the bar back down to shoulder level.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: smith shoulder press
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and position yourself on the smith machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Grasp the bar with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Lift the bar off the rack and position it at shoulder level, with your elbows bent and palms facing forward.
Step:4 Press the bar upward until your arms are fully extended overhead.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the bar back down to shoulder level.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: press de hombros en máquina Smith
instructions: Paso:1 Ajusta la altura del asiento y colócate en la máquina Smith con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros.
Paso:2 Agarra la barra con un agarre prono, un poco más ancho que la distancia entre los hombros.
Paso:3 Levanta la barra del soporte y colócala a la altura de los hombros, con los codos flexionados y las palmas hacia adelante.
Paso:4 Empuja la barra hacia arriba hasta que tus brazos estén completamente extendidos por encima de la cabeza.
Paso:5 Haz una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, luego baja lentamente la barra a la altura de los hombros.
Paso:6 Repite para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: cable pushdown (straight arm) v. 2
instructions: Step:1 Attach a straight bar to a high pulley cable machine.
Step:2 Stand facing the machine with your feet shoulder-width apart and a slight bend in your knees.
Step:3 Grasp the bar with an overhand grip, keeping your arms straight and your palms facing down.
Step:4 Engage your core and keep your back straight as you exhale and push the bar down towards your thighs.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then slowly return the bar to the starting position while inhaling.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: cable pushdown (straight arm) v. 2
instructions: Step:1 Attach a straight bar to a high pulley cable machine.
Step:2 Stand facing the machine with your feet shoulder-width apart and a slight bend in your knees.
Step:3 Grasp the bar with an overhand grip, keeping your arms straight and your palms facing down.
Step:4 Engage your core and keep your back straight as you exhale and push the bar down towards your thighs.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then slowly return the bar to the starting position while inhaling.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: pulldown con brazos rectos en cable v. 2
instructions: Paso:1 Conecta una barra recta a una máquina de cable con polea alta.
Paso:2 Párate frente a la máquina con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y una ligera flexión en las rodillas.
Paso:3 Agarra la barra con un agarre prono, manteniendo los brazos rectos y las palmas hacia abajo.
Paso:4 Activa tu core y mantén la espalda recta mientras exhalas y empujas la barra hacia abajo, hacia tus muslos.
Paso:5 Haz una pausa por un momento en la parte inferior, luego regresa lentamente la barra a la posición inicial mientras inhalas.
Paso:6 Repite para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: weighted hyperextension (on stability ball)
instructions: Step:1 Position yourself face down on a stability ball with your hips resting on the ball and your feet against a wall for stability.
Step:2 Place your hands behind your head or cross them over your chest.
Step:3 Engage your core and slowly lift your upper body off the ball, extending your back until your body forms a straight line.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your upper body back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: weighted hyperextension (on stability ball)
instructions: Step:1 Position yourself face down on a stability ball with your hips resting on the ball and your feet against a wall for stability.
Step:2 Place your hands behind your head or cross them over your chest.
Step:3 Engage your core and slowly lift your upper body off the ball, extending your back until your body forms a straight line.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your upper body back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: hiperextensión con peso (sobre pelota de estabilidad)
instructions: Paso:1 Colócate boca abajo sobre una pelota de estabilidad con las caderas apoyadas en la pelota y los pies contra una pared para mayor estabilidad.
Paso:2 Coloca las manos detrás de la cabeza o crúzalas sobre el pecho.
Paso:3 Activa tu core y levanta lentamente la parte superior del cuerpo de la pelota, extendiendo la espalda hasta que tu cuerpo forme una línea recta.
Paso:4 Haz una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, luego baja lentamente la parte superior del cuerpo a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: frog crunch
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Place your hands behind your head with your elbows pointing outwards.
Step:3 Engaging your abs, lift your upper body off the ground, curling forward until your torso is at a 45-degree angle.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your upper body back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: frog crunch
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Place your hands behind your head with your elbows pointing outwards.
