Step:3 Engaging your abs, lift your upper body off the ground, curling forward until your torso is at a 45-degree angle.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your upper body back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: crunch de rana
instructions: Paso:1 Acuéstate boca arriba con las rodillas flexionadas y los pies planos en el suelo.
Paso:2 Coloca las manos detrás de la cabeza con los codos apuntando hacia afuera.
Paso:3 Activando tus abdominales, levanta la parte superior del cuerpo del suelo, encorvándote hacia adelante hasta que tu torso esté en un ángulo de 45 grados.
Paso:4 Haz una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, luego baja lentamente la parte superior del cuerpo a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell lying hammer press
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on a bench with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing each other and arms extended straight up.
Step:2 Lower the dumbbells to the sides of your chest, keeping your elbows at a 90-degree angle.
Step:3 Press the dumbbells back up to the starting position, fully extending your arms.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell lying hammer press
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on a bench with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing each other and arms extended straight up.
Step:2 Lower the dumbbells to the sides of your chest, keeping your elbows at a 90-degree angle.
Step:3 Press the dumbbells back up to the starting position, fully extending your arms.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: press martillo acostado con mancuernas
instructions: Paso:1 Acuéstate en un banco con una mancuerna en cada mano, las palmas una frente a la otra y los brazos extendidos hacia arriba.
Paso:2 Baja las mancuernas a los lados del pecho, manteniendo los codos en un ángulo de 90 grados.
Paso:3 Empuja las mancuernas de vuelta a la posición inicial, extendiendo completamente los brazos.
Paso:4 Repite para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell one arm kickback
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a dumbbell in your right hand.
Step:2 Bend your knees slightly and hinge forward at the hips, keeping your back straight.
Step:3 Bring your right elbow up to your side, keeping it bent at a 90-degree angle.
Step:4 Extend your right arm straight back, squeezing your triceps at the top of the movement.
Step:5 Slowly lower the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides.

translations.name: dumbbell one arm kickback
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a dumbbell in your right hand.
Step:2 Bend your knees slightly and hinge forward at the hips, keeping your back straight.
Step:3 Bring your right elbow up to your side, keeping it bent at a 90-degree angle.
Step:4 Extend your right arm straight back, squeezing your triceps at the top of the movement.
Step:5 Slowly lower the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides.

translations.name: patada de tríceps a un brazo con mancuerna
instructions: Paso:1 Párate con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y sostén una mancuerna en tu mano derecha.
Paso:2 Flexiona ligeramente las rodillas e inclínate hacia adelante desde las caderas, manteniendo la espalda recta.
Paso:3 Levanta el codo derecho a tu costado, manteniéndolo flexionado en un ángulo de 90 grados.
Paso:4 Extiende el brazo derecho hacia atrás, apretando los tríceps en la parte superior del movimiento.
Paso:5 Baja lentamente la mancuerna a la posición inicial.
Paso:6 Repite para el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambia de lado.

name: chest and front of shoulder stretch
instructions: Step:1 Stand tall with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Extend your arms straight out in front of you at shoulder height.
Step:3 Cross your arms in front of your body, with your right arm on top of your left arm.
Step:4 Interlace your fingers and press your palms together.
Step:5 Gently squeeze your shoulder blades together and push your hands forward, feeling a stretch in your chest and front of your shoulders.
Step:6 Hold the stretch for 20-30 seconds, then release.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: chest and front of shoulder stretch
instructions: Step:1 Stand tall with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Extend your arms straight out in front of you at shoulder height.
Step:3 Cross your arms in front of your body, with your right arm on top of your left arm.
Step:4 Interlace your fingers and press your palms together.
Step:5 Gently squeeze your shoulder blades together and push your hands forward, feeling a stretch in your chest and front of your shoulders.
Step:6 Hold the stretch for 20-30 seconds, then release.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: estiramiento de pecho y deltoides anterior
instructions: Paso:1 Párate derecho con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros.
Paso:2 Extiende los brazos rectos frente a ti a la altura de los hombros.
Paso:3 Cruza los brazos frente a tu cuerpo, con el brazo derecho sobre el brazo izquierdo.
Paso:4 Entrelaza los dedos y junta las palmas.
Paso:5 Aprieta suavemente los omóplatos y empuja las manos hacia adelante, sintiendo un estiramiento en el pecho y la parte delantera de los hombros.
Paso:6 Mantén el estiramiento durante 20-30 segundos, luego suelta.
Paso:7 Repite para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell standing front raise above head
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a dumbbell in each hand with an overhand grip.
Step:2 Keep your arms straight and lift the dumbbells in front of you, raising them above your head.
Step:3 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell standing front raise above head
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a dumbbell in each hand with an overhand grip.
Step:2 Keep your arms straight and lift the dumbbells in front of you, raising them above your head.
Step:3 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: elevación frontal de pie con mancuernas por encima de la cabeza
instructions: Paso:1 Párate con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros, sosteniendo una mancuerna en cada mano con un agarre prono.
Paso:2 Mantén los brazos rectos y levanta las mancuernas frente a ti, elevándolas por encima de tu cabeza.
Paso:3 Haz una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, luego baja lentamente las mancuernas a la posición inicial.
Paso:4 Repite para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: ankle circles
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the ground with your legs extended in front of you.
Step:2 Lift one leg off the ground and rotate your ankle in a circular motion.
Step:3 Perform the desired number of circles in one direction, then switch to the other direction.
Step:4 Repeat with the other leg.

translations.name: ankle circles
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the ground with your legs extended in front of you.
Step:2 Lift one leg off the ground and rotate your ankle in a circular motion.
Step:3 Perform the desired number of circles in one direction, then switch to the other direction.
Step:4 Repeat with the other leg.

translations.name: círculos de tobillo
instructions: Paso:1 Siéntate en el suelo con las piernas extendidas frente a ti.
Paso:2 Levanta una pierna del suelo y gira el tobillo en un movimiento circular.
Paso:3 Realiza el número deseado de círculos en una dirección, luego cambia a la otra dirección.
Paso:4 Repite con la otra pierna.

name: roller hip lat stretch
instructions: Step:1 Start by kneeling on the ground with the roller positioned under your hips.
Step:2 Place your hands on the roller for support.
Step:3 Slowly roll the roller forward, extending your hips and stretching your glutes.
Step:4 Hold the stretch for a few seconds, then roll back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: roller hip lat stretch
instructions: Step:1 Start by kneeling on the ground with the roller positioned under your hips.
Step:2 Place your hands on the roller for support.
Step:3 Slowly roll the roller forward, extending your hips and stretching your glutes.
Step:4 Hold the stretch for a few seconds, then roll back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: estiramiento de cadera y dorsal con rodillo
instructions: Paso:1 Comienza arrodillado en el suelo con el rodillo colocado debajo de tus caderas.
Paso:2 Coloca las manos sobre el rodillo para apoyarte.
Paso:3 Rueda lentamente el rodillo hacia adelante, extendiendo las caderas y estirando los glúteos.
Paso:4 Mantén el estiramiento durante unos segundos, luego regresa a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: cable incline bench row
instructions: Step:1 Set up an incline bench at a 45-degree angle and attach a cable handle to the low pulley.
Step:2 Sit on the bench facing the cable machine with your feet flat on the floor and your knees slightly bent.
Step:3 Grasp the cable handle with an overhand grip and extend your arms fully in front of you.
Step:4 Lean forward from your hips while keeping your back straight and your core engaged.
Step:5 Pull the cable handle towards your chest by retracting your shoulder blades and bending your elbows.
Step:6 Squeeze your back muscles at the top of the movement, then slowly extend your arms back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: cable incline bench row
instructions: Step:1 Set up an incline bench at a 45-degree angle and attach a cable handle to the low pulley.
Step:2 Sit on the bench facing the cable machine with your feet flat on the floor and your knees slightly bent.
Step:3 Grasp the cable handle with an overhand grip and extend your arms fully in front of you.
Step:4 Lean forward from your hips while keeping your back straight and your core engaged.
Step:5 Pull the cable handle towards your chest by retracting your shoulder blades and bending your elbows.
Step:6 Squeeze your back muscles at the top of the movement, then slowly extend your arms back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: remo en banco inclinado con cable
instructions: Paso:1 Coloca un banco inclinado en un ángulo de 45 grados y conecta una manija de cable a la polea baja.
Paso:2 Siéntate en el banco de cara a la máquina de cable con los pies planos en el suelo y las rodillas ligeramente flexionadas.
Paso:3 Agarra la manija del cable con un agarre prono y extiende los brazos completamente frente a ti.
Paso:4 Inclínate hacia adelante desde las caderas manteniendo la espalda recta y el core activado.
Paso:5 Tira de la manija del cable hacia tu pecho retrayendo los omóplatos y flexionando los codos.
Paso:6 Aprieta los músculos de la espalda en la parte superior del movimiento, luego extiende lentamente los brazos de regreso a la posición inicial.
Paso:7 Repite para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: lever bent over row
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and knees slightly bent.
Step:2 Hold the barbell with an overhand grip, hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Bend forward at the hips, keeping your back straight and chest up.
Step:4 Pull the barbell towards your lower chest, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the barbell back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: lever bent over row
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and knees slightly bent.
Step:2 Hold the barbell with an overhand grip, hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Bend forward at the hips, keeping your back straight and chest up.
Step:4 Pull the barbell towards your lower chest, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the barbell back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: remo inclinado con palanca
instructions: Paso:1 Párate con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y las rodillas ligeramente flexionadas.
Paso:2 Sostén la barra con un agarre prono, las manos un poco más separadas que el ancho de los hombros.
Paso:3 Inclínate hacia adelante desde las caderas, manteniendo la espalda recta y el pecho erguido.
Paso:4 Tira de la barra hacia la parte inferior de tu pecho, juntando los omóplatos.
Paso:5 Haz una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, luego baja lentamente la barra a la posición inicial.
Paso:6 Repite para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: barbell standing wide military press
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold the barbell with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width.
Step:2 Lift the barbell to shoulder height, keeping your elbows slightly in front of the bar.
Step:3 Press the barbell overhead, extending your arms fully.
Step:4 Lower the barbell back to shoulder height and repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: barbell standing wide military press
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold the barbell with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width.
Step:2 Lift the barbell to shoulder height, keeping your elbows slightly in front of the bar.
Step:3 Press the barbell overhead, extending your arms fully.
Step:4 Lower the barbell back to shoulder height and repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: press militar de pie con agarre ancho con barra
instructions: Paso:1 Párate con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y sostén la barra con un agarre prono, un poco más ancho que la distancia entre los hombros.
Paso:2 Levanta la barra a la altura de los hombros, manteniendo los codos ligeramente por delante de la barra.
Paso:3 Empuja la barra por encima de la cabeza, extendiendo completamente los brazos.
Paso:4 Baja la barra de nuevo a la altura de los hombros y repite para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: barbell sitted alternate leg raise (female)
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your back straight and hold a barbell across your thighs.
Step:2 Place your hands on the sides of the bench for support.
Step:3 Keeping your legs straight, lift one leg up as high as possible while keeping it parallel to the ground.
Step:4 Lower the leg back down and repeat with the other leg.
Step:5 Continue alternating legs for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: barbell sitted alternate leg raise (female)
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your back straight and hold a barbell across your thighs.
Step:2 Place your hands on the sides of the bench for support.
Step:3 Keeping your legs straight, lift one leg up as high as possible while keeping it parallel to the ground.
Step:4 Lower the leg back down and repeat with the other leg.
Step:5 Continue alternating legs for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: elevación de piernas alternas sentada con barra (femenino)
instructions: Paso:1 Siéntate en un banco con la espalda recta y sostén una barra sobre tus muslos.
Paso:2 Coloca las manos a los lados del banco como apoyo.
Paso:3 Manteniendo las piernas rectas, levanta una pierna lo más alto posible mientras la mantienes paralela al suelo.
Paso:4 Baja la pierna y repite con la otra pierna.
Paso:5 Continúa alternando las piernas para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: ez barbell seated curls
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your feet flat on the ground and your back straight.
Step:2 Hold the ez barbell with an underhand grip, palms facing up, and your hands shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Rest your upper arms on your thighs, allowing the ez barbell to hang down in front of you.
Step:4 Keeping your upper arms stationary, exhale and curl the ez barbell upwards towards your shoulders.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, squeezing your biceps.
Step:6 Inhale and slowly lower the ez barbell back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: ez barbell seated curls
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your feet flat on the ground and your back straight.
Step:2 Hold the ez barbell with an underhand grip, palms facing up, and your hands shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Rest your upper arms on your thighs, allowing the ez barbell to hang down in front of you.
Step:4 Keeping your upper arms stationary, exhale and curl the ez barbell upwards towards your shoulders.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, squeezing your biceps.
Step:6 Inhale and slowly lower the ez barbell back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: curl sentado con barra EZ
instructions: Paso:1 Siéntate en un banco con los pies planos en el suelo y la espalda recta.
Paso:2 Sostén la barra EZ con un agarre supino, las palmas hacia arriba y las manos separadas al ancho de los hombros.
Paso:3 Apoya la parte superior de los brazos en los muslos, permitiendo que la barra EZ cuelgue frente a ti.
Paso:4 Manteniendo la parte superior de los brazos inmóvil, exhala y flexiona la barra EZ hacia arriba, en dirección a tus hombros.
Paso:5 Haz una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, apretando los bíceps.
Paso:6 Inhala y baja lentamente la barra EZ a la posición inicial.
Paso:7 Repite para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: assisted parallel close grip pull-up
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the machine to your desired weight and height.
Step:2 Place your hands on the parallel bars with a close grip, palms facing each other.
Step:3 Hang from the bars with your arms fully extended and your feet off the ground.
Step:4 Engage your back muscles and pull your body up towards the bars, keeping your elbows close to your body.
Step:5 Continue pulling until your chin is above the bars.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your body back down to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: assisted parallel close grip pull-up
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the machine to your desired weight and height.
Step:2 Place your hands on the parallel bars with a close grip, palms facing each other.
Step:3 Hang from the bars with your arms fully extended and your feet off the ground.
Step:4 Engage your back muscles and pull your body up towards the bars, keeping your elbows close to your body.
Step:5 Continue pulling until your chin is above the bars.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your body back down to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dominada asistida con agarre cerrado y paralelo
instructions: Paso:1 Ajusta la máquina al peso y altura deseados.
Paso:2 Coloca las manos en las barras paralelas con un agarre cerrado, las palmas una frente a la otra.
Paso:3 Cuélgate de las barras con los brazos completamente extendidos y los pies sin tocar el suelo.
Paso:4 Activa los músculos de la espalda y tira de tu cuerpo hacia arriba, hacia las barras, manteniendo los codos cerca de tu cuerpo.
Paso:5 Continúa tirando hasta que tu barbilla esté por encima de las barras.
Paso:6 Haz una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, luego baja lentamente el cuerpo a la posición inicial.
Paso:7 Repite para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbells seated triceps extension
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your back straight and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell in both hands with an overhand grip, and raise it above your head.
Step:3 Bend your elbows and lower the dumbbell behind your head, keeping your upper arms close to your ears.
Step:4 Extend your arms and raise the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbells seated triceps extension
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your back straight and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell in both hands with an overhand grip, and raise it above your head.
Step:3 Bend your elbows and lower the dumbbell behind your head, keeping your upper arms close to your ears.
Step:4 Extend your arms and raise the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: extensión de tríceps sentado con mancuernas
instructions: Paso:1 Siéntate en un banco con la espalda recta y los pies planos en el suelo.
Paso:2 Sostén una mancuerna con ambas manos con un agarre prono, y elévala por encima de tu cabeza.
Paso:3 Flexiona los codos y baja la mancuerna detrás de tu cabeza, manteniendo la parte superior de los brazos cerca de tus orejas.
Paso:4 Extiende los brazos y levanta la mancuerna de nuevo a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: hanging pike
instructions: Step:1 Hang from a pull-up bar with your arms fully extended and your palms facing away from you.
Step:2 Engage your core and lift your legs up towards the bar, keeping them straight.
Step:3 Continue lifting until your body forms a 'V' shape, with your legs parallel to the ground.
Step:4 Hold the position for a moment, then slowly lower your legs back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: hanging pike
instructions: Step:1 Hang from a pull-up bar with your arms fully extended and your palms facing away from you.
Step:2 Engage your core and lift your legs up towards the bar, keeping them straight.
Step:3 Continue lifting until your body forms a 'V' shape, with your legs parallel to the ground.
Step:4 Hold the position for a moment, then slowly lower your legs back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: pica suspendido
instructions: Paso:1 Cuélgate de una barra de dominadas con los brazos completamente extendidos y las palmas de las manos mirando hacia afuera.
Paso:2 Activa tu core y levanta las piernas hacia la barra, manteniéndolas rectas.
Paso:3 Continúa levantando hasta que tu cuerpo forme una 'V', con las piernas paralelas al suelo.
Paso:4 Mantén la posición por un momento, luego baja lentamente las piernas a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: weighted standing hand squeeze
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a weight in each hand.
Step:2 Extend your arms straight in front of you, palms facing each other.
Step:3 Squeeze your hands together as hard as you can, engaging your forearms.
Step:4 Hold the squeeze for a few seconds, then release.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: weighted standing hand squeeze
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a weight in each hand.
Step:2 Extend your arms straight in front of you, palms facing each other.
Step:3 Squeeze your hands together as hard as you can, engaging your forearms.
Step:4 Hold the squeeze for a few seconds, then release.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: apretón de mano con peso de pie
instructions: Paso:1 Ponte de pie con los pies al ancho de hombros y sostiene un peso en cada mano.
Paso:2 Extiende los brazos rectos al frente, con las palmas enfrentadas.
Paso:3 Aprieta las manos entre sí lo más fuerte posible, activando los antebrazos.
Paso:4 Mantén el apretón unos segundos y luego suelta.
Paso:5 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell biceps curl
instructions: Step:1 Stand up straight with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing forward and arms fully extended.
Step:2 Keeping your upper arms stationary, exhale and curl the weights while contracting your biceps.
Step:3 Continue to raise the weights until your biceps are fully contracted and the dumbbells are at shoulder level.
Step:4 Hold the contracted position for a brief pause as you squeeze your biceps.
Step:5 Inhale and slowly begin to lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell biceps curl
instructions: Step:1 Stand up straight with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing forward and arms fully extended.
Step:2 Keeping your upper arms stationary, exhale and curl the weights while contracting your biceps.
Step:3 Continue to raise the weights until your biceps are fully contracted and the dumbbells are at shoulder level.
Step:4 Hold the contracted position for a brief pause as you squeeze your biceps.
Step:5 Inhale and slowly begin to lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: curl de bíceps con mancuernas
instructions: Paso:1 Ponte de pie con una mancuerna en cada mano, palmas al frente y brazos totalmente extendidos.
Paso:2 Manteniendo los brazos superiores quietos, exhala y realiza un curl contrayendo los bíceps.
Paso:3 Continúa elevando hasta contraer por completo los bíceps y llevar las mancuernas a la altura de los hombros.
Paso:4 Mantén la contracción un instante mientras aprietas los bíceps.
Paso:5 Inhala y baja lentamente las mancuernas a la posición inicial.
Paso:6 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: cable straight arm pulldown (with rope)
instructions: Step:1 Attach a rope to the cable machine at the highest setting.
Step:2 Stand facing the machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Grasp the rope with both hands, palms facing down.
Step:4 Extend your arms fully in front of you, keeping your elbows slightly bent.
Step:5 Engage your back and slowly pull the rope down towards your thighs, keeping your arms straight.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then slowly release the tension and return to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: cable straight arm pulldown (with rope)
instructions: Step:1 Attach a rope to the cable machine at the highest setting.
Step:2 Stand facing the machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Grasp the rope with both hands, palms facing down.
Step:4 Extend your arms fully in front of you, keeping your elbows slightly bent.
Step:5 Engage your back and slowly pull the rope down towards your thighs, keeping your arms straight.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then slowly release the tension and return to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: jalón con brazos rectos en polea (con cuerda)
instructions: Paso:1 Coloca una cuerda en la polea en la posición más alta.
Paso:2 Ponte de pie frente a la máquina con los pies al ancho de hombros.
Paso:3 Sujeta la cuerda con ambas manos, palmas hacia abajo.
Paso:4 Extiende los brazos completamente al frente, manteniendo ligera flexión en los codos.
Paso:5 Activa la espalda y tira de la cuerda hacia los muslos manteniendo los brazos rectos.
Paso:6 Pausa un momento abajo y libera la tensión lentamente volviendo a la posición inicial.
Paso:7 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: lever narrow grip seated row
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and footrests to ensure proper form.
Step:2 Sit on the machine with your feet flat on the footrests and your knees slightly bent.
Step:3 Grasp the handles with a narrow grip, palms facing each other.
Step:4 Keep your back straight and lean slightly forward.
Step:5 Pull the handles towards your torso, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the peak of the movement.
Step:7 Slowly release the handles and return to the starting position.
Step:8 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: lever narrow grip seated row
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and footrests to ensure proper form.
Step:2 Sit on the machine with your feet flat on the footrests and your knees slightly bent.
Step:3 Grasp the handles with a narrow grip, palms facing each other.
Step:4 Keep your back straight and lean slightly forward.
Step:5 Pull the handles towards your torso, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the peak of the movement.
Step:7 Slowly release the handles and return to the starting position.
Step:8 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: remo sentado agarre cerrado en máquina de palanca
instructions: Paso:1 Ajusta la altura del asiento y los apoyapiés para asegurar una buena técnica.
Paso:2 Siéntate con los pies planos en los apoyapiés y las rodillas ligeramente flexionadas.
Paso:3 Sujeta las manijas con agarre cerrado, palmas enfrentadas.
Paso:4 Mantén la espalda recta e inclínate levemente hacia adelante.
Paso:5 Tira de las manijas hacia el torso juntando las escápulas.
Paso:6 Pausa un momento en el pico del movimiento.
Paso:7 Libera las manijas lentamente y vuelve a la posición inicial.
Paso:8 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: box jump down with one leg stabilization
instructions: Step:1 Stand in front of a box or platform with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Bend your knees and jump onto the box, landing softly with one foot on the box and the other foot hanging off the edge.
Step:3 Stabilize yourself on the box with the foot that is on it, while keeping the other foot off the ground.
Step:4 Hold this position for a few seconds, engaging your calf muscles to maintain balance.
Step:5 Slowly step down with the foot that is on the box, returning to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat the exercise with the other leg.

translations.name: box jump down with one leg stabilization
instructions: Step:1 Stand in front of a box or platform with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Bend your knees and jump onto the box, landing softly with one foot on the box and the other foot hanging off the edge.
Step:3 Stabilize yourself on the box with the foot that is on it, while keeping the other foot off the ground.
Step:4 Hold this position for a few seconds, engaging your calf muscles to maintain balance.
Step:5 Slowly step down with the foot that is on the box, returning to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat the exercise with the other leg.

translations.name: salto al cajón con estabilización a una pierna
instructions: Paso:1 Ponte de pie frente a un cajón o plataforma con los pies al ancho de hombros.
Paso:2 Flexiona las rodillas y salta al cajón, cayendo suave con un pie sobre el cajón y el otro pie fuera del borde.
Paso:3 Estabilízate sobre el cajón con el pie apoyado, manteniendo el otro pie sin tocar el suelo.
Paso:4 Mantén la posición unos segundos activando las pantorrillas para conservar el equilibrio.
Paso:5 Desciende lentamente con el pie que está en el cajón, volviendo a la posición inicial.
Paso:6 Repite el ejercicio con la otra pierna.

name: dumbbell seated kickback
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your feet flat on the ground and hold a dumbbell in each hand.
Step:2 Bend your knees slightly and lean forward from your hips, keeping your back straight.
Step:3 Bring your upper arms close to your sides and keep your elbows bent at a 90-degree angle.
Step:4 Extend your arms straight back, squeezing your triceps at the top of the movement.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then slowly lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell seated kickback
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your feet flat on the ground and hold a dumbbell in each hand.
Step:2 Bend your knees slightly and lean forward from your hips, keeping your back straight.
Step:3 Bring your upper arms close to your sides and keep your elbows bent at a 90-degree angle.
Step:4 Extend your arms straight back, squeezing your triceps at the top of the movement.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then slowly lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: patada de tríceps sentado con mancuernas
instructions: Paso:1 Siéntate en un banco con los pies planos en el suelo y sostiene una mancuerna en cada mano.
Paso:2 Flexiona levemente las rodillas e inclínate desde las caderas manteniendo la espalda recta.
Paso:3 Lleva los brazos superiores cerca del torso con los codos flexionados a 90 grados.
Paso:4 Extiende los brazos hacia atrás, contrayendo los tríceps en la parte alta del movimiento.
Paso:5 Pausa un momento y desciende las mancuernas lentamente a la posición inicial.
Paso:6 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell clean
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a dumbbell in each hand with an overhand grip.
Step:2 Bend your knees and lower your hips into a squat position, keeping your back straight and chest up.
Step:3 Explosively extend your hips and knees, driving through your heels to jump off the ground.
Step:4 As you jump, shrug your shoulders and pull the dumbbells up towards your shoulders, keeping them close to your body.
Step:5 Catch the dumbbells at shoulder height, with your elbows pointing forward and your palms facing up.
Step:6 Lower the dumbbells back down to the starting position by reversing the movement.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell clean
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a dumbbell in each hand with an overhand grip.
Step:2 Bend your knees and lower your hips into a squat position, keeping your back straight and chest up.
Step:3 Explosively extend your hips and knees, driving through your heels to jump off the ground.
Step:4 As you jump, shrug your shoulders and pull the dumbbells up towards your shoulders, keeping them close to your body.
Step:5 Catch the dumbbells at shoulder height, with your elbows pointing forward and your palms facing up.
Step:6 Lower the dumbbells back down to the starting position by reversing the movement.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: cargada con mancuernas
instructions: Paso:1 Ponte de pie con los pies al ancho de hombros, sosteniendo una mancuerna en cada mano con agarre prono.
Paso:2 Flexiona las rodillas y baja las caderas a una sentadilla, manteniendo la espalda recta y el pecho arriba.
Paso:3 Extiende explosivamente caderas y rodillas, impulsándote con los talones para despegar del suelo.
Paso:4 Mientras saltas, encoge los hombros y tira de las mancuernas hacia los hombros, manteniéndolas cerca del cuerpo.
Paso:5 Recibe las mancuernas a la altura de los hombros, con codos al frente y palmas hacia arriba.
Paso:6 Baja las mancuernas a la posición inicial invirtiendo el movimiento.
Paso:7 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: elbow-to-knee
instructions: Step:1 Start by lying flat on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Place your hands behind your head with your elbows pointing outwards.
Step:3 Engage your abs and lift your upper body off the ground, bringing your right elbow towards your left knee.
Step:4 At the same time, bring your left knee towards your right elbow, creating a twisting motion.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your upper body and extend your legs back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat the movement, this time bringing your left elbow towards your right knee and your right knee towards your left elbow.
Step:7 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: elbow-to-knee
instructions: Step:1 Start by lying flat on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Place your hands behind your head with your elbows pointing outwards.
Step:3 Engage your abs and lift your upper body off the ground, bringing your right elbow towards your left knee.
Step:4 At the same time, bring your left knee towards your right elbow, creating a twisting motion.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your upper body and extend your legs back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat the movement, this time bringing your left elbow towards your right knee and your right knee towards your left elbow.
Step:7 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: codo a rodilla
instructions: Paso:1 Comienza acostado boca arriba con las rodillas flexionadas y los pies apoyados en el suelo.
Paso:2 Coloca las manos detrás de la cabeza con los codos apuntando hacia afuera.
Paso:3 Activa los abdominales y eleva el torso, llevando el codo derecho hacia la rodilla izquierda.
Paso:4 Al mismo tiempo, acerca la rodilla izquierda hacia el codo derecho generando un giro.
Paso:5 Pausa un momento arriba y desciende el torso extendiendo las piernas a la posición inicial.
Paso:6 Repite el movimiento llevando ahora el codo izquierdo hacia la rodilla derecha y la rodilla derecha hacia el codo izquierdo.
Paso:7 Continúa alternando lados por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: lever seated reverse fly
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and position yourself on the machine with your chest against the pad and your feet flat on the floor.
Step:2 Grasp the handles with an overhand grip and keep your arms slightly bent.
Step:3 Exhale and squeeze your shoulder blades together as you pull the handles back and outward, away from your body.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the peak contraction, then inhale and slowly return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: lever seated reverse fly
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and position yourself on the machine with your chest against the pad and your feet flat on the floor.
Step:2 Grasp the handles with an overhand grip and keep your arms slightly bent.
Step:3 Exhale and squeeze your shoulder blades together as you pull the handles back and outward, away from your body.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the peak contraction, then inhale and slowly return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: aperturas inversas sentado en máquina de palanca
instructions: Paso:1 Ajusta la altura del asiento y colócate en la máquina con el pecho contra el apoyo y los pies planos en el suelo.
Paso:2 Sujeta las manijas con agarre prono manteniendo una ligera flexión en los codos.
Paso:3 Exhala y junta las escápulas tirando de las manijas hacia atrás y hacia afuera, alejándolas del cuerpo.
Paso:4 Pausa un momento en la contracción máxima, luego inhala y vuelve lentamente a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: resistance band seated straight back row
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the floor with your legs extended and loop the resistance band around your feet.
Step:2 Hold the ends of the resistance band with your hands, palms facing each other.
Step:3 Keep your back straight and lean slightly back, engaging your core.
Step:4 Pull the resistance band towards your chest, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly release the tension and return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: resistance band seated straight back row
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the floor with your legs extended and loop the resistance band around your feet.
Step:2 Hold the ends of the resistance band with your hands, palms facing each other.
Step:3 Keep your back straight and lean slightly back, engaging your core.
Step:4 Pull the resistance band towards your chest, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly release the tension and return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: remo sentado espalda recta con banda de resistencia
instructions: Paso:1 Siéntate en el suelo con las piernas extendidas y pasa la banda de resistencia alrededor de los pies.
Paso:2 Sujeta los extremos de la banda con las manos, palmas enfrentadas.
Paso:3 Mantén la espalda recta e inclínate ligeramente hacia atrás activando el core.
Paso:4 Tira de la banda hacia el pecho juntando las escápulas.
Paso:5 Pausa un momento arriba, luego libera la tensión lentamente y vuelve a la posición inicial.
Paso:6 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: weighted russian twist v. 2
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the ground with your knees bent and feet flat on the floor.
Step:2 Hold the weight with both hands in front of your chest.
Step:3 Lean back slightly to engage your core muscles.
Step:4 Twist your torso to the right, bringing the weight towards the right side of your body.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then twist your torso to the left, bringing the weight towards the left side of your body.
Step:6 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: weighted russian twist v. 2
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the ground with your knees bent and feet flat on the floor.
Step:2 Hold the weight with both hands in front of your chest.
Step:3 Lean back slightly to engage your core muscles.
Step:4 Twist your torso to the right, bringing the weight towards the right side of your body.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then twist your torso to the left, bringing the weight towards the left side of your body.
Step:6 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: giro ruso con peso v. 2
instructions: Paso:1 Siéntate en el suelo con las rodillas flexionadas y los pies apoyados.
Paso:2 Sostén el peso con ambas manos frente al pecho.
Paso:3 Inclínate ligeramente hacia atrás para activar el core.
Paso:4 Gira el torso a la derecha, llevando el peso hacia el lado derecho del cuerpo.
Paso:5 Pausa un momento y luego gira el torso a la izquierda, llevando el peso hacia el lado izquierdo del cuerpo.
Paso:6 Continúa alternando lados por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: world greatest stretch
instructions: Step:1 Start in a lunge position with your right foot forward and your left foot back.
Step:2 Place your hands on the ground on either side of your right foot.
Step:3 Lower your left knee to the ground and extend your right leg, keeping your right foot flat on the ground.
Step:4 Rotate your torso to the right, reaching your right arm up towards the ceiling.
Step:5 Hold this position for a few seconds, then return to the starting position.
Step:6 Switch sides and repeat the stretch with your left foot forward.

translations.name: world greatest stretch
instructions: Step:1 Start in a lunge position with your right foot forward and your left foot back.
Step:2 Place your hands on the ground on either side of your right foot.
Step:3 Lower your left knee to the ground and extend your right leg, keeping your right foot flat on the ground.
Step:4 Rotate your torso to the right, reaching your right arm up towards the ceiling.
Step:5 Hold this position for a few seconds, then return to the starting position.
Step:6 Switch sides and repeat the stretch with your left foot forward.

translations.name: estiramiento World’s Greatest
instructions: Paso:1 Comienza en una posición de zancada con el pie derecho al frente y el izquierdo atrás.
Paso:2 Coloca las manos en el suelo a ambos lados del pie derecho.
Paso:3 Apoya la rodilla izquierda en el suelo y extiende la pierna derecha, manteniendo el pie derecho plano.
Paso:4 Rota el torso hacia la derecha, extendiendo el brazo derecho hacia el techo.
Paso:5 Mantén la posición unos segundos y vuelve a la posición inicial.
Paso:6 Cambia de lado y repite el estiramiento con el pie izquierdo al frente.

name: lever incline chest press
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat and backrest of the leverage machine to a comfortable position.
Step:2 Sit on the machine with your back against the backrest and your feet flat on the floor.
Step:3 Grasp the handles with an overhand grip and position your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:4 Push the handles forward and away from your body until your arms are fully extended.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then slowly bend your elbows and lower the handles back towards your chest.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: lever incline chest press
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat and backrest of the leverage machine to a comfortable position.
Step:2 Sit on the machine with your back against the backrest and your feet flat on the floor.
Step:3 Grasp the handles with an overhand grip and position your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:4 Push the handles forward and away from your body until your arms are fully extended.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then slowly bend your elbows and lower the handles back towards your chest.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: press de pecho inclinado en máquina de palanca
instructions: Paso:1 Ajusta el asiento y el respaldo de la máquina de palanca a una posición cómoda.
Paso:2 Siéntate con la espalda contra el respaldo y los pies planos en el suelo.
Paso:3 Sujeta las manijas con agarre prono, un poco más ancho que los hombros.
Paso:4 Empuja las manijas hacia adelante y lejos del cuerpo hasta extender por completo los brazos.
Paso:5 Pausa un momento y luego flexiona los codos para bajar las manijas de regreso hacia el pecho.
Paso:6 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: back pec stretch
instructions: Step:1 Stand tall with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Extend your arms straight out in front of you, parallel to the ground.
Step:3 Cross your arms in front of your body, with your right arm over your left arm.
Step:4 Interlock your fingers and rotate your palms away from your body.
Step:5 Slowly raise your arms up and away from your body, feeling a stretch in your back and chest.
Step:6 Hold the stretch for 15-30 seconds, then release.
Step:7 Repeat on the opposite side.

translations.name: back pec stretch
instructions: Step:1 Stand tall with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Extend your arms straight out in front of you, parallel to the ground.
Step:3 Cross your arms in front of your body, with your right arm over your left arm.
Step:4 Interlock your fingers and rotate your palms away from your body.
Step:5 Slowly raise your arms up and away from your body, feeling a stretch in your back and chest.
Step:6 Hold the stretch for 15-30 seconds, then release.
Step:7 Repeat on the opposite side.

translations.name: estiramiento de espalda y pecho
instructions: Paso:1 Ponte de pie erguido con los pies al ancho de hombros.
Paso:2 Extiende los brazos al frente, paralelos al suelo.
Paso:3 Cruza los brazos frente al cuerpo, con el derecho sobre el izquierdo.
Paso:4 Entrelaza los dedos y gira las palmas alejándolas del cuerpo.
Paso:5 Eleva lentamente los brazos arriba y alejados del cuerpo, sintiendo el estiramiento en la espalda y el pecho.
Paso:6 Mantén de 15 a 30 segundos y suelta.
Paso:7 Repite del lado contrario.

name: cable curl
instructions: Step:1 Stand facing the cable machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Grasp the cable attachment with an underhand grip, palms facing up.
Step:3 Keep your elbows close to your sides and your upper arms stationary.
Step:4 Exhale and curl the cable attachment towards your shoulders, contracting your biceps.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top of the movement, squeezing your biceps.
Step:6 Inhale and slowly lower the cable attachment back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: cable curl
instructions: Step:1 Stand facing the cable machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Grasp the cable attachment with an underhand grip, palms facing up.
Step:3 Keep your elbows close to your sides and your upper arms stationary.
Step:4 Exhale and curl the cable attachment towards your shoulders, contracting your biceps.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top of the movement, squeezing your biceps.
Step:6 Inhale and slowly lower the cable attachment back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: curl en polea
instructions: Paso:1 Ponte de pie frente a la polea con los pies al ancho de hombros.
Paso:2 Sujeta el accesorio con agarre supino, palmas hacia arriba.
Paso:3 Mantén los codos pegados al torso y los brazos superiores quietos.
Paso:4 Exhala y lleva el accesorio hacia los hombros contrayendo los bíceps.
Paso:5 Pausa un instante arriba, apretando los bíceps.
Paso:6 Inhala y baja lentamente el accesorio a la posición inicial.
Paso:7 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: exercise ball supine triceps extension
instructions: Step:1 Sit on an exercise ball with your feet flat on the ground and your knees bent at a 90-degree angle.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell with both hands and extend your arms straight up towards the ceiling.
Step:3 Slowly lower the dumbbell behind your head, keeping your elbows close to your ears.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then raise the dumbbell back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: exercise ball supine triceps extension
instructions: Step:1 Sit on an exercise ball with your feet flat on the ground and your knees bent at a 90-degree angle.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell with both hands and extend your arms straight up towards the ceiling.
Step:3 Slowly lower the dumbbell behind your head, keeping your elbows close to your ears.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then raise the dumbbell back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: extensión de tríceps supina con balón de ejercicio
instructions: Paso:1 Siéntate en un balón de ejercicio con los pies planos y las rodillas a 90 grados.
Paso:2 Sostén una mancuerna con ambas manos y extiende los brazos hacia el techo.
Paso:3 Baja la mancuerna lentamente detrás de la cabeza, manteniendo los codos cerca de las orejas.
Paso:4 Pausa un momento y eleva la mancuerna de regreso a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: twisted leg raise
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your legs extended and your arms by your sides.
Step:2 Place your hands under your glutes for support.
Step:3 Engage your abs and lift both legs off the ground, keeping them straight.
Step:4 As you lift your legs, twist your hips to one side, bringing your legs towards your opposite shoulder.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your legs back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat the movement, this time twisting your hips to the other side.
Step:7 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: twisted leg raise
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your legs extended and your arms by your sides.
Step:2 Place your hands under your glutes for support.
Step:3 Engage your abs and lift both legs off the ground, keeping them straight.
Step:4 As you lift your legs, twist your hips to one side, bringing your legs towards your opposite shoulder.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your legs back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat the movement, this time twisting your hips to the other side.
Step:7 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: elevación de piernas con giro
instructions: Paso:1 Acuéstate boca arriba con las piernas extendidas y los brazos a los costados.
Paso:2 Coloca las manos debajo de los glúteos para apoyar.
Paso:3 Activa los abdominales y eleva ambas piernas del suelo, manteniéndolas rectas.
Paso:4 Mientras elevas las piernas, gira las caderas hacia un lado, llevando las piernas hacia el hombro contrario.
Paso:5 Pausa un momento arriba y baja las piernas lentamente a la posición inicial.
Paso:6 Repite el movimiento girando ahora las caderas hacia el otro lado.
Paso:7 Continúa alternando lados por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: cable side bend crunch (bosu ball)
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a cable handle in one hand.
Step:2 Place the other hand on your hip.
Step:3 Engage your core and slowly bend sideways towards the hand holding the cable, keeping your back straight.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom of the movement, then slowly return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides.

translations.name: cable side bend crunch (bosu ball)
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a cable handle in one hand.
Step:2 Place the other hand on your hip.
Step:3 Engage your core and slowly bend sideways towards the hand holding the cable, keeping your back straight.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom of the movement, then slowly return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides.

translations.name: crunch lateral en polea (bosu)
instructions: Paso:1 Ponte de pie con los pies al ancho de hombros, sosteniendo una manija de polea con una mano.
Paso:2 Coloca la otra mano en la cadera.
Paso:3 Activa el core e inclínate lentamente hacia el lado de la mano que sujeta la polea, manteniendo la espalda recta.
Paso:4 Pausa un momento abajo y vuelve lentamente a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones y cambia de lado.

name: ez barbell spider curl
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold the ez barbell with an underhand grip, palms facing up.
Step:2 Rest your upper arms on a preacher bench or stability ball, allowing your elbows to hang down.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arms stationary, exhale and curl the barbell up towards your shoulders.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, squeezing your biceps.
Step:5 Inhale and slowly lower the barbell back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: ez barbell spider curl
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold the ez barbell with an underhand grip, palms facing up.
Step:2 Rest your upper arms on a preacher bench or stability ball, allowing your elbows to hang down.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arms stationary, exhale and curl the barbell up towards your shoulders.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, squeezing your biceps.
Step:5 Inhale and slowly lower the barbell back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: curl spider con barra EZ
instructions: Paso:1 Ponte de pie con los pies al ancho de hombros y sujeta la barra EZ con agarre supino, palmas hacia arriba.
Paso:2 Apoya los brazos superiores en un banco predicador o balón de estabilidad, dejando que los codos cuelguen.
Paso:3 Manteniendo los brazos superiores quietos, exhala y lleva la barra hacia los hombros.
Paso:4 Pausa un momento arriba, apretando los bíceps.
Paso:5 Inhala y baja lentamente la barra a la posición inicial.
Paso:6 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: clap push up
instructions: Step:1 Start in a high plank position with your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Lower your body towards the ground by bending your elbows, keeping your core engaged.
Step:3 Push through your palms explosively to propel your body off the ground.
Step:4 While in mid-air, clap your hands together before landing back in the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: clap push up
instructions: Step:1 Start in a high plank position with your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Lower your body towards the ground by bending your elbows, keeping your core engaged.
Step:3 Push through your palms explosively to propel your body off the ground.
Step:4 While in mid-air, clap your hands together before landing back in the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: flexión con palmada
instructions: Paso:1 Comienza en posición de plancha alta con las manos un poco más anchas que los hombros.
Paso:2 Desciende el cuerpo flexionando los codos, manteniendo el core activado.
Paso:3 Empuja explosivamente con las palmas para despegar el cuerpo del suelo.
Paso:4 En el aire, da una palmada antes de volver a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell hammer curl
instructions: Step:1 Stand up straight with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing your torso.
Step:2 Keep your elbows close to your torso and rotate the palms of your hands until they are facing forward.
Step:3 This will be your starting position.
Step:4 Now, keeping the upper arms stationary, exhale and curl the weights while contracting your biceps.
Step:5 Continue to raise the weights until your biceps are fully contracted and the dumbbells are at shoulder level.
Step:6 Hold the contracted position for a brief pause as you squeeze your biceps.
Step:7 Then, inhale and slowly begin to lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Step:8 Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell hammer curl
instructions: Step:1 Stand up straight with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing your torso.
Step:2 Keep your elbows close to your torso and rotate the palms of your hands until they are facing forward.
Step:3 This will be your starting position.
Step:4 Now, keeping the upper arms stationary, exhale and curl the weights while contracting your biceps.
Step:5 Continue to raise the weights until your biceps are fully contracted and the dumbbells are at shoulder level.
Step:6 Hold the contracted position for a brief pause as you squeeze your biceps.
Step:7 Then, inhale and slowly begin to lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Step:8 Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions.

translations.name: curl martillo con mancuernas
instructions: Paso:1 Ponte de pie erguido con una mancuerna en cada mano, palmas hacia el torso.
Paso:2 Mantén los codos cerca del torso y gira las palmas hasta que miren al frente.
Paso:3 Esta será tu posición inicial.
Paso:4 Manteniendo los brazos superiores quietos, exhala y realiza el curl contrayendo los bíceps.
Paso:5 Continúa elevando hasta contraer por completo los bíceps y llevar las mancuernas a la altura de los hombros.
Paso:6 Mantén la contracción un instante mientras aprietas los bíceps.
Paso:7 Luego inhala y baja lentamente las mancuernas a la posición inicial.
Paso:8 Repite por la cantidad recomendada de repeticiones.

name: rear pull-up
instructions: Step:1 Grab the pull-up bar with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Hang from the bar with your arms fully extended and your body straight.
Step:3 Engage your back muscles and pull your body up towards the bar, keeping your elbows close to your body.
Step:4 Continue pulling until your chin is above the bar.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your body back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: rear pull-up
instructions: Step:1 Grab the pull-up bar with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Hang from the bar with your arms fully extended and your body straight.
Step:3 Engage your back muscles and pull your body up towards the bar, keeping your elbows close to your body.
Step:4 Continue pulling until your chin is above the bar.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your body back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dominada tras nuca
instructions: Paso:1 Sujeta la barra de dominadas con agarre prono, un poco más ancho que los hombros.
Paso:2 Quédate colgando con los brazos completamente extendidos y el cuerpo recto.
Paso:3 Activa la espalda y eleva el cuerpo hacia la barra, manteniendo los codos cerca del cuerpo.
Paso:4 Continúa tirando hasta que la barbilla quede por encima de la barra.
Paso:5 Pausa un momento arriba y baja lentamente a la posición inicial.
Paso:6 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell one arm zottman preacher curl
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a preacher curl bench and hold a dumbbell in one hand with an underhand grip.
Step:2 Rest your upper arm on the preacher bench pad, allowing your arm to fully extend.
Step:3 Curl the dumbbell up towards your shoulder, keeping your upper arm stationary.
Step:4 At the top of the curl, rotate your wrist so that your palm faces up.
Step:5 Slowly lower the dumbbell back down to the starting position, rotating your wrist back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

translations.name: dumbbell one arm zottman preacher curl
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a preacher curl bench and hold a dumbbell in one hand with an underhand grip.
Step:2 Rest your upper arm on the preacher bench pad, allowing your arm to fully extend.
Step:3 Curl the dumbbell up towards your shoulder, keeping your upper arm stationary.
Step:4 At the top of the curl, rotate your wrist so that your palm faces up.
Step:5 Slowly lower the dumbbell back down to the starting position, rotating your wrist back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

translations.name: curl zottman en banco predicador a una mano con mancuerna
instructions: Paso:1 Siéntate en un banco predicador y sujeta una mancuerna con agarre supino.
Paso:2 Apoya el brazo superior en el cojín del banco, dejando extender por completo el brazo.
Paso:3 Realiza el curl llevando la mancuerna hacia el hombro, manteniendo el brazo superior quieto.
Paso:4 En la parte alta del movimiento, rota la muñeca hasta que la palma quede hacia arriba.
Paso:5 Desciende la mancuerna lentamente a la posición inicial, rotando la muñeca de regreso.
Paso:6 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones y cambia de brazo.

name: barbell lateral lunge
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a barbell across your back.
Step:2 Take a big step to the side with your right foot, keeping your left foot planted.
Step:3 Bend your right knee and lower your body down into a lunge position, keeping your left leg straight.
Step:4 Push off with your right foot and return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat on the other side, stepping with your left foot.

translations.name: barbell lateral lunge
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a barbell across your back.
Step:2 Take a big step to the side with your right foot, keeping your left foot planted.
Step:3 Bend your right knee and lower your body down into a lunge position, keeping your left leg straight.
Step:4 Push off with your right foot and return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat on the other side, stepping with your left foot.

translations.name: zancada lateral con barra
instructions: Paso:1 Ponte de pie con los pies al ancho de hombros, sosteniendo una barra sobre la espalda.
Paso:2 Da un gran paso lateral con el pie derecho, manteniendo el izquierdo plantado.
Paso:3 Flexiona la rodilla derecha y baja el cuerpo a una zancada, manteniendo la pierna izquierda recta.
Paso:4 Impúlsate con el pie derecho para volver a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite del otro lado, avanzando con el pie izquierdo.

name: push-up medicine ball
instructions: Step:1 Start in a high plank position with your hands on the medicine ball, shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Engage your core and lower your body towards the ground by bending your elbows, keeping your back straight.
Step:3 Push through your palms to extend your arms and return to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: push-up medicine ball
instructions: Step:1 Start in a high plank position with your hands on the medicine ball, shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Engage your core and lower your body towards the ground by bending your elbows, keeping your back straight.
Step:3 Push through your palms to extend your arms and return to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: flexión con balón medicinal
instructions: Paso:1 Inicia en plancha alta con las manos sobre el balón medicinal, al ancho de hombros.
Paso:2 Activa el core y baja el cuerpo flexionando los codos, manteniendo la espalda recta.
Paso:3 Empuja con las palmas para extender los brazos y volver a la posición inicial.
Paso:4 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: lever standing calf raise
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the machine to your height and stand with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Place your shoulders under the pads and hold onto the handles for stability.
Step:3 Raise your heels as high as possible by extending your ankles.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your heels back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: lever standing calf raise
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the machine to your height and stand with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Place your shoulders under the pads and hold onto the handles for stability.
Step:3 Raise your heels as high as possible by extending your ankles.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your heels back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: elevación de pantorrillas de pie en máquina de palanca
instructions: Paso:1 Ajusta la máquina a tu altura y colócate con los pies al ancho de hombros.
Paso:2 Ubica los hombros debajo de las almohadillas y sujeta las manijas para estabilidad.
Paso:3 Eleva los talones lo más alto posible extendiendo los tobillos.
Paso:4 Pausa un momento arriba y desciende los talones lentamente a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: kettlebell alternating hang clean
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a kettlebell in each hand with an overhand grip.
Step:2 Bend your knees slightly and hinge forward at the hips, keeping your back straight and chest up.
Step:3 Allow the kettlebells to hang in front of your body with your arms fully extended.
Step:4 In one fluid motion, explosively extend your hips, shrug your shoulders, and pull the kettlebells up towards your shoulders.

Step:5 As the kettlebells reach shoulder height, rotate your wrists and catch the kettlebells in the rack position, with your palms facing inward and the kettlebells resting on the outside of your forearms.
Step:6 Lower the kettlebells back down to the starting position and repeat the movement with the opposite arm.
Step:7 Continue alternating arms for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: kettlebell alternating hang clean
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a kettlebell in each hand with an overhand grip.
Step:2 Bend your knees slightly and hinge forward at the hips, keeping your back straight and chest up.
Step:3 Allow the kettlebells to hang in front of your body with your arms fully extended.
Step:4 In one fluid motion, explosively extend your hips, shrug your shoulders, and pull the kettlebells up towards your shoulders.

Step:5 As the kettlebells reach shoulder height, rotate your wrists and catch the kettlebells in the rack position, with your palms facing inward and the kettlebells resting on the outside of your forearms.
Step:6 Lower the kettlebells back down to the starting position and repeat the movement with the opposite arm.
Step:7 Continue alternating arms for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: cargada colgante alternada con kettlebell
instructions: Paso:1 Ponte de pie con los pies al ancho de hombros, sosteniendo una kettlebell en cada mano con agarre prono.
Paso:2 Flexiona ligeramente las rodillas y bisagra desde las caderas, manteniendo la espalda recta y el pecho arriba.
Paso:3 Deja que las kettlebells cuelguen al frente con los brazos extendidos.
Paso:4 En un movimiento fluido, extiende explosivamente caderas, encoge hombros y tira de las kettlebells hacia los hombros.
Paso:5 Al llegar a la altura de hombros, rota las muñecas y recibe las kettlebells en posición de rack, palmas hacia adentro y apoyadas sobre los antebrazos.
Paso:6 Baja las kettlebells a la posición inicial y repite el movimiento con el brazo contrario.
Paso:7 Continúa alternando brazos por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell rear delt row_shoulder
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and knees slightly bent.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell in each hand with your palms facing your body.
Step:3 Bend forward at the waist, keeping your back straight and your core engaged.
Step:4 Extend your arms straight down towards the floor, with a slight bend in your elbows.
Step:5 Raise the dumbbells out to the sides, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell rear delt row_shoulder
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and knees slightly bent.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell in each hand with your palms facing your body.
Step:3 Bend forward at the waist, keeping your back straight and your core engaged.
Step:4 Extend your arms straight down towards the floor, with a slight bend in your elbows.
Step:5 Raise the dumbbells out to the sides, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: remo deltoides posterior con mancuernas (hombros)
instructions: Paso:1 Ponte de pie con los pies al ancho de hombros y las rodillas ligeramente flexionadas.
Paso:2 Sostén una mancuerna en cada mano con las palmas hacia el cuerpo.
Paso:3 Inclínate desde la cintura manteniendo la espalda recta y el core activo.
Paso:4 Extiende los brazos hacia el suelo con ligera flexión en los codos.
Paso:5 Eleva las mancuernas hacia los lados juntando las escápulas.
Paso:6 Pausa un momento arriba y baja lentamente a la posición inicial.
Paso:7 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: cable reverse wrist curl
instructions: Step:1 Attach a cable to a low pulley and sit on a bench facing the cable machine.
Step:2 Grasp the cable handle with an overhand grip, palms facing down.
Step:3 Rest your forearms on your thighs, with your wrists hanging off the edge.
Step:4 Keeping your forearms stationary, exhale and curl your wrists upward as far as possible.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then inhale and slowly lower your wrists back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: cable reverse wrist curl
instructions: Step:1 Attach a cable to a low pulley and sit on a bench facing the cable machine.
Step:2 Grasp the cable handle with an overhand grip, palms facing down.
Step:3 Rest your forearms on your thighs, with your wrists hanging off the edge.
Step:4 Keeping your forearms stationary, exhale and curl your wrists upward as far as possible.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then inhale and slowly lower your wrists back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: curl de muñeca inverso en polea
instructions: Paso:1 Coloca un cable en una polea baja y siéntate en un banco mirando la máquina.
Paso:2 Sujeta la manija con agarre prono, palmas hacia abajo.
Paso:3 Apoya los antebrazos sobre los muslos, con las muñecas fuera del borde.
Paso:4 Manteniendo los antebrazos quietos, exhala y flexiona las muñecas hacia arriba lo más posible.
Paso:5 Pausa un momento arriba, luego inhala y baja lentamente las muñecas a la posición inicial.
Paso:6 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: cable standing crunch (with rope attachment)
instructions: Step:1 Attach a rope to a cable machine at chest height.
Step:2 Stand facing away from the machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Hold the rope with both hands and bring it behind your head, keeping your elbows bent.
Step:4 Engage your abs and slowly crunch your torso forward, bringing your elbows towards your knees.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top of the crunch, then slowly return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: cable standing crunch (with rope attachment)
instructions: Step:1 Attach a rope to a cable machine at chest height.
Step:2 Stand facing away from the machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Hold the rope with both hands and bring it behind your head, keeping your elbows bent.
Step:4 Engage your abs and slowly crunch your torso forward, bringing your elbows towards your knees.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top of the crunch, then slowly return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: crunch de pie en polea (con cuerda)
instructions: Paso:1 Coloca una cuerda en la polea a la altura del pecho.
Paso:2 Ponte de espaldas a la máquina con los pies al ancho de hombros.
Paso:3 Sujeta la cuerda con ambas manos detrás de la cabeza, manteniendo los codos flexionados.
Paso:4 Activa los abdominales y flexiona el torso hacia adelante, acercando los codos a las rodillas.
Paso:5 Pausa un momento arriba y vuelve lentamente a la posición inicial.
Paso:6 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: kettlebell advanced windmill
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet wider than shoulder-width apart, toes pointing slightly outward.
Step:2 Hold a kettlebell in your right hand, with your arm extended overhead and your palm facing forward.
Step:3 Rotate your left foot slightly to the right, and shift your weight onto your left leg.
Step:4 Bend your left knee and hinge at the hip, lowering your torso towards the left side.
Step:5 Keep your right arm extended overhead and your eyes on the kettlebell.
Step:6 As you lower your torso, allow your right leg to straighten and your right foot to pivot slightly.
Step:7 Lower your torso until you feel a stretch in your left hamstring and your right arm is pointing towards the ground.
Step:8 Pause for a moment, then engage your core and push through your left heel to return to the starting position.
Step:9 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides.

translations.name: kettlebell advanced windmill
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet wider than shoulder-width apart, toes pointing slightly outward.
Step:2 Hold a kettlebell in your right hand, with your arm extended overhead and your palm facing forward.
Step:3 Rotate your left foot slightly to the right, and shift your weight onto your left leg.
Step:4 Bend your left knee and hinge at the hip, lowering your torso towards the left side.
Step:5 Keep your right arm extended overhead and your eyes on the kettlebell.
Step:6 As you lower your torso, allow your right leg to straighten and your right foot to pivot slightly.
Step:7 Lower your torso until you feel a stretch in your left hamstring and your right arm is pointing towards the ground.
Step:8 Pause for a moment, then engage your core and push through your left heel to return to the starting position.
Step:9 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides.

translations.name: molino avanzado con kettlebell
instructions: Paso:1 Coloca los pies más anchos que los hombros, puntas ligeramente hacia afuera.
Paso:2 Sostén una kettlebell en la mano derecha, brazo extendido sobre la cabeza y palma al frente.
Paso:3 Rota ligeramente el pie izquierdo hacia la derecha y carga el peso en la pierna izquierda.
Paso:4 Flexiona la rodilla izquierda y bisagra en la cadera, bajando el torso hacia el lado izquierdo.
Paso:5 Mantén el brazo derecho extendido arriba y la mirada en la kettlebell.
Paso:6 Al bajar el torso, deja que la pierna derecha se extienda y el pie derecho pivote levemente.
Paso:7 Desciende hasta sentir estiramiento en el isquiotibial izquierdo y que el brazo derecho apunte al suelo.
Paso:8 Pausa un momento, activa el core y empuja con el talón izquierdo para volver a la posición inicial.
Paso:9 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones y cambia de lado.

name: standing hamstring and calf stretch with strap
instructions: Step:1 Stand upright with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Hold the strap with both hands and place it around the ball of your foot.
Step:3 Keep your leg straight and slowly lean forward from your hips, keeping your back straight.
Step:4 Feel the stretch in your hamstring and calf muscles.
Step:5 Hold the stretch for 20-30 seconds.
Step:6 Release the stretch and repeat with the other leg.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: standing hamstring and calf stretch with strap
instructions: Step:1 Stand upright with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Hold the strap with both hands and place it around the ball of your foot.
Step:3 Keep your leg straight and slowly lean forward from your hips, keeping your back straight.
Step:4 Feel the stretch in your hamstring and calf muscles.
Step:5 Hold the stretch for 20-30 seconds.
Step:6 Release the stretch and repeat with the other leg.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: estiramiento de isquiotibiales y pantorrillas de pie con correa
instructions: Paso:1 Ponte de pie erguido con los pies al ancho de hombros.
Paso:2 Sostén la correa con ambas manos y colócala en la planta del pie.
Paso:3 Mantén la pierna recta e inclínate lentamente desde las caderas, con la espalda recta.
Paso:4 Siente el estiramiento en los isquiotibiales y las pantorrillas.
Paso:5 Mantén el estiramiento de 20 a 30 segundos.
Paso:6 Suelta y repite con la otra pierna.
Paso:7 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: ez bar french press on exercise ball
instructions: Step:1 Sit on an exercise ball and hold an EZ barbell with an overhand grip.
Step:2 Extend your arms straight up, keeping your elbows close to your head.
Step:3 Slowly lower the barbell behind your head by bending your elbows.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then extend your arms back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: ez bar french press on exercise ball
instructions: Step:1 Sit on an exercise ball and hold an EZ barbell with an overhand grip.
Step:2 Extend your arms straight up, keeping your elbows close to your head.
Step:3 Slowly lower the barbell behind your head by bending your elbows.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then extend your arms back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: press francés barra EZ en balón de ejercicio
instructions: Paso:1 Siéntate en un balón de ejercicio y sujeta una barra EZ con agarre prono.
Paso:2 Extiende los brazos hacia arriba, manteniendo los codos cerca de la cabeza.
Paso:3 Baja la barra lentamente detrás de la cabeza flexionando los codos.
