Paso:4 Pausa un momento y extiende los brazos de regreso a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: single leg platform slide
instructions: Step:1 Start by standing with one foot on a platform or slide board.
Step:2 Bend your knee slightly and slide the foot on the platform backward, extending your leg.
Step:3 Keep your core engaged and maintain a straight posture throughout the movement.
Step:4 Slowly return to the starting position by sliding your foot back to the initial position.
Step:5 Repeat the movement for the desired number of repetitions, then switch legs.

translations.name: single leg platform slide
instructions: Step:1 Start by standing with one foot on a platform or slide board.
Step:2 Bend your knee slightly and slide the foot on the platform backward, extending your leg.
Step:3 Keep your core engaged and maintain a straight posture throughout the movement.
Step:4 Slowly return to the starting position by sliding your foot back to the initial position.
Step:5 Repeat the movement for the desired number of repetitions, then switch legs.

translations.name: deslizamiento en plataforma a una pierna
instructions: Paso:1 Comienza de pie con un pie sobre una plataforma o slide board.
Paso:2 Flexiona levemente la rodilla y desliza el pie de la plataforma hacia atrás, extendiendo la pierna.
Paso:3 Mantén el core activo y una postura recta durante todo el movimiento.
Paso:4 Regresa lentamente a la posición inicial deslizando el pie de vuelta.
Paso:5 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones y cambia de pierna.

name: lever one arm lateral wide pulldown
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and position yourself on the machine with your chest against the pad and your feet flat on the floor.
Step:2 Grasp the handle with an overhand grip and fully extend your arm, keeping a slight bend in your elbow.
Step:3 Pull the handle down and across your body towards your opposite hip, squeezing your lat muscle at the bottom of the movement.
Step:4 Slowly return the handle to the starting position, fully extending your arm.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides.

translations.name: lever one arm lateral wide pulldown
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and position yourself on the machine with your chest against the pad and your feet flat on the floor.
Step:2 Grasp the handle with an overhand grip and fully extend your arm, keeping a slight bend in your elbow.
Step:3 Pull the handle down and across your body towards your opposite hip, squeezing your lat muscle at the bottom of the movement.
Step:4 Slowly return the handle to the starting position, fully extending your arm.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides.

translations.name: jalón lateral amplio a una mano en máquina de palanca
instructions: Paso:1 Ajusta la altura del asiento y colócate en la máquina con el pecho contra el apoyo y los pies planos.
Paso:2 Sujeta la manija con agarre prono y extiende el brazo, manteniendo ligera flexión en el codo.
Paso:3 Tira de la manija hacia abajo y a través del cuerpo hacia la cadera contraria, contrayendo el dorsal al final del movimiento.
Paso:4 Regresa lentamente la manija a la posición inicial, extendiendo el brazo.
Paso:5 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones y cambia de lado.

name: cable standing one leg calf raise
instructions: Step:1 Stand facing a cable machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Hold onto the cable machine for support.
Step:3 Lift one leg off the ground and balance on the other leg.
Step:4 Slowly raise your heel off the ground, lifting your body up onto your toes.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your heel back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch legs.

translations.name: cable standing one leg calf raise
instructions: Step:1 Stand facing a cable machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Hold onto the cable machine for support.
Step:3 Lift one leg off the ground and balance on the other leg.
Step:4 Slowly raise your heel off the ground, lifting your body up onto your toes.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your heel back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch legs.

translations.name: elevación de pantorrilla a una pierna en polea de pie
instructions: Paso:1 Ponte de pie frente a una máquina de polea con los pies al ancho de hombros.
Paso:2 Sujétate de la máquina para apoyar el equilibrio.
Paso:3 Eleva una pierna del suelo y equilibra el peso sobre la otra.
Paso:4 Eleva lentamente el talón, subiendo el cuerpo a la punta del pie.
Paso:5 Pausa un momento arriba y baja el talón lentamente a la posición inicial.
Paso:6 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones y cambia de pierna.

name: cable pulldown
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the cable pulldown machine so that the seat is at a comfortable height and the knee pad is secured.
Step:2 Sit on the seat with your back straight and your feet flat on the ground.
Step:3 Grasp the cable bar with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:4 Lean back slightly and engage your core.
Step:5 Pull the cable bar down towards your chest, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the bottom of the movement, then slowly release the bar back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: cable pulldown
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the cable pulldown machine so that the seat is at a comfortable height and the knee pad is secured.
Step:2 Sit on the seat with your back straight and your feet flat on the ground.
Step:3 Grasp the cable bar with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:4 Lean back slightly and engage your core.
Step:5 Pull the cable bar down towards your chest, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the bottom of the movement, then slowly release the bar back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: jalón en polea
instructions: Paso:1 Ajusta la máquina de jalón para que el asiento quede a una altura cómoda y la almohadilla de rodillas firme.
Paso:2 Siéntate con la espalda recta y los pies planos en el suelo.
Paso:3 Sujeta la barra con agarre prono, un poco más ancho que los hombros.
Paso:4 Inclínate levemente hacia atrás y activa el core.
Paso:5 Tira de la barra hacia el pecho juntando las escápulas.
Paso:6 Pausa un momento abajo y regresa la barra lentamente a la posición inicial.
Paso:7 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: london bridge
instructions: Step:1 Attach the rope to a high anchor point.
Step:2 Stand facing away from the anchor point with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Grasp the rope with an overhand grip, palms facing down.
Step:4 Lean forward slightly, keeping your back straight and core engaged.
Step:5 Pull the rope towards your body, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the peak of the movement, then slowly release the tension and return to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: london bridge
instructions: Step:1 Attach the rope to a high anchor point.
Step:2 Stand facing away from the anchor point with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Grasp the rope with an overhand grip, palms facing down.
Step:4 Lean forward slightly, keeping your back straight and core engaged.
Step:5 Pull the rope towards your body, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the peak of the movement, then slowly release the tension and return to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: puente de Londres
instructions: Paso:1 Fija la cuerda a un punto de anclaje alto.
Paso:2 Ponte de espaldas al anclaje con los pies al ancho de hombros.
Paso:3 Sujeta la cuerda con agarre prono, palmas hacia abajo.
Paso:4 Inclínate levemente hacia adelante, manteniendo la espalda recta y el core activo.
Paso:5 Tira de la cuerda hacia el cuerpo, juntando las escápulas.
Paso:6 Pausa un momento en el pico del movimiento y libera la tensión lentamente para volver a la posición inicial.
Paso:7 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: ez bar reverse grip bent over row
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and knees slightly bent.
Step:2 Hold the ez barbell with an underhand grip, palms facing up, and hands shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Bend forward at the hips, keeping your back straight and chest up, until your torso is almost parallel to the floor.
Step:4 Pull the ez barbell towards your lower chest, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the ez barbell back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: ez bar reverse grip bent over row
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and knees slightly bent.
Step:2 Hold the ez barbell with an underhand grip, palms facing up, and hands shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Bend forward at the hips, keeping your back straight and chest up, until your torso is almost parallel to the floor.
Step:4 Pull the ez barbell towards your lower chest, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the ez barbell back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: remo inclinado con agarre inverso con barra EZ
instructions: Paso:1 Ponte de pie con los pies al ancho de hombros y las rodillas ligeramente flexionadas.
Paso:2 Sujeta la barra EZ con agarre supino, palmas hacia arriba, manos al ancho de hombros.
Paso:3 Inclínate desde las caderas con la espalda recta y el pecho arriba hasta que el torso quede casi paralelo al suelo.
Paso:4 Tira de la barra EZ hacia la parte baja del pecho, juntando las escápulas.
Paso:5 Pausa un momento arriba y baja la barra EZ lentamente a la posición inicial.
Paso:6 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: band single leg calf raise
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet hip-width apart and place the band around the ball of your left foot.
Step:2 Hold onto a stable object for balance if needed.
Step:3 Slowly raise your left heel off the ground, lifting your body weight onto the ball of your foot.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your left heel back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch to the right leg.

translations.name: band single leg calf raise
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet hip-width apart and place the band around the ball of your left foot.
Step:2 Hold onto a stable object for balance if needed.
Step:3 Slowly raise your left heel off the ground, lifting your body weight onto the ball of your foot.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your left heel back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch to the right leg.

translations.name: elevación de pantorrilla a una pierna con banda
instructions: Paso:1 Ponte de pie con los pies al ancho de caderas y coloca la banda en la planta del pie izquierdo.
Paso:2 Sujétate de un objeto estable para equilibrarte si es necesario.
Paso:3 Eleva lentamente el talón izquierdo, cargando el peso sobre la punta del pie.
Paso:4 Pausa un momento arriba y baja el talón izquierdo lentamente a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones y cambia a la pierna derecha.

name: band one arm twisting seated row
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench or chair with your feet flat on the ground and your back straight.
Step:2 Hold the band with one hand and extend your arm fully in front of you.
Step:3 Keeping your back straight, pull the band towards your body by bending your elbow and squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:4 At the same time, twist your torso towards the side of the pulling arm.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly release the tension in the band and return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch to the other arm.

translations.name: band one arm twisting seated row
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench or chair with your feet flat on the ground and your back straight.
Step:2 Hold the band with one hand and extend your arm fully in front of you.
Step:3 Keeping your back straight, pull the band towards your body by bending your elbow and squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:4 At the same time, twist your torso towards the side of the pulling arm.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly release the tension in the band and return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch to the other arm.

translations.name: remo sentado con banda a una mano con giro
instructions: Paso:1 Siéntate en un banco o silla con los pies planos en el suelo y la espalda recta.
Paso:2 Sujeta la banda con una mano y extiende el brazo completamente al frente.
Paso:3 Manteniendo la espalda recta, tira de la banda hacia tu cuerpo flexionando el codo y juntando las escápulas.
Paso:4 Al mismo tiempo, gira el torso hacia el lado del brazo que tira.
Paso:5 Haz una pausa un momento arriba, luego libera la tensión de la banda lentamente y vuelve a la posición inicial.
Paso:6 Repite las repeticiones deseadas y cambia al otro brazo.

name: dumbbell pullover on exercise ball
instructions: Step:1 Sit on an exercise ball and hold a dumbbell with both hands above your chest, arms extended.
Step:2 Slowly lower the dumbbell behind your head while keeping your arms straight.
Step:3 Pause for a moment, then raise the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell pullover on exercise ball
instructions: Step:1 Sit on an exercise ball and hold a dumbbell with both hands above your chest, arms extended.
Step:2 Slowly lower the dumbbell behind your head while keeping your arms straight.
Step:3 Pause for a moment, then raise the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: pullover con mancuerna sobre balón de ejercicio
instructions: Paso:1 Siéntate sobre un balón de ejercicio y sujeta una mancuerna con ambas manos sobre el pecho, brazos extendidos.
Paso:2 Baja lentamente la mancuerna detrás de la cabeza manteniendo los brazos rectos.
Paso:3 Haz una pausa un momento y eleva la mancuerna de vuelta a la posición inicial.
Paso:4 Repite las repeticiones deseadas.

name: quarter sit-up
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Place your hands behind your head with your elbows pointing outwards.
Step:3 Engaging your abs, slowly lift your upper body off the ground, curling forward until your torso is at a 45-degree angle.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your upper body back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: quarter sit-up
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Place your hands behind your head with your elbows pointing outwards.
Step:3 Engaging your abs, slowly lift your upper body off the ground, curling forward until your torso is at a 45-degree angle.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your upper body back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: abdominales cuarto de recorrido
instructions: Paso:1 Acuéstate boca arriba con las rodillas flexionadas y los pies planos en el suelo.
Paso:2 Coloca las manos detrás de la cabeza con los codos hacia afuera.
Paso:3 Activando los abdominales, eleva lentamente el torso curvándolo hacia adelante hasta unos 45 grados.
Paso:4 Pausa un momento arriba y desciende lentamente el torso a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite las repeticiones deseadas.

name: all fours squad stretch
instructions: Step:1 Start on all fours with your hands directly under your shoulders and your knees directly under your hips.
Step:2 Extend one leg straight back, keeping your knee bent and your foot flexed.
Step:3 Slowly lower your hips towards the ground, feeling a stretch in your quads.
Step:4 Hold this position for 20-30 seconds.
Step:5 Switch legs and repeat the stretch on the other side.

translations.name: all fours squad stretch
instructions: Step:1 Start on all fours with your hands directly under your shoulders and your knees directly under your hips.
Step:2 Extend one leg straight back, keeping your knee bent and your foot flexed.
Step:3 Slowly lower your hips towards the ground, feeling a stretch in your quads.
Step:4 Hold this position for 20-30 seconds.
Step:5 Switch legs and repeat the stretch on the other side.

translations.name: estiramiento de cuádriceps en cuatro apoyos
instructions: Paso:1 Ponte en cuatro apoyos con las manos bajo los hombros y las rodillas bajo las caderas.
Paso:2 Extiende una pierna recta hacia atrás, manteniendo la rodilla flexionada y el pie en flexión.
Paso:3 Desciende lentamente las caderas hacia el suelo, sintiendo el estiramiento en los cuádriceps.
Paso:4 Mantén la posición de 20 a 30 segundos.
Paso:5 Cambia de pierna y repite el estiramiento del otro lado.

name: lever seated reverse fly (parallel grip)
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and position yourself on the machine with your chest against the pad and your feet flat on the floor.
Step:2 Grasp the handles with a parallel grip, palms facing each other, and keep your arms slightly bent.
Step:3 Exhale and squeeze your shoulder blades together as you pull the handles back and outward, away from your body.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the peak contraction, then inhale and slowly return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: lever seated reverse fly (parallel grip)
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and position yourself on the machine with your chest against the pad and your feet flat on the floor.
Step:2 Grasp the handles with a parallel grip, palms facing each other, and keep your arms slightly bent.
Step:3 Exhale and squeeze your shoulder blades together as you pull the handles back and outward, away from your body.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the peak contraction, then inhale and slowly return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: aperturas inversas sentado en máquina de palancas (agarre paralelo)
instructions: Paso:1 Ajusta la altura del asiento y colócate en la máquina con el pecho contra el apoyo y los pies planos en el piso.
Paso:2 Sujeta las manijas con agarre paralelo, palmas enfrentadas, y mantén los brazos levemente flexionados.
Paso:3 Exhala y junta las escápulas mientras llevas las manijas hacia atrás y hacia afuera, alejándolas del cuerpo.
Paso:4 Pausa un momento en la contracción máxima, luego inhala y regresa lentamente a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite las repeticiones deseadas.

name: dumbbell decline one arm hammer press
instructions: Step:1 Lie on a decline bench with a dumbbell in one hand, resting on your chest.
Step:2 Extend your arm straight up, keeping your elbow slightly bent.
Step:3 Lower the dumbbell down towards your shoulder, keeping your elbow close to your body.
Step:4 Press the dumbbell back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

translations.name: dumbbell decline one arm hammer press
instructions: Step:1 Lie on a decline bench with a dumbbell in one hand, resting on your chest.
Step:2 Extend your arm straight up, keeping your elbow slightly bent.
Step:3 Lower the dumbbell down towards your shoulder, keeping your elbow close to your body.
Step:4 Press the dumbbell back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

translations.name: press martillo a una mano con mancuerna en banco declinado
instructions: Paso:1 Acuéstate en un banco declinado con una mancuerna en una mano, apoyada sobre el pecho.
Paso:2 Extiende el brazo hacia arriba manteniendo una ligera flexión en el codo.
Paso:3 Desciende la mancuerna hacia el hombro, manteniendo el codo cerca del cuerpo.
Paso:4 Empuja la mancuerna de vuelta a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite las repeticiones deseadas y cambia de brazo.

name: jump squat v. 2
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Lower your body into a squat position by bending your knees and pushing your hips back.
Step:3 Jump explosively, extending your hips and knees fully.
Step:4 Land softly on the balls of your feet and immediately lower your body back into a squat position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: jump squat v. 2
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Lower your body into a squat position by bending your knees and pushing your hips back.
Step:3 Jump explosively, extending your hips and knees fully.
Step:4 Land softly on the balls of your feet and immediately lower your body back into a squat position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: sentadilla con salto v. 2
instructions: Paso:1 Ponte de pie con los pies al ancho de los hombros.
Paso:2 Baja a una sentadilla flexionando las rodillas y llevando las caderas hacia atrás.
Paso:3 Salta de forma explosiva, extendiendo completamente caderas y rodillas.
Paso:4 Aterriza suave sobre las puntas y baja de inmediato de nuevo a sentadilla.
Paso:5 Repite las repeticiones deseadas.

name: cable rear drive
instructions: Step:1 Attach a handle to a low pulley cable machine and stand facing away from the machine.
Step:2 Grasp the handle with an overhand grip and extend your arms straight out in front of you.
Step:3 Keeping your elbows stationary, pull the handle back towards your body, squeezing your triceps at the end of the movement.
Step:4 Slowly return the handle to the starting position and repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: cable rear drive
instructions: Step:1 Attach a handle to a low pulley cable machine and stand facing away from the machine.
Step:2 Grasp the handle with an overhand grip and extend your arms straight out in front of you.
Step:3 Keeping your elbows stationary, pull the handle back towards your body, squeezing your triceps at the end of the movement.
Step:4 Slowly return the handle to the starting position and repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: empuje posterior con cable
instructions: Paso:1 Coloca una manija en una polea baja y ponte de espaldas a la máquina.
Paso:2 Sujeta la manija con agarre prono y extiende los brazos al frente.
Paso:3 Manteniendo los codos fijos, tira de la manija hacia tu cuerpo, apretando los tríceps al final del movimiento.
Paso:4 Regresa la manija lentamente a la posición inicial y repite las repeticiones deseadas.

name: barbell skier
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a barbell in front of your thighs with an overhand grip.
Step:2 Bend your knees slightly and hinge forward at the hips, keeping your back straight and chest up.
Step:3 Simultaneously lift the barbell up towards your shoulders while jumping slightly off the ground.
Step:4 As you reach the top of the movement, quickly reverse the motion and lower the barbell back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: barbell skier
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a barbell in front of your thighs with an overhand grip.
Step:2 Bend your knees slightly and hinge forward at the hips, keeping your back straight and chest up.
Step:3 Simultaneously lift the barbell up towards your shoulders while jumping slightly off the ground.
Step:4 As you reach the top of the movement, quickly reverse the motion and lower the barbell back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: esquiador con barra
instructions: Paso:1 Ponte de pie con los pies al ancho de los hombros y sujeta una barra frente a los muslos con agarre prono.
Paso:2 Flexiona ligeramente las rodillas y bisagra la cadera hacia adelante manteniendo la espalda recta y el pecho arriba.
Paso:3 Eleva la barra hacia los hombros mientras realizas un pequeño salto.
Paso:4 Al llegar arriba, invierte el movimiento rápidamente y baja la barra a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite las repeticiones deseadas.

name: dumbbell over bench one arm wrist curl
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your feet flat on the ground and hold a dumbbell in one hand, palm facing down.
Step:2 Rest your forearm on the bench with your wrist hanging off the edge.
Step:3 Slowly curl your wrist upwards, bringing the dumbbell towards your forearm.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbell back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch to the other arm.

translations.name: dumbbell over bench one arm wrist curl
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your feet flat on the ground and hold a dumbbell in one hand, palm facing down.
Step:2 Rest your forearm on the bench with your wrist hanging off the edge.
Step:3 Slowly curl your wrist upwards, bringing the dumbbell towards your forearm.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbell back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch to the other arm.

translations.name: curl de muñeca a una mano con mancuerna sobre banco
instructions: Paso:1 Siéntate en un banco con los pies planos y sujeta una mancuerna con una mano, palma hacia abajo.
Paso:2 Apoya el antebrazo sobre el banco con la muñeca fuera del borde.
Paso:3 Flexiona lentamente la muñeca hacia arriba llevando la mancuerna hacia el antebrazo.
Paso:4 Pausa un momento arriba y baja la mancuerna lentamente a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite las repeticiones deseadas y cambia al otro brazo.

name: dumbbell incline bench press
instructions: Step:1 Set up an incline bench at a 45-degree angle.
Step:2 Sit on the bench with your feet flat on the ground and your back pressed firmly against the bench.
Step:3 Hold a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing forward, and lift them to shoulder height.
Step:4 Slowly lower the dumbbells to the sides of your chest, keeping your elbows at a 90-degree angle.
Step:5 Push the dumbbells back up to the starting position, fully extending your arms.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell incline bench press
instructions: Step:1 Set up an incline bench at a 45-degree angle.
Step:2 Sit on the bench with your feet flat on the ground and your back pressed firmly against the bench.
Step:3 Hold a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing forward, and lift them to shoulder height.
Step:4 Slowly lower the dumbbells to the sides of your chest, keeping your elbows at a 90-degree angle.
Step:5 Push the dumbbells back up to the starting position, fully extending your arms.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: press en banco inclinado con mancuernas
instructions: Paso:1 Ajusta un banco inclinado a 45 grados.
Paso:2 Siéntate con los pies planos y la espalda bien apoyada en el banco.
Paso:3 Sujeta una mancuerna en cada mano, palmas al frente, y llévalas a la altura de los hombros.
Paso:4 Desciende lentamente las mancuernas a los lados del pecho, manteniendo codos a 90 grados.
Paso:5 Empuja las mancuernas de regreso a la posición inicial, extendiendo completamente los brazos.
Paso:6 Repite las repeticiones deseadas.

name: cable rope seated row
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the rowing machine with your feet flat on the footrests and knees slightly bent.
Step:2 Grasp the cable ropes with an overhand grip, palms facing each other.
Step:3 Keep your back straight and lean slightly forward, maintaining a slight bend in your elbows.
Step:4 Pull the cable ropes towards your body, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the peak of the movement, then slowly release the tension and return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: cable rope seated row
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the rowing machine with your feet flat on the footrests and knees slightly bent.
Step:2 Grasp the cable ropes with an overhand grip, palms facing each other.
Step:3 Keep your back straight and lean slightly forward, maintaining a slight bend in your elbows.
Step:4 Pull the cable ropes towards your body, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the peak of the movement, then slowly release the tension and return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: remo sentado con cable y cuerda
instructions: Paso:1 Siéntate en la máquina de remo con los pies en las plataformas y las rodillas ligeramente flexionadas.
Paso:2 Sujeta las cuerdas del cable con agarre prono, palmas enfrentadas.
Paso:3 Mantén la espalda recta e inclínate levemente hacia adelante, con ligera flexión en los codos.
Paso:4 Tira de las cuerdas hacia el cuerpo, juntando las escápulas.
Paso:5 Pausa un momento en el pico del movimiento y luego libera la tensión lentamente volviendo a la posición inicial.
Paso:6 Repite las repeticiones deseadas.

name: smith behind neck press
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height of the smith machine so that the bar is at shoulder level.
Step:2 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your knees slightly bent.
Step:3 Grasp the bar with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:4 Lift the bar off the rack and step back, maintaining a stable stance.
Step:5 Lower the bar down to the back of your neck, keeping your elbows pointing forward.
Step:6 Press the bar up overhead until your arms are fully extended.
Step:7 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the bar back down to the starting position.
Step:8 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: smith behind neck press
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height of the smith machine so that the bar is at shoulder level.
Step:2 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your knees slightly bent.
Step:3 Grasp the bar with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:4 Lift the bar off the rack and step back, maintaining a stable stance.
Step:5 Lower the bar down to the back of your neck, keeping your elbows pointing forward.
Step:6 Press the bar up overhead until your arms are fully extended.
Step:7 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the bar back down to the starting position.
Step:8 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: press tras nuca en máquina Smith
instructions: Paso:1 Ajusta la altura de la barra en la máquina Smith a nivel de hombros.
Paso:2 Colócate de pie con los pies al ancho de los hombros y rodillas levemente flexionadas.
Paso:3 Sujeta la barra con agarre prono, un poco más ancho que los hombros.
Paso:4 Desmonta la barra y da un paso atrás manteniendo una postura estable.
Paso:5 Baja la barra a la parte posterior del cuello, con los codos apuntando hacia adelante.
Paso:6 Realiza un press llevando la barra por encima de la cabeza hasta extender los brazos.
Paso:7 Pausa un momento arriba y desciende lentamente a la posición inicial.
Paso:8 Repite las repeticiones deseadas.

name: farmers walk
instructions: Step:1 Stand up straight with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing your sides.
Step:2 Keep your back straight and your shoulders back.
Step:3 Take small, controlled steps forward, maintaining an upright posture.
Step:4 Continue walking for the desired distance or time.
Step:5 To finish, stop walking and carefully lower the dumbbells to your sides.

translations.name: farmers walk
instructions: Step:1 Stand up straight with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing your sides.
Step:2 Keep your back straight and your shoulders back.
Step:3 Take small, controlled steps forward, maintaining an upright posture.
Step:4 Continue walking for the desired distance or time.
Step:5 To finish, stop walking and carefully lower the dumbbells to your sides.

translations.name: caminata del granjero con mancuernas
instructions: Paso:1 Ponte de pie erguido con una mancuerna en cada mano, palmas hacia los costados.
Paso:2 Mantén la espalda recta y los hombros atrás.
Paso:3 Da pasos cortos y controlados hacia adelante, conservando una postura erguida.
Paso:4 Continúa caminando la distancia o tiempo deseado.
Paso:5 Para finalizar, detente y baja las mancuernas con cuidado a los costados.

name: cable squat row (with rope attachment)
instructions: Step:1 Attach a rope to a cable machine at waist height.
Step:2 Stand facing the cable machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Bend your knees and lower your body into a squat position, keeping your back straight and chest up.
Step:4 Grasp the rope with an overhand grip, with your hands shoulder-width apart.
Step:5 Engage your core and pull the rope towards your body, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:6 Keep your elbows close to your body and continue pulling until your hands reach your chest.
Step:7 Pause for a moment at the top of the movement, then slowly release the rope and extend your arms back to the starting position.
Step:8 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: cable squat row (with rope attachment)
instructions: Step:1 Attach a rope to a cable machine at waist height.
Step:2 Stand facing the cable machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Bend your knees and lower your body into a squat position, keeping your back straight and chest up.
Step:4 Grasp the rope with an overhand grip, with your hands shoulder-width apart.
Step:5 Engage your core and pull the rope towards your body, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:6 Keep your elbows close to your body and continue pulling until your hands reach your chest.
Step:7 Pause for a moment at the top of the movement, then slowly release the rope and extend your arms back to the starting position.
Step:8 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: remo en sentadilla con cable (con cuerda)
instructions: Paso:1 Coloca una cuerda en una máquina de cable a la altura de la cintura.
Paso:2 Ponte de frente a la máquina con los pies al ancho de los hombros.
Paso:3 Flexiona las rodillas y baja a una sentadilla, manteniendo la espalda recta y el pecho arriba.
Paso:4 Sujeta la cuerda con agarre prono, manos al ancho de los hombros.
Paso:5 Activa el core y tira de la cuerda hacia tu cuerpo, juntando las escápulas.
Paso:6 Mantén los codos cerca del cuerpo y sigue tirando hasta que las manos lleguen al pecho.
Paso:7 Pausa un momento arriba y luego extiende los brazos lentamente regresando a la posición inicial.
Paso:8 Repite las repeticiones deseadas.

name: cable straight back seated row
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the cable row machine with your feet flat on the footrests and your knees slightly bent.
Step:2 Grasp the cable handles with an overhand grip, palms facing down.
Step:3 Keep your back straight and lean slightly forward from the hips.
Step:4 Pull the cable handles towards your body, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the peak of the movement, then slowly release the handles back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: cable straight back seated row
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the cable row machine with your feet flat on the footrests and your knees slightly bent.
Step:2 Grasp the cable handles with an overhand grip, palms facing down.
Step:3 Keep your back straight and lean slightly forward from the hips.
Step:4 Pull the cable handles towards your body, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the peak of the movement, then slowly release the handles back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: remo sentado en cable con espalda recta
instructions: Paso:1 Siéntate en la máquina de remo con cable con los pies en los apoyos y las rodillas ligeramente flexionadas.
Paso:2 Sujeta las manijas con agarre prono, palmas hacia abajo.
Paso:3 Mantén la espalda recta e inclínate levemente desde las caderas.
Paso:4 Tira de las manijas hacia tu cuerpo, juntando las escápulas.
Paso:5 Pausa un momento en el pico del movimiento y luego regresa lentamente las manijas a la posición inicial.
Paso:6 Repite las repeticiones deseadas.

name: lever decline chest press
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and backrest of the leverage machine to a comfortable position.
Step:2 Sit on the machine with your back against the backrest and your feet flat on the floor.
Step:3 Grasp the handles with an overhand grip and position your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:4 Push the handles forward and away from your body until your arms are fully extended.
Step:5 Slowly lower the handles back towards your chest, keeping your elbows slightly bent.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push the handles back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: lever decline chest press
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and backrest of the leverage machine to a comfortable position.
Step:2 Sit on the machine with your back against the backrest and your feet flat on the floor.
Step:3 Grasp the handles with an overhand grip and position your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:4 Push the handles forward and away from your body until your arms are fully extended.
Step:5 Slowly lower the handles back towards your chest, keeping your elbows slightly bent.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push the handles back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: press de pecho declinado en máquina de palancas
instructions: Paso:1 Ajusta la altura del asiento y el respaldo de la máquina de palancas a una posición cómoda.
Paso:2 Siéntate con la espalda contra el respaldo y los pies planos en el piso.
Paso:3 Sujeta las manijas con agarre prono, manos un poco más anchas que los hombros.
Paso:4 Empuja las manijas hacia adelante y lejos del cuerpo hasta extender por completo los brazos.
Paso:5 Desciende lentamente las manijas hacia el pecho manteniendo ligera flexión en los codos.
Paso:6 Pausa un momento abajo y empuja de nuevo a la posición inicial.
Paso:7 Repite las repeticiones deseadas.

name: lever lateral raise
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and position yourself on the machine with your back against the pad.
Step:2 Grasp the handles with an overhand grip and keep your arms straight.
Step:3 Exhale and raise your arms out to the sides until they are parallel to the floor.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then inhale and slowly lower your arms back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: lever lateral raise
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and position yourself on the machine with your back against the pad.
Step:2 Grasp the handles with an overhand grip and keep your arms straight.
Step:3 Exhale and raise your arms out to the sides until they are parallel to the floor.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then inhale and slowly lower your arms back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: elevación lateral en máquina de palancas
instructions: Paso:1 Ajusta la altura del asiento y colócate en la máquina con la espalda contra el apoyo.
Paso:2 Sujeta las manijas con agarre prono y mantén los brazos rectos.
Paso:3 Exhala y eleva los brazos hacia los lados hasta quedar paralelos al piso.
Paso:4 Pausa un momento arriba, luego inhala y baja lentamente los brazos a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite las repeticiones deseadas.

name: inchworm v. 2
instructions: Step:1 Start in a standing position with your feet hip-width apart.
Step:2 Bend forward at the waist and place your hands on the ground in front of you.
Step:3 Walk your hands forward until you are in a high plank position, with your body in a straight line from head to toe.
Step:4 Keeping your legs straight, walk your feet towards your hands, bringing your hips up towards the ceiling.
Step:5 Continue walking your hands forward, repeating the movement for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: inchworm v. 2
instructions: Step:1 Start in a standing position with your feet hip-width apart.
Step:2 Bend forward at the waist and place your hands on the ground in front of you.
Step:3 Walk your hands forward until you are in a high plank position, with your body in a straight line from head to toe.
Step:4 Keeping your legs straight, walk your feet towards your hands, bringing your hips up towards the ceiling.
Step:5 Continue walking your hands forward, repeating the movement for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: gusano caminante v. 2
instructions: Paso:1 Comienza de pie con los pies al ancho de las caderas.
Paso:2 Flexiona el torso y apoya las manos en el suelo frente a ti.
Paso:3 Camina con las manos hacia adelante hasta quedar en plancha alta, cuerpo en línea recta de cabeza a pies.
Paso:4 Manteniendo las piernas rectas, camina con los pies hacia las manos elevando las caderas.
Paso:5 Sigue caminando con las manos hacia adelante, repitiendo el movimiento las repeticiones deseadas.

name: kneeling plank tap shoulder (male)
instructions: Step:1 Start in a kneeling position with your hands on the ground, shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Extend your legs behind you, resting on your toes, and lift your body into a plank position.
Step:3 Keeping your core engaged and your hips stable, lift one hand off the ground and tap the opposite shoulder.
Step:4 Return the hand to the ground and repeat with the other hand.
Step:5 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: kneeling plank tap shoulder (male)
instructions: Step:1 Start in a kneeling position with your hands on the ground, shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Extend your legs behind you, resting on your toes, and lift your body into a plank position.
Step:3 Keeping your core engaged and your hips stable, lift one hand off the ground and tap the opposite shoulder.
Step:4 Return the hand to the ground and repeat with the other hand.
Step:5 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: plancha en rodillas con toque de hombro (hombre)
instructions: Paso:1 Comienza en posición de rodillas con las manos en el suelo al ancho de los hombros.
Paso:2 Extiende las piernas hacia atrás apoyando las puntas de los pies y eleva el cuerpo a posición de plancha.
Paso:3 Manteniendo el core activado y las caderas estables, eleva una mano y toca el hombro contrario.
Paso:4 Regresa la mano al suelo y repite con la otra mano.
Paso:5 Alterna lados por las repeticiones deseadas.

name: handstand push-up
instructions: Step:1 Find a wall and face away from it, standing a few feet away.
Step:2 Place your hands on the ground shoulder-width apart and kick your feet up against the wall, coming into a handstand position.
Step:3 Bend your elbows and lower your head towards the ground, keeping your body in a straight line.
Step:4 Push through your hands and extend your arms to return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: handstand push-up
instructions: Step:1 Find a wall and face away from it, standing a few feet away.
Step:2 Place your hands on the ground shoulder-width apart and kick your feet up against the wall, coming into a handstand position.
Step:3 Bend your elbows and lower your head towards the ground, keeping your body in a straight line.
Step:4 Push through your hands and extend your arms to return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: flexión de pino
instructions: Paso:1 Busca una pared y colócate de espaldas a ella, a unos pasos de distancia.
Paso:2 Apoya las manos en el suelo al ancho de los hombros y lanza los pies contra la pared para entrar en posición de pino.
Paso:3 Flexiona los codos y baja la cabeza hacia el suelo, manteniendo el cuerpo en línea recta.
Paso:4 Empuja con las manos y extiende los brazos para volver a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite las repeticiones deseadas.

name: sled closer hack squat
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the sled machine to a comfortable weight and position yourself with your back against the pad.
Step:2 Place your feet shoulder-width apart on the platform, toes slightly pointed outwards.
Step:3 Grip the handles on the sides of the machine for stability.
Step:4 Engage your core and slowly lower your body by bending your knees and hips, keeping your back straight.
Step:5 Continue lowering until your thighs are parallel to the ground or slightly below.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push through your heels to extend your legs and return to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: sled closer hack squat
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the sled machine to a comfortable weight and position yourself with your back against the pad.
Step:2 Place your feet shoulder-width apart on the platform, toes slightly pointed outwards.
Step:3 Grip the handles on the sides of the machine for stability.
Step:4 Engage your core and slowly lower your body by bending your knees and hips, keeping your back straight.
Step:5 Continue lowering until your thighs are parallel to the ground or slightly below.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push through your heels to extend your legs and return to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: sentadilla hack en trineo (pies juntos)
instructions: Paso:1 Ajusta el trineo a un peso cómodo y colócate con la espalda contra el respaldo.
Paso:2 Ubica los pies al ancho de los hombros en la plataforma, puntas ligeramente hacia afuera.
Paso:3 Sujeta las manijas laterales para estabilidad.
Paso:4 Activa el core y desciende flexionando rodillas y caderas, manteniendo la espalda recta.
Paso:5 Continúa bajando hasta que los muslos estén paralelos al suelo o un poco más abajo.
Paso:6 Pausa un momento abajo y empuja con los talones para extender las piernas y volver al inicio.
Paso:7 Repite las repeticiones deseadas.

name: dumbbell rear delt raise
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing your body.
Step:2 Bend your knees slightly and hinge forward at the hips, keeping your back straight.
Step:3 Raise your arms out to the sides, keeping a slight bend in your elbows, until they are parallel to the floor.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your arms back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell rear delt raise
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing your body.
Step:2 Bend your knees slightly and hinge forward at the hips, keeping your back straight.
Step:3 Raise your arms out to the sides, keeping a slight bend in your elbows, until they are parallel to the floor.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your arms back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: elevación posterior de deltoides con mancuernas
instructions: Paso:1 Ponte de pie con los pies al ancho de los hombros y sujeta una mancuerna en cada mano, palmas hacia el cuerpo.
Paso:2 Flexiona levemente las rodillas y bisagra la cadera hacia adelante, manteniendo la espalda recta.
Paso:3 Eleva los brazos hacia los lados con ligera flexión en los codos hasta quedar paralelos al piso.
Paso:4 Pausa un momento arriba y baja lentamente los brazos a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite las repeticiones deseadas.

name: medicine ball chest push single response
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding the medicine ball at chest level.
Step:2 Extend your arms forward, pushing the medicine ball away from your chest.
Step:3 Pause for a moment, then slowly bring the medicine ball back to your chest.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: medicine ball chest push single response
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding the medicine ball at chest level.
Step:2 Extend your arms forward, pushing the medicine ball away from your chest.
Step:3 Pause for a moment, then slowly bring the medicine ball back to your chest.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: empuje de pecho con balón medicinal (respuesta simple)
instructions: Paso:1 Ponte de pie con los pies al ancho de los hombros, sosteniendo el balón medicinal a la altura del pecho.
Paso:2 Extiende los brazos hacia adelante empujando el balón lejos del pecho.
Paso:3 Pausa un momento y regresa el balón lentamente al pecho.
Paso:4 Repite las repeticiones deseadas.

name: rocking frog stretch
instructions: Step:1 Start by kneeling on the ground with your knees hip-width apart.
Step:2 Place your hands on the ground in front of you for support.
Step:3 Slowly lean forward, shifting your weight onto your hands and extending your legs behind you.
Step:4 Keep your back straight and engage your glutes as you push your hips back and up towards the ceiling.
Step:5 Hold this position for a few seconds, feeling a stretch in your glutes.
Step:6 Slowly return to the starting position by bending your knees and lowering your hips back down.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: rocking frog stretch
instructions: Step:1 Start by kneeling on the ground with your knees hip-width apart.
Step:2 Place your hands on the ground in front of you for support.
Step:3 Slowly lean forward, shifting your weight onto your hands and extending your legs behind you.
Step:4 Keep your back straight and engage your glutes as you push your hips back and up towards the ceiling.
Step:5 Hold this position for a few seconds, feeling a stretch in your glutes.
Step:6 Slowly return to the starting position by bending your knees and lowering your hips back down.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: estiramiento rana balanceado
instructions: Paso:1 Comienza de rodillas en el suelo con las rodillas al ancho de las caderas.
Paso:2 Coloca las manos en el suelo al frente para apoyo.
Paso:3 Inclínate lentamente hacia adelante, llevando el peso a las manos y extendiendo las piernas hacia atrás.
Paso:4 Mantén la espalda recta y activa los glúteos empujando las caderas hacia atrás y arriba.
Paso:5 Mantén la posición unos segundos, sintiendo el estiramiento en los glúteos.
Paso:6 Vuelve lentamente a la posición inicial flexionando las rodillas y bajando las caderas.
Paso:7 Repite las repeticiones deseadas.

name: dumbbell one arm shoulder press v. 2
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a dumbbell in one hand at shoulder level, palm facing forward.
Step:2 Engage your core and press the dumbbell straight up overhead, fully extending your arm.
Step:3 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbell back to shoulder level.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch to the other arm.

translations.name: dumbbell one arm shoulder press v. 2
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a dumbbell in one hand at shoulder level, palm facing forward.
Step:2 Engage your core and press the dumbbell straight up overhead, fully extending your arm.
Step:3 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbell back to shoulder level.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch to the other arm.

translations.name: press de hombro a una mano con mancuerna v. 2
instructions: Paso:1 Ponte de pie con los pies al ancho de los hombros y sujeta una mancuerna a la altura del hombro, palma al frente.
Paso:2 Activa el core y presiona la mancuerna recto por encima de la cabeza, extendiendo por completo el brazo.
Paso:3 Pausa un momento arriba y baja la mancuerna lentamente al nivel del hombro.
Paso:4 Repite las repeticiones deseadas y cambia al otro brazo.

name: dumbbell step-up split squat
instructions: Step:1 Stand in front of a bench or step with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing your body.
Step:2 Place your right foot on the bench or step, ensuring your entire foot is in contact with the surface.
Step:3 Step up onto the bench or step with your right foot, pushing through your heel to lift your body up.
Step:4 As you step up, simultaneously lift your left knee towards your chest.
Step:5 Pause at the top of the movement, then slowly lower your left foot back to the ground while keeping your right foot on the bench or step.
Step:6 Repeat the movement with your left foot on the bench or step.
Step:7 Continue alternating between your right and left foot for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell step-up split squat
instructions: Step:1 Stand in front of a bench or step with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing your body.
Step:2 Place your right foot on the bench or step, ensuring your entire foot is in contact with the surface.
Step:3 Step up onto the bench or step with your right foot, pushing through your heel to lift your body up.
Step:4 As you step up, simultaneously lift your left knee towards your chest.
Step:5 Pause at the top of the movement, then slowly lower your left foot back to the ground while keeping your right foot on the bench or step.
Step:6 Repeat the movement with your left foot on the bench or step.
Step:7 Continue alternating between your right and left foot for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: step-up con mancuernas y sentadilla dividida
instructions: Paso:1 Ponte frente a un banco o escalón con una mancuerna en cada mano, palmas hacia el cuerpo.
Paso:2 Coloca el pie derecho sobre el banco o escalón asegurando todo el pie en contacto.
Paso:3 Súbete con el pie derecho empujando con el talón para elevar el cuerpo.
Paso:4 Mientras subes, eleva simultáneamente la rodilla izquierda hacia el pecho.
Paso:5 Pausa arriba y baja lentamente el pie izquierdo al suelo manteniendo el derecho sobre el banco.
Paso:6 Repite el movimiento ahora colocando el pie izquierdo en el banco.
Paso:7 Alterna entre pie derecho e izquierdo por las repeticiones deseadas.

name: standing behind neck press
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold the barbell behind your neck with an overhand grip.
Step:2 Keep your back straight and core engaged.
Step:3 Press the barbell overhead by extending your arms, fully extending your elbows.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the barbell back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: standing behind neck press
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold the barbell behind your neck with an overhand grip.
Step:2 Keep your back straight and core engaged.
Step:3 Press the barbell overhead by extending your arms, fully extending your elbows.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the barbell back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: press tras nuca de pie con barra
instructions: Paso:1 Ponte de pie con los pies al ancho de los hombros y sujeta la barra tras la nuca con agarre prono.
Paso:2 Mantén la espalda recta y el core activado.
Paso:3 Realiza un press elevando la barra por encima de la cabeza, extendiendo por completo los codos.
Paso:4 Pausa un momento arriba y baja la barra lentamente a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite las repeticiones deseadas.

name: biceps narrow pull-ups
instructions: Step:1 Hang from a pull-up bar with your palms facing towards you and your hands shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Engage your core and pull yourself up towards the bar, focusing on using your biceps to lift your body.
Step:3 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower yourself back down to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: biceps narrow pull-ups
instructions: Step:1 Hang from a pull-up bar with your palms facing towards you and your hands shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Engage your core and pull yourself up towards the bar, focusing on using your biceps to lift your body.
Step:3 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower yourself back down to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dominadas supinas agarre estrecho (énfasis bíceps)
instructions: Paso:1 Cuelga de una barra de dominadas con palmas hacia ti y manos al ancho de los hombros.
Paso:2 Activa el core y tracciona el cuerpo hacia la barra, enfocándote en usar los bíceps.
Paso:3 Pausa un momento arriba y desciende lentamente a la posición inicial.
Paso:4 Repite las repeticiones deseadas.

name: hands clasped circular toe touch (male)
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your hands clasped together in front of your chest.
Step:2 Bend your knees slightly and hinge forward at the hips, keeping your back straight.
Step:3 Lower your hands towards your toes in a circular motion, reaching as far as you can without straining.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then slowly return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: hands clasped circular toe touch (male)
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your hands clasped together in front of your chest.
Step:2 Bend your knees slightly and hinge forward at the hips, keeping your back straight.
Step:3 Lower your hands towards your toes in a circular motion, reaching as far as you can without straining.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then slowly return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: toque circular a los pies con manos entrelazadas (hombre)
instructions: Paso:1 Ponte de pie con los pies al ancho de los hombros y las manos entrelazadas frente al pecho.
Paso:2 Flexiona ligeramente las rodillas y bisagra la cadera hacia adelante manteniendo la espalda recta.
Paso:3 Desciende las manos hacia los pies en un movimiento circular, alcanzando sin forzar.
Paso:4 Pausa un momento abajo y vuelve lentamente a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite las repeticiones deseadas.

name: l-pull-up
instructions: Step:1 Grab the pull-up bar with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Hang with your arms fully extended and your body straight.
Step:3 Engage your back and biceps to pull your body up towards the bar, keeping your elbows close to your body.
Step:4 Continue pulling until your chin is above the bar.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your body back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: l-pull-up
instructions: Step:1 Grab the pull-up bar with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Hang with your arms fully extended and your body straight.
Step:3 Engage your back and biceps to pull your body up towards the bar, keeping your elbows close to your body.
Step:4 Continue pulling until your chin is above the bar.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your body back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dominada en L
instructions: Step:1 Agarra la barra de dominadas con un agarre por encima, un poco más ancho que el ancho de los hombros.
Step:2 Cuelga con los brazos completamente extendidos y el cuerpo recto.
Step:3 Activa la espalda y los bíceps para jalar tu cuerpo hacia la barra, manteniendo los codos pegados al cuerpo.
Step:4 Continúa tirando hasta que la barbilla quede por encima de la barra.
Step:5 Haz una pausa breve en la parte superior, luego baja lentamente el cuerpo de regreso a la posición inicial.
Step:6 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: smith leg press
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat and footplate of the smith machine to a comfortable position.
Step:2 Sit on the machine with your back against the backrest and your feet shoulder-width apart on the footplate.
Step:3 Grasp the handles or sides of the machine for stability.
Step:4 Push the footplate away from you by extending your legs, keeping your back against the backrest.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the fully extended position.
Step:6 Slowly bend your knees and lower the footplate back towards you, returning to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: smith leg press
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat and footplate of the smith machine to a comfortable position.
Step:2 Sit on the machine with your back against the backrest and your feet shoulder-width apart on the footplate.
Step:3 Grasp the handles or sides of the machine for stability.
Step:4 Push the footplate away from you by extending your legs, keeping your back against the backrest.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the fully extended position.
Step:6 Slowly bend your knees and lower the footplate back towards you, returning to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: press de piernas en máquina Smith
instructions: Step:1 Ajusta el asiento y la plataforma para los pies de la máquina Smith a una posición cómoda.
Step:2 Siéntate en la máquina con la espalda apoyada en el respaldo y los pies a la altura de los hombros sobre la plataforma.
Step:3 Agárrate a los asideros o a los lados de la máquina para mantener la estabilidad.
Step:4 Empuja la plataforma con los pies extendiendo las piernas, manteniendo la espalda apoyada en el respaldo.
Step:5 Haz una pausa momentánea en la posición totalmente extendida.
Step:6 Flexiona las rodillas lentamente y baja la plataforma hacia ti, regresando a la posición inicial.
Step:7 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell reverse grip row (female)
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and knees slightly bent.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell in each hand with an overhand grip, palms facing your body.
Step:3 Bend forward at the waist, keeping your back straight and your core engaged.
Step:4 Let your arms hang straight down, fully extended, with a slight bend in your elbows.
Step:5 Pull the dumbbells up towards your chest, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbells back down to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell reverse grip row (female)
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and knees slightly bent.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell in each hand with an overhand grip, palms facing your body.
Step:3 Bend forward at the waist, keeping your back straight and your core engaged.
Step:4 Let your arms hang straight down, fully extended, with a slight bend in your elbows.
Step:5 Pull the dumbbells up towards your chest, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbells back down to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: remo con mancuerna agarre inverso (femenino)
instructions: Step:1 Párate con los pies al ancho de los hombros y las rodillas ligeramente flexionadas.
Step:2 Sostén una mancuerna en cada mano con agarre por encima, palmas hacia tu cuerpo.
Step:3 Inclínate hacia delante desde la cintura, manteniendo la espalda recta y el core activado.
Step:4 Deja que los brazos cuelguen completamente extendidos, con una ligera flexión en los codos.
Step:5 Lleva las mancuernas hacia el pecho, apretando los omóplatos.
Step:6 Haz una pausa breve en la parte superior, luego baja lentamente las mancuernas hasta la posición inicial.
Step:7 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: smith reverse calf raises
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the smith machine bar to a height just below your shoulders.
Step:2 Stand facing the bar with your feet hip-width apart and toes pointing forward.
Step:3 Place the balls of your feet on the edge of a step or platform, with your heels hanging off.
Step:4 Hold onto the bar for support, keeping your back straight and core engaged.
Step:5 Raise your heels as high as possible, lifting your body weight onto the balls of your feet.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your heels back down to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: smith reverse calf raises
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the smith machine bar to a height just below your shoulders.
Step:2 Stand facing the bar with your feet hip-width apart and toes pointing forward.
Step:3 Place the balls of your feet on the edge of a step or platform, with your heels hanging off.
Step:4 Hold onto the bar for support, keeping your back straight and core engaged.
Step:5 Raise your heels as high as possible, lifting your body weight onto the balls of your feet.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your heels back down to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: elevaciones de pantorrillas invertidas en máquina Smith
instructions: Step:1 Ajusta la barra de la máquina Smith a una altura justo debajo de los hombros.
Step:2 Párate frente a la barra con los pies al ancho de las caderas y las puntas hacia adelante.
Step:3 Coloca las almohadillas de los pies en el borde de un escalón o plataforma, con los talones colgando.
Step:4 Agárrate a la barra para mantener el equilibrio, manteniendo la espalda recta y el core activado.
Step:5 Eleva los talones lo más alto posible, cargando el peso sobre las almohadillas de los pies.
Step:6 Haz una pausa momentánea en la parte superior, luego baja lentamente los talones a la posición inicial.
Step:7 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell reverse bench press
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on a bench with your feet flat on the ground and your knees bent.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell in each hand with an overhand grip, palms facing towards your feet.
Step:3 Extend your arms straight up towards the ceiling, keeping a slight bend in your elbows.
Step:4 Slowly lower the dumbbells towards your chest, allowing your elbows to flare out to the sides.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push the dumbbells back up to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell reverse bench press
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on a bench with your feet flat on the ground and your knees bent.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell in each hand with an overhand grip, palms facing towards your feet.
Step:3 Extend your arms straight up towards the ceiling, keeping a slight bend in your elbows.
Step:4 Slowly lower the dumbbells towards your chest, allowing your elbows to flare out to the sides.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push the dumbbells back up to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: press con mancuerna en banco invertido
instructions: Step:1 Acuéstate boca arriba en un banco con los pies apoyados en el suelo y las rodillas dobladas.
Step:2 Sostén una mancuerna en cada mano con agarre por encima, palmas mirando hacia tus pies.
Step:3 Extiende los brazos hacia el techo, manteniendo una ligera flexión en los codos.
Step:4 Baja lentamente las mancuernas hacia el pecho, permitiendo que los codos se abran hacia los lados.
Step:5 Haz una pausa breve en la parte baja, luego empuja las mancuernas de regreso a la posición inicial.
Step:6 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell cross body hammer curl v. 2
instructions: Step:1 Stand up straight with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing your body.
Step:2 Keep your elbows close to your torso and your upper arms stationary.
Step:3 Exhale and curl the weights while contracting your biceps, bringing the dumbbells as close to your opposite shoulder as possible.
Step:4 Hold the contracted position for a brief pause as you squeeze your biceps.
Step:5 Inhale and slowly begin to lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell cross body hammer curl v. 2
instructions: Step:1 Stand up straight with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing your body.
Step:2 Keep your elbows close to your torso and your upper arms stationary.
Step:3 Exhale and curl the weights while contracting your biceps, bringing the dumbbells as close to your opposite shoulder as possible.
Step:4 Hold the contracted position for a brief pause as you squeeze your biceps.
Step:5 Inhale and slowly begin to lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: curl martillo cruzado con mancuerna v. 2
instructions: Step:1 Párate erguido con una mancuerna en cada mano, palmas mirando hacia el cuerpo.
Step:2 Mantén los codos pegados al torso y la parte superior de los brazos inmóvil.
Step:3 Exhala y haz el curl mientras contraes los bíceps, llevando las mancuernas lo más cerca posible del hombro opuesto.
Step:4 Mantén la posición contraída brevemente apretando los bíceps.
Step:5 Inhala y baja lentamente las mancuernas hasta la posición inicial.
Step:6 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell lying pronation
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on a bench with your chest facing down and your arms extended straight down, holding a dumbbell in each hand.
Step:2 Rotate your palms so they are facing up.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arms stationary, exhale and curl the dumbbells as you rotate your palms to face down.
Step:4 Inhale and slowly lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell lying pronation
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on a bench with your chest facing down and your arms extended straight down, holding a dumbbell in each hand.
Step:2 Rotate your palms so they are facing up.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arms stationary, exhale and curl the dumbbells as you rotate your palms to face down.
Step:4 Inhale and slowly lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: pronación tumbado con mancuerna
instructions: Step:1 Acuéstate boca abajo en un banco con el pecho hacia el suelo y los brazos extendidos hacia abajo, sosteniendo una mancuerna en cada mano.
Step:2 Rota las palmas para que queden mirando hacia arriba.
Step:3 Manteniendo la parte superior de los brazos inmóvil, exhala y realiza el curl de las mancuernas mientras rotas las palmas para que queden mirando hacia abajo.
Step:4 Inhala y baja lentamente las mancuernas a la posición inicial.
Step:5 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: cable kneeling triceps extension
instructions: Step:1 Attach a rope handle to a high pulley and kneel down facing the cable machine.
Step:2 Grasp the rope with a neutral grip (palms facing each other) and bring your hands to the sides of your head.
Step:3 Keep your elbows close to your head and your upper arms stationary throughout the exercise.
Step:4 Extend your forearms by contracting your triceps until your arms are fully extended.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then slowly return to the starting position by bending your elbows.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: cable kneeling triceps extension
instructions: Step:1 Attach a rope handle to a high pulley and kneel down facing the cable machine.
Step:2 Grasp the rope with a neutral grip (palms facing each other) and bring your hands to the sides of your head.
Step:3 Keep your elbows close to your head and your upper arms stationary throughout the exercise.
Step:4 Extend your forearms by contracting your triceps until your arms are fully extended.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then slowly return to the starting position by bending your elbows.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: extensión de tríceps arrodillado con cable
instructions: Step:1 Coloca un asa de cuerda en una polea alta y arrodíllate frente a la máquina de cables.
Step:2 Agarra la cuerda con agarre neutral (palmas enfrentadas) y lleva las manos a los lados de la cabeza.
Step:3 Mantén los codos cerca de la cabeza y la parte superior de los brazos inmóvil durante todo el ejercicio.
Step:4 Extiende los antebrazos contrayendo los tríceps hasta estirar completamente los brazos.
Step:5 Haz una pausa, luego regresa lentamente a la posición inicial flexionando los codos.
Step:6 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell decline one arm fly
instructions: Step:1 Lie down on a decline bench with a dumbbell in one hand, resting it on your thigh.
Step:2 Using your thigh to help raise the dumbbell, lift it up to shoulder width with your palm facing your torso.
Step:3 Rotate your wrist so that the palm of your hand is facing forward.
Step:4 As you breathe in, lower the dumbbell slowly to the side until you feel a stretch in your chest.
Step:5 Exhale and use your chest muscles to bring the dumbbell back up to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

translations.name: dumbbell decline one arm fly
instructions: Step:1 Lie down on a decline bench with a dumbbell in one hand, resting it on your thigh.
Step:2 Using your thigh to help raise the dumbbell, lift it up to shoulder width with your palm facing your torso.
Step:3 Rotate your wrist so that the palm of your hand is facing forward.
Step:4 As you breathe in, lower the dumbbell slowly to the side until you feel a stretch in your chest.
Step:5 Exhale and use your chest muscles to bring the dumbbell back up to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

translations.name: aperturas declinadas con mancuerna a un brazo
instructions: Step:1 Acuéstate en un banco declinado con una mancuerna en una mano, apoyada sobre tu muslo.
Step:2 Usa el muslo para ayudar a subir la mancuerna hasta la altura del hombro con la palma hacia tu torso.
Step:3 Rota la muñeca para que la palma de la mano mire hacia adelante.
Step:4 Al inhalar, baja la mancuerna lentamente hacia un lado hasta sentir un estiramiento en el pecho.
Step:5 Exhala y usa los músculos del pecho para volver a la posición inicial.
Step:6 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambia de brazo.

name: straddle planche
instructions: Step:1 Start in a push-up position with your hands shoulder-width apart and your feet spread wide apart.
Step:2 Engage your core and slowly shift your weight forward, bringing your shoulders over your hands.
Step:3 Bend your elbows and lower your body towards the ground, keeping your elbows close to your sides.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push through your hands to straighten your arms and lift your body back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: straddle planche
instructions: Step:1 Start in a push-up position with your hands shoulder-width apart and your feet spread wide apart.
Step:2 Engage your core and slowly shift your weight forward, bringing your shoulders over your hands.
Step:3 Bend your elbows and lower your body towards the ground, keeping your elbows close to your sides.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push through your hands to straighten your arms and lift your body back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: planche con piernas abiertas
instructions: Step:1 Comienza en posición de flexión con las manos a la altura de los hombros y los pies muy separados.
Step:2 Activa el core y desplaza lentamente el peso hacia adelante, llevando los hombros sobre las manos.
Step:3 Flexiona los codos y baja el cuerpo hacia el suelo, manteniendo los codos cerca de los costados.
Step:4 Haz una pausa en la parte baja, luego empuja con las manos para estirar los brazos y elevar el cuerpo de regreso a la posición inicial.
Step:5 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: self assisted inverse leg curl
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back on a mat or bench with your legs extended.
Step:2 Place your hands by your sides or under your glutes for support.
Step:3 Bend your knees and lift your feet off the ground, bringing your thighs towards your chest.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your legs back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: self assisted inverse leg curl
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back on a mat or bench with your legs extended.
Step:2 Place your hands by your sides or under your glutes for support.
Step:3 Bend your knees and lift your feet off the ground, bringing your thighs towards your chest.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your legs back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: curl inverso de piernas asistido
instructions: Step:1 Acuéstate boca arriba sobre una colchoneta o banco con las piernas extendidas.
Step:2 Coloca las manos a los costados o debajo de los glúteos para apoyo.
Step:3 Flexiona las rodillas y levanta los pies del suelo, acercando los muslos hacia el pecho.
Step:4 Haz una pausa en la parte alta, luego baja lentamente las piernas hasta la posición inicial.
Step:5 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: cable hammer curl (with rope)
instructions: Step:1 Stand upright with your feet shoulder-width apart and a slight bend in your knees.
Step:2 Hold the cable rope attachment with an underhand grip, palms facing each other, and your arms fully extended.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arms stationary, exhale and curl the weights while contracting your biceps.
Step:4 Continue to raise the cable rope attachment until your biceps are fully contracted and the rope is at shoulder level.
Step:5 Hold the contracted position for a brief pause as you squeeze your biceps.
Step:6 Inhale and slowly begin to lower the cable rope attachment back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: cable hammer curl (with rope)
instructions: Step:1 Stand upright with your feet shoulder-width apart and a slight bend in your knees.
Step:2 Hold the cable rope attachment with an underhand grip, palms facing each other, and your arms fully extended.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arms stationary, exhale and curl the weights while contracting your biceps.
