Step:4 Continue to raise the cable rope attachment until your biceps are fully contracted and the rope is at shoulder level.
Step:5 Hold the contracted position for a brief pause as you squeeze your biceps.
Step:6 Inhale and slowly begin to lower the cable rope attachment back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: curl martillo con cable (con cuerda)
instructions: Step:1 Párate erguido con los pies al ancho de los hombros y una ligera flexión en las rodillas.
Step:2 Sujeta la cuerda del cable con agarre por debajo, palmas enfrentadas, y los brazos completamente extendidos.
Step:3 Manteniendo la parte superior de los brazos inmóvil, exhala y realiza el curl contrayendo los bíceps.
Step:4 Continúa elevando la cuerda hasta que los bíceps estén totalmente contraídos y la cuerda llegue al nivel de los hombros.
Step:5 Mantén la posición contraída por un breve momento apretando los bíceps.
Step:6 Inhala y baja lentamente la cuerda hasta la posición inicial.
Step:7 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: swimmer kicks v. 2 (male)
instructions: Step:1 Lie face down on a mat with your arms extended overhead.
Step:2 Engage your core and lift your chest and legs off the ground simultaneously.
Step:3 Kick your legs up and down in a fluttering motion, as if you were swimming.
Step:4 Continue kicking for the desired number of repetitions.
Step:5 Lower your chest and legs back down to the starting position.

translations.name: swimmer kicks v. 2 (male)
instructions: Step:1 Lie face down on a mat with your arms extended overhead.
Step:2 Engage your core and lift your chest and legs off the ground simultaneously.
Step:3 Kick your legs up and down in a fluttering motion, as if you were swimming.
Step:4 Continue kicking for the desired number of repetitions.
Step:5 Lower your chest and legs back down to the starting position.

translations.name: patadas de nadador v. 2 (masculino)
instructions: Step:1 Acuéstate boca abajo sobre una colchoneta con los brazos extendidos por encima de la cabeza.
Step:2 Activa el core y eleva simultáneamente el pecho y las piernas del suelo.
Step:3 Mueve las piernas arriba y abajo en un movimiento de aleteo, como si nadaras.
Step:4 Continúa pateando por el número deseado de repeticiones.
Step:5 Baja el pecho y las piernas hasta la posición inicial.

name: smith machine bicep curl
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the height of the smith machine bar to be at waist level.
Step:2 Stand facing the smith machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Grasp the bar with an underhand grip, hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:4 Keep your elbows close to your sides and your upper arms stationary.
Step:5 Exhale and curl the bar up towards your shoulders, contracting your biceps.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the top of the movement, squeezing your biceps.
Step:7 Inhale and slowly lower the bar back down to the starting position.
Step:8 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: smith machine bicep curl
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the height of the smith machine bar to be at waist level.
Step:2 Stand facing the smith machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Grasp the bar with an underhand grip, hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:4 Keep your elbows close to your sides and your upper arms stationary.
Step:5 Exhale and curl the bar up towards your shoulders, contracting your biceps.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the top of the movement, squeezing your biceps.
Step:7 Inhale and slowly lower the bar back down to the starting position.
Step:8 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: curl de bíceps en máquina Smith
instructions: Step:1 Ajusta la altura de la barra de la máquina Smith al nivel de la cintura.
Step:2 Párate frente a la máquina Smith con los pies al ancho de los hombros.
Step:3 Agarra la barra con agarre supino (palmas hacia arriba), manos ligeramente más separadas que el ancho de los hombros.
Step:4 Mantén los codos cerca de los costados y la parte superior de los brazos inmóvil.
Step:5 Exhala y eleva la barra hacia los hombros contrayendo los bíceps.
Step:6 Haz una pausa breve en la parte alta del movimiento, apretando los bíceps.
Step:7 Inhala y baja lentamente la barra hasta la posición inicial.
Step:8 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell one leg fly on exercise ball
instructions: Step:1 Sit on an exercise ball with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing each other.
Step:2 Place one foot on the ground and extend the other leg straight out in front of you.
Step:3 Lean forward slightly and bring your arms out to the sides, keeping a slight bend in your elbows.
Step:4 Slowly lower the dumbbells down and out to the sides, feeling a stretch in your chest.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then squeeze your chest muscles to bring the dumbbells back up to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch legs and repeat.

translations.name: dumbbell one leg fly on exercise ball
instructions: Step:1 Sit on an exercise ball with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing each other.
Step:2 Place one foot on the ground and extend the other leg straight out in front of you.
Step:3 Lean forward slightly and bring your arms out to the sides, keeping a slight bend in your elbows.
Step:4 Slowly lower the dumbbells down and out to the sides, feeling a stretch in your chest.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then squeeze your chest muscles to bring the dumbbells back up to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch legs and repeat.

translations.name: aperturas a una pierna con mancuerna sobre balón de ejercicio
instructions: Step:1 Siéntate sobre un balón de ejercicio con una mancuerna en cada mano, palmas enfrentadas.
Step:2 Apoya un pie en el suelo y extiende la otra pierna recta hacia adelante.
Step:3 Inclínate ligeramente hacia adelante y abre los brazos hacia los lados, manteniendo una ligera flexión en los codos.
Step:4 Baja lentamente las mancuernas hacia los lados, sintiendo un estiramiento en el pecho.
Step:5 Haz una pausa por un momento, luego aprieta los músculos del pecho para volver a la posición inicial.
Step:6 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambia de pierna.

name: cable lying fly
instructions: Step:1 Attach the handles to the cables and lie flat on a bench with your feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Hold the handles with your palms facing each other and your arms extended straight above your chest.
Step:3 Keeping a slight bend in your elbows, lower your arms out to the sides in a wide arc until you feel a stretch in your chest.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then squeeze your chest muscles to bring your arms back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: cable lying fly
instructions: Step:1 Attach the handles to the cables and lie flat on a bench with your feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Hold the handles with your palms facing each other and your arms extended straight above your chest.
Step:3 Keeping a slight bend in your elbows, lower your arms out to the sides in a wide arc until you feel a stretch in your chest.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then squeeze your chest muscles to bring your arms back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: aperturas acostado con cable
instructions: Step:1 Coloca las empuñaduras en los cables y acuéstate en un banco con los pies apoyados en el suelo.
Step:2 Sujeta las empuñaduras con las palmas enfrentadas y los brazos extendidos sobre el pecho.
Step:3 Manteniendo una ligera flexión en los codos, baja los brazos hacia los lados en un amplio arco hasta sentir un estiramiento en el pecho.
Step:4 Haz una pausa y luego aprieta los músculos del pecho para traer los brazos de regreso a la posición inicial.
Step:5 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell reverse wrist curl
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench or chair with your feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell in each hand with an overhand grip, palms facing down.
Step:3 Rest your forearms on your thighs, allowing your wrists to hang off the edge.
Step:4 Slowly curl your wrists upward, bringing the dumbbells towards your body.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbells back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell reverse wrist curl
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench or chair with your feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell in each hand with an overhand grip, palms facing down.
Step:3 Rest your forearms on your thighs, allowing your wrists to hang off the edge.
Step:4 Slowly curl your wrists upward, bringing the dumbbells towards your body.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbells back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: curl de muñeca reverso con mancuerna
instructions: Step:1 Siéntate en un banco o silla con los pies apoyados en el suelo.
Step:2 Sostén una mancuerna en cada mano con agarre por encima, palmas mirando hacia abajo.
Step:3 Apoya los antebrazos sobre los muslos, dejando las muñecas por fuera del borde.
Step:4 Flexiona lentamente las muñecas hacia arriba, llevando las mancuernas hacia el cuerpo.
Step:5 Haz una pausa momentánea en la parte alta, luego baja lentamente las mancuernas a la posición inicial.
Step:6 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell one arm pullover on exercise ball
instructions: Step:1 Sit on an exercise ball with your feet flat on the ground and your knees bent at a 90-degree angle.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell with one hand and extend your arm straight up above your chest.
Step:3 Slowly lower the dumbbell behind your head while keeping your arm straight.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then raise the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

translations.name: dumbbell one arm pullover on exercise ball
instructions: Step:1 Sit on an exercise ball with your feet flat on the ground and your knees bent at a 90-degree angle.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell with one hand and extend your arm straight up above your chest.
Step:3 Slowly lower the dumbbell behind your head while keeping your arm straight.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then raise the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

translations.name: pullover a un brazo con mancuerna sobre balón de ejercicio
instructions: Step:1 Siéntate sobre un balón de ejercicio con los pies apoyados en el suelo y las rodillas dobladas a 90 grados.
Step:2 Sujeta una mancuerna con una mano y extiende el brazo por encima del pecho.
Step:3 Baja lentamente la mancuerna detrás de la cabeza manteniendo el brazo recto.
Step:4 Haz una pausa y luego eleva la mancuerna de regreso a la posición inicial.
Step:5 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambia de brazo.

name: incline reverse grip push-up
instructions: Step:1 Place your hands on the edge of a bench or elevated surface, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Extend your legs behind you, resting on the balls of your feet, creating a straight line from your head to your heels.
Step:3 Lower your chest towards the bench by bending your elbows, keeping them close to your sides.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push yourself back up to the starting position by extending your arms.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: incline reverse grip push-up
instructions: Step:1 Place your hands on the edge of a bench or elevated surface, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Extend your legs behind you, resting on the balls of your feet, creating a straight line from your head to your heels.
Step:3 Lower your chest towards the bench by bending your elbows, keeping them close to your sides.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push yourself back up to the starting position by extending your arms.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: flexión inclinada con agarre invertido
instructions: Step:1 Coloca las manos en el borde de un banco o superficie elevada, un poco más ancho que el ancho de los hombros.
Step:2 Extiende las piernas hacia atrás apoyándote sobre las puntas de los pies, formando una línea recta desde la cabeza hasta los talones.
Step:3 Baja el pecho hacia el banco flexionando los codos y manteniéndolos cerca de los costados.
Step:4 Haz una pausa en la parte baja, luego empuja hacia arriba extendiendo los brazos hasta la posición inicial.
Step:5 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: quads
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Lower your body by bending your knees and pushing your hips back as if sitting on a chair.
Step:3 Keep your chest up and your back straight.
Step:4 Lower yourself until your thighs are parallel to the ground.
Step:5 Push through your heels to return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: quads
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Lower your body by bending your knees and pushing your hips back as if sitting on a chair.
Step:3 Keep your chest up and your back straight.
Step:4 Lower yourself until your thighs are parallel to the ground.
Step:5 Push through your heels to return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: cuádriceps
instructions: Step:1 Párate con los pies al ancho de los hombros.
Step:2 Baja el cuerpo flexionando las rodillas y empujando las caderas hacia atrás como si te sentaras en una silla.
Step:3 Mantén el pecho hacia arriba y la espalda recta.
Step:4 Desciende hasta que los muslos queden paralelos al suelo.
Step:5 Impulsa con los talones para regresar a la posición inicial.
Step:6 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: kettlebell figure 8
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a kettlebell in one hand.
Step:2 Bend your knees slightly and hinge forward at the hips, keeping your back straight.
Step:3 Pass the kettlebell between your legs, switching hands as it reaches the back of your legs.
Step:4 As the kettlebell comes forward, pass it to the other hand between your legs.
Step:5 Continue passing the kettlebell between your legs in a figure 8 motion.
Step:6 Maintain a steady pace and engage your core throughout the exercise.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: kettlebell figure 8
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a kettlebell in one hand.
Step:2 Bend your knees slightly and hinge forward at the hips, keeping your back straight.
Step:3 Pass the kettlebell between your legs, switching hands as it reaches the back of your legs.
Step:4 As the kettlebell comes forward, pass it to the other hand between your legs.
Step:5 Continue passing the kettlebell between your legs in a figure 8 motion.
Step:6 Maintain a steady pace and engage your core throughout the exercise.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: figura 8 con kettlebell
instructions: Step:1 Párate con los pies al ancho de los hombros, sosteniendo un kettlebell en una mano.
Step:2 Flexiona ligeramente las rodillas e inclínate desde las caderas, manteniendo la espalda recta.
Step:3 Pasa el kettlebell entre las piernas, cambiando de mano cuando llegue a la parte posterior de las piernas.
Step:4 Cuando el kettlebell avance, pásalo entre las piernas a la otra mano.
Step:5 Continúa pasando el kettlebell entre las piernas en un movimiento de figura 8.
Step:6 Mantén un ritmo constante y activa el core durante todo el ejercicio.
Step:7 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell high curl
instructions: Step:1 Stand up straight with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing forward.
Step:2 Keep your upper arms stationary and curl the dumbbells as high as possible while contracting your biceps.
Step:3 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell high curl
instructions: Step:1 Stand up straight with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing forward.
Step:2 Keep your upper arms stationary and curl the dumbbells as high as possible while contracting your biceps.
Step:3 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: curl alto con mancuerna
instructions: Step:1 Párate erguido con una mancuerna en cada mano, palmas hacia adelante.
Step:2 Mantén la parte superior de los brazos inmóvil y realiza el curl elevando las mancuernas lo más alto posible mientras contraes los bíceps.
Step:3 Haz una pausa momentánea en la parte alta, luego baja lentamente las mancuernas hasta la posición inicial.
Step:4 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: cross body crunch
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Place your hands behind your head with your elbows pointing outwards.
Step:3 Engaging your abs, lift your upper body off the ground and twist to bring your right elbow towards your left knee.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your upper body back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat on the other side, bringing your left elbow towards your right knee.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: cross body crunch
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Place your hands behind your head with your elbows pointing outwards.
Step:3 Engaging your abs, lift your upper body off the ground and twist to bring your right elbow towards your left knee.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your upper body back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat on the other side, bringing your left elbow towards your right knee.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: crunch cruzado
instructions: Step:1 Acuéstate boca arriba con las rodillas dobladas y los pies apoyados en el suelo.
Step:2 Coloca las manos detrás de la cabeza con los codos apuntando hacia afuera.
Step:3 Activando los abdominales, eleva el torso y gira para llevar el codo derecho hacia la rodilla izquierda.
Step:4 Haz una pausa en la parte alta, luego baja lentamente el torso hasta la posición inicial.
Step:5 Repite del otro lado, llevando el codo izquierdo hacia la rodilla derecha.
Step:6 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: cable standing rear delt row (with rope)
instructions: Step:1 Stand facing a cable machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Hold the cable attachment with both hands, palms facing each other, and step back to create tension in the cable.
Step:3 Keep your back straight and your core engaged.
Step:4 Pull the cable towards your body, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the peak of the movement, then slowly release the cable back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: cable standing rear delt row (with rope)
instructions: Step:1 Stand facing a cable machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Hold the cable attachment with both hands, palms facing each other, and step back to create tension in the cable.
Step:3 Keep your back straight and your core engaged.
Step:4 Pull the cable towards your body, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the peak of the movement, then slowly release the cable back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: remo de deltoides posterior de pie (con cuerda)
instructions: Step:1 Párate frente a una máquina de cables con los pies al ancho de los hombros.
Step:2 Sujeta el accesorio del cable con ambas manos, palmas enfrentadas, y da un paso atrás para crear tensión.
Step:3 Mantén la espalda recta y el core activado.
Step:4 Tira del cable hacia el cuerpo, apretando los omóplatos.
Step:5 Haz una pausa en el punto máximo del movimiento, luego suelta lentamente el cable hasta la posición inicial.
Step:6 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: russian twist
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the ground with your knees bent and feet flat on the floor.
Step:2 Lean back slightly while keeping your back straight and your core engaged.
Step:3 Hold your hands together in front of your chest or hold a weight if desired.
Step:4 Lift your feet off the ground, balancing on your sit bones.
Step:5 Twist your torso to the right, bringing your hands or weight towards the right side of your body.
Step:6 Pause for a moment, then twist your torso to the left, bringing your hands or weight towards the left side of your body.
Step:7 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: russian twist
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the ground with your knees bent and feet flat on the floor.
Step:2 Lean back slightly while keeping your back straight and your core engaged.
Step:3 Hold your hands together in front of your chest or hold a weight if desired.
Step:4 Lift your feet off the ground, balancing on your sit bones.
Step:5 Twist your torso to the right, bringing your hands or weight towards the right side of your body.
Step:6 Pause for a moment, then twist your torso to the left, bringing your hands or weight towards the left side of your body.
Step:7 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: giro ruso
instructions: Step:1 Siéntate en el suelo con las rodillas dobladas y los pies apoyados en el suelo.
Step:2 Inclínate ligeramente hacia atrás manteniendo la espalda recta y el core activado.
Step:3 Junta las manos frente al pecho o sujeta un peso si lo deseas.
Step:4 Eleva los pies del suelo, equilibrándote sobre los isquiones.
Step:5 Gira el torso hacia la derecha llevando las manos o el peso hacia ese lado.
Step:6 Haz una pausa, luego gira el torso hacia la izquierda llevando las manos o el peso hacia ese lado.
Step:7 Continúa alternando lados por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: ez barbell anti gravity press
instructions: Step:1 Start by standing with your feet shoulder-width apart and holding the ez barbell with an overhand grip.
Step:2 Raise the barbell to shoulder height, keeping your elbows slightly bent and your palms facing forward.
Step:3 Press the barbell overhead, extending your arms fully.
Step:4 Lower the barbell back to shoulder height and repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: ez barbell anti gravity press
instructions: Step:1 Start by standing with your feet shoulder-width apart and holding the ez barbell with an overhand grip.
Step:2 Raise the barbell to shoulder height, keeping your elbows slightly bent and your palms facing forward.
Step:3 Press the barbell overhead, extending your arms fully.
Step:4 Lower the barbell back to shoulder height and repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: press antigravedad con barra EZ
instructions: Step:1 Comienza de pie con los pies al ancho de los hombros y sosteniendo la barra EZ con agarre por encima.
Step:2 Eleva la barra hasta la altura de los hombros, manteniendo los codos ligeramente flexionados y las palmas hacia adelante.
Step:3 Presiona la barra por encima de la cabeza extendiendo completamente los brazos.
Step:4 Baja la barra de nuevo hasta la altura de los hombros y repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: backward jump
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Bend your knees slightly and jump backwards, pushing off with both feet.
Step:3 Land softly on the balls of your feet, bending your knees to absorb the impact.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: backward jump
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Bend your knees slightly and jump backwards, pushing off with both feet.
Step:3 Land softly on the balls of your feet, bending your knees to absorb the impact.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: salto hacia atrás
instructions: Step:1 Párate con los pies al ancho de los hombros.
Step:2 Flexiona ligeramente las rodillas y salta hacia atrás, impulsándote con ambos pies.
Step:3 Aterriza suavemente sobre las almohadillas de los pies, flexionando las rodillas para absorber el impacto.
Step:4 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: kettlebell thruster
instructions: Step:1 Start by standing with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a kettlebell in front of your chest with both hands, palms facing each other.
Step:2 Lower into a squat position by bending your knees and pushing your hips back, keeping your chest up and your back straight.
Step:3 As you reach the bottom of the squat, explosively drive through your heels to stand up, simultaneously pressing the kettlebell overhead.
Step:4 Lock out your arms at the top of the movement, fully extending your elbows.
Step:5 Lower the kettlebell back to the starting position by reversing the movement, bending your elbows and lowering the weight back to your chest.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: kettlebell thruster
instructions: Step:1 Start by standing with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a kettlebell in front of your chest with both hands, palms facing each other.
Step:2 Lower into a squat position by bending your knees and pushing your hips back, keeping your chest up and your back straight.
Step:3 As you reach the bottom of the squat, explosively drive through your heels to stand up, simultaneously pressing the kettlebell overhead.
Step:4 Lock out your arms at the top of the movement, fully extending your elbows.
Step:5 Lower the kettlebell back to the starting position by reversing the movement, bending your elbows and lowering the weight back to your chest.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: thruster con kettlebell
instructions: Step:1 Comienza de pie con los pies al ancho de los hombros, sosteniendo un kettlebell frente al pecho con ambas manos, palmas enfrentadas.
Step:2 Baja a una sentadilla flexionando las rodillas y empujando las caderas hacia atrás, manteniendo el pecho erguido y la espalda recta.
Step:3 Al llegar al fondo, impulsa explosivamente con los talones para ponerte de pie y, al mismo tiempo, presiona el kettlebell por encima de la cabeza.
Step:4 Bloquea los brazos en la parte alta extendiendo completamente los codos.
Step:5 Baja el kettlebell a la posición inicial invirtiendo el movimiento, flexionando los codos y llevando el peso de vuelta al pecho.
Step:6 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: barbell rack pull
instructions: Step:1 Set up a barbell on a rack at knee height.
Step:2 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, toes pointing slightly outwards.
Step:3 Bend at the hips and knees to lower yourself down and grip the barbell with an overhand grip, hands shoulder-width apart.
Step:4 Engage your core and lift the barbell by extending your hips and knees, pulling your shoulders back and squeezing your glutes at the top.
Step:5 Lower the barbell back down to the starting position by bending at the hips and knees.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: barbell rack pull
instructions: Step:1 Set up a barbell on a rack at knee height.
Step:2 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, toes pointing slightly outwards.
Step:3 Bend at the hips and knees to lower yourself down and grip the barbell with an overhand grip, hands shoulder-width apart.
Step:4 Engage your core and lift the barbell by extending your hips and knees, pulling your shoulders back and squeezing your glutes at the top.
Step:5 Lower the barbell back down to the starting position by bending at the hips and knees.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: rack pull con barra
instructions: Step:1 Coloca una barra en un rack a la altura de las rodillas.
Step:2 Párate con los pies al ancho de los hombros, con las puntas ligeramente hacia afuera.
Step:3 Flexiona las caderas y las rodillas para bajar y agarrar la barra con agarre por encima, manos al ancho de los hombros.
Step:4 Activa el core y levanta la barra extendiendo las caderas y las rodillas, llevando los hombros hacia atrás y apretando los glúteos en la parte superior.
Step:5 Baja la barra hasta la posición inicial flexionando las caderas y las rodillas.
Step:6 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: resistance band seated shoulder press
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a chair or bench with your back straight and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Hold the resistance band with both hands, palms facing forward, and bring it up to shoulder level.
Step:3 Press the band overhead, extending your arms fully.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the band back down to shoulder level.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: resistance band seated shoulder press
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a chair or bench with your back straight and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Hold the resistance band with both hands, palms facing forward, and bring it up to shoulder level.
Step:3 Press the band overhead, extending your arms fully.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the band back down to shoulder level.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: press de hombros sentado con banda de resistencia
instructions: Step:1 Siéntate en una silla o banco con la espalda recta y los pies apoyados en el suelo.
Step:2 Sujeta la banda de resistencia con ambas manos, palmas hacia adelante, y llévala hasta la altura de los hombros.
Step:3 Presiona la banda por encima de la cabeza, extendiendo completamente los brazos.
Step:4 Haz una pausa momentánea en la parte alta, luego baja lentamente la banda hasta la altura de los hombros.
Step:5 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: triceps press
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your knees slightly bent.
Step:2 Extend your arms straight out in front of you, parallel to the ground.
Step:3 Bend your elbows and lower your body towards the ground, keeping your upper arms close to your sides.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push yourself back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: triceps press
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your knees slightly bent.
Step:2 Extend your arms straight out in front of you, parallel to the ground.
Step:3 Bend your elbows and lower your body towards the ground, keeping your upper arms close to your sides.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push yourself back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: press de tríceps
instructions: Paso:1 Párate con los pies al ancho de los hombros y las rodillas ligeramente flexionadas.
Paso:2 Extiende los brazos al frente, paralelos al suelo.
Paso:3 Flexiona los codos y baja el cuerpo hacia el suelo manteniendo la parte superior de los brazos pegada a los costados.
Paso:4 Haz una pausa un momento abajo y luego empuja para volver a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite las repeticiones deseadas.

name: dumbbell one arm bench fly
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a flat bench with a dumbbell in one hand, resting it on top of your thigh.
Step:2 Lie back on the bench, keeping the dumbbell pressed against your thigh.
Step:3 Using your free hand, help lift the dumbbell up to the starting position.
Step:4 Hold the dumbbell directly above your shoulder with your arm extended and palm facing inward.
Step:5 Lower the dumbbell out to the side in a wide arc, keeping a slight bend in your elbow.
Step:6 Pause when your arm is parallel to the ground, then reverse the movement and bring the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms and repeat.

translations.name: dumbbell one arm bench fly
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a flat bench with a dumbbell in one hand, resting it on top of your thigh.
Step:2 Lie back on the bench, keeping the dumbbell pressed against your thigh.
Step:3 Using your free hand, help lift the dumbbell up to the starting position.
Step:4 Hold the dumbbell directly above your shoulder with your arm extended and palm facing inward.
Step:5 Lower the dumbbell out to the side in a wide arc, keeping a slight bend in your elbow.
Step:6 Pause when your arm is parallel to the ground, then reverse the movement and bring the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms and repeat.

translations.name: aperturas en banco a una mano con mancuerna
instructions: Paso:1 Siéntate en un banco plano con una mancuerna en una mano, apoyándola sobre el muslo.
Paso:2 Recuéstate en el banco manteniendo la mancuerna presionada contra el muslo.
Paso:3 Con la mano libre, ayuda a llevar la mancuerna a la posición inicial.
Paso:4 Sostén la mancuerna directamente encima del hombro con el brazo extendido y la palma hacia adentro.
Paso:5 Desciende la mancuerna hacia el costado en un arco amplio, manteniendo una ligera flexión en el codo.
Paso:6 Pausa cuando el brazo quede paralelo al suelo, luego invierte el movimiento y regresa la mancuerna a la posición inicial.
Paso:7 Repite las repeticiones deseadas, cambia de brazo y repite.

name: arms overhead full sit-up (male)
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Extend your arms overhead, keeping them straight.
Step:3 Engaging your abs, slowly lift your upper body off the ground, curling forward until your torso is upright.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your upper body back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: arms overhead full sit-up (male)
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Extend your arms overhead, keeping them straight.
Step:3 Engaging your abs, slowly lift your upper body off the ground, curling forward until your torso is upright.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your upper body back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: abdominal completo con brazos extendidos (hombre)
instructions: Paso:1 Acuéstate boca arriba con las rodillas flexionadas y los pies planos en el suelo.
Paso:2 Extiende los brazos por encima de la cabeza, manteniéndolos rectos.
Paso:3 Activando los abdominales, eleva lentamente el torso del suelo curvándolo hacia adelante hasta quedar erguido.
Paso:4 Pausa un momento arriba y desciende lentamente el torso a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite las repeticiones deseadas.

name: impossible dips
instructions: Step:1 Position yourself between two parallel bars with your arms fully extended and your body suspended in the air.
Step:2 Bend your knees and cross your ankles.
Step:3 Lower your body by bending your elbows until your upper arms are parallel to the ground.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then push yourself back up to the starting position by straightening your arms.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: impossible dips
instructions: Step:1 Position yourself between two parallel bars with your arms fully extended and your body suspended in the air.
Step:2 Bend your knees and cross your ankles.
Step:3 Lower your body by bending your elbows until your upper arms are parallel to the ground.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then push yourself back up to the starting position by straightening your arms.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: fondos imposibles
instructions: Paso:1 Colócate entre dos barras paralelas con los brazos completamente extendidos y el cuerpo suspendido en el aire.
Paso:2 Flexiona las rodillas y cruza los tobillos.
Paso:3 Desciende doblando los codos hasta que la parte superior de los brazos quede paralela al suelo.
Paso:4 Pausa un momento y luego empuja para volver a la posición inicial extendiendo los brazos.
Paso:5 Repite las repeticiones deseadas.

name: dumbbell lying one arm rear lateral raise
instructions: Step:1 Lie face down on a flat bench with a dumbbell in one hand, hanging towards the floor.
Step:2 Keep your arm straight and lift the dumbbell out to the side, away from your body.
Step:3 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbell back down to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch to the other arm.

translations.name: dumbbell lying one arm rear lateral raise
instructions: Step:1 Lie face down on a flat bench with a dumbbell in one hand, hanging towards the floor.
Step:2 Keep your arm straight and lift the dumbbell out to the side, away from your body.
Step:3 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbell back down to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch to the other arm.

translations.name: elevación lateral posterior acostado a una mano con mancuerna
instructions: Paso:1 Acuéstate boca abajo en un banco plano con una mancuerna en una mano, dejándola colgar hacia el piso.
Paso:2 Mantén el brazo recto y eleva la mancuerna hacia el costado, alejándola del cuerpo.
Paso:3 Pausa un momento arriba y baja lentamente la mancuerna a la posición inicial.
Paso:4 Repite las repeticiones deseadas y cambia al otro brazo.

name: dumbbell press on exercise ball
instructions: Step:1 Sit on an exercise ball with your feet flat on the ground and dumbbells in each hand, resting on your thighs.
Step:2 Slowly walk your feet forward, rolling the exercise ball until your lower back is supported on the ball and your knees are at a 90-degree angle.
Step:3 Raise the dumbbells to shoulder height, palms facing forward.
Step:4 Press the dumbbells upward until your arms are fully extended.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell press on exercise ball
instructions: Step:1 Sit on an exercise ball with your feet flat on the ground and dumbbells in each hand, resting on your thighs.
Step:2 Slowly walk your feet forward, rolling the exercise ball until your lower back is supported on the ball and your knees are at a 90-degree angle.
Step:3 Raise the dumbbells to shoulder height, palms facing forward.
Step:4 Press the dumbbells upward until your arms are fully extended.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: press con mancuernas sobre balón de ejercicio
instructions: Paso:1 Siéntate sobre un balón de ejercicio con los pies planos en el suelo y una mancuerna en cada mano apoyada en los muslos.
Paso:2 Camina lentamente con los pies hacia adelante rodando el balón hasta apoyar la zona lumbar y quedar con las rodillas a 90 grados.
Paso:3 Eleva las mancuernas a la altura de los hombros con las palmas al frente.
Paso:4 Realiza un press elevando las mancuernas hasta extender completamente los brazos.
Paso:5 Pausa un momento arriba y baja lentamente las mancuernas a la posición inicial.
Paso:6 Repite las repeticiones deseadas.

name: lever seated calf press
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat of the machine so that your shoulders are aligned with the lever pad.
Step:2 Place your toes on the lower portion of the platform and position your knees under the lever pad.
Step:3 Grasp the handles on the sides of the seat for stability.
Step:4 Press the lever pad down by extending your ankles, lifting your heels as high as possible.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top of the movement, then slowly lower your heels back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: lever seated calf press
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat of the machine so that your shoulders are aligned with the lever pad.
Step:2 Place your toes on the lower portion of the platform and position your knees under the lever pad.
Step:3 Grasp the handles on the sides of the seat for stability.
Step:4 Press the lever pad down by extending your ankles, lifting your heels as high as possible.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top of the movement, then slowly lower your heels back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: press de pantorrillas sentado en máquina de palancas
instructions: Paso:1 Ajusta el asiento de la máquina para alinear los hombros con la almohadilla de la palanca.
Paso:2 Coloca las puntas de los pies en la parte baja de la plataforma y posiciona las rodillas bajo la almohadilla.
Paso:3 Sujeta las manijas laterales del asiento para mayor estabilidad.
Paso:4 Empuja la almohadilla extendiendo los tobillos y elevando los talones lo más alto posible.
Paso:5 Pausa un momento en la parte alta y desciende lentamente los talones a la posición inicial.
Paso:6 Repite las repeticiones deseadas.

name: dumbbell alternate side press
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a dumbbell in each hand at shoulder height.
Step:2 Press one dumbbell overhead while keeping the other dumbbell at shoulder height.
Step:3 Lower the pressed dumbbell back to shoulder height while pressing the other dumbbell overhead.
Step:4 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell alternate side press
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a dumbbell in each hand at shoulder height.
Step:2 Press one dumbbell overhead while keeping the other dumbbell at shoulder height.
Step:3 Lower the pressed dumbbell back to shoulder height while pressing the other dumbbell overhead.
Step:4 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: press alternado con mancuernas
instructions: Paso:1 Párate con los pies al ancho de los hombros, sosteniendo una mancuerna en cada mano a la altura de los hombros.
Paso:2 Realiza un press elevando una mancuerna por encima de la cabeza mientras la otra permanece a la altura del hombro.
Paso:3 Baja la mancuerna elevada al nivel del hombro mientras presionas la otra por encima de la cabeza.
Paso:4 Continúa alternando lados por las repeticiones deseadas.

name: low glute bridge on floor
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Place your arms by your sides, palms facing down.
Step:3 Engage your glutes and core, then lift your hips off the ground until your body forms a straight line from your knees to your shoulders.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, squeezing your glutes.
Step:5 Slowly lower your hips back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: low glute bridge on floor
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Place your arms by your sides, palms facing down.
Step:3 Engage your glutes and core, then lift your hips off the ground until your body forms a straight line from your knees to your shoulders.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, squeezing your glutes.
Step:5 Slowly lower your hips back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: puente de glúteos bajo en el suelo
instructions: Paso:1 Acuéstate boca arriba con las rodillas flexionadas y los pies planos en el suelo.
Paso:2 Coloca los brazos a los costados con las palmas hacia abajo.
Paso:3 Activa los glúteos y el core, luego eleva las caderas del suelo hasta formar una línea recta desde las rodillas hasta los hombros.
Paso:4 Pausa un momento arriba apretando los glúteos.
Paso:5 Desciende lentamente las caderas a la posición inicial.
Paso:6 Repite las repeticiones deseadas.

name: macro style weighted one hand pull up
instructions: Step:1 Grab the pull-up bar with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Hang from the bar with your arm fully extended and your body straight. Perform with macro intensity.
Step:3 Engage your core and pull your body up towards the bar by bending your elbow and squeezing your back muscles.
Step:4 Continue pulling until your chin is above the bar.
Step:5 Lower your body back down to the starting position with control.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: macro style weighted one hand pull up
instructions: Step:1 Grab the pull-up bar with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Hang from the bar with your arm fully extended and your body straight. Perform with macro intensity.
Step:3 Engage your core and pull your body up towards the bar by bending your elbow and squeezing your back muscles.
Step:4 Continue pulling until your chin is above the bar.
Step:5 Lower your body back down to the starting position with control.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dominada a una mano lastrada estilo macro
instructions: Paso:1 Sujeta la barra de dominadas con agarre prono, un poco más ancho que los hombros.
Paso:2 Cuelga de la barra con el brazo completamente extendido y el cuerpo recto. Realiza con intensidad macro.
Paso:3 Activa el core y tira del cuerpo hacia la barra flexionando el codo y contrayendo la espalda.
Paso:4 Continúa tirando hasta que la barbilla quede por encima de la barra.
Paso:5 Desciende el cuerpo con control hasta la posición inicial.
Paso:6 Repite las repeticiones deseadas.

name: inverted style smith seated shoulder press
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height so that the handles are at shoulder level.
Step:2 Sit on the machine with your back against the pad and your feet flat on the floor.
Step:3 Grasp the handles with an overhand grip and lift them off the supports, extending your arms fully.
Step:4 Lower the handles down to shoulder level, keeping your elbows slightly bent.
Step:5 Press the handles up overhead until your arms are fully extended.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the handles back down to shoulder level. Maintain inverted form throughout.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: inverted style smith seated shoulder press
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height so that the handles are at shoulder level.
Step:2 Sit on the machine with your back against the pad and your feet flat on the floor.
Step:3 Grasp the handles with an overhand grip and lift them off the supports, extending your arms fully.
Step:4 Lower the handles down to shoulder level, keeping your elbows slightly bent.
Step:5 Press the handles up overhead until your arms are fully extended.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the handles back down to shoulder level. Maintain inverted form throughout.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: press sentado en máquina Smith estilo invertido
instructions: Step:1 Ajusta la altura del asiento para que los agarres queden a la altura de los hombros.
Step:2 Siéntate en la máquina con la espalda contra el respaldo y los pies apoyados en el suelo.
Step:3 Sujeta los agarres con un agarre por encima y levántalos de los soportes, extendiendo completamente los brazos.
Step:4 Baja los agarres hasta la altura de los hombros, manteniendo los codos ligeramente flexionados.
Step:5 Empuja los agarres hacia arriba por encima de la cabeza hasta extender completamente los brazos.
Step:6 Haz una pausa breve en la parte alta y luego baja lentamente los agarres hasta la altura de los hombros. Mantén la forma invertida durante todo el ejercicio.
Step:7 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: cable low seated row controlled
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the machine with your feet flat on the footrests and your knees slightly bent.
Step:2 Grasp the handles with an overhand grip, palms facing down.
Step:3 Keep your back straight and lean slightly forward, maintaining a slight bend in your elbows. Maintain controlled form throughout.
Step:4 Pull the handles towards your body, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the peak of the movement, then slowly release the handles back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: cable low seated row controlled
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the machine with your feet flat on the footrests and your knees slightly bent.
Step:2 Grasp the handles with an overhand grip, palms facing down.
Step:3 Keep your back straight and lean slightly forward, maintaining a slight bend in your elbows. Maintain controlled form throughout.
Step:4 Pull the handles towards your body, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the peak of the movement, then slowly release the handles back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: remo bajo sentado con cable controlado
instructions: Step:1 Siéntate en la máquina con los pies apoyados en los reposapiés y las rodillas ligeramente flexionadas.
Step:2 Agarra los agarres con un agarre por encima, palmas hacia abajo.
Step:3 Mantén la espalda recta e inclínate ligeramente hacia adelante, manteniendo una ligera flexión en los codos. Mantén la forma controlada durante todo el ejercicio.
Step:4 Tira de los agarres hacia el cuerpo, apretando los omóplatos.
Step:5 Haz una pausa breve en el pico del movimiento, luego suelta lentamente los agarres hasta la posición inicial.
Step:6 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: wall style dumbbell pullover hip extension on exercise ball
instructions: Step:1 Sit on an exercise ball with your feet flat on the ground and the dumbbell resting on your thighs.
Step:2 Slowly walk your feet forward, rolling the exercise ball down your back until your head, neck, and back are supported on the ball.
Step:3 Hold the dumbbell with both hands and extend your arms straight up over your chest, keeping a slight bend in your elbows.
Step:4 Lower the dumbbell behind your head, keeping your arms straight and maintaining control.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then raise the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:6 While keeping your arms extended, lift your hips off the ground, squeezing your glutes and engaging your core.
Step:7 (wall variation) Lower your hips back down to the starting position.
Step:8 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: wall style dumbbell pullover hip extension on exercise ball
instructions: Step:1 Sit on an exercise ball with your feet flat on the ground and the dumbbell resting on your thighs.
Step:2 Slowly walk your feet forward, rolling the exercise ball down your back until your head, neck, and back are supported on the ball.
Step:3 Hold the dumbbell with both hands and extend your arms straight up over your chest, keeping a slight bend in your elbows.
Step:4 Lower the dumbbell behind your head, keeping your arms straight and maintaining control.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then raise the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:6 While keeping your arms extended, lift your hips off the ground, squeezing your glutes and engaging your core.
Step:7 (wall variation) Lower your hips back down to the starting position.
Step:8 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: pullover con mancuerna estilo pared y extensión de cadera sobre balón de ejercicio
instructions: Step:1 Siéntate sobre un balón de ejercicio con los pies apoyados en el suelo y la mancuerna descansando sobre los muslos.
Step:2 Camina lentamente con los pies hacia delante, rodando el balón por la espalda hasta que la cabeza, cuello y espalda queden apoyados en el balón.
Step:3 Sujeta la mancuerna con ambas manos y extiende los brazos rectos sobre el pecho, manteniendo una ligera flexión en los codos.
Step:4 Baja la mancuerna detrás de la cabeza, manteniendo los brazos rectos y controlando el movimiento.
Step:5 Haz una pausa por un momento y luego eleva la mancuerna de regreso a la posición inicial.
Step:6 Manteniendo los brazos extendidos, eleva las caderas del suelo, apretando los glúteos y activando el core.
Step:7 (variación pared) Baja las caderas de regreso a la posición inicial.
Step:8 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: cable kneeling crunch - gentle variation
instructions: Step:1 Attach a rope handle to a high pulley and kneel down facing away from the machine.
Step:2 Hold the rope handle with both hands and place it behind your head, keeping your elbows out to the sides.
Step:3 Keeping your hips stationary, flex your waist and crunch your torso down towards your thighs.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then slowly return to the starting position. Maintain gentle form throughout.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: cable kneeling crunch - gentle variation
instructions: Step:1 Attach a rope handle to a high pulley and kneel down facing away from the machine.
Step:2 Hold the rope handle with both hands and place it behind your head, keeping your elbows out to the sides.
Step:3 Keeping your hips stationary, flex your waist and crunch your torso down towards your thighs.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then slowly return to the starting position. Maintain gentle form throughout.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: abdominal con cable arrodillado - variación suave
instructions: Step:1 Coloca una empuñadura de cuerda en una polea alta y arrodíllate mirando hacia afuera de la máquina.
Step:2 Sujeta la cuerda con ambas manos y colócala detrás de la cabeza, manteniendo los codos hacia los lados.
Step:3 Manteniendo las caderas inmóviles, flexiona la cintura y encoge el torso hacia los muslos.
Step:4 Haz una pausa breve en la parte baja y luego regresa lentamente a la posición inicial. Mantén una forma suave durante todo el ejercicio.
Step:5 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: band alternating v-up with simple
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your legs straight and your arms extended overhead, holding the band.
Step:2 Engage your abs and lift your legs and upper body off the ground simultaneously, reaching your hands towards your toes.
Step:3 As you lower your legs and upper body back down, switch the position of your legs, crossing one over the other. Focus on simple movement.
Step:4 Repeat the movement, alternating the position of your legs with each repetition.
Step:5 Continue for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: band alternating v-up with simple
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your legs straight and your arms extended overhead, holding the band.
Step:2 Engage your abs and lift your legs and upper body off the ground simultaneously, reaching your hands towards your toes.
Step:3 As you lower your legs and upper body back down, switch the position of your legs, crossing one over the other. Focus on simple movement.
Step:4 Repeat the movement, alternating the position of your legs with each repetition.
Step:5 Continue for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: v-up alternado con banda - simple
instructions: Step:1 Acuéstate boca arriba con las piernas rectas y los brazos extendidos por encima de la cabeza, sujetando la banda.
Step:2 Activa los abdominales y eleva las piernas y la parte superior del cuerpo simultáneamente, llevando las manos hacia los pies.
Step:3 Al bajar las piernas y el torso, cambia la posición de las piernas cruzando una sobre la otra. Enfócate en un movimiento simple.
Step:4 Repite el movimiento alternando la posición de las piernas en cada repetición.
Step:5 Continúa por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: ez barbell close grip preacher curl - precision variation
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a preacher curl bench and place your upper arms on the pad, gripping the ez barbell with an underhand grip.
Step:2 Rest your triceps on the pad and fully extend your arms, keeping your back straight.
Step:3 Slowly curl the barbell towards your shoulders, contracting your biceps.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, squeezing your biceps.
Step:5 Lower the barbell back to the starting position, fully extending your arms.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions. Emphasize precision control.

translations.name: ez barbell close grip preacher curl - precision variation
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a preacher curl bench and place your upper arms on the pad, gripping the ez barbell with an underhand grip.
Step:2 Rest your triceps on the pad and fully extend your arms, keeping your back straight.
Step:3 Slowly curl the barbell towards your shoulders, contracting your biceps.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, squeezing your biceps.
Step:5 Lower the barbell back to the starting position, fully extending your arms.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions. Emphasize precision control.

translations.name: curl en predicador con barra EZ agarre cerrado - variación de precisión
instructions: Step:1 Siéntate en un banco predicador y apoya la parte superior de los brazos sobre la almohadilla, sujetando la barra EZ con agarre supino.
Step:2 Apoya los tríceps en la almohadilla y extiende completamente los brazos, manteniendo la espalda recta.
Step:3 Flexiona lentamente la barra hacia los hombros contrayendo los bíceps.
Step:4 Haz una pausa breve en la parte alta, apretando los bíceps.
Step:5 Baja la barra hasta la posición inicial extendiendo completamente los brazos.
Step:6 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones. Enfatiza el control y la precisión.

name: hanging pike with intense
instructions: Step:1 Hang from a pull-up bar with your arms fully extended and your palms facing away from you.
Step:2 Engage your core and lift your legs up towards the bar, keeping them straight.
Step:3 (intense variation) Continue lifting until your body forms a 'V' shape, with your legs parallel to the ground.
Step:4 Hold the position for a moment, then slowly lower your legs back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: hanging pike with intense
instructions: Step:1 Hang from a pull-up bar with your arms fully extended and your palms facing away from you.
Step:2 Engage your core and lift your legs up towards the bar, keeping them straight.
Step:3 (intense variation) Continue lifting until your body forms a 'V' shape, with your legs parallel to the ground.
Step:4 Hold the position for a moment, then slowly lower your legs back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: pike colgado - intenso
instructions: Step:1 Cuelga de una barra de dominadas con los brazos completamente extendidos y las palmas mirando hacia afuera.
Step:2 Activa el core y eleva las piernas hacia la barra manteniéndolas rectas.
Step:3 (variación intensa) Continúa elevando hasta que el cuerpo forme una 'V', con las piernas paralelas al suelo.
Step:4 Mantén la posición un momento y luego baja lentamente las piernas hasta la posición inicial.
Step:5 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: side cable high row (kneeling)
instructions: Step:1 Attach a straight bar to a cable machine at chest height.
Step:2 Kneel down in front of the cable machine and grab the bar with an overhand grip, hands shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Sit back on your heels, keeping your back straight and your core engaged.
Step:4 Pull the bar towards your upper abdomen, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top of the movement, then slowly release the bar back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions. Maintain side form throughout.

translations.name: side cable high row (kneeling)
instructions: Step:1 Attach a straight bar to a cable machine at chest height.
Step:2 Kneel down in front of the cable machine and grab the bar with an overhand grip, hands shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Sit back on your heels, keeping your back straight and your core engaged.
Step:4 Pull the bar towards your upper abdomen, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top of the movement, then slowly release the bar back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions. Maintain side form throughout.

translations.name: remo alto lateral con cable (arrodillado)
instructions: Step:1 Coloca una barra recta en una máquina de cables a la altura del pecho.
Step:2 Arrodíllate frente a la máquina de cables y agarra la barra con un agarre por encima, manos al ancho de los hombros.
Step:3 Siéntate sobre los talones, manteniendo la espalda recta y el core activado.
Step:4 Tira de la barra hacia la parte superior del abdomen, apretando los omóplatos.
Step:5 Haz una pausa breve en la parte alta del movimiento, luego suelta lentamente la barra hasta la posición inicial.
Step:6 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones. Mantén la forma lateral durante todo el ejercicio.

name: blunt cable standing crunch
instructions: Step:1 Attach a cable handle to a high pulley and stand facing away from the machine.
Step:2 Hold the handle with both hands and place it behind your head, keeping your elbows bent.
Step:3 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your knees slightly bent.
Step:4 Keeping your abs engaged, exhale and crunch your torso down towards your knees, bringing your elbows towards your thighs.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom of the movement, then slowly return to the starting position. Emphasize blunt control.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: blunt cable standing crunch
instructions: Step:1 Attach a cable handle to a high pulley and stand facing away from the machine.
Step:2 Hold the handle with both hands and place it behind your head, keeping your elbows bent.
Step:3 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your knees slightly bent.
Step:4 Keeping your abs engaged, exhale and crunch your torso down towards your knees, bringing your elbows towards your thighs.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom of the movement, then slowly return to the starting position. Emphasize blunt control.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: abdominal de pie con cable - control contundente
instructions: Step:1 Coloca un agarre de cable en una polea alta y ponte de pie mirando hacia afuera de la máquina.
Step:2 Sujeta el agarre con ambas manos y colócalo detrás de la cabeza, manteniendo los codos doblados.
Step:3 Colócate con los pies al ancho de los hombros y las rodillas ligeramente flexionadas.
Step:4 Manteniendo los abdominales activados, exhala y encoge el torso hacia las rodillas, acercando los codos a los muslos.
Step:5 Haz una pausa breve en la parte baja del movimiento, luego regresa lentamente a la posición inicial. Enfatiza el control contundente.
Step:6 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: barbell lying triceps extension double
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on a bench with your feet flat on the ground and your head at the end of the bench.
Step:2 Hold the barbell with an overhand grip, hands shoulder-width apart, and extend your arms straight up over your chest.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arms stationary, slowly lower the barbell towards your forehead by bending your elbows. Focus on double movement.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then extend your arms back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: barbell lying triceps extension double
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on a bench with your feet flat on the ground and your head at the end of the bench.
Step:2 Hold the barbell with an overhand grip, hands shoulder-width apart, and extend your arms straight up over your chest.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arms stationary, slowly lower the barbell towards your forehead by bending your elbows. Focus on double movement.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then extend your arms back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: extensión de tríceps acostado con barra doble
instructions: Step:1 Acuéstate boca arriba en un banco con los pies apoyados en el suelo y la cabeza en el extremo del banco.
Step:2 Sujeta la barra con un agarre por encima, manos al ancho de los hombros, y extiende los brazos rectos sobre el pecho.
Step:3 Manteniendo la parte superior de los brazos inmóvil, baja lentamente la barra hacia la frente flexionando los codos. Enfócate en el movimiento doble.
Step:4 Haz una pausa breve en la parte baja, luego extiende los brazos hasta la posición inicial.
Step:5 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: fierce weighted straight bar dip
instructions: Step:1 Position yourself between parallel bars with your arms fully extended and your body straight.
Step:2 Lower your body by bending your elbows until your upper arms are parallel to the ground.
Step:3 Pause for a moment, then push yourself back up to the starting position by straightening your arms.
Step:4 (fierce variation) Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: fierce weighted straight bar dip
instructions: Step:1 Position yourself between parallel bars with your arms fully extended and your body straight.
Step:2 Lower your body by bending your elbows until your upper arms are parallel to the ground.
Step:3 Pause for a moment, then push yourself back up to the starting position by straightening your arms.
Step:4 (fierce variation) Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: fondos con barra recta y peso - intenso
instructions: Step:1 Colócate entre las barras paralelas con los brazos completamente extendidos y el cuerpo recto.
Step:2 Baja el cuerpo flexionando los codos hasta que la parte superior de los brazos quede paralela al suelo.
Step:3 Haz una pausa breve y luego empuja el cuerpo hacia arriba hasta la posición inicial extendiendo los brazos.
Step:4 (variación intensa) Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: slow leg pull in flat bench
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a flat bench with your legs extended straight out in front of you.
Step:2 Place your hands on the bench beside your hips for support.
Step:3 Engage your abs and lift your legs off the ground, bringing your knees towards your chest.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your legs back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions. Maintain slow form throughout.

translations.name: slow leg pull in flat bench
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a flat bench with your legs extended straight out in front of you.
Step:2 Place your hands on the bench beside your hips for support.
Step:3 Engage your abs and lift your legs off the ground, bringing your knees towards your chest.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your legs back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions. Maintain slow form throughout.

translations.name: tirón de piernas lento en banco plano
instructions: Step:1 Siéntate en un banco plano con las piernas extendidas rectas frente a ti.
Step:2 Coloca las manos en el banco junto a las caderas para apoyo.
Step:3 Activa los abdominales y eleva las piernas del suelo, acercando las rodillas al pecho.
Step:4 Haz una pausa breve en la parte alta, luego baja lentamente las piernas hasta la posición inicial.
Step:5 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones. Mantén una forma lenta durante todo el ejercicio.

name: cable twisting pull with intensified
instructions: Step:1 Attach a cable handle to a low pulley and stand facing the machine.
Step:2 Grasp the handle with your left hand and step away from the machine, extending your arm fully.
Step:3 Position your feet shoulder-width apart, with your knees slightly bent.
Step:4 Keep your back straight and your core engaged throughout the exercise.
Step:5 Pull the handle towards your body, rotating your torso to the right as you do so.
Step:6 Squeeze your back muscles at the end of the movement.
Step:7 Slowly return to the starting position, keeping tension on the cable.
Step:8 (intensified variation) Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides and perform with your right hand.

translations.name: cable twisting pull with intensified
instructions: Step:1 Attach a cable handle to a low pulley and stand facing the machine.
Step:2 Grasp the handle with your left hand and step away from the machine, extending your arm fully.
Step:3 Position your feet shoulder-width apart, with your knees slightly bent.
Step:4 Keep your back straight and your core engaged throughout the exercise.
Step:5 Pull the handle towards your body, rotating your torso to the right as you do so.
Step:6 Squeeze your back muscles at the end of the movement.
Step:7 Slowly return to the starting position, keeping tension on the cable.
Step:8 (intensified variation) Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides and perform with your right hand.

translations.name: tirón con giro en cable - intensificado
instructions: Step:1 Coloca un agarre de cable en una polea baja y párate frente a la máquina.
Step:2 Agarra el agarre con la mano izquierda y aléjate de la máquina, extendiendo completamente el brazo.
Step:3 Coloca los pies al ancho de los hombros con las rodillas ligeramente flexionadas.
Step:4 Mantén la espalda recta y el core activado durante todo el ejercicio.
Step:5 Tira del agarre hacia el cuerpo, rotando el torso hacia la derecha mientras lo haces.
Step:6 Aprieta los músculos de la espalda al final del movimiento.
Step:7 Regresa lentamente a la posición inicial, manteniendo tensión en el cable.
Step:8 (variación intensificada) Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambia de lado y realiza con la mano derecha.

name: suspended abdominal fallout - inclined variation
instructions: Step:1 Attach a suspension trainer to a high anchor point and adjust the straps to waist height.
Step:2 Stand facing away from the anchor point and hold the handles with your arms extended in front of you. Maintain inclined form throughout.
Step:3 Lean forward at the waist, keeping your body straight and your core engaged.
Step:4 Lower your body as far as you can while maintaining control and tension in your abs.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then slowly raise your body back up to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: suspended abdominal fallout - inclined variation
instructions: Step:1 Attach a suspension trainer to a high anchor point and adjust the straps to waist height.
Step:2 Stand facing away from the anchor point and hold the handles with your arms extended in front of you. Maintain inclined form throughout.
Step:3 Lean forward at the waist, keeping your body straight and your core engaged.
Step:4 Lower your body as far as you can while maintaining control and tension in your abs.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then slowly raise your body back up to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: fallout abdominal suspendido - variación inclinada
instructions: Step:1 Fija un entrenador en suspensión a un punto de anclaje alto y ajusta las correas a la altura de la cintura.
Step:2 Colócate de espaldas al anclaje y sujeta las empuñaduras con los brazos extendidos frente a ti. Mantén la forma inclinada durante todo el ejercicio.
Step:3 Inclínate hacia adelante desde la cintura, manteniendo el cuerpo recto y el core activado.
Step:4 Baja el cuerpo todo lo que puedas manteniendo control y tensión en los abdominales.
Step:5 Haz una pausa breve en la parte baja y luego eleva lentamente el cuerpo hasta la posición inicial.
Step:6 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: inclined style pelvic tilt into bridge
instructions: Step:1 Lie on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Place your arms by your sides with your palms facing down.
Step:3 Engage your glutes and core muscles.
Step:4 Tilt your pelvis upward, lifting your hips off the ground. Emphasize inclined control.
Step:5 Hold the bridge position for a few seconds.
Step:6 Slowly lower your hips back down to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: inclined style pelvic tilt into bridge
instructions: Step:1 Lie on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Place your arms by your sides with your palms facing down.
Step:3 Engage your glutes and core muscles.
Step:4 Tilt your pelvis upward, lifting your hips off the ground. Emphasize inclined control.
Step:5 Hold the bridge position for a few seconds.
Step:6 Slowly lower your hips back down to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: inclinación pélvica en puente - estilo inclinado
instructions: Step:1 Acuéstate boca arriba con las rodillas dobladas y los pies apoyados en el suelo.
Step:2 Coloca los brazos a los lados con las palmas hacia abajo.
Step:3 Activa los glúteos y los músculos del core.
Step:4 Inclina la pelvis hacia arriba elevando las caderas del suelo. Enfatiza el control inclinado.
Step:5 Mantén la posición de puente unos segundos.
Step:6 Baja lentamente las caderas hasta la posición inicial.
Step:7 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell incline one arm press on exercise ball modified
instructions: Step:1 Sit on an exercise ball with a dumbbell in one hand, feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Slowly walk your feet forward, rolling the ball until your head, neck, and back are supported on the ball.
Step:3 Hold the dumbbell at shoulder height with your palm facing forward.
Step:4 Press the dumbbell upward until your arm is fully extended.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbell back to the starting position. Emphasize modified control.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch to the other arm.

translations.name: dumbbell incline one arm press on exercise ball modified
instructions: Step:1 Sit on an exercise ball with a dumbbell in one hand, feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Slowly walk your feet forward, rolling the ball until your head, neck, and back are supported on the ball.
Step:3 Hold the dumbbell at shoulder height with your palm facing forward.
Step:4 Press the dumbbell upward until your arm is fully extended.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbell back to the starting position. Emphasize modified control.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch to the other arm.

translations.name: press inclinado a un brazo con mancuerna sobre balón de ejercicio - modificado
instructions: Step:1 Siéntate sobre un balón de ejercicio con una mancuerna en una mano y los pies apoyados en el suelo.
Step:2 Camina lentamente con los pies hacia adelante, rodando el balón hasta que la cabeza, cuello y espalda queden apoyados en el balón.
Step:3 Sostén la mancuerna a la altura del hombro con la palma mirando hacia adelante.
Step:4 Presiona la mancuerna hacia arriba hasta extender completamente el brazo.
Step:5 Haz una pausa breve en la parte alta y luego baja lentamente la mancuerna a la posición inicial. Enfatiza el control modificado.
Step:6 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambia de brazo.

name: cable kneeling rear delt row (with rope) (male) expanded
instructions: Step:1 Attach a rope handle to a low cable pulley and kneel down facing the machine.
Step:2 (expanded variation) Grasp the rope with a neutral grip (palms facing each other) and extend your arms fully in front of you.
Step:3 Keeping your back straight and core engaged, pull the rope towards your body by retracting your shoulder blades.
Step:4 Squeeze your shoulder blades together at the end of the movement and hold for a brief pause.
Step:5 Slowly release the tension and return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: cable kneeling rear delt row (with rope) (male) expanded
instructions: Step:1 Attach a rope handle to a low cable pulley and kneel down facing the machine.
Step:2 (expanded variation) Grasp the rope with a neutral grip (palms facing each other) and extend your arms fully in front of you.
Step:3 Keeping your back straight and core engaged, pull the rope towards your body by retracting your shoulder blades.
Step:4 Squeeze your shoulder blades together at the end of the movement and hold for a brief pause.
Step:5 Slowly release the tension and return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: remo de deltoides posterior arrodillado con cable (con cuerda) (masculino) - expandido
instructions: Step:1 Coloca una empuñadura de cuerda en una polea baja y arrodíllate frente a la máquina.
Step:2 (variación expandida) Agarra la cuerda con agarre neutral (palmas enfrentadas) y extiende los brazos completamente frente a ti.
Step:3 Manteniendo la espalda recta y el core activado, tira de la cuerda hacia el cuerpo retrayendo los omóplatos.
Step:4 Aprieta los omóplatos al final del movimiento y mantén una breve pausa.
Step:5 Suelta lentamente la tensión y regresa a la posición inicial.
Step:6 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: rotated dumbbell pronate-grip triceps extension
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench or chair with your back straight and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell with both hands, palms facing down, and extend your arms straight up overhead.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arms close to your head and elbows pointing forward, slowly lower the dumbbell behind your head by bending your elbows.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then extend your arms back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions. Focus on rotated movement.

translations.name: rotated dumbbell pronate-grip triceps extension
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench or chair with your back straight and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell with both hands, palms facing down, and extend your arms straight up overhead.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arms close to your head and elbows pointing forward, slowly lower the dumbbell behind your head by bending your elbows.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then extend your arms back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions. Focus on rotated movement.

translations.name: extensión de tríceps con mancuerna agarre pronado rotado
instructions: Step:1 Siéntate en un banco o silla con la espalda recta y los pies apoyados en el suelo.
Step:2 Sostén una mancuerna con ambas manos, palmas mirando hacia abajo, y extiende los brazos rectos por encima de la cabeza.
