Step:3 Manteniendo la parte superior de los brazos cerca de la cabeza y los codos apuntando hacia adelante, baja lentamente la mancuerna detrás de la cabeza flexionando los codos.
Step:4 Haz una pausa por un momento y luego extiende los brazos hasta la posición inicial.
Step:5 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones. Enfócate en el movimiento rotado.

name: sled 45 degrees one leg press pointed
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the sled machine to a 45-degree angle.
Step:2 Sit on the sled machine with your back against the pad and your feet on the footplate. Perform with pointed intensity.
Step:3 Place one foot on the footplate and extend your leg, pushing the sled away from you.
Step:4 Slowly bend your knee and lower the sled back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat with the other leg.
Step:6 Continue alternating legs for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: sled 45 degrees one leg press pointed
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the sled machine to a 45-degree angle.
Step:2 Sit on the sled machine with your back against the pad and your feet on the footplate. Perform with pointed intensity.
Step:3 Place one foot on the footplate and extend your leg, pushing the sled away from you.
Step:4 Slowly bend your knee and lower the sled back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat with the other leg.
Step:6 Continue alternating legs for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: press a una pierna en trineo 45 grados - enfocado
instructions: Step:1 Ajusta la máquina de trineo a un ángulo de 45 grados.
Step:2 Siéntate en la máquina con la espalda apoyada en la almohadilla y los pies sobre la plataforma. Realiza con intensidad enfocada.
Step:3 Coloca un pie en la plataforma y extiende la pierna, empujando el trineo lejos de ti.
Step:4 Flexiona la rodilla lentamente y baja el trineo hasta la posición inicial.
Step:5 Repite con la otra pierna.
Step:6 Continúa alternando las piernas por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: stretched full planche push-up
instructions: Step:1 Start in a push-up position with your hands placed slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Engage your core and lower your body down towards the ground, keeping your elbows close to your sides.
Step:3 As you lower yourself, lean your body forward and lift your feet off the ground, balancing on your hands. Perform with stretched intensity.
Step:4 Continue to lower your body until your chest is just above the ground.
Step:5 Push through your hands and extend your arms to lift your body back up to the starting position.
Step:6 Maintain a straight line from your head to your heels throughout the movement.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: stretched full planche push-up
instructions: Step:1 Start in a push-up position with your hands placed slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Engage your core and lower your body down towards the ground, keeping your elbows close to your sides.
Step:3 As you lower yourself, lean your body forward and lift your feet off the ground, balancing on your hands. Perform with stretched intensity.
Step:4 Continue to lower your body until your chest is just above the ground.
Step:5 Push through your hands and extend your arms to lift your body back up to the starting position.
Step:6 Maintain a straight line from your head to your heels throughout the movement.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: flexión planche completa estirada
instructions: Step:1 Comienza en posición de flexión con las manos colocadas un poco más separadas que el ancho de los hombros.
Step:2 Activa el core y baja el cuerpo hacia el suelo, manteniendo los codos cerca de los costados.
Step:3 Al bajar, inclina el cuerpo hacia adelante y eleva los pies del suelo, equilibrándote sobre las manos. Realiza con intensidad estirada.
Step:4 Continúa bajando hasta que el pecho esté justo por encima del suelo.
Step:5 Empuja con las manos y extiende los brazos para elevar el cuerpo de regreso a la posición inicial.
Step:6 Mantén una línea recta desde la cabeza hasta los talones durante todo el movimiento.
Step:7 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: calf push stretch with hands against wall elite
instructions: Step:1 Stand facing a wall with your feet hip-width apart.
Step:2 Place your hands against the wall at shoulder height.
Step:3 Step back with one foot, keeping your heel on the ground and your leg straight.
Step:4 Bend your front knee slightly and lean forward, feeling a stretch in your calf.
Step:5 Hold the stretch for 20-30 seconds.
Step:6 Switch legs and repeat the stretch. Focus on elite movement.

translations.name: calf push stretch with hands against wall elite
instructions: Step:1 Stand facing a wall with your feet hip-width apart.
Step:2 Place your hands against the wall at shoulder height.
Step:3 Step back with one foot, keeping your heel on the ground and your leg straight.
Step:4 Bend your front knee slightly and lean forward, feeling a stretch in your calf.
Step:5 Hold the stretch for 20-30 seconds.
Step:6 Switch legs and repeat the stretch. Focus on elite movement.

translations.name: estiramiento de pantorrilla con manos contra la pared - elite
instructions: Step:1 Párate frente a una pared con los pies al ancho de las caderas.
Step:2 Coloca las manos contra la pared a la altura de los hombros.
Step:3 Da un paso atrás con un pie, manteniendo el talón en el suelo y la pierna recta.
Step:4 Flexiona ligeramente la rodilla delantera e inclínate hacia adelante, sintiendo el estiramiento en la pantorrilla.
Step:5 Mantén el estiramiento durante 20-30 segundos.
Step:6 Cambia de pierna y repite el estiramiento. Enfócate en el movimiento elite.

name: clock push-up extreme
instructions: Step:1 Start in a high plank position with your hands directly under your shoulders and your body in a straight line.
Step:2 Lower your body towards the ground by bending your elbows, keeping them close to your sides.
Step:3 As you lower, rotate your body to the left, extending your left arm straight out to the side. Focus on extreme movement.
Step:4 Push back up to the starting position, while rotating your body to the center.
Step:5 Repeat the push-up, this time rotating your body to the right and extending your right arm out to the side.
Step:6 Continue alternating sides with each repetition.

translations.name: clock push-up extreme
instructions: Step:1 Start in a high plank position with your hands directly under your shoulders and your body in a straight line.
Step:2 Lower your body towards the ground by bending your elbows, keeping them close to your sides.
Step:3 As you lower, rotate your body to the left, extending your left arm straight out to the side. Focus on extreme movement.
Step:4 Push back up to the starting position, while rotating your body to the center.
Step:5 Repeat the push-up, this time rotating your body to the right and extending your right arm out to the side.
Step:6 Continue alternating sides with each repetition.

translations.name: flexión reloj extrema
instructions: Step:1 Comienza en posición de plancha alta con las manos directamente bajo los hombros y el cuerpo en línea recta.
Step:2 Baja el cuerpo hacia el suelo flexionando los codos y manteniéndolos cerca de los costados.
Step:3 Al bajar, rota el cuerpo hacia la izquierda y extiende el brazo izquierdo hacia un lado. Enfócate en un movimiento extremo.
Step:4 Empuja hacia arriba hasta la posición inicial mientras rotas el cuerpo al centro.
Step:5 Repite la flexión y esta vez rota el cuerpo hacia la derecha extendiendo el brazo derecho hacia un lado.
Step:6 Continúa alternando lados en cada repetición.

name: lever military press with strength
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and position yourself on the machine with your back against the backrest.
Step:2 Grasp the handles with an overhand grip and position your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Push the handles upward until your arms are fully extended, but do not lock your elbows.
Step:4 (strength variation) Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the handles back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: lever military press with strength
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and position yourself on the machine with your back against the backrest.
Step:2 Grasp the handles with an overhand grip and position your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Push the handles upward until your arms are fully extended, but do not lock your elbows.
Step:4 (strength variation) Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the handles back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: press militar en palanca con fuerza
instructions: Step:1 Ajusta la altura del asiento y colócate en la máquina con la espalda contra el respaldo.
Step:2 Agarra los agarres con un agarre por encima y coloca las manos un poco más separadas que el ancho de los hombros.
Step:3 Empuja los agarres hacia arriba hasta que los brazos estén completamente extendidos, pero sin bloquear los codos.
Step:4 (variación de fuerza) Haz una pausa breve en la parte alta y luego baja lentamente los agarres hasta la posición inicial.
Step:5 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: half knee bends (male) with blunt
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Bend your knees and lower your body down as if you were sitting back into a chair. Emphasize blunt control.
Step:3 Keep your chest up and your weight in your heels.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push through your heels to return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: half knee bends (male) with blunt
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Bend your knees and lower your body down as if you were sitting back into a chair. Emphasize blunt control.
Step:3 Keep your chest up and your weight in your heels.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push through your heels to return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: medio sentadilla (masculino) con control contundente
instructions: Step:1 Párate con los pies al ancho de los hombros.
Step:2 Flexiona las rodillas y baja el cuerpo como si te sentaras en una silla. Enfatiza el control contundente.
Step:3 Mantén el pecho erguido y el peso en los talones.
Step:4 Haz una pausa breve en la parte baja y luego empuja con los talones para volver a la posición inicial.
Step:5 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dynamic style band side triceps extension
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold the band with both hands, palms facing down.
Step:2 Extend your arms straight out to the sides, keeping them parallel to the ground.
Step:3 Slowly bend your elbows and bring your hands towards your shoulders, keeping your upper arms still.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then slowly extend your arms back out to the starting position.
Step:5 (dynamic variation) Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dynamic style band side triceps extension
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold the band with both hands, palms facing down.
Step:2 Extend your arms straight out to the sides, keeping them parallel to the ground.
Step:3 Slowly bend your elbows and bring your hands towards your shoulders, keeping your upper arms still.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then slowly extend your arms back out to the starting position.
Step:5 (dynamic variation) Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: extensión lateral de tríceps con banda - estilo dinámico
instructions: Step:1 Párate con los pies al ancho de los hombros y sujeta la banda con ambas manos, palmas hacia abajo.
Step:2 Extiende los brazos hacia los lados manteniéndolos paralelos al suelo.
Step:3 Flexiona lentamente los codos y lleva las manos hacia los hombros, manteniendo la parte superior de los brazos inmóvil.
Step:4 Haz una pausa por un momento y luego extiende lentamente los brazos hasta la posición inicial.
Step:5 (variación dinámica) Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: exercise ball seated triceps stretch wide
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a stability ball with your feet flat on the ground and your back straight.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell in one hand and extend your arm straight up above your head.
Step:3 Bend your elbow and lower the dumbbell behind your head, keeping your upper arm close to your ear. Maintain wide form throughout.
Step:4 Hold the stretch for a few seconds, then return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat with the other arm.

translations.name: exercise ball seated triceps stretch wide
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a stability ball with your feet flat on the ground and your back straight.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell in one hand and extend your arm straight up above your head.
Step:3 Bend your elbow and lower the dumbbell behind your head, keeping your upper arm close to your ear. Maintain wide form throughout.
Step:4 Hold the stretch for a few seconds, then return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat with the other arm.

translations.name: estiramiento de tríceps sentado sobre balón de ejercicio - amplio
instructions: Step:1 Siéntate sobre un balón de estabilidad con los pies apoyados en el suelo y la espalda recta.
Step:2 Sostén una mancuerna en una mano y extiende el brazo recto por encima de la cabeza.
Step:3 Flexiona el codo y baja la mancuerna detrás de la cabeza, manteniendo la parte superior del brazo cerca de la oreja. Mantén la forma amplia durante todo el ejercicio.
Step:4 Mantén el estiramiento unos segundos y luego vuelve a la posición inicial.
Step:5 Repite con el otro brazo.

name: band underhand pulldown with classic
instructions: Step:1 Attach the band to a high anchor point, such as a pull-up bar or sturdy beam.
Step:2 Stand facing the anchor point with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Grasp the band with an underhand grip, hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart. Emphasize classic control.
Step:4 Extend your arms fully overhead, keeping your elbows slightly bent.
Step:5 Engage your back and pull the band down towards your chest, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the bottom of the movement, then slowly release the tension and return to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: band underhand pulldown with classic
instructions: Step:1 Attach the band to a high anchor point, such as a pull-up bar or sturdy beam.
Step:2 Stand facing the anchor point with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Grasp the band with an underhand grip, hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart. Emphasize classic control.
Step:4 Extend your arms fully overhead, keeping your elbows slightly bent.
Step:5 Engage your back and pull the band down towards your chest, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the bottom of the movement, then slowly release the tension and return to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: jalón con banda agarre supino - clásico
instructions: Step:1 Fija la banda a un punto de anclaje alto, como una barra de dominadas o una viga resistente.
Step:2 Párate mirando al anclaje con los pies al ancho de los hombros.
Step:3 Agarra la banda con agarre supino, manos ligeramente más separadas que el ancho de los hombros. Enfatiza el control clásico.
Step:4 Extiende los brazos por encima de la cabeza, manteniendo los codos ligeramente doblados.
Step:5 Activa la espalda y tira de la banda hacia el pecho, apretando los omóplatos.
Step:6 Haz una pausa breve en la parte baja del movimiento, luego suelta la tensión y regresa lentamente a la posición inicial.
Step:7 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: chest stretch with exercise ball partial
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the stability ball with your feet flat on the ground and your back straight.
Step:2 Hold the exercise ball with both hands and extend your arms straight out in front of you. Focus on partial movement.
Step:3 Slowly bring the exercise ball towards your chest, feeling a stretch in your chest muscles.
Step:4 Hold the stretch for a few seconds, then slowly return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: chest stretch with exercise ball partial
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the stability ball with your feet flat on the ground and your back straight.
Step:2 Hold the exercise ball with both hands and extend your arms straight out in front of you. Focus on partial movement.
Step:3 Slowly bring the exercise ball towards your chest, feeling a stretch in your chest muscles.
Step:4 Hold the stretch for a few seconds, then slowly return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: estiramiento de pecho con balón de ejercicio - parcial
instructions: Step:1 Siéntate sobre el balón de estabilidad con los pies apoyados en el suelo y la espalda recta.
Step:2 Sujeta el balón con ambas manos y extiende los brazos rectos frente a ti. Enfócate en un movimiento parcial.
Step:3 Lleva el balón lentamente hacia el pecho sintiendo el estiramiento en los músculos del pecho.
Step:4 Mantén el estiramiento unos segundos y luego regresa lentamente a la posición inicial.
Step:5 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: weighted lunge with swing twisted
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a weight in each hand.
Step:2 Take a step forward with your right foot, lowering your body into a lunge position.
Step:3 As you lunge forward, swing the weights forward and upward, keeping your arms straight.
Step:4 Push off with your right foot and return to the starting position, swinging the weights back down.
Step:5 (twisted variation) Repeat with your left foot and continue alternating legs for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: weighted lunge with swing twisted
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a weight in each hand.
Step:2 Take a step forward with your right foot, lowering your body into a lunge position.
Step:3 As you lunge forward, swing the weights forward and upward, keeping your arms straight.
Step:4 Push off with your right foot and return to the starting position, swinging the weights back down.
Step:5 (twisted variation) Repeat with your left foot and continue alternating legs for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: zancada con peso y balanceo - torsionada
instructions: Step:1 Párate con los pies al ancho de los hombros sosteniendo un peso en cada mano.
Step:2 Da un paso adelante con el pie derecho bajando el cuerpo hasta una posición de zancada.
Step:3 Al avanzar en la zancada, balancea los pesos hacia adelante y hacia arriba manteniendo los brazos rectos.
Step:4 Impúlsate con el pie derecho y regresa a la posición inicial, dejando que los pesos bajen con el balanceo.
Step:5 (variación torsionada) Repite con el pie izquierdo y continúa alternando piernas por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: controlled band straight back stiff leg deadlift
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and place the band around your upper legs.
Step:2 Hold the band with both hands in front of your thighs, palms facing your body.
Step:3 Keeping your back straight and your knees slightly bent, hinge at the hips and lower the band towards the ground. Focus on controlled movement.
Step:4 Feel the stretch in your hamstrings as you lower the band.
Step:5 Engage your glutes and hamstrings to lift your body back up to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: controlled band straight back stiff leg deadlift
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and place the band around your upper legs.
Step:2 Hold the band with both hands in front of your thighs, palms facing your body.
Step:3 Keeping your back straight and your knees slightly bent, hinge at the hips and lower the band towards the ground. Focus on controlled movement.
Step:4 Feel the stretch in your hamstrings as you lower the band.
Step:5 Engage your glutes and hamstrings to lift your body back up to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: peso muerto piernas rígidas con banda y espalda recta - controlado
instructions: Step:1 Párate con los pies al ancho de los hombros y coloca la banda alrededor de la parte superior de las piernas.
Step:2 Sujeta la banda con ambas manos frente a los muslos, palmas hacia el cuerpo.
Step:3 Manteniendo la espalda recta y las rodillas ligeramente flexionadas, inclínate desde las caderas y baja la banda hacia el suelo. Enfócate en un movimiento controlado.
Step:4 Siente el estiramiento en los isquiotibiales mientras bajas la banda.
Step:5 Activa los glúteos y los isquiotibiales para levantar el cuerpo de regreso a la posición inicial.
Step:6 Repite por el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: gentle style dumbbell one leg fly on exercise ball
instructions: Step:1 Sit on an exercise ball with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing each other.
Step:2 Place one foot on the ground and extend the other leg straight out in front of you.
Step:3 Lean forward slightly and bring your arms out to the sides, keeping a slight bend in your elbows.
Step:4 Slowly lower the dumbbells down and out to the sides, feeling a stretch in your chest.
Step:5 (gentle variation) Pause for a moment at the bottom, then squeeze your chest muscles to bring the dumbbells back up to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch legs and repeat.

translations.name: gentle style dumbbell one leg fly on exercise ball
instructions: Step:1 Sit on an exercise ball with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing each other.
Step:2 Place one foot on the ground and extend the other leg straight out in front of you.
Step:3 Lean forward slightly and bring your arms out to the sides, keeping a slight bend in your elbows.
Step:4 Slowly lower the dumbbells down and out to the sides, feeling a stretch in your chest.
Step:5 (gentle variation) Pause for a moment at the bottom, then squeeze your chest muscles to bring the dumbbells back up to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch legs and repeat.

translations.name: aperturas a una pierna con mancuerna sobre pelota de ejercicio estilo suave
instructions: Paso:1 Siéntate en una pelota de ejercicio con una mancuerna en cada mano, con las palmas una frente a la otra.
Paso:2 Coloca un pie en el suelo y extiende la otra pierna recta frente a ti.
Paso:3 Inclínate ligeramente hacia adelante y abre los brazos hacia los lados, manteniendo una ligera flexión en los codos.
Paso:4 Baja lentamente las mancuernas hacia abajo y hacia los lados, sintiendo un estiramiento en el pecho.
Paso:5 (variación suave) Haz una pausa por un momento en la parte inferior, luego aprieta los músculos del pecho para volver a subir las mancuernas a la posición inicial.
Paso:6 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambia de pierna y repite.

name: intense kettlebell two arm row
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, knees slightly bent, and hold a kettlebell in each hand with your palms facing your body.
Step:2 Bend forward at the hips, keeping your back straight and your core engaged.
Step:3 Pull the kettlebells up towards your chest, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the kettlebells back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions. Maintain intense form throughout.

translations.name: intense kettlebell two arm row
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, knees slightly bent, and hold a kettlebell in each hand with your palms facing your body.
Step:2 Bend forward at the hips, keeping your back straight and your core engaged.
Step:3 Pull the kettlebells up towards your chest, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the kettlebells back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions. Maintain intense form throughout.

translations.name: remo intenso a dos brazos con pesa rusa
instructions: Paso:1 Párate con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros, las rodillas ligeramente flexionadas, y sostén una pesa rusa en cada mano con las palmas mirando hacia tu cuerpo.
Paso:2 Inclínate hacia adelante desde las caderas, manteniendo la espalda recta y el core activado.
Paso:3 Levanta las pesas rusas hacia tu pecho, apretando los omóplatos.
Paso:4 Haz una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, luego baja lentamente las pesas rusas a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones. Mantén una forma intensa en todo momento.

name: contracted kettlebell extended range one arm press on floor
instructions: Step:1 Start by lying on your back on the floor with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Hold a kettlebell in one hand, with your palm facing towards your feet.
Step:3 Extend your arm straight up towards the ceiling, keeping your elbow locked and your wrist straight.
Step:4 Slowly lower the kettlebell back down to the starting position, maintaining control throughout the movement.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch to the other arm. Emphasize contracted control.

translations.name: contracted kettlebell extended range one arm press on floor
instructions: Step:1 Start by lying on your back on the floor with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Hold a kettlebell in one hand, with your palm facing towards your feet.
Step:3 Extend your arm straight up towards the ceiling, keeping your elbow locked and your wrist straight.
Step:4 Slowly lower the kettlebell back down to the starting position, maintaining control throughout the movement.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch to the other arm. Emphasize contracted control.

translations.name: press de suelo a un brazo con rango extendido y pesa rusa contraída
instructions: Paso:1 Comienza acostado boca arriba en el suelo con las rodillas flexionadas y los pies planos en el suelo.
Paso:2 Sostén una pesa rusa en una mano, con la palma mirando hacia tus pies.
Paso:3 Extiende el brazo recto hacia el techo, manteniendo el codo bloqueado y la muñeca recta.
Paso:4 Baja lentamente la pesa rusa a la posición inicial, manteniendo el control durante todo el movimiento.
Paso:5 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambia al otro brazo. Enfatiza el control contraído.

name: triple style sled one leg calf press on leg press
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat of the leg press machine so that your knees are slightly bent when your feet are on the sled.
Step:2 Sit on the machine with your back against the backrest and your feet on the sled, shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Place your toes and the balls of your feet on the sled, keeping your heels off.
Step:4 Push the sled forward by extending your ankles, keeping your knees slightly bent.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the sled back down by flexing your ankles.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions. Perform with triple intensity.

translations.name: triple style sled one leg calf press on leg press
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat of the leg press machine so that your knees are slightly bent when your feet are on the sled.
Step:2 Sit on the machine with your back against the backrest and your feet on the sled, shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Place your toes and the balls of your feet on the sled, keeping your heels off.
Step:4 Push the sled forward by extending your ankles, keeping your knees slightly bent.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the sled back down by flexing your ankles.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions. Perform with triple intensity.

translations.name: press de pantorrilla a una pierna en prensa estilo triple sled
instructions: Paso:1 Ajusta el asiento de la máquina de prensa de piernas para que tus rodillas estén ligeramente flexionadas cuando tus pies estén en la plataforma.
Paso:2 Siéntate en la máquina con la espalda contra el respaldo y los pies en la plataforma, separados al ancho de los hombros.
Paso:3 Coloca los dedos y las puntas de los pies en la plataforma, manteniendo los talones fuera.
Paso:4 Empuja la plataforma hacia adelante extendiendo los tobillos, manteniendo las rodillas ligeramente flexionadas.
Paso:5 Haz una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, luego baja lentamente la plataforma flexionando los tobillos.
Paso:6 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones. Realiza con triple intensidad.

name: resistance band leg extension declined
instructions: Step:1 Attach the resistance band to a sturdy anchor point and secure it around your ankle.
Step:2 Stand facing the anchor point with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Keeping your core engaged and your upper body stable, extend your leg straight out in front of you.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly return your leg to the starting position. Focus on declined movement.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch legs.

translations.name: resistance band leg extension declined
instructions: Step:1 Attach the resistance band to a sturdy anchor point and secure it around your ankle.
Step:2 Stand facing the anchor point with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Keeping your core engaged and your upper body stable, extend your leg straight out in front of you.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly return your leg to the starting position. Focus on declined movement.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch legs.

translations.name: extensión de pierna declinada con banda de resistencia
instructions: Paso:1 Sujeta la banda de resistencia a un punto de anclaje resistente y asegúrala alrededor de tu tobillo.
Paso:2 Párate de cara al punto de anclaje con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros.
Paso:3 Manteniendo el core activado y la parte superior del cuerpo estable, extiende la pierna recta frente a ti.
Paso:4 Haz una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, luego regresa lentamente la pierna a la posición inicial. Concéntrate en el movimiento declinado.
Paso:5 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambia de pierna.

name: dumbbell iron cross - improved variation
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a dumbbell in each hand at your sides.
Step:2 Raise your arms out to the sides until they are parallel to the ground, forming a T shape with your body. Perform with improved intensity.
Step:3 Pause for a moment, then slowly lower your arms back down to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell iron cross - improved variation
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a dumbbell in each hand at your sides.
Step:2 Raise your arms out to the sides until they are parallel to the ground, forming a T shape with your body. Perform with improved intensity.
Step:3 Pause for a moment, then slowly lower your arms back down to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: cruz de hierro con mancuernas - variación mejorada
instructions: Paso:1 Párate con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros, sosteniendo una mancuerna en cada mano a los costados.
Paso:2 Levanta los brazos hacia los lados hasta que estén paralelos al suelo, formando una T con tu cuerpo. Realiza con intensidad mejorada.
Paso:3 Haz una pausa por un momento, luego baja lentamente los brazos a la posición inicial.
Paso:4 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: quick feet v. 2 with bent
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your arms by your sides.
Step:2 Begin by rapidly moving your feet up and down, as if you were running in place.
Step:3 Keep your movements quick and light, focusing on staying on the balls of your feet.
Step:4 Continue for the desired duration or number of repetitions. Emphasize bent control.

translations.name: quick feet v. 2 with bent
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your arms by your sides.
Step:2 Begin by rapidly moving your feet up and down, as if you were running in place.
Step:3 Keep your movements quick and light, focusing on staying on the balls of your feet.
Step:4 Continue for the desired duration or number of repetitions. Emphasize bent control.

translations.name: pies rápidos v. 2 con flexión
instructions: Paso:1 Párate con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y los brazos a los costados.
Paso:2 Comienza moviendo rápidamente los pies hacia arriba y hacia abajo, como si estuvieras corriendo en el lugar.
Paso:3 Mantén los movimientos rápidos y ligeros, concentrándote en mantenerte sobre las puntas de los pies.
Paso:4 Continúa durante el tiempo o número de repeticiones deseado. Enfatiza el control de la flexión.

name: barbell wide reverse grip bench press horizontal
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on a bench with your feet flat on the ground and your back pressed against the bench.
Step:2 Grasp the barbell with a wide reverse grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Lift the barbell off the rack and hold it directly above your chest with your arms fully extended.
Step:4 Lower the barbell slowly towards your chest, keeping your elbows tucked in and your wrists straight. Focus on horizontal movement.
Step:5 Pause for a moment when the barbell touches your chest, then push it back up to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: barbell wide reverse grip bench press horizontal
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on a bench with your feet flat on the ground and your back pressed against the bench.
Step:2 Grasp the barbell with a wide reverse grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Lift the barbell off the rack and hold it directly above your chest with your arms fully extended.
Step:4 Lower the barbell slowly towards your chest, keeping your elbows tucked in and your wrists straight. Focus on horizontal movement.
Step:5 Pause for a moment when the barbell touches your chest, then push it back up to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: press de banco horizontal con barra y agarre inverso ancho
instructions: Paso:1 Acuéstate en un banco plano con los pies en el suelo y la espalda presionada contra el banco.
Paso:2 Agarra la barra con un agarre inverso ancho, un poco más abierto que el ancho de los hombros.
Paso:3 Levanta la barra del soporte y sostenla directamente sobre tu pecho con los brazos completamente extendidos.
Paso:4 Baja la barra lentamente hacia tu pecho, manteniendo los codos pegados y las muñecas rectas. Concéntrate en el movimiento horizontal.
Paso:5 Haz una pausa por un momento cuando la barra toque tu pecho, luego empújala de nuevo a la posición inicial.
Paso:6 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: sissy squat isolation
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your toes pointing slightly outward.
Step:2 Hold onto a stable object for balance if needed.
Step:3 Slowly lower your body by bending your knees and leaning back, keeping your torso upright.
Step:4 Continue lowering until your thighs are parallel to the ground or as far as you can comfortably go.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then push through your heels to return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions. Emphasize isolation control.

translations.name: sissy squat isolation
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your toes pointing slightly outward.
Step:2 Hold onto a stable object for balance if needed.
Step:3 Slowly lower your body by bending your knees and leaning back, keeping your torso upright.
Step:4 Continue lowering until your thighs are parallel to the ground or as far as you can comfortably go.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then push through your heels to return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions. Emphasize isolation control.

translations.name: sentadilla sissy de aislamiento
instructions: Paso:1 Párate con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y los dedos de los pies apuntando ligeramente hacia afuera.
Paso:2 Sostente de un objeto estable para mantener el equilibrio si es necesario.
Paso:3 Baja lentamente el cuerpo flexionando las rodillas e inclinándote hacia atrás, manteniendo el torso erguido.
Paso:4 Continúa bajando hasta que tus muslos estén paralelos al suelo o hasta donde te sientas cómodo.
Paso:5 Haz una pausa por un momento, luego empuja con los talones para volver a la posición inicial.
Paso:6 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones. Enfatiza el control del aislamiento.

name: chair leg extended stretch with modified
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the edge of a chair with your back straight and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Extend one leg straight out in front of you, keeping your heel on the ground.
Step:3 Lean forward slightly, feeling a stretch in your quads.
Step:4 Hold this position for 20-30 seconds. Focus on modified movement.
Step:5 Switch legs and repeat the stretch.

translations.name: chair leg extended stretch with modified
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the edge of a chair with your back straight and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Extend one leg straight out in front of you, keeping your heel on the ground.
Step:3 Lean forward slightly, feeling a stretch in your quads.
Step:4 Hold this position for 20-30 seconds. Focus on modified movement.
Step:5 Switch legs and repeat the stretch.

translations.name: estiramiento de pierna extendida en silla modificado
instructions: Paso:1 Siéntate en el borde de una silla con la espalda recta y los pies planos en el suelo.
Paso:2 Extiende una pierna recta frente a ti, manteniendo el talón en el suelo.
Paso:3 Inclínate ligeramente hacia adelante, sintiendo un estiramiento en los cuádriceps.
Paso:4 Mantén esta posición durante 20-30 segundos. Concéntrate en el movimiento modificado.
Paso:5 Cambia de pierna y repite el estiramiento.

name: cable concentration curl tempo
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench or chair with your feet flat on the floor and your knees slightly bent.
Step:2 Hold the cable handle with an underhand grip and rest your elbow against the inside of your thigh. Focus on tempo movement.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arm stationary, exhale and curl the cable handle towards your shoulder while contracting your biceps.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top of the movement, then inhale and slowly lower the cable handle back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

translations.name: cable concentration curl tempo
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench or chair with your feet flat on the floor and your knees slightly bent.
Step:2 Hold the cable handle with an underhand grip and rest your elbow against the inside of your thigh. Focus on tempo movement.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arm stationary, exhale and curl the cable handle towards your shoulder while contracting your biceps.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top of the movement, then inhale and slowly lower the cable handle back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

translations.name: curl de concentración con cable a tempo
instructions: Paso:1 Siéntate en un banco o silla con los pies planos en el suelo y las rodillas ligeramente flexionadas.
Paso:2 Sostén la manija del cable con un agarre supino y apoya el codo en la parte interior de tu muslo. Concéntrate en el movimiento a tempo.
Paso:3 Manteniendo la parte superior del brazo inmóvil, exhala y flexiona la manija del cable hacia tu hombro mientras contraes los bíceps.
Paso:4 Haz una pausa por un momento en la parte superior del movimiento, luego inhala y baja lentamente la manija del cable a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambia de brazo.

name: intense barbell straight leg deadlift
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your toes pointing forward.
Step:2 Hold the barbell with an overhand grip, hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Bend at your hips and lower the barbell towards the ground, keeping your back straight and your knees slightly bent.
Step:4 Lower the barbell until you feel a stretch in your hamstrings. Maintain intense form throughout.
Step:5 Engage your hamstrings and glutes to lift the barbell back up to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: intense barbell straight leg deadlift
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your toes pointing forward.
Step:2 Hold the barbell with an overhand grip, hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Bend at your hips and lower the barbell towards the ground, keeping your back straight and your knees slightly bent.
Step:4 Lower the barbell until you feel a stretch in your hamstrings. Maintain intense form throughout.
Step:5 Engage your hamstrings and glutes to lift the barbell back up to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: peso muerto intenso con barra y piernas rectas
instructions: Paso:1 Párate con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y los dedos apuntando hacia adelante.
Paso:2 Sostén la barra con un agarre prono, con las manos un poco más separadas que el ancho de los hombros.
Paso:3 Flexiona las caderas y baja la barra hacia el suelo, manteniendo la espalda recta y las rodillas ligeramente flexionadas.
Paso:4 Baja la barra hasta que sientas un estiramiento en los isquiotibiales. Mantén una forma intensa en todo momento.
Paso:5 Activa los isquiotibiales y los glúteos para levantar la barra de nuevo a la posición inicial.
Paso:6 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: precision style lever bent-over row with v-bar
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and position yourself facing the machine.
Step:2 Grasp the v-bar with an overhand grip, keeping your back straight and your knees slightly bent.
Step:3 Pull the v-bar towards your abdomen, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top of the movement, then slowly release the weight back to the starting position. Emphasize precision control.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: precision style lever bent-over row with v-bar
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and position yourself facing the machine.
Step:2 Grasp the v-bar with an overhand grip, keeping your back straight and your knees slightly bent.
Step:3 Pull the v-bar towards your abdomen, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top of the movement, then slowly release the weight back to the starting position. Emphasize precision control.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: remo inclinado con barra en V en máquina de palanca estilo precisión
instructions: Paso:1 Ajusta la altura del asiento y colócate de cara a la máquina.
Paso:2 Agarra la barra en V con un agarre prono, manteniendo la espalda recta y las rodillas ligeramente flexionadas.
Paso:3 Jala la barra en V hacia tu abdomen, apretando los omóplatos.
Paso:4 Haz una pausa por un momento en la parte superior del movimiento, luego suelta lentamente el peso para volver a la posición inicial. Enfatiza el control de precisión.
Paso:5 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: high style scapula push-up
instructions: Step:1 Start in a high plank position with your hands directly under your shoulders and your body in a straight line.
Step:2 Lower your chest towards the ground, keeping your elbows close to your body.
Step:3 As you lower, squeeze your shoulder blades together and push your chest forward. Focus on high movement.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: high style scapula push-up
instructions: Step:1 Start in a high plank position with your hands directly under your shoulders and your body in a straight line.
Step:2 Lower your chest towards the ground, keeping your elbows close to your body.
Step:3 As you lower, squeeze your shoulder blades together and push your chest forward. Focus on high movement.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: flexión escapular estilo alto
instructions: Paso:1 Comienza en una posición de plancha alta con las manos directamente debajo de los hombros y el cuerpo en línea recta.
Paso:2 Baja el pecho hacia el suelo, manteniendo los codos cerca del cuerpo.
Paso:3 Mientras bajas, aprieta los omóplatos y empuja el pecho hacia adelante. Concéntrate en el movimiento alto.
Paso:4 Haz una pausa por un momento en la parte inferior, luego empuja hacia arriba para volver a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: barbell reverse preacher curl inclined
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a preacher bench with your chest against the pad and your arms extended straight down, holding a barbell with an overhand grip.
Step:2 Keeping your upper arms stationary, exhale and curl the barbell upward while contracting your biceps.
Step:3 Continue to raise the barbell until your biceps are fully contracted and the barbell is at shoulder level. Perform with inclined intensity.
Step:4 Hold the contracted position for a brief pause as you squeeze your biceps.
Step:5 Inhale and slowly lower the barbell back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: barbell reverse preacher curl inclined
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a preacher bench with your chest against the pad and your arms extended straight down, holding a barbell with an overhand grip.
Step:2 Keeping your upper arms stationary, exhale and curl the barbell upward while contracting your biceps.
Step:3 Continue to raise the barbell until your biceps are fully contracted and the barbell is at shoulder level. Perform with inclined intensity.
Step:4 Hold the contracted position for a brief pause as you squeeze your biceps.
Step:5 Inhale and slowly lower the barbell back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: curl predicador inverso inclinado con barra
instructions: Paso:1 Siéntate en un banco predicador con el pecho contra la almohadilla y los brazos extendidos hacia abajo, sosteniendo una barra con un agarre prono.
Paso:2 Manteniendo la parte superior de los brazos inmóvil, exhala y flexiona la barra hacia arriba mientras contraes los bíceps.
Paso:3 Continúa levantando la barra hasta que tus bíceps estén completamente contraídos y la barra esté a la altura de los hombros. Realiza con intensidad inclinada.
Paso:4 Mantén la posición contraída durante una breve pausa mientras aprietas los bíceps.
Paso:5 Inhala y baja lentamente la barra a la posición inicial.
Paso:6 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: lever reverse grip preacher curl with precision
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and position yourself on the leverage machine.
Step:2 Grasp the handles with an underhand grip, palms facing up.
Step:3 Rest your upper arms on the preacher pad, ensuring your elbows are fully extended. Maintain precision form throughout.
Step:4 Keeping your upper arms stationary, exhale and curl the handles towards your shoulders.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top of the movement, squeezing your biceps.
Step:6 Inhale and slowly lower the handles back to the starting position, fully extending your elbows.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: lever reverse grip preacher curl with precision
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and position yourself on the leverage machine.
Step:2 Grasp the handles with an underhand grip, palms facing up.
Step:3 Rest your upper arms on the preacher pad, ensuring your elbows are fully extended. Maintain precision form throughout.
Step:4 Keeping your upper arms stationary, exhale and curl the handles towards your shoulders.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top of the movement, squeezing your biceps.
Step:6 Inhale and slowly lower the handles back to the starting position, fully extending your elbows.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: curl predicador con agarre inverso en máquina de palanca con precisión
instructions: Paso:1 Ajusta la altura del asiento y colócate en la máquina de palanca.
Paso:2 Agarra las manijas con un agarre supino, con las palmas hacia arriba.
Paso:3 Apoya la parte superior de los brazos en la almohadilla del predicador, asegurándote de que tus codos estén completamente extendidos. Mantén una forma precisa en todo momento.
Paso:4 Manteniendo la parte superior de los brazos inmóvil, exhala y flexiona las manijas hacia tus hombros.
Paso:5 Haz una pausa por un momento en la parte superior del movimiento, apretando los bíceps.
Paso:6 Inhala y baja lentamente las manijas a la posición inicial, extendiendo completamente los codos.
Paso:7 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: narrow style band jack knife sit-up
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your legs straight and your arms extended overhead, holding the band.
Step:2 Engage your abs and lift your legs and upper body simultaneously, bringing your hands towards your feet.
Step:3 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your legs and upper body back down to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions. Focus on narrow movement.

translations.name: narrow style band jack knife sit-up
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your legs straight and your arms extended overhead, holding the band.
Step:2 Engage your abs and lift your legs and upper body simultaneously, bringing your hands towards your feet.
Step:3 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your legs and upper body back down to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions. Focus on narrow movement.

translations.name: abdominal navaja con banda estilo estrecho
instructions: Paso:1 Acuéstate boca arriba con las piernas rectas y los brazos extendidos por encima de la cabeza, sosteniendo la banda.
Paso:2 Activa tus abdominales y levanta las piernas y la parte superior del cuerpo simultáneamente, llevando las manos hacia los pies.
Paso:3 Haz una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, luego baja lentamente las piernas y la parte superior del cuerpo a la posición inicial.
Paso:4 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones. Concéntrate en el movimiento estrecho.

name: forward lunge (male) with bench
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet hip-width apart and hands on your hips.
Step:2 Take a big step forward with your right foot, lowering your body into a lunge position.
Step:3 Bend your right knee to about 90 degrees, keeping your knee aligned with your ankle.
Step:4 Push off with your right foot and return to the starting position. Focus on bench movement.
Step:5 Repeat with your left leg, alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: forward lunge (male) with bench
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet hip-width apart and hands on your hips.
Step:2 Take a big step forward with your right foot, lowering your body into a lunge position.
Step:3 Bend your right knee to about 90 degrees, keeping your knee aligned with your ankle.
Step:4 Push off with your right foot and return to the starting position. Focus on bench movement.
Step:5 Repeat with your left leg, alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: zancada hacia adelante (masculino) con banco
instructions: Paso:1 Párate con los pies separados al ancho de las caderas y las manos en las caderas.
Paso:2 Da un gran paso hacia adelante con el pie derecho, bajando el cuerpo a una posición de zancada.
Paso:3 Flexiona la rodilla derecha a unos 90 grados, manteniendo la rodilla alineada con el tobillo.
Paso:4 Empuja con el pie derecho y vuelve a la posición inicial. Concéntrate en el movimiento del banco.
Paso:5 Repite con la pierna izquierda, alternando lados para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: alternating bear crawl
instructions: Step:1 Start on all fours with your hands directly under your shoulders and your knees directly under your hips.
Step:2 Lift your knees slightly off the ground, keeping your back flat and your core engaged.
Step:3 Move your right hand and left foot forward simultaneously, followed by your left hand and right foot.
Step:4 Continue crawling forward, alternating your hand and foot movements.
Step:5 Maintain a steady pace and keep your core tight throughout the exercise.
Step:6 (alternating variation) Continue for the desired distance or time.

translations.name: alternating bear crawl
instructions: Step:1 Start on all fours with your hands directly under your shoulders and your knees directly under your hips.
Step:2 Lift your knees slightly off the ground, keeping your back flat and your core engaged.
Step:3 Move your right hand and left foot forward simultaneously, followed by your left hand and right foot.
Step:4 Continue crawling forward, alternating your hand and foot movements.
Step:5 Maintain a steady pace and keep your core tight throughout the exercise.
Step:6 (alternating variation) Continue for the desired distance or time.

translations.name: gateo de oso alterno
instructions: Paso:1 Comienza en cuatro puntos con las manos directamente debajo de los hombros y las rodillas directamente debajo de las caderas.
Paso:2 Levanta las rodillas ligeramente del suelo, manteniendo la espalda plana y el core activado.
Paso:3 Mueve la mano derecha y el pie izquierdo hacia adelante simultáneamente, seguido por la mano izquierda y el pie derecho.
Paso:4 Continúa gateando hacia adelante, alternando los movimientos de manos y pies.
Paso:5 Mantén un ritmo constante y el core apretado durante todo el ejercicio.
Paso:6 (variación alterna) Continúa durante la distancia o el tiempo deseado.

name: single style cable standing crunch (with rope attachment)
instructions: Step:1 Attach a rope to a cable machine at chest height.
Step:2 Stand facing away from the machine with your feet shoulder-width apart. Focus on single movement.
Step:3 Hold the rope with both hands and bring it behind your head, keeping your elbows bent.
Step:4 Engage your abs and slowly crunch your torso forward, bringing your elbows towards your knees.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top of the crunch, then slowly return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: single style cable standing crunch (with rope attachment)
instructions: Step:1 Attach a rope to a cable machine at chest height.
Step:2 Stand facing away from the machine with your feet shoulder-width apart. Focus on single movement.
Step:3 Hold the rope with both hands and bring it behind your head, keeping your elbows bent.
Step:4 Engage your abs and slowly crunch your torso forward, bringing your elbows towards your knees.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top of the crunch, then slowly return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: crunch de pie con cable estilo único (con agarre de cuerda)
instructions: Paso:1 Conecta una cuerda a una máquina de cable a la altura del pecho.
Paso:2 Párate de espaldas a la máquina con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros. Concéntrate en el movimiento único.
Paso:3 Sostén la cuerda con ambas manos y llévala detrás de la cabeza, manteniendo los codos flexionados.
Paso:4 Activa tus abdominales y flexiona lentamente el torso hacia adelante, llevando los codos hacia las rodillas.
Paso:5 Haz una pausa por un momento en la parte superior del crunch, luego regresa lentamente a la posición inicial.
Paso:6 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: rough band push sit-up
instructions: Step:1 Attach the band securely to a stable anchor point.
Step:2 Lie flat on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:3 Hold the band with both hands and extend your arms straight up towards the ceiling. Focus on rough movement.
Step:4 Engaging your abs, slowly lift your upper body off the ground, curling forward until your torso is at a 45-degree angle.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your upper body back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: rough band push sit-up
instructions: Step:1 Attach the band securely to a stable anchor point.
Step:2 Lie flat on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:3 Hold the band with both hands and extend your arms straight up towards the ceiling. Focus on rough movement.
Step:4 Engaging your abs, slowly lift your upper body off the ground, curling forward until your torso is at a 45-degree angle.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your upper body back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: abdominal con empuje y banda
instructions: Paso:1 Sujeta la banda de forma segura a un punto de anclaje estable.
Paso:2 Acuéstate boca arriba con las rodillas flexionadas y los pies planos en el suelo.
Paso:3 Sostén la banda con ambas manos y extiende los brazos rectos hacia el techo. Concéntrate en un movimiento explosivo.
Paso:4 Activando tus abdominales, levanta lentamente la parte superior del cuerpo del suelo, encorvándote hacia adelante hasta que tu torso esté en un ángulo de 45 grados.
Paso:5 Haz una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, luego baja lentamente la parte superior del cuerpo a la posición inicial.
Paso:6 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: fast style resistance band seated hip abduction
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a chair or bench with your back straight and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Wrap the resistance band around your thighs, just above your knees.
Step:3 Place your hands on the sides of the chair or bench for support.
Step:4 (fast variation) Engage your abductors (outer thigh muscles) and slowly push your knees apart, against the resistance of the band.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the end of the movement, then slowly bring your knees back together.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: fast style resistance band seated hip abduction
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a chair or bench with your back straight and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Wrap the resistance band around your thighs, just above your knees.
Step:3 Place your hands on the sides of the chair or bench for support.
Step:4 (fast variation) Engage your abductors (outer thigh muscles) and slowly push your knees apart, against the resistance of the band.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the end of the movement, then slowly bring your knees back together.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: abducción de cadera sentada con banda de resistencia estilo rápido
instructions: Paso:1 Siéntate en una silla o banco con la espalda recta y los pies planos en el suelo.
Paso:2 Coloca la banda de resistencia alrededor de tus muslos, justo por encima de las rodillas.
Paso:3 Coloca las manos a los lados de la silla o banco para apoyarte.
Paso:4 (variación rápida) Activa tus abductores (músculos externos del muslo) y empuja lentamente las rodillas hacia afuera, contra la resistencia de la banda.
Paso:5 Haz una pausa por un momento al final del movimiento, luego junta lentamente las rodillas de nuevo.
Paso:6 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: pure chin-up
instructions: Step:1 Hang from a pull-up bar with your palms facing towards you and your hands shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Engage your core and pull your body up towards the bar, leading with your chest. Emphasize pure control.
Step:3 Continue pulling until your chin is above the bar.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your body back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: pure chin-up
instructions: Step:1 Hang from a pull-up bar with your palms facing towards you and your hands shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Engage your core and pull your body up towards the bar, leading with your chest. Emphasize pure control.
Step:3 Continue pulling until your chin is above the bar.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your body back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dominada pura
instructions: Paso:1 Cuélgate de una barra de dominadas con las palmas de las manos hacia ti y las manos separadas al ancho de los hombros.
Paso:2 Activa tu core y jala tu cuerpo hacia la barra, liderando con el pecho. Enfatiza el control puro.
Paso:3 Continúa jalando hasta que tu barbilla esté por encima de la barra.
Paso:4 Haz una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, luego baja lentamente el cuerpo a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: light lever standing chest press
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and position yourself on the machine with your feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Grasp the handles with an overhand grip and position your hands at chest level. Maintain light form throughout.
Step:3 Push the handles forward until your arms are fully extended, keeping your elbows slightly bent.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then slowly bring the handles back towards your chest, maintaining control throughout the movement.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: light lever standing chest press
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and position yourself on the machine with your feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Grasp the handles with an overhand grip and position your hands at chest level. Maintain light form throughout.
Step:3 Push the handles forward until your arms are fully extended, keeping your elbows slightly bent.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then slowly bring the handles back towards your chest, maintaining control throughout the movement.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: press de pecho ligero de pie en máquina de palanca
instructions: Paso:1 Ajusta la altura del asiento y colócate en la máquina con los pies planos en el suelo.
Paso:2 Agarra las manijas con un agarre prono y coloca las manos a la altura del pecho. Mantén una forma ligera en todo momento.
Paso:3 Empuja las manijas hacia adelante hasta que tus brazos estén completamente extendidos, manteniendo los codos ligeramente flexionados.
Paso:4 Haz una pausa por un momento, luego regresa lentamente las manijas hacia tu pecho, manteniendo el control durante todo el movimiento.
Paso:5 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: resistance band seated shoulder press with declined
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a chair or bench with your back straight and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Hold the resistance band with both hands, palms facing forward, and bring it up to shoulder level.
Step:3 Press the band overhead, extending your arms fully.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the band back down to shoulder level. Emphasize declined control.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: resistance band seated shoulder press with declined
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a chair or bench with your back straight and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Hold the resistance band with both hands, palms facing forward, and bring it up to shoulder level.
Step:3 Press the band overhead, extending your arms fully.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the band back down to shoulder level. Emphasize declined control.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: press de hombros sentado con banda de resistencia y declinación
instructions: Paso:1 Siéntate en una silla o banco con la espalda recta y los pies planos en el suelo.
Paso:2 Sostén la banda de resistencia con ambas manos, con las palmas hacia adelante, y llévala a la altura de los hombros.
Paso:3 Empuja la banda por encima de la cabeza, extendiendo completamente los brazos.
Paso:4 Haz una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, luego baja lentamente la banda a la altura de los hombros. Enfatiza el control declinado.
Paso:5 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: barbell prone incline curl with intensive
instructions: Step:1 Set up an incline bench at a 45-degree angle.
Step:2 Lie face down on the bench with your chest and stomach resting against it.
Step:3 Hold a barbell with an underhand grip, shoulder-width apart.
Step:4 Extend your arms fully, allowing the barbell to hang down towards the floor.
Step:5 Keeping your upper arms stationary, exhale and curl the weights while contracting your biceps.
Step:6 Continue to raise the barbell until your biceps are fully contracted and the bar is at shoulder level.
Step:7 (intensive variation) Hold the contracted position for a brief pause as you squeeze your biceps.
Step:8 Inhale and slowly begin to lower the barbell back to the starting position.
Step:9 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: barbell prone incline curl with intensive
instructions: Step:1 Set up an incline bench at a 45-degree angle.
Step:2 Lie face down on the bench with your chest and stomach resting against it.
Step:3 Hold a barbell with an underhand grip, shoulder-width apart.
Step:4 Extend your arms fully, allowing the barbell to hang down towards the floor.
Step:5 Keeping your upper arms stationary, exhale and curl the weights while contracting your biceps.
Step:6 Continue to raise the barbell until your biceps are fully contracted and the bar is at shoulder level.
Step:7 (intensive variation) Hold the contracted position for a brief pause as you squeeze your biceps.
Step:8 Inhale and slowly begin to lower the barbell back to the starting position.
Step:9 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: curl inclinado prono con barra intensivo
instructions: Paso:1 Coloca un banco inclinado en un ángulo de 45 grados.
Paso:2 Acuéstate boca abajo en el banco con el pecho y el estómago apoyados en él.
Paso:3 Sostén una barra con un agarre supino, separado al ancho de los hombros.
Paso:4 Extiende los brazos completamente, permitiendo que la barra cuelgue hacia el suelo.
Paso:5 Manteniendo la parte superior de los brazos inmóvil, exhala y flexiona las pesas mientras contraes los bíceps.
Paso:6 Continúa levantando la barra hasta que tus bíceps estén completamente contraídos y la barra esté a la altura de los hombros.
Paso:7 (variación intensiva) Mantén la posición contraída durante una breve pausa mientras aprietas los bíceps.
Paso:8 Inhala y comienza a bajar lentamente la barra a la posición inicial.
Paso:9 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: barbell standing reverse grip curl resistance
instructions: Step:1 Stand up straight with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a barbell with an underhand grip, palms facing up.
Step:2 Keep your elbows close to your torso and your upper arms stationary.
Step:3 Exhale and curl the weights while contracting your biceps, bringing the barbell as close to your shoulders as possible.
Step:4 Hold the contracted position for a brief pause as you squeeze your biceps.
Step:5 Inhale and slowly lower the barbell back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions. Focus on resistance movement.

translations.name: barbell standing reverse grip curl resistance
instructions: Step:1 Stand up straight with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a barbell with an underhand grip, palms facing up.
Step:2 Keep your elbows close to your torso and your upper arms stationary.
Step:3 Exhale and curl the weights while contracting your biceps, bringing the barbell as close to your shoulders as possible.
Step:4 Hold the contracted position for a brief pause as you squeeze your biceps.
Step:5 Inhale and slowly lower the barbell back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions. Focus on resistance movement.

translations.name: curl de pie con agarre inverso y resistencia con barra
instructions: Paso:1 Párate derecho con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y sostén una barra con un agarre supino, con las palmas hacia arriba.
Paso:2 Mantén los codos cerca del torso y la parte superior de los brazos inmóvil.
Paso:3 Exhala y flexiona las pesas mientras contraes los bíceps, acercando la barra lo más posible a tus hombros.
Paso:4 Mantén la posición contraída durante una breve pausa mientras aprietas los bíceps.
Paso:5 Inhala y baja lentamente la barra a la posición inicial.
Paso:6 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones. Concéntrate en el movimiento de resistencia.

name: exercise ball hip flexor stretch pointed
instructions: Step:1 Place the stability ball on the ground and kneel in front of it.
Step:2 Place your right foot on top of the stability ball, with your knee bent at a 90-degree angle.
Step:3 Extend your left leg behind you, keeping it straight.
Step:4 Lean forward, pushing your hips towards the stability ball, until you feel a stretch in your right hip flexor.
Step:5 Hold the stretch for 20-30 seconds, then switch sides and repeat. Emphasize pointed control.

translations.name: exercise ball hip flexor stretch pointed
instructions: Step:1 Place the stability ball on the ground and kneel in front of it.
Step:2 Place your right foot on top of the stability ball, with your knee bent at a 90-degree angle.
Step:3 Extend your left leg behind you, keeping it straight.
Step:4 Lean forward, pushing your hips towards the stability ball, until you feel a stretch in your right hip flexor.
Step:5 Hold the stretch for 20-30 seconds, then switch sides and repeat. Emphasize pointed control.

translations.name: estiramiento de flexor de cadera con pelota de ejercicio en punta
instructions: Paso:1 Coloca la pelota de estabilidad en el suelo y arrodíllate frente a ella.
Paso:2 Coloca el pie derecho sobre la pelota de estabilidad, con la rodilla flexionada en un ángulo de 90 grados.
Paso:3 Extiende la pierna izquierda detrás de ti, manteniéndola recta.
Paso:4 Inclínate hacia adelante, empujando las caderas hacia la pelota de estabilidad, hasta que sientas un estiramiento en el flexor de la cadera derecha.
Paso:5 Mantén el estiramiento durante 20-30 segundos, luego cambia de lado y repite. Enfatiza el control en punta.

name: rough band hip lift
instructions: Step:1 Lie on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Place a resistance band just above your knees.
Step:3 Engage your glutes and core muscles.
Step:4 Press your heels into the ground and lift your hips off the floor, squeezing your glutes at the top.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your hips back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions. Focus on rough movement.

translations.name: rough band hip lift
instructions: Step:1 Lie on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Place a resistance band just above your knees.
Step:3 Engage your glutes and core muscles.
Step:4 Press your heels into the ground and lift your hips off the floor, squeezing your glutes at the top.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your hips back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions. Focus on rough movement.

translations.name: elevación de cadera con banda
instructions: Paso:1 Acuéstate boca arriba con las rodillas flexionadas y los pies planos en el suelo.
Paso:2 Coloca una banda de resistencia justo por encima de tus rodillas.
Paso:3 Activa los músculos de los glúteos y del core.
Paso:4 Presiona los talones contra el suelo y levanta las caderas del suelo, apretando los glúteos en la parte superior.
Paso:5 Haz una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, luego baja lentamente las caderas a la posición inicial.
Paso:6 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones. Concéntrate en un movimiento explosivo.

name: flexible assisted prone hamstring
instructions: Step:1 Lie face down on a mat or bench with your legs fully extended.
Step:2 (flexible variation) Have a partner or use a resistance band to secure your ankles.
Step:3 Engage your hamstrings and lift your legs towards your glutes, keeping your knees straight.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your legs back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: flexible assisted prone hamstring
instructions: Step:1 Lie face down on a mat or bench with your legs fully extended.
Step:2 (flexible variation) Have a partner or use a resistance band to secure your ankles.
Step:3 Engage your hamstrings and lift your legs towards your glutes, keeping your knees straight.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your legs back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: isquiotibial prono asistido flexible
instructions: Paso:1 Acuéstate boca abajo en una colchoneta o banco con las piernas completamente extendidas.
Paso:2 (variación flexible) Pide a un compañero o usa una banda de resistencia para asegurar tus tobillos.
Paso:3 Activa tus isquiotibiales y levanta las piernas hacia los glúteos, manteniendo las rodillas rectas.
Paso:4 Haz una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, luego baja lentamente las piernas a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: incline push-up (on box) - active variation
instructions: Step:1 Place your hands on the edge of a box or elevated surface, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Extend your legs behind you, resting on the balls of your feet, creating a straight line from your head to your heels.
Step:3 Lower your chest towards the box by bending your elbows, keeping your body in a straight line.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push yourself back up to the starting position by straightening your arms.
Step:5 (active variation) Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: incline push-up (on box) - active variation
instructions: Step:1 Place your hands on the edge of a box or elevated surface, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Extend your legs behind you, resting on the balls of your feet, creating a straight line from your head to your heels.
Step:3 Lower your chest towards the box by bending your elbows, keeping your body in a straight line.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push yourself back up to the starting position by straightening your arms.
Step:5 (active variation) Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: flexión inclinada (sobre cajón) - variación activa
instructions: Paso:1 Coloca las manos en el borde de un cajón o superficie elevada, un poco más separadas que el ancho de los hombros.
Paso:2 Extiende las piernas detrás de ti, apoyándote en las puntas de los pies, creando una línea recta desde la cabeza hasta los talones.
Paso:3 Baja el pecho hacia el cajón flexionando los codos, manteniendo el cuerpo en línea recta.
Paso:4 Haz una pausa por un momento en la parte inferior, luego empújate hacia arriba a la posición inicial estirando los brazos.
Paso:5 (variación activa) Repite el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: barbell bent arm pullover - powerful variation
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on a bench with your head at one end and your feet on the floor.
Step:2 Hold a barbell with a shoulder-width grip and extend your arms straight above your chest.
Step:3 Lower the barbell behind your head while keeping your arms slightly bent.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then raise the barbell back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions. Focus on powerful movement.

translations.name: barbell bent arm pullover - powerful variation
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on a bench with your head at one end and your feet on the floor.
Step:2 Hold a barbell with a shoulder-width grip and extend your arms straight above your chest.
Step:3 Lower the barbell behind your head while keeping your arms slightly bent.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then raise the barbell back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions. Focus on powerful movement.

translations.name: pullover con brazos flexionados y barra - variación potente
instructions: Paso:1 Acuéstate en un banco plano con la cabeza en un extremo y los pies en el suelo.
Paso:2 Sostén una barra con un agarre al ancho de los hombros y extiende los brazos rectos sobre tu pecho.
Paso:3 Baja la barra detrás de tu cabeza manteniendo los brazos ligeramente flexionados.
Paso:4 Haz una pausa por un momento, luego levanta la barra de regreso a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones. Concéntrate en un movimiento potente.

name: core barbell upright row v. 2
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a barbell with an overhand grip, hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Let the barbell hang in front of your thighs, arms fully extended. Perform with core intensity.
Step:3 Keeping your back straight, exhale and lift the barbell straight up towards your chin, leading with your elbows.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then inhale and slowly lower the barbell back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: core barbell upright row v. 2
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a barbell with an overhand grip, hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Let the barbell hang in front of your thighs, arms fully extended. Perform with core intensity.
Step:3 Keeping your back straight, exhale and lift the barbell straight up towards your chin, leading with your elbows.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then inhale and slowly lower the barbell back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: remo al mentón con barra para core v. 2
instructions: Paso:1 Párate con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y sostén una barra con un agarre prono, con las manos un poco más separadas que el ancho de los hombros.
Paso:2 Deja que la barra cuelgue frente a tus muslos, con los brazos completamente extendidos. Realiza con intensidad en el core.
Paso:3 Manteniendo la espalda recta, exhala y levanta la barra directamente hacia tu barbilla, liderando con los codos.
Paso:4 Haz una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, luego inhala y baja lentamente la barra a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones.
