name: dumbbell step up single leg balance with bicep curl - chair variation
instructions: Step:1 Stand in front of a step or platform with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing your body.
Step:2 Place your right foot on the step, ensuring your entire foot is in contact with the surface.
Step:3 Engage your core and push through your right heel to lift your body up onto the step, bringing your left knee up towards your chest.
Step:4 At the top of the movement, perform a bicep curl by bending your elbows and bringing the dumbbells towards your shoulders.
Step:5 Lower the dumbbells back down and simultaneously lower your left foot back to the ground.
Step:6 (chair variation) Repeat the movement on the opposite side, stepping up with your left foot and curling the dumbbells.
Step:7 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell step up single leg balance with bicep curl - chair variation
instructions: Step:1 Stand in front of a step or platform with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing your body.
Step:2 Place your right foot on the step, ensuring your entire foot is in contact with the surface.
Step:3 Engage your core and push through your right heel to lift your body up onto the step, bringing your left knee up towards your chest.
Step:4 At the top of the movement, perform a bicep curl by bending your elbows and bringing the dumbbells towards your shoulders.
Step:5 Lower the dumbbells back down and simultaneously lower your left foot back to the ground.
Step:6 (chair variation) Repeat the movement on the opposite side, stepping up with your left foot and curling the dumbbells.
Step:7 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: subida al cajón con equilibrio a una pierna y curl de bíceps con mancuerna - variación con silla
instructions: Paso:1 Párate frente a un escalón o plataforma con una mancuerna en cada mano, con las palmas hacia tu cuerpo.
Paso:2 Coloca el pie derecho en el escalón, asegurándote de que todo el pie esté en contacto con la superficie.
Paso:3 Activa tu core y empuja con el talón derecho para levantar el cuerpo sobre el escalón, llevando la rodilla izquierda hacia el pecho.
Paso:4 En la parte superior del movimiento, realiza un curl de bíceps flexionando los codos y llevando las mancuernas hacia los hombros.
Paso:5 Baja las mancuernas y simultáneamente baja el pie izquierdo al suelo.
Paso:6 (variación con silla) Repite el movimiento en el lado opuesto, subiendo con el pie izquierdo y haciendo el curl con las mancuernas.
Paso:7 Continúa alternando lados para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: band one arm standing low row - lateral variation
instructions: Step:1 Attach the band to a stable anchor point at waist height.
Step:2 Stand facing the anchor point with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Hold the band with one hand, palm facing inward, and step back to create tension in the band.
Step:4 Bend your knees slightly and hinge forward at the hips, keeping your back straight.
Step:5 Pull the band towards your waist, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the top of the movement, then slowly release the band back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides. Emphasize lateral control.

translations.name: band one arm standing low row - lateral variation
instructions: Step:1 Attach the band to a stable anchor point at waist height.
Step:2 Stand facing the anchor point with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Hold the band with one hand, palm facing inward, and step back to create tension in the band.
Step:4 Bend your knees slightly and hinge forward at the hips, keeping your back straight.
Step:5 Pull the band towards your waist, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the top of the movement, then slowly release the band back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides. Emphasize lateral control.

translations.name: remo bajo de pie a un brazo con banda - variación lateral
instructions: Paso:1 Sujeta la banda a un punto de anclaje estable a la altura de la cintura.
Paso:2 Párate de frente al punto de anclaje con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros.
Paso:3 Sostén la banda con una mano, con la palma hacia adentro, y da un paso atrás para crear tensión en la banda.
Paso:4 Flexiona ligeramente las rodillas e inclínate hacia adelante desde las caderas, manteniendo la espalda recta.
Paso:5 Jala la banda hacia tu cintura, apretando los omóplatos.
Paso:6 Haz una pausa por un momento en la parte superior del movimiento, luego suelta lentamente la banda para volver a la posición inicial.
Paso:7 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambia de lado. Enfatiza el control lateral.

name: endurance style one arm dip
instructions: Step:1 Stand facing away from a bench or chair, with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Place one hand on the bench or chair behind you, fingers pointing towards your body. Maintain endurance form throughout.
Step:3 Extend your legs out in front of you, keeping your heels on the ground.
Step:4 Bend your elbows and lower your body towards the ground, keeping your back close to the bench or chair.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push through your palms to straighten your arms and return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides and repeat with the other arm.

translations.name: endurance style one arm dip
instructions: Step:1 Stand facing away from a bench or chair, with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Place one hand on the bench or chair behind you, fingers pointing towards your body. Maintain endurance form throughout.
Step:3 Extend your legs out in front of you, keeping your heels on the ground.
Step:4 Bend your elbows and lower your body towards the ground, keeping your back close to the bench or chair.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push through your palms to straighten your arms and return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides and repeat with the other arm.

translations.name: fondo a un brazo estilo resistencia
instructions: Paso:1 Párate de espaldas a un banco o silla, con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros.
Paso:2 Coloca una mano en el banco o silla detrás de ti, con los dedos apuntando hacia tu cuerpo. Mantén la forma de resistencia en todo momento.
Paso:3 Extiende las piernas frente a ti, manteniendo los talones en el suelo.
Paso:4 Flexiona los codos y baja el cuerpo hacia el suelo, manteniendo la espalda cerca del banco o silla.
Paso:5 Haz una pausa por un momento en la parte inferior, luego empuja con las palmas para estirar los brazos y volver a la posición inicial.
Paso:6 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambia de lado y repite con el otro brazo.

name: cable side bend smooth
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and grasp the cable handle with one hand.
Step:2 Keep your back straight and your core engaged.
Step:3 Slowly bend sideways at the waist, lowering the cable handle towards your knee.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then return to the starting position. Focus on smooth movement.
Step:5 Repeat on the other side.
Step:6 Alternate sides for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: cable side bend smooth
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and grasp the cable handle with one hand.
Step:2 Keep your back straight and your core engaged.
Step:3 Slowly bend sideways at the waist, lowering the cable handle towards your knee.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then return to the starting position. Focus on smooth movement.
Step:5 Repeat on the other side.
Step:6 Alternate sides for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: flexión lateral con cable suave
instructions: Paso:1 Párate con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y agarra la manija del cable con una mano.
Paso:2 Mantén la espalda recta y el core activado.
Paso:3 Flexiona lentamente la cintura hacia un lado, bajando la manija del cable hacia la rodilla.
Paso:4 Haz una pausa por un momento, luego regresa a la posición inicial. Concéntrate en un movimiento suave.
Paso:5 Repite en el otro lado.
Paso:6 Alterna los lados para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell decline shrug - rigid variation
instructions: Step:1 Set up a decline bench at a 45-degree angle.
Step:2 Lie face down on the bench with your chest and stomach resting against it.
Step:3 (rigid variation) Hold a dumbbell in each hand with your arms fully extended towards the floor.
Step:4 Keeping your arms straight, raise your shoulders towards your ears as high as possible.
Step:5 Hold the contraction for a moment, then slowly lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell decline shrug - rigid variation
instructions: Step:1 Set up a decline bench at a 45-degree angle.
Step:2 Lie face down on the bench with your chest and stomach resting against it.
Step:3 (rigid variation) Hold a dumbbell in each hand with your arms fully extended towards the floor.
Step:4 Keeping your arms straight, raise your shoulders towards your ears as high as possible.
Step:5 Hold the contraction for a moment, then slowly lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: encogimiento de hombros declinado con mancuernas - variación rígida
instructions: Paso:1 Coloca un banco declinado en un ángulo de 45 grados.
Paso:2 Acuéstate boca abajo en el banco con el pecho y el estómago apoyados contra él.
Paso:3 (variación rígida) Sostén una mancuerna en cada mano con los brazos completamente extendidos hacia el suelo.
Paso:4 Manteniendo los brazos rectos, levanta los hombros hacia las orejas lo más alto posible.
Paso:5 Mantén la contracción por un momento, luego baja lentamente las mancuernas a la posición inicial.
Paso:6 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: pulse style walk elliptical cross trainer
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the resistance level and incline of the elliptical machine to your desired settings.
Step:2 Step onto the pedals of the machine and grip the handles lightly.
Step:3 Begin by pushing down with your feet and pulling the handles towards your body.
Step:4 Continue this motion, alternating between pushing and pulling, to simulate a walking or running motion.
Step:5 Maintain a steady pace and keep your core engaged throughout the exercise. Emphasize pulse control.
Step:6 Continue for the desired duration of your cardio workout.
Step:7 Gradually decrease the intensity and speed of the machine before stepping off.

translations.name: pulse style walk elliptical cross trainer
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the resistance level and incline of the elliptical machine to your desired settings.
Step:2 Step onto the pedals of the machine and grip the handles lightly.
Step:3 Begin by pushing down with your feet and pulling the handles towards your body.
Step:4 Continue this motion, alternating between pushing and pulling, to simulate a walking or running motion.
Step:5 Maintain a steady pace and keep your core engaged throughout the exercise. Emphasize pulse control.
Step:6 Continue for the desired duration of your cardio workout.
Step:7 Gradually decrease the intensity and speed of the machine before stepping off.

translations.name: caminata en elíptica estilo pulso
instructions: Paso:1 Ajusta el nivel de resistencia y la inclinación de la máquina elíptica a tu configuración deseada.
Paso:2 Súbete a los pedales de la máquina y agarra las manijas ligeramente.
Paso:3 Comienza empujando hacia abajo con los pies y jalando las manijas hacia tu cuerpo.
Paso:4 Continúa este movimiento, alternando entre empujar y jalar, para simular un movimiento de caminar o correr.
Paso:5 Mantén un ritmo constante y el core activado durante todo el ejercicio. Enfatiza el control del pulso.
Paso:6 Continúa durante el tiempo deseado de tu entrenamiento cardiovascular.
Paso:7 Disminuye gradualmente la intensidad y la velocidad de la máquina antes de bajarte.

name: balance cable incline fly
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the cable machine to a low position and attach the handles.
Step:2 Sit on an incline bench with your back against the pad and feet flat on the floor. Perform with balance intensity.
Step:3 Grasp the handles with an overhand grip and extend your arms straight out in front of you.
Step:4 Keeping a slight bend in your elbows, open your arms out to the sides in a controlled motion.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the fully extended position, then slowly return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: balance cable incline fly
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the cable machine to a low position and attach the handles.
Step:2 Sit on an incline bench with your back against the pad and feet flat on the floor. Perform with balance intensity.
Step:3 Grasp the handles with an overhand grip and extend your arms straight out in front of you.
Step:4 Keeping a slight bend in your elbows, open your arms out to the sides in a controlled motion.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the fully extended position, then slowly return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: aperturas inclinadas con cable para equilibrio
instructions: Paso:1 Ajusta la máquina de cable a una posición baja y conecta las manijas.
Paso:2 Siéntate en un banco inclinado con la espalda contra la almohadilla y los pies planos en el suelo. Realiza con intensidad de equilibrio.
Paso:3 Agarra las manijas con un agarre prono y extiende los brazos rectos frente a ti.
Paso:4 Manteniendo una ligera flexión en los codos, abre los brazos hacia los lados con un movimiento controlado.
Paso:5 Haz una pausa por un momento en la posición totalmente extendida, luego regresa lentamente a la posición inicial.
Paso:6 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: cocoons with mega
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Place your hands behind your head with your elbows pointing outwards.
Step:3 Engaging your abs, slowly lift your upper body off the ground, curling forward until your torso is at a 45-degree angle.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your upper body back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions. Emphasize mega control.

translations.name: cocoons with mega
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Place your hands behind your head with your elbows pointing outwards.
Step:3 Engaging your abs, slowly lift your upper body off the ground, curling forward until your torso is at a 45-degree angle.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your upper body back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions. Emphasize mega control.

translations.name: encogimientos con mega
instructions: Paso:1 Acuéstate boca arriba con las rodillas flexionadas y los pies planos en el suelo.
Paso:2 Coloca las manos detrás de la cabeza con los codos apuntando hacia afuera.
Paso:3 Activando tus abdominales, levanta lentamente la parte superior del cuerpo del suelo, encorvándote hacia adelante hasta que tu torso esté en un ángulo de 45 grados.
Paso:4 Haz una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, luego baja lentamente la parte superior del cuerpo a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones. Enfatiza el mega control.

name: cable incline bench row - elite variation
instructions: Step:1 Set up an incline bench at a 45-degree angle and attach a cable handle to the low pulley.
Step:2 Sit on the bench facing the cable machine with your feet flat on the floor and your knees slightly bent.
Step:3 Grasp the cable handle with an overhand grip and extend your arms fully in front of you. Perform with elite intensity.
Step:4 Lean forward from your hips while keeping your back straight and your core engaged.
Step:5 Pull the cable handle towards your chest by retracting your shoulder blades and bending your elbows.
Step:6 Squeeze your back muscles at the top of the movement, then slowly extend your arms back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: cable incline bench row - elite variation
instructions: Step:1 Set up an incline bench at a 45-degree angle and attach a cable handle to the low pulley.
Step:2 Sit on the bench facing the cable machine with your feet flat on the floor and your knees slightly bent.
Step:3 Grasp the cable handle with an overhand grip and extend your arms fully in front of you. Perform with elite intensity.
Step:4 Lean forward from your hips while keeping your back straight and your core engaged.
Step:5 Pull the cable handle towards your chest by retracting your shoulder blades and bending your elbows.
Step:6 Squeeze your back muscles at the top of the movement, then slowly extend your arms back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: remo en banco inclinado con cable - variación de élite
instructions: Paso:1 Coloca un banco inclinado en un ángulo de 45 grados y conecta una manija de cable a la polea baja.
Paso:2 Siéntate en el banco de cara a la máquina de cable con los pies planos en el suelo y las rodillas ligeramente flexionadas.
Paso:3 Agarra la manija del cable con un agarre prono y extiende los brazos completamente frente a ti. Realiza con intensidad de élite.
Paso:4 Inclínate hacia adelante desde las caderas manteniendo la espalda recta y el core activado.
Paso:5 Tira de la manija del cable hacia tu pecho retrayendo los omóplatos y flexionando los codos.
Paso:6 Aprieta los músculos de la espalda en la parte superior del movimiento, luego extiende lentamente los brazos de regreso a la posición inicial.
Paso:7 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: flexible cable triceps pushdown (v-bar)
instructions: Step:1 Attach a v-bar attachment to the cable machine at the highest setting.
Step:2 Stand facing the cable machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Grasp the v-bar with an overhand grip, palms facing down, and your hands shoulder-width apart.
Step:4 Keep your elbows close to your sides and your upper arms stationary throughout the exercise.
Step:5 Engage your triceps and exhale as you push the v-bar down until your arms are fully extended. Perform with flexible intensity.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the bottom of the movement, squeezing your triceps.
Step:7 Inhale as you slowly return the v-bar to the starting position, maintaining control.
Step:8 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: flexible cable triceps pushdown (v-bar)
instructions: Step:1 Attach a v-bar attachment to the cable machine at the highest setting.
Step:2 Stand facing the cable machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Grasp the v-bar with an overhand grip, palms facing down, and your hands shoulder-width apart.
Step:4 Keep your elbows close to your sides and your upper arms stationary throughout the exercise.
Step:5 Engage your triceps and exhale as you push the v-bar down until your arms are fully extended. Perform with flexible intensity.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the bottom of the movement, squeezing your triceps.
Step:7 Inhale as you slowly return the v-bar to the starting position, maintaining control.
Step:8 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: jalón de tríceps flexible con cable (barra en V)
instructions: Paso:1 Conecta un accesorio de barra en V a la máquina de cable en la posición más alta.
Paso:2 Párate de frente a la máquina de cable con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros.
Paso:3 Agarra la barra en V con un agarre prono, con las palmas hacia abajo y las manos separadas al ancho de los hombros.
Paso:4 Mantén los codos cerca de los costados y la parte superior de los brazos inmóvil durante todo el ejercicio.
Paso:5 Activa tus tríceps y exhala mientras empujas la barra en V hacia abajo hasta que tus brazos estén completamente extendidos. Realiza con intensidad flexible.
Paso:6 Haz una pausa por un momento en la parte inferior del movimiento, apretando los tríceps.
Paso:7 Inhala mientras regresas lentamente la barra en V a la posición inicial, manteniendo el control.
Paso:8 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: advanced dumbbell stiff leg deadlift
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a dumbbell in each hand with an overhand grip.
Step:2 Keeping your back straight and your core engaged, hinge at the hips and lower the dumbbells towards the ground, allowing a slight bend in your knees. Focus on advanced movement.
Step:3 Lower the dumbbells until you feel a stretch in your hamstrings, then squeeze your glutes and push through your heels to return to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: advanced dumbbell stiff leg deadlift
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a dumbbell in each hand with an overhand grip.
Step:2 Keeping your back straight and your core engaged, hinge at the hips and lower the dumbbells towards the ground, allowing a slight bend in your knees. Focus on advanced movement.
Step:3 Lower the dumbbells until you feel a stretch in your hamstrings, then squeeze your glutes and push through your heels to return to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: peso muerto avanzado con piernas rígidas y mancuernas
instructions: Paso:1 Párate con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros, sosteniendo una mancuerna en cada mano con un agarre prono.

Paso:2 Manteniendo la espalda recta y el core activado, flexiona las caderas y baja las mancuernas hacia el suelo, permitiendo una ligera flexión en las rodillas. Concéntrate en el movimiento avanzado.
Paso:3 Baja las mancuernas hasta que sientas un estiramiento en los isquiotibiales, luego aprieta los glúteos y empuja con los talones para volver a la posición inicial.
Paso:4 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: hold style dumbbell alternating seated bicep curl on exercise ball
instructions: Step:1 Sit on an exercise ball with your feet flat on the ground and your back straight.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell in each hand with your palms facing forward and your arms fully extended.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arms stationary, exhale and curl one dumbbell while rotating your forearm until your palm is facing your shoulder.
Step:4 (hold variation) Inhale and slowly lower the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat the curl with the other arm.
Step:6 Continue alternating curls for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: hold style dumbbell alternating seated bicep curl on exercise ball
instructions: Step:1 Sit on an exercise ball with your feet flat on the ground and your back straight.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell in each hand with your palms facing forward and your arms fully extended.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arms stationary, exhale and curl one dumbbell while rotating your forearm until your palm is facing your shoulder.
Step:4 (hold variation) Inhale and slowly lower the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat the curl with the other arm.
Step:6 Continue alternating curls for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: curl de bíceps sentado alterno con mancuernas sobre pelota de ejercicio estilo isométrico
instructions: Paso:1 Siéntate en una pelota de ejercicio con los pies planos en el suelo y la espalda recta.
Paso:2 Sostén una mancuerna en cada mano con las palmas hacia adelante y los brazos completamente extendidos.
Paso:3 Manteniendo la parte superior de los brazos inmóvil, exhala y flexiona una mancuerna mientras giras el antebrazo hasta que la palma de la mano mire hacia tu hombro.
Paso:4 (variación de sostener) Inhala y baja lentamente la mancuerna a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite el curl con el otro brazo.
Paso:6 Continúa alternando los curls para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: active style cable pushdown
instructions: Step:1 Attach a straight bar to a high pulley cable machine.
Step:2 Stand facing the machine with your feet shoulder-width apart and a slight bend in your knees.
Step:3 Grasp the bar with an overhand grip, hands shoulder-width apart.
Step:4 Keep your elbows close to your sides and your upper arms stationary.
Step:5 Exhale and push the bar down until your elbows are fully extended.
Step:6 Pause for a moment, then inhale and slowly return the bar to the starting position. Maintain active form throughout.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: active style cable pushdown
instructions: Step:1 Attach a straight bar to a high pulley cable machine.
Step:2 Stand facing the machine with your feet shoulder-width apart and a slight bend in your knees.
Step:3 Grasp the bar with an overhand grip, hands shoulder-width apart.
Step:4 Keep your elbows close to your sides and your upper arms stationary.
Step:5 Exhale and push the bar down until your elbows are fully extended.
Step:6 Pause for a moment, then inhale and slowly return the bar to the starting position. Maintain active form throughout.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: jalón de tríceps activo con cable
instructions: Paso:1 Conecta una barra recta a una máquina de cable con polea alta.
Paso:2 Párate de frente a la máquina con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y una ligera flexión en las rodillas.
Paso:3 Agarra la barra con un agarre prono, con las manos separadas al ancho de los hombros.
Paso:4 Mantén los codos cerca de los costados y la parte superior de los brazos inmóvil.
Paso:5 Exhala y empuja la barra hacia abajo hasta que los codos estén completamente extendidos.
Paso:6 Haz una pausa por un momento, luego inhala y regresa lentamente la barra a la posición inicial. Mantén una forma activa en todo momento.
Paso:7 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: stability style band kneeling one arm pulldown
instructions: Step:1 Attach the band to a sturdy anchor point above your head.
Step:2 Kneel down and hold the band with one hand, palm facing down.
Step:3 Extend your arm fully overhead, keeping your elbow slightly bent.
Step:4 Engage your lat muscles and pull the band down towards your side, bringing your elbow towards your ribcage.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then slowly release the tension and return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides. Perform with stability intensity.

translations.name: stability style band kneeling one arm pulldown
instructions: Step:1 Attach the band to a sturdy anchor point above your head.
Step:2 Kneel down and hold the band with one hand, palm facing down.
Step:3 Extend your arm fully overhead, keeping your elbow slightly bent.
Step:4 Engage your lat muscles and pull the band down towards your side, bringing your elbow towards your ribcage.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then slowly release the tension and return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides. Perform with stability intensity.

translations.name: jalón de rodillas a un brazo con banda estilo estabilidad
instructions: Paso:1 Sujeta la banda a un punto de anclaje resistente por encima de tu cabeza.
Paso:2 Arrodíllate y sostén la banda con una mano, con la palma hacia abajo.
Paso:3 Extiende el brazo completamente por encima de la cabeza, manteniendo el codo ligeramente flexionado.
Paso:4 Activa los músculos dorsales y jala la banda hacia abajo, hacia tu costado, llevando el codo hacia la caja torácica.
Paso:5 Haz una pausa por un momento en la parte inferior, luego libera lentamente la tensión y regresa a la posición inicial.
Paso:6 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambia de lado. Realiza con intensidad de estabilidad.

name: rounded twisted leg raise (female)
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your legs extended and your arms by your sides.
Step:2 Bend your knees and lift your legs off the ground, bringing them towards your chest. Emphasize rounded control.
Step:3 As you lift your legs, twist your hips to one side, bringing your knees towards your opposite shoulder.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your legs back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat the movement, this time twisting your hips to the other side.
Step:6 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: rounded twisted leg raise (female)
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your legs extended and your arms by your sides.
Step:2 Bend your knees and lift your legs off the ground, bringing them towards your chest. Emphasize rounded control.
Step:3 As you lift your legs, twist your hips to one side, bringing your knees towards your opposite shoulder.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your legs back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat the movement, this time twisting your hips to the other side.
Step:6 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: elevación de piernas con torsión redondeada (femenino)
instructions: Paso:1 Acuéstate boca arriba con las piernas extendidas y los brazos a los costados.
Paso:2 Flexiona las rodillas y levanta las piernas del suelo, llevándolas hacia el pecho. Enfatiza el control redondeado.
Paso:3 Mientras levantas las piernas, gira las caderas hacia un lado, llevando las rodillas hacia el hombro opuesto.
Paso:4 Haz una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, luego baja lentamente las piernas a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite el movimiento, esta vez girando las caderas hacia el otro lado.
Paso:6 Continúa alternando lados para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: wide-grip chest dip on high parallel bars - low variation
instructions: Step:1 Position yourself on the parallel bars with your arms fully extended and your body suspended in the air.
Step:2 Lean forward slightly and lower your body by bending your elbows until your chest is just above the bars.
Step:3 (low variation) Pause for a moment, then push yourself back up to the starting position by straightening your arms.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: wide-grip chest dip on high parallel bars - low variation
instructions: Step:1 Position yourself on the parallel bars with your arms fully extended and your body suspended in the air.
Step:2 Lean forward slightly and lower your body by bending your elbows until your chest is just above the bars.
Step:3 (low variation) Pause for a moment, then push yourself back up to the starting position by straightening your arms.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: fondos en paralelas altas para pecho con agarre ancho - variación baja
instructions: Paso:1 Colócate en las barras paralelas con los brazos completamente extendidos y el cuerpo suspendido en el aire.
Paso:2 Inclínate ligeramente hacia adelante y baja el cuerpo flexionando los codos hasta que el pecho esté justo por encima de las barras.
Paso:3 (variación baja) Haz una pausa por un momento, luego empújate hacia arriba a la posición inicial estirando los brazos.
Paso:4 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: cable one arm incline press with rigid
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the cable machine to a low pulley position.
Step:2 Sit on an incline bench facing away from the cable machine.
Step:3 Grasp the handle with one hand and bring it up to shoulder height. Emphasize rigid control.
Step:4 Position your feet firmly on the ground and maintain a stable position.
Step:5 Press the handle forward and upward, extending your arm fully.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the handle back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides.

translations.name: cable one arm incline press with rigid
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the cable machine to a low pulley position.
Step:2 Sit on an incline bench facing away from the cable machine.
Step:3 Grasp the handle with one hand and bring it up to shoulder height. Emphasize rigid control.
Step:4 Position your feet firmly on the ground and maintain a stable position.
Step:5 Press the handle forward and upward, extending your arm fully.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the handle back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides.

translations.name: press inclinado a un brazo con cable y rígido
instructions: Paso:1 Ajusta la máquina de cable a una posición de polea baja.
Paso:2 Siéntate en un banco inclinado de espaldas a la máquina de cable.
Paso:3 Agarra la manija con una mano y llévala a la altura del hombro. Enfatiza el control rígido.
Paso:4 Coloca los pies firmemente en el suelo y mantén una posición estable.
Paso:5 Empuja la manija hacia adelante y hacia arriba, extendiendo el brazo por completo.
Paso:6 Haz una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, luego baja lentamente la manija a la posición inicial.
Paso:7 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambia de lado.

name: exercise ball alternating arm ups with fast
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the stability ball with your feet flat on the ground and your back straight.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell in each hand with your palms facing inwards and your arms extended down by your sides.
Step:3 Engage your core and slowly lift one arm up towards your shoulder, keeping your elbow slightly bent. Perform with fast intensity.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your arm back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat the movement with the other arm.
Step:6 Continue alternating arms for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: exercise ball alternating arm ups with fast
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the stability ball with your feet flat on the ground and your back straight.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell in each hand with your palms facing inwards and your arms extended down by your sides.
Step:3 Engage your core and slowly lift one arm up towards your shoulder, keeping your elbow slightly bent. Perform with fast intensity.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your arm back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat the movement with the other arm.
Step:6 Continue alternating arms for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: elevaciones de brazos alternas rápidas en pelota de ejercicio
instructions: Paso:1 Siéntate en la pelota de estabilidad con los pies planos en el suelo y la espalda recta.
Paso:2 Sostén una mancuerna en cada mano con las palmas hacia adentro y los brazos extendidos a los costados.
Paso:3 Activa tu core y levanta lentamente un brazo hacia el hombro, manteniendo el codo ligeramente flexionado. Realiza con intensidad rápida.
Paso:4 Haz una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, luego baja lentamente el brazo a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite el movimiento con el otro brazo.
Paso:6 Continúa alternando los brazos para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: hanging pike weak
instructions: Step:1 Hang from a pull-up bar with your arms fully extended and your palms facing away from you.
Step:2 Engage your core and lift your legs up towards the bar, keeping them straight.
Step:3 Continue lifting until your body forms a 'V' shape, with your legs parallel to the ground. Emphasize weak control.
Step:4 Hold the position for a moment, then slowly lower your legs back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: hanging pike weak
instructions: Step:1 Hang from a pull-up bar with your arms fully extended and your palms facing away from you.
Step:2 Engage your core and lift your legs up towards the bar, keeping them straight.
Step:3 Continue lifting until your body forms a 'V' shape, with your legs parallel to the ground. Emphasize weak control.
Step:4 Hold the position for a moment, then slowly lower your legs back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: pica suspendida débil
instructions: Paso:1 Cuélgate de una barra de dominadas con los brazos completamente extendidos y las palmas de las manos mirando hacia afuera.
Paso:2 Activa tu core y levanta las piernas hacia la barra, manteniéndolas rectas.
Paso:3 Continúa levantando hasta que tu cuerpo forme una 'V', con las piernas paralelas al suelo. Enfatiza el control débil.
Paso:4 Mantén la posición por un momento, luego baja lentamente las piernas a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: one arm against wall compressed
instructions: Step:1 Stand facing a wall with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Extend one arm straight out in front of you and place your palm against the wall.
Step:3 Engage your core and lean your body forward, keeping your arm straight and your back flat. Maintain compressed form throughout.
Step:4 Slowly push against the wall with your palm, activating your lat muscles.
Step:5 Hold the position for a few seconds, then release and repeat with the other arm.

translations.name: one arm against wall compressed
instructions: Step:1 Stand facing a wall with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Extend one arm straight out in front of you and place your palm against the wall.
Step:3 Engage your core and lean your body forward, keeping your arm straight and your back flat. Maintain compressed form throughout.
Step:4 Slowly push against the wall with your palm, activating your lat muscles.
Step:5 Hold the position for a few seconds, then release and repeat with the other arm.

translations.name: compresión a un brazo contra la pared
instructions: Paso:1 Párate de frente a una pared con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros.
Paso:2 Extiende un brazo recto frente a ti y coloca la palma de la mano contra la pared.
Paso:3 Activa tu core e inclina tu cuerpo hacia adelante, manteniendo el brazo recto y la espalda plana. Mantén la forma comprimida en todo momento.
Paso:4 Empuja lentamente contra la pared con la palma de la mano, activando los músculos dorsales.
Paso:5 Mantén la posición durante unos segundos, luego suelta y repite con el otro brazo.

name: ez barbell decline close grip face press - mini variation
instructions: Step:1 Lie on a decline bench with your head lower than your feet.
Step:2 Grasp the ez barbell with a close grip, palms facing each other.
Step:3 Extend your arms straight up above your chest, keeping your elbows close to your body.
Step:4 Lower the barbell towards your forehead by bending your elbows.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then press the barbell back up to the starting position. Emphasize mini control.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: ez barbell decline close grip face press - mini variation
instructions: Step:1 Lie on a decline bench with your head lower than your feet.
Step:2 Grasp the ez barbell with a close grip, palms facing each other.
Step:3 Extend your arms straight up above your chest, keeping your elbows close to your body.
Step:4 Lower the barbell towards your forehead by bending your elbows.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then press the barbell back up to the starting position. Emphasize mini control.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: press francés declinado con barra EZ y agarre cerrado - mini variación
instructions: Paso:1 Acuéstate en un banco declinado con la cabeza más baja que los pies.
Paso:2 Agarra la barra EZ con un agarre cerrado, con las palmas una frente a la otra.
Paso:3 Extiende los brazos rectos sobre tu pecho, manteniendo los codos cerca de tu cuerpo.
Paso:4 Baja la barra hacia tu frente flexionando los codos.
Paso:5 Haz una pausa por un momento, luego empuja la barra de nuevo a la posición inicial. Enfatiza el mini control.
Paso:6 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: weighted one hand pull up fast
instructions: Step:1 Grab the pull-up bar with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Hang from the bar with your arm fully extended and your body straight.
Step:3 Engage your core and pull your body up towards the bar by bending your elbow and squeezing your back muscles.
Step:4 Continue pulling until your chin is above the bar.
Step:5 (fast variation) Lower your body back down to the starting position with control.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: weighted one hand pull up fast
instructions: Step:1 Grab the pull-up bar with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Hang from the bar with your arm fully extended and your body straight.
Step:3 Engage your core and pull your body up towards the bar by bending your elbow and squeezing your back muscles.
Step:4 Continue pulling until your chin is above the bar.
Step:5 (fast variation) Lower your body back down to the starting position with control.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dominada rápida a una mano con peso
instructions: Paso:1 Agarra la barra de dominadas con un agarre prono, un poco más ancho que el ancho de los hombros.
Paso:2 Cuélgate de la barra con el brazo completamente extendido y el cuerpo recto.
Paso:3 Activa tu core y jala tu cuerpo hacia la barra flexionando el codo y apretando los músculos de la espalda.
Paso:4 Continúa jalando hasta que tu barbilla esté por encima de la barra.
Paso:5 (variación rápida) Baja el cuerpo de nuevo a la posición inicial con control.
Paso:6 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: incline push up depth jump with complex
instructions: Step:1 Find an elevated surface, such as a bench or step, and place your hands shoulder-width apart on the edge.
Step:2 Step your feet back, keeping your body in a straight line from head to heels.
Step:3 Lower your chest towards the edge of the surface, bending your elbows and keeping your body aligned. Maintain complex form throughout.
Step:4 Push through your palms to extend your arms and return to the starting position.
Step:5 Jump off the edge of the surface, landing softly with your knees slightly bent.
Step:6 Repeat the push-up and depth jump for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: incline push up depth jump with complex
instructions: Step:1 Find an elevated surface, such as a bench or step, and place your hands shoulder-width apart on the edge.
Step:2 Step your feet back, keeping your body in a straight line from head to heels.
Step:3 Lower your chest towards the edge of the surface, bending your elbows and keeping your body aligned. Maintain complex form throughout.
Step:4 Push through your palms to extend your arms and return to the starting position.
Step:5 Jump off the edge of the surface, landing softly with your knees slightly bent.
Step:6 Repeat the push-up and depth jump for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: salto de profundidad con flexión inclinada complejo
instructions: Paso:1 Encuentra una superficie elevada, como un banco o un escalón, y coloca las manos separadas al ancho de los hombros en el borde.
Paso:2 Da un paso hacia atrás con los pies, manteniendo el cuerpo en línea recta desde la cabeza hasta los talones.
Paso:3 Baja el pecho hacia el borde de la superficie, flexionando los codos y manteniendo el cuerpo alineado. Mantén una forma compleja en todo momento.
Paso:4 Empuja con las palmas para extender los brazos y volver a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Salta desde el borde de la superficie, aterrizando suavemente con las rodillas ligeramente flexionadas.
Paso:6 Repite la flexión y el salto de profundidad para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: pointed cable palm rotational row
instructions: Step:1 Attach a handle to a cable machine at waist height.
Step:2 Stand facing the machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Grasp the handle with an overhand grip, palms facing down.
Step:4 Step back to create tension on the cable, keeping your back straight and knees slightly bent. Emphasize pointed control.
Step:5 Pull the handle towards your body, rotating your palms to face upwards as you do so.
Step:6 Squeeze your shoulder blades together at the end of the movement.
Step:7 Slowly release the handle back to the starting position.
Step:8 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: pointed cable palm rotational row
instructions: Step:1 Attach a handle to a cable machine at waist height.
Step:2 Stand facing the machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Grasp the handle with an overhand grip, palms facing down.
Step:4 Step back to create tension on the cable, keeping your back straight and knees slightly bent. Emphasize pointed control.
Step:5 Pull the handle towards your body, rotating your palms to face upwards as you do so.
Step:6 Squeeze your shoulder blades together at the end of the movement.
Step:7 Slowly release the handle back to the starting position.
Step:8 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: remo con rotación de palma y cable en punta
instructions: Paso:1 Conecta una manija a una máquina de cable a la altura de la cintura.
Paso:2 Párate de frente a la máquina con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros.
Paso:3 Agarra la manija con un agarre prono, con las palmas hacia abajo.
Paso:4 Da un paso atrás para crear tensión en el cable, manteniendo la espalda recta y las rodillas ligeramente flexionadas. Enfatiza el control en punta.
Paso:5 Jala la manija hacia tu cuerpo, girando las palmas hacia arriba mientras lo haces.
Paso:6 Aprieta los omóplatos al final del movimiento.
Paso:7 Suelta lentamente la manija para volver a la posición inicial.
Paso:8 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: intermediate style dumbbell preacher curl over exercise ball
instructions: Step:1 Sit on an exercise ball with your feet flat on the ground and your back straight.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell in one hand with an underhand grip, resting your elbow on the exercise ball.
Step:3 (intermediate variation) Keeping your upper arm stationary, exhale and curl the dumbbell up towards your shoulder.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then inhale and slowly lower the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

translations.name: intermediate style dumbbell preacher curl over exercise ball
instructions: Step:1 Sit on an exercise ball with your feet flat on the ground and your back straight.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell in one hand with an underhand grip, resting your elbow on the exercise ball.
Step:3 (intermediate variation) Keeping your upper arm stationary, exhale and curl the dumbbell up towards your shoulder.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then inhale and slowly lower the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

translations.name: curl predicador con mancuerna sobre pelota de ejercicio estilo intermedio
instructions: Paso:1 Siéntate en una pelota de ejercicio con los pies planos en el suelo y la espalda recta.
Paso:2 Sostén una mancuerna en una mano con un agarre supino, apoyando el codo en la pelota de ejercicio.
Paso:3 (variación intermedia) Manteniendo la parte superior del brazo inmóvil, exhala y flexiona la mancuerna hacia tu hombro.
Paso:4 Haz una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, luego inhala y baja lentamente la mancuerna a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambia de brazo.

name: iron cross stretch - deep variation
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your arms extended out to the sides.
Step:2 Raise your legs up towards the ceiling, keeping them straight.
Step:3 Slowly lower your legs to one side, aiming to touch the floor with your feet.
Step:4 Hold the stretch for a few seconds, then return your legs to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat the stretch on the other side. Maintain deep form throughout.
Step:6 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: iron cross stretch - deep variation
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your arms extended out to the sides.
Step:2 Raise your legs up towards the ceiling, keeping them straight.
Step:3 Slowly lower your legs to one side, aiming to touch the floor with your feet.
Step:4 Hold the stretch for a few seconds, then return your legs to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat the stretch on the other side. Maintain deep form throughout.
Step:6 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: estiramiento de cruz de hierro - variación profunda
instructions: Paso:1 Acuéstate boca arriba con los brazos extendidos hacia los lados.
Paso:2 Levanta las piernas hacia el techo, manteniéndolas rectas.
Paso:3 Baja lentamente las piernas hacia un lado, intentando tocar el suelo con los pies.
Paso:4 Mantén el estiramiento durante unos segundos, luego regresa las piernas a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite el estiramiento en el otro lado. Mantén una forma profunda en todo momento.
Paso:6 Continúa alternando lados para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: all fours squad stretch - elevated variation
instructions: Step:1 Start on all fours with your hands directly under your shoulders and your knees directly under your hips.
Step:2 Extend one leg straight back, keeping your knee bent and your foot flexed. Maintain elevated form throughout.
Step:3 Slowly lower your hips towards the ground, feeling a stretch in your quads.
Step:4 Hold this position for 20-30 seconds.
Step:5 Switch legs and repeat the stretch on the other side.

translations.name: all fours squad stretch - elevated variation
instructions: Step:1 Start on all fours with your hands directly under your shoulders and your knees directly under your hips.
Step:2 Extend one leg straight back, keeping your knee bent and your foot flexed. Maintain elevated form throughout.
Step:3 Slowly lower your hips towards the ground, feeling a stretch in your quads.
Step:4 Hold this position for 20-30 seconds.
Step:5 Switch legs and repeat the stretch on the other side.

translations.name: estiramiento de cuádriceps en cuatro puntos - variación elevada
instructions: Paso:1 Comienza en cuatro puntos con las manos directamente debajo de los hombros y las rodillas directamente debajo de las caderas.
Paso:2 Extiende una pierna recta hacia atrás, manteniendo la rodilla flexionada y el pie flexionado. Mantén una forma elevada en todo momento.
Paso:3 Baja lentamente las caderas hacia el suelo, sintiendo un estiramiento en los cuádriceps.
Paso:4 Mantén esta posición durante 20-30 segundos.
Paso:5 Cambia de pierna y repite el estiramiento en el otro lado.

name: isolation assisted seated pectoralis major stretch with stability ball
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a stability ball with your feet flat on the ground and your back straight.
Step:2 Hold a stability ball with both hands and extend your arms straight out in front of you.
Step:3 Slowly lower the stability ball towards your chest, feeling a stretch in your pectoral muscles.
Step:4 Hold the stretch for a few seconds, then slowly return to the starting position. Emphasize isolation control.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: isolation assisted seated pectoralis major stretch with stability ball
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a stability ball with your feet flat on the ground and your back straight.
Step:2 Hold a stability ball with both hands and extend your arms straight out in front of you.
Step:3 Slowly lower the stability ball towards your chest, feeling a stretch in your pectoral muscles.
Step:4 Hold the stretch for a few seconds, then slowly return to the starting position. Emphasize isolation control.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: estiramiento de pectoral mayor sentado asistido y aislado con balón de estabilidad
instructions: Paso:1 Siéntate sobre un balón de estabilidad con los pies planos en el suelo y la espalda recta.
Paso:2 Sostén un balón de estabilidad con ambas manos y extiende los brazos al frente.
Paso:3 Baja lentamente el balón hacia el pecho, sintiendo el estiramiento en los músculos del pecho.
Paso:4 Mantén el estiramiento unos segundos y regresa lentamente a la posición inicial. Enfatiza el control de aislamiento.
Paso:5 Repite las repeticiones deseadas.

name: one leg squat - expanded variation
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Extend one leg forward, keeping it off the ground.
Step:3 Bend your standing leg and lower your body down as if sitting back into a chair.
Step:4 Keep your chest up and your back straight.
Step:5 Push through your heel to return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat with the other leg. Maintain expanded form throughout.

translations.name: one leg squat - expanded variation
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Extend one leg forward, keeping it off the ground.
Step:3 Bend your standing leg and lower your body down as if sitting back into a chair.
Step:4 Keep your chest up and your back straight.
Step:5 Push through your heel to return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat with the other leg. Maintain expanded form throughout.

translations.name: sentadilla a una pierna - variación expandida
instructions: Paso:1 Ponte de pie con los pies al ancho de los hombros.
Paso:2 Extiende una pierna al frente, manteniéndola fuera del suelo.
Paso:3 Flexiona la pierna de apoyo y baja el cuerpo como si te sentaras hacia atrás en una silla.
Paso:4 Mantén el pecho arriba y la espalda recta.
Paso:5 Empuja con el talón para volver a la posición inicial.
Paso:6 Repite con la otra pierna. Mantén la forma expandida en todo momento.

name: targeted style smith close-grip bench press
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and position yourself on the bench with your feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Grasp the barbell with a close grip, slightly narrower than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Lower the barbell towards your chest, keeping your elbows close to your body. Focus on targeted movement.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push the barbell back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: targeted style smith close-grip bench press
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and position yourself on the bench with your feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Grasp the barbell with a close grip, slightly narrower than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Lower the barbell towards your chest, keeping your elbows close to your body. Focus on targeted movement.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push the barbell back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: press de banca con agarre cerrado en máquina Smith estilo enfocado
instructions: Paso:1 Ajusta la altura del asiento y colócate sobre el banco con los pies planos en el suelo.
Paso:2 Sujeta la barra con agarre cerrado, un poco más estrecho que el ancho de hombros.
Paso:3 Desciende la barra hacia el pecho manteniendo los codos cerca del cuerpo. Enfócate en un movimiento dirigido.
Paso:4 Pausa un momento abajo y luego empuja la barra de vuelta a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite las repeticiones deseadas.

name: dumbbell one arm prone hammer curl - macro variation
instructions: Step:1 Lie face down on a flat bench with a dumbbell in one hand, palm facing your body and arm fully extended.
Step:2 Keep your upper arm stationary and curl the dumbbell towards your shoulder, contracting your biceps.
Step:3 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms. Focus on macro movement.

translations.name: dumbbell one arm prone hammer curl - macro variation
instructions: Step:1 Lie face down on a flat bench with a dumbbell in one hand, palm facing your body and arm fully extended.
Step:2 Keep your upper arm stationary and curl the dumbbell towards your shoulder, contracting your biceps.
Step:3 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms. Focus on macro movement.

translations.name: curl martillo prono a una mano con mancuerna - variación macro
instructions: Paso:1 Acuéstate boca abajo en un banco plano con una mancuerna en una mano, palma hacia el cuerpo y brazo extendido.
Paso:2 Mantén la parte superior del brazo fija y realiza un curl llevando la mancuerna hacia el hombro, contrayendo los bíceps.
Paso:3 Pausa un momento arriba y baja lentamente la mancuerna a la posición inicial.
Paso:4 Repite las repeticiones deseadas y cambia de brazo. Enfócate en el movimiento macro.

name: push-up (wall) with static
instructions: Step:1 Stand facing a wall, about arm's length away.
Step:2 Place your hands on the wall at shoulder height, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Step back a few feet, keeping your body straight and your feet hip-width apart.
Step:4 (static variation) Bend your elbows and lower your chest towards the wall, keeping your body in a straight line.
Step:5 Push back up to the starting position, straightening your arms.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: push-up (wall) with static
instructions: Step:1 Stand facing a wall, about arm's length away.
Step:2 Place your hands on the wall at shoulder height, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Step back a few feet, keeping your body straight and your feet hip-width apart.
Step:4 (static variation) Bend your elbows and lower your chest towards the wall, keeping your body in a straight line.
Step:5 Push back up to the starting position, straightening your arms.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: flexión de pecho en pared con estático
instructions: Paso:1 Ponte de frente a una pared, a la distancia de un brazo.
Paso:2 Coloca las manos en la pared a la altura de los hombros, un poco más anchas que el ancho de hombros.
Paso:3 Retrocede unos pasos manteniendo el cuerpo recto y los pies al ancho de caderas.
Paso:4 (variación estática) Flexiona los codos y acerca el pecho a la pared manteniendo el cuerpo en línea recta.
Paso:5 Empuja de vuelta a la posición inicial estirando los brazos.
Paso:6 Repite las repeticiones deseadas.

name: fierce style forward lunge (male)
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet hip-width apart and hands on your hips.
Step:2 Take a big step forward with your right foot, lowering your body into a lunge position.
Step:3 Bend your right knee to about 90 degrees, keeping your knee aligned with your ankle.
Step:4 Push off with your right foot and return to the starting position.
Step:5 (fierce variation) Repeat with your left leg, alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: fierce style forward lunge (male)
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet hip-width apart and hands on your hips.
Step:2 Take a big step forward with your right foot, lowering your body into a lunge position.
Step:3 Bend your right knee to about 90 degrees, keeping your knee aligned with your ankle.
Step:4 Push off with your right foot and return to the starting position.
Step:5 (fierce variation) Repeat with your left leg, alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: zancada al frente estilo feroz (hombre)
instructions: Paso:1 Ponte de pie con los pies al ancho de caderas y las manos en la cintura.
Paso:2 Da un gran paso al frente con el pie derecho, bajando el cuerpo a una posición de zancada.
Paso:3 Flexiona la rodilla derecha a unos 90 grados, manteniéndola alineada con el tobillo.
Paso:4 Impúlsate con el pie derecho para volver a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 (variación feroz) Repite con la pierna izquierda, alternando lados por las repeticiones deseadas.

name: chin-up diagonal
instructions: Step:1 Hang from a pull-up bar with your palms facing towards you and your hands shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Engage your core and pull your body up towards the bar, leading with your chest.
Step:3 Continue pulling until your chin is above the bar.
Step:4 (diagonal variation) Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your body back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: chin-up diagonal
instructions: Step:1 Hang from a pull-up bar with your palms facing towards you and your hands shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Engage your core and pull your body up towards the bar, leading with your chest.
Step:3 Continue pulling until your chin is above the bar.
Step:4 (diagonal variation) Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your body back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dominada supina diagonal
instructions: Paso:1 Cuelga de una barra con las palmas hacia ti y las manos al ancho de los hombros.
Paso:2 Activa el core y tira del cuerpo hacia la barra guiando con el pecho.
Paso:3 Continúa tirando hasta que la barbilla quede por encima de la barra.
Paso:4 (variación diagonal) Pausa un momento arriba y desciende lentamente el cuerpo a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite las repeticiones deseadas.

name: cable judo flip with static
instructions: Step:1 Stand facing the cable machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Hold the cable handle with both hands at chest level, palms facing down.
Step:3 Engage your core and rotate your torso to the right, pulling the cable across your body.
Step:4 As you rotate, pivot your back foot and allow your hips to rotate naturally. Emphasize static control.
Step:5 Extend your arms fully and finish the movement by flipping the cable handle over your shoulder.
Step:6 Return to the starting position by reversing the movement, rotating your torso back to the center.
Step:7 Repeat the movement on the opposite side.
Step:8 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: cable judo flip with static
instructions: Step:1 Stand facing the cable machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Hold the cable handle with both hands at chest level, palms facing down.
Step:3 Engage your core and rotate your torso to the right, pulling the cable across your body.
Step:4 As you rotate, pivot your back foot and allow your hips to rotate naturally. Emphasize static control.
Step:5 Extend your arms fully and finish the movement by flipping the cable handle over your shoulder.
Step:6 Return to the starting position by reversing the movement, rotating your torso back to the center.
Step:7 Repeat the movement on the opposite side.
Step:8 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: giro judo en cable con estático
instructions: Paso:1 Ponte de frente a la máquina de cable con los pies al ancho de los hombros.
Paso:2 Sostén la manija del cable con ambas manos a la altura del pecho, palmas hacia abajo.
Paso:3 Activa el core y rota el torso hacia la derecha, tirando del cable a través del cuerpo.
Paso:4 Al rotar, pivota el pie trasero y permite que las caderas roten de forma natural. Enfatiza el control estático.
Paso:5 Extiende por completo los brazos y termina el movimiento pasando la manija del cable sobre el hombro.
Paso:6 Regresa a la posición inicial invirtiendo el movimiento y rotando el torso al centro.
Paso:7 Repite el movimiento del lado opuesto.
Paso:8 Alterna lados por las repeticiones deseadas.

name: dumbbell over bench one arm wrist curl - strength variation
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your feet flat on the ground and hold a dumbbell in one hand, palm facing down.
Step:2 Rest your forearm on the bench with your wrist hanging off the edge.
Step:3 Slowly curl your wrist upwards, bringing the dumbbell towards your forearm.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbell back down to the starting position. Maintain strength form throughout.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch to the other arm.

translations.name: dumbbell over bench one arm wrist curl - strength variation
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your feet flat on the ground and hold a dumbbell in one hand, palm facing down.
Step:2 Rest your forearm on the bench with your wrist hanging off the edge.
Step:3 Slowly curl your wrist upwards, bringing the dumbbell towards your forearm.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbell back down to the starting position. Maintain strength form throughout.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch to the other arm.

translations.name: curl de muñeca a una mano con mancuerna sobre banco - variación de fuerza
instructions: Paso:1 Siéntate en un banco con los pies planos en el suelo y sujeta una mancuerna con una mano, palma hacia abajo.
Paso:2 Apoya el antebrazo sobre el banco dejando la muñeca fuera del borde.
Paso:3 Flexiona lentamente la muñeca hacia arriba llevando la mancuerna hacia el antebrazo.
Paso:4 Pausa un momento arriba y baja lentamente la mancuerna a la posición inicial. Mantén la técnica de fuerza en todo momento.
Paso:5 Repite las repeticiones deseadas y cambia al otro brazo.

name: lying leg-hip raise - contracted variation
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your legs extended and your arms by your sides.
Step:2 Place your hands under your glutes for support.
Step:3 Engage your core and lift your legs off the ground, raising them towards the ceiling.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your legs back down to the starting position. Emphasize contracted control.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: lying leg-hip raise - contracted variation
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your legs extended and your arms by your sides.
Step:2 Place your hands under your glutes for support.
Step:3 Engage your core and lift your legs off the ground, raising them towards the ceiling.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your legs back down to the starting position. Emphasize contracted control.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: elevación de piernas y cadera acostado - variación contraída
instructions: Paso:1 Acuéstate boca arriba con las piernas extendidas y los brazos a los costados.
Paso:2 Coloca las manos bajo los glúteos para apoyo.
Paso:3 Activa el core y eleva las piernas del suelo llevándolas hacia el techo.
Paso:4 Pausa un momento arriba y baja lentamente las piernas a la posición inicial. Enfatiza el control contraído.
Paso:5 Repite las repeticiones deseadas.

name: prone medicine ball close grip push up
instructions: Step:1 Start in a high plank position with your hands on the medicine ball, shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Lower your body towards the ground by bending your elbows, keeping them close to your sides.
Step:3 Push back up to the starting position, fully extending your arms.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions. Maintain prone form throughout.

translations.name: Prone Medicine Ball Close-Grip Push-Up
instructions: Step:1 Start in a high plank with hands on the medicine ball, shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Lower by bending elbows close to your sides, body in one line.
Step:3 Push back to start, fully extending the arms.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired reps, maintaining a stable prone position.

translations.name: Flexión con agarre cerrado sobre balón medicinal (prono)
instructions: Paso:1 Inicia en plancha alta con las manos sobre el balón medicinal, al ancho de hombros.
Paso:2 Desciende flexionando los codos pegados al cuerpo, manteniendo el cuerpo en línea.
Paso:3 Empuja de regreso a la posición inicial extendiendo totalmente los brazos.
Paso:4 Repite las repeticiones deseadas, manteniendo una posición prona estable.

name: triceps dip (between benches) - extreme variation
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your hands gripping the edge of the bench, fingers pointing forward.
Step:2 (extreme variation) Slide your butt off the bench, supporting your weight with your hands.
Step:3 Bend your elbows and lower your body towards the ground, keeping your back close to the bench.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push yourself back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Triceps Dip Between Benches (Extreme Variation)
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench and grip the edge with fingers pointing forward.
Step:2 (extreme variation) Slide hips off the bench, supporting your weight with your hands.
Step:3 Bend elbows to lower your body, back close to the bench.
Step:4 Pause at the bottom, then press back to the start.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired reps.

translations.name: Fondos de tríceps entre bancos (variación extrema)
instructions: Paso:1 Siéntate en un banco y sujeta el borde con los dedos apuntando al frente.
Paso:2 (variación extrema) Desliza la cadera fuera del banco, sosteniendo tu peso con las manos.
Paso:3 Flexiona los codos para bajar el cuerpo, manteniendo la espalda cerca del banco.
Paso:4 Pausa abajo y luego presiona de regreso a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite las repeticiones deseadas.

name: micro style barbell speed squat
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, toes slightly turned out.
Step:2 Hold the barbell across your back, resting it on your traps or rear shoulders.
Step:3 Engage your core and keep your chest up as you lower your hips back and down, as if sitting into a chair.
Step:4 (micro variation) Lower until your thighs are parallel to the ground, or as low as you can comfortably go.
Step:5 Drive through your heels to stand back up, squeezing your glutes at the top.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Micro-Style Barbell Speed Squat
instructions: Step:1 Stand feet shoulder-width, toes slightly out.
Step:2 Rack the barbell across your back on the traps/rear shoulders.
Step:3 Brace the core and keep chest up as you hinge hips back and down.
Step:4 (micro variation) Lower until thighs are parallel or your comfortable depth.
Step:5 Drive through heels to stand, squeezing the glutes.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired reps.

translations.name: Sentadilla rápida con barra estilo micro
instructions: Paso:1 Coloca los pies al ancho de hombros, puntas ligeramente hacia afuera.
Paso:2 Apoya la barra sobre la espalda en los traps/hombros posteriores.
Paso:3 Activa el core y mantiene el pecho arriba mientras llevas cadera atrás y abajo.
Paso:4 (variación micro) Baja hasta que los muslos queden paralelos o a tu rango cómodo.
Paso:5 Empuja con los talones para ponerte de pie, apretando los glúteos.
Paso:6 Repite las repeticiones deseadas.

name: rough cable decline fly
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the cable machine to a decline position.
Step:2 Stand facing away from the machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Hold the handles with your palms facing forward and your arms extended straight out in front of you.
Step:4 Keeping a slight bend in your elbows, open your arms out to the sides in a controlled motion. Perform with rough intensity.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the fully extended position, then slowly return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Cable Decline Fly (Rough Style)
instructions: Step:1 Set the cable machine for a decline path.
Step:2 Stand facing away, feet shoulder-width.
Step:3 Hold handles palms forward, arms extended slightly in front.
Step:4 With a slight elbow bend, open arms wide under control with strong intent.
Step:5 Pause fully extended, then return slowly to start.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired reps.

translations.name: Aperturas en cable en declive (estilo fuerte)
instructions: Paso:1 Ajusta la máquina de cable para un recorrido en declive.
Paso:2 Ponte de espaldas a la máquina, pies al ancho de hombros.
Paso:3 Sujeta las manijas con palmas al frente y brazos extendidos levemente al frente.
Paso:4 Con ligera flexión de codos, abre los brazos de forma controlada con intensidad fuerte.
Paso:5 Pausa en la extensión completa y regresa lentamente a la posición inicial.
Paso:6 Repite las repeticiones deseadas.

name: stability lever narrow grip seated row
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and footrests to ensure proper form.
Step:2 Sit on the machine with your feet flat on the footrests and your knees slightly bent.
Step:3 Grasp the handles with a narrow grip, palms facing each other.
Step:4 Keep your back straight and lean slightly forward.
Step:5 Pull the handles towards your torso, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the peak of the movement.
Step:7 Slowly release the handles and return to the starting position. Focus on stability movement.
Step:8 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Stability Lever Narrow-Grip Seated Row
instructions: Step:1 Adjust seat height and footrests for proper alignment.
Step:2 Sit with feet on footrests, knees slightly bent.
Step:3 Grasp handles with a narrow neutral grip.
Step:4 Keep back straight and lean slightly forward.
Step:5 Pull handles to torso, squeezing shoulder blades.
Step:6 Pause briefly at peak contraction.
Step:7 Return slowly to start, focusing on stable movement.
Step:8 Repeat for the desired reps.

translations.name: Remo sentado en máquina de palanca agarre estrecho (en estabilidad)
instructions: Paso:1 Ajusta la altura del asiento y los apoyapiés para una alineación adecuada.
Paso:2 Siéntate con los pies en los apoyapiés y rodillas ligeramente flexionadas.
Paso:3 Sujeta las manijas con agarre estrecho y neutro.
Paso:4 Mantén la espalda recta e inclínate levemente hacia adelante.
Paso:5 Tira de las manijas hacia el torso, juntando las escápulas.
Paso:6 Pausa brevemente en la contracción máxima.
Paso:7 Regresa lentamente a la posición inicial, priorizando la estabilidad.
Paso:8 Repite las repeticiones deseadas.

name: twisted side-to-side chin
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your knees slightly bent.
Step:2 Grasp a pull-up bar with an overhand grip, hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Hang from the bar with your arms fully extended and your body relaxed.
Step:4 Pull yourself up by bending your elbows and bringing your chin towards the bar, while keeping your body straight.
Step:5 Once your chin is above the bar, lower yourself back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions. Perform with twisted intensity.

translations.name: Twisted Side-to-Side Chin
instructions: Step:1 Stand feet shoulder-width with slight knee bend.
Step:2 Grip a pull-up bar overhand, hands just wider than shoulder-width.
Step:3 Hang with arms extended and body relaxed.
Step:4 Pull up, bringing chin to the bar while keeping body straight.
Step:5 Lower back to full hang under control.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired reps with a twisted effort.

translations.name: Dominada de lado a lado con giro
instructions: Paso:1 Colócate con pies al ancho de hombros y ligera flexión de rodillas.
Paso:2 Sujeta la barra con agarre prono, manos un poco más anchas que hombros.
Paso:3 Cuelga con brazos extendidos y cuerpo relajado.
Paso:4 Tira hacia arriba llevando la barbilla a la barra, manteniendo el cuerpo alineado.
Paso:5 Desciende controlado hasta la extensión completa.
Paso:6 Repite las repeticiones deseadas con intensidad de giro.

name: prone dumbbell upright shoulder external rotation
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a dumbbell in each hand with your palms facing your body.
Step:2 Raise your arms out to the sides until they are parallel to the ground, keeping your elbows slightly bent. Emphasize prone control.
Step:3 Rotate your arms externally, bringing the dumbbells up towards your head while keeping your elbows in the same position.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Prone Dumbbell Upright Shoulder External Rotation
instructions: Step:1 Stand feet shoulder-width holding a dumbbell in each hand, palms toward body.
Step:2 Raise arms to shoulder level with slight elbow bend, emphasizing controlled prone posture.
Step:3 Externally rotate to bring dumbbells upward while elbows stay fixed.
Step:4 Pause at the top, then lower slowly to start.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired reps.

translations.name: Rotación externa de hombros vertical con mancuernas (prono)
instructions: Paso:1 De pie con pies al ancho de hombros, sostén una mancuerna en cada mano con palmas hacia el cuerpo.
Paso:2 Eleva los brazos hasta la altura de hombros con ligera flexión de codos, enfatizando control en prono.
Paso:3 Rota externamente elevando las mancuernas manteniendo los codos fijos.
Paso:4 Pausa arriba y desciende lentamente a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite las repeticiones deseadas.

name: controlled wrist rollerer
instructions: Step:1 Attach a weight to one end of a rope or bar.
Step:2 Hold the other end of the rope or bar with both hands, palms facing down.
Step:3 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your arms fully extended in front of you.
Step:4 Slowly roll the weight up towards your hands by flexing your wrists.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the weight back down to the starting position. Perform with controlled intensity.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Controlled Wrist Roller
instructions: Step:1 Attach weight to one end of a rope or bar.
Step:2 Hold the other end with both hands, palms down.
Step:3 Stand feet shoulder-width, arms fully extended in front.
Step:4 Roll the weight up by flexing wrists.
Step:5 Pause at the top, then lower with control.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired reps.

translations.name: Rodillo de muñecas controlado
instructions: Paso:1 Coloca un peso en un extremo de una cuerda o barra.
Paso:2 Sujeta el otro extremo con ambas manos, palmas hacia abajo.
Paso:3 Ponte de pie con pies al ancho de hombros y brazos extendidos al frente.
Paso:4 Enrolla el peso hacia arriba flexionando las muñecas.
Paso:5 Pausa arriba y baja con control.
Paso:6 Repite las repeticiones deseadas.

name: barbell incline bench press seated
instructions: Step:1 Set up an incline bench at a 45-degree angle.
Step:2 (seated variation) Lie down on the bench with your feet flat on the ground.
Step:3 Grasp the barbell with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:4 Unrack the barbell and lower it slowly towards your chest, keeping your elbows at a 45-degree angle.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push the barbell back up to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Barbell Incline Bench Press (Seated)
instructions: Step:1 Set an incline bench to about 45 degrees.
Step:2 (seated variation) Lie back on the bench with feet flat.
Step:3 Grip the barbell overhand, slightly wider than shoulder-width.
