Step:4 Unrack and lower to chest with elbows ~45 degrees.
Step:5 Pause briefly, then press the barbell back up.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired reps.

translations.name: Press de banca inclinado con barra (sentado)
instructions: Paso:1 Ajusta un banco inclinado a ~45 grados.
Paso:2 (variación sentada) Recuéstate en el banco con los pies apoyados.
Paso:3 Toma la barra con agarre prono un poco más ancho que hombros.
Paso:4 Desencaja y baja hacia el pecho con codos a ~45 grados.
Paso:5 Pausa breve y presiona la barra de regreso arriba.
Paso:6 Repite las repeticiones deseadas.

name: barbell sitted alternate leg raise (female) with intermediate
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your back straight and hold a barbell across your thighs.
Step:2 (intermediate variation) Place your hands on the sides of the bench for support.
Step:3 Keeping your legs straight, lift one leg up as high as possible while keeping it parallel to the ground.
Step:4 Lower the leg back down and repeat with the other leg.
Step:5 Continue alternating legs for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Barbell Seated Alternate Leg Raise (Intermediate, Female Demo)
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with back straight, barbell across thighs.
Step:2 (intermediate variation) Place hands on bench sides for support.
Step:3 With legs straight, lift one leg as high as possible, parallel to floor.
Step:4 Lower and repeat with the other leg.
Step:5 Alternate for the desired reps.

translations.name: Elevación alterna de piernas sentado con barra (intermedio)
instructions: Paso:1 Siéntate en un banco con la espalda recta y la barra sobre los muslos.
Paso:2 (variación intermedia) Coloca las manos en los costados del banco para apoyo.
Paso:3 Con las piernas rectas, eleva una pierna lo más alto posible, paralela al suelo.
Paso:4 Baja y repite con la otra pierna.
Paso:5 Alterna por las repeticiones deseadas.

name: push-up to side plank - athletic variation
instructions: Step:1 Start in a push-up position with your hands shoulder-width apart and your body in a straight line.
Step:2 Lower your body towards the ground by bending your elbows, keeping your core engaged.
Step:3 Push back up to the starting position. Emphasize athletic control.
Step:4 Shift your weight onto your left hand and rotate your body to the right, lifting your right arm towards the ceiling.
Step:5 Hold the side plank position for a few seconds, then return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat the push-up and side plank on the opposite side.
Step:7 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Push-Up to Side Plank (Athletic Variation)
instructions: Step:1 Start in a push-up position, hands shoulder-width, body straight.
Step:2 Lower by bending elbows, keeping core engaged.
Step:3 Press back up with athletic control.
Step:4 Shift weight to left hand and rotate right arm to the ceiling into side plank.
Step:5 Hold briefly, then return to start.
Step:6 Repeat to the opposite side.
Step:7 Alternate sides for the desired reps.

translations.name: Flexión a plancha lateral (variación atlética)
instructions: Paso:1 Inicia en posición de flexión, manos al ancho de hombros, cuerpo alineado.
Paso:2 Desciende flexionando los codos, con el core activo.
Paso:3 Empuja de vuelta con control atlético.
Paso:4 Traslada el peso a la mano izquierda y rota elevando el brazo derecho a la vertical en plancha lateral.
Paso:5 Mantén breve y regresa al inicio.
Paso:6 Repite hacia el lado opuesto.
Paso:7 Alterna lados por las repeticiones deseadas.

name: dumbbell seated one leg calf raise - hammer grip deep
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench or chair with your feet flat on the ground and a dumbbell resting on your thighs.
Step:2 Place one foot on a raised surface, such as a step or block, with your heel hanging off the edge.
Step:3 Hold the dumbbell with a hammer grip, meaning your palms are facing each other and your fingers are wrapped around the handle.
Step:4 Keeping your core engaged and your back straight, slowly raise your heel as high as possible by pushing through the ball of your foot.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your heel back down to the starting position.
Step:6 (deep variation) Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch to the other leg.

translations.name: Dumbbell Seated One-Leg Calf Raise (Hammer Grip, Deep)
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench or chair, feet flat, dumbbell on thighs.
Step:2 Place one foot on a raised surface with heel off the edge.
Step:3 Hold the dumbbell hammer-grip; keep back straight and core engaged.
Step:4 Raise the heel as high as possible by pressing through the ball of the foot.
Step:5 Pause at the top, then lower slowly.
Step:6 (deep variation) Repeat for reps, then switch legs.

translations.name: Elevación de pantorrilla a una pierna sentado con mancuerna (agarre martillo, profundo)
instructions: Paso:1 Siéntate en un banco o silla, pies apoyados y mancuerna sobre los muslos.
Paso:2 Coloca un pie en una superficie elevada con el talón fuera del borde.
Paso:3 Sujeta la mancuerna con agarre martillo; mantiene la espalda recta y el core activo.
Paso:4 Eleva el talón lo más alto posible presionando con la parte delantera del pie.
Paso:5 Pausa arriba y desciende lentamente.
Paso:6 (variación profunda) Repite las repeticiones y cambia de pierna.

name: gentle style cable pulldown (pro lat bar)
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height so that your thighs are parallel to the ground and your feet are flat on the floor.
Step:2 Grasp the lat bar with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Sit down and lean back slightly, keeping your chest up and your back straight.
Step:4 Pull the bar down towards your chest, squeezing your shoulder blades together. Maintain gentle form throughout.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom of the movement, then slowly release the bar back up to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Cable Pulldown (Pro Lat Bar, Gentle Style)
instructions: Step:1 Adjust seat so thighs are parallel and feet flat.
Step:2 Grip the lat bar overhand, slightly wider than shoulder-width.
Step:3 Sit and lean back slightly, chest up, back straight.
Step:4 Pull bar to chest, squeezing shoulder blades with gentle, controlled form.
Step:5 Pause at the bottom, then let the bar rise under control.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired reps.

translations.name: Jalón en polea con barra ancha (estilo suave)
instructions: Paso:1 Ajusta el asiento para que los muslos queden paralelos y los pies apoyados.
Paso:2 Sujeta la barra ancha con agarre prono un poco más ancho que hombros.
Paso:3 Siéntate e inclínate levemente atrás, pecho arriba y espalda recta.
Paso:4 Tira la barra al pecho, juntando escápulas con forma suave y controlada.
Paso:5 Pausa abajo y deja subir la barra de forma controlada.
Paso:6 Repite las repeticiones deseadas.

name: inverted style inverse leg curl (on pull-up cable machine)
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the cable machine so that the ankle straps are at the lowest setting.
Step:2 Lie face down on the bench with your legs extended and the ankle straps attached to your feet.
Step:3 Hold onto the handles of the bench for stability.
Step:4 Bend your knees and curl your legs towards your glutes, squeezing your hamstrings.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top of the movement, then slowly lower your legs back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions. Maintain inverted form throughout.

translations.name: Inverted-Style Inverse Leg Curl (on Pull-Up Cable Machine)
instructions: Step:1 Set ankle straps at the lowest cable setting.
Step:2 Lie face down on the bench, legs extended, straps on feet.
Step:3 Hold bench handles for stability.
Step:4 Bend knees to curl legs toward the glutes, squeezing hamstrings.
Step:5 Pause at the top, then lower slowly to start.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired reps with inverted control.

translations.name: Curl inverso de piernas estilo invertido (en máquina de dominadas con cable)
instructions: Paso:1 Coloca las correas de tobillo en el ajuste más bajo del cable.
Paso:2 Túmbate boca abajo en el banco con piernas extendidas y correas en los pies.
Paso:3 Sujeta las asas del banco para estabilidad.
Paso:4 Flexiona las rodillas llevando los pies hacia los glúteos, contrayendo isquiotibiales.
Paso:5 Pausa arriba y baja lentamente a la posición inicial.
Paso:6 Repite las repeticiones deseadas con control invertido.

name: barbell high bar squat core
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, toes slightly turned out.
Step:2 Place the barbell on your back, resting it on your traps.
Step:3 Engage your core and keep your chest up as you begin to squat down, pushing your hips back and bending your knees. Perform with core intensity.
Step:4 Lower yourself until your thighs are parallel to the ground, or as low as you can comfortably go.
Step:5 Drive through your heels to stand back up, extending your hips and knees.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Barbell High-Bar Squat (Core Focus)
instructions: Step:1 Stand feet shoulder-width, toes slightly out.
Step:2 Place the barbell high on the traps.
Step:3 Brace the core and keep chest up as you squat down with core intent.
Step:4 Lower until thighs are parallel or comfortable depth.
Step:5 Drive through heels to stand, extending hips and knees.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired reps.

translations.name: Sentadilla alta con barra (enfoque en core)
instructions: Paso:1 Coloca los pies al ancho de hombros, puntas ligeramente hacia afuera.
Paso:2 Ubica la barra alta sobre los traps.
Paso:3 Activa el core y mantiene el pecho arriba mientras desciendes con énfasis en el core.
Paso:4 Baja hasta paralelo o a tu rango cómodo.
Paso:5 Empuja con los talones para ponerte de pie, extendiendo caderas y rodillas.
Paso:6 Repite las repeticiones deseadas.

name: sharp style dumbbell sumo pull through
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet wider than shoulder-width apart, toes pointed outwards.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell with both hands in front of your body, arms extended.
Step:3 Bend your knees and lower your hips down into a squat position, keeping your back straight. Focus on sharp movement.
Step:4 Lower the dumbbell down between your legs, keeping your arms straight.
Step:5 Drive through your heels and extend your hips forward, pulling the dumbbell up and in front of your body.
Step:6 Squeeze your glutes at the top of the movement, then lower the dumbbell back down between your legs.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Sharp-Style Dumbbell Sumo Pull-Through
instructions: Step:1 Stand wider than shoulder-width, toes out.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell with both hands in front, arms extended.
Step:3 Drop into a squat keeping back straight, emphasizing crisp movement.
Step:4 Lower the dumbbell between the legs, arms straight.
Step:5 Drive through heels and extend hips forward, pulling the dumbbell through.
Step:6 Squeeze glutes at the top, then lower between legs again.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired reps.

translations.name: Pull-through sumo con mancuerna (estilo preciso)
instructions: Paso:1 Coloca los pies más anchos que hombros, puntas hacia afuera.
Paso:2 Sostén una mancuerna con ambas manos al frente, brazos extendidos.
Paso:3 Desciende a sentadilla manteniendo la espalda recta, enfatizando un movimiento preciso.
Paso:4 Baja la mancuerna entre las piernas con brazos rectos.
Paso:5 Impulsa con los talones y extiende caderas hacia adelante, llevando la mancuerna al frente.
Paso:6 Aprieta glúteos arriba y vuelve a bajar la mancuerna entre las piernas.
Paso:7 Repite las repeticiones deseadas.

name: rough cable standing one arm triceps extension
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, facing the cable machine.
Step:2 Hold the cable handle with your right hand, palm facing down, and position your arm so that it is fully extended and parallel to the ground.
Step:3 Keep your elbow stationary and close to your body.
Step:4 Slowly bend your elbow, lowering the cable handle towards the back of your head.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom of the movement, then extend your arm back to the starting position. Focus on rough movement.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides and perform the exercise with your left arm.

translations.name: Cable Standing One-Arm Triceps Extension (Rough Style)
instructions: Step:1 Stand facing the cable stack, feet shoulder-width.
Step:2 Hold the handle in the right hand, arm extended parallel to the floor.
Step:3 Keep elbow close and stationary.
Step:4 Bend the elbow, lowering the handle behind the head.
Step:5 Pause, then extend back to start with a firm, rough intent.
Step:6 Repeat for reps, then switch sides.

translations.name: Extensión de tríceps a un brazo de pie en polea (estilo fuerte)
instructions: Paso:1 Ponte de pie frente a la polea, pies al ancho de hombros.
Paso:2 Sujeta la manija con la mano derecha, brazo extendido paralelo al piso.
Paso:3 Mantén el codo cerca y estable.
Paso:4 Flexiona el codo llevando la manija detrás de la cabeza.
Paso:5 Pausa y extiende de vuelta con intención firme.
Paso:6 Repite las repeticiones y cambia de lado.

name: assisted standing chin-up with focused
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the machine to your desired assistance level.
Step:2 (focused variation) Stand on the foot platform and grip the handles with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Keep your chest up and shoulders back, engage your core, and slightly bend your knees.
Step:4 Pull your body up by flexing your elbows and driving your elbows down towards your sides.
Step:5 Continue pulling until your chin is above the bar.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your body back down to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Assisted Standing Chin-Up (Focused Variation)
instructions: Step:1 Set the machine to your assistance level.
Step:2 (focused variation) Stand on the platform and grip handles overhand, slightly wider than shoulder-width.
Step:3 Chest up, shoulders back, core braced, knees slightly bent.
Step:4 Pull by flexing elbows and driving them down.
Step:5 Continue until chin clears the bar.
Step:6 Pause on top, then lower under control.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired reps.

translations.name: Dominada asistida de pie (variación enfocada)
instructions: Paso:1 Ajusta la máquina al nivel de asistencia deseado.
Paso:2 (variación enfocada) Colócate en la plataforma y sujeta las manijas con agarre prono, un poco más ancho que hombros.
Paso:3 Pecho arriba, hombros atrás, core activo y rodillas levemente flexionadas.
Paso:4 Tira flexionando los codos y llevándolos hacia abajo.
Paso:5 Continúa hasta que la barbilla pase la barra.
Paso:6 Pausa arriba y baja de forma controlada.
Paso:7 Repite las repeticiones deseadas.

name: single smith shoulder press
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and position yourself on the smith machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 (single variation) Grasp the bar with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Lift the bar off the rack and position it at shoulder level, with your elbows bent and palms facing forward.
Step:4 Press the bar upward until your arms are fully extended overhead.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the bar back down to shoulder level.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Single Smith Shoulder Press
instructions: Step:1 Adjust seat and set stance under the Smith bar.
Step:2 (single variation) Grip the bar overhand, slightly wider than shoulder-width.
Step:3 Unrack to shoulder level, elbows bent, palms forward.
Step:4 Press overhead until arms are fully extended.
Step:5 Pause, then lower to shoulder level.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired reps.

translations.name: Press de hombros en máquina Smith (unilateral)
instructions: Paso:1 Ajusta el asiento y colócate bajo la barra de la Smith.
Paso:2 (variación a un solo lado) Toma la barra con agarre prono, un poco más ancho que hombros.
Paso:3 Desencaja a la altura de hombros, codos flexionados y palmas al frente.
Paso:4 Presiona por encima de la cabeza hasta extender los brazos.
Paso:5 Pausa y baja a la altura de hombros.
Paso:6 Repite las repeticiones deseadas.

name: complete style ez bar lying close grip triceps extension behind head
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on a bench with your feet flat on the ground and your head at the end of the bench.
Step:2 Hold the ez barbell with a close grip, palms facing up, and extend your arms straight up over your chest.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arms stationary, slowly lower the barbell behind your head by bending your elbows.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then extend your arms back up to the starting position. Maintain complete form throughout.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Complete-Style EZ-Bar Lying Close-Grip Triceps Extension (Behind Head)
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on a bench with feet on the floor, head near the bench end.
Step:2 Hold the EZ-bar with a close grip, arms straight over chest.
Step:3 Keep upper arms still and lower the bar behind the head by bending elbows.
Step:4 Pause, then extend back to start with complete control.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired reps.

translations.name: Press francés barra EZ acostado agarre cerrado (detrás de la cabeza)
instructions: Paso:1 Túmbate boca arriba en un banco con los pies en el suelo y la cabeza cerca del borde.
Paso:2 Sujeta la barra EZ con agarre cerrado, brazos rectos sobre el pecho.
Paso:3 Mantén los brazos superiores quietos y baja la barra detrás de la cabeza flexionando los codos.
Paso:4 Pausa y extiende de regreso con control completo.
Paso:5 Repite las repeticiones deseadas.

name: smith one arm row linear
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the height of the smith machine bar to waist level.
Step:2 Stand facing the smith machine with your feet shoulder-width apart. Emphasize linear control.
Step:3 Bend your knees slightly and hinge forward at the hips, keeping your back straight.
Step:4 Grasp the bar with one hand using an overhand grip, with your palm facing down.
Step:5 Keep your elbow close to your body and pull the bar towards your waist, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the top of the movement, then slowly lower the bar back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch to the other arm.

translations.name: Smith One-Arm Row (Linear)
instructions: Step:1 Set Smith bar to about waist height.
Step:2 Stand facing the bar, feet shoulder-width, emphasizing linear control.
Step:3 Slight knee bend and hip hinge, back flat.
Step:4 Grab the bar with one hand, overhand grip.
Step:5 Keep elbow close and row the bar toward the waist, squeezing shoulder blade.
Step:6 Pause at the top, then lower slowly.
Step:7 Repeat for reps, then switch arms.

translations.name: Remo a una mano en máquina Smith (lineal)
instructions: Paso:1 Ajusta la barra de la Smith a la altura de la cintura.
Paso:2 Párate de frente, pies al ancho de hombros, enfatizando control lineal.
Paso:3 Flexiona levemente las rodillas y bisagra de cadera, espalda recta.
Paso:4 Sujeta la barra con una mano en agarre prono.
Paso:5 Mantén el codo cerca y realiza el remo hacia la cintura, apretando la escápula.
Paso:6 Pausa arriba y desciende lentamente.
Paso:7 Repite las repeticiones y cambia de brazo.

name: assisted pull-up inclined
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the machine to your desired weight and height settings.
Step:2 Grasp the handles with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Hang with your arms fully extended and your feet off the ground.
Step:4 Engage your back muscles and pull your body up towards the handles, keeping your elbows close to your body.
Step:5 Continue pulling until your chin is above the handles.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your body back down to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions. Maintain inclined form throughout.

translations.name: Assisted Pull-Up (Inclined)
instructions: Step:1 Set the machine to desired weight and height.
Step:2 Grip handles overhand, slightly wider than shoulder-width.
Step:3 Hang with arms fully extended, feet off the floor.
Step:4 Engage back and pull toward the handles, elbows close.
Step:5 Continue until chin is above the handles.
Step:6 Pause on top, then lower under control.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired reps with an inclined setup.

translations.name: Dominada asistida (inclinada)
instructions: Paso:1 Ajusta la máquina al peso y altura deseados.
Paso:2 Sujeta las manijas con agarre prono, un poco más ancho que hombros.
Paso:3 Cuelga con brazos extendidos y pies fuera del suelo.
Paso:4 Activa la espalda y tira hacia las manijas con codos cerca del cuerpo.
Paso:5 Continúa hasta que la barbilla pase las manijas.
Paso:6 Pausa arriba y baja controlado.
Paso:7 Repite las repeticiones deseadas con configuración inclinada.

name: cable seated row with reverse
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the cable row machine with your feet flat on the footrests and your knees slightly bent.
Step:2 Grasp the handles with an overhand grip, keeping your back straight and your shoulders relaxed.
Step:3 Pull the handles towards your body, squeezing your shoulder blades together. Focus on reverse movement.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the peak of the movement, then slowly release the handles back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Cable Seated Row (Reverse Emphasis)
instructions: Step:1 Sit at the cable row with feet on footrests, knees slightly bent.
Step:2 Grip handles overhand, back straight, shoulders relaxed.
Step:3 Pull handles to the body, squeezing shoulder blades with reverse emphasis.
Step:4 Pause at peak, then release slowly to start.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired reps.

translations.name: Remo sentado en polea (énfasis inverso)
instructions: Paso:1 Siéntate en la máquina de remo con los pies en los apoyapiés y rodillas ligeramente flexionadas.
Paso:2 Sujeta las manijas con agarre prono, espalda recta y hombros relajados.
Paso:3 Tira de las manijas hacia el cuerpo, juntando escápulas con énfasis inverso.
Paso:4 Pausa en el pico y regresa lentamente al inicio.
Paso:5 Repite las repeticiones deseadas.

name: dumbbell hammer curl with traditional
instructions: Step:1 Stand up straight with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing your torso.
Step:2 Keep your elbows close to your torso and rotate the palms of your hands until they are facing forward.
Step:3 This will be your starting position.
Step:4 Now, keeping the upper arms stationary, exhale and curl the weights while contracting your biceps.
Step:5 Continue to raise the weights until your biceps are fully contracted and the dumbbells are at shoulder level.
Step:6 Hold the contracted position for a brief pause as you squeeze your biceps.
Step:7 Then, inhale and slowly begin to lower the dumbbells back to the starting position.
Step:8 Repeat for the recommended amount of repetitions. Focus on traditional movement.

translations.name: Dumbbell Hammer Curl (Traditional)
instructions: Step:1 Stand tall with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing torso.
Step:2 Keep elbows close and rotate palms forward.
Step:3 This is the starting position.
Step:4 Keep upper arms still and curl the weights, contracting biceps.
Step:5 Raise until biceps are fully shortened and dumbbells reach shoulder level.
Step:6 Hold briefly and squeeze the biceps.
Step:7 Lower slowly to the start.
Step:8 Repeat for the recommended reps with traditional control.

translations.name: Curl martillo con mancuernas (tradicional)
instructions: Paso:1 Ponte erguido con una mancuerna en cada mano, palmas hacia el torso.
Paso:2 Mantén los codos cerca y rota las palmas al frente.
Paso:3 Esta es la posición inicial.
Paso:4 Sin mover los brazos superiores, eleva las mancuernas contrayendo los bíceps.
Paso:5 Sube hasta acortar completamente los bíceps y llevar las mancuernas a la altura de los hombros.
Paso:6 Mantén y aprieta brevemente los bíceps.
Paso:7 Desciende lentamente a la posición inicial.
Paso:8 Repite las repeticiones recomendadas con control tradicional.

name: smith machine incline tricep extension - straight variation
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat of the smith machine so that the bar is at shoulder height.
Step:2 Sit on the bench with your back against the pad and your feet flat on the ground.
Step:3 Grasp the bar with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:4 Extend your arms fully, lifting the bar off the rack and holding it directly above your chest. Focus on straight movement.
Step:5 Lower the bar slowly towards your forehead, keeping your elbows close to your head.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push the bar back up to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Smith Machine Incline Tricep Extension (Straight Variation)
instructions: Step:1 Set seat so the bar is at shoulder height.
Step:2 Sit with back on pad and feet flat.
Step:3 Grip bar overhand, slightly wider than shoulder-width.
Step:4 Fully extend arms, unracking bar above chest with a straight path.
Step:5 Lower toward the forehead, elbows close.
Step:6 Pause, then press back to start.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired reps.

translations.name: Extensión de tríceps en máquina Smith inclinada (variación recta)
instructions: Paso:1 Ajusta el asiento para que la barra quede a la altura de los hombros.
Paso:2 Siéntate con la espalda en el respaldo y los pies apoyados.
Paso:3 Toma la barra con agarre prono, un poco más ancho que hombros.
Paso:4 Extiende por completo los brazos, desencajando la barra sobre el pecho en trayectoria recta.
Paso:5 Baja hacia la frente con codos cerca.
Paso:6 Pausa y presiona de regreso al inicio.
Paso:7 Repite las repeticiones deseadas.

name: push-up on lower arms - resistance variation
instructions: Step:1 Start in a plank position with your forearms on the ground and elbows directly below your shoulders.
Step:2 Engage your core and keep your body in a straight line from head to toe.
Step:3 Lower your chest towards the ground by bending your elbows, keeping them close to your body. Emphasize resistance control.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push yourself back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Push-Up on Lower Arms (Resistance Variation)
instructions: Step:1 Start in a forearm plank, elbows under shoulders.
Step:2 Brace core, body in a straight line.
Step:3 Lower chest by bending elbows close to the body with resistance control.
Step:4 Pause at the bottom, then press back to start.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired reps.

translations.name: Flexión sobre antebrazos (variación de resistencia)
instructions: Paso:1 Inicia en plancha sobre antebrazos, codos bajo los hombros.
Paso:2 Activa el core, cuerpo en línea recta.
Paso:3 Desciende el pecho flexionando los codos pegados al cuerpo con control de resistencia.
Paso:4 Pausa abajo y vuelve a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite las repeticiones deseadas.

name: sled 45в° leg wide press - blunt variation
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the sled machine to a 45-degree angle.
Step:2 Sit on the sled machine with your back against the pad and your feet on the foot platform.
Step:3 Position your feet wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:4 Push against the foot platform to extend your legs and straighten your knees.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the end of the movement, then slowly bend your knees to return to the starting position. Maintain blunt form throughout.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Sled 45° Leg Wide Press (Blunt Variation)
instructions: Step:1 Set sled to a 45-degree angle.
Step:2 Sit with back on pad and feet on platform.
Step:3 Place feet wider than shoulder-width.
Step:4 Press to extend legs and straighten knees.
Step:5 Pause, then bend knees to return with steady, blunt form.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired reps.

translations.name: Prensa de piernas en trineo 45° pies anchos (variación firme)
instructions: Paso:1 Ajusta el trineo a 45 grados.
Paso:2 Siéntate con la espalda en el respaldo y los pies en la plataforma.
Paso:3 Coloca los pies más anchos que los hombros.
Paso:4 Empuja para extender las piernas y enderezar las rodillas.
Paso:5 Pausa y flexiona las rodillas para volver con forma estable y firme.
Paso:6 Repite las repeticiones deseadas.

name: dumbbell lunge with firm
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a dumbbell in each hand.
Step:2 Take a step forward with your right foot, lowering your body into a lunge position.
Step:3 Keep your back straight and your chest up as you lower your body. Maintain firm form throughout.
Step:4 Push through your right heel to return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat with your left leg.
Step:6 Alternate legs for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Dumbbell Lunge (Firm)
instructions: Step:1 Stand feet shoulder-width holding a dumbbell in each hand.
Step:2 Step forward with the right foot into a lunge.
Step:3 Keep back straight and chest up, maintaining firm form.
Step:4 Drive through the right heel back to start.
Step:5 Repeat with the left leg.
Step:6 Alternate for the desired reps.

translations.name: Zancada con mancuernas (firme)
instructions: Paso:1 De pie con pies al ancho de hombros, sostén una mancuerna en cada mano.
Paso:2 Da un paso al frente con el pie derecho entrando en zancada.
Paso:3 Mantén la espalda recta y el pecho arriba, con forma firme.
Paso:4 Impulsa con el talón derecho para volver al inicio.
Paso:5 Repite con la pierna izquierda.
Paso:6 Alterna por las repeticiones deseadas.

name: improved sphinx
instructions: Step:1 Lie face down on the ground with your forearms flat on the floor, elbows directly under your shoulders.
Step:2 Engage your core and lift your chest off the ground, keeping your forearms and toes on the floor.
Step:3 Hold this position for a few seconds, making sure to keep your neck in a neutral position.
Step:4 Slowly lower your chest back down to the starting position. Emphasize improved control.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Improved Sphinx
instructions: Step:1 Lie prone with forearms on the floor, elbows under shoulders.
Step:2 Engage core and lift chest off the ground, forearms and toes down.
Step:3 Hold briefly, neck neutral.
Step:4 Lower chest back to start with improved control.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired reps.

translations.name: Esfinge mejorada
instructions: Paso:1 Túmbate boca abajo con antebrazos en el suelo y codos bajo los hombros.
Paso:2 Activa el core y eleva el pecho, manteniendo antebrazos y puntas de pies apoyados.
Paso:3 Mantén brevemente con cuello neutral.
Paso:4 Baja el pecho a la posición inicial con control mejorado.
Paso:5 Repite las repeticiones deseadas.

name: band seated twist pure
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the ground with your legs extended in front of you and your back straight.
Step:2 Wrap the band around your waist and hold the ends with both hands.
Step:3 Engage your abs and slowly twist your torso to one side, keeping your back straight and your feet on the ground.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the end of the twist, then slowly return to the starting position.
Step:5 (pure variation) Repeat the twist to the other side.
Step:6 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: Band Seated Twist (Pure)
instructions: Step:1 Sit with legs extended and back upright.
Step:2 Wrap the band around the waist and hold both ends.
Step:3 Brace abs and rotate the torso to one side, feet on the ground.
Step:4 Pause at end range, then return slowly.
Step:5 (pure variation) Twist to the other side.
Step:6 Alternate sides for the desired reps.

translations.name: Giro sentado con banda (puro)
instructions: Paso:1 Siéntate con las piernas extendidas y la espalda erguida.
Paso:2 Rodea la cintura con la banda y sujeta ambos extremos.
Paso:3 Activa los abdominales y rota el torso a un lado, con los pies en el suelo.
Paso:4 Pausa al final del recorrido y regresa lentamente.
Paso:5 (variación pura) Repite el giro hacia el otro lado.
Paso:6 Alterna lados por las repeticiones deseadas.

name: walk elliptical cross trainer - expanded variation
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the resistance level and incline of the elliptical machine to your desired settings.
Step:2 Step onto the pedals of the machine and grip the handles lightly.
Step:3 Begin by pushing down with your feet and pulling the handles towards your body.
Step:4 Continue this motion, alternating between pushing and pulling, to simulate a walking or running motion. Emphasize expanded control.
Step:5 Maintain a steady pace and keep your core engaged throughout the exercise.
Step:6 Continue for the desired duration of your cardio workout.
Step:7 Gradually decrease the intensity and speed of the machine before stepping off.

translations.name: walk elliptical cross trainer - expanded variation
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the resistance level and incline of the elliptical machine to your desired settings.
Step:2 Step onto the pedals of the machine and grip the handles lightly.
Step:3 Begin by pushing down with your feet and pulling the handles towards your body.
Step:4 Continue this motion, alternating between pushing and pulling, to simulate a walking or running motion. Emphasize expanded control.
Step:5 Maintain a steady pace and keep your core engaged throughout the exercise.
Step:6 Continue for the desired duration of your cardio workout.
Step:7 Gradually decrease the intensity and speed of the machine before stepping off.

translations.name: caminata en elíptica - variación expandida
instructions: Paso:1 Ajusta el nivel de resistencia y la inclinación de la máquina elíptica a tu configuración deseada.
Paso:2 Súbete a los pedales de la máquina y agarra las manijas ligeramente.
Paso:3 Comienza empujando hacia abajo con los pies y jalando las manijas hacia tu cuerpo.
Paso:4 Continúa este movimiento, alternando entre empujar y jalar, para simular un movimiento de caminar o correr. Enfatiza el control expandido.
Paso:5 Mantén un ritmo constante y el core activado durante todo el ejercicio.
Paso:6 Continúa durante el tiempo deseado de tu entrenamiento cardiovascular.
Paso:7 Disminuye gradualmente la intensidad y la velocidad de la máquina antes de bajarte.

name: smith bent over row with declined
instructions: Step:1 Set up the smith machine with the bar at hip height.
Step:2 Stand facing the bar with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Bend your knees slightly and hinge forward at the hips, keeping your back straight.
Step:4 Grasp the bar with an overhand grip, hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:5 Pull the bar towards your lower chest, squeezing your shoulder blades together. Perform with declined intensity.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the bar back down to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: smith bent over row with declined
instructions: Step:1 Set up the smith machine with the bar at hip height.
Step:2 Stand facing the bar with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Bend your knees slightly and hinge forward at the hips, keeping your back straight.
Step:4 Grasp the bar with an overhand grip, hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:5 Pull the bar towards your lower chest, squeezing your shoulder blades together. Perform with declined intensity.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the bar back down to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: remo inclinado en máquina Smith con declinación
instructions: Paso:1 Configura la máquina Smith con la barra a la altura de la cadera.
Paso:2 Párate de frente a la barra con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros.
Paso:3 Flexiona ligeramente las rodillas e inclínate hacia adelante desde las caderas, manteniendo la espalda recta.
Paso:4 Agarra la barra con un agarre prono, con las manos un poco más separadas que el ancho de los hombros.
Paso:5 Jala la barra hacia la parte inferior de tu pecho, apretando los omóplatos. Realiza con intensidad declinada.
Paso:6 Haz una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, luego baja lentamente la barra a la posición inicial.
Paso:7 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell incline one arm press on exercise ball with extended
instructions: Step:1 Sit on an exercise ball with a dumbbell in one hand, feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Slowly walk your feet forward, rolling the ball until your head, neck, and back are supported on the ball. Perform with extended intensity.
Step:3 Hold the dumbbell at shoulder height with your palm facing forward.
Step:4 Press the dumbbell upward until your arm is fully extended.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch to the other arm.

translations.name: dumbbell incline one arm press on exercise ball with extended
instructions: Step:1 Sit on an exercise ball with a dumbbell in one hand, feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Slowly walk your feet forward, rolling the ball until your head, neck, and back are supported on the ball. Perform with extended intensity.
Step:3 Hold the dumbbell at shoulder height with your palm facing forward.
Step:4 Press the dumbbell upward until your arm is fully extended.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch to the other arm.

translations.name: press inclinado a un brazo con mancuerna sobre pelota de ejercicio con extensión
instructions: Paso:1 Siéntate en una pelota de ejercicio con una mancuerna en una mano y los pies planos en el suelo.
Paso:2 Camina lentamente con los pies hacia adelante, rodando la pelota hasta que la cabeza, el cuello y la espalda queden apoyados en la pelota. Realiza con intensidad extendida.
Paso:3 Sostén la mancuerna a la altura del hombro con la palma hacia adelante.
Paso:4 Empuja la mancuerna hacia arriba hasta que el brazo esté completamente extendido.
Paso:5 Haz una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, luego baja lentamente la mancuerna a la posición inicial.
Paso:6 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambia al otro brazo.

name: athletic style battling ropes
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and knees slightly bent.
Step:2 Hold one end of the rope in each hand, with your palms facing each other.
Step:3 Raise your arms to shoulder height, keeping your elbows slightly bent.
Step:4 (athletic variation) Begin making alternating waves with the ropes by rapidly raising and lowering each arm.
Step:5 Continue for the desired duration or number of repetitions.

translations.name: athletic style battling ropes
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and knees slightly bent.
Step:2 Hold one end of the rope in each hand, with your palms facing each other.
Step:3 Raise your arms to shoulder height, keeping your elbows slightly bent.
Step:4 (athletic variation) Begin making alternating waves with the ropes by rapidly raising and lowering each arm.
Step:5 Continue for the desired duration or number of repetitions.

translations.name: cuerdas de batalla estilo atlético
instructions: Paso:1 Párate con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y las rodillas ligeramente flexionadas.
Paso:2 Sostén un extremo de la cuerda en cada mano, con las palmas una frente a la otra.
Paso:3 Levanta los brazos a la altura de los hombros, manteniendo los codos ligeramente flexionados.
Paso:4 (variación atlética) Comienza a hacer ondas alternas con las cuerdas levantando y bajando rápidamente cada brazo.
Paso:5 Continúa durante el tiempo o el número de repeticiones deseado.

name: dumbbell reverse grip row (female) hold
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and knees slightly bent.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell in each hand with an overhand grip, palms facing your body. Perform with hold intensity.
Step:3 Bend forward at the waist, keeping your back straight and your core engaged.
Step:4 Let your arms hang straight down, fully extended, with a slight bend in your elbows.
Step:5 Pull the dumbbells up towards your chest, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbells back down to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell reverse grip row (female) hold
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and knees slightly bent.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell in each hand with an overhand grip, palms facing your body. Perform with hold intensity.
Step:3 Bend forward at the waist, keeping your back straight and your core engaged.
Step:4 Let your arms hang straight down, fully extended, with a slight bend in your elbows.
Step:5 Pull the dumbbells up towards your chest, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the dumbbells back down to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: remo con agarre inverso y mancuernas (femenino) isométrico
instructions: Paso:1 Párate con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y las rodillas ligeramente flexionadas.
Paso:2 Sostén una mancuerna en cada mano con un agarre prono, con las palmas hacia tu cuerpo. Realiza con intensidad isométrica.
Paso:3 Inclínate hacia adelante desde la cintura, manteniendo la espalda recta y el core activado.
Paso:4 Deja que tus brazos cuelguen rectos hacia abajo, completamente extendidos, con una ligera flexión en los codos.
Paso:5 Jala las mancuernas hacia tu pecho, apretando los omóplatos.
Paso:6 Haz una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, luego baja lentamente las mancuernas a la posición inicial.
Paso:7 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: lever narrow grip seated row - strength variation
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and footrests to ensure proper form.
Step:2 Sit on the machine with your feet flat on the footrests and your knees slightly bent.
Step:3 Grasp the handles with a narrow grip, palms facing each other.
Step:4 Keep your back straight and lean slightly forward.
Step:5 Pull the handles towards your torso, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the peak of the movement. Maintain strength form throughout.
Step:7 Slowly release the handles and return to the starting position.
Step:8 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: lever narrow grip seated row - strength variation
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and footrests to ensure proper form.
Step:2 Sit on the machine with your feet flat on the footrests and your knees slightly bent.
Step:3 Grasp the handles with a narrow grip, palms facing each other.
Step:4 Keep your back straight and lean slightly forward.
Step:5 Pull the handles towards your torso, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the peak of the movement. Maintain strength form throughout.
Step:7 Slowly release the handles and return to the starting position.
Step:8 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: remo sentado con agarre estrecho en máquina de palanca - variación de fuerza
instructions: Paso:1 Ajusta la altura del asiento y los reposapiés para asegurar una forma adecuada.
Paso:2 Siéntate en la máquina con los pies planos en los reposapiés y las rodillas ligeramente flexionadas.
Paso:3 Agarra las manijas con un agarre estrecho, con las palmas una frente a la otra.
Paso:4 Mantén la espalda recta e inclínate ligeramente hacia adelante.
Paso:5 Jala las manijas hacia tu torso, apretando los omóplatos.
Paso:6 Haz una pausa por un momento en el punto máximo del movimiento. Mantén la forma de fuerza en todo momento.
Paso:7 Suelta lentamente las manijas y regresa a la posición inicial.
Paso:8 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: traditional barbell romanian deadlift
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your toes pointing forward.
Step:2 Hold the barbell with an overhand grip, hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Bend at the hips, keeping your back straight and your knees slightly bent.
Step:4 Lower the barbell towards the ground, keeping it close to your body.
Step:5 Feel the stretch in your hamstrings as you lower the barbell.
Step:6 Once you feel a stretch in your hamstrings, push your hips forward and stand up straight.
Step:7 Squeeze your glutes at the top of the movement.
Step:8 Lower the barbell back down to the starting position and repeat for the desired number of repetitions. Focus on traditional movement.

translations.name: traditional barbell romanian deadlift
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your toes pointing forward.
Step:2 Hold the barbell with an overhand grip, hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Bend at the hips, keeping your back straight and your knees slightly bent.
Step:4 Lower the barbell towards the ground, keeping it close to your body.
Step:5 Feel the stretch in your hamstrings as you lower the barbell.
Step:6 Once you feel a stretch in your hamstrings, push your hips forward and stand up straight.
Step:7 Squeeze your glutes at the top of the movement.
Step:8 Lower the barbell back down to the starting position and repeat for the desired number of repetitions. Focus on traditional movement.

translations.name: peso muerto rumano tradicional con barra
instructions: Paso:1 Párate con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y los dedos de los pies apuntando hacia adelante.
Paso:2 Sostén la barra con un agarre prono, con las manos un poco más separadas que el ancho de los hombros.
Paso:3 Flexiona las caderas, manteniendo la espalda recta y las rodillas ligeramente flexionadas.
Paso:4 Baja la barra hacia el suelo, manteniéndola cerca de tu cuerpo.
Paso:5 Siente el estiramiento en los isquiotibiales mientras bajas la barra.
Paso:6 Una vez que sientas un estiramiento en los isquiotibiales, empuja las caderas hacia adelante y párate derecho.
Paso:7 Aprieta los glúteos en la parte superior del movimiento.
Paso:8 Baja la barra a la posición inicial y repite el número deseado de repeticiones. Concéntrate en el movimiento tradicional.

name: exercise ball one leg prone lower body rotation fierce
instructions: Step:1 Lie face down on the stability ball with your hips resting on the ball and your legs extended straight behind you.
Step:2 Place your hands on the ground in front of you for support.
Step:3 Engage your glutes and core muscles to stabilize your body.
Step:4 Slowly lift one leg off the ground, keeping it straight and parallel to the floor.
Step:5 Rotate your leg outward, away from your body, while keeping your hips and upper body stable.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the end of the rotation, then slowly return your leg to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat the rotation with the other leg. Focus on fierce movement.
Step:8 Continue alternating legs for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: exercise ball one leg prone lower body rotation fierce
instructions: Step:1 Lie face down on the stability ball with your hips resting on the ball and your legs extended straight behind you.
Step:2 Place your hands on the ground in front of you for support.
Step:3 Engage your glutes and core muscles to stabilize your body.
Step:4 Slowly lift one leg off the ground, keeping it straight and parallel to the floor.
Step:5 Rotate your leg outward, away from your body, while keeping your hips and upper body stable.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the end of the rotation, then slowly return your leg to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat the rotation with the other leg. Focus on fierce movement.
Step:8 Continue alternating legs for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: rotación del tren inferior prono a una pierna en pelota de ejercicio intensa
instructions: Paso:1 Acuéstate boca abajo sobre la pelota de estabilidad con las caderas apoyadas en la pelota y las piernas extendidas rectas detrás de ti.
Paso:2 Coloca las manos en el suelo frente a ti para apoyarte.
Paso:3 Activa los músculos de los glúteos y del core para estabilizar tu cuerpo.
Paso:4 Levanta lentamente una pierna del suelo, manteniéndola recta y paralela al suelo.
Paso:5 Rota la pierna hacia afuera, lejos de tu cuerpo, mientras mantienes las caderas y la parte superior del cuerpo estables.
Paso:6 Haz una pausa por un momento al final de la rotación, luego regresa lentamente la pierna a la posición inicial.
Paso:7 Repite la rotación con la otra pierna. Concéntrate en un movimiento intenso.
Paso:8 Continúa alternando las piernas para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: kettlebell arnold press - beginner variation
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a kettlebell in each hand at shoulder height with your palms facing towards you.
Step:2 Engage your core and press the kettlebells overhead, rotating your palms to face forward as you extend your arms. Emphasize beginner control.
Step:3 Pause at the top of the movement, then slowly lower the kettlebells back to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: kettlebell arnold press - beginner variation
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a kettlebell in each hand at shoulder height with your palms facing towards you.
Step:2 Engage your core and press the kettlebells overhead, rotating your palms to face forward as you extend your arms. Emphasize beginner control.
Step:3 Pause at the top of the movement, then slowly lower the kettlebells back to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: press Arnold con pesa rusa - variación para principiantes
instructions: Paso:1 Párate con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros, sosteniendo una pesa rusa en cada mano a la altura de los hombros con las palmas hacia ti.
Paso:2 Activa tu core y empuja las pesas rusas por encima de la cabeza, girando las palmas hacia adelante mientras extiendes los brazos. Enfatiza el control para principiantes.
Paso:3 Haz una pausa en la parte superior del movimiento, luego baja lentamente las pesas rusas a la posición inicial.
Paso:4 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: fluid dumbbell step-up lunge
instructions: Step:1 Stand in front of a step or platform with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing your sides.
Step:2 Place your right foot on the step, ensuring your entire foot is on the surface.
Step:3 Push through your right heel and lift your body up onto the step, bringing your left foot up as well.
Step:4 (fluid variation) Once both feet are on the step, lower your left foot back down to the starting position, keeping your right foot on the step.
Step:5 Repeat the movement, alternating which foot you step up with each time.
Step:6 Continue for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: fluid dumbbell step-up lunge
instructions: Step:1 Stand in front of a step or platform with a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing your sides.
Step:2 Place your right foot on the step, ensuring your entire foot is on the surface.
Step:3 Push through your right heel and lift your body up onto the step, bringing your left foot up as well.
Step:4 (fluid variation) Once both feet are on the step, lower your left foot back down to the starting position, keeping your right foot on the step.
Step:5 Repeat the movement, alternating which foot you step up with each time.
Step:6 Continue for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: zancada con subida al cajón fluida con mancuernas
instructions: Paso:1 Párate frente a un escalón o plataforma con una mancuerna en cada mano, con las palmas hacia los costados.
Paso:2 Coloca el pie derecho en el escalón, asegurándote de que todo el pie esté sobre la superficie.
Paso:3 Empuja con el talón derecho y levanta el cuerpo sobre el escalón, subiendo también el pie izquierdo.
Paso:4 (variación fluida) Una vez que ambos pies estén en el escalón, baja el pie izquierdo a la posición inicial, manteniendo el pie derecho en el escalón.
Paso:5 Repite el movimiento, alternando el pie con el que subes cada vez.
Paso:6 Continúa durante el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: quads complex
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Lower your body by bending your knees and pushing your hips back as if sitting on a chair.
Step:3 Keep your chest up and your back straight.
Step:4 Lower yourself until your thighs are parallel to the ground.
Step:5 Push through your heels to return to the starting position. Emphasize complex control.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: quads complex
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Lower your body by bending your knees and pushing your hips back as if sitting on a chair.
Step:3 Keep your chest up and your back straight.
Step:4 Lower yourself until your thighs are parallel to the ground.
Step:5 Push through your heels to return to the starting position. Emphasize complex control.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: complejo de cuádriceps
instructions: Paso:1 Párate con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros.
Paso:2 Baja el cuerpo flexionando las rodillas y empujando las caderas hacia atrás como si te sentaras en una silla.
Paso:3 Mantén el pecho erguido y la espalda recta.
Paso:4 Baja hasta que tus muslos estén paralelos al suelo.
Paso:5 Empuja con los talones para volver a la posición inicial. Enfatiza el control complejo.
Paso:6 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: lever assisted chin-up with twisted
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the leverage machine to your desired resistance level.
Step:2 Stand on the foot platform and grip the handles with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Hang with your arms fully extended, keeping your body straight.
Step:4 (twisted variation) Engage your back muscles and pull your body up towards the handles, leading with your chest.
Step:5 Continue pulling until your chin is above the handles.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your body back down to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: lever assisted chin-up with twisted
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the leverage machine to your desired resistance level.
Step:2 Stand on the foot platform and grip the handles with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Hang with your arms fully extended, keeping your body straight.
Step:4 (twisted variation) Engage your back muscles and pull your body up towards the handles, leading with your chest.
Step:5 Continue pulling until your chin is above the handles.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your body back down to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dominada asistida en máquina de palanca con torsión
instructions: Paso:1 Ajusta la máquina de palanca a tu nivel de resistencia deseado.
Paso:2 Párate en la plataforma para los pies y agarra las manijas con un agarre prono, un poco más ancho que el ancho de los hombros.
Paso:3 Cuélgate con los brazos completamente extendidos, manteniendo el cuerpo recto.
Paso:4 (variación con torsión) Activa los músculos de la espalda y jala tu cuerpo hacia las manijas, liderando con el pecho.
Paso:5 Continúa jalando hasta que tu barbilla esté por encima de las manijas.
Paso:6 Haz una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, luego baja lentamente el cuerpo a la posición inicial.
Paso:7 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: push up on bosu ball with improved
instructions: Step:1 Place the bosu ball on the ground with the flat side facing up.
Step:2 Position yourself in a push-up position with your hands on the outer edges of the bosu ball.
Step:3 Engage your core and lower your body down towards the bosu ball by bending your elbows. Focus on improved movement.
Step:4 Push yourself back up to the starting position by extending your arms.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: push up on bosu ball with improved
instructions: Step:1 Place the bosu ball on the ground with the flat side facing up.
Step:2 Position yourself in a push-up position with your hands on the outer edges of the bosu ball.
Step:3 Engage your core and lower your body down towards the bosu ball by bending your elbows. Focus on improved movement.
Step:4 Push yourself back up to the starting position by extending your arms.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: flexión en bosu mejorada
instructions: Paso:1 Coloca el bosu en el suelo con el lado plano hacia arriba.
Paso:2 Colócate en posición de flexión con las manos en los bordes exteriores del bosu.
Paso:3 Activa tu core y baja el cuerpo hacia el bosu flexionando los codos. Concéntrate en un movimiento mejorado.
Paso:4 Empújate de nuevo a la posición inicial extendiendo los brazos.
Paso:5 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dynamic style barbell lying back of the head tricep extension
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on a bench with your feet flat on the ground and your head at the end of the bench.
Step:2 Hold a barbell with an overhand grip, hands shoulder-width apart, and extend your arms straight up over your chest.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arms stationary, slowly lower the barbell behind your head by bending your elbows. Maintain dynamic form throughout.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then extend your arms back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dynamic style barbell lying back of the head tricep extension
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on a bench with your feet flat on the ground and your head at the end of the bench.
Step:2 Hold a barbell with an overhand grip, hands shoulder-width apart, and extend your arms straight up over your chest.
Step:3 Keeping your upper arms stationary, slowly lower the barbell behind your head by bending your elbows. Maintain dynamic form throughout.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then extend your arms back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: extensión de tríceps acostado tras nuca con barra estilo dinámico
instructions: Paso:1 Acuéstate en un banco plano con los pies en el suelo y la cabeza al final del banco.
Paso:2 Sostén una barra con un agarre prono, con las manos separadas al ancho de los hombros, y extiende los brazos rectos sobre tu pecho.
Paso:3 Manteniendo la parte superior de los brazos inmóvil, baja lentamente la barra detrás de tu cabeza flexionando los codos. Mantén una forma dinámica en todo momento.
Paso:4 Haz una pausa por un momento, luego extiende los brazos de nuevo a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: deep smith machine reverse decline close grip bench press
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the smith machine to a decline position.
Step:2 Lie down on the bench with your feet secured under the foot pads.
Step:3 Grasp the barbell with a close grip, slightly narrower than shoulder-width apart.
Step:4 Unrack the barbell and lower it slowly towards your chest, keeping your elbows tucked in. Focus on deep movement.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push the barbell back up to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: deep smith machine reverse decline close grip bench press
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the smith machine to a decline position.
Step:2 Lie down on the bench with your feet secured under the foot pads.
Step:3 Grasp the barbell with a close grip, slightly narrower than shoulder-width apart.
Step:4 Unrack the barbell and lower it slowly towards your chest, keeping your elbows tucked in. Focus on deep movement.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push the barbell back up to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: press de banco declinado profundo con agarre cerrado inverso en máquina Smith
instructions: Paso:1 Ajusta la máquina Smith a una posición declinada.
Paso:2 Acuéstate en el banco con los pies asegurados bajo las almohadillas para los pies.
Paso:3 Agarra la barra con un agarre cerrado, un poco más estrecho que el ancho de los hombros.
Paso:4 Saca la barra del soporte y bájala lentamente hacia tu pecho, manteniendo los codos pegados. Concéntrate en un movimiento profundo.
Paso:5 Haz una pausa por un momento en la parte inferior, luego empuja la barra de nuevo a la posición inicial.
Paso:6 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: hanging straight leg raise with elevated
instructions: Step:1 Hang from a pull-up bar with your arms fully extended and your palms facing away from you.
Step:2 Engage your core and lift your legs up in front of you, keeping them straight.
Step:3 Continue lifting until your legs are parallel to the ground or as high as you can comfortably go. Maintain elevated form throughout.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your legs back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: hanging straight leg raise with elevated
instructions: Step:1 Hang from a pull-up bar with your arms fully extended and your palms facing away from you.
Step:2 Engage your core and lift your legs up in front of you, keeping them straight.
Step:3 Continue lifting until your legs are parallel to the ground or as high as you can comfortably go. Maintain elevated form throughout.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your legs back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: elevación de piernas rectas suspendido con elevación
instructions: Paso:1 Cuélgate de una barra de dominadas con los brazos completamente extendidos y las palmas de las manos mirando hacia afuera.
Paso:2 Activa tu core y levanta las piernas frente a ti, manteniéndolas rectas.
Paso:3 Continúa levantando hasta que tus piernas estén paralelas al suelo o tan alto como puedas cómodamente. Mantén una forma elevada en todo momento.
Paso:4 Haz una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, luego baja lentamente las piernas a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: upright smith incline bench press
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the bench to a 30-45 degree incline.
Step:2 Sit on the bench with your back flat against the pad and feet firmly on the ground.
Step:3 Grasp the barbell with an overhand grip slightly wider than shoulder-width apart. Perform with upright intensity.
Step:4 Unrack the barbell and lower it slowly towards your upper chest, keeping your elbows slightly tucked in.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push the barbell back up to the starting position, fully extending your arms.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: upright smith incline bench press
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the bench to a 30-45 degree incline.
Step:2 Sit on the bench with your back flat against the pad and feet firmly on the ground.
Step:3 Grasp the barbell with an overhand grip slightly wider than shoulder-width apart. Perform with upright intensity.
Step:4 Unrack the barbell and lower it slowly towards your upper chest, keeping your elbows slightly tucked in.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push the barbell back up to the starting position, fully extending your arms.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: press de banco inclinado vertical en máquina Smith
instructions: Paso:1 Ajusta el banco a una inclinación de 30-45 grados.
Paso:2 Siéntate en el banco con la espalda plana contra la almohadilla y los pies firmemente en el suelo.
Paso:3 Agarra la barra con un agarre prono un poco más ancho que el ancho de los hombros. Realiza con intensidad vertical.
Paso:4 Saca la barra del soporte y bájala lentamente hacia la parte superior de tu pecho, manteniendo los codos ligeramente metidos.
Paso:5 Haz una pausa por un momento en la parte inferior, luego empuja la barra de nuevo a la posición inicial, extendiendo completamente los brazos.
Paso:6 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: extended style inverted row
instructions: Step:1 Set up a bar at waist height or use a suspension trainer.
Step:2 Stand facing the bar or suspension trainer, with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Grab the bar or handles with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:4 Lean back, keeping your body straight and your heels on the ground.
Step:5 Pull your chest towards the bar or handles, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower yourself back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions. Perform with extended intensity.

translations.name: extended style inverted row
instructions: Step:1 Set up a bar at waist height or use a suspension trainer.
Step:2 Stand facing the bar or suspension trainer, with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Grab the bar or handles with an overhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:4 Lean back, keeping your body straight and your heels on the ground.
Step:5 Pull your chest towards the bar or handles, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower yourself back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions. Perform with extended intensity.

translations.name: remo invertido estilo extendido
instructions: Paso:1 Coloca una barra a la altura de la cintura o usa un entrenador de suspensión.
Paso:2 Párate de frente a la barra o al entrenador de suspensión, con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros.
Paso:3 Agarra la barra o las manijas con un agarre prono, un poco más ancho que el ancho de los hombros.
Paso:4 Inclínate hacia atrás, manteniendo el cuerpo recto y los talones en el suelo.
Paso:5 Jala tu pecho hacia la barra o las manijas, apretando los omóplatos.
Paso:6 Haz una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, luego baja lentamente a la posición inicial.
Paso:7 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones. Realiza con intensidad extendida.

name: dumbbell one arm fly on exercise ball improved
instructions: Step:1 Sit on an exercise ball with a dumbbell in one hand and your feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Walk your feet forward and roll your body down until your back is resting on the exercise ball.
Step:3 Extend your arm with the dumbbell straight up above your chest, palm facing inwards.
Step:4 Slowly lower the dumbbell out to the side, keeping a slight bend in your elbow.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then squeeze your chest muscles to bring the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms. Focus on improved movement.

translations.name: dumbbell one arm fly on exercise ball improved
instructions: Step:1 Sit on an exercise ball with a dumbbell in one hand and your feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Walk your feet forward and roll your body down until your back is resting on the exercise ball.
Step:3 Extend your arm with the dumbbell straight up above your chest, palm facing inwards.
Step:4 Slowly lower the dumbbell out to the side, keeping a slight bend in your elbow.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then squeeze your chest muscles to bring the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms. Focus on improved movement.

translations.name: aperturas a un brazo con mancuerna sobre pelota de ejercicio mejorada
instructions: Paso:1 Siéntate en una pelota de ejercicio con una mancuerna en una mano y los pies planos en el suelo.
Paso:2 Camina con los pies hacia adelante y rueda el cuerpo hacia abajo hasta que la espalda descanse sobre la pelota de ejercicio.
Paso:3 Extiende el brazo con la mancuerna directamente sobre tu pecho, con la palma hacia adentro.
Paso:4 Baja lentamente la mancuerna hacia un lado, manteniendo una ligera flexión en el codo.
Paso:5 Haz una pausa por un momento, luego aprieta los músculos del pecho para volver a llevar la mancuerna a la posición inicial.
Paso:6 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambia de brazo. Concéntrate en un movimiento mejorado.

name: hanging straight twisting leg hip raise with compound
instructions: Step:1 Hang from a pull-up bar with your arms fully extended and your legs straight.
Step:2 Engage your core and lift your legs up towards your chest, keeping them straight. Perform with compound intensity.
Step:3 Once your legs are parallel to the ground, twist your hips to one side, bringing your legs towards that side.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat the movement, but this time twist your hips to the opposite side.
Step:6 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: hanging straight twisting leg hip raise with compound
instructions: Step:1 Hang from a pull-up bar with your arms fully extended and your legs straight.
Step:2 Engage your core and lift your legs up towards your chest, keeping them straight. Perform with compound intensity.
Step:3 Once your legs are parallel to the ground, twist your hips to one side, bringing your legs towards that side.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then return to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat the movement, but this time twist your hips to the opposite side.
Step:6 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: elevación de cadera con piernas rectas y giro suspendido compuesto
instructions: Paso:1 Cuélgate de una barra de dominadas con los brazos completamente extendidos y las piernas rectas.
Paso:2 Activa tu core y levanta las piernas hacia el pecho, manteniéndolas rectas. Realiza con intensidad compuesta.
Paso:3 Una vez que tus piernas estén paralelas al suelo, gira la cadera hacia un lado, llevando las piernas hacia ese lado.
Paso:4 Haz una pausa por un momento, luego regresa a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite el movimiento, pero esta vez gira la cadera hacia el lado opuesto.
Paso:6 Continúa alternando lados para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: fast band straight leg deadlift
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and place the band around your feet.
Step:2 Hold the band with both hands, palms facing your body, and keep your arms straight.
Step:3 Engage your core and maintain a slight bend in your knees.
Step:4 Slowly hinge forward at your hips, keeping your back straight and chest lifted.
Step:5 Lower the band towards the ground while keeping your legs straight.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then squeeze your glutes and hamstrings to return to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions. Perform with fast intensity.

translations.name: fast band straight leg deadlift
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and place the band around your feet.
Step:2 Hold the band with both hands, palms facing your body, and keep your arms straight.
Step:3 Engage your core and maintain a slight bend in your knees.
Step:4 Slowly hinge forward at your hips, keeping your back straight and chest lifted.
Step:5 Lower the band towards the ground while keeping your legs straight.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then squeeze your glutes and hamstrings to return to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions. Perform with fast intensity.

translations.name: peso muerto rápido con banda y piernas rectas
instructions: Paso:1 Párate con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y coloca la banda alrededor de tus pies.
Paso:2 Sostén la banda con ambas manos, con las palmas hacia tu cuerpo, y mantén los brazos rectos.
Paso:3 Activa tu core y mantén una ligera flexión en las rodillas.
Paso:4 Inclínate lentamente hacia adelante desde las caderas, manteniendo la espalda recta y el pecho erguido.
Paso:5 Baja la banda hacia el suelo mientras mantienes las piernas rectas.
Paso:6 Haz una pausa por un momento en la parte inferior, luego aprieta los glúteos y los isquiotibiales para volver a la posición inicial.
Paso:7 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones. Realiza con intensidad rápida.

name: cable lateral pulldown (with rope attachment) core
instructions: Step:1 Attach a rope attachment to the cable machine at a high position.
Step:2 Stand facing the machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Grasp the rope with an overhand grip, palms facing each other.
Step:4 Keep your back straight and lean slightly back.
Step:5 Pull the rope down towards your sides, squeezing your shoulder blades together. Emphasize core control.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the bottom of the movement.
Step:7 Slowly release the tension and allow the rope to return to the starting position.
Step:8 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: cable lateral pulldown (with rope attachment) core
instructions: Step:1 Attach a rope attachment to the cable machine at a high position.
Step:2 Stand facing the machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Grasp the rope with an overhand grip, palms facing each other.
Step:4 Keep your back straight and lean slightly back.
Step:5 Pull the rope down towards your sides, squeezing your shoulder blades together. Emphasize core control.
Step:6 Pause for a moment at the bottom of the movement.
Step:7 Slowly release the tension and allow the rope to return to the starting position.
Step:8 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: jalón lateral con cable (con agarre de cuerda) para core
instructions: Paso:1 Conecta un accesorio de cuerda a la máquina de cable en una posición alta.
Paso:2 Párate de frente a la máquina con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros.
Paso:3 Agarra la cuerda con un agarre prono, con las palmas una frente a la otra.
Paso:4 Mantén la espalda recta e inclínate ligeramente hacia atrás.
Paso:5 Jala la cuerda hacia abajo, hacia tus costados, apretando los omóplatos. Enfatiza el control del core.
Paso:6 Haz una pausa por un momento en la parte inferior del movimiento.
Paso:7 Libera lentamente la tensión y permite que la cuerda vuelva a la posición inicial.
Paso:8 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: dumbbell around pullover - intensive variation
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on a bench with your head at one end and your feet firmly on the ground.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell with both hands and extend your arms straight above your chest. Perform with intensive intensity.
Step:3 Keeping your arms straight, slowly lower the dumbbell behind your head in an arc motion.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then raise the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dumbbell around pullover - intensive variation
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on a bench with your head at one end and your feet firmly on the ground.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell with both hands and extend your arms straight above your chest. Perform with intensive intensity.
Step:3 Keeping your arms straight, slowly lower the dumbbell behind your head in an arc motion.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then raise the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: pullover alrededor con mancuerna - variación intensiva
instructions: Paso:1 Acuéstate en un banco plano con la cabeza en un extremo y los pies firmemente en el suelo.
Paso:2 Sostén una mancuerna con ambas manos y extiende los brazos rectos sobre tu pecho. Realiza con intensidad intensiva.
Paso:3 Manteniendo los brazos rectos, baja lentamente la mancuerna detrás de la cabeza en un movimiento de arco.
Paso:4 Haz una pausa por un momento en la parte inferior, luego levanta la mancuerna de regreso a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: sit-up with arms on chest with mini
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Cross your arms over your chest.
Step:3 Engaging your abs, lift your upper body off the ground towards your knees.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your upper body back down to the starting position. Maintain mini form throughout.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: sit-up with arms on chest with mini
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Cross your arms over your chest.
Step:3 Engaging your abs, lift your upper body off the ground towards your knees.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your upper body back down to the starting position. Maintain mini form throughout.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: abdominal con brazos en el pecho mini
instructions: Paso:1 Acuéstate boca arriba con las rodillas flexionadas y los pies planos en el suelo.
Paso:2 Cruza los brazos sobre el pecho.
Paso:3 Activando tus abdominales, levanta la parte superior del cuerpo del suelo hacia las rodillas.
Paso:4 Haz una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, luego baja lentamente la parte superior del cuerpo a la posición inicial. Mantén una forma mini en todo momento.
Paso:5 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: squared reverse grip machine lat pulldown
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and position yourself on the machine with your knees under the pads and your feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Grasp the handles with an underhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Sit upright with your chest out and shoulders back, maintaining a slight arch in your lower back.
Step:4 Pull the handles down towards your chest, squeezing your shoulder blades together. Maintain squared form throughout.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom of the movement, then slowly release the handles back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: squared reverse grip machine lat pulldown
instructions: Step:1 Adjust the seat height and position yourself on the machine with your knees under the pads and your feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Grasp the handles with an underhand grip, slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Sit upright with your chest out and shoulders back, maintaining a slight arch in your lower back.
Step:4 Pull the handles down towards your chest, squeezing your shoulder blades together. Maintain squared form throughout.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom of the movement, then slowly release the handles back to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.
