translations.name: jalón al pecho en máquina con agarre inverso cuadrado
instructions: Paso:1 Ajusta la altura del asiento y colócate en la máquina con las rodillas debajo de las almohadillas y los pies planos en el suelo.
Paso:2 Agarra las manijas con un agarre supino, un poco más ancho que el ancho de los hombros.
Paso:3 Siéntate erguido con el pecho hacia afuera y los hombros hacia atrás, manteniendo un ligero arco en la parte baja de la espalda.
Paso:4 Jala las manijas hacia tu pecho, apretando los omóplatos. Mantén una forma cuadrada en todo momento.
Paso:5 Haz una pausa por un momento en la parte inferior del movimiento, luego suelta lentamente las manijas para volver a la posición inicial.
Paso:6 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: targeted style single leg calf raise (on a dumbbell)
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet hip-width apart and hold a dumbbell in one hand.
Step:2 Lift one foot off the ground and balance on the other foot.
Step:3 Slowly raise your heel as high as possible, using your calf muscles. Emphasize targeted control.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your heel back down.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch to the other leg.

translations.name: targeted style single leg calf raise (on a dumbbell)
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet hip-width apart and hold a dumbbell in one hand.
Step:2 Lift one foot off the ground and balance on the other foot.
Step:3 Slowly raise your heel as high as possible, using your calf muscles. Emphasize targeted control.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your heel back down.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch to the other leg.

translations.name: elevación de pantorrilla a una pierna estilo enfocado (sobre una mancuerna)
instructions: Paso:1 Párate con los pies separados al ancho de las caderas y sostén una mancuerna en una mano.
Paso:2 Levanta un pie del suelo y mantén el equilibrio sobre el otro pie.
Paso:3 Levanta lentamente el talón lo más alto posible, usando los músculos de la pantorrilla. Enfatiza el control enfocado.
Paso:4 Haz una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, luego baja lentamente el talón.
Paso:5 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambia a la otra pierna.

name: chest and front of shoulder stretch micro
instructions: Step:1 Stand tall with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Extend your arms straight out in front of you at shoulder height.
Step:3 Cross your arms in front of your body, with your right arm on top of your left arm.
Step:4 Interlace your fingers and press your palms together.
Step:5 Gently squeeze your shoulder blades together and push your hands forward, feeling a stretch in your chest and front of your shoulders.
Step:6 (micro variation) Hold the stretch for 20-30 seconds, then release.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: chest and front of shoulder stretch micro
instructions: Step:1 Stand tall with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Extend your arms straight out in front of you at shoulder height.
Step:3 Cross your arms in front of your body, with your right arm on top of your left arm.
Step:4 Interlace your fingers and press your palms together.
Step:5 Gently squeeze your shoulder blades together and push your hands forward, feeling a stretch in your chest and front of your shoulders.
Step:6 (micro variation) Hold the stretch for 20-30 seconds, then release.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: micro estiramiento de pecho y deltoides anterior
instructions: Paso:1 Párate derecho con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros.
Paso:2 Extiende los brazos rectos frente a ti a la altura de los hombros.
Paso:3 Cruza los brazos frente a tu cuerpo, con el brazo derecho sobre el brazo izquierdo.
Paso:4 Entrelaza los dedos y junta las palmas.
Paso:5 Aprieta suavemente los omóplatos y empuja las manos hacia adelante, sintiendo un estiramiento en el pecho y la parte delantera de los hombros.
Paso:6 (micro variación) Mantén el estiramiento durante 20-30 segundos, luego suelta.
Paso:7 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: kettlebell seated press with high
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your back straight and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Hold a kettlebell in each hand at shoulder height, palms facing forward.
Step:3 Press the kettlebells overhead, fully extending your arms. Focus on high movement.
Step:4 Lower the kettlebells back to shoulder height.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: kettlebell seated press with high
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your back straight and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Hold a kettlebell in each hand at shoulder height, palms facing forward.
Step:3 Press the kettlebells overhead, fully extending your arms. Focus on high movement.
Step:4 Lower the kettlebells back to shoulder height.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: press sentado con pesa rusa alto
instructions: Paso:1 Siéntate en un banco con la espalda recta y los pies planos en el suelo.
Paso:2 Sostén una pesa rusa en cada mano a la altura de los hombros, con las palmas hacia adelante.
Paso:3 Empuja las pesas rusas por encima de la cabeza, extendiendo completamente los brazos. Concéntrate en el movimiento alto.
Paso:4 Baja las pesas rusas de nuevo a la altura de los hombros.
Paso:5 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: barbell squat (on knees) with pure
instructions: Step:1 Start by kneeling on the ground with your knees hip-width apart and your toes pointing forward.
Step:2 Place a barbell across your shoulders, gripping it with an overhand grip and your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Engage your core and keep your chest lifted as you slowly lower your body down by bending your knees, keeping your back straight. Perform with pure intensity.
Step:4 Continue lowering until your thighs are parallel to the ground, or as low as you can comfortably go.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push through your heels to return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: barbell squat (on knees) with pure
instructions: Step:1 Start by kneeling on the ground with your knees hip-width apart and your toes pointing forward.
Step:2 Place a barbell across your shoulders, gripping it with an overhand grip and your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Engage your core and keep your chest lifted as you slowly lower your body down by bending your knees, keeping your back straight. Perform with pure intensity.
Step:4 Continue lowering until your thighs are parallel to the ground, or as low as you can comfortably go.
Step:5 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push through your heels to return to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: sentadilla con barra (de rodillas) pura
instructions: Paso:1 Comienza arrodillado en el suelo con las rodillas separadas al ancho de las caderas y los dedos de los pies apuntando hacia adelante.
Paso:2 Coloca una barra sobre tus hombros, agarrándola con un agarre prono y las manos un poco más separadas que el ancho de los hombros.
Paso:3 Activa tu core y mantén el pecho erguido mientras bajas lentamente el cuerpo flexionando las rodillas, manteniendo la espalda recta. Realiza con intensidad pura.
Paso:4 Continúa bajando hasta que tus muslos estén paralelos al suelo, o tan bajo como puedas cómodamente.
Paso:5 Haz una pausa por un momento en la parte inferior, luego empuja con los talones para volver a la posición inicial.
Paso:6 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: tough cable one arm lateral raise
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, facing the cable machine.
Step:2 Hold the cable handle with one hand, palm facing down, and stand far enough away from the machine so that there is tension on the cable.
Step:3 Keep your arm straight and slowly raise it out to the side until it is parallel to the ground.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your arm back down to the starting position. Focus on tough movement.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides.

translations.name: tough cable one arm lateral raise
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, facing the cable machine.
Step:2 Hold the cable handle with one hand, palm facing down, and stand far enough away from the machine so that there is tension on the cable.
Step:3 Keep your arm straight and slowly raise it out to the side until it is parallel to the ground.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your arm back down to the starting position. Focus on tough movement.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides.

translations.name: elevación lateral a un brazo con cable intensa
instructions: Paso:1 Párate con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros, de frente a la máquina de cable.
Paso:2 Sostén la manija del cable con una mano, con la palma hacia abajo, y párate lo suficientemente lejos de la máquina para que haya tensión en el cable.
Paso:3 Mantén el brazo recto y levántalo lentamente hacia un lado hasta que esté paralelo al suelo.
Paso:4 Haz una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, luego baja lentamente el brazo a la posición inicial. Concéntrate en un movimiento intenso.
Paso:5 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambia de lado.

name: kipping muscle up with triple
instructions: Step:1 Start by hanging from a pull-up bar with an overhand grip, hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Engage your core and use a swinging motion to generate momentum.
Step:3 As you swing forward, pull your chest towards the bar, using your back and biceps to initiate the movement. Emphasize triple control.
Step:4 Continue the upward motion until your chest reaches the bar, then transition into a dip position by pushing down on the bar and extending your arms.
Step:5 Lower yourself back down to the starting position by bending your arms and controlling the descent.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: kipping muscle up with triple
instructions: Step:1 Start by hanging from a pull-up bar with an overhand grip, hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Engage your core and use a swinging motion to generate momentum.
Step:3 As you swing forward, pull your chest towards the bar, using your back and biceps to initiate the movement. Emphasize triple control.
Step:4 Continue the upward motion until your chest reaches the bar, then transition into a dip position by pushing down on the bar and extending your arms.
Step:5 Lower yourself back down to the starting position by bending your arms and controlling the descent.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: muscle up con kipping triple
instructions: Paso:1 Comienza colgando de una barra de dominadas con un agarre prono, con las manos un poco más separadas que el ancho de los hombros.
Paso:2 Activa tu core y utiliza un movimiento de balanceo para generar impulso.
Paso:3 A medida que te balanceas hacia adelante, jala tu pecho hacia la barra, usando la espalda y los bíceps para iniciar el movimiento. Enfatiza el control triple.
Paso:4 Continúa el movimiento ascendente hasta que tu pecho alcance la barra, luego pasa a una posición de fondo empujando la barra hacia abajo y extendiendo los brazos.
Paso:5 Baja de nuevo a la posición inicial flexionando los brazos y controlando el descenso.
Paso:6 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: intermediate style kneeling plank tap shoulder (male)
instructions: Step:1 Start in a kneeling position with your hands on the ground, shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Extend your legs behind you, resting on your toes, and lift your body into a plank position.
Step:3 (intermediate variation) Keeping your core engaged and your hips stable, lift one hand off the ground and tap the opposite shoulder.
Step:4 Return the hand to the ground and repeat with the other hand.
Step:5 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: intermediate style kneeling plank tap shoulder (male)
instructions: Step:1 Start in a kneeling position with your hands on the ground, shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Extend your legs behind you, resting on your toes, and lift your body into a plank position.
Step:3 (intermediate variation) Keeping your core engaged and your hips stable, lift one hand off the ground and tap the opposite shoulder.
Step:4 Return the hand to the ground and repeat with the other hand.
Step:5 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: toque de hombro en plancha de rodillas estilo intermedio (masculino)
instructions: Paso:1 Comienza en una posición de rodillas con las manos en el suelo, separadas al ancho de los hombros.
Paso:2 Extiende las piernas detrás de ti, apoyándote en los dedos de los pies, y levanta el cuerpo a una posición de plancha.
Paso:3 (variación intermedia) Manteniendo el core activado y las caderas estables, levanta una mano del suelo y toca el hombro opuesto.
Paso:4 Regresa la mano al suelo y repite con la otra mano.
Paso:5 Continúa alternando lados para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: intensified style kettlebell extended range one arm press on floor
instructions: Step:1 Start by lying on your back on the floor with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Hold a kettlebell in one hand, with your palm facing towards your feet.
Step:3 Extend your arm straight up towards the ceiling, keeping your elbow locked and your wrist straight.
Step:4 Slowly lower the kettlebell back down to the starting position, maintaining control throughout the movement.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch to the other arm. Perform with intensified intensity.

translations.name: intensified style kettlebell extended range one arm press on floor
instructions: Step:1 Start by lying on your back on the floor with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Hold a kettlebell in one hand, with your palm facing towards your feet.
Step:3 Extend your arm straight up towards the ceiling, keeping your elbow locked and your wrist straight.
Step:4 Slowly lower the kettlebell back down to the starting position, maintaining control throughout the movement.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch to the other arm. Perform with intensified intensity.

translations.name: press de suelo a un brazo con rango extendido y pesa rusa estilo intensificado
instructions: Paso:1 Comienza acostado boca arriba en el suelo con las rodillas flexionadas y los pies planos en el suelo.
Paso:2 Sostén una pesa rusa en una mano, con la palma mirando hacia tus pies.
Paso:3 Extiende el brazo recto hacia el techo, manteniendo el codo bloqueado y la muñeca recta.
Paso:4 Baja lentamente la pesa rusa a la posición inicial, manteniendo el control durante todo el movimiento.
Paso:5 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambia al otro brazo. Realiza con intensidad intensificada.

name: supine style band alternating v-up
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your legs straight and your arms extended overhead, holding the band.
Step:2 Engage your abs and lift your legs and upper body off the ground simultaneously, reaching your hands towards your toes.
Step:3 As you lower your legs and upper body back down, switch the position of your legs, crossing one over the other. Focus on supine movement.
Step:4 Repeat the movement, alternating the position of your legs with each repetition.
Step:5 Continue for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: supine style band alternating v-up
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your legs straight and your arms extended overhead, holding the band.
Step:2 Engage your abs and lift your legs and upper body off the ground simultaneously, reaching your hands towards your toes.
Step:3 As you lower your legs and upper body back down, switch the position of your legs, crossing one over the other. Focus on supine movement.
Step:4 Repeat the movement, alternating the position of your legs with each repetition.
Step:5 Continue for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: v-up alterno con banda estilo supino
instructions: Paso:1 Acuéstate boca arriba con las piernas rectas y los brazos extendidos por encima de la cabeza, sosteniendo la banda.
Paso:2 Activa tus abdominales y levanta las piernas y la parte superior del cuerpo del suelo simultáneamente, llevando las manos hacia los dedos de los pies.
Paso:3 A medida que bajas las piernas y la parte superior del cuerpo, cambia la posición de las piernas, cruzando una sobre la otra. Concéntrate en el movimiento supino.
Paso:4 Repite el movimiento, alternando la posición de las piernas con cada repetición.
Paso:5 Continúa durante el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: assisted standing triceps extension (with towel) with horizontal
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a towel with both hands behind your head.
Step:2 Keep your elbows close to your ears and your upper arms stationary.
Step:3 (horizontal variation) Slowly extend your forearms upward, squeezing your triceps at the top.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then slowly lower the towel back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: assisted standing triceps extension (with towel) with horizontal
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a towel with both hands behind your head.
Step:2 Keep your elbows close to your ears and your upper arms stationary.
Step:3 (horizontal variation) Slowly extend your forearms upward, squeezing your triceps at the top.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then slowly lower the towel back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: extensión de tríceps de pie asistida (con toalla) horizontal
instructions: Paso:1 Párate con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y sostén una toalla con ambas manos detrás de la cabeza.
Paso:2 Mantén los codos cerca de las orejas y la parte superior de los brazos inmóvil.
Paso:3 (variación horizontal) Extiende lentamente los antebrazos hacia arriba, apretando los tríceps en la parte superior.
Paso:4 Haz una pausa por un momento, luego baja lentamente la toalla a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: wall style dumbbell one arm french press on exercise ball
instructions: Step:1 Sit on an exercise ball with your feet flat on the ground and your back straight.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell in one hand with your palm facing up and your elbow bent at a 90-degree angle. Focus on wall movement.
Step:3 Extend your arm straight up towards the ceiling, keeping your elbow stationary.
Step:4 Slowly lower the dumbbell back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

translations.name: wall style dumbbell one arm french press on exercise ball
instructions: Step:1 Sit on an exercise ball with your feet flat on the ground and your back straight.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell in one hand with your palm facing up and your elbow bent at a 90-degree angle. Focus on wall movement.
Step:3 Extend your arm straight up towards the ceiling, keeping your elbow stationary.
Step:4 Slowly lower the dumbbell back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

translations.name: press francés a un brazo con mancuerna sobre pelota de ejercicio estilo pared
instructions: Paso:1 Siéntate en una pelota de ejercicio con los pies planos en el suelo y la espalda recta.
Paso:2 Sostén una mancuerna en una mano con la palma hacia arriba y el codo flexionado en un ángulo de 90 grados. Concéntrate en el movimiento de pared.
Paso:3 Extiende el brazo recto hacia el techo, manteniendo el codo inmóvil.
Paso:4 Baja lentamente la mancuerna a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambia de brazo.

name: side-to-side chin with reverse
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your knees slightly bent.
Step:2 Grasp a pull-up bar with an overhand grip, hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Hang from the bar with your arms fully extended and your body relaxed.
Step:4 Pull yourself up by bending your elbows and bringing your chin towards the bar, while keeping your body straight. Perform with reverse intensity.
Step:5 Once your chin is above the bar, lower yourself back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: side-to-side chin with reverse
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your knees slightly bent.
Step:2 Grasp a pull-up bar with an overhand grip, hands slightly wider than shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Hang from the bar with your arms fully extended and your body relaxed.
Step:4 Pull yourself up by bending your elbows and bringing your chin towards the bar, while keeping your body straight. Perform with reverse intensity.
Step:5 Once your chin is above the bar, lower yourself back down to the starting position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: dominada de lado a lado con reverso
instructions: Paso:1 Párate con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y las rodillas ligeramente flexionadas.
Paso:2 Agarra una barra de dominadas con un agarre prono, con las manos un poco más separadas que el ancho de los hombros.
Paso:3 Cuélgate de la barra con los brazos completamente extendidos y el cuerpo relajado.
Paso:4 Sube flexionando los codos y llevando la barbilla hacia la barra, mientras mantienes el cuerpo recto. Realiza con intensidad inversa.
Paso:5 Una vez que tu barbilla esté por encima de la barra, baja de nuevo a la posición inicial.
Paso:6 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: macro style close-grip push-up
instructions: Step:1 Start in a high plank position with your hands placed close together, directly under your shoulders.
Step:2 Engage your core and lower your body towards the ground, keeping your elbows close to your sides.
Step:3 Push through your palms to extend your arms and return to the starting position. Maintain macro form throughout.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: macro style close-grip push-up
instructions: Step:1 Start in a high plank position with your hands placed close together, directly under your shoulders.
Step:2 Engage your core and lower your body towards the ground, keeping your elbows close to your sides.
Step:3 Push through your palms to extend your arms and return to the starting position. Maintain macro form throughout.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: flexión con agarre cerrado estilo macro
instructions: Paso:1 Comienza en una posición de plancha alta con las manos juntas, directamente debajo de los hombros.
Paso:2 Activa tu core y baja el cuerpo hacia el suelo, manteniendo los codos cerca de los costados.
Paso:3 Empuja con las palmas para extender los brazos y volver a la posición inicial. Mantén la forma macro en todo momento.
Paso:4 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: gentle prone twist on stability ball
instructions: Step:1 Start by lying face down on a stability ball with your feet shoulder-width apart and your toes touching the ground.
Step:2 Place your hands behind your head or cross them over your chest.
Step:3 Engage your core muscles and slowly lift your upper body off the ball, keeping your back straight.
Step:4 Rotate your torso to one side, bringing your shoulder towards your hip. Keep your hips and legs stable throughout the movement.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then return to the starting position.
Step:6 (gentle variation) Repeat the rotation to the other side.
Step:7 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: gentle prone twist on stability ball
instructions: Step:1 Start by lying face down on a stability ball with your feet shoulder-width apart and your toes touching the ground.
Step:2 Place your hands behind your head or cross them over your chest.
Step:3 Engage your core muscles and slowly lift your upper body off the ball, keeping your back straight.
Step:4 Rotate your torso to one side, bringing your shoulder towards your hip. Keep your hips and legs stable throughout the movement.
Step:5 Pause for a moment, then return to the starting position.
Step:6 (gentle variation) Repeat the rotation to the other side.
Step:7 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: torsión prona suave sobre pelota de estabilidad
instructions: Paso:1 Comienza acostado boca abajo sobre una pelota de estabilidad con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y los dedos de los pies tocando el suelo.
Paso:2 Coloca las manos detrás de la cabeza o crúzalas sobre el pecho.
Paso:3 Activa los músculos del core y levanta lentamente la parte superior del cuerpo de la pelota, manteniendo la espalda recta.
Paso:4 Gira el torso hacia un lado, llevando el hombro hacia la cadera. Mantén las caderas y las piernas estables durante todo el movimiento.
Paso:5 Haz una pausa por un momento, luego regresa a la posición inicial.
Paso:6 (variación suave) Repite la rotación hacia el otro lado.
Paso:7 Continúa alternando lados para el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: cable rope incline tricep extension - reverse variation
instructions: Step:1 Attach a rope to a high pulley and adjust the incline bench to a comfortable angle.
Step:2 Stand facing away from the pulley with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Grasp the rope with an overhand grip and extend your arms straight overhead.
Step:4 (reverse variation) Keep your elbows close to your head and your upper arms stationary throughout the exercise.
Step:5 Lower the rope behind your head by bending your elbows until your forearms touch your biceps.
Step:6 Pause for a moment, then extend your arms back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: cable rope incline tricep extension - reverse variation
instructions: Step:1 Attach a rope to a high pulley and adjust the incline bench to a comfortable angle.
Step:2 Stand facing away from the pulley with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 Grasp the rope with an overhand grip and extend your arms straight overhead.
Step:4 (reverse variation) Keep your elbows close to your head and your upper arms stationary throughout the exercise.
Step:5 Lower the rope behind your head by bending your elbows until your forearms touch your biceps.
Step:6 Pause for a moment, then extend your arms back to the starting position.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: extensión de tríceps inclinada con cuerda en polea - variación inversa
instructions: Paso:1 Conecta una cuerda a una polea alta y ajusta el banco inclinado a un ángulo cómodo.
Paso:2 Párate de espaldas a la polea con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros.
Paso:3 Agarra la cuerda con un agarre prono y extiende los brazos rectos por encima de la cabeza.
Paso:4 (variación inversa) Mantén los codos cerca de la cabeza y la parte superior de los brazos inmóvil durante todo el ejercicio.
Paso:5 Baja la cuerda detrás de la cabeza flexionando los codos hasta que los antebrazos toquen los bíceps.
Paso:6 Haz una pausa por un momento, luego extiende los brazos de nuevo a la posición inicial.
Paso:7 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: cable squat row (with rope attachment) heavy
instructions: Step:1 Attach a rope to a cable machine at waist height.
Step:2 Stand facing the cable machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 (heavy variation) Bend your knees and lower your body into a squat position, keeping your back straight and chest up.
Step:4 Grasp the rope with an overhand grip, with your hands shoulder-width apart.
Step:5 Engage your core and pull the rope towards your body, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:6 Keep your elbows close to your body and continue pulling until your hands reach your chest.
Step:7 Pause for a moment at the top of the movement, then slowly release the rope and extend your arms back to the starting position.
Step:8 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: cable squat row (with rope attachment) heavy
instructions: Step:1 Attach a rope to a cable machine at waist height.
Step:2 Stand facing the cable machine with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:3 (heavy variation) Bend your knees and lower your body into a squat position, keeping your back straight and chest up.
Step:4 Grasp the rope with an overhand grip, with your hands shoulder-width apart.
Step:5 Engage your core and pull the rope towards your body, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:6 Keep your elbows close to your body and continue pulling until your hands reach your chest.
Step:7 Pause for a moment at the top of the movement, then slowly release the rope and extend your arms back to the starting position.
Step:8 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: remo en sentadilla con cable pesado (con agarre de cuerda)
instructions: Paso:1 Conecta una cuerda a una máquina de cable a la altura de la cintura.
Paso:2 Párate de frente a la máquina de cable con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros.
Paso:3 (variación pesada) Flexiona las rodillas y baja el cuerpo a una posición de sentadilla, manteniendo la espalda recta y el pecho erguido.
Paso:4 Agarra la cuerda con un agarre prono, con las manos separadas al ancho de los hombros.
Paso:5 Activa tu core y jala la cuerda hacia tu cuerpo, apretando los omóplatos.
Paso:6 Mantén los codos cerca del cuerpo y continúa jalando hasta que tus manos lleguen al pecho.
Paso:7 Haz una pausa por un momento en la parte superior del movimiento, luego suelta lentamente la cuerda y extiende los brazos de regreso a la posición inicial.
Paso:8 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: band vertical pallof press - seated variation
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and wrap the band around a sturdy object at chest height.
Step:2 Hold the band with both hands and step away from the anchor point, creating tension in the band.
Step:3 Position yourself perpendicular to the anchor point, with your side facing the band.
Step:4 Extend your arms straight out in front of you, keeping your hands at chest height.
Step:5 Engage your core and press the band away from your chest, fully extending your arms.
Step:6 Hold the position for a few seconds, then slowly bring the band back towards your chest.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides. Perform with seated intensity.

translations.name: band vertical pallof press - seated variation
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and wrap the band around a sturdy object at chest height.
Step:2 Hold the band with both hands and step away from the anchor point, creating tension in the band.
Step:3 Position yourself perpendicular to the anchor point, with your side facing the band.
Step:4 Extend your arms straight out in front of you, keeping your hands at chest height.
Step:5 Engage your core and press the band away from your chest, fully extending your arms.
Step:6 Hold the position for a few seconds, then slowly bring the band back towards your chest.
Step:7 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch sides. Perform with seated intensity.

translations.name: press pallof vertical con banda - variación sentada
instructions: Paso:1 Párate con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros y enrolla la banda alrededor de un objeto resistente a la altura del pecho.
Paso:2 Sostén la banda con ambas manos y aléjate del punto de anclaje, creando tensión en la banda.
Paso:3 Colócate perpendicular al punto de anclaje, con el costado hacia la banda.
Paso:4 Extiende los brazos rectos frente a ti, manteniendo las manos a la altura del pecho.
Paso:5 Activa tu core y empuja la banda lejos de tu pecho, extendiendo completamente los brazos.
Paso:6 Mantén la posición durante unos segundos, luego regresa lentamente la banda hacia tu pecho.
Paso:7 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones, luego cambia de lado. Realiza con intensidad sentada.

name: barbell reverse wrist curl - prone variation
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your feet flat on the ground and hold a barbell with an overhand grip, palms facing down.
Step:2 Rest your forearms on your thighs, allowing your wrists to hang off the edge.
Step:3 Slowly curl your wrists upward, bringing the barbell towards your body. Emphasize prone control.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the barbell back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: barbell reverse wrist curl - prone variation
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your feet flat on the ground and hold a barbell with an overhand grip, palms facing down.
Step:2 Rest your forearms on your thighs, allowing your wrists to hang off the edge.
Step:3 Slowly curl your wrists upward, bringing the barbell towards your body. Emphasize prone control.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower the barbell back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: curl de muñeca inverso con barra - variación prona
instructions: Paso:1 Siéntate en un banco con los pies planos en el suelo y sostén una barra con un agarre prono, con las palmas hacia abajo.
Paso:2 Apoya los antebrazos en los muslos, permitiendo que las muñecas cuelguen del borde.
Paso:3 Flexiona lentamente las muñecas hacia arriba, llevando la barra hacia tu cuerpo. Enfatiza el control prono.
Paso:4 Haz una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, luego baja lentamente la barra a la posición inicial.
Paso:5 Repite el número deseado de repeticiones.

name: firm style hanging oblique knee raise
instructions: Step:1 Hang from a pull-up bar with your arms fully extended and your palms facing away from you.
Step:2 Engage your core and lift your knees towards your chest, twisting your torso to the side as you do so.
Step:3 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your legs back down to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat on the other side, twisting your torso in the opposite direction.
Step:5 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions. Emphasize firm control.

translations.name: firm style hanging oblique knee raise
instructions: Step:1 Hang from a pull-up bar with your arms fully extended and your palms facing away from you.
Step:2 Engage your core and lift your knees towards your chest, twisting your torso to the side as you do so.
Step:3 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your legs back down to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat on the other side, twisting your torso in the opposite direction.
Step:5 Continue alternating sides for the desired number of repetitions. Emphasize firm control.

translations.name: elevación de rodillas oblicua suspendido estilo firme
instructions: Paso:1 Cuélgate de una barra de dominadas con los brazos completamente extendidos y las palmas de las manos mirando hacia afuera.
Paso:2 Activa tu core y levanta las rodillas hacia el pecho, girando el torso hacia un lado mientras lo haces.
Paso:3 Haz una pausa por un momento en la parte superior, luego baja lentamente las piernas a la posición inicial.
Paso:4 Repite en el otro lado, girando el torso en la dirección opuesta.
Paso:5 Continúa alternando lados para el número deseado de repeticiones. Enfatiza el control firme.

name: horizontal dumbbell standing alternate overhead press
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a dumbbell in each hand at shoulder level with your palms facing forward.
Step:2 (horizontal variation) Press one dumbbell overhead, fully extending your arm.
Step:3 Lower the dumbbell back to shoulder level.
Step:4 Repeat with the other arm.
Step:5 Continue alternating arms for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: horizontal dumbbell standing alternate overhead press
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a dumbbell in each hand at shoulder level with your palms facing forward.
Step:2 (horizontal variation) Press one dumbbell overhead, fully extending your arm.
Step:3 Lower the dumbbell back to shoulder level.
Step:4 Repeat with the other arm.
Step:5 Continue alternating arms for the desired number of repetitions.

translations.name: press militar alterno de pie con mancuernas horizontal
instructions: Paso:1 Párate con los pies separados al ancho de los hombros, sosteniendo una mancuerna en cada mano a la altura de los hombros con las palmas hacia adelante.
Paso:2 (variación horizontal) Empuja una mancuerna por encima de la cabeza, extendiendo completamente el brazo.
Paso:3 Baja la mancuerna de nuevo a la altura de los hombros.
Paso:4 Repite con el otro brazo.
Paso:5 Continúa alternando los brazos para el número deseado de repeticiones.
